Title: Red Kite Tree Tent - Ynys Affalon
Description: escape to one of these two fabulous tree tents suspended high above the canopy its time to appreciate life from a new perspective featured on george clarkes amazing spaces these tree tents are a feat of aviation technology tree tent comes complete with fire pit outdoor kitchen and shower with hot water youll discover a comfortable bed and cosy wood burning stove part of the red kite estate along with our barn and its sister tree tent the first ever built in the uk dragons egg the space the spacenthe true joy of this place is how wonderfully simple it is aviation technology aside days are filled with fireside discussions wildlife watching and stunningly beautiful walks with the nearest mobile signal a ten minute walk away its a great place to ditch the digital and truly escape head over the bridge to your own private deck that happily houses a clever outdoorkitchen and shower complete with hot water its the perfect spot to fry up breakfast whilst basking in peace and tranquility there is also a flushing toilet situated just up the hilland dont worry youre not totally left to your own devices on arrival you can expect bed linen towels and a load of dry wood and kindling if you feel the need to leave your new found homestead in the trees then the local area has lots of suitably chilled things to do head out on a moorland walk to take in some magical views and perhaps even grab a pint at the local pub en route further afield the stunning elan valley a landscape bursting with impressive dams and reservoirs is well worthy of an explore and for those needing supplies and perhaps a flat white then the friendly market town of builth wells is just down the road other things to notenyou are entering a remote woodland hideaway for a digital detox there is very patchy mobile signal and limited internet connectivity

Title:
Cabane Entre Les Pins
üå≤üèïÔ∏èüå≤
Description: rustic cabin between the pines 3 meters high and 28 square meters on the banks of the austreberth river the space the spacenour cabin between the pines is a great alternative for those looking for contact with nature and want to rest enjoy together or have fun with family or friends with 3 meters high and 28 square meters it accommodates 4 people located on a 12 hectare property by the river austreberthe our rustic treehouse shares the space with our garden rabbits and dumplings as well as wild dumplings and our beloved khenty mare who loves apples and carrots a tranquil retreat with efficient thermal insulation and heaters for the colder days equipped with a double bed sofa bed kitchen duvet and toiletnnnwe providentowelsnbed linens and pillowsnkitchen detergent and bathroom soapnpaper towels toilet paperncooking utensilsncoffee tea salt and pepper herbs of provencenwhat to do in the areas guidennill follow us on instagram entreespins guest access guest accessnguests can use the space around the cabin other things to note other things to notenwhen its windy the cabin squeaks but theres nothing to worry aboutnndo not use candles or objects containing a fire inside and outside the cabin as the polyester is flammablennsmoking outside only pleasennour dear pets are allowed but with the commitment of their guardian not to leave them on the bed and furnishing fabrics as well as being responsible for their wastennpine needles often fall on the balcony which doesnt mean the space hasnt been cleanednnas this is literally a house between the trees it is common that there are insects and cobwebs outside but with the door closed it will prevent them from entering the cabinnnwith the arrival of the cold season we see that the internal temperature is between 15 and 18 degreesnncheckout time must be respected so as not to change the arrival time of the next guest

Title: Tree Top Cabin with log burner & private hot tub
Description: the tree top cabin is situated in our peaceful woodland in the heart of snowdonia it has a shower hot water includedand wc and washbasin no hot water in the washbasinnlighting is provided from a 12v solar panel systemna log burner is provided with free woodnthere is a double bednthe private wood fired hot tub is situated on a balcony overlooking the woodland areanpet friendlynoutside seating is provided the space the spacenthis unique glamping experience has everything you need for a restful and idyllic break from everyday life wake up to bird song and the sound of the stream enjoy your own exclusive hot tub whilst sipping a glass of bubbly our cabin is fully insulated and has everything you need for that perfect rustic getaway without compromising on quality and conveniencennall bedding and towels are included in your stay you may like to bring extra towels for hot tub usagenna small log burner inside to keep you nice and cosynnthere is limited telephone signal

Title: Treehouse near Paris Disney
Description: charming cabin nestled in the leaves real unusual and cozy house in the trees with all the modern comforts just 45 minutes from paris 28 km from disneyland or provins and 5 minutes from the parc des flins this cozy nest awaits you yearround for an unusual romantic or family experience a parenthesis of relaxation and relaxation ideal to offer yourself or yourself see you soon the space the spacenla cabane perche de chambonnire awaits you over the seasons and offers a comfortable and cozy setting amidst the trees the opportunity to escape from everyday life during a romantic stay with two or family for one or more nightsnnyou will be seduced by this treehouse full of charm with neat decorationn access by gentle slope ideal for welcoming you easilyn charming living room with bioethanol fireplace only in cold weather and exclusively for couples or families with children over 7 years oldn fully equipped kitchenn double bedroom 1 bedroom with 2 single beds upstairsn shower room with shower and real toiletn magnificent private terrace of 36m with garden furniture and deckchairnnnthis cozy nest in the trees offers all the modern comforts electricity heating bathroom with toilet and standard shower flat screen tv and a kitchenette with multifunction oven refrigerator hob wifi internet access for your arrival all beds are madennthe shack perched in chambonnire is ideally located to allow you to discover the charms of the seine and marne and the champagne regionn the parc des flinsn the medieval city of provins with magnificent equestrian and falconry shows in seasonn disneyland paris la valle village 25mnn the castles of vaux le vicomte blandy les tours and fontainebleaun and for the most sporty depending on the seasonn tree climbingn paintballn karting and other motor sportsn youll also have a chance to go for nice walks around on foot or by mountain bike and tennis in the villagenna parenthesis of relaxation and relaxation ideal to offer yourself or yourself nnlooking forward to welcoming younnnthe rates shown in the calendar are for 2 people rates for 4 people are calculated automatically when bookingnna surcharge may be charged if the general condition rendered is indecent other things to note other things to notenthe owners reserve the right to cancel your stay at the hut if the weather conditions are very bad whether they are known a few days before or even on the day of arrival whether you are already on the road or already arrived on site or during your stay weather alert severe weather events strong wind storm thunderstorm if this happens well try to relocate you to other types of accommodation nearby subject to availability and at no extra charge if we do not have a relocation solution available and in this case only you will be offered a date extension at the choice of the owners or you will receive a 50 discount on a next equivalent stay in a cabin in the current 12 months in any case no compensation or reimbursement can be claimed

Title: CABANE DES GIROLLES - IN THE TREES
Description: above all this is a breathtaking setting that we invite you to discover during your stay at les hbergements de qunecan we invite you to escape to this natural and unique horizon in the heart of naturennin the heart of the immense forest of quncan near the water points or overlooking the former iron and steel village of les forges enjoy the peace and quiet to take a moment to recharge your batteries away from everyday life the space the spacenlocated at a height of 10 meters in an oak of nearly 200 years the cabane des girolles takes its name from the good girolles harvests that are made regularly for the happiness of allnnit is equipped withnna bed in 90na bed in 140 abovena toilet corner with water reserve dry toilet wipesna spacious sunny terrace overlooking the listed village of les forges des salles ideal terrace for breakfast or summer eveningsnextra heating when the need arisesnyou can have sanitary showers toilets arranged for you at the reception to enjoy several days of our sitenit is ideal for a couple and a childnnit is accessed by a long fully secured footbridge that will delight young and old alikenn we remind you that each of our accommodations has a small toilet area as well as a dry toilet and a sun terrace breakfast is included the evening meal can be delivered by reservation

Title: RENARDI√àRE HUT - IN THE TREES
Description: it is above all a breathtaking setting that we offer you to discover during your stay at accommodations in quncan we invite you to escape to this natural and unique landscape surrounded by naturennin the heart of the immense forest of quncan near the water points or overlooking the old steel village of les forges take advantage of the peace and quiet to take a moment to recharge your batteries away from everyday life the space the spacenin the forest on the edge of the private furnace pond 12 hectares the renardire cabin is built at a height of 5 meters while douglasfir and larch naturally impenetrable wood this cabin for 6 people is ideal for an exceptional moment with friends or family located in an oak tree and supported by 5 pillars this large very spacious and clear cabin will seduce you with its originalitya spiral staircase will take you to the southwesterly facing terrace overlooking the furnace pondthe occupants of the cabin will be able to settle in for dinner at sunset the cabin is composed of a living room with coffee table and benches a bed in 140 retractable 2 beds in 90 including a 90140 a mezzanine with a bed in 160 a small toilet with dry toilets this hut will please aspiring pirates indeed our builders have planned a drawbridge to maneuver to drop the moorings and start the adventure guest access guest accessnaccess indicated during booking private parking at the foot of the cabin other things to note other things to notenon the estate enjoy the steel village of les forges des salles free visit this former wellpreserved steel industrial site brings you back to the daily life of a 19th century blacksmithnaround lake guerldan the abbey of bon repos the museum of electricity the valley of saints are all sites that open their doors to you

Title: La Cabane Les Faines
Description: the les faines cabin perched in a 150yearold beech tree will make you live an unusual nature experience in normandy yearroundnwe are located 12 km from dieppe seinemaritime 2 h from paris and 3 h from brussels the space the spacennestled in a 150yearold beech tree 8 m high this hut is oriented northwest sunset ensured on the terrace 10 m between the branches overlooking the horse meadow and you can watch for the passage of animals among others deer who like to sleep nearbynthis hut 10 m built with total respect for the tree and its environment accommodates 2 people adult or 12 years minimum accompanied by an adultnnaccess is via a beautiful spiral staircase then via a 15 m long walkwaynnit is undoubtedly the easiest access deckhouse combining height and easennthis hut also gives you exclusive access to another large terrace common to the 3 bridge huts perched 20 m from a 190yearold beech tree it is the tallest terrace in france accessible by a magnificent crinoline ladder fully secured change of scenery and relaxation guaranteed nnwithout running water or electricity but rustic comfort for a unique adventure in the wild water supply 4 l dry toilet and heating bathroom at the reception other things to note

Title: CLEARING HUT - IN THE TREES
Description: above all this is a breathtaking setting that we invite you to discover during your stay at les hbergements de qunecan we invite you to escape to this natural and unique horizon in the heart of naturennin the heart of the immense forest of quncan near the water points or overlooking the former iron and steel village of les forges enjoy the peace and quiet to take a moment to recharge your batteries away from everyday life the space the spacenin a 145yearold sessile oak tree the cabane de la clairire sits 10 meters highnclose to the pond du fourneau on the banks of morbihan this hut stands out for its very original access a colimasson staircase that our artists built around an oak barrel a first circular landing and a long footbridge that leads you through the foliagenthe hut with a capacity of 4 people or even 5 possibility to add a driver is large and exposed west to make the most of the lighting of the pond that reverberatesnthe arrival at the hut is quite spectacular for the attention of subjects to the vertigo we will propose instead another hut nnit includes nna sitting area with two 90 beds possibility of extra bedna toilet area with water reserve toilet bowl dry toilet wipesna lovely mezzanine with a double bed in 160na large terrace where are installed a table and 4 chairs where it will be nice dinner with family or friendsnyou can have toilets showers toilets arranged for you at the reception to enjoy several days of our sitenn we remind you that each of our accommodations has a small toilet area as well as a dry toilet and a sun terrace breakfast is included the evening meal can be delivered by reservation

Title: Heavenly Treehouse w/ Wrap Around Deck & Farm Views
Description: welcome to the treehouse at bluebird farm connecticut nnthis 40acre farm sanctuary is suitable for anyone looking to visit a farmstaynnthe town of willington offersn hiking trailsn antiquingn local dinersn vineyards breweriesn drivein movie theaternnwe are close drive fromn uconn 10 minsn hartford 25 minsn boston 15 hoursn nyc 25 hours the spacenthe treehouse is custom built for your comfortnnyou will have all the essentials in your kitchenette bathroom and shower you also have shared access to the gardens gazebonnare you sleeping among the clouds almost the main bed has a memory foam mattress and is encircled by what seems like endless windows rest easy among the surrounding treesnnnote 1 the treehouses fire place is propanebased and does not use fire wood temperature regulation of the unit is easily regulated via a simple thermostat and ceiling fannnnote 2 it might get rustic there is no guarantee of running water from november 15 to april 15 due to seasonal freezing of the treehouses water line this means running sink water and shower will most likely not be in use during this period the toilet is ecofriendly and in use year roundnnamenitiesn free coffee and tean outdoor gas grilln indoor gas stovetopn bathroom gear towels soaps shampoo conditionern backup toothpastebrushn classic board games clue battle ship monopoly sorryn free parking on premisen fire pit for bonfiresn interaction w farm animalsn close proximity to trails and state parks guest access guest accessn guest will have access to property grounds gazebo and treehousenn guests have access to the animal pasture only when guided by hostnn guest may use of the gas grill on the patio of the treehousenn guest can use the bonfire and we supply the wood other things to note other Title: Lovely Treehouse in the Woods next to Stream
Description: note please read the covid travel restriction information below before you booknnyou will feel the stresses of life wash away as you sway in the trees and listen to the sounds of the beautiful stream just feet from the treehouse deck youll never want to leave enjoy a bit of solitude or some special alone time with a loved one its hard to beat stone city treehouse to make your time away special the space the spacencovid info 101721nni had not been updating covid info so heres the most recent infonnvermont does not currently have any travel restrictions or behavior restrictions around covid i do not have any such requirements for the treehouse either however i am vaccinated and wear a mask in public indoor spacennlets all be respectful and kindnnnnafter your day of hiking skiing or touring local breweries and distilleries come home to this beautiful private tiny house in the trees or just spend the day lazily relaxing by the fire and reading while the sound of the stream soothes younnwalk through the woods up the stairs and enter into another dimension one that you wont want to leave much thought was put into the design and local natural and recycled materials were a priority in its constructionnnsoak in the curated interior design while you relax in the living room space and gaze out the large recycled windows from an old local schoolhousennenjoy the deck that overlooks the yearround stream that may be frozen over in the winter and let the sound of the water wash through you you may even see some critters if youre still enoughnnthere is a sweet sitting area hammock and campfire space just below the treehouse right on the stream with a dramatic view of the treehouse and a hanging bed underneathnnyou can cook simple meals on the propane campstove with a griddle option or use the small charcoal grill in the space under the treehouse there is a minifridge with a separate freezer to keep your fresh produce from the farmers market and your yummy local beer nice and cool theres a very primitive and limited water system you can use for washing dishesnnwe also provide some basic condiments and cooking basics like olive oil and salt and pepper we also offer coffee hot chocolate and lemonade most of the products we offer for your use and our cleaning supplies and paper products are from public goods and you can get a 25 discount on your first purchase with the coupon code treehousepgannthere is a basic composting toilet in the treehouse for your convenience but you also have access to a full modern bathroom at the house with a beautiful showernnwhen its time for bed climb up the loft ladder to the nest and sink into the comfy bed open up the windows to hear the nighttime sounds of the forestnnwe prioritize our earth and take environmental considerations into every decision we generate solar electricity we compost and recycle we use environmentally friendly cleaning products we avoid disposable items as much as possible and we used many local and recycled materials in the construction of the treehousennthe interior structure is 10x16 with a loft and the deck is 4x16 guest access guest accessnalthough official checkin is at 5pm if youd like to check in before this time please inquire and we may be able to accommodatennyou have exclusive access to the entire treehousennthe treehouse is about 200 feet from the driveway and house yet its very private in the woodsnni have a garden cart you can use to transport your belongings to the treehousennif you arrive early and the treehouse is not ready yet you are welcome to leave your things on the porch at the house other things to note other things to notenyou must be physically able to climb stairs and ladders to stay here the sleeping space is in a somewhattight loft but the limited space has not been an issue for even our taller guests we do not allow dogs or any other pets in the sleeping loftnnthis area of vermont the northeast kingdom has snow all winter and sometimes mud especially in the spring the treehouse is located on a dirtgravel road that can sometimes be challenging if its muddy or even snowy or icy we can get a lot of snow sometimes and you could possibly get stuck on your way here or in the driveway i do my best to keep the driveway clean and sanded but its not always possible all of the time we live in a rural area and services are not always immediately availablennall of that being said most of the time there are no issues but if you have access to a 4wd vehicle ideally with higher clearance and snow tires that is the best case scenario keep an eye on the weather and plan ahead the northeast kingdom of vermont is probably not like where youre from and being prepared for weather and challenging driving conditions is absolutely the best policynnthere is a primitive composting toilet in the treehouse with regular bathroom access toilet sink washer dryer shower in the main house which is about 200 feet awaynnwifi is not barely available at the treehouse but it is at the house there is a phone landline at the treehouse and minimalintermittent cell receptionnni provide at least two gallons of water that can be used for either drinking andor washing i encourage you to fill the water up at the house if you need more than this there is a faucet option in the shower rather than bringing in bottles our water is greatnnthere is a camping cookstove available with a griddle a charcoal grill toaster oven and a minifridge you should be able to find all you need for basic cooking therennplease understand that you are likely to come across various critters anything from fairly large spiders most likely they love the water to bears and moose less likely walking down to the treehouse you may come across our resident chipmunk and will often hear owls and loons at night so if you want to stay here you must be comfortable with insects and wildlife we are in the woods and nature and spiders and insects are part of the package

Title: Tullihas in the Trees
Description: tullihas in the trees is an offgrid treehouse adventure the treehouse has no electricity no running water no central heating and limited cell service there is a composting outhouse on site and potable water is available a short distance away the treehouse is a great place to hammock sit around the campfire explore trails and unwind while glamping on a lovely wooded farmnsleeping bags are highly recommended during the cool months the small propane heater will only take off the chill the space the spacenthe treehouse has one double bed a single bed and two cots we provide sheets for the double bed and single bed however it is highly recommended that you bring a sleeping bag and pillows if you plan to use the cots you will need to bring your own beddingnthere is a single burner propane stove a coffee pot and french press there is also a small propane heater for the cold months to take off the chillnthe treehouse is situated on a 230 acre farm which is available for exploring and hiking all spring and summer long restrictions apply october and november guest access guest accessnto access the treehouse we give you the address for the mailbox directly across from the treehouse when you put that address in your gps it takes you right there you park right out front of the treehousenthis is the country which means dirt roads and no streetlights other things to note other things to notenremember this is a treehouse with no electricity and no running water this means we do not have a shower no air conditioning no central heat and no refrigerator the potable water is available on the farm guests are welcome to build campfires in the ring we provide you with one double memory foam mattress one single memory foam mattress and a two cots hammocking is strongly encouraged think of it as glamping nn in the cooler months bring warm beddingsleeping bags the propane heater is intended to take off the chill but it will still be cool we supply you with extra propane tanks located in the cedar chest they last for about 8 hours on lownn we do spray for bugs but it is a treehouse therefore be prepared to meet an occasional fly spider ladybug or wasp as they think the treehouse is super cool toonn guests are free to hike the trails explore the woods creeks and farmland from december to october some restrictions apply october and novembernnexpectn ladybugs on your pillow and the occasional cricket if youre lucky please watch out for waspsthey seem to like the treehouse toon the noisy amish cows and goats that will work better than an alarm clockn a million stars and even more birdsn the opportunity to walk out your door to the stream and watch wildlife literally a few steps awayn to be treated like a houseguest not a rentern no cell phone service you can always walk up the hill to make a calln campfires hiking trails nearby fishing swimming etcn the best hammocking yes this is a verb in all of ohion a sunset view that will take your breath away

Title: Cherry Treesort "Big Nick"
Description: this tree house is very unique it features two separate sleeping quarters to give renters the ability to accommodate more friends and enjoy time together but also have private time at night its 25 feet up in the trees and has plenty of nature coming through and around the decks its also has all the amenities one would want for comfort in the main house with heat ac tv shower and toilet the bunk house also has tvdvd heat and ac come enjoy nature at its best other things to note other things to notenthe shower is very unique in that it is an outdoor shower its located high up in the trees with the main house and is very private it has very good water pressure and very hot water just thought we should let everyone know also we do not offer wifi

Title: Romantic Treehouse Getaway with Breathtaking Views
Description: discover the ultimate romance in trees 30 feet off the ground this luxurious treehouse offers the perfect treehouse lodging in ohio for a romantic escape private setting in the woods on a 38acre property in the heart of ohios amish country enjoy a king bed and a living room with a sofa and sitting chair a covered porch will help you enjoy the breathtaking treetop views come see why these incredible oneofakind treehouses were featured on hgtv were sure youll have an incredible stay the space the spacenliving roomnroughhewn beams and split pine planking surround you as you relax in the comfy sofa and matching chair in front of a live edge coffee table flip the switch to ignite the fireplace encased in handcut stone and curl up with a good book or take a muchdeserved nap you can also catch up on your favorite shows on the large screen tv with cable channels that are mounted above the mantle windows on each wall allow plenty of natural light and outdoor beauty to enter your hideawaynnbut make sure you spend lots of time outside on the wraparound balcony allow the peacefulness of your wooded retreat to soothe your mind and soul as you rock gently in the rockers and absorb the serenity that surrounds younnking bednbefore snuggling into the king size bed featuring an amishmade pillowtop mattress resting on an elevated pinewood base make sure you unwind in your private twoperson jetted tub the ceilinghigh waterfall fill supplies the hot water that will be jetted over tired muscles creating just the right mood for the perfect nightnnkitchennyour kitchen is home to a collegiatesized refrigerator with a freezer and a 2burner stovetop there are ample pots and pans if you feel like making your favorite vacation meal or a microwave oven for heating up the leftovers from one of our amazing restaurants in town a toaster and drip coffee maker round out the appliances which are at your disposal the amishmade wood table and chairs are the perfect spots for breakfast for twonnbathroomna sliding barn door opens to reveal your tiled floor bathroom an artisanal counter rests on legs made from logs and supports an above counter stone basin the expertly tiled shower is large enough for two and can start your day or end your night on just the right note

Title: Baumhaushotel Krautsand Haus JOJO
Description: the tree house jojo is the 3 tree house on our paddock it rests on stilts at an altitude of about 6m above the pastures the tree house stands between old pastures and you have a magnificent view of the meadows here you can go back a gear the space the spacenthere is a hotpot on our premises that you can use at any time there is also a ground seminar or meditation house for max 12 people we live practically next door but are also far away that we do not disturb you if you need any help or tips just come over other things to note other things to notenyou will deliberately not find a tv in our treehouses for this there is music or free access to wifi an ipad is also available for surfing the internet if you want to see which ship is passing by or when the next flood is

Title: Moose Meadow Lodge - Treehouse
Description: waking up to the splashing of rainbow trout and the music of the hermit thrush as you gaze out on the pristine pond at moose meadow the treehouse is where nature and luxury come together in tranquil harmony and where your imagination can soar its a perfect location to isolate yourself with your loved one away from others the space the spacenthis new england treehouse features a living dining area on the first floor with an expansive wraparound deck enjoy the view of the woods as you climb up the circular staircase wrapped around a maple tree the secondstory bedroom with its custom made queen size bed provides comfort and warmth while the balcony provides a high perch to take in the surrounding natural beauty guest access guest accessnthe treehouse is part of the moose meadow lodge bed breakfast treehouse guests will be given a full breakfast each morning and will also have access to the lodges kitchen for storing food and for preparing snacks or meals a variety of restaurants are nearby for lunch or dinner other things to note other things to notenwe are a lodging facility that is licensed inspected and registered with the vt department of health we are also members of the vermont chamber of commerce mad river valley chamber of commerce and revitalizing waterburynncovid19 due to the rise in covid19 infections we require proof of vaccination for those age 5 or older or proof of a negative covid test antigen or pcr within 24 hours prior to arrival masks are required in public spaces in the presence of people outside your household if youre feeling any covid19 symptoms stay home you will not be allowed to enter we appreciate your help in mitigating the pandemic and look forward to welcoming younnif you or anyone in your party has had any symptoms within the last 24 hours stay home you will not be allowed to enter symptoms includen coughn difficulty breathingn fever feeling feverish or have a measured temperature at or above 1004f38cn chillsn repeated shaking with chillsn muscle or body achesn headachen sore throatn new loss of taste or smelln congestion or runny nosen nausea or vomiting diarrhea

Title: Chulavista Dome
Description: the chulavista dome is a geodesic dome high up in the trees our twostorey treehouse is built around 3 fresnos european ash a tree native to cantabria the huge windows and large terrace offer panoramic views of the valley mountains and forests the space the spacenfantastic for romantic getaways the cozy bedroom sleeps two and features a seating area nespresso coffee maker and heatingnnthe garden under the dome is very secluded and offers a gas barbecue picnic table and a jacuzzi just for the two of you the only sounds youll hear are birds chirping and cow bells ringingnnenjoy this unique experience of sleeping under the stars surrounded by nothing but nature with all modern comfort such as a full bathroom wifi and a microwave

Title: Nature‚Äôs Nook- A Modern Treehouse
Description: set in the heart of wine country this treehouse is where nature meets globally inspired modern design the compact interior sleeps up to 4 people in layered bunks lofts and nooks while the exterior space sprawls overlooking the fern filled valley below this property is the perfect getaway for adventure relaxation wine tasting or hiking built around a living oak tree this treehouse embraces the beauty nature offers and still has creature comforts such as heat ac and a full bathroom the space the spacennatures nook is the culmination of the fine work of a number of craftsmen the overall design was crafted by susan scranton there are so many unique features that set it apart below are a fewnnhand scribed live edge poplar floorsnlarge deck for outdoor enjoyment whose shape mirrors the treehouse itselfnback deck perched high above the fern forest with two custom whiskey barrel adirondack chairsnmain bed is a queen tucked into its own nook with views out the massive windowncustom cabinets in kitchen and bath built by the treehouse squadna living roof covered in moss will be planted this fall in the cooler weathernbuilt around a massive oak tree that runs through middle of the treehousenhuge glass window overlooking the fern forestnconcrete site poured countertopsnshou sugi ban cypress siding an ancient technique where the wood is charred using a torch this makes the wood rot and insect resistantnglass tiled shower with rainfall shower headnwhiskey barrel adirondack chairs custom made by the treehouse squadnall rainfall is channeled to the back of the roof and directed at the base of the tree ensuring the tree has plenty of waterndeck boasts a grill and a built in yeti cooler for extra cold storage

Title: Luxurious Secluded Romantic Treehouse with Hot Tub
Description: 2020 1 airbnb most wishlisted property in north carolinanntake a short walk on well lit path to an oasis in the woods a swinging bridge welcomes you to a quiet cozy home in the trees surrounded by native laurel and abundant hardwoods listen to the birds while having your morning coffee on the deck or relax in the hot tub below the home is located on 14 acres old fort is 10 minutes to black mountain and 20 minutes to asheville the space the spacenthe treehouse has luxury bedding led fireplace full internet connection cable tv heatair microwave cook top and refrigerator we have an outdoor shower with hot water and composting toilet all located on the deck overlooking the forest our driveway is approximately 13 of a mile long through the woods the gravel driveway does have some hills and curves it does not require 4wd but if you have a very low profile car you may scrape in some sections if you drive a prius you may have trouble getting up the hill if you have a rear wheel drive car or truck you may spin slightly in the gravel on the hills if you are uncomfortable driving on a gravel road drive a low profile vehicle or if we have a heavy snow we offer drive in and drive out service on our utv were always available to help

Title: Bed+Bough, an enchanting Treehouse Retreat
Description: this is the stuff dreams are made of nestled in the north georgia treetops an hour north of atlanta bedbough is the luxury treehouse youve been waiting for enjoy your own private nature retreat with the luxurious accommodations youve come to expect built by our team of craftsman with artisanal details and a whimsical flair the treehouse sits on 5 acres just outside of dahlonegas award winning wineries waterfalls and historic square for travelers seeking rest romance or adventure the space the spacenbedbough has so many unique features including a king size bed in the loft a fold out couch with a queen size bed a full bathroom a living room a kitchenette with a microwave a toaster oven a sink and a french press for that morning coffee nestled among 5 acres of beautiful trees you will feel as if you are in the middle of nowhere and yet you are just minutes from restaurants and shopping the grounds of bedbough offer a firepit with adirondack chairs a picnic table a pizza oven a protected sitting area and a grill as well as wifi speed of 40 mgbsnndebra stipe as your super host with over 800 reviews and a 49 overall rating invites you to come and experience this unique treehouse in north georgia guest access guest accessnaccess to the whole treehouse grounds around the treehouse as well as the firepit picnic table area other things to note other things to notenthis is a treehouse and as such is high among the trees and this height must be respected for safety reasons therefore the treehouse is not suitable for young children but kids 7 years and up are considered on a case by case basis there is a kitchenette with a microwave a toaster oven a electric hot water kettle french press and keurig for coffee a mini fridge and freezer and a sink additionally it has running water hot and cold a full bathroom with shower sink and toilet heat and air conditioning is also provided the treehouse is set on 5 acres of forest with a covered outdoor seating area a front porch and a built in yeti cooler for additional food and beverage storage the outdoor area has a built in grill a picnic table a fire pit and a built in pizza oven we recommend you pick up some firewood at a grocery store or convenience store on your way as ours gets wet outside if using the pizza oven we recommend picking up pizza dough at the publix located off of 400 in dawsonvillennfollow us staydahlonega

Title: Raven Rock Treehouse
Description: radical off grid therapy if you want a walk on the wild side this is your spot perched on the apex of the eastern continental divide raven rock treehouse is nestled in the trees near raven rock cabin in a 40 acre wilderness wild life preserve in spite of our remote setting everything is close by hiking artisan shops wineries and unique dining abound from complete seclusion you are just 10 miles from the asheville airport and 5 miles away from the quaint town of hendersonville the space the spacenaccess is all wheel drive only gravel road is well maintained but too steep for 2 wheel drivennthe bathroom is a clean porta potty 50 ft from the venue also 50 feet to the ground there is a pee bucket with a toilet seat for night time convenance that guests empty in the porta potty and rinse at the outdoor kitchennnspring water dispenser with 6 gallons is on the deck along with a propane cooktop a 500 watt goal zero solar generator will charge your cell phones and laptops although service is sometimes spotty depending on your carriernnwe supply a crate of kindling and precut wood 10 for the dwarf mini wood stove additional crates are available next to the port potty for 10 cash or venmonnbring your own sheets and bedding queen our mattress and box spring are hermetically sealed and disinfected for your protectionnnthis site is off grid no electric there is a gravity fed spigot with cold water if you want to wash or rinse offnnbears are extremely shy but hungry please store all foodnif you are an early riser and quiet you may see bobcat fox deer turkey hawks falcons grouse owls and of course ravens it

Title: The Majestic Treehouse romantic, luxury retreat
Description: at this time we are fully booked until march 2022 check out our other listingsncovid19 safety measures 150 point cleaning disinfecting checklist performed for every guest healthscreening for all guests we recommend bringing food with you so you can stay put and enjoy nature and quality time in the safety of the woods and our farmnnlive like kings play like kids in this extraordinary awardwinning treehousennwe are 25x superhosts named the most popular airbnb in sc the space the spacenwhy do people travel thousands of miles from around the world to stay in our treehouse come and see for yourself transport your spirit and feel a thrill that can only be discovered in the treetops experience the oneofakind blend of youthful bliss and grownup luxury for yourself the faster you get here the sooner you change your pace and unwind in our wooden paradisennthis luxury treehouse was designed by seth bolt from the band needtobreathe who grew up on bolt farm larry bolt seths dad proprietor eagle scout and licensed custom home builder has been building remodeling homes for over 40 years in upstate scnnlarry and seth both love creating masterpieces they built our home from timber they harvested from our land and this romantic luxury treehouse is one of their finest works of artnnseth tori bolt were married at bolt farm and honeymooned in the treehouse suite tori manages branding press and runs the social media pagesnnregina bolt seths mom the queen caretaker is one of the top producing realestate agents in south carolina because of how much she genuinely cares for others and helping their dreams become reality she will make sure your stay is comfortable and unforgettablennwe have heating air conditioning this is a yearround destination we do have a bathroom with a toilet and washbasin in the treehouse and an amazing outdoor shower with a hot water supply for you to use just a short walk away other things to note other things to notendue to high demand and to make booking fair to everyone we release more treehouse dates at 12 noon est on the 15th of every month for more information go to our boltfarmtreehouse website dates are first come first reserved and sell out fast set your reminders for next months treehouse release day follow us on social media to stay updated on lastminute openingsnnnew offering the vip treehouse experience our goal as airbnb superhosts is to ensure every guests treehouse experience is truly unforgettable going vip adds a wonderful variety of fun activities sweet treats keepsakes enjoy our luxury smores around your own private campfire and even get a coupon for 100 off your next stay be sure to ask us about how you can access our vip treehouse experiencennplease let us know what you will be celebrating during your stay also at this time please make us aware of any special needs you may havennin order to ensure all of our treehouse guests have an unforgettable and safe stay at bolt farm we require our guests to sign a simple liability waiver prior to checkin professional photoshoots are welcomed with advanced notice and approval for media inquiries please contact us on our boltfarmtreehouse website thank you for celebrating our treehouse and the joy it brings

Title: √Ö Auge - River Eye - Treehouse
Description: experience being in the trees falling asleep under the stars and waking up to the sound of birdsong in this spectacular treehouse if you are looking for an intimate simple and restful retreat look no further the space the spacentowering six meters above the tessunge river that runs down from the great plateau of norway hardangervidda you will feel truly immersed in nature from your unique vantage point take in unparalleled views over the rushing river and into the forest beyond through fulllength windows spanning the entire living areannthe cleverly designed space has a surprisingly generous capacity so not only is it ideal for a couple on a romantic getaway it can also accommodate families and large groups on the lower level you will find two sleeping alcoves complete with premium double mattresses and leafy views upstairs in the mezzanine there is a cosy sleeping loft with queen sized bed panoramic windows and a huge skylight so you can enjoy a magical moment drifting off to sleep with a view of the constellations above youll surely sleep soundly here at the treehousennlight candles in the evening and cook up a storm in the fully functioning kitchen which features a powerful gas stove and all the necessary equipmentnndine on the covered terrace with the river flowing below you while being enveloped in thick greenery from the trees that support the treehouse its an enchanting place to drink a coffee watch the sun set or the snow fall while staying warm curled up in a soft woollen blanket the terrace also includes a full sized bed so those who want a real outdoors experience can sleep here in summernnyou will never feel cold in this wellinsulated treetop cabin thanks to double glazed windows and an efficient wood fired stove taking pride of place in the center you can enjoy long evenings in golden light feeding the fire with firewood felled sustainably from the surrounding forestnnheat up some crystalclear river water and wash yourself with an indianstyle bucket bath in the custom designed wet room or if you want more of an outdoor spa experience take a bath in your private riverside tub and soak in the steamy water while taking in the spectacular viewnnyou also have access to your own heated well maintained outdoor composting toilet designed to adhere to our ecofriendly principlesnninstead of electricity we provide candles solar lamps and a solar phone charger if you need to connect to the outside world free wifi is available in the nearby cabin 50 meters walk along with plenty of powerpoints for chargingnnin this secluded offgrid retreat you will have a memorable experience made up of the simple pleasures that come from slowing down and disconnecting from technology all while savoring the comforts of top quality modern architecture guest access guest accessnthe entire treehouse and its surroundings are available for you during your stay other things to note other things to notenit is also possible to rent the whole location called camp for gatherings or parties please get in touch here

Title: PRIVATE romantic TREEHOUSE ‚òÖ The Lions Lair
Description: take in the rustic fairy tale vibe of this custommade treehouse in the midst of towering trees star gaze on the top deck or swing on the bottom deck while listening to the nightly sounds of the forest the fire pit is also an amazing area to fellowship unwind and make smores in the morning walk to the trailhead and explore the stunning forest of the red river gorgennif your travel dates are not available on this calendar visit one of our sister properties by visiting our profile the space the spacenat night listen to gentle owls and enjoy the twinkling stars as you disconnect from your normal busy warm up near a fire while enjoying the solitude that the forest has to offernnin the morning walk to the national trailhead location while the sun breaks through the trees as you hear the gentle stream of a nearby creek when you return swing underneath lions lair with a designated covered outdoor patio surrounded by ambient lightingnnwe are a rare find in the area located on private land and one of the few rentals in the red river gorge that is located so conveniently inside the national park just walking distance to great nearby hiking trailsnnif your dates are unavailable be sure to check out our other listings as well such as the eagles nest and kentucky breeze each providing their own unique accommodationsnnthis treehouse provides both heat electricity and a full bathroom we guarantee you this combination of outdoors amenities provides a truly unique adventurous magical and relaxing getaway experience with your friends or and loved ones perfectly designed for small families and romantic couples looking for a weekend getawaynnwe look forward to having you stay with us and be sure to book soon before it fills up fast

Title: Treasure Hunt Tree House in Metro Atlanta
Description: welcome to treasure hunt tree house located in kennesaw ga about 20 min drive from atlantanthis is a truly unique three floor tree house complete with many fun features as well as this cool activity this backyard tree house has an adventurous twist in the form of a treasure hunt for any guest who stays in this fun little bungalow again this is a backyard treehousennnnn the space the spacenthis unique two structure tree house connected by a rope bridge sits high among the bamboo leaves in our backyard down below you will hear the sounds of a trickling stream that runs underneath the treehouse a bridge and the hammocks this simple intimate setting provides quiet spaces to rest and relax with an added bonus of an escape room style treasure hunt hidden amongst the tree housesnthe first structure consists of a 144 square foot bedroom with 3 sets of french doors and a vaulted ceiling supported by pine beams there is a wraparound porch on 3 sides surrounded by bamboo railing the tin roof provides a calming sound when it rains all six doors open fully to allow maximum airflow but the treehouse bedroom is also equipped with a ceiling fan and heating and air conditioning the bed is a comfortable memory foam coil hybrid mattress with high quality sheets trees run through the deck and the interior of this room most of the dcor was handmade by the ownernas you walk across the rope bridge youll enter the 2nd structure which is screened in with a table and chairs to sit in along the center tree is a ladder that leads through a trap door to a crows nest observatory above with bamboo railing this floor has a bucket that is raised via a rope and pulley system that is turned by a boat helm just for fun all three levels are lit up at night via stringed lights magical feeling ambiancena full bathroom consisting of a sink toilet and marble shower is reserved on the ground level exclusively for tree house guests guests are provided with towels handmade soaps waters and snacks there is a small mini fridge a microwave and a coffee maker in the treehouse as well guests are encouraged to look at the online guidebook we have created which highlights the many great restaurants and activities available in the kennesaw areanfor those adventurous types looking for more fun than just a simple quiet retreat these bungalows hold a secret many complex clues puzzles and riddles are hidden throughout the structures and promise to surprise and delight the inner child of all who plays the game no assistance is given to find the treasure so work together those who win the game will have the eternal honor of signing their name amongst the past legends who have overcome this challenge and you will get a prize too nwe try our very best to exceed your expectations in our little backyard bungalow and aim to make it a truly memorable and relaxing time to escape and unwind in a fun and unique setting this treehouse as most treehouses are is in the backyard the bathroom is about 30 steps from the treehouse on the ground level and is attached to my house but is exclusively for treehouse guests the electronic key code for the tree house is the same code as for the bathroom guest access guest accessnall three treehouse levels and the bathroom on the ground level

Title: Luxury Stone and Timber Treehouse on 40-Acre Farm
Description: stay in the gorgeous treehouse for a luxury glamping experience perfect for anyone looking for a peaceful getaway surrounded by towering pines on a 40acre farm estate in concord you feel like you are in the mountains of asheville enjoy the hot tub fire pit walk our trails or visit the animals all within minutes of historic concord and kannapolis book a 60 or 90 minute individual massage or coffee tasting during your stay at the farm please contact them directly for availability the space the spacenthe treehouse is a large oneroom space featuring a queen bed with handcrafted furnishings and a small table with chairs there is also a private deck for enjoying your morning coffee looking out over the trees outside of your space is a propane grill as well as an outdoor table with chairs for dining under the starsnnthe space includes ac and heat all linens including bath and swim towels robes and extra blankets a mini fridge and a coffee bar with a keurig coffee machine ground coffee assorted teas and hot cocoa as well as assorted sweeteners and halfhalf we also provide you with a selection of ecofriendly compostable plates bowls napkins silverware and cupsnna short walk from your space is the main barn where you will find the shared farm kitchen it includes a fullsize fridge microwave and sink as well as all necessary cooking supplies tools oil seasonings and more and grillfriendly pots and pans you can also find an iron and ironing board picnic blankets and nest hammocks in this spacennalso located in the main barn is cairn coffee roasters harmony balance massage studio and our farm store you can contact them directly after booking to check availability for a 60 or 90 minute individual massage or a tour of the roasting facilitiesnnthe eco bathrooms are located within a short walking distance from your space they contain separate mens and womens ecotoilets with a shared exterior sink the main eco bathroom also includes an amazing attached outdoor rainforest shower with organic shampoo conditioner and bodywash no worries our tankless hot water heaters provide unlimited hot water for you during your staynnwhether youre visiting the eco shower or relaxing in the hot tub we provide you with robes rainboots and cozy socks to keep you comfortable and warm going to and from your spacesnnyou will also have shared access to our beautiful aboveground pool and deck open seasonally and a 7person hot tub and a fire pit open year round other things to note other things to notenwe do not allow pets in this rental space however pets are allowed at the barn loft and greenhouse with advanced approvalnnthe set up of our spaces are for adult occupany only and therefore we do not allow children to stay with you at the farm regardless of agennyou may not invite anyone to visit you at the farm during your stay the property is only available for the use of our registered guestsnnif the treehouse is not available for your trip or you would like to see our other spaces please check out our airbnb profilennprofessional photoshoots are not allowed with airbnb bookings

Title: Epic Luxury Treehouse - next to Dog Mountain !
Description: the outpost treehouse is a beautifully handcrafted retreat nestled amongst the evergreens atop spaulding mtn and adjacent to the nationally renowned alerin barn event venue located 5 mile from stephen huneck gallerydog mountain 3 miles from the historic town of st johnsbury in the heart of vermonts north east kingdom mountain bikers are just over 10 miles to the hub at kingdom trails 15 miles to burke mtn ski and bike park and we are 2 exits north i 93 from littleton white mtns nh the space the spacenthe outpost luxury treehouse has been a lifelong dream and labor of love handcrafted with reclaimed timber and vintage salvaged finds by husband and wife design team alexa and aaron airoldi designer finishes soft linens pendleton blankets and a eclectic mix of antique rustic alpine lodge decor in a magnificent setting among the treetops looking out over alerin farm cattle pastures private ski trails and green mountain views cathedral great room with gas fireplace we turn it on from october may main heat renai gas heater full kitchen full size gas stove under mount mini wine fridge small ice maker no freezerbut we provide outdoor beverage station for iced beverages antique farmhouse sink bathroom 1 king on main floor 2 queens in the sleeping loft tucked under the eve 2 story deck with exterior dining table exterior bar with barstools and covered porch with private parking and use of fire pits there is a exterior cooler for beer on the porch the treehouse is a natural retreat space located in the woods you may see bugs outside you will feel pine needles drop on the out side decks this is as much about the setting in nature as it is the vintage aesthetic there is no airconditioning but there are double french doors that open with screens and create a draft we have 4 plug in fans for cooling if needed and screens on all french doors the treehouse is well insulated and under tree cover and remains cool in summer this is a tv and wifi free zone but cell reception works great and you can use your cell as a hotspot easily to activate laptop or tablet etc an orange wireless bluetooth speaker is included in the rental for music there is a weber charcoal grill at the fire pit for guest use this place is perfectly equipped to handle a couples getaway for two a family with children or a few friendsnnplease review our description carefully and decide if this is the right space for you and your guests before booking remember no tv no wifi no air conditioning this is a small unique space made with salvaged treasures and eclectic finds it is a cozy escape literally in the trees that means steps to climb and in the hot summer fans and old fashioned open screen doors to cool down in the winter that means winter boots and 4x4 drive to get up the mountainthat being said you may see bugs hear animals at night and maybe even rediscover yourself by the fire other things to note other things to notennote please review our description carefully and decide if this is the right space for you and your guests before booking remember no tv no wifi no air conditioning this is a small unique space made with salvaged treasures and eclectic finds it is a cozy escape literally in the trees that means steps to climb and in the hot summer fans and old fashioned open screen doors to cool down in the winter that means winter boots and 4x4 drive to get up the mountainthat being said you may see bugs hear animals at night and maybe even rediscover yourself by the fire nnwinter rentals driving to the treehouse in the winter we are located 18 miles at the top of spaulding rd on spaulding mtn the road is steep and the drive down into the treehouse is a hill as well for driving in snowy conditions a 4x4 or awd vehicle with snow tires would be preferred to get up the road in lieu of bad weather road conditions the road and driveway are fully plowed salted and maintained but sometimes vermont winter conditions can make it difficult so plan accordinglynnreviews if you loved your stay please leave us a review online at airbnb and in our guest book at the treehouse and pass the word about this enchanting place lets stay connectednnpets we will consider upon request a well adjusted mature and well behaved dog a dog is allowed for a fee of 5000 per dog and that is to be paid upon booking in special requests and fees a dog must be crated while unattended in the treehouse please provide your own dog clean up supplies please scoop poops and if you see our friendly cat targhee please leash your dog if you are attending a alerin barn or wedding next door absolutely no dogs are permitted on alerin barn grounds dogs must remain at the outpost if you walk your dog you can hike down the lower cattle fence below the treehouse down the hill if you walk the upper fence do not go farther than the cattle barn dogs are not permitted in the alerin barn compound

Title: Trailside Treehouse - Riverside in Richmond, VA
Description: fulfill your childhood dream of camping in a treehouse from this central spot by the river easily explore the trails and river then relax on the deck and enjoy the magic of the treesnnairbnb top 20 places to stay in vanbest of richmond by style magazinenfeatured in airbnb article on hospitalitynone of 8 great airbnbs in the us by inside hooknncomplementary bikesncomes with bathroom kitchenette lounge apartment in host housendogfriendlynnsocial media trailsidetreehouse the space the spacenwhen you stay in the treehouse youre not just embarking on an incredible adventure for your familyyoure also helping the richmondarea community by supporting nonprofits that are aligned with our mission of supporting children and the outdoors we donate a large portion of your payment to local nonprofits and thank you for being a positive part of our communitynnnnheres your chance to fulfill that childhood dream of running away and camping out in a treehouse this is not a tiny house wrapped around a tree or a glamorous treehouse complete with running water and a kitchen instead this is an authentic treehouse that we built for our nephew in 2014 complete with reclaimed redwood walls and windows from our old house its an authentic kidlike treehouse experience a space devoted to the stuff of childhood dreamsnnlocation the trailside treehouse is centrally located in richmond virginia just minutes from i95 and i64 it is directly across the river from one of richmonds popular parks called maymont the james river park system and buttermilk trail also come through the property thanks to an easement we have given the city the treehouse property itself includes five wooded acres with nationallycelebrated singletrack trail and is adjacent to the riverjust hike down the trail and cross a single train track and youll find some of richmonds best fishing and swimmingnnthe space as we designed the treehouse space we asked ourselves one question what would we have wanted in a treehouse as kids the trailside treehouse is our answer to that questionits a magnum opus to childhoodnnplease note there is a zipline on the property per our insurance company guests are not allowed to use it please prepare your children ahead of time so theyre not bummed when they arrivennwhat to expect the treehouse isnt an inexpensive place to stay its not simply a comfortable room to call home as you pass through town as are many airbnbs instead its an unparalleled experience that we hope transforms our guests by bringing them back to their childlike centers its a place to practice juggling or learn new yoyo tricks its a place to flip through a book about bowling rules and get curious about things you havent wondered about since you were a kid there are notes to discover in the nooks and crannies there are games you may not have played with since you were a child theres a bin of junk food and a fridge with sodas weve stocked the treehouse with activities that we hope reminds you of the curiosity you had as a child we want you to feel that your time here is invaluablethat it is a priceless trip that sets you up for a transformative week or month or year reinvigorates rejuvenates renews your very sense of selfnnvaluable memories to last a lifetimenwe know the treehouse experience is an investment that many families save for our goal is to provide you with value beyond your expectations so that you truly feel that your time exploring here with your friends and family was worth every cent our guests who get the most value from the experience are those guests who are willing to leave their phones in their bags and truly live in the simplicity and wonder of the moment we want you to imagine that you are your 10year old self and have packed a backpack with all of your favorite things and run away to your neighbors treehouse in the woods even those guests bringing kids should feel ready to loosen the reigns of responsibility for awhile to just enjoy the space and get optimum value from their time herennndesign and tour historynthis twostory treehouse was designed by renowned richmond architect henry tenser and modeled after a western firetower it was featured alongside the modern home where the hosts live on the 2017 virginia home and garden tour as well as three westover hills neighborhood association tours and the modern richmond tournnntrailside location in the citynthe treehouse sits in our back yard at the top of a wooded gully that leads to the james river park system and is mere yards from the popular buttermilk trailone of the most celebrated urban singletrack trail systems in the entire country for traillovers and adventurelovers you simply cant find a better spot to stay the night in richmond virginiannplease note that we are located within the city so you can expect to hear city sounds which may include trains sirens traffic and other thingsnnnbridge to childhoodnto access the treehouse youll cross a wooden bridge and enter onto the main deck if youre ready to play jump into the twisty tube slide and play on the playground equipment beneath the main floor if youre ready to relax take a seat on the deck and enjoy your wooded surroundingsnnnporch levelnenter the main floor screened porch through the screened doors the main floor is screened in on all four sides and features two hammock swingsthe perfect place to read a book or recount your day on the trail as you rock amongst the treesmosquitofree a rare summer treat for richmondnnwhen more than 4 people wish to stay in the treehouse this first floor can be transformed into an additional sleeping area with a foldup memory foam mattress or single cots just let us know if you need thosennnsleeping levelnthe sleeping area on the second story is located up a kneehole ladder and through a trap door the second story is surrounded by windows on all four sides including two fisheye windows so you can poke your head into the concave plexiglass and get a look at the ground three stories below the second story also features a balcony which is accessible through a screen door youll sleep soundly under the corrugated corten steel roof the sleeping quarters features a queen bed with a memory foam mattress and a bunkbed cotnnnlounge bathroom and kitchenetteninside the host house youll have full private use of our basement which includes a temperaturecontrolled lounge area with a tv sleeper sofa bean bag chair kitchenette with sink microwave and keurig and full bathroom the entrance to the lower level is private and accessible from the exterior of the homennthe bike room is also in this basement space you are welcome to take out a bike as long as you sign a waiver and wear a helmet there are 4 bikes to use for freennnguest count and sleeping comfortablynplease let us know in advance how many guests are in your party so we can set up beds set out the appropriate number of towels pillows blankets and make sure there are enough snacks and drinksnnour standard guest limit is 6 if you want to bring a larger party we have some options let us know and we will help you figure out whether the options suit your travel style including the sleeper sofa inside and putting two children per level of the cot and sleeping in any of the hammocks nnstandard sleeping arrangements are as follows let us know if youd like something differentn12 guests queen bed on 2nd floorn34 guests queen bed bunkbed cot on 2nd floorn56 guests queen bed bunkbed cot on 2nd floor foldup memory foam mattress on 1st floor note when there are families with more than two kids we recommend fitting two kids per level of the bunkbed cot so everyone can sleep on the same levelnnnndogs are welcomenif youre bringing your dogs please let us know our dog is very friendlynnsingle night options are available upon request and availability contact us for more infonnwe cant wait to host your adventure guest access guest accessnyoull have full exclusive access to the treehouse firepit and basement of the host house which includes a full bathroom lounge area with a sofa bed massive bean bag and televisionnnthis is also where the bike room is complete with adultsized bikes for you to usennthe entrance to the basement is private so you can come and go as you please without feeling selfconsciousnnour insurance company does not allow guests to use the ziplinenndrink water from the kitchen and sink faucets but not the garden spigots garden spigot water comes from rainwater collected from the roof other things to note other things to notensummer guests yes it can be hot again think of the treehouse of your childhood dreams it doesnt have ac overnight temps are typically in the 70s and we have fans if you need temperature controlled environments plan to spend time and sleep in the basement lounge of the host house if summer glamping isnt appealing book your stay in the spring or fall when temps are milder nnwinter guests see above only oppositennsingle night options are sometimes available contact us if youd like to book just one nightnnpleaseno candles or open flames in the treehouse including grills or propane cooktopsnnriver accessthe treehouse property includes five wooded acres with trails for you to explore a train track borders our property to the north and just on the other side of the track is a popular river swimming and fishing spot you can hike to the river easily and spend a day enjoying swimming floating fishing water sports and exploring rock hopping is very popular in richmondnnfood odorsplease no fish or fragrant fooditems in the treehouse or lounge this includes cologne perfume fish fish incense fish and any other odors that may take a few days to air out especially but not limited to fishnnziplinethere is a zipline on the property per our insurance company guests are not allowed to use it please prepare your children ahead of time so theyre not bummed when they arrivenntrail accessthe trail off of the treehouse property is a single track trail that leads to 40 miles of a nationally recognized trail system its very technical for riders and should only be attempted by advanced riders its great for hikers and runners at all levels if you are borrowing treehouse bikes and want to ride the trail avoid the single track buttermilk trailyoull want to ride the bikes a mile downriver on the road to reedy creek to pick up the fire road which is flat and awesome for riders at all levels from the fire road ride down river two miles to belle isle then circle the island or ride all over the city including the canal walk and capital trail togwateefrom here you can go anywherennbonfirewe have firewood lighters and fire starters plan to have a bonfire you may want to bring your own starter log if youre unfamiliar with starting a fire the kind youd use in a fireplace worksnnegress and ladderthe sleeping quarters are up a ladder and through a 24x24 opening please be comfortable climbing the ladder and moving through the opening if youre pregnant you may want to measure your bellynnweatherwe do not refund cancellations for weather reasons please be aware when booking that you could get inclement weather including storms snow wind etc for that reason you need to be comfortable assuming some weatherrelated risk before you booknnreschedulingwe do allow guests to reschedule in some cases as long as they request the rescheduling 10 days prior to the day of stay or morennurban noisesthe treehouse is located on five wooded acres in the center of richmond city our property is only one of about a dozen riverside properties in the entire city so you will have easy access to the river while enjoying life in the trees along with lots of wildlife you will hear city sounds which we refer to in our family as urban waves like the sounds of beach waves these noises may include sirens trains and traffic along with all the sounds of nature and your loved ones laughter and cheernnhost family interaction and space useour family lives in the property and our home is very close to the treehouse our family plays in the front yard when guests are in residence and we leave the back yard for guests to enjoy on their own guests should be comfortable and open to seeing our kids in the driveway and front yard nnelectricity limitationsthe treehouse is on a 20 amp power circuit if too many devices are plugged in and running the breaker may trip causing power loss please let us know right away if you lose powernnheaterswe provide heaters that are approved by our insurance company please do not bring your ownnnhot platesdue to safety concerns please do not use hot plates or other heating or cooking devices within the treehousennguest countplease let us know in advance how many guests are in your party so we can set up the beds set out the appropriate number of towels and make sure there are enough snacks and drinks we want everyone in your group to have an awesome experience if we dont know a guest is coming we wont have set up a comfortable space for himher and heshe will not have towels blankets pillows snacks drinks and all the fun stuff that makes glamping in the treehouse such a memorable experience thank younnnwaterdrink water from the kitchen and sink faucets but not the garden spigots garden spigot water comes from rainwater collected from the roof

Title: BREEZE, in a tree The Appleton Retreat
Description: breeze treehouse is located at the appleton retreat on 120 acres of private land bordered by 1300 acres of a protected nature conservancy to the south is the pettengill stream a resource protected area and to the north a large secluded pond breeze guests may reserve the wood fired cedar hot tub and the sauna at an additional charge which are close by and private the appleton retreat is less than a 30 minute drive to belfast rockport camden and rockland charming downeast seaside towns the space the spacentotal privacy alone in a tree the ultimate getawaynthe 1st floor of breeze is over 20 high and the sleeping loft is approximately 40 off the ground to gain access to breeze requires climbing three flights of stairs two are very easy and code compliant the 3rd is a ships ladder most dogs will need a lot of coaching or need to be carried up the sleeping loft is also accessed by a steep set of stairsnbreeze is not a great place for young childrennyou will experience the uniqueness of being in a tree windowed walls overlook the treetops and a glimpse of the ridge to the south there is a large deck for hanging outncaution in winds over 25 mph you may experience some movement and noise not to worrynalthough breeze appears to be a rustic structure it has many amenities including air conditioning a full galley kitchen a shower and traditional toilet as well as good old electricity so you will not be roughing itnalthough there is not wifi at breeze you may tap into the wifi at braeburn by getting in that proximitynthere is private parking at the treehouse

Title: Oasis Treehouse Atlanta
Description: when you step into our little forest sanctuary it is easy to forget that you are only 10 min from downtown atlanta nestled in the forest across a bridge over a little creek is a beautiful little modern treehouse that sleeps 4 people there is a composting toilet and a small kitchenette with running water across the bridge are a private outdoor shower with hotcold water and a heater for amazing winter showers next to it is a heated bath house all for your use only the space the spacena true urban oasis beautiful nature all around without having to leave the comfort or proximity of the city visit eat and enjoy everything atlanta has to offer then sit on the treehouse balcony swing in the hammock take in the bird song and the forest enjoy the rays of sunshine through the trees and the mesmerizing rain as it comes downnnan authentic treehouse held up by two oaks heated in the winter and cooled in the summer with a cosy loft bed a composting toilet and everything you need for a comfortable staynna walk down the magnificent suspended bridge leads you to secluded charming outdoor shower with hot running waternnthe treehouse is small but comfortably sleeps up to four two in the queen bed in the loft and two on the the pull out sofa queen guest access guest accessnplenty of parking is available on our quiet street

Title: Sugar Creek Treehouse with hot tub
Description: surely the place you dreamed of as a child the treehouse sits above a beautiful mountain stream close to parks art and culture great views and restaurants and dining youll love the treehouse because of the romantic coziness my place is good for couples solo adventurers and families with kids the space the spacenidyllic 600 sq ft artists treehouse deep in the forest 35 feet above a mountain stream with gently cascading waterfalls just 45 minutes northeast of asheville nc just 45 miles west of boone nc perched high in the sky this home offers sleeping for up to six follow the floating log staircase to a romantic upstairs loft with romeo and juliet balcony lounge in the window seat there enjoying the best view in the house or enjoy the cozy sleeping loft tucked away off the living room its the perfect place to curl up with a good book stroll along the wrap around deck for magnificent views of the stream immediately below sit by the crackling wood stove and enjoy its cozy warmth the modern kitchen was made for a master chef all the cookware organic spices and oils are provided to whip up an amazing meal this is the place you surely dreamed of when you were a childndesigned and built by two imaginative and experienced natural builders this tiny treehouse hamlet sits on 6 wooded acres with south facing slopes at a comfortable elevation of 2150 feet it is near mt mitchell the tallest mountain east of the mississippi and only twenty minutes away from the renowned penland school of crafts and the community of celo in yancey county where more artists per capita live than anywhere in the us the blue ridge parkway will get you within 20 miles of the home the newly paved highways take you the rest of the waynwith easy access to statemaintained roads and just 7 miles from all the conveniences in burnsville nc this quiet tuckedaway eden offers the best of both worlds an inspiring wildlife and birdwatchers paradise its other features include a view of the beautiful north toe river from mountain plateau magnificent rock outcroppings a small sounding cave nature trails and many edible wild plantsnsimply walk across the street to enjoy the toe river it offers refreshing deep waters for swimming and excellent trout or bass fishing walk along the pebble shores and simply enjoy the beautynthe appalachian trail is within 15 miles of the home running along the nc and tn border take a short drive for a worthwhile hike the home is also within 20 miles of the roan mountain state park for another beautiful hikenn please note the sleeping loft not bedroom is accessed by a fixed ladder best for school age children or mobile adults not suitable for younger children and older adults

Title: Porumbacu tree house close to Carpathian mountains
Description: porumbacu treehouse is the perfect place for a vacation immersed in a small forest right in the heart of porumbacu a mountain village in transylvania two rivers cross the property and you will wake up very day in a deep green landscape escape from the busy weekdays life and find the relaxing and quiet way of living in addition in the front yard there is our transylvanian guesthouse where you will find other facilities for a pleasant stay fully equipped kitchen wifi barbecue kiosk etc the space the spacenthe treehouse has one bedroom 2 adults 2 childrenadults with a queen bed and an extendible sofa a kitchenette and one bathroom the terrace offers beautiful view over the entire are other things to note other things to notenporumbacu treehouse is the perfect place for a vacation immersed in a small forest right in the heart of porumbacu a mountain village in transylvania two rivers cross the property and you will wake up very day in a deep green landscape escape from the busy weekdays life and find the relaxing and quiet way of living in addition in the front yard there is our transylvanian guesthouse where you will find other facilities for a pleasant stay fully equipped kitchen wifi barbecue kiosk et

Title: Treehouse near Bar Harbor. Luxurious and private!
