Title: La Paz at Treehouse Mountain!
Description: enter this colorful treehouse in the mountains for your next getaway perfect for trips with friends family and couples completely dog friendly walk across a suspension bridge into this magical treehouse that offers a main floor and a loft as well as a spacious porch and the perfect view of the mountainsnnthere are four treehouses total on this property let me know if you have questions about renting more than one together for larger groups the space the spacentreehouse la paz is one of four treehouses located on this 29 acre property backed up against a wooded mountainsidenntreehouse mountain retreat is a relaxing getaway for every type of traveler guests are welcome to inquire about booking more than one treehouse during their stay in case their party is larger than four we can accommodate up to 11 guests with all three treehousesnnall treehouses are dog friendly and we do not charge an extra fee to bring your pets all you have to do is let us know if youre bringing any dogs and if theyre friendly with other dogs as wellnnthere is a kitchenette which features a halfsize refrigerator a cold sink no hot water in treehouse a microwave a coffee maker a water boiler for tea and hot chocolate a mini rice cooker and a toaster on the connecting platform there is a flat top griddle that is great for cooking breakfast lunch and dinnernwe will provide tea coffee creamer sugar and coffee mugs as well as basic cooking items such as rice salt pepper spices oil utensils plates a pot a pan and a cast iron skillet nnthis treehouse has access to a half bathroom located on the platform connected to the main treehouse as well as use of the 2 shower 2 bathroom climate controlled bathhousennthere is a pond on our property and multiple firepits for guests to use each treehouse has their own private firepit with firewood and firestarter includednnnhere at treehouse mountain our goal is to provide everything that we would want if we were to travel to other airbnbs during your stay you can find that we are readily available if theres anything we can help out with or want help planning your trip to the area as wellnnif you have questions about any of our treehouse rentals we have four total send me a message we also offer discounts for military weekly stay return guests or renting more than one treehouse during a staynnguests can use up to two discounts for a reservation our property is 29 acres of mostly forest with some open fields as well guests have full access to our property except for the other treehouses that may be rented out by other guestsnnquiet hoursnto respect all guests vacationing at our property we have a quiet time of 9 pm youre still welcome to enjoy camp fires or sitting out on the porch etc we just ask that theres no loud music or anything that may cause a disturbance to other guestsnnareas of interest guests may enjoyn9 hole disc golf course map can be found on the udisc app we have discs available for guest usenwalking trails throughout the propertyna slack line balancing linenngamesactivities available upon requestncorn holengiant jenganbocce ballnnother things to noteni have a pottery studio on the property if this interests you youre welcome to come check it out just let me knownwe do our best to maintain the grounds without disturbing guests leaf blowing cutting grass cutting firewood etc we aim to do this when all guests are out and about during the day if you arrive back and were still working just send me a message as we may not have noticed your arrival back our goal is to provide a relaxing environment nnwe are constantly looking for new things to add to this list so this may change over time other things to note other things to notenthe other two treehouses may be booked during your stay and other guests may have dogs off leash on the property because we are fully dog friendly if this is a concern to you due to fear of dogs or your dog is not friendly towards other dogs let me know and i would be glad to request any guests staying to keep their dogs on leash

Title: Magical Treehouse - winter wonderland getaway!
Description: sleep up in the trees in our cozy magical treehouse this place is the perfect base camp for your next adventure or a unique spot to curl up with a good book the perfect place to be in the woods but not isolated cook your meals in the nearby cookhouse 40 away unheated on a camp stove or over an open campfire a heated bathroomshower is 20 away we provide you with linens cookware plus help you plan your trip property includes miles of hiking trails and beautiful places to explore the space the spacenrural but centrally located the magical treehouse is seven miles north of paul smiths college on rt 30 youll be in one of the most varied wilderness areas of the parknnthe paul smiths college visitors interpretive center is five miles away with wonderful hiking trails and educational programs for the whole familynnyoull be 25 minutes to saranac lake or malone 35 minutes to lake placid and its olympic venues 50 minutes to whiteface mountain the natural history museum of the adirondacks the wild center is 40 minutes away in tupper lakennthe magical treehouse has a single room with a beautiful comfortable handcrafted queensize bed a table and cozy chairs your bathroomshower is in a separate building 20 away and your cookhouse is in a screened in area and is 40 away wintertime mini fridge microwave and snowshoes providednnthere is a nice campfire spot for summer marshmallow roasts or quiet fire gazing a complimentary bundle of campfire wood is provided for your use more for purchasennyou can cook meals in the screened in cookhouse not heated in winter and a spigot nearby provides water the cookhouse has all the pots dishes utensils and tools youll need to make a great mealnnthere are over 5 miles of hikingxc skisnowshoe trails on the property to explore and nearby trails are excellent for mountain biking with both back country roads and singletrack the property is home to a bog an old quarry and a river runs nearby designated horseback riding trail heads are less than a mile away a wild and scenic study river the osgood flows nearby with putin and takeouts within a couple of miles of our driveway dropoff and pickup arrangements can be made this is a must paddle for those interested in wildlife and scenery many have spotted the bald eagle who has a nest at the rivers edge we are surrounded by many great fishing spotsnnyour hosts bob and sheila are a former professional wilderness guide and a lifelong resident of the paul smiths area between the two of them good adviceconnecting you to great experiences and unique destinations is as close to a sure thing as you can get the temporary use of their brains is complimentary youll have 27 acres to explore including purposebuilt mountain biking trails other things to note other things to noteneverything that youll need is here all you have to do is bring your food and your adventurous spirit

Title: Varena Treehouse West
Description: the treehouse is a perfect place for a vacation in the middle of the old pine trees forest it offers a retreat from an intensive city life and a short getaway to the wild less than one hour away from vilnius the space the spacenthe place itself is a romantic room suited for an unforgettable moments with a loved one it contains a lovely terrace with the fantastic view to the landscape hammocks fireplace and many other things that will make your time amazing moreover the place offers a perfect working place with a free wifi and working desk for those who are looking to change their usual office day into peaceful and untraditional work place other things to note other things to notenfor those who enjoy more active leisure time we offer a bike tour to the nearest village pamerkiai located on the cost of a river merkys there you are going to find not only a beautiful village established in the beginning of xx century but also grikucis farmstead famous for its traditional kitchen and educational programs

Title: Treehouse Lika 1
Description: if youre looking to spend your vacation in unspoiled nature in a luxuriously equipped house among the trees listen to the birds to ride a bicycle to walk along the forest trails to explore velebits peaks and other particular characteristics of this region of exceptional beauty then youve come to the right place the sea is only 20 minutes away by car plitvice lakes national park is within 1 hour drive 4 more national parks are also within an hour drive the space the spacenthe house is situated in velebit nature park it is unique because you stay between the trees at the height of 4 meters you experience the nature in a totally different and special way the location is perfect because in summer time you are close to the sea 20 minutes but you sleep in the freshness guest access guest accessnthe whole house is available for stay with its surrounding area where is the barbecue and big covered terrace with garden furniture other things to note other things to notenthe house is new and fully equipped for maximum comfort

Title: ER69 - Rachel's Tree House - Great location...close to all the action!
Description: one of our most unique 1 bedroom 1 bathroom log cabins youre sure to remember that 69 is a real treat upon entering on the bottom level youre in for quite a surprise this cabin was built around a tree yes a tree goes from the bottom level in the middle of your dining area all the way up through the top level right past the foot of your bed ground level consists of an incredibly well thought out style of kitchen and dining area with mason jars as light covers and an old washtub sink equipped with a hand pump water spout and all upstairs on one side youll find a cozy loveseat and tv with fireplace in your sitting area and your bedroom with a queen sized bed and jacuzzi on the other there is also a steaming hot tub out on your private deck staying in this cabin makes for a splendid vacation youll always remember our resort area swimming pool and clubhouse is within walking distance for those hot summer days area restaurants and attractions are all just minutes away by car

Title: Romantic Treehouse Getaway with Treetop Views
Description: enjoy breathtaking and oneofakind lodging in our whispering pines treehouse this unique treehouse rental in ohio towers 22 feet in the air and offers luxury adventure and comfort featuring a stone twoperson jetted tub with a ceiling tub filler kingsize rustic amish crafted pillowtop mattress cherry hardwood floors and rustic furnishings privately tucked away in a grove of white pines relax and refresh yourself while sitting on your deck the space the spacenliving roomnstep into luxury with your first step over the threshold and onto the beautiful cherry hardwood floor roughhewn beams and split pine planking surround you as you relax in the comfy sofa and matching chair in front of a live edge coffee table flip the switch to ignite the fireplace encased in handcut stone and curl up with a good book or take a muchdeserved nap you can also catch up on your favorite shows on the large screen tv with cable channels that are mounted above the mantlennwindows on each wall allow plenty of natural light and outdoor beauty to enter your hideaway but make sure you spend lots of time outside on the wraparound balcony allow the peacefulness of your wooded retreat to soothe your mind and soul as you rock gently in the rockers and absorb the serenity that surrounds younnbefore snuggling into the king size bed featuring an amishmade pillowtop mattress resting on an elevated pinewood base make sure you unwind in your private twoperson jetted tub the ceilinghigh waterfall fill supplies the hot water that will be jetted over tired muscles creating just the right mood for the perfect nightnnkitchennyour kitchen is home to a collegiatesized refrigerator with a freezer and a 2burner stovetop there are ample pots and pans if you feel like making your favorite vacation meal or a microwave oven for heating up the leftovers from one of our amazing restaurants in town a toaster and drip coffee maker round out the appliances which are at your disposal the amishmade wood table and chairs are the perfect spots for breakfast for twonnbathroomna sliding barn door opens to reveal your tiled floor bathroom an artisanal counter rests on legs made from logs the expertly tiled shower is large enough for two and can start your day or end your night on just the right note

Title: Mink Cove Treehouse
Description: a unique adult adventure awaits in this cozy hand crafted tree house nestled 12 feet off the ground amongst the chirping birds red oaks breathtaking views of mink cove in buzzards bay the tree house is accessible by a suspension bridge that leads you to a partially covered porch where you can enjoy a cup of coffee or sit back take in the sunset with a glass of wine step inside to the living space snuggle up on the couch for an intimate evening the space the spacento get up to the sleeping area youll have to climb a very narrow spiral staircase we demonstrate how narrow the stairs are by photos upstairs houses a double bed and a loft area with a twin the tree house is equipped with a compostable toilet bathroom sink and outdoor showernthe 25 acre property is adjacent to miles of walking hiking trailsnthe treehouse is not handicapped accessible our place of residence is right next door to the treehouse and guests will share our stone drivewaynon arrival each guest must sign a release of liability agreement other things to note other things to notenthe treehouse is at the end of a dirt road parking is right in front of our house on stone gravel driveway beside large barnworkshopnin case of hurricane we reserve the right to cancel

Title: Magpies Nest Treehouse
Description: treehouse overlooking the dallvan river on an organic farm in a secluded setting treehouse is fully equipped with microwave two burner hot plate and conventional oven inside toilet and shower hotcold running water electric radiators electric blanket the bed is made up ready towels gowns slippers sauna and hot tub included car park next to the treehouse outside grill meals on request nearby busses transport on requestnpets by arrangement the space the spacenprivate entrance to the treehousena treehouse overlooking the dallvan river with spectacular views set in woodland on an organic farm in sweden private and secluded among forests bubble pool included and sauna includednskatboet treehouse magpies nest is 36 square meters and 6 meters highnall modern conveniences in the treehouse hot and cold running water electric radiators for heating shower and toiletnno internet inside the treehouse internet within the farmhouse areanking size bed room for extra guests fully equipped with oven microwave two burner hot plate the bed is made up ready with bed linen towels slippers and gowns and an electric blanket watch the northern lights aurora borealis during december to marchnfrom december to march the temperature outside is normally minus 25c degrees celsius in the winter there is flat skiing ski resorts nearby roma alpine and others visit the copper mines and silver mines a short drive away bison farm 6 kilometres awayntherapy treatments offered swedish body massage happy feet at 500 krona for an hours treatmentncows horses two cats and chickens on the farm moose springbok swans and many other wild life walks in the forests and around the farmnmushroom apple and berry picking in season in the forests aroundnenjoy the tranquility in your own space and time beautiful sunrises and sunsetsnpets by arrangementnmeals by arrangement

Title: La Pitalaya hut, perched at 7m, romantic night
Description: high perched in two centuryold oaks pitalaya will welcome the most romantic of youna spiral staircase will lead you to the heart of the cabin connected by a bridge suspended from an interlaced terrace in the heart of the branches of a majestic leaning oaknperched at a height of almost 7m it can accommodate 2 people and its access is reserved for adults the space the spacen3 cabins perched in the trees in the heart of the pyrenees in the barousse valley a magical place to stay with family friends or loversnall our cabins are equipped with lights solar and battery dry toilets water point and washbasin for the extra toilet with locally made handmade soap tables chairs and deckchairs as well as additional gas heating towels linens duvets plaids and blankets are provided and beds are made upon arrivalnla pitalaya cabin 7m high 2 people the romantic with a fourposter bed formed by the branches of the tree access by a spiral staircase 2 terraces including one covered connected by a suspension bridgencabane du brame 5m 34 pers the cocooning with a bed in 140 a bed in 90200 on the mezzanine accessible by a rope ladder a junior bed in 70160 and a large semicovered terracenpeyre hitte cabin 3m 2 to 7 pers the fairytale perched on 3 trees with a bed in 140200 2 bunk beds and 1 single bed in 90200 guest access guest accessnsite with an exceptional environment very frequented by deer and other animals of the forest located 20min from the motorway exit in the heart of the pyrenees 400m from the village center and 700m above sea levelncar parking on arrival on site access to the cabins on foot 70 to 120m from the car park reception building with office and sanitary facilities open 24 hours a day 2 ha landscaped site that promises privacy and moments of relaxation with a nordic bath reservation required and wooden games free access other things to note other things to notenrestoration optionsnbreakfast is included in the overnight rate we carry it in a basket that you lift with a pulley to the cabin for an indoor or outdoor tastingnas an option you can book a warm and hearty evening meal basket made with local producenfor groups of 4 to 10 people we offer an atypical form of catering in the kota grill allinclusive meal from aperitif to dessert around grills in a small hexagonal chalet with a grill in the center of the table topped with a host for a memorable and very friendly meal

Title: Forest Treehouse
Description: have you ever experienced sunrise waking up in the trees here is your chance our treehouse is place to relax and commune with nature and all this only 35 min drive from tallinn city center the treehouse provides an intimate simple and calming retreat for 2 people the space the spacenour quests has described the treehouse as being truly relaxing romantic and unique place youll ever stay what could be better than falling asleep in the trees and waking up to birds singing around you all this near the citynyou have whole apartment in trees with kitchen bathroom sleeping area fireplace and decknthe treehouse from the main house parking lot summer kitchen saunas and pond is about a 200m walknnguests will have free parking in our parking lot and access to outdoor kitchen bikes to ride with during the rental time pond for swimming and cooling down in hot summer days

Title: TreeHouse in the Cloud, (Close  toTheme Parks
Description: the treehouse is a private getaway for a couple that want to experience the magicnfor a video tour type the following link into your browsernhttpstinyurlcoma72vevp5nthere have been several movie and other photo shoots done on property please text request and details and we can negotiate feesnour other airbnb is just next door meemawscountry cottage which sleeps six guest access guest accessnthe treehouse has a full wrap around walk and a deck inside is a bedroom table and chairs a full bathroom and a kitchenette you have choice of stairs or a fixed ladder other things to note other things to notenthere are 4 horses on the property that you can enjoy in the refrigerator you will find carrots for you to feed the horses they will be your forever friend nthere is a fire pit in the common area and we will be glad to set one for younalthough we do not have a built in stove and oven we do have a large toaster oven with air cook and an electric frying pan these items along with the microwave can make almost anything you need

Title: Rainforest Tree House with Hot Springs
Description: no children under 5 years of age for safety reasons the tree house is handcrafted one of 3 casitas and 3 treehouses at the bio thermales natural resort organically integrated into our 35 acre rainforest guests enjoy free access from 9 am to 10 pm to the 15 natural hot and cool springs pools of various temperatures and rainforest trails the space the spacenplease message us if we will be your first or last destination in costa rica we highly recommend booking on weekdays for more privacy and tranquility as we have more day visitors from 9 am to 6 pm to our hot springs on the weekends especially sundays if your reservation includes a sunday we highly recommend planning a day outing to the many wonderful nearby activitiesnnwe are three hours north of san jose airport 45 minutes east of fortuna and volcano arenal and the many activities there and nearbynnguests enjoy 24day access to our hot springs and trails in our 35 acre rainforest at no extra charge the pools are cleaned every morning starting at 6 am but one hot spring will always be available many factors may dictate scheduling including weather we do not charge for children 17 and under but we will not accept reservations for the tree house for families with children under 5 years old for whom a 20 foot fall from the balcony would be very seriousnnour hot springs are ancient deep earth sources that bubble up through the rainforest floor laden with mineralrich waters that have been in the earth for at least 10000 years our waters are rich in bicarbonates calcium and magnesium low in sulfur and slightly acidic qualities shared by many of the worlds best hot springsnnfive of our 9 organic form hot springs pools are located in the rainforest and 4 hot springs pools as well as a small and a large cool spring swimming pool are located in a meadow surrounded by rainforest see below for more information the small and large cool springs pools both have water slides and there is a small water slide in one of the shallow and moderate temperature pools for small childrennnthe tree house is built to strict costa rican building codes but as with all tree houses there is some movement when the wind blows and this could be uncomfortable for people very sensitive to motion sicknessnnyou may see our other listings on airbnb atnntucano casita toucan casita is listed as rainforest casita with hot springs airbnbcomrooms30358nnmariposa casita butterfly casita is listed as rainforest casita2 with hot springs airbnbcomrooms51518nncolibri casita hummingbird casita is listed as rainforest casita3 with hot springsnairbnbcomrooms1896911nntree house rainforest tree house with hot springs airbnbcomrooms50435nnyou can check availability of each accommodation by clicking on the calendar tab above the main photo on each listingnntree house features see floorplan for all detailsn perched high among the rainforest trees the tree house has large screened areas for circulation of naturally cooler breezes it also has fansn all onsite hot springs and recreation activities included including 24 hour access to the hot springs and cool spring swimming poolsn the master bedroom with a queen sized bed with orthopedic mattress and hypoallergenic bedding is in a loftn one the main floor two twinsized beds that can double as settees with hypoallergenic beddingn handcrafted rustic furniture from naturally harvested trees on the landn main floor kitchen with refrigerator microwave coffee maker basic kitchenwaren bathroom with flash ondemand hotwater heatern wrap around balcony for relaxing and animal and bird watchingn maid service every 3 days includedn laundry service at extra charge per loadn short walk to rainforest and hot springs poolsn no telephone or televisionn wifi internet for your laptop if reliable 24 hour internet is essential to you please message us for suggestionsn hosts kathy and bernie live onsiten languages english spanish german limited frenchnnone time 10 cleaning fee thereafter housecleaning services every 3 days are freennbio thermales hot springs featuresn our hot springs pools are allnatural mineral water just as it flows from the earthn rainforest pools from 90 105f 31 40cn grotto pools in meadow flow from the 112f45c source pool onward into two larger and progressively cooler pools which are handicapaccessible and suitable for small childrenn cool pool in meadow is 90f31c mineral water flowing from the thermal creekn 2 swimming pools with continuous flow of natural cold spring water 88 degrees one is 1 to 15 meters deep and the larger is 3 meters deepn bathhouse in meadow with handicap accessible bathrooms and showersn ranchos roofed tables with concrete floors and grills for picnicsnnother activities on our 35 acre rainforest reserven birdwatching many types of toucans oropendulas parrots hummingbirds and the rare green macawn rainforest enjoy it from the casita porch or hot springs pools take easy walks on paths or more adventurous hikesn fossils enjoy our collection or hunt gently for your ownn wildlife twotoed sloths iguanas capuchin and mantled howler monkeys tree frogs birds butterflies and many othersnnwe are a 45 minute drive from the many activities in fortuna and volcano arenal such as ziplines hanging bridges white water rafting slow river floats or kayaking through wildlife sanctuaries or a 15 hour drive to la paz waterfall gardens and volcano poasnnbio thermales hot springs is open to the public for day use of the hot springs and most of our day visitors are costa ricans so you may also meet new tico friends bio thermales is generally not crowded however except on major holidays and sundaysnnfoodmeals the tree house has a kitchen there are many restaurants and a good supermarket within a 15 minute drive traditional costa rican meals can be delivered from a local caterer for very reasonable prices costa rican food is tasty but not spicy otherwise for those without cars we can call a taxi or synchronize a food shopping trip when we go to town for errandsnndriving from sjo airport please message us before booking if we are your first andor last destination in costa ricannwe recommend at least a small 4 wheel drive car the last 3 kilometers are country roadsnnthree hours of daylight are needed to safely drive here from the sjo airport before sunset at 530 pm the drive through mountainous cloud forests is splendid in daylight but prone to fog and rain especially at night creating hazardous visibility conditions after dark finding our countryside location will also be far easier if you arrive the first time before sunset if your plane lands in the morning to noon you can drive here directly from the airport otherwise it is safer to book a room near the airport on your first night or ask us to book a private driver 145 and have a rental car delivered at no extra chargennlast night in costa ricandriving directly to the sjo airport on the same day is possible if you book a flight in the afternoon please be aware that you must be at the airport 25 hours before departure if you have an early morning departing flight it is basically necessary to stay near the airport on the night before guest access guest accessnfive of our 9 organic form hot springs pools are located in the rainforest and 4 hot springs pools as well as a small and a large cool spring swimming poolwith water slides are located in a meadow surrounded by rainforest and one cool fresh spring pool in the rainforest see below for more information tree house guests can enjoy the hot springs pools from 9am to 10 pm and 35 acres of rainforest access at no charge the pools are cleaned daily from 6 am to 9 am but one pool is always available there are many factors involved including weather that may dictate when the pools are ready we have a staff operated laundry facility and guests may give clothes for washingdryingfolding for 5load other things to note other things to notenday visitors and groups are permitted entrance to use the hot springs and cool springs pools from 9 am to 6 pm there are usually more day visitors on weekends especially sundays and we recommend booking week days for more tranquility and privacy if guests book a longer reservation that includes a sunday we recommend planning a day tour in the many nearby activities on sundays day visitors must leave by 6 pm and only casita and tree house guests may use the pools after 6 pm and enjoy unlimited access to the pools with the exception of no nighttime use of the forest pools and cleaning schedule as noted abovennwe recommend either ordering a catered dinner in advance for your first evening andor next morning breakfast or buying and bringing groceries to cook because we are 4 km from the main paved road and driving after dark is highly discouraged until drivers have quite some experience on costa rican roads also most guests prefer to settle in upon arrival and not to have to get back in the car and drive out to dinner we provide a catering menu to each guest once reserved but the caterer requires advance notice of selected meals and times guests would like meals delivered we do not have a liquor license and guests must bring their own beerwinerum etc the tap water is safe to drink and we sell soft drinks fruit juices and other nonalcohol beverages snacks and ice cream

Title: Sulfur Ridge-Tennessee's First Luxury Treehouse ¬Æ
Description: check in dates arenfriday three night minimumnmonday two night minimumnwednesdaytwo night minimumnyou can book 234 nights or morendesigned to be the most romantic getaway tucked deep in the woods of tennessee come experience sulfur ridge tennessees first luxury treehouse perched 15 feet above the forest floor the treehouse offers a private intimate space to relax and be immersed in naturennplease notenwe are an adult only propertynno petsnno smoking the space the spacenplease notenthree night minimum on week endsncheck in datesmonday wednesday or fridaynour local amish built treehouse has an eclectic style encompassing a variety of eras all intertwined togethernfrom entering through the front door dated 1848 to the 100 year old stain glass window repurposed in the bathroom you will discover many interesting storiesnthe treehouse is built with your comfort in mind from a luxury mattress to a cast iron claw foot tub large enough for twondance the night away to your favorite songs on the jukeboxnspend your evening underneath the stars sitting at the fire pitnsoaking in the hot tub designed for only two will be the ending of a perfect daynnif you are a group of six or less we also have on our property our retro inspired shasta camp three 1962 inspired campers are available as a separate listing to book all three campers think of it like a three bedroom housennlook under cummins falls staysnsulfur ridge shasta camp

Title: Celesterra: Transformation Amidst Heaven and Earth
Description: celesterra is a spiritual retreat treehouse for people feeling the need to experience deep rest and contemplation healing from grief a new direction in life a more powerful connection with nature andor yourself a vision you wish to clarify etc to spend time in retreat here you must include two or three paragraphs about why your heart is calling you here also please let us know you have read the description and agree to our guidelines this is a magical place for your retreat the space the spacencelesterra is a 230 sq ft sacred space that floats between earth and sky about 15 feet off of the ground built by the television show treehouse masters it is a beautiful serene space that is cozy warm and inviting please note all food and cooking are strictly vegetarian with no garlic or onions so the next guests might be able to appreciate the space as well no meat on the land at all pleasenncelesterra features a beautiful living area with wood stove and leather club chairs a dining table fully stocked kitchenette and a bathroom with a composting toilet it has no running water but glorious spring water is supplied for drinking washing dishes and cleaning hands there is a full bathroom available in the main house exclusively for your use about a three minute walk try a walking meditation back and forth each day it features a beautiful walkin shower and flushing toilet and sink with hot and cold water you can restock up on water there or walk about 1 minute from the treehouse to where the spring overflows into the creek and fill up there celesterra also features a large front deck with fabulous views of the mountainsnnthe bedroom is located in a loft above the kitchen area it features a queen size memory foam mattress like a cloud with all natural bedding it is accessed by a 9foot ladder if you have physical limitations using the ladder might prove difficult for you please let us know see photos included here or we can send photosnnthis is a wonderfully quiet space that enhances your meditations reflections and relaxation only serious intentions to do deep personal work will be considered we ask for 7 days notice before booking but apply if you feel a deep need to come within the 7 day limit also we are happy to discuss financial costs for retreats longer than a week we will try and work with you in any way to help make this a transformational experiencennno dogs please we have a hunting dog winston rescue who is human friendly but not dog friendly also while we love the energy of children we do not allow them to come on retreat other things to note other things to notenthe application is simple please write a thorough explanation to the question what is my innermost heart yearning for during my retreat in celesterra and why if we feel your application is sincere and earnest and gives us enough information to come to a sense of right alignment we will notify you of your acceptance

Title:
The best in tiny living!
TreehouseTopia
Description: the barkhouse is the only fully tree supported structure in the gatlinburgpigeon forge area located just minutes from all the major attractions in the area and only 5 miles from the greenbriar entrance to the gsmnp enjoy the seclusion of 25 acres of trees with amazing views of the river and the mountains plus all the comforts of homenthe barkhouse is engineered with a beautiful live white pine growing through the center of the treehouse enjoy stargazing through the skylight the space the spacenthe barkhouse has a kitchen area with a microwave refrigeratorfreezer combo toaster oven single electric burner and coffee maker enjoy charcoal grilling outdoors on your private deck or using the fire pit shared with the other treehouse located on the property spend time inside resting on yoga mats in the suspended cargo net area guest access guest accessna door code will be given prior to arrival to enter the premise once inside the treehouse the entire black circle locking mechanism will need to be turned clockwise or counterclockwise to unlock or lock the door other things to note other things to notenno pets

Title: Tree house safari
Description: perfect for a wedding night an engagement request a big reunion or a moment you will never forget in your life come live the experience of being a bird in the trees and let the wind rock you in the leaves in the heart of naturenncitq number 304228 the space the spacenmagic tingwick is a 15 acre maple forest bordered by a stream a nearby forest and two market gardening fields in this vast space we offer for rent only 3 dwellings separated from each other in the forest so that everyone can enjoy the calm of nature in complete privacynwe also live on site in a small house near the alpacas to answer your questions and welcome younncitq number 304228 guest access guest accessnsuperb central spa pavilion with fireplace a large living room with cathedral ceiling and two kitchens one interior with dishwasher and induction hob and one outside with sink barbecue and view of the pondnthis common space is shared with the three minidwellings in our large forestnncitq number 304228

Title: Suburban Treehouse Getaway - Newly Renovated!
Description: owl in the oak treehouse was renovated in january to give our guests a completely modern experience while maintaining the uniqueness and charm of a real treehouse overlooking a small stream in a quiet valley the space the spacenthe treehouse is secluded more than 300 feet from the closest house in the winter several neighborhood homes are visible from the treehouse but summer foliage cloaks the treehouse in almost total privacynnthe main floor of the treehouse is 120 square feet and has a sitting area bathroom and kitchenette there is also a small writing desk that folds out of the way when not in usennthe 50squarefoot sleeping loft is accessed via ladder and gives guests some of the best views of the forest and streamnnthe kitchenette features a sink minifridge microwave and keurig coffee makernnthe small bathroom has a composting toilet and a shower towels body wash shampoo and conditioner are includednnoutside the treehouse is a sitting area with stunning views out over the forest and down to a small stream 30 feet below guest access guest accessnguests have access to the entire treehouse and platform there is also a short side path with a bench overlooking the stream other things to note other things to notenguest parking is on the street and the twominute walk to the treehouse takes you down a stone path through the woods up and down several flights of uneven steps and across a small footbridgennaccess to the treehouse itself is up a spiral staircase and its necessary to climb a ladder to get to the sleeping loftnnchildren under the age of 10 are not allowed to access the sleeping loft for safety reasonsnnthe water heater tank only holds 7 gallons of water so showers need to be kept short the toilet in the treehouse is a composting toiletnnthis property is a real treehouse actually suspended in trees if it happens to be windy during your stay you will feel the sway and hear some creaking sounds

Title: THE BELLA LUNA Romantic Mountain Treehouse
Description: come sleep in the trees luxury romantic treehouse above walhalla sc is just minutes from stumphouse tunnel stumphouse mountain bike park issaqueena falls white water rafting oconee county has many beautiful waterfalls hiking trails we are close to clemson lake keowee lake hartwell lake jocassee and located just inside sumter national forestnnan amazing romantic getaway for honeymoons anniversaries birthdaysnnsee our sister treehouse the stella vista the space the spacenplease read entire descriptionnbefore you booknnthis is a romantic retreat for couples onlynwe are not pet friendly due to guests that may have pet allergies and due to the high decks we are not kid friendlynnour romantic little house in the trees is designed with our guests comfort in mind it sleeps 2 people there is a beautiful kingsize custom built bed with a rainbow poplar live edge headboard we chose to dress our tuft needle mattress with soft comfy cotton linens and soft blankets the white flowing drapery surrounding the sleeping area makes this a dreamy and romantic space hanging over the bed is a stunning vintage crystal chandelier if you happen to catch the sun streaming in the upper windows just right in the morning or late afternoon you may see a beautiful show of rainbow prisms cast by the crystals dancing all over the room the french door from the sleeping area leads out to a west facing deck where you can enjoy your morning coffee or a glass of wine in the evenings in the treetops on a pretty little bistro setnninside the cozy sitting area has a small dining table for 2 and small loveseat for relaxing and kicking your feet upnnthe kitchenette has a mini fridge microwave and a toaster the wake up station is stocked with a french press coffee maker burr coffee grinder and an electric water kettle we have whole bean coffee ground coffee flavored teas along with cream and sugar and sugar substitutes we have plates bowls coffee cups glasses cool bronze flatware and glass stemware and of course wine bottle openers if you prefer to paper plates and plastic utensils we have those too we leave snacks a few goodies juice and water these are for you and there is no extra charge so please enjoynnfor outdoor cooking there is a weber electric grill and an electric griddle for cooking on the lower deck we have grilling utensils spices foil and cooking oil all cooking must be done outside as there is very limited counter space indoors after all this is a treehouse so enjoy the glamping experience there are two great outdoor dining spaces with bistro tables and chairs one is on the upper deck off the bedroom and the other is a dedicated covered dining area downstairs that overlooks the fire pitnnthe bathroom has a huge walkin shower with natural fossil stone tile and a river rock floor over the shower are copper fairy wire lights for a fun showering experience wrap yourself in the large fluffy bath sheets after showering there is a petrified teak vessel sink and standard traditional potty just like you have at home soap shampoo hairdryer and all towels and linens are provided just bring your toothbrushnnif you want a more adventurous showering experience grab a robe and head downstairs to our new outdoor summer shower you will love the cool copper rain head and lighting for showering at nightnnoff the back deck you can stroll across the laurel branch bridge to a private napping deck complete with a raised doublestack net custommade for just two people grab a pillow and blanket and snuggle upnnon the downstairs deck you can relax in the 2 cedar rocking chairs or hang out on the porch swingnnthe fire pit is just off the lower deck and we provide firewood and a little basket of goodies to make smoresnnyou will find utensils and cooking supplies in the utility room off the lower decknnthere is no tv or wifi but we have a basket of games playing cards and a vintage style record player and few old records for you to enjoy on the lower deck there is an addicting hook ring on a string gamennquiet hours are 10pm to 8amnni only allow 2 guests there is not a sleeper sofa or any room for a cot or air mattress the treehouse is a cozy 300 square feetnni have poured my heart into building this treehouse i want my guests to enjoy all the wonderful and carefully thought out things i have placed here for themnnplease respect my property follow the house rules and please leave everything like you found itnni provide a nice clean place for you when you arrive fresh clean linens cozy blankets towels dish towels and dishes all hard surfaces door knobs etc are wiped down with sanitizing wipes between every guest please clean up after yourself and leave everything in good order before checking outnni only book out 6 months in advance so if you look on the calendar and the dates you want are more than 6 months away that doesnt mean they are not available it just means the dates havent been released yet please check back and grab your dates once they become available to book guest access guest accessnyou will have access to the area around the treehouse other things to note other things to notenmy dream when designing and building this little getaway was to provide a comfortable and relaxing space where you can unwind and enjoy some downtime i carefully thought out all the things i wanted my guests to enjoy all the fun little details and interesting things mean a lot to me and i want you to enjoy them as wellnni know accidents happen and that is okay as long as you let me know about it if you do happen to break something please just let me know just leave me a note or message me i need to be able to replace things before i host my next guestsnnfailure to report brokendamaged items will result in replacement feesnnwe do not have wifinncell service is best with verizon

Title: Caba√±a Treehouse Mountain View
Description: the dream when we were children a treehouse surrounded by trees where the main habitat is birds you will get unparalleled peace and tranquility awakening with the view to the mountain and birdsong is a unique experience far from the noise of the city in the middle of the mountainnin the background you will hear the sound of a river of crystal clear water just 70 metres from the cabin ideal for relaxing and sharing being an extremely quiet and safe place the space the spacenquanta with kitchen equipped for cooking and all kinds of utensils additional sugar coffee salt oilnthe bed with all its equipment the bathroom has a hot tub gel towels guest access guest accessnwe have the horseback tour service on the slopes of the braulio carrillo national park visiting the river the waterfall and a spectacular view of the central valleynwe also have guided hikes to cerros tibs caricias tur where you can enjoy mountaineering and its great landscapes other things to note other things to noten700 metres from the property is part of the braulio carrillo national park a 30minute drive you can reach the braulio carrillo national park and the cable car as well as the barva volcano within an hours drivena horseback riding tour is offered on the slopes of braulio carrillonwe are 15 minutes from toucan rescue ranch

Title: Cozy West Virginia Treehouse
Description: thanks for checking out our treehouse its 4 minutes from downtown shepherdstown and 15 minutes from downtown harpers ferry we are excited to share it with other funloving folks the treehouse has heat and ac a tiny kitchen with a mini fridge stove top toaster oven gravityfed sink and kitchenware theres a bathhouse built on the back of the hosts home with a conventional toilet and shower theres also an outhouse with a light and essentials we provide wood for the fire pit also the space the spacenthe treehouse sits between oak and hickory trees 20 feet above a rock outcropping that overlooks our little holler there is a 12x5 front porch with a good sunset view and lighting for nighttime enjoyment inside there is a nook with large windows to relax by a mini kitchen with a gravity fed sink mini fridge dual cook top and toaster oven along with four stools we provide kitchenware pillows bedding towels and firewood for the outdoor firepit the loft is more suited for kids but is fine for ablebodied adults as well we do not provide bedding for the full mattress in the loft only pillows the bathhouse is on the back side of the hosts house and is about a 30 second walk from the treehouse the outhouse is 50 feet from the treehouse and has a light and other essentialsnnwhen you arrive use the gravel driveway just beyond our homes paved driveway that has two silver gates you will see a sign that reads willbillys and a school bus that you can park beside the path to the treehouse begins along the left side of our large red workshopnni live on a country road and my neighbors are like family so make yourselves at home and feel free to check out our property we have one other airbnb cozy school bus on the other side of our property

Title: Treehouse at Bliss Ridge Farm - Best View in VT
Description: dr seussinspired luxury treehouse perched at the top of an 88acre organic hill farm further surrounded by 1000s of acres of wilderness designed by bfer roth diy network tv show host of the treehouse guys this is an authentic treehouse built within and around living trees enjoy private hiking from your door panoramic views of vts worcester range camels hump mt mansfield etc you are truly secluded yet only a 15min drive from the heart of the mad river valley waterbury the space the spacenthe treehouse is nestled in the edge of the woods at the top of the farms hay fields enjoy seclusion and incredible views hiking and quietude there is a springfed pond available for swimming nearer to the farmhouse and farm events and dinners can be arrangednnthe indoor spacenthe queen bed foldout sofa kitchen living bathroom and patio with hammock are all part of the main floor there are two 10ft lofts above one with a double bed and one with a twin the bedrooms are not closed off from oneanother see photos the house is built within the trees which move and creak subtly if it is windy the toilet is the best composting toilet available it looks like a regular toilet and the waste closes behind a door but note that it does not have a water flush the shower is a hot outdoor shower on the front porch with a curtainnnimportant information regarding the treehouse at bliss ridge farmnwe would like for you to understand a few important facts before you arrivebeing a tree house guest has its benefits and its limitationsnbuilding and caring for a treehouse in nature was a labor of love and not an easy endeavor we hope that you will appreciate how special it is enjoy the majesty of mother nature and at the same time will understand its limitations and respect our operating instructions there is an explicit information sheet when you get here but we want you to be prepared ahead of timenthere is no electricity and no plumbing however there is a solar panel to provide you with lights and cell phone charging please note that cell phone service is limited to texting and sometimes a phone callnthere is a composting toilet which is very modern and clean but you need to follow the directions that are clearly postednthere is hot and cold water for a kitchen sink and an outside showernbecause the treehouse is in the woods nature will take over when it can ie mice may come in in the fall to try and nest in warm places in vermont we hope that you do not leave food around to entice them we monitor mouse traps so you will not have to deal with thatnsometimes some rainwater may come down the large inside tree if it is windy and raining hard we provide towels to put on the floor around the tree if this happens it stays in a small area around the treenif you have small children we trust that you will take responsibility for them please monitor them on the loft stairs help them to use the toilet properly and dont let them take food away from the dining tables that are inside and on the decknbeing mindful of being in nature will help prevent mice ants and bugs and it will help us to keep the treehouse clean and smelling freshnwe have an organic farm and respect nature and do not want to be wasteful we hope that you will divide your garbage into recycling trash and compost receptacles are clearly marked on the bridge and please do not bring plastic water bottles onto the property we will provide you with two x 2 gallon containers of fresh spring water and refill whenever you would likenno smoking in the treehouse or on the decks pleasenwe wish you a wonderful adventurous experience if you have any questionsnplease do not hesitate to ask other things to note other things to notenwe supply fresh tested spring water please do not bring plastic water bottles please do not buy or use plastic water bottles at all they are ruining the earthnnwe open the calendar for the following season at the end of the current season late october our season runs between late april and late october

Title: Magical Treehouse: Secluded Mountain View Off-Grid
Description: you will have a truly unique experience sleeping 30 feet above the forest floor rockabye babynnyou get to go totally offgrid in this treehouse perched between two beautiful maple trees in a wooded forest in the countryside with amazing views over a fields all the way to the stunning endless mountainsnnthis is your opportunity to reconnect this is your chance to be in touch with the environmentnnwe are proud to be rated as gold key superhosts by airbnb since 2014 the space the spacenyour stay in the treehouse is offgrid thoroughly insulated and heated by a woodburning stove also we do supply you with a jackery 1000 lithium battery generator to power the shower or to charge your phone or laptop we also use a composting toilet for the cleanest and most environmentally sensitive relationship to the surroundingsnyou will learn firsthand what offgrid glamping is likeand that includes a hotwater showernwe will supply you with bed linens towels bath soap shampoo plates cups utensils at least 2 12 gallons of fresh drinking water pots and pans grill utensils salt and pepper paper towels a sink and dish soap dish towels toilet tissue hand sanitizer a camping percolating coffee pot coffee cups a flashlight and some firewood for the mini wood stovesee amenity limitationsnmobile phone service is definitely adequate for working from a tree guest access guest accessnguests have access to the entire treehouse area and surrounding 2 acres of woods the field downhill from the treehouse is not our property it is the field for our neighbors cows please respect his property by not trespassingnthis area of mehoopany is referred to as mehoopany mountain atop the mountain sit wind turbines which power the local area with green energynnthe closest public transportation available is either in scranton or wilkesbarre our guests drive their cars or rent one to get to the countryncheck in time is from 4 to 7 pm

Title: Pica-Pau's Treehouse
Description: to support the permaculture project of quinta do sol come and experiment special stay in a treehouse in the middle of corktree forest at 8m from the grown the location and the view are a spectacular perfect for birds watching up there you can cook in the kitchen have hot shower and use compost toiletna childs dream experience for wild nature lovers the space the spacenyou will find up there all thisnseparate and isolate bedroom with double bed kitchen with fridge and cooker a shower with hot water compost toilet gaz heater and large terrace guest access guest accessnafter 400m of dirty road but practicable you can park next to the treehousenand you need to go up the stairs case other things to note other things to notenis recommend for people who like to be in nature and not too afraid of hight because is 8m from the grown licence number licence numbernexempt

Title: Whispering Pines Treehouse
Description: whispering pinesnnone of a kind beautiful 2 storey tree house built on 8 pine trees overlooking a ravine with an amazing view located only minutes from st catharines and jordan station in the heart of wine country the tree house can sleep 2 adults and 1 child age 3 and up the space the spacenyour private space is located over 1000 feet 300 m back from the road with easy access to free parking sitting 10 feet 3 m off the ground the treehouse is a perfect place to relax and unwind and spend time with naturenthe treehouse comes with 1 queen size bed on the upper level and the possibility of a fold out mattress for a child the main floor has an eating area and basic kitchenette equipped with a bar fridge keurig coffee maker toaster and microwave no stove supplied a bathroom with a shower is located on the main level enjoy your morning coffee on a large balcony overlooking the wooded ravine along the creek below you may hear or see ravine wildlife the fully insulated premise has both heating and air conditioning for your comfort early luggage drop off availablenchildren aged 3 and over are welcomenmajor grocery stores and restaurants are located 5 mins drive from treehousenbring your bikes and enjoy the scenery of the beautiful jordan area guest access guest accessnguest access self checkin with keypadnguest can access the entire space other things to note other things to notenof notenunit is thoroughly cleaned and disinfected after each guest leavesnmust navigate stairs to enter treehouse and bedroom 10 ftnno smoking or vaping on propertynno pets allowednno fires of any type because of treehouse location including candles and incensenpotential of noise treehouse is located on a farm property adjacent to orchards and vineyards and there may be noises related to agricultural operations

Title: Mountaintop Luxury Treehouse at Selah Ridge
Description: located in ringgold georgia the treehouse sits in 16 acres of private property it is minutes from georgias best wineries and some of the most desirable hiking whitewater and scenic activities in chattanooga and the tennessee valley escape to our mountaintop retreat for solitude and tranquilitynnall military police and firefighters will receive a 15 discount on all week day stays thank you for your sacrifice and service the space the spacenfor a full tour of the treehouse please visit our instagram selahridgetreesort and click on the tour bubble below the profilennthough plenty of activities are nearby for adventure the treehouse provides sanctuary for the weary soul an arched bridge connects the treehouse to the hot tub custombuilt in alaska by zen bathworks made from aromatic cedar youll sooth away your worries as you breathe in the sweet mountain airnntake in the views and sounds of the rustling trees while experiencing our spacious outdoor shower top off the night with a nice glass of wine or roast smores on the balcony fire pit at our treehouse you will not only enjoy the breathtaking views and the melodies of nature but also unwind to the sound of the waterfall underneath bundle up in the warmth of the cozy indoors or bring in nature by sliding open the giant picture window our sweet escape makes kicking back in nature easynnthe treehouse is the perfect place for a romantic getaway for two however it can accommodate up to four guests comfortably with a full size trundle bed that pulls out from below the king bed if needednnour treehouse is not currently equipped with wifi it is our hope that this provides a much needed escape from the world and that you will enjoy being off the grid however if you find that plugging in is a necessity during your stay there is great cell service any hotspots you provide should work well

Title: Modern Tree Dwelling w/Water Views+Cedar Hot Tub
Description: stay in our custom designed tree dwelling w woodfired cedar hot tub up among the trees this unique structure is perched atop a 21acre wooded hill sloping to water views enjoy stunning views from the king size bed through a wall of windows located in a classic coastal maine village w reid state parks miles of beaches famed five islands lobster co see 2 other tree dwellings on our 21 acre property listed on airbnb as tree dwelling wwater views see our reviews the space the spacenpart modern tree house part tiny house this abode is called souhegan which means watching place because of the gorgeous views of the river and neighboring conservation land the dwelling consists of two elevated structures connected by a rope bridge structures are elevated on posts and trees a second rope bridge leads to a woodfired cedar hot tub elevated up among the trees weve used vintage and salvaged materials when possible structure 1 a twostory structure master bedroom on the second floor accessed via a spiral staircase with a wall of south facing windows affording stunning river views includes king size bed or two twin beds upon request on the first floor is a small kitchen and dining area with large windows for water views a small full bathroom and a screenedin porch with rockers and river views kitchen includes twoburner stove sink small fridge pots pans dishes toaster oven no regular oven and importantly cork screw structure 2 is a convertible space with a wall of waterfacing windows upon request for an extra fee of 20 per personper night this fee includes labor of converting the living room space into a bedroom extra linens and towels for the extra guests we can set it up as a second bedroom with either king size bed or two twins do let us know at least one day in advance or we can set it up as a living room space with sofas and coffee table there is a waterfacing veranda off the front of structure 2nnplease note as much as we love pets we have a strict nopet policy in our dwellingsnnthere are 2 other tree dwellings on our 21 acre property listed on airbnb as tree dwelling wwater views see our reviewsnnautumn visits come stay in the tree dwelling in autumn for stunning views of foliage and crisp walks along the marsh back to the tree dwelling to warm up in the cedar hot tub the dwelling is well insulated and warms up quickly with our top quality wall mounted heating unitsnnwinter visits the tree dwelling is open all year round they stay super cozy on cold nights and there is no better time of year to sit in the hot tub snow flakes swirling around you warm up after a day of cross country skiing or snowshoeingnnthe views both structures have views across down the large tidal back river in the distance you can see where the back river meets up with kennebec river just before both flow into open ocean and past seguin island where a light house was commissioned by george washington across the back river from the land lie hundreds of acres of pristine conservation land part of the year this tree dwelling will be used for the seguin artist in residence program at the seguinland institute which is under development use of kayaks and canoes are included with rental and available at anytime during your stay guest access guest accessnthe space and the 21 acre property are yours there are two other onebedroom tree dwellings on the property each well spaced out to give plenty of privacy in addition guests have access to adjoining 40 acre peninsula with docks trails and cottages the two other tree dwellings are also listed on airbnb as tree dwelling wwater views take note of our reviews

Title: Cottage in the Woods B&B "The Owls Nest"
Description: this beautiful newly constructed treehouse lifts guests into the trees with the peak of the structure reaching 30 feet into the air this private tiny home and balcony is all yours with no shared spacesnenjoy the ground level covered patio complete with furniture and a gas grill perfect for cookouts after long hikes at ricketts glen immerse yourself in the beautiful landscapes of this woodland experience perfect base for your outdoor adventure to ricketts glen state park only 25 miles the space the spacenthe treehouse has a sleeping loft with two twin mattresses that easily slide together into a king bed king sheets providednalso the sofa on the main floor converts to a full sized bed comfortably sleeps a total of 4 guests guest access guest accessnthe treehouse is accessed by many stairs and may not be suitable for small children or those with disabilities other things to note other things to notenyoy will have your own private patio area and firepit extendable forks for the firepit can be found in a black bag hanging on the grill breakfast is served at the main house and you are welcome to join

Title: Eagles Nest Treehouse ~ Hike/ Relax / Climb!
Description: take in the rustic fairy tale vibe of this custommade treehouse in the midst of towering trees recline in a rocking chair and watch the sunset over the mountains or try your hand at some stargazing on the nest deck overlooking the forest while listening to the nightly sounds of the forest in the morning step out on the trailhead and explore the stunning forest book soonnnif your travel dates are not available on this calendar visit one of our sister properties by visiting our profile the space the spacenrelax at night while you listen to gentle owls and enjoy the twinkling stars above while you warm up near a homemade stone fireplace area with bulb strung lights encircling the area in the morning walk to the national trailhead location while the sun breaks through the trees as you hear the gentle stream of a nearby creeknnwe are a rare find in the area located on private land and one of the only rentals in the red river gorge that is located so conveniently inside the national park just walking distance to great nearby hiking trails if your dates are unavailable be sure to check out our other listings as well such as the ey breeze and lions lair each providing its own unique accommodationsnnthis treehouse is one of our original builds and receives high reviews due to its unique build and amenities such as a swing underneath a separate bedroom called the nest which is 16ft off the ground and a handmade stone fireplace with ambient lightingnnwe guarantee you this combination of outdoors amenities provides a truly unique adventurous magical and relaxing getaway experience with your friends or and loved ones we look forward to having you stay with us and be sure to book soon before it fills up fastnnwe look forward to having you stay with us and be sure to book soon before it fills up fast

Title: Little Goldies
Description: free whitewater rafting tour cozy charming cabin glorious view the space the spacenfree activities included every day to enhance your vacation experience free admissions are included every day of your stay to some of the most popular attractions the area has to offer such as the biltmore smoky mountain railroad white water rafting jeep excursions and more daily value of 250nncabin is pet friendly pet fees applynnwhen you just need to sit back and enjoy the great outdoors on a modest budget little goldies is the place this unassuming cabin is perched perfectly on the side of a rocky hill with an expansive view of the great smoky mountains but dont let the simplicity fool you at little goldies cabin you have a steaming hot tub on the ample deck and a comfortable queen bed inside the basic kitchenette with washer and dryer dishwasher and small cooktop added to the propane grill are all youll need to survive comfortably in the woods so to speak the housekeeping standards and luxury linens are included and up to the standards of watershed what is even better is that while you may seem hidden away in nature miles from civilization you can be wifi connected have satellite tv and are just 15 minutes to bryson citynnall bookings are subject to local restrictions in place at the time of the stay we may not be allowed to accommodate all bookings that are made if local rules change after you make a booking we make every effort to communicate current local rules and any changes to them

Title: Water Forest Retreat- Tree House
Description: water forest retreat tree house is a 168 sq ft private heated and electrified tiny home with stained glass windows surrounding an oak tree nestled in 100 acres of forest enjoy your favorite drink out on the deck up in the trees while watching the birds there are 2 12 miles of hiking trails with a brook waterfall marsh and pond come here to hike fish or just relax in this beautiful forest we also have an octagon and hikers haven house please click on our profile picture to read more the space the spacenregarding the corona virus we follow all cdc cleaning protocols we also supply sanitizer wipes lysol and hand sanitizernnwater forest retreattree house is a great place to rejuvenate and enjoy all that nature has to offer here you can hike meditate relax read write mushroom hunt fish create art music photography bird watch cross country ski snowshoe and star gaze as there is little light pollution along with many other activities in a private woodland settingnnthe space which is 168 ft or 156 m has electricity but not running water hand sanitizer is provided along with a wash basin or you can use the sink at the main house to wash your hands soap wash cloths and towels are stored in a container under the bed on top of the cabinet there is complimentary hand made glycerin soap bottled water is provided or you can fill up a container at the shower as the well water is very good the composting toilet is conveniently located in the tree house and is vented so there is no odor toilet paper is provided there are directions on the bathroom wall on how to use it please read carefully so that it will function properly never urinate with the chute opennnthe tree house has a locking door and six large windows with screens and shades for privacy the key is located on top of the cabinet there are two stained glass transoms above the front windows and two more in the apexes the space has a queen size bed with a comfy hybrid coil memory foam mattress there are 400 thread count sheets with plenty of pillows and quilts along with a faux fur throw two bed side tables with tiffany style lamps complement each side along with two tall white birch logs decorated with branches crystals and fairy lights behind the bed side tables are usb ports with cords so you can charge your iphone above the bed hangs a stained glass panel and a ceiling fan for your comfort on warm nights there is also an electric fireplace for cold nights or you can just enjoy watching the flames without heat on very cold nights we also supply a propane heater though the electric fireplace is usually sufficientnnalthough there is no traditional kitchen there is space inside on top of the cabinet table and outdoor tables to prepare your meals there is no fridge or microwave we do have a large lobster pot and a tripod pizza grill available upon requestnnthere is a cabinet which stores some camping essentials such as a propane camp stove dinnerware cutlery cutting board sugar and sugar substitutes spices oil tin foil creamers pots pans lighters scissors wine bottle and can opener extra light bulbs mugs dish drying cloth umbrellas first aid kit paper towels lysol cleaner flashlights propane insect repellent and a battery powered lantern a kuerig coffee machine is provided with assorted coffees chai latte tea hot chocolate and hot apple cider there is also a turquoise inlaid wooden table with two chairs where you can dine write or use your computer and a small wall rack for hanging clothes on top of the rack are two wine glasses binoculars and a mirror under the bed there are an assortment of games two pottery mugs are provided which nancy made the mugs are for sale at 3400 each atop the cabinet is a bowl of snacks and a book binder with more information maps menus and directions on how to use the coffee machine propane stove propane heater and electric fire placennthere are 2 12 miles of well maintained wood lined hiking trails with some that follow goldmine brook to a waterfall that once hosted a grist mill back in the 1700s you can still see the large stone foundations along the trails you will see many of the iconic stone walls that are unique to new england maps are provided in the book binder and trail markers are posted along the way there are many benches and chairs along the trail where you can sit relax and enjoy the scenery while hiking the trails walking poles or sticks are suggested as the terrain is hilly with some stone steps and steep areas two walking sticks hang on the wall in the tree house because of the terrain hiking boots are strongly recommended due to the nature of the trails no atv dirt or mountain biking is allowed these are hiking trails only we ask that you please respect the private sign as this trail leads to the octagon where guests may be staying there is a good distance between the buildings so you will not be able to see each other even in winter we wanted to make each site secluded and private while hiking please stay on our side of the brook as the opposite side is owned by our neighbornnit is a five minute walk to the spring fed pond which is part of goldmine brook the brook is rated class a and supports a myriad of wildlife including river otters mink and great blue herons if you like to fish bring your gear to try for pickerel large and small mouth bass white and yellow perch shiners and native trout previous guests have had great luck fly fishing herennif you are looking for a place to swim canoe or kayak visit gardner lake state park in salem which is only 15 minutes away you will have to supply your own canoe or kayaks depending on water flow you can also take a dip right here in the small pool below the goldmine brook waterfall which is a 2025 minute walk down the trail or you can go for a swim in gold mine brook pond which is only a five minute walk away we supply water floats that you can borrow looking for some ocean fun bluff point state park in groton is another good choice here they have a beach along with hiking and biking trails bluff point is about 24 minutes away both places are free of charge please check out our guide book on airbnb by clicking our profile picture for more things to do in the areannthe outdoor living area is conveniently layered with crushed stone enjoy a fire in the fire pit and meals either outdoors or in on the deck there are two chairs and a mosaic glass table for outdoor dining along with a propane grill and a mayan style hammock that seats two people at ground level there is a fire pit with additional tables and chairs zero gravity lounge chairs along with tiki torches for extra light and ambiance seasoned wood is available for 6 dollars per five gallon bucket and includes fire starter please no wood deliveries after dusk you can bring your own wood or use any of the wood on the forest floor as long as it is not being used to mark the trailsnnthere is a walmart and big y one mile away where you can buy food drinks ice and other supplies looking for a liquor store bozrah wine and spirits is one mile one the right heading west on route 82 since there is no refrigerator you will need to bring your own cooler or you can borrow ours if you do not wish to cook there are many good restaurants close by we provide a few menus in the book binder for you to look through some restaurants even make deliveries or you can use a delivery app such as door dashcomnnenjoy a hot private outdoor shower down at the main house the distance to the shower is about a one minute walk the shower is private while you are using it but is shared with other guests plush towels washcloths and soap are stored under the bed in a container shampoo and conditioner are at the shower there is a sink here where you can wash your dishes under the bed there is a black plastic container to use for dirty dishes dish soap and scrubber are provided at the sink there is a dish drying cloth in the cabinet back at the tree house due to freezing temperatures the shower and sink are not available in winter a wash basin is provided for sponge bathing the basin is stored under the bed simply use the coffee machine or camp stove to make hot water guests staying two nights or more during this season are more than welcome to use the inside shower up at the main house in winter we will take care of washing the dishesnnbecause of the distance wifi is not available in the tree house but is available in the parking area and pottery studio which is a walking distance of about 300 feet if your device is supported by an internet provider you will be able to get onlinennnfor the nature enthusiast take part in a guided nature walk where nancy will discuss the history plants animals geology and mushrooms found in the area the walk costs 15 dollars per person and lasts about an hour and a half to two hours we usually cover 2 miles and may go off trail after the hike we will go to the house and sample some autumn berry syrup shagbark hickory syrup sassafras syrup spice bush pepper and acorn or mushroom cookies when available we also have shagbark hickory syrup for sale you might want to bring something to drink a snack and your camerannbefore you book please keep in mind that this is a fancy form of camping glamping that is semi off grid no running water in the treehouse with all that camping entails including insects animals sudden weather changes rocky paths and hilly terrain it is a one minute walk from the parking lot to the tree house and shower you may get to hear our resident barred owls red fox eastern coyotes or possibly come across a white tailed deer or mink while hiking the trailsnnthe distance from the parking area to the tree house is about 300 feet with 170 feet of that being in the forest since the tree house is small please pack appropriately we will be more be more than happy to help you with your luggagennbe mindful of check in and check out times if you tell us you plan to arrive at three and do not show up until 9 oclock realize that we have been waiting many hours for you when we couldve been doing something else we have also been running electricity and heat which is wasteful if you are going to be late please have the courtesy to let us know unfortunately our tiny homes are not conducive for lockbox entry and we need to show you around we also need time to clean after check out for the next guest and are on a tight schedulennplease read house rulesnnsmoking is not allowed inside the tree house but is allowed outside of itnnfor people staying two nights or more i will leave you a check in text to see how youre doingnnwe also have a pottery shopstudio that you are more than welcome to visit there are many items for sale including hand woven scarves earrings and shagbark hickory syrup that i makenncheck out is easy please leave the key on top of the cabinet and youre all set to go if you would like to stay longer and hike the trails after check out you are more than welcomennbert and i will do everything we can to make your stay relaxing and enjoyable please feel free to contact us at anytime during your stay if you need anything we look forward to hosting you guest access guest accessnhiking trails yard shower and parking area please respect the private signs as these trails lead to the octagon or hikers haven where guests may be staying you will not be able to see the octagon or hikers haven from the tree house nor they you we wanted to make all places private and secluded while hiking please stay on our side of the brook as the opposite side belongs to our neighbor thanks for your cooperation other things to note other things to notenplease bring your own personal toiletries food drinks and ice for your cooler if you do not have a cooler you can borrow ours we also have extra ice packs if you need them also bring suitable footwear for hiking outdoor shower or if you want to walk in the brook as the stones can be slippery we do not do wood deliveries after dusk but if you would like more wood we will get some ready for you and leave it by the basement door outside

Title: Treehouse for dreaming
Description: our cuckoos nest tree house is close to many destinations it is hidden above a small village at the edge of the forest and is good for couples and families with children the space the spacenthe tree house stands on the edge of an oak forest overlooking the small village of bottenbach through your own access from the road you are also independent of the associated farm at night you can switch on a lighting of the path from the parking lot otherwise there is no lighting in the village between approx 2400 and 400 citydwellers are always very enthusiastic about the sight of the clear starry skynin summer the terrace offers shelter from excessive heat from the canopy and can sit outside for a long time in the evening and enjoy the view in winter the sun comes through the bare branches and inside the marble plate heater creates a cozy atmospherennfor child restraint there is a folddown grid on the ladder in the upper sleeping area see picture and doors with latches on the two entrances on the outside on the terrace guest access guest accessnour guests are welcome to come to the farm to watch the daily work pet the animals and also to stoke and grill a campfire unfortunately this is not possible near the tree house because of the fire hazard other things to note other things to notenin the neighbouring village of rennhofen there is a beautiful beer garden baumhaus just google nwe have 23 bikes to rent at the farm
