Title: Treehouse with Jacuzzi bathtub + infrared cabin
Description: enjoy your holiday amidst vineyards in a unique apartment at 4 meters altitude from the new living area you can access a terrace where you can spend cozy hours as well as watch magnificent suns rise and set the space the spacen21 steps at a height of 4 meters with a magnificent view of the krems valleynour apartment has a small kitchen dining area toilet and bathroom with shower and whirlpool as well as a bedroom in the upper area ideal for 2 people but possible for four in the living area there is then an additional sleeping possibility for two people guest access guest accessnthe tree house is only available to you other things to note other things to notenstarting point is our tree house in a perfect location for many wonderful hikes cycling trips mountain biking and visiting historical sights in our beautiful wachau and in the forest district

Title: An Adirondack Tree House Retreat
Description: the treehouse is one of the most sought after places for couples to reconnect with naturennnnestled in the foothills of the adirondack mtns and just 9 miles from saratoga springs ny boasting quiet solitudennthe winding staircase leads to a sleeping area and covered porchnalso outdoor kitchen deck fire pit and full bath just a few steps away are includednnplease keep in mind that our treehouse is meant as a quiet retreat for 13 people the space the spacenthis private wooded setting offers many unique features such as private parking outdoor kitchen and dining with charcoal grillrefrigerator microwave fire pit hot and cold running water as well as outdoor lightingnnthe narrow circular stair case leads to a comfortable sleeping area including a double bed plus a loft just outside the sleeping quarters is a covered porch for reading writing or reflectingnnelectric heater and fan are includednnprovided are sheets blankets pillows and pillow casesnna full bathroom is just a few steps away provided are towels soap shampoo and paper goods

Title: Modern treehouse on working maple syrup farm.
Description: welcome to quinns treehouse we are located on a 500 acre working maple syrup farm at the base of robbins mountain there is endless outdoor opportunities hiking biking boating swimming and skiing are right outside the door the treehouse abuts camels hump state forest however is close to local shops dining and the interstate for easy travel the space the spacenthis is a unique treehouse experience with modern accommodations yet nestled in the woods the space works best for couples or a family with 2 children we are located on a very steep private driveway and in the winter you will need a 4 wheel drive vehiclenthe treehouse is on an owner occupied property but our house is completely out of sight the treehouse has heat air conditioning wifi and an incinerating toilet which requires some unique procedures to operate but very easy to use we have a smart tv available for your use there is no cable but have basic streaming options to use with your personal accountnwe have a small kitchenette with a mini fridge hotplate toaster oven and keurig coffee maker a sink and barbecue occupy the outdoor kitchen and there is an outdoor hot water shower there is no indoor plumbing including shower or sink the toilet runs on electricity and cleanly incinerates wastenwe supply plenty of drinking water the outdoor sink and shower water is not suitable for drinking in winter months we have a portable on demand hot water heater that runs on propane as there is a specific procedure to follow we are going to have to set up times for water delivery and showers we will supply water from our house and set everything up for you guest accessnthe treehouse is surrounded by miles of hiking trails multiple rivers and an abundance of mountain biking and skiing opportunities numerous established mountain biking trails are minutes away and there are 2 local ski resorts within 5 miles from us there are endless opportunities to ski bike hike swim fly fish paddle or just float down the river with an inner tube to our local brewery in richmond shuttling can be arranged for an extra feenas the treehouse is located on a maple syrup farm you may have an opportunity to witness maple syrup making in action sugaring season is typically march through april but tours of the sugarhouse and sugarbush are year round and can be easily arrangednvisit sweetabbyscom for more information

Title: Treehouse Village - The Box
Description: the box is a shipping container with a modern design that is set amidst the trees there is a bedroom with a queensized bed and an air mattress to add space for two more guests should you want to make it a family affair or bring a few friends there is a full bath a kitchenette and then the rest of the space is made into a living area with all youll need to enjoy your stay at the end of the living area youll find yourself surrounded by huge windows looking high into the treetops the space the spacenthe box is a shipping container with a modern design that is set amidst the trees there is a bedroom with a queensized bed and an air mattress to add space for two more guests should you want to make it a family affair or bring a few friends there is a full bath a kitchenette and then the rest of the space is made into a living area with all youll need to enjoy your stay at the end of the living area youll find yourself surrounded by huge windows looking high into the treetops guest access guest accessnyou will have the whole treehouse to yourself other things to note other things to notensince these are treehouses you will need to esign a liability waiver we are located in the woods so all animals and insects that come with nature will be prevalentnsince we are in a rural area we have limited wifi available also there is a long hilly driveway if the weather is rough you will need to be careful if you get stuck we will assist you if we are available a fourwheel drive vehicles is recommended if there is snow

Title: Luxurious Two-Story Treehouse | Minutes from Lake Sunapee | Peaceful
Description: a fourseason treehouse packed with all the modern amenities an experience to remember with exquisite craftsmanship throughout enjoy the unique features yet simple pleasures of life in the trees the treehouse is equipped with radiant heat flooring and a propane fireplace for the winter and air conditioning for the summer with two bedrooms and one bathroom you will find romance privacy and charm all nestled in the woods near mount sunapee and lake sunapeennknock this one off your bucket list sleep in a treehouse the space the spacena four season treehouse packed with all the modern amenities an experience to remember with exquisite craftsmanship throughout enjoy the unique features yet simple pleasures of life in the trees the treehouse is equipped with radiant heat flooring and a propane fireplace for the winter and air conditioning for the summer with two bedrooms and one bathroom you will find romance privacy and charm all nestled in the woods near mount sunapee and lake sunapee knock this one off your bucket list sleep in a treehousennevery inch of this oneofakind treehouse has been crafted with the utmost attention to detail that invites you to discover the many surprises it holds including a mouse housennother features include wraparound deck raised high above the trees where you can relax and enjoy the solitude surrounding you and a lower deck with bench seating and a weber spirit grill that converts to a griddle cook your morning pancakes in the great outdoors in the evening sit back and relax around the fire pit with your favorite drinknnwalk through the handcrafted hobbit door to discover a welcoming main room with radiant heated travertine stone flooring and walls covered with reclaimed barn board from the 1800s dine at the table built on a kilndried tree stump the galley kitchen is equipped with a microwave convection oven twoburner cook stove and underthecounter refrigeratorfreezernna soapstone propane stove keeps the house cozy on snowy winter days while a central air conditioning cools down the heat of the summernnthe treehouse offers two bedrooms to comfortably sleep four the lower level bedroom has a full size bed and the upstairs bedroom has a queen size bednnthe kitchen is fully stocked with utensils dinnerware pans a toaster and keurig coffee maker with coffee and creamernnthe tree house is a selfcontained private area located on a welllit road with parking for two vehiclesnnmust be 21 years of age or older to rent guests have access to the entire property

Title: Ash hill treehouse, in the Adirondacks
Description: brand new the ash hill treehouse is suspended between ash and maple trees this is a real treehouse built in the trees and you wont want to miss out on an experience like this five steps will lead you up a path as you embark on a 100 foot winding bridge elevating you from ground level into the canopy of the trees where you will start your much needed getaway relax by the propane fireplace the perfect place for couples or solo travelers that want to getaway and enjoy the sounds of nature the space the spacenthe ash hill treehouse is the perfect mix between rustic and modern guest access guest accessnfeel free to walk the 15 acre property and experience nature

Title: Observatory Tree House
Description: the observatory treehouse is a vacation experience that quite literally rises above the rest built not for the faint of heart this treetop adventure offers the best views of the red river gorge the space the spacenonce you trek up to your new home in the swaying eastern white pine you may feel exposed to the unforgettable raw nature of the canopy this tree house is designed for ablebodied folks and is not meant for unsupervised or small childrennnascend the wandering wooden staircases into the canopy to begin your exploration of this pirate ship in the trees youll discover spectacular views from a glass bedroom with builtin skylights a screenedin hammock lounge with plenty of storage and a cozy kitchen with a wraparound porch as you navigate from room to room through floating walkways and steep ship ladders you may be wondering what it must have been like to create such an epic abode guest access guest accessnaccess to wifi on our red office porch and in the office parking lot other things to note other things to notenkitchen the observatory kitchen has a gas stove french press coffee pot cookware dishware soap and kitchen linens above the sink youll find a 5gallon water dispenser for your cooking and cleaning needs we supply two 5gallon jugs of potable water during your stay for perishables a 75 l yeti cooler is provided please bring your own icennlivingdining screenedin lounge on the lowest level with a futon and two hammocks a porch and barstyle seating for two on the midlevel and the most spectacular views from the highest level on the observation deck that leads to the bedroomnnbathroom observatory has a private composting outhouse you are also welcome to use our guest shower and bathroom at the rrg headquarters at any time during your staynnbedroom a full bed above the trees and a fullfuton in the lower hammock lounge please note that while this treehouse was designed for two there is room for two additional guests in the hammock loungennadditional amenities weber charcoal grill wall heater in the bedroom solar powered kitchen lights and solar charging station for small electronics batterypowered lanterns and a private fire pit with camp chairsnnimportant while we allow dogs at our rentals we do not recommend them for observatory your furry friends will most likely not be fans of the steep laddersstairsnn4wd and high clearance vehicles are recommended but not required

Title: KY Breeze PRIVATE Treehouse ‚òÖ  Romantic RRG Forest
Description: take in the rustic fairy tale vibe of this custommade treehouse in the midst of towering trees open the 15 ft glass garage door watch the sunset over the mountains or try your hand at some stargazing on the stargazing deck while listening to the nightly sounds of the forest in the morning step out on the trailhead and explore the stunning forest of the red river gorgennif your travel dates are not available on this calendar visit one of our sister properties by visiting our profile the space the spacenat night listen to gentle owls and enjoy the twinkling stars above on the stargazing deck warm up near a fire while enjoying the solitude that the forest has to offer in the morning walk to the national trailhead location while the sun breaks through the trees as you hear the gentle stream of a nearby creeknnwe are a rare find in the area located on private land and one of the only rentals in the red river gorge that is located so conveniently inside the national park just walking distance to great nearby hiking trailsnnif your dates are unavailable be sure to check out our other listings as well such as the eagles nest and lions lair each providing its own unique accommodations this treehouse is one of our newest additions providing ac heat and electricitynnwe guarantee you this combination of outdoors amenities provides a truly unique adventurous magical and relaxing getaway experience with your friends or and loved onesnnwe look forward to having you stay with us and be sure to book soon before it fills up fast

Title: The Tree house in Ano Korakiana
Description: although this lovely and romantic tree house is set in the woods it is light and airy with a balcony that overlooks the verdant landscape so typical of corfunthe detail as well as the tasteful fabrics adds to the ambience whilst small it has everything you need it will enchant you the space the spacenthe treehouse is part of an estate called vradi estate which is located in the foothills of the village of ano korakiana as part of the estate there is a guest house with 7 bedrooms three cottages an aframe house a treehouse and a horse trekking center the cottages were built in such way so that our guests can enjoy the peace and the privacy that the place has to offer each property has its own outdoor space and its own unique view of the field where the horses graze every evening near the cottages there is a vegetable garden from where guests can help themselves to fresh producenanyone that is a nature and animal lover and is looking for a quiet place away from the touristy spots will enjoy it friendly cats an dogs roam around the estate freelynthe vradi estate is quite central located on the island making it a good base for guests to explore both the north and the south of corfunthe nearest beaches are ipsos dassia and barbati which are all within 10 minutes distance by car or scooter approximately 5 6 km palaiokastrisa one of corfus most popular attractions is 15 minutes awayncorfu town is 15km away so 20 minutes by carncorfu airport and corfu port about the same 1516 km away 20 minutes by car or scooterna car of scooter is required as there is no public transportationnthe horse trekking center just 20m from the cottages is nicely busy in the summer but not noisynbreakfast is also available at an extra cost at luna inn the adjacent bb

Title: Panorama: Magnificent treehouse,cozy
Description: www valterria comnnthe totem houses of valterria are located in the valterria adventure park located in the privileged environment of the merindadesnnimagine sleeping among trees jumping on zip lines taking a ride on our ebikes enjoying the sunset on your terrace with unique views you can enjoy the tranquility of the rural world and immerse yourself in countless adventures the space the spacentreehouse located in the forest of the valterra adventure parknits hexagonal shape accommodates two people with the possibility of a double bed or two single bedsnit has a toilet and a showernthe terrace of this cabin has east orientation guest access guest accessnan adventure park at your feetnn climbing zip lines and jumping in a single tower of 24 meters high climb up its climbing and climbing tracks or from the stairs inside an adrenaline monster through which to access the circuits of high rope bridgesnn hanging bridges it runs 18 extra long bridges at 11 meters high through the canopies of an oak forestnn giant zip line jump and slide along the large double zip line of 300 meters in lengthnn enchanted forest of molars turn on your imagination thanks to a circuit built between giant rocks joined by bridges and with different challengesnn cafeteria skewers rations or some dishes that come out of our kitchen in a family atmosphere and with the best views of the merindadnn food truck come and see our foodtruck mounted on the chassis of an old bus that will delight young and old in the you can enjoy our pizzas and focattias with a wide variety of ingredients waffles creps ice cream and much more in our adventure atmospherennwww valterria com

Title: Treehouse Canopy Room: Permaculture Farm
Description: our lovely space is a lush urban oasis and permaculture farm enjoy goats pigs emus roosters parrots tortoises cats and friendly people located in little haiti near art district 15 minutes from airport and south beach fresh veggies eggs and honey when available late night train horns and early rooster crows alsonplease check in by 7 pm on arrival day the space the spacenwalk up narrow staircase to the 3rd level of the treehouse nestled within the pithocilobium tree feel like youre living in the trees beautiful view of canopy and animals theres a double bed for two shared kitchen downstairs the bahamas style bathroom is located a few steps away from the treehouse and the lovely outdoor shower is also close by bathroom and shower have hot waterndue to height of treehouse no children are allowed sorry from the canopy room you will hear animal sounds and possibly midnight train hornsnmosquitos are at their peak during rainy season juneseptember we have a net over the bed citronella candle two fans and incense to keep them away from you in the treehouse but thats not a guaranteenmiami summer is hot while our beautiful canopy of trees helps keep the farm a lot cooler than other parts of the city be mindful that the treehouse only has fans for cooling it does not have an air conditioner please consider our cozy cabin room or cute cedar camper listings if you are sensitive to mosquitoes or prefer air conditioning click on my photo and scroll down to see all our interesting listings on the farmnplease checkin by 7 pm guest access

Title: Eagles Nest Tree House
Description: come stay in your very own tree housennthis rustic luxury treehouse is nestled away 17 feet high in the treetops eagles nest will accommodate up to 4 guests thrill your inner child staying in a treehouse but with all the luxury you expect as an adultnnthis beautiful 900 sq ft treehouse is furnished in a rustic luxury style and has all the luxurious amenities you want with the fun of a treehouse stairs are necessary to enter the treehouse check in is after 4pm check out is 11am the space the spacenwe sanitize the cabins and change the hot tub water before and after every guestnnwalk right onto the 1st screened porch where youll find a 4 person hot tub then into the treehouse youll find a kitchenette washerdryer wifi in house surround sound gas fireplace king bed upstairs and two foldout memory foam twin beds convertible to a king downstairs there is a half bath downstairs and a full bath with a tiled shower upstairs you can also enjoy the upstairs screenedin porch sitting area right off the bedroomnnthere is 280 ft of open deck and a lower patio area with a gas grill and picnic table for an additional 160 sq ft you can also relax outside on the deck in the hanging rope chairs or under the treehouse by the lower patio area in the swinging play forts weight limit 250 pounds so much fun to be had and so much relaxing to donnyour payment constitutes your agreement to our rental contract so you do not need to sign and return it to us rates are based on double occupancy and do not include tax processing additional guest fees or insurance feesnnadditional adults are 25 per night per adult one child free per paying adult if you have children instant quote will include in the price please contact us before instant booking so we can correct the costnnminimum stay 2 nights 3 night minimum for holiday dates other discounts may be available please contact us for more informationnnwe do require payment in full at the time of booking unless other arrangements are agreed to at the time of bookingnnnonrefundable pet fee 75 plus tax per dog we do not allow cats 2 dogs max rates are based on double occupancy and do not include tax processing or insurance fees rates may change at any time without noticennadditional guests are 25 per night per guest we offer weeknight 1night minimum stays weekend minimum stay is 2 nights 3 night minimum for holiday datesnnplease also note that if you plan to bring our fur family members we have 2 do max and there will be an 8273 75 plus tax nonrefundable per dog fee for the entire trip note that this is not a per night fee this charge will be billed to you through the airbnb resolution center please contact the manager with any questions or concerns we do not allow catsnnwe are available 247 to answer your questions and are here to make your stay with us unforgettable

Title: Nomad Jungle Treehouse - surf / yoga (shared bath)
Description: la selva at nomad tree lodge is an adventure accommodation offering a home to surfers yogis and nomads from around the worldnnwe offer daily yoga and foot access to 2 world class surf breaks intermediate advancednnwere not perfect were not luxury but life here is really beautiful in its raw simplicity if you sign up for this adventure commit to surrendering to the jungle and immersing yourself in this unique experiencennnote wifi in communal space only no guest kitchen the space the spacenour rooms are all uniquely beautiful in their rustic simplicity think of the space more as glamping than as a hotelnnyou will get to your cabin by a series of pathways rope bridges through the trees nestled in the jungle your little aframe treehouse cabina is your own little jungle nest to reset relaxnnthe treehouse is breezy and open even though its 100 screened and protected from bugs and youll often see monkeys right out your front door listen to the waves crashing at night and the jungle sounds in the morning your little paradisennyoull have access to the shared bathhouse with a bathroom and shower shared with 1 other cabin guest accessnyou will have access to the pool yoga shala and the main lounge where we have wifi connection and seating for an additional charge we offer breakfast and daily yoga classesnnwe dont have a shared kitchen but there are plenty of restaurants nearby

Title: Treehouse Escape on 5 Acres- TreeHausATL
Description: come sleep in the treesthis is the perfect place to come when you need a break this beautiful treehouse sits on five acres of wooded property minutes from the 75285 and less than two miles from the the battery and truist park after your walk down the sparkling path past the firepit you enter the house by crossing three bridges to the porch has a full kitchen and bathroom the sleeping loft has a ships ladder and a king size bed with soft linen bedding truly awesome place to recharge the space the spacenthe large 400 square foot deck sits 23 feet in the air full in suit bathroom fiber internet kitchen and acheat its a great way to recharge your soul when you need a break from the norm other things to note other things to notenpets are welcome but there is a 65 pet fee

Title: The Sugar Maple Treehouse @ Vermont ReTREEt
Description: the sugar maple treehouse was hand built by us as a peaceful and serene retreet in central vermont surrounded by the wilderness of the green mountain national forest and perched high above the ground in three maples trees there is no place better to escape to there are so many things to do in this area between killington and sugarbush i cant list them all between the cozy bed and inhouse massage therapist you probably wont want to leave anyway please read the entire description the space the spacenyou can relax in the treehouse and enjoy being surrounded by nature or you can be adventurous and go explore the surrounding forest guest access guest accessnafter you park your car you will get to walk along the path and across the beaver creek bridge and up the path some more until you come across the treehouse nestled in the forest perched up on three beautiful maple trees other things to note other things to notenwhile we tried to make this treehouse as easy to access as possible the path to the treehouse is 650 in length up a slight hill with the treehouse being located in a forest the walking path can be a bit muddy bumpy snow covered perfect of a combination of everything so please bring appropriate footwearnnwe expect to clean the treehouse after each guest so there is no additional cleaning fee but if you leave a mess we will contact you and ask for a cleaning feennwe love animals and enjoy when guests gets to bring theirs we just do not like cleaning up after those furry family members so we are asking for you to bring a bed or blanket for the furry one to sleep on we do have a fee of 20 per day per pet for normal wear and tear airbnb is set up to charge you for the first night but any more nights will be added manually this fee does not include any extra cleaning or damage to the treehouse if you bring a pet with out telling us a head of time we will add on 50 since we use different linens when pets are visiting and wont be able to change them out on your arrival i do apologize if this sounds over the top in anyway a few bad apples are why we had to implement such thingsnnplease let us know your estimated time of arrival on arrival day so i know when to come down from the trees and keep an eye out showing up without giving me a heads up could cause up to an hour wait time until i can get you checked in since i could be in the middle of a project in the forestnnwe try to be as accommodating as possible by having a 4 hour check in window if you want to check in out side of that time frame we will do so to the best of our abilities at a charge of 30 per hournnthe bathroom consists of a composting toilet which is on the same treehouse platform we have a seasonal heated outdoor shower which is operational in the warmer months we will provide you with some drinking water in a bottle and hand sanitizernnthe treehouse is well insulated and has electric heaters that will keep you plenty warm on the coldest of vermont nightsnnfor those that want to disconnect while still being able to connect we now have internet and a small smart tv in this treehousennwe will help bring your belongings up to the treehouse upon your arrival but can not guarantee help bringing them back down as we both work in the morningsnnwe want to make sure everyone who visits our treehouse knows what they are booking by reading the description and not just our glorious reviews because the experience at our treehouse is not for everyone to indicate that you have read all of this please include your favorite type of tree when you message us licence number licence numbernmrt10126712

Title: The TreEscape
Description: 1st true treehouse in gatlinburgpigeon forge built by the treehouse guys from the diy network show features a loft br full bath with rain headtile shower unlimited high speed internet fully equipped kitchen very comfortable power reclining leather couch 2 live trees growing through the interior 2 live trees growing through the enormous deck space covered hot tub 2 outdoor bars suspension bridge to crows nest deck around a 5th tree and so much more the space the spacenour space was designed primarily for a unique experience that we would describe as luxury in the trees the setting is perfect for a quiet writers retreat honeymoon or romantic getaway or an unforgettable family trip to the smoky mountains our property is the best of both worlds as you can be in gatlinburg or pigeon forge within minutes but still feel like you have your own private setting in the woods below the house is even more to explore including a pub table with hangingswinging chairs there is also a nice charcoal grill and fire pit just off to the front and side of our place guest access guest accessnour guests will have complete and exclusive access to all amenities at the treescape

Title: Gypsy Treehouse Gazebo - Walk to Beach
Description: this beautiful large gazebo is detached from our home but is accessed via the back porch and deck plenty of windows overlook the trees and pond inside find this eclectic haven for the wandering soul with hanging bed and 2 foot deep tub find us on fb under treehouse gazebo the space the spaceneclectic is an understatement one of a kind indoor modern outhouse and cattle trough tub enjoy privacy overlooking a large yard and access the deck to cookout read relax or just soak in some sun its a trip back in time but with modern amenities the suspended bed is super comfortable and all of this is found in one room nestled among the trees just a few blocks from the beach or a short walk to the nags head woods preserve forestnnnote bed is full size 54x75 this may not be comfortable for those fortunate enough to be over 6 foot tallnna mini fridge oven toaster microwave oven and keurig single brew coffemaker are available for your convenience there are also usb charger ports at bedside underneath the bed there is a wooden chest inside you will find the bluray dvd player 12 ft hdmi cord iron ironing board blow dryer and first aid kit please write down supplies taken from kit so that i can replace them underneath the sink there is a small broom and dustpan if you want to clean the sand from the floor a drying rack is provided for your wet bathing suits you may set it up outside or over the tub located in shower light switch for the bathroom lamp is on the lamp itself cable for the tv is on the spectrum app as there is no longer a cable box you may also use netflix under treehouse guest profile and we want you to enjoy this unique experience so if you have any special requests or recommendations we would love to know other things to note other things to notenbed is full size 54x75 this may not be comfortable for those fortunate enough to be over 6 foot tall

Title: Girgola Treehouse Experience Ger√™s
Description: stay in this unique accommodation and enjoy the sounds of nature the space the spacenwe are located in northern portugal in the council of vieira do minho included in the national ecological reserve due to its richness of flora and fauna next to penedagers national park and with the caniada dam as backgroundnwe have two treehouses amanita and cantharellus and now girgola in our private forestna strategic place located in the middle of nature but with the comfort of the neighborhood of cities such as braga porto and vigo guest access guest accessnguests have access to a 1 hectare of forest swimming pool and free parking licence number licence numbern110790al

Title: 02 - Treetop Flyer
Description: now with electric the treetop flyer is a small oneroom treehouse with a loft wraparound porch lower deck propane grill and nearby fire pit there is no plumbing but we provide a jug of spring water and theres an outhouse at the base of the stairs the farm also has a centrally located community kitchen and a bath house which are shared with other guests on the farm no pets no exceptions please read all the house rules and full description homegrown hideaways is also on fb and ig the space the spacenhomegrown hideaways is a hundredacre farm campground and event facility with treehouses yurts cabins camping etc the owners nathan jessa live onsite with a parade of dogs cats chickens and ducks for the safety of our own animals and yours we cannot allow any additional animals onto the farm anyone arriving with an animal of any kind will not be allowed to stay and no refund will be givennninterior the interior of the treetop flyer is complete with 4 double beds pillows sheets and light blankets 2 futons that fold open on the main floor and 2 mattresses in the loft barnwood table with 2 benches for eating and playing games and a jug of spring water there is an electric fireplace for heat but no indoor plumbing you get the entire treehouse to yourself a trash can is provided but we do not have trash service on the farm so you need to take your trash to town with you upon departure note please let us know if you plan to bring your own linens we offer a linen discount of 3 per person if we dont have to do extra laundry beds will still come with a fitted sheet and pillows with pillowcases just no blankets or top sheet you can request the discount as a refund or farm credit to use towards eggs firewood or other itemsnnexterior the treehouse features a covered wraparound porch above and massive deck below with swing picnic table propane grill and firewood bundles bring cash the upstairs porch and lower deck have solar lights please note that the lights do not come on until dark and they will only stay on for as much time as the battery was able to recharge during the day a private outhouse is just a few steps away from the base of the stairs or you can use the shareduse bath house in the main camping field there is also a nearby firepit that overlooks the gardens parking is available at the base of the treehouse is but very limited if you are bringing a group some will need to park in the parking area near the community kitchennncheckincheckout guests can check in any time after 4pm but we do recommend arriving before dark depending on our cleaning schedule we may be able to accommodate an earlier arrival time with advance notice rentals are unlocked so guests can just follow the instructions sent with the checkin email to find their location and let themselves in checkout is at 11am so that we have time to clean the rental before the next guest arrives if something comes up and you need to leave before your scheduled checkout date please do us the courtesy of sending a message once you have cell service so that we know not to expect younnunplug and reconnect homegrown hideaways does not have cell service or wifi but there is a landline in the community kitchen for guests to use we hope that you will take the opportunity to reconnect with nature yourself your family and other guests in addition to the shared kitchen space we also have a pavilion with cornhole set up for rainy days and a massive bonfire area where we encourage guests to pitch in on firewood to share stories and smores please note that quiet hours are from 10pm 7am and sound carries far in the hollernnshared bath house in addition to yearround outhouses there is a seasonal bath house with 4 flush toilets and 2 solarheated showers the bath house is rustic with a concrete floor so we recommend shower shoes or flip flops towels and toiletries are not provided but we do have extra for purchase if you forget yours in the winter months when the bath house is closed we open the restrooms in the community building for showering 1 full bath and 1 half bathnncommunity kitchen the farm has a brand new 2021 centrallylocated solarpowered chefinspired community kitchen with 4 ovens 5burner gas cooktop microwave refrigerator with farmfresh eggs coffeemaker toaster dishes cutlery baking sheets basic cooking supplies oil salt pepper etc plus homegrown farm goods smore kits and other goodies bring cash for the honor system please remember that this space is available for all visitors of the farm so guests are expected to clean up after themselves and not to loiter when others are waiting to prevent overcrowding we ask that a maximum of two people from your group occupy the space at a time and children must be accompanied by a guardian at all times meals may be eaten at the picnic tables on the porch under the pavilion or you can take food back to your site food scraps must be put into the compost bin not in the trash please do not discard food on the ground as it can make our animals sick and attract unwanted wildlifennthe farm we are a farm in the mountains so we have all the good beautiful views babbling brook hiking trails and the bad insects howling coyotes poison ivy that nature has to offer so come prepared we recommend hiking boots bug spray and weatherappropriate clothing be prepared to encounter insects mosquitoes ticks chiggers wildlife deer turkey snakes toads and dare we mention the bear track we spotted one spring weather hot cold rain snow toxic plants poison ivy stinging nettle wild mushrooms just to name a few there is a steep and rugged 15mile hiking loop that takes most folks about an hour if they can get past the first 10minute uphill climb we also have playground swings disc golf hula hoops a croquet set and a creek full of geodes to huntnncampfires most sites have their own fire pit except for the primitive camping area there is also a large communal fire pit near the community kitchen due to the spread of invasive insects we ask that you do not bring firewood unless it is storeboughtkiln dried we have bundles for sale here for 5bundle bring cash or you can scavenge dead wood from the forest floor for free do not cut down live trees and do not burn plastic glass trash gas or anything that isnt wood or paper there is plenty of firestarting materials under the pavilion next to the bundles on your way to the farm you will pass the local fire department please make note of the fire danger sign if the fire danger is high a campfire may not be advisable please check for local burn bansnnsmoking smoking is not permitted within the vicinity of any building on the farm please do not discard cigarette butts in the firepits or on the ground they must be completely extinguished and can be thrown in the trashnntrash in case you missed it before we do not have trash pickup on the farm and very much appreciate it if you can take your trash with you when you leave the farm we do have recycling bins for clean plastic and aluminum cans paper and cardboard can be put in the box next to the firewood bundles under the pavilion for others to use for starting fires we also have a compost bin available for all food scraps paper napkins and paper plates please do not discard food on the ground as it can make our animals sick and attract unwanted wildlifennmotorized vehicles we do not allow atvs 4wheelers golf carts or any nonmedical motorized transportation bicycles are welcome and encouragednngenerators we highly discourage the use of generators as they can be quite noisy and produce toxic fumes please talk to us in advance if you require one for a specific purposennaccidents if a child or member of your party has an accident involving bodily fluids please take the time to clean up after them first aid kits are supplied in most rentals and in the community kitchen if bedding is involved we have coinoperated laundry facilities in the community building to begin the washing process please notify us of such eventsnncoolers candles coolers should be left outside so that the condensation doesnt damage our floors candles are not allowed due to too many wax spillsnnnearby we are just 8 miles from the berea pinnacles 6 miles from get outside ky they rent canoes kayaks sups and ebikes 3 miles to tater knob pottery 20 minutes to anglin falls and a scenic hour from red river gorge berea is known for its arts and crafts the historic berea college and outdoor recreation in addition to hiking at the pinnacles there are several other trails throughout town and the newly opened silver creek bike parknnnoms our favorite places to eat in berea are noodle nirvana native bagel company happy jacks world sandwich bar nightjar apollo pizza papalenos and el rio grande in richmond we like masala indian purdys coffee co and thai smile note madison county is dry berea is moist and richmond is wet so plan your alcohol accordingly guest access guest accessnguests have access to all 100 acres of the farm except the private rentals the residence and the chickenduck houses do not let your children chase the birdsnnwe highly recommend arriving before dark there are very few streetlights on the road coming in and none on the farm it gets really dark out here and some of our city guests have a bit of trouble with thisnnrentals are unlocked for your arrival be sure to savescreenshotdownload the checkin instructions you receive in your inbox as theres no wifi or cell service once you arrive other things to note other things to notenitems we recommend bringing cash for firewood eggs and farm goods bug spray hiking shoesmudboots slippers earplugs sometimes the coyotes throw big parties and shower shoes the bath house is rustic with a concrete floornnwe live onsite if you have any issues during your stay please come knock on our door so we can assist theres nothing worse than finding out in the review that you didnt enjoy your stay and its something we could have easily fixednnwe are constantly striving to make the farm better and sometimes we forget to update the listings with the latest changes and improvements for the most uptodate information we suggest you follow our homegrown hideaways social media accounts where we also advertise onfarm workshops classes and events

Title: Le chalet du Pibeste  www.chalet-pibeste.com
Description: chalet dunpibeste chalet in wood perched 35 m at the edge of the natural reserve of the pibestenspend 2 nights with your partner or a week with your family in a very comfortable and exotic settingnequipped with a kitchen 2 open bedrooms bedding in 160 bathroom and normal toilet a terrace with views of the summits and a private jacuzzi tvnchalet for 2 adults and 1 child ideal for coupleshikers and cyclistsnbreakfast is free on the 1st morning and last morning the space the spacenyou can order the evening meal with a supplement of 25 per personnextra breakfast 7

Title: The Looking Glass:  A Pair of Mirrored Treehouses
Description: a pair of twin mirrored treehouses the space the spacenwelcome to the looking glass treehouse this dual treehouse is perched atop a tulip poplar and pignut hickory the faade of mirrors reflects the surrounding forest back to you creating a shimmering atmosphere of strong trunks and vibrant leaves the looking glass treehouse is truly a masterful creation that is a product of extraordinary craftsmanship and imaginative design other things to note other things to notenin winter months the kitchen plumbing is winterized guests will use water in the kitchen from the provided 5 gallon dispenser over the kitchen sink since the bathroom is at groundlevel its plumbing is in operation in the winter

Title: Treehouse on the Blue Ridge Parkway near Boone
Description: this hideaway was built on camera for an episode of animal planets treehouse masters perched in trees just off the blue ridge parkway its ideal for guests who would like to reconnect with nature and its a great home base for exploring the high country this property offers many unique features so please read the entire listing before booking we look forward to having you the space the spacenlocated on the blue ridge parkway this beautiful cabin is literally nestled in the trees built with special touches throughout you may not want to leave this unique treasure once you get here as you drive down the private drive you will feel the stress of daily life melt away the treehouse is below the main house and has views of the vast forest surrounding you enjoy your breakfast on the back deck with total privacy from the outside world inside the cabin you will find a fully stocked kitchen and charming sitting area with comfortable futon that pulls out into an additional sleeping space a comfortable queensize bed is upstairs in the loft and surrounded by windows so you will wake up in the treesnthe treehouse uniquely features an outdoor shower and a composting toilet guest access guest accessnthe treehouse is yours during your stay guests can explore surrounding land and hiking trails on the property other things to note other things to notenplease note there is no shower available in the treehouse during the winter months when it is below freezing the treehouse does have a bathroom with a composting toilet if you are staying for two nights or more you are welcome to request shower access in our private home

Title: Mountain Dreams in Big Canoe-Escape the masses!
Description: beautiful views of lake petit and the mountains all year this chalet has been completely remodeled and is just beautiful if your wanting a romantic getaway in the mountains it would be hard to beat this one the lake with boat rentals and miles of hiking trails the cabin is close to big canoes core amenities and trails this cabin has upgraded high speed wifi and tvs in each room many of our guests come and end up buying a home here if your looking to relax this is the place the space the spacenthis chalet has one bedroom and one bath it is approximately 600 square feet the kitchen is completely stocked with everything you would need to cook a full meal and then some there are two tvs in the cabin one in the bedroom and one in the living room both have smart devices attached to them if you have netflix or some other streaming service the couch is also a sleeper sofa that turns into a queen bed this cabin is maintained immaculately if your looking to come to the mountains this is the place we occasionally allow guests with a child to stay in the cabin as a fourth person but you must ask we do not want more than two adults staying in this cabinnnowner is a licensed real estate agent lic370513nthe owner is a licensed real estate agent with harry norman realtors and is always willing to show properties in big canoe and nearby communities with guest access guest accessnall of chalet laundry room is only available if guests are staying over three days or if specifically requested by the guest other things to note other things to notenno smoking or pets inside the cabin

Title: Nights of Cimes - The Cabane du Bois Mauret
Description: unusual accommodation open all year round dream cabins just for you perched 10 meters in the trees easy and secure access isolated from everything peace is guaranteed for an unforgettable night in the heart of the forest for lovers families or friends ideal as a gift for those you love the space the spacenperched on a magnificent tree the mauret wood hut is comfortable and rustic access is from a wooden staircase and then a footbridge fully secured by a net that leads directly to a small terrace inside many windows create a bright atmosphere and allow you to fully enjoy the surroundingsnit is equipped with dry toilets a kitchenette with gas and sink a cozy seating area additional heating tables and chairs inside and on the terrace storage areas and solar electricity lamps and socketnthis cabin does not have a shower we provide you towels and gloves for a rustic toilet in the kitchen sinknupstairs there are two small bedrooms under the rooftops in all the cabin is designed to accommodate four people in hotel formula that is to say clean and prepared beds you do not have sheets to bring and breakfast is provided guest access guest accessna 10minute walk in the forest from the parking lot takes you to the foot of a staircase plan a pair of sneakers this leads you to the departure of a suspended walkway to the terrace of the cabana other things to note other things to notenbreakfast included in the price for meals you can cook in the cabin or go to a nearby restaurant

Title: Treehouse perched in the trees  of Cassis
Description: text idea for your hutnnn as long as there are huts innthe woods nothing will be totally lost nnwhether you are a child in the countryside or in the city the hut is a part of your childhoodnwhat if for the time of a getaway you find the joys of these suspended momentsngo for an atypical stay by combining wellbeing and respect for nature in a chic and intimate setting offset from everyday lifenall in newly clothed wood the space the spacenunique cassis cabin the cabin is installed on a wide platform hanging from the trees and supported by stilts accessible on one level thanks to the natural slope you will however have the real feeling of being high with 5 m under your feetnthe cabin is insulated in sheeps wool it ensures natural softness in the middle of the season and freshness in the summer it includes a 140 cm bed that faces a glazed window lying down youll have a bird seye view of nature a hanging wooden walkwaynna bathroom is at your disposal a shower a sink and a private toilet the bathroom is private to the hut towels are providednnthe hut has electric light but also photophores for a more romantic atmospherennif you cant separate from your mobile phone or computer you will be able to charge it on a socketnna small fridge in the cabin and an espresso coffee machine are provided no breakfast schedulednnyou will spend a stay in lazy mode during summer bucolic during spring shimmering during fall and in trapper mode during winter

Title: Treehouse

Title: TreeHouse~Aliyah~Off  grid+hiking+family friendly!
Description: a whimsical magical treehouse a real tree house with a red oak that resides in the living room sleeps total of 2 adults 4 kids full bed in loft of main cabin a swinging bridge connects to the snuggle palace bedroom 50 feet off ground that has bunk bed a fire pit lights up the entire place hike 285 acres with trail head right below treehouse play games cook full meal in stocked kitchenette dates taken check out our tree houses the pete nelson hickory or tiny home schooliethe love bus the space the spacenwe are excited you found usnnwe are earthjoy village and have three treehouses on 200 acres of privately owned land strategically placed to give you privacy and close enough that you can rent out all three one built by master pete nelsonnnyou will have private access to the 285 acres with over ten miles of rolling hiking trails of varying degrees of difficulty there is a laminated map inside your treehouse with descriptions on the back there are hammocks and tire swings along the way there are creeks to explore play and hike your trail starts right below your treehousennthe listing you are looking at presently is the aliyah treehouse what makes it unique is that the snuggle palace is 50 feet high this is our tallest treehouse its great for when youre a family that likes to spread out in the main cabin is a full size bed and across the swinging bridge is a bunk bed with a twin full size bednnwhat stands us apart is the quiet seclusion and options to add on adventures like our unique guided tree climbnnthe aliyah this tree house is for those wanting an off the grid nature experience it sleeps 2 adults and 34 kids this is truly a one of a kind experiencenninside this particular tree house you are greeted by a tree in the room as in a morethan100yearold two foot wide trunk right there in the middle lichen and all reaching straight through the roof one of two red oaks that support the tree housennneighboring limbs hold a second treehouse bedroom accessible by a suspended ropeandplank bridge to a deck its an excellent place to sleep without light or sounds except for the nighttime woodsnnits trees as far as the eyes can see the woods hold different marvels all times of year so there is no offseasonnnguests also relax with a swinging cabana tree pod below a hammock village a outdoor patio set a stackedstone firepit cafe seating outside the main tree house on the deck and shaded hiking paths including the popular 33 mile heart trail that wind through the 285acre private property each bend bringing old growth forests full of white and red oaks hickories blackberry patch for you to pick your own ponds and creeks plus the newest are two of largest tunnel landslides in ky to enjoy over 150 feetnnthere is a space heater for winter for both spaces and back up propane if needednnbathroomsnyou have a compost toilet 5 second walk outside the treehouse for quick trips and a private bathroom marked aliyah bath house up the road about a football field away with shower flushing toilet sink towels wash rags soap shampoo paper towels and toilet paper heated in the winternncooking it has a fully stocked kitchenette inside and everything you need to cook all your meals including propane stove 3gallon tank of water pots and pans plates bowls cups mugs and utensils french coffee press and cooler with a portable sink for clean up a charcoal grill outside bring your own preference of charcoalnnbeds a full memory foam mattress in the loft above the living room in main cabinnthe snuggle palace bedroom has a full size memory foam mattress below and twin bunk above snuggle palace gives you that true treehouse feel so you will have to draw strawsnnthis treehouse is recommended for nature lovers people who seek time away from technology and love being outside it is an experiencennbecause it is truly a off the grid experience we want to alert you to a few things you may have to navigate during your stay we have lighting for you by makita light ceiling light and mini lights we recommend bringing your own head lamps you have two electrical outlets in this treehouse mainly for space heater you can charge your cell phones via the usb ports on the makita battery sourcennthe tree grove is available to you to book a guided tree climb here our professional facilitator will take you step by step to the top for the best views challenge by choice and always on rope you can learn all the tree tricks including coming down upside down or you can always just hang out in the giant green netnna firepit is strategically placed to view from the all parts of the tree house build a fire and roast marsh mellows you can buy a bundle of split firewood for 4000 that will be delivered to your treehouse with a small fire starter about 20 pieces that equals one night or bring your own firewood it must have state compliance codennpets are welcome for 50 a pet per stay maximum 2nnyou can go on scavenger hunt to find the 5 ponds scavenger bingo is supplied for you and in the tree house a favorite of guests is to explore an abandoned 1800s settlers log cabinproceed with caution wade and play in several cool creeks bring your fishing poles for kids fishing pondsnnwe now have two large land slides over 150 feet on property for you to explore bring wax paper if you want to go super fastnnmake sure to play the survival card game in the tree house to get everyone engaged and off their phonesnncheck out our nature invitations in the tree house manual as a tool to enhance your selfawareness connect deeper to nature and othersnnnwe cannot predict the weather when it is sunny and warm things can be peachy the tree house can also be fun when it rains just prepare ahead of time we will send out a welcome letter once you book with detailed info for a rainy day and other important things to notennnin good dry weather you will have much easier time to navigate right up to the tree house however if snow is in forecast we recommend four wheel drive or front wheel drive with good tires if you are afraid you will get stuck during your stay we ask you do not pull down further than the green farm house at entry of property from there you can use a wagon next to farmhouse to take your things down or prearrange someone to assist younnnwe have a detailed manual inside the tree house for more details about everything in the tree housennyou will also receive a detailed welcome letter after you book with what to bring what to expect and local information like where to get groceriesnnwe love our guests and love to meet everyone however first and foremost we respect your privacy if you would like to meet us simply give us a text during your stay and if we are on the property we will meet you we do not live on the property and hour away so you will need to be coached for any problems via phonennnplease take note this adventure includes wildlife the tree house is in the middle of the woods you may encounter mice wasp bees ticks deer turkey flies ants water bugs hear coyotes and owls especially out on the trails this is their home we ask that you be a person that loves and respects wildlife if interaction with bugs insects animals and nature is disheartening to you we do not recommend this tree house experience for younnlocal tipsna favorite of guests is visiting the historical town of augusta ky childhood home to george clooney the irish pub is a great place to eat call ahead for open hours and have a ice cream after at the general store across the street visit the small red train with historical info and take a stroll along the beautiful ohio river just two blocks to the left of the pub augusta is also home to underground railroadnnanother favorite for more fine dining right on the river is the beehive call ahead to make sure they are open during your stay and to make reservationsnnfrom augusta you can take a magical ferry ride across river and visit small town of ripley find a place to eat along the river you can take bridge back to maysville and visit their historical downtown eat at parc cafea italian cafe replica or at the five star liljumbo cafennfor quick bite to eat order a pizza from the germantown 1st stop gas station 4 miles and pick it up phone number is in the treehouse or order from snappys in brooksville and they will now deliver as far as 3 miles from tree house by palmer funeral home at beginning of 875nnnback story the tree houses are our dream come true we both wanted treehouses at a young age for me being in nature brings me peace when i was 9 i would play in the woods with my siblings and build my tree house with small branches using rocks as our furniture and moss as our carpet i never let go of having this space and thought about it oftennnwhen bill and i started our dream company earthjoy tree adventures in 2007 whereas we take clients to the top of trees on ropes as part of this venture we wanted to give them another experience why not be able to stay in a treehouse toonnwe set off to take pete nelsons learn how to build a treehouse in 2009 workshopnnafter the workshop we looked high and low for the perfect property to have this dream come true we ran into many obstacles one being not able to afford it or not the right treesnnwhen we saw pete on animal planet i thought i would just apply for the fun of it we didnt even have a place when they called and accepted our application i called dad i asked him if we could build a treehouse on his 200 acre farm he laughed and then said yes he said he was tired of running two farms and would now change gears to have a few tree housesnnin 2017 we built our second tree house this one you are reading aboutnnin 2019 we finished our third tree house built by bill coowner and my husband he put love into every single nail and board it is unique in that it has play elements like a slide 2 swings and double loft he made 50 of the tree house from the land itself using cedars and repurposed wood and roof from one of the old farmhouses nnnn important no reschedules or cancellations within 30 days of your stay this is a strict policy as a small business we are no longer able to accept cancels or reschedules unless it is a death in the immediate family however you are able to transfer it to someone else that is 21 if its outside 30 days before your stay and you absolutely need to cancel or reschedule your date there is a 7500 change of reservation fee we do not accept cancellations beyond 30 days rain or shine please do not call if you are cancelling weather related guest access guest accessn285 acres of rolling trails approximately 79 miles to be exact you can hike walk or mountain bike if advanced there are also a kids fishing ponds a three person hammock on hidden trail and 10 hobbit tree houses to find hidden in the trees on hobbit trail find the tree pod along cabana trailnnplay in 2 largest land slides of ky 150 feet longnnnewest trail is jacobs ladders trail in honor of my late nephew killed in a motorcycle accident guests from all over the world bring a chime to hang in memory of someone other things to note other things to notenfrom your car is 10 second walk to the tree house bring your ice we have a cooler there is charcoal grill outside and inside camp stovennif it is snow you may need to park at top of hill it is about 200 feet walk down on gravel we recommend four wheel or front wheel drive or simply park at the top of the hill

Title: Pioneer Cabins + Luxury Treehouse  with Lakeviews
Description: a collection of 2 pioneer built cabins moved and rebuilt at this location in 2003 and a luxury treehouse on 12 wooded private and gated acres the breathtaking lake views await you at once you step out on to the back porch of the main cabinnthe property sleeps up to 14 people yet each structure is on the smaller side and brimming with character the space the spacenperfect for couples or families who want to be together but still need some privacy the large screened in porch has incredible views of the hilltop across the lake and dont miss the hot tub outdoor shower horseshoe pit and extra large fire pit seating area the porch bed swing is the most popular place to relax with a good bookni loved the challenge of renovating these structures and bringingnluxury to a rustic setting the string lights will guide you down the steps to a fabulous view of the water off the back of the property kitchens are fully equipped to cook a great meal and the treehouse boasts a keurig coffee station with a small fridge for leftovers from the main mealnwood burning fireplaces and coziness await take a soak in the jacuzzi tubnthen head outside to listen to the sounds of the deep woods and see the sky full of starsnsligo marina is 10 minutes away where you can rent a pontoon for the day and burgess falls has the most incredible hiking and waterfalls also 10 minutes away there are many beautiful nature parks also nearby come enjoy the finest of tennessee treasures

Title: Treehouse perched in the forest
Description: a treehouse 4 m from the ground where you will sleep in the intoxicating smells of wood here nature gives you all its secrets without electricity with dry toilets and well water a return to springs away from the world village at 1kmnnnew nin winter philippe offers extra heating for warm evenings in the hut the space the spacenphilippe and ccile built this spruce cabin made of douglas and insulated with straw it offers rustic comfort the 25squaremetre platform is accessed via a milled staircase there is everything you need to sleep rest and have fun for children a sofa bed games reading a small table and two chilean girls for the terrace nwhen handing over the keys a bottle of water 4 cups a garbage bag and a battery lamp will be provided all you have to do is plan your picnic and bedding kit guest access guest accessnin a forest of 10000 m a zip line games branches to make huts will delight young and old alikena picnic table a dry toilet a pump on the well for a toilet in the wild other things to note other things to notenat an altitude of 940 m nights can be cool nccile and philippe recommend that you come equipped with a warm downnfor your winter evenings if youd like youll be offered extra heating for 5 for refuellingnnwe also rent a lovely ecological house gorges de l ardche in chauzonnyou can find all of our rentals on airbnb

Title: Stay In tree house or set up tent
Description: come sleep among the trees and spend your days hunting andor hiking on more than 130 acres of landgreat place to bring your dad to hunt he can keep up fire while you hunt he will see deer guaranteefrom glass sliding door great shot he will see more than you jan 202020 now making syrup come see taste the space the spacenvery quite no one around all woods only noise maybe a airplane no roads or houses within one mile very secluded pets welcome please have crate and pee pads do not leave pets unattended guest access guest accessnfor deer hunting price is 50 extra per person a day lots of deer other things to note other things to notenwe have two twin beds there is an out side bath room if you need shower come to our house at this time with the covid going aroundwe do not allow taking showers at our house we will supply drinking spring waterwe have generator for 25 run time about 7 hr

Title: Treehouse Village - The Arrow
Description: the arrow is a classic hit you in your heart aframe with the addition of a swinging rope bridge what more could you want this treehouse is a favorite and youll see why it is simple yet cozy and comfortable there is a queensized bed and a bathroom with a beautiful clawfoot bathtub this is the perfect retreat for couples not designed for children the space the spacenthe arrow is a classic aframe with the addition of a swinging rope bridge it is simple yet cozy and comfortable there is a queensized bed and a bathroom with a beautiful clawfoot bathtub guest access guest accessnyou will have the whole treehouse to yourself other things to note other things to notensince these are treehouses you will need to esign a liability waiver we are located in the woods so all animals and insects that come with nature will be prevalentnsince we are in a rural area we have limited wifi available also there is a long hilly driveway if the weather is rough you will need to be careful if you get stuck we will assist you if we are available a fourwheel drive vehicles is recommended if there is snow

Title: Bear's Pat'
Description: cozy 15 m2 cabin on the edge of the forest perched 5 m on stiltsnlocated at the porte des vosges 25 minutes from epinal 40 minutes from gerardmer lake and the slopes in winternmany mountain bike trails in the village of julien absalonnpossibility of booking by the week or on dates other than those displayed on request the space the spacen1 double bed on the mezzanine 1 convertible bed in the living room if you want to sleep on the net provide a sleeping bagnkitchen with dining area refrigerator dishwasher oven and microwavenbathroom with sink shower and dry toiletnelectric radiators for a warm atmospherennfor cooking you will have at your disposal organic eggs olive oil vinegar salt pepper herbs of provence flour rice pastanbreakfast is not served but you will find for your stay homemade jam 12 liter of milk as well as a serving of butter and a small brick of orange juice per personncoffee pods and tea will also be available in numbernnno wifi but very good 4g reception for sfr good for orangennfor reservations of 2 nights in winter we provide two bobs and will give you the location a toboggan spot 30 minutes away

Title: La Cabins de Luca
Description: the hut perched in the 21st century in the paradise of the ardche in a space of one hectare you have an appointment with an exceptional place equipped with hottub and sauna heated by wood you will love the magnificent terraces hammock etc the space the spacenhottub nordic bath and private sauna heated by wood stovesnthe operation of the hottub and sauna is your responsibility it takes between 4 and 6 hours of heating for the 1500 litres of water in the hottub and 15 to 20 minutes for the sauna other things to note other things to notenrental from 2 nights july and august from a weeknbarbecues have been prohibited since 2010 by the prefect of the ardeche

Title: Icaco Treehouse:Rustic tiny treehouse by the river
Description: icaco treehouse is a tiny gem hidden away in the mountains of rio grande just 25 minutes drive from the sju airport and below the rainforest the name comes from the first indigenous living here meaning god of the mountain who is said to protect us from natural disasters it is nettled by the side of a peaceful arterial stream of the espritu santo river on a 9acre farm with private entrance a perfect place to relax disconnect from the craziness out there and reconnect with nature the space the spacenbecause of the covid situation unfortunately right now im not provided sheets blankets nor pillows for safety matters also i dont host pets i hope that you can understand me and come to my place because youll have the most amazing nature experience in the caribbean youll love the beauty of the surrounds including a rustic tiny house that comfortably fits 4 and provides basic amenities for a comfortable stay with a view of the yunque national rainforest the first floor is fitted with a small electric stove and water reservoir handpumped from the cristal clear stream connected to the sink and the shower below also there is a basic bathroom with toilet papernnthe friendly calm espritu santo river lays at the doorstep with its natural pools its the perfect place to chill with a beer and enjoy its shallow waters also youll be able to walk through a trail where youll see many beautiful trees and birdsnnplease be gentle with windows and mahogany surfaces take good care of this gem so others can enjoy it as much as you and youll return this is a property with full contact with nature so insects lizards and nonpoisonous snakes bound around the river is easily hikeable but enjoy it at your own risk and be aware of rising water levels guest access

Title: Tradewinds Treehouse
Description: the trade winds treehouse is simply our most luxurious getaway in the forest two twin treehouses perch side by side like owls roosting on a limb it features full electricity running water heat a private bathhouse a slide and even a hot tub the space the spacenimportantnaccess to this cabin requires driving up a gravel road with various steep sections most vehicles can make it but we do recommend 4wd andor high clearance if your vehicle cannot make it we can give you and your things a ride upnnfull bathroom featuring tile shower flush toilet hand sink towel hooks bath exhaust fan and more approximately 50 feet away from the two tree houses on a gravel path with night lighting the bathhouse is a log cabin which includes a living room area loft with a full size bed plus a comfy couch bar sink sleeps 3 totalnnfull compact kitchen featuring 3 burner stove half size fridge cookware eating utensils dish rack kichten sink rolling island with integrated cutting board kitchen exhaust fan and ample lighting interior seating in the kitchen is limited but can accomodate 6 people with additional outside seating availablenntwo treehouses one master quarters with a queen mattress downstairs plus a sleeping loft for 1 additional person sleeps 3 total and the other features a kitchen downstairs compact futon downstairs and sleeping loft with a full size mattress upstairs sleeps 3 totalnnfull electricity plumbing and flush toiletnnspringfed hot tub enjoy in the spring summer and fall we need to disconnect it when temperatures are below freezing nnamazing all natural locationnnample parking for 3 or more carsnneasy access to exceptional hiking trails and climbing areas including several within walking distance

Title: Treehouse Algarve

Title: Skyview garden Tree House - Casa Kalitero
Description: skyview tree house casa kalitero is a unique accomodation surrounded by olive groves and green 5 to 10 min distance from airport zakynthos town and kalamaki beachnnthe tree house is located behind a cypress hill therefore not on a busy street zakynthos town is in 30 min walking distance the combination of the ambience and privacy makes casa kalitero tree house the ideal place for an extraordinary and relaxing holiday enjoy the romantic nights with the panoramic sky view from your bed the space the spacenthe tree house is next to the main house casa kalitero its surrounded by the garden of the property with plenty space to relax the tree house is fully lockable and weatherproof access is very easy and possible for everyonennthe tree housenelectricityncoffee machine with coffee and teanwater heaternflowing waternmini fridge freezerndishesndouble bed 130 x 2m with panoramic sky viewnmini bathroom with toilet and hairdryernwifinfanninsect screens on the windowsnmini balcony with garden viewnnoutside the tree housenfree parkingnprivate outdoor rain shower with warm water and changing room including bathrobesncovered terrace with relaxing area and dining tablensunbeds and umbrellas in the gardennaccess to the organic garden fruits

Title: Peaceful Harbour Town Treehouse with Marsh Views
Description: bathroom and kitchen renovations coming spring 2022nnour sea loft is a great opportunity to stay in a unique treehouselike space it has the privacy of a singlefamily home yet its close to many amenitiesnnplease read the full detailed description for more information before booking hope to see you soon the space the spacenour home is unique because it offers the privacy of a single family home that is surrounded by trees and peaceful marsh views but its also in a fantastic location close to great dining shopping and activities in harbour townnnthe sea loft is bright and airy inside with an openconcept kitchendiningliving area with floor to ceiling windows throughout the home it has one bedroom with a queen bed but we are able to accommodate up to four people with a murphy bed and sleeper sofa in the living areannour home is clean comfortable and quiet please note that the current photos do not reflect the updates coming spring 2022 new pictures to come guest access guest accessnguests have access to the entire home other things to note other things to notenplease note that the sea loft is pet free and smoke free there are stairs on the property there is a driveway area but please note that it is not paved

Title: Hemlock Hill Hideaway - Treehouse Glamping Style!
Description: welcome to hemlock hill hideaway a unique glamping experience while being minutes from boone city limitsnna perfect place to connect with nature the space the spacenthe treehouse is approximately 10x10 there is a loft consisting of a fullsize mattress while facing a clear semiseethrough roof a futon with a fullsize memory foam mattress sits below itnnduring the winter months november 7 to tbd there is a nonwater portable toilet in a tent off the treehouse but no sink or shower amenities please see the picture provided we do not have the means to keep water from freezing when temperatures fall below freezing and do not want to risk damaging our bathroom items you will need to bring water for cleaning and drinkingnnplease remember that winter in the mountains can be unpredictable we might have snow we might not we might have ice we might not if you decide to venture out here during the winter months please be prepared to deal with snow and ice the steps to the treehouse can get treacherous we work very hard to keep our guests informed of the weather conditions particularly bad weather we are also not responsible for any accidents or injuries or damages to your vehicles that might occur as the result of the bad weathernnduring the spring summer and fall months the bathroom will consist of a portable toilet and sink in a tent off the treehouse a shower station sits on the other side of the treehouse although there is no plumbing both have water you would only need to bring drinking water for yourselvesnnthere is electricity and wifi there is a cooler and an electric kettle available for you to use outside of the treehouse there is a fire pit a grill a hammock and a slide plenty to do while relaxing in naturennplease bring blanketssleeping bags and pillows to sleep both the foam mattress futon will have freshly laundered sheetsnna space heater is provided but you will still need to make sure you bring plenty of blankets to keep warm also be aware that plugging in too many devices along with the space heater can trip the breakernnif you plan to use the grill please bring your own charcoal grilling utensils are providednnfirewood is provided for the fire pitnnalthough smoking is allowed on the premises we ask that you do not smoke inside the treehouse if you decide to smoke please clean up after yourselvesnnchecking out is easy we ask that you throw away your trash recycles and return the key to the lockbox we will take care of the rest there is no need to refill the water or take the sheets off of the mattresses guest access guest accessnplease park in the designated parking area as shown in the picturennwe are located at the end of a quiet street although we are minutes away from us421 and all of the amenities the high country has to offernn1 mile pine run paddle access for kayaking canoeing and tubingn2 miles food lionn4 miles blue ridge parkway entrance we are close to two br parkway entrancesn4 miles rocky knob mountain bike parkn4 miles brookshire parkn7 miles starbucks other things to note other things to notenthe hideaway is behind our backyard so you may seehear us from time to time there may be a cat or a dog running around although we find that they do not go out there as much without usnnif you have any questions or concerns please feel free to ask thank you

Title: Ti Kas (small house)
Description: ti kas is all wood with one bedroom with a king size bed complete kitchen saloon with smart tv with wifi connection sofa in case of a third person an extra bed will be provided one toilet inside bath on the balcony from the guest balcony theres a wonderful view of the ocean neighbouring martinique lush greenery birds surrounds our property including seven varieties of mangoes lime lemon sour orange trees yoga mediation place is available please see pics for more the space the spacenyou will have an opportunity to be one with nature bamboo plants bird song and clean fresh air tropical rains are also welcome since it helps maintain the lush green so abundant all around its also a quiet getaway from all the distractions tropical plants are on locationcoconut six varieties of mangoes bananas avocado lime lemon soursop and the famous sour orange trees among other trees guest access guest accessnplease see pictures of entire property that are listed since the gate is automatic an electronic key will be issued to guests upon arrival for their convenience other things to note other things to notenprivate parking is available to all guests the la toc and vigi beach can be reached after 10 minutes driving theres a hospital nearby where covid19 test can be done if your country requires it for reentry

Title: Cabin Sutton 252 - In harmony with nature!
