Title: Cozy Treehouse near Helen, Ga
Description: this treehouse is one of a kind and made out of recycled materials placed 20ft up a tree it is a cozy place to relax and be completely surrounded by nature there is no water or electricity it is located about a 12 mile from our checkin officeparking cars are not allowed at the camping sites and parking is available at the main office they are hike in or we will provide transportation only once at check in and once at check out the space the spacenmade of of recycled materials and placed 20ft up a tree the treehouse is a cozy place with one bedroom three beds and back deck with table and chairs for relaxing please be aware that there is no water or electricity sometimes in summer months it still be very warm at night the treehouse is in a remote location commercial vehicles are not allowed at the site you must leave your car at our main office and then either hike in or be shuttled in guest access guest accessnguests cannot drive their car to the treehouse parking is available in a gravel lot at our main office we will transport guests once upon checkin and once at checkout any other time you must walknnthere is an outhouse directly across from the treehouse and regular bathrooms and showers are conveniently located at our main office along with wifi other things to note other things to notenthe treehouse is located about a 12 mile from our checkin officeparking we will provide transportation once at checkin and once at checkout we have maps to get you to downtown helen from via the hardman farm trail located across the street from our main officennguests need to bring pillows and sleeping bags they are not provided all that is provided is the shelter and mattressesnnthis is just like camping except instead of a tent you are using our shelter plan to bring any supplies you would need if you were campingnntents can be pitched next to the treehouse for an extra 10 per tentnnplease let us know if you will be arriving after hours so we can make arrangements for you you can check in late via no contact check in

Title: Chasing Fireflies Treehouse- NEW!! Treehouse sits adjacent to the Great Smoky Mountain National Park
Description: newly constructed in 2021the chasing fireflies treehouse is perched over 15 feet up among the trees complete with modern amenities and oversized windows enjoy the calm peaceful view from this treehouse bordering the great smoky mountains national park let nostalgic memories of your youth come back to life when you stay at the chasing fireflies treehouse this farmhouse style treehouse has oversized windows that will bring the outdoor beauty in and is full of modern amenities while providing you whimsical and enchanting experiencethe chasing fireflies treehouse sits adjacent to the great smoky mountains national park at the base of cove mountain in wears valley this open concept 1 bedroom 1 bath treehouse sleeps up to 4 people the treehouse is full of amenities in addition to a queen bed and sofa bed it offers a full size bathroom shower and kitchenette chasing fireflies has oversized windows which provide a feeling of having the national park in your living room regardless of the season relax in the airconditioned or heated treehouse after your days activities the kitchen has a 2 burner cooktop refrigerator and combo convectionmicrowave oven enjoy your favorite show on the 55 big screen smarttv or use the free wifi when you arrive at the chasing fireflies treehouse you will experience the lifelike flashing and flickering lights of fireflies along with firefly decor in the treehouse while your treehouse sits in the trees you access chasing fireflies via the set of stairs 30 steps catwalks or a service set of 15 stairs the outsides decks provide ample outdoor seating and viewing areas use the decks to sit and relax or dine outside in the fresh mountain air at night chasing fireflies transforms into a nightly light display with over 150 feet of outdoor lights

Title: TreeHouse in South West of France. Peneleau
Description: pretty tree house in the south west of france a party plancha 6m high a nap in a hammock in the middle of the leaves a pedalboat ride with swans or a sleep on the island come and see us the space the spacenjolie cabane perche en pleine campagne du sud ouest avec vue sur le lac de peneleau une plancha party a 6m de hauteur une sieste dans un hamac au milieu des feuilles un tour de pdalo avec les cygnes de peneleau venez nous voirnnla cabane du lamas is located in the lot et garonne countryside near the dordogne in aquitaine of large country houses and castles to visit in the area and many fruits and vegetables to eatnncome and enjoy an unusual location in the trees in the south west the cabin with a beautiful view is perched 6 meters in the countryside near the prigord its implementation has required hundreds of hours and thousands of holes screws and other cutsnnthe treehouse is small but very functional there is email hidden sofa 160cm with a latex mattress 12cm thick enough sleep you will also find lots of nice led lighting not to eat too you can enjoy a small kitchenette with everything you need to make a small meal plancha goes well for you good good recipes with small garden produce and neighbors and especially how to rest hammock lounge chair in the hut and a large outside the center of the heart to see the milky way and all its stars mattressnnle lac de peneleaunla plancha les hamacs le big bag au centre du url hidden les lamas vous attendentnnun petit vin de noix ou d orange fait maison avec nous si a vous ditnnle calme et la beaut de la campagne du bord de lac de peneleau et ses animauxnnen voiture ou taxi depuis marmande ou bergeracnnla cabane est en train de s agrandir mais pas dinquitude on y travaille pas pendant votre sjour

Title: Tree house eco lodge
Description: if youre looking for an immersive jungle experience while retaining creature comforts and staying close to civilisation this gorgeous openplan tree house is just the place the space the spacenhighlightsn open plan bedroom and living area with chairs and table comfortably situated to witness the magnificence of naturen the space can accomodate 2 to 4 people with 1 double bed and 1 extra double matressn proper bathroom with a wc and a shower overlooking the junglen fall asleep and wake up to the sounds of the junglen live among tree topsn observe the unique flora and fauna guest access guest accessnyou can easily get here without a 4x4 and park on the property a quiet gravel road takes you from the main road costanera to the tree house 1km drivennwhats nearbynnyoure really well connected here there is a choice of restaurants around here including the famous farm to table gourmet reservation only dining experience one of the most beautiful beaches in the area playa hermosa 2km away with great surf cacao tour medicinal plants tour and morennuvita is just 8km away with ballena marine national park is nearby known for its humpback whale migration and the land bridge that appears at low tide to punta uvita and its iconic whaletail rock formationnndomincal surfer town with a good choice of vegan and nonvegan restaurants bars good surf and cool vibe 14km

Title: Hacienda in the branches
Description: have you ever dreamed of sleeping in the trees like a peter pannas a little child you wanted to have your house high in the branchesnour hacienda in the trees makes your dream come truenbut when it blows that the hells moves are you ready for it the space the spacenwe offer not just overnight accommodation in a unique building nowhere else in the giant mountains such a facility to stay open throughout the year you will not findnthere is no networking no electricity no gas no water no stoves no fireplaces and even no wifi thats means no heating just and only pure naturenit is strictly forbidden to use open fire candles stoves etc only led lamps please guest access guest accessnif you settle in our hacienda in the branches we will arrange for free using of toilets and showers on mountain chalet portky portaskycz you can order breakfast lunch and dinner you can also subscribe to our specialties delivered almost to your sleeping bag all for fee other things to note other things to notenyou are not the usually forest the behavior of visitors subject to the rules of krnap our forest is unique in that it will stay overnight and in the morning you will be amazed at how much wildlife around you through of course you can not make a noise

Title: Treehouse Village - The Shack
Description: the shack is what dreams are made of enter over a 40 foot swinging bridge then step into a house in the woods there is a full bath a kitchenette and a day bed lounge area on the main floor a european style ladder takes you up into the loft where youll find your queensized bed sleeping area outside you can warm by the fire on a deck large enough for the family the space the spacenthe shack is what dreams are made of enter over a 40 foot swinging bridge then step into a house in the woods there is a full bath a kitchenette and a day bed lounge area that doubles as another bed to sleep at night on the main floor a european style ladder takes you up into the loft where youll find your queensized bed sleeping area outside you can warm by the fire on a deck large enough for the entire family guest access guest accessnyou will have the whole treehouse to yourself other things to note other things to notensince these are treehouses you will need to esign a liability waiver we are located in the woods so all animals and insects that come with nature will be prevalentnsince we are in a rural area we have limited wifi available also there is a long hilly driveway if the weather is rough you will need to be careful if you get stuck we will assist you if we are available a fourwheel drive vehicles is recommended if there is snow

Title: The  treehouse of Cerro Verde. ECORREFUGIO
Description: youll love my place because it has magic and is special it is in the middle of a primary tropical wet forest at 3000 meters above sea level at 33 km from cll 82 with kr 7 of bogota 55 min or 25 min from la calera you will find a very comfortable and wellequipped cabinnbuilt at 8 m high in the canopy of the trees with good views birds moss bromeliads and ravinesnon a sidewalk of good and friendly farmers easy to get to its an unforgettable experience the space the spacenyou can arrive by car or there are public buses from la calera that leaves you about 1 km from the cabinnit is very cozy and quietnit is a very beautiful region very quiet and safe and very close to bogotnyou can go for a walk to the chingaza national natural park where the water is born for bogot guest access guest accessnthe forest is beautiful and 300 m away there is a very clean and very cold water stream other things to note other things to notenit is recommended to bring boots and good raincoat to walk comfortably and warm clothes to be in the housenits always nice to wear warm clothes and a raincoatnthere are several very nice walks and walks in the region and sometimes very humid and coldnthe walk to chingaza is very close it is beautiful and unique you need to buy the tickets in advance to enter the chingaza natural national park i can present them with a foundation that also allows you to enter the park more easily and they have very good guides

Title: Casa Cascada: a unique cabin with waterfall
Description: casa cascada is a unique cabin in the middle of the forest with a stuning waterfall just in front of the balcony the place is located in a private green comunity with no neighbors the place is perfect for couples who want to disconnect from the world and connect between them and nature get away from the hustle and bustle and enjoy this quiet cabin in the middle of the forest follow us on insta casacascada the space the spacencasa cascada is a wood cabin built right over a serene waterfall and is a perfect private romantic getaway the studiosized cabin features a king bed as well as a larger hanging covered patio suited for entertaining or lounging the lounge chair on the terrace is a perfect place to sit and read while listening to the sounds of the waterfall and creek

Title: Magical Jungle Tree House with Hot Springs
Description: no children under 5 years of age for safety reasons the handcrafted magical jungle tree house is one of 3 casitas and 2 treehouses at the bio thermales natural resort organically integrated into our 35 acre rainforest guests enjoy free 24 hour access to the 12 natural hot and cool springs pools of various temperatures and rainforest trails the space the spacenthe magical jungle tree house is handcrafted with many artistic wood work and furniture a tile bathroom with a flash ondemand water heater for the shower and a nicely laid out and well equipped kitchen it is set back a bit in the rainforest but still close to the hot and cool springs the balcony almost completely surrounds the tree housennour hot springs are ancient deep earth sources that bubble up through the rainforest floor laden with mineralrich waters that have been in the earth for at least 10000 years our waters are rich in bicarbonates calcium and magnesium low in sulfur and slightly acidic qualities shared by many of the worlds best hot springsnnfive of our 9 organic form hot springs pools are located in the rainforest and 4 hot springs pools as well as a small and a large cool spring swimming pool are located in a meadow surrounded by rainforest see below for more information the small and large cool springs pools both have water slides and there is a small water slide in one of the shallow and moderate temperature pools for small childrennnnote on wifi we have a fiber optic cable to the main office that is about 98 reliable but had to install repeaters to bring wifi signal to the casitas and tree houses the repeaters are not as reliable especially in bad weather however we can help you send or receive email one way or another via the fiber optic cablennthe treehouse is built to strict costa rican building codesnnto see all our listings including the colibri casita3 please go to httpswwwairbnbcomusersshow54000 and on the left side of the page three listings will show at the bottom of them click on view all listings to see all 5 listingsnnyou can check availability of each accommodation by clicking on the calendar tab above the main photo on each listingnntreehouse features see floorplan for all detailsn perched high among the rainforest trees the tree house has large screened areas for circulation of naturally cooler breezes it also has fansn all onsite hot springs and recreation activities included including 24 hour access to the hot springs and cool spring swimming poolsn the treehouse2 is all on one floor with a queen sized bed with orthopedic mattress and hypoallergenic beddingn there is also a twinsized bed that can double a a settee with hypoallergenic beddingn handcrafted rustic furniture from naturally harvested trees on the landn main floor kitchen with refrigerator microwave ricecooker coffee maker basic kitchenwaren bathroom with flash ondemand hotwater heatern wrap around balcony for relaxing and animal and bird watchingn laundry service at 5 charge per loadn short walk to rainforest and hot springs poolsn no telephone or televisionn wifi internet for your laptop if reliable 24 hour internet is essential to you please message us for suggestionsn hosts kathy and bernie live onsiten languages english spanish germannone time 10 cleaning fee thereafter housecleaning services every 3 days are freenbio thermales hot springs featuresn our hot springs pools are allnatural mineral water just as it flows from the earthn rainforest pools from 90 102f 31 40cn grotto pools in meadow flow from the 104f42c source pool onward into two larger and progressively cooler pools which are handicapaccessible and suitable for small childrenn cool pool in meadow is 90f31c mineral water flowing from the thermal creekn 2 swimming pools with continuous flow of natural cold spring water 88 degrees one is 1 to 15 meters deep and the larger is 16 meters deepn bathhouse in meadow with handicap accessible bathrooms and showersn ranchos roofed tables with concrete floors and grills for picnicsnother activities on our 35 acre rainforest reserven birdwatching many types of toucans oropendulas parrots hummingbirds and the rare green macawn rainforest enjoy it from the casita porch or hot springs pools take easy walks on paths or more adventurous hikesn fossils enjoy our collection or hunt gently for your ownn wildlife twotoed sloths iguanas capuchin and mantled howler monkeys tree frogs birds butterflies and many othersnnwe are a 45 minute drive from the many activities in fortuna and volcano arenal such as ziplines hanging bridges white water rafting slow river floats or kayaking through wildlife sanctuaries or a 15 hour drive to la paz waterfall gardens and volcano poasnnbio thermales hot springs is open to the public for day use of the hot springs and most of our day visitors are costa ricans so you may also meet new tico friends bio thermales is generally not crowded however except on major holidays and sundaysnnfoodmeals the tree house has a kitchen there are many restaurants and a good supermarket within a 15 minute drive traditional costa rican meals can be delivered from a local caterer for very reasonable prices costa rican food is tasty but not spicy otherwise for those without cars we can call a taxi or try to synchronize a food shopping trip when we go to town for errandsnnthree hours of daylight are needed to safely drive here from the sjo airport before sunset at 530 pm the drive through mountainous cloud forests is splendid in daylight but prone to fog and rain especially at night creating hazardous visibility conditions after dark finding our countryside location will also be far easier if you arrive the first time before sunset if your plane lands in the morning to noon at sjo airport or 1100 am at liberia airport you can drive here directly from the airport otherwise it is safer to book a room near the airport on your first night or ask us to book a private driver and have a rental car delivered at no extra chargennlast night in costa ricandriving directly to the airport on the same day is possible if you book a flight in the afternoon please be aware that you must be at the airport 25 hours before departure if you have an early morning departing flight it is basically necessary to stay near the airport on the night before guest access guest accessnguests enjoy free access to the hot springs swimming pools and rainforest trails from 9 am to 10 pmnnlaundry we have a full laundry facility and we will do laundry for 5 per load wash dry and fold other things to note other things to notenday visitors and groups are permitted entrance to use the hot springs and cool springs pools from 9 am to 6 pm there are usually more day visitors on weekends especially sundays and we recommend booking week days for more tranquility and privacy if guests book a longer reservation that includes a sunday we recommend planning a day tour in the many nearby activities on sundays day visitors must leave by 6 pm and only casita and tree house guests may use the pools after 6 pm and enjoy unlimited access to the pools with the exception of no nighttime use of the forest pools and cleaning schedule as noted abovennwe recommend either ordering a catered dinner in advance for your first evening andor next morning breakfast or buying and bringing groceries to cook because we are 4 km from the main paved road and driving after dark is highly discouraged until drivers have quite some experience on costa rican roads also most guests prefer to settle in upon arrival and not to have to get back in the car and drive out to dinner we provide a catering menu to each guest once reserved but the caterer requires advance notice of selected meals and times guests would like meals delivered we do not have a liquor license and guests must bring their own beerwinerum etc the tap water is safe to drink and we sell soft drinks fruit juices and other nonalcohol beverages snacks and ice cream

Title: Private wooden cabin with power and double bed
Description: in our woods 50 meters from the parking lot you get your own tree house input power for charging mobile computer etc we made your bednyou will have access to hot water so that the outdoor shower will be comfortablenthe fire pan is ready outside electric heater in the cabinnvery good breakfast on the door can be orderednfor other cooking bring primus or similar we have plastic storage boxes for food etc a really nice place romantic and completely private the space the spacena great starting point for romsdalseggen rampestreken and via ferrata at ndalsnes ice fjord is a gemnnwe always respond quickly to messages and are excited to welcome you guest access guest accessnyou have the forest to yourself romantically and privatelynown electric heater in the cabin so it doesnt get coldnnparking between the garage and the black main house upon arrivalnnhot water can be found in the tap in front of the black main house other things to note other things to notennew this yearn sauna we offer the riverside sauna this one you can easily book yourself via our websites there is also an outdoor shower with fresh river water included in the bath rental good cook daring to swim in the rivernn breakfast in bed we offer homemade rolls eggs from local farm coffee butter juice happy salmon and other snacks high quality lots organic delivered in a great picnic basket at the gate of the tree house every morning at 830 290 kr per person to be ordered no later than 5 pm the day before

Title: Tahkuna tree-house
Description: a unique cozy and modern tree house located in a picturesque pine forest will envelope you in peace and quiet and bring unforgettable memories you will find yourself surrounded by nature with easy access to secluded endless beaches and crystalclear sea the rustling of trees singing of birds and star gazing in the night will be all you need to forget the busy rhythm of city life you will explore ancient lighthouses and see many other unique and abundant sights of hiiumaa island the space the spacensorry there is no electricity now you will find comfort and peace in our cozy house the lower spacious floor contains a kitchen with all the necessities such as a gas grill a washstand a dinner table as well as a hammock the upper deck is a relaxation zone with two chaise lounges and a small table inside the living room is a fireplacewood burner which can be used for cooking or boiling water the room also has a double bed with a pullout bed extension for two more people a table with chairs and a storage chest big windows offer majestic views of the forest the house is insulated theres a fireplace inside so you will be warm even in the colder months of spring and autumn electricity is supplied by solar panels a lovely fire pit with benches is set up on a meadow near the house close by there are an outside shower cabin and a toilet you will find supermarkets bars cafes a bank a pharmacy and a hospital in picturesque town of krdla 15 km away the sea is an easy 800 m walk from the housenin addition to the wonderful forest and the sea the island has a lot of amazing things to see ancient lighthouses the old suuremeyza estate an openair ethnomuseum an old peasant farm there are also tennis courts a golf course horses excursions to seals and etc and so onnthe cozy town of krdla 15km with supermarkets bars cafes rental cars and bicyclesnall sorts of festivals are held on the island jazz classical music etc cafe day jan day craft fair and many othersnalso yacht parking beaches for surfers and kitersnwe hope you will enjoy staying at our tree house and have a great time on the magic hiiumaa island

Title: A TREEHOUSE! Adventure! Support Organic Farming!
Description: cozy rustic authentic treehouse for two by a babbling brook full bed wlinens towels shared bathroomsn11 acre organic vegetable farm supplies local restaurants french broad food coop and farmers market the space the spacenrustic cozy treehouse has a fullsize bed candlelight adds to the memorable experience there is no electricity in the treehouse shared bathroom fire ring charcoal grill two bathrooms wshowers outdoor shower is closed in winter guest access guest accessnguests are welcome and encouraged to walk all 11 acres of our organic farm including the woodlot the creek and the vegetable fields access to the greenhouses is restricted your room completely private the farm itself is shared with other guests and farm family other things to note other things to notencommon courtesy pleasendo not throw cigarette butts garbage cans bottle caps etc in the fire pitsnthere is a dumpster at the farm entrancenpets must be friendly to other dogs and peoplenpets cannot be left unattended while you are off the farm if you leave they go with younif you consume alcohol it must be confined to your personal space all guests and residents must be enjoying themselves any excessive noise obnoxious behavior or general disrespect will not be tolerated you will be put out for drunkenness no refund i am sole judge jury and hangman if has to go that farnsmoking allowed on the farm stay a reasonable distance away from buildings crops and other guests no smoking of any substance in the barn or the treehouse or the bathrooms no butts on ground evernwarningnunder north carolina law there is no liability for an injury to or death of a participant in an agritourism activity conducted at this agritourism location if such injury or death results from the inherent risks of the agritourism activity inherent risks of agritourism activities include among others risks of injury inherent to land equipment and animals as well as the potential for you to act in a negligent manner that may contribute to your injury or death you are assuming the risk of participating in this agritourism activity

Title: Nights of Cimes - La Grande Cabane du Mauret
Description: unusual accommodation open all year round dream cabins just for you perched 10 meters in the trees easy and secure access isolated from everything calm is guaranteed for an unforgettable night in the heart of the forest as a lover family or friends ideal as a gift to those we love the space the spacenperched between two magnificent trees the large mauret hut is both comfortable and rustic access is from a wooden staircase and then from two walkways fully secured by a net that leads directly to a large terrace inside many windows create a bright atmosphere and allow you to fully enjoy the surroundings and its great asset is its second terrace perched on a part of the roof to fully live this unique adventurenit is equipped with dry toilets kitchenette with gas and sink gas heating tables and chairs inside and on the terrace solar electricity lampsnthis cabin doesnt have a shower we provide towels and gloves for a rustic toilet at the kitchen sinknthe living area has two convertible sofas upstairs there is a large room under the roofs in all the hut is designed to accommodate up to seven people in a hotel formula that is to say clean and prepared beds you do not have to bring any sheets and breakfast is provided

Title: Treehouse 10 minutes from Biarritz
Description: near the sea and the mountain come and relax in a refuge 10 minutes from biarritz perched on stilts at more than 3 m surrounded by trees in a lush garden the hut is fully equipped for you to enjoy a great comfort in the middle of nature the fullyequipped summer kitchen is under the hut and the toilet is at its foot you will wake up to bird song optional organic breakfast at 5 9 or 12pers except from april 16 to may 2 the space the spacencome and try the unusual and poetic experience of living in a warm and comfortable hutnhigh quality king size bedding of 180nlinens and towels are of course included in the servicenwashable slippers are available for your staynfor the toilet you have the choice between the cosy of a bathtub inside and the exotic of an outdoor shower but under shelter na bottle of wine from our reserve or local apple juice is offerednranked 2 star furnished tourist accommodationnfrom april 16 to may 2 without optional breakfast servicenplease read the house rules in full guest access guest accessnyou will also enjoy the lush garden from sunny days a ping pong table a slackline in summer a barbecuea small grocery store is available on request with local andor organic productsnpossibility to buy bottle of champagne other things to note other things to notena radiator will warm up chilly nights and a ventilator will cool down hot daysnwe do not accept credit cards for the payment of breakfasts or possible cleaning fees only cash check nplease take a minute to read the rules of procedure nfor breakfast you can choose the french breakfast at 9 tea or chocolate coffee toast with honey jam butter hot croissant milk specialty orange juice or local apple or canadian breakfast at 12 the same as the french with pancakes or eggs to choose from or the autonomous menu at 5 like the french breakfast without the croissant or the milk specialty arranged the day before in the summer kitchen all 3 organic except croissants except for april 16 to may 2 when the rental will be autonomous

Title: Treehouse Resnice

Title: Providence area TreeHouse Farm Stay
Description: unique charming spacious private tree house overlooking working diversified family farm enjoy solitude surrounded by only the sounds of nature and our farm animals woodstove heats the space for cozy 4 season getaways fire wood and lanterns are provided this is a popular offthegrid space please look at our vintage airstream and providence area camper if you require additional space or electricitynask about our special whole weekend or multiple night pricing the space the spacenthis is a spacious though rustic off the grid accommodation in the trees overlooking our farm fields to the south and the forest to the north fresh breezes blow through the open windows in the warm weather and the wood stove keeps the space cozy and warm in the cooler seasons if light air and views are what you are looking for this is the place working sustainable farm vegetables dairy goats livestock guardian dogs cats heritage hogs poultry horses sheep and a water buffalo please leave your pets home so as not to stress our animalsnif you need more space please see our other listings vintage airstream and 28 camper guest access guest accessnthe tree house has no electricity lanterns are provided or plumbing the tree house is marked with a sign on the driveway there is no lock on the door there is a composting toilet close by a spacious outdoor shower on the pond side of our house and a real bathroom available in the house for coldweather guests there is a charcoal grill for use by our guests you must provide the charcoal and ice other things to note other things to notenas a tree house in the woods on a working farm please anticipate that u might experience some insects and hear various animal sounds please bring insect repellent if u think you might want it expect that u will hear the sounds of the crickets katydids tree frogs song birds wood peckers owls coyotes rooster peacocks cats dogs or other animals if u would like to explore the farm fields woods etc you might want to bring boots depending on the weathernthere are several breakfast spots in close proximity both providence and warren ri are great destination spots and meccas of great restaurants we are happy to give you recommendationsnour daughter calls the tree house home when she is on the farm you will be staying in her personal space with her personal furnishings and possessions please be respectfulnif the th is not available when you want it please check out our vintage airstream and working farm providence area campers

Title: Caeiro's Tree by the Beach
Description: beautiful selfbuilt wooden tree house situated on top of a horizontallygrown pine tree only a 5 minute walk from the sea which borders the property two skylights allow you to enjoy the trees the blue sky and the birds above plenty of privacy and space around the house and a sunbed for lazing about the land is part of the natural park has stunning views across the ocean amazing sunsetsnthe cabin is decorated with handmade details has a comfortable double bed a fridge gas stove the space the spacendirectly on the seafront this selfsustained ecotreehouse is a 20 min walk away to nearby foz beach and it is the last seafront accommodation between lisbon and cabo espichel the rocky sea pools are only 5 min awaynthe treehouse is the proud highlight of the cantinho alberto caeiros project celebrating the poetry philosophy of our famous poet fernando pessoa the love for nature which he expresses can be found in this lovely space in the middle of a protected nature area we let nature speak for itself without the need for any fancy adornments keeping its wilderness and raw beauty the shower outside is sunwarmed using recycled scaffolding material and wood we try to recycle and upcycle we used old wine bottles for lamps and restored an old oaktree door the wooden bed is selfbuilt and the kitchen counter has a grand view of the treesnthe tree house is run on solar energy 12vnfinishing touches are hand made details such as the cushions from local woolnnkey pointsnrocky sea pools where you can let the waves crash over you nlocated on top of a rare horizontally grown typically portuguese pine treentable chairs and hammock amongst the treesnunforgettable sunsetsnnall basic amenities available 2pit gas stove for cooking a fridge and your own sunwarmed outdoor shower cold in winternthe dry compost toilet is sharednthe tree house is situated within 155 acres 63 hectare of agricultural land which gives you unparalleled privacy and sense of naturenall beaches are nearbynthe village has a small supermarket a bakery a coffeelunch place and 2 restaurants we have good contacts and are happy to advice and book you a tablennlocation and transportnmerely 40 minutes from lisbon with your own car you have greater autonomy to explore the areanotherwise a bus from sete rios or an uber will get you here as wellnnplease note there is no atm in the village guest access guest accessnyou have access to all the landnthe main entrance is accessed via a good dirt road from the village of azoia you can exit the bottom of the land to go down to the rock pools and walk to the beach other things to note other things to notenplease note that under no circumstances we will allow bbqs open fires during the hot dry summer monthsnnthe water on the land is good enough to cook with but we advice not to drink it bring enough drinking water licence number licence numbernexempt

Title: Creek Treehouse near Helen, GA
Description: this treehouse is one of a kind and made out of recycled materials it is a secluded place to relax and be completely surrounded by nature there is no water or electricity and it is located about a 12 mile from our checkin officeparking cars are not allowed at the camping sites and parking is available at the main office it is hike in we will provide shuttle when you check in and check out to get you and your gear to and from the site the space the spacenthe treehouse is a cozy place with one bedroom two beds and deck for relaxing on main level is one king size mattress and in the loft is a full size mattress please be aware that there is no water or electricity the treehouse is in a remote location commercial vehicles are not allowed at the site you must leave your car at our main office 12mi away and then hike in guest access guest accessnguests cannot drive their car to the treehouse parking is available in a gravel lot at our main office 12mi away during normal business hours we will transport guests one time at checkin and once at checkout any other time you must walk other things to note other things to notenthis is just like camping except in the trees we only provide the space and the beds please plan to bring with you anything that you would need on a regular camping tripie linenssleeping bagspillows lightslanterns cooking tools etc we do have firewood available to purchase for 5 a bundle or you are more than welcome to bring your own

Title: ‚òÖTake to the skies in a Lov Nid‚òÖ
Description: come spend an unusual night in our treehouse the lovnidna funny wooden sphere for 2 close to nature an unusual bed and breakfast ideal for loversnour guesthouse is at 55 beynac road in the village of lembras 10 minutes from the center of bergeracnwwwbellevuecottagecom the space the spacenless than 3 hours from bordeaux toulouse la rochelle clermont ferrandnnear bergerac come and spend an unusual night in our cabin perched the lovnid nestled in our park this wooden bubble awaits you for a stay in harmony with naturenit all starts with a walkway of about ten meters then a terrace perched 3 meters high and you discover a cozy nest amid birds and trees for a getaway for twonits transparent dome and portholes will give you a magical night with the starry canopy for bed skyna dedicated bathroom is available nearbynback on land in the morning well have a hearty breakfastnnsome practical informationn in the current context additional precautions have been put in place particularly regarding disinfection of frequently touched surfacesn the lov nid is a cabin designed for up to 2 people adult or childn inside just a bed impossible to eatn the cabin and the entire property are really nonsmoking and nonsmokingn no water electricity heating or air conditioning in the cabinn during the summer the temperature inside the cabin can exceed 25n in winter it can be cool or even cold indoorsn use a mosquito repellent if you attract them other things to note

Title: Rocky River Cotton Treehouse
Description: come stay for a weekend getaway in a rustic treehouse on the heart of the rocky river we are located south of cottonville on plank rd norwood treehouse has queen size mattress in loft queen size futon in living area comes with heat ac directv mini frig mw weber grill shower toilet and an outdoor fire pit for your convenience enjoy outdoor porch sitting listening to the sounds of water flowing over rocks theres a shelter for parking or camping 4 kayaks and 1 canoe available the space the spacenprices include access to canoe and 4 kayaks during summer months weather permittingnyou can launch a canoe or one of 4 kayaks just steps away from the treehouse and float the rocky river 2 landings one located about 45 minutes away or another thats approx 4 hours away for your conveniencenfire pit outside for small campfire or cooking other things to note other things to noteni tell everyone that comes to stay please prepare as if you are going campingni provide bed linens no towels a bed a shower a microwave a coffee maker a sink a toilet a charcoal grill and a fire pit those are the only things that are included with the rental

Title: Charming hut perched "Hiss√©o"
Description: a charming treehouse with an atypical openair comfortable shower 5 minutes from cousteau reserve and its diving clubs enjoy the tropical garden and magnificent views of the pigeon islets from the top of the cheese maker the space the spacencharming cabin perched in a cheesemaker overlooking the islets pigeon with its atypical shower under the foliage the stars offering all the comforts for 2 to 46 people guest access guest accessnguests can enjoy a large private heated saltwater swimming pool equipped with a waterfall and around the deckchair pool a swing bed and a small relaxation loungeunder a pretty little carbet surrounded by a magnificent tropical garden and relaxing where butterflies hummingbirds iguanas sugar trees and our faithful fishing martin front of the eyes of our cat ulysses and you can also enjoy the bbq area and the small lounge located under the cabin a swing for children and you also have a court to play balls and petanque other things to note other things to notenthe 2 large kingsize beds 2mx2m are equipped with mosquito nets plus 1 bznyou can have access to a wellness area spa of 5 places and infrared sauna for a small supplementnyou have access to a petanque ground

Title: Newport, Maine Lakeside Treehouse Near ATV Trail
Description: this cozy treehouse is for outdoor lovers it sits feet from the 4288 acre sebasticook lake great for kayak or canoe trips swimming or bass fishing on the other side were right on the 4 season rail trail great for hiking biking or atv riding close 1 mile to stores and restaurants were also close enough to almost anywhere in the state for day trips travel to the ocean acadia national park moosehead lake area baxter state park and more let your maine adventure begin the space the spacenever wanted to stay in a treehouse this space is not very big but it makes up for size with a breathtaking view of the lake it is not fancy but its comfortable you can bring your atv we have 2 kayaks or a canoe for you to use there is plenty of space for parking of your vehicle and trailer theres a firepit with wood provided picnic table and bbq grill we book only during the summer months we start booking in june and end about mid september

Title: LYON COUNTRY HOUSE , LYON TREEHOUSE & SPA
Description: lyon country house is a 3 hectare property by the sane just across from paul bocuses we offer bed and breakfasts and a luxurious detached cottage and very soon a cabin perched 6 meters high among trees the perched hut at the end of the park will have stunning views of the sane with a sublime sunsetnit should come as no surprise that you encounter deer or sheep on the property even 15 minutes from bellecour the space the spacencabin for 4 people comprising a kitchenette a dry toilet a bar for dining with 4 a lounge area with two bench beds with 180 degree views of the sane a mezzanine of 11m2 with queen size bed with plunging views of the sane a terrace of 12m2 with weber barbecue as the cabin is an ecological project in total connection with nature we have provided a water reserve for the kitchen and small evening toiletnfor those wishing shower access we have a dedicated shack in the spa area that is automatically privatized for shacks in the evening from 8pm to 9pm this private access to the spa is included in the price of the cabin as well as the breakfast delivered in the morning in a pannier that you climb up to the terrace thanks to a pulley

Title: Lake Joseph Waterfront Cottage
Description: lakeside cottage at the end of a private road this charming 3 bedroom sleeps 6 plus bunkie sleeps 5 with southern exposure right on the water is the ideal location for a summer family getaway a newly painted and refreshed cottage with a large deck perfect for evening supper or drinksnnoutside there is plenty of space to sit and soak up the sun along 300 feet of water frontage sits a large boathouse with plenty of furniture to lounge and relax or jump off the docks the space the spacenthe kitchen has many amenities including stainless steel appliances dishwasher toaster coffee maker cappuccino maker and an ample supply of dishware outside of the kitchen is a screened in gazebo which is a perfect spot for dinnernn 7 day minimum friday to friday check in and check out requirednnwe will provide a clean set of sheets and towels kitchen towels and beach towels a cleaning crew will turn over the cottage prior to your arrival if you require a change of sheets or additional cleaning throughout the week this too can be arranged for an additional 400 cleaning feennplease note you are responsible to take your garbage and other wasterecycling with you you will be charged 20 per garbage bag left behindnn paper products the cottage will provide you enough to get started but vacationers must supply their ownnn life vests are supplied vacationers must bring their own childrens life jackets due to safety and liability concernsnnsecurity deposit is 2500 per booking

Description: cabaa jasper at casa carite by the lake is our newest tree house cabin relax and enjoy the views of the lake and surrounding mountains from the large balcony overlooking the entire property this cabin is perfect for couples looking to get away and enjoy the natural beauty of the puerto rican countryside with easy access from the parking area it is only steps away from the lakefront where you can spend the day enjoying our natural lagoon guest access guest accessnguests listed on the reservation will have access to their cabin and common shared areas of the property common shared areas include the docks the covered balcony in front of the lake the outdoor kitchens and el bosque de palmas guests are permitted to fish and swim in the lake at their own discretion from sun up until sun down

Title: El Nido del viento
Description: hello we are angela and david 4 years ago we changed our lifestyle and moved to the countryside we live in a very beautiful place and decided to share it with youour family business is a glampingtype cabin located in guatequeboy vrd llano grande we are 15 km away from the city centre we have a spectacular view you can see villages such as guayata somondoco sutatenza and guateque in this space you can obtain tranquility peace and a comfortable stay the space the spacenthe cabin consists of 1 queen bed private bath dining room with spectacular views of the tenza valley a cloudy balcony catamaran mesh the landscape tranquility and peace of this place will make you live a magical experience guest access guest accessncatamaran mesh parking other things to note other things to notenremember that to travel to el nido del viento we recommend you take with youn insect repellentn coatn sun protectionnnwe are friendly with your petnnthe stay includes breakfastnntap water is not suitable for human consumptionnnadditional horse riding service

Title: A Little Closer to Heaven Primitive Tree house
Description: this little tree house is primitive with no electricity and no water but has a bath house nearby this is tent camping in a tree house located behind the historic rm brooks store it is the perfect place to find peace and beauty perfect for hikers rest in the huge branches of this nearly 100 year old oak tree a queen bed awaits you for your restful nights sleep underneath you can picnic at the table or swing in the swing that hangs below this is the perfect place to unplug the space the spacenthere is a queen size bed and two chairs for sitting and relaxing a small table with two chairs for playing cards or eating a dresser for storing clothes with a mirror above it two night stands on each side of beds very spacious and easy to move around in

Title: Florida Vacation Magic, Pool, 8BR-5BA
Description: our 5500sqft home set on an acre in the middle of town is the perfect place to host your next trip to central florida our home with its incredible out door living space is a perfect place to relax and enjoy your family three story tree house with tiny house in ground pool picnic tables to eat and enjoy the great out doors enjoy a game of horse shoes croquet bocce ball corn hole or just relax around the fire bring some steaks and enjoy the outdoor grill the space the spacenwe know you will create some great memories during your time in our home located half way between tampa and lakeland an hour from orlando and st pete clear water a short 5 min drive to local shopping or a hop onto i4 you couldnt ask for a more convenient location to stay as you enjoy all the sights of central florida disney our beautiful beaches busch gardens lego land dinosaur world and bach tower so many things to do and enjoy guest access guest accessnguest have full access to the entire indoor and out door living space other things to note other things to notenwe invite our guest to enjoy all the space featured in our guest home and our outdoor living spacennwe offer solar heating for our pool and hot tub we do not offer temperature controlled heat for our hot tub or pool

Title: The Willow in Treehouse Grove at Norton Creek
Description: treehouse grove is a treehouse resort designed and built by the treehouse master pete nelson the willow treehouse is the most private treehouse in the lower grove and can hear the constant roar of the local favorite norton creek this treehouse features a large swing under the treehouse while upholding the luxury creature comforts youve become accustom to such as highspeed wifi a shower toilet heating and cooling kitchenette and of course your favorite streaming channels the space the spacenthe willow is your perfect treehouse getaway in gatlinburg as you enter the treehouse you will find the wellequipped kitchenette with a mini fridge microwave coffee pot utensils and murphy table for 4 with a queen bed in the master and a queen bed in the loft this treehouse comfortably sleeps 4 if you are fortunate enough to stay during the great smoky mountain fall or winter you are in for a treat snow occasionally turns the forest into a picturesque winter wonderland stand beneath the covered view deck and watch the cascading snowfall accumulate around you while enjoying a steaming cup of hot cocoa prepare a meal or another drink in the stocked kitchenette and fully enjoy each moment book your stay today guest access guest accessnall guest at treehouse grove will have easytouse entry keypads into their treehouse guest also have access to all the amenities at treehouse grove including but not limited to grills firepits picnic tables hammocks swings walking and hiking trails and norton creek the pavilion at norton creek resort is also available depending on the season other things to note other things to notenas much as we love pets and our furry friends treehouse grove abides by a strict nopet policy the access into the grove can be steep for some and difficult to navigate depending on weather conditions different seasons and attractions include winterfest autumn foliage freshwater fishing outlet shopping miniature golf restaurants snowboarding snow skiing water tubing sledding white water rafting churches caves forests library live theater museums rec center theme parks waterfalls winery tours health beauty spa antiquing cinemas

Title: Unusual night in a Treehouse
Description: on a 2 hectare estate located on the heights of the municipality of ferdrupt the hut is perched at 7 m 50 it will seduce you with its charm and comfort it can accommodate 2 to 4 people a panoramic terrace of 40 m with stunning views of the meadow the forest and the massifs this is the place to recharge your batteriesnoptionsn relaxation area spasauna wellness area with massages kota grill for your barbecue in winter or in bad weather all by reservation only the space the spacenfor your convenience the cabin is supplied with cold water outside the freezing period if not we provide a water bottle in the cabinnpowered by electricity it features highperformance electric heatingnit is equipped with 4 sleeping accommodations a mezzanine bed for 1 person a bed for 2 and a folding bed blanket duvet and pillows are availablena kitchenette with sink small kitchenware dishes electric hob campsite type electric kettle fridge coffee table and dining area for 4 people separate dry toilet inside the cabin at the foot of the cabin a barbecuenat your disposal a communal sanitary area close to the car park is at your disposal with 4 showers 2 toilets and a diving area open 24 hours a daynyou can also approach the farm animals rabbit poultry sheep llama horsenoptions nsauna relaxation area and private balneo by reservationn wellness massages and ayurvedic massages by reservationn kota grill by reservation guest accessneasy access even in winters onsite parkingnyou can also approach the farm animals rabbit poultry sheep llama horse other things to notenoptionnhealth cleaningnany meals delivered onsitenbreakfast it is delivered onsite which includes teacoffee or chocolate orange juice croissant breadbutter and homemade jamnrocation of good quality disposable sheets bed 2 pers and bed 1 persnrocation of toilet linennbois for fireplace to the hearthnlocation baby bedn high chairn relaxation area balneo and sauna private session duration 1 hour 30 minutesnor 2 hours only on reservationn kota grill for your winter barbecuen massage area on reservation with wellness massages and ayurvedic massages performed by catherine wellness practitioner

Title: Ecotoo+tree room pres de la Plage de Juan y Lolo
Description: you will appreciate this bungalow for its privileged location playita beach is at 75 mts it is perfect for couples with 2 childrenthe large garden has 2 traditional bungalows made of palm wood comfortable with small kitchen fridge and gas stove 3 fires bathroom open air shower queen bed 4 chairs with table on the terrace as well as a bench with cushions and comfortable armchair insidenew and unique a lg 2nd bedroom full bed in arbrewifi 1 usd24h the space the spacennew and unique in las galeras la chambrarbrea queen bed mosquito net in a bedroom perched in a tree also all the construction as well as the philosophy of the deco is based on ecology and recovery green tellurian tray for wastewater treatmentsin the garden there are banana trees 1 guava tree 2 tamarind trees 2 almond trees 2 cherry trees country passion fruit 1 moringa 3 coconut trees 1 gina and 1 avocado guest access guest accessnthe garden is to be shared between the 2 bungalows but each has its own privacy and privilege other things to note other things to notenwe can arrange your pickup with a taxi from all airports in the countrynpaid wifi has 1 usd day

Title: Casa da Mouta - Douro Valley
Description: house with 2 bedrooms and an ideal room for families overlooking the douro river good sunlight an equipped kitchen a living room with a tv and a playstation and a covered terrace for meals and leisure the house is set on a farm with vineyards fruit trees aromatic herbs and vegetable gardens on the farm there is an infinity pool and a treehouse that enchants children nearby there is the casa de ea de queiroz the caminhos de jacinto the termas de argos and the douro river the space the spacenquiet and quiet space great for resting guests can enjoy the farm go hiking or get to know this region by bike in the surroundings have good regional restaurants guest access guest accessnguests will see the entire farm and can even take part in rural activities if its of interest to you licence number licence numbern74231al

Title: Llama Meadows Farm Purple Palace TinyTreehouse
Description: our purple palace tinytreehouse here at llama meadows peace farm we welcome all who wish to find the nurturing peace and solitude of nature at our peaceful organic retired llama farm we no longer have llamas we truly enjoyed raising llamas for 24 years our oldest one live to be 25 years and 10 days old here in beautful benzie county a true camping experiencenthe tree house is nice cozy just right for 1 or 2 people children 7 yrs or older are welcome with parents limit is two the space the spacenyou use the campground 150 ft away for the outhouse and campfire with a grate grill for cooking your food on there is a 6 ft table to use for preparing your food on we have a outdoor shower with hot water the treehouse is 8 by 10 small cute and cosy we love sleeping in it up in the tree with the birds guest access guest accessncampground 150 ft away for the outhouse and campfire with a grate grill for cooking your food on there is a 6 ft table to use for preparing your food on we have a outdoor shower with hot water other things to note other things to notenthe tinytreehouse overlooks our gardens guest are welcome to walk our labyrinth and stroll through our organic garden we are around with tips on where to go and things to do locally

Title: Secluded, Romantic Tree House Retreat
Description: pamoon is a contemporary style treehouse sleeping 2 with stunning views of pigeon mountain nestled within the tranquil hills and valleys of the appalachian mountains of northwest georgia it is surrounded by natural beauty and panoramic backdrops within its very own 15 acres of private woodland and walking trails the space the spacenfor a video tour of the tree house pamoon visit our websitenlifeshouldbenetnnplease note we are unable to accommodate checkin on the following days christmas eve christmas day new years day memorial day july 4th labor day thanksgiving sundaysnnpamoon boasts a light and airy open plan living space with modern fully equipped kitchen the bedroom has its own screened in porch for relaxing and taking in those stunning views our beautifully decorated bathroom has a full size shower with luxurious bathrobes for your comfortnnyou will find the gas bbq on the rear deck along with seating and sun loungers our beautiful calming japanese ofuro soaking tub situated on a separate relaxation area amongst the trees is a big hit with all of our guestsnnthis heated cedar tub has no jets which leads to a beautifully calming experience the perfect way to cleanse the mind and soul in the natural surroundings a tin roof covering this space adds to the experience when rain or snow decides to fallnntake time to walk the peaceful wooded trails on your secluded 15 acres that are home to deer turkey and the beautiful red cardinalsnnlife should beliving alongside naturennin the evenings as the sun sets spend time by the fire pit perfect for roasting smores and relaxing with a loved one sipping cocktails and enjoying quiet conversationnnwhatever you choose to do with your time just relaxing or hiking and exploring rest assured you will make many wonderful memories at pamoon our hidden gem will offer you peace seclusion and privacy for your wellbeing and the chance to just sit back take a moment and rechargennour property management team are close by if you have any issues or queries during your stay we are very lucky to have them as our neighboursnnfor your arrival information the tree house is situated at the end of a long driveway the first part of the drive is shared with our two other vacation homes but then splinters off with sign posting leading to your very own hideaway in the treesnamenities includenn covered japanese ofuro soaking tub heated all year round the water is replaced and the tub is sanitised ready for each new guestnplease note this is not a traditional hot tubjacuzzi and has no jetsnn bedroom sleeps 2 comfortable mattress and good quality linens hairdryer providednn open plan living areakitchennn wireless internet wifi due to our rural location the internet speed can be slower than in urban areasnn 43 4k ultra hd resolution smart tv with hulu streaming servicenn fullyequipped kitchen fullsize stove fridgefreezer microwave dishes pots cutlery glassware dishwasher coffee maker keurig drip and toasternn dining table for twonn gas bbq on rear deck gas utensils providednn fire pit and seating wood providednn outdoor hook and ring gamenn laundry closet with fullsize separate washer and dryernn all linenstowels and soaking tub towels providednn large enclosed shower unit with detachable shower head unisex bathrobes providednn fully furnished throughout by a professional interior designernnnote pamoons interior and exterior has been designed with adults in mind our home has no child safety locks on doorswindows and the soaking tub area is not gated guest access guest accessnparking on site other things to note other things to notenpamoons interior and exterior has been designed with adults in mind our home has no child safety locks on external or internal doors and the soaking tub area is not gatednnthe japanese soaking tub is a heated calming experience it does not have jets like a traditional hot tub it is emptied and sanitized after each departing guest

Title: The Treehouse of Borgo Stazione Salionze
Description: you can experience the thrill of sleeping at a height of 5 metres among the leaves of the great linden treenthe suite is built entirely of wood and furnished with natural materials in line with our ecofriendly philosophyna very comfortable king size bed an area with an exposed shower and bathtub and a living area with a sofa bed led tv a corner infusions and a minibar the terrace exclusive area for guests of the suite is an extraordinary observatory of the sky and the river landscape the space the spacenuniqueness and hospitality in an old station returned to life to live a green vacation on two wheels surrounded by extraordinary naturenyou can choose the type that best fits your needs one of the rooms built in the double or family station a mini apartment or the tree house suite 5 meters from the groundnyou will find a full service dedicated to cyclists and discover the territory with a sustainable approach by renting electric bicycles or bringing your ownnthe outdoor pool in the heart of the village will allow you to relax in the reflecting body of the sky you can choose to relax your muscles after a day spent cycling in the heated whirlpool up to 35 in winter or simply stay in the sun on our solariumna spa area for exclusive use can end your days of relaxation service included for the tree suite guest access guest accessnan indoor parking lot will welcome your car being a little close to the a4 peschiera exit valeggio direction it will be easy to find us along via del garda on the right side other things to note other things to notenwant a surprise or are you celebrating a special datenwe can offer support and suggestions a bottle of bubbly a cake or a bouquet of flowers your favorite photos or a romantic setupnndo you want to book your bike on the day of your arrivalnebikes muscles mountain bikes or racing bikesnnsend us a message services for a fee

Title: Full bath, Seclusion, Mtn View- Kitchen, Fireplace
Description: woodberrys farm treehouse retreat to total seclusion and privacy at the far side of our 94 acre farm tucked away in the trees on a ridge is a fully functional 380 sf treehouse with a small kitchen full bath with double shower heads relax on the wrap around deck soak in the distant mountain views hang the hammocks from below or fire up the pit for smores lounge on the sofa in front of the gas fireplace play some board games or watch a movie cook together or hike to the onsite lake the space the spacenguests will have the privacy and exclusive use of the entire treehouse located at the back end of our 94 acre farm which neighbors several thousand undeveloped acres guests are guaranteed a true getaway when you step through the french mahogany doors you are faced with a 9x20 span of glass wall looking out over the valley to the distant mountains the 380 square foot floor plan has a 5x8 full bath with double head shower tiled in antique reclaimed roofing slate the jade basin sink sits atop a real tree root retrofitted to accommodate it the kitchenette is also tiled in the reclaimed roofing slate and has a mini fridge microwave toaster gas stove with small oven and coffee service the dining space is graced with a beautiful italian marble bar table with a reclaimed wood base the cozy living area has a relaxing gas fireplace and the sofa is super comfortable stretch out in the king size bed with memory foam mattress the wrap around deck features a longe area a high top dining set grab the hammocks and hang them under the treehouse or go for a hike and find your perfect spot guests are also welcome to take the short hike to our private four acre lake perfect spot for a picnic and you can use our canoes and paddles bring fishing gear if you like you can catch and release or have a fish fry

Title: THE STUDIO IN THE OAKS
Description: a moment of relaxation among oaks birds ideal for couples looking for a change of scenery in love with nature in the heart of a small wood you will be charmed by this studio recently furnished in a shed its exceptional situation will allow you to visit our beautiful basque country you will be in the middle of the campaign while beingn10 minutes from bayonne 20 minutes from biarritz and by motorway 20 minutes from saint jean de luz 30 minutes from san sbastien 20 minutes from capbreton the space the spacenthe shed is composed of a bedroom corner bed 160x200 from where you will have a direct view of the wood the bathroom opening onto the bedroom is composed of a large walkin shower and a granite sinka modern and functional kitchen with induction hob dishwasher large fridge freezer a large counter will allow you to take your meals if the weather does not allow to go on the terrace a large wooden terrace will welcome you for your meals relax and nap on deckchairs with the singing of birds as the only noise licence number licence numbern64496000020f7

Title: Glamping at Deer Camp
Description: this is a complete glamping experience think tiny house this 12x12 tree house is equipped with an outdoor kitchen a table for two lounger and chair wifi smart tv with netflix hulu and showtime hbo now air conditioning board games books comfy queen bed air conditions gas log coffee greenhouse bathhouse and fire pitnit is located just 162 miles from fall creek falls state park and 9 miles from savage gulf natural area on the cumberland plateaunand now with an outdoor theater the space the spacenthis glamping experience will give you something to talk about for a long while close to great hiking trails in both savage gulf and fall creek falls state park secluded in the woods yet close 3 miles to dollar general and 12 mikes to walmart to a few groceries and gas if you love glamping youll love it at deer campnthe cabin is 12x12 and every piece of furniture has been specifically chosen for your experience it is cozy besides the queen bed and lounger theres a table for two a chair a gas log fireplace throws and throw pillows to snuggle up in board games and books and a smart tv with hulu and showtime netflix and hbonow are the various forms of entertainment or you can sit around the fire pit and make smores or roast hot dogs or just tell ghost stories or if you have the talent bring your guitar and play a few songs now weve just added an outdoor theater this is a nighttime experience with hammock chairs cozy blankets propane fire ring and big screen with projector and a amazon fire stick with all the shows and movies you love this experience is available rain or moonlight and will be for use from march through december please turn off the propane fire ring when not using the theaterncoffee can be made in the 12 cup stainless percolator or the pour over method is available or make hot cocoa or hot teanshowering offers its own experience in the greenhouse bathhouse with the on demand unlimited hot water camp shower this is its own experience have you ever showered in a greenhouse with a gas log fireplacenand the entire camp is lit up with string lights so even if you need a trip to the bathhouse at night the rock path is well lit when you turn on the porch lightnits glamping all the feels of camping without the work the camp kitchen is stocked with pans and paper plate and cups and utensils you have a warm bed to crawl into firewood is provided for the fire pit coffee and hot beverages are provided and soft towels in the bath house all of the camping experience without camp neighbors and without the packing just bring your clothes and food and enjoy this unique experiencenand if you sit quietly on the porch youre almost certain to see many forms of wildlife if you dont see it youll certainly hear the coyotes yipping and howling and the owls hooting a bear sighting is possible as is a bob cat and or coyote both sighted in the middle of day running through camp and seeing deer is almost a certainty there are mountain lion though they are the most reclusive of all other things to note other things to notenthere is cold running water in the outdoor kitchen via a spigot and because its 8 off the ground once you turn it on it takes about 5 seconds to get water there is hot water in the bathhousenyou do have to cook outsidencamp plates cups cooking pans and utensils are providednthere is a complete hot beverage station with coffee tea and cocoana cooler and ice are providednits just almost an oxymoron its a 12x12 but you have lots of space between the various stations inside the cabin to the fire pit to the outdoor kitchen and bathhouse theres plenty of living spacenyes pets are allowed at deer camp we do love and welcome fur babies however due to the allergens of future guests and the extra cleaning that must done there is a pet fee of 60 100 based on weight that is separate from the cleaning fee pets must remain on a leash per tn state law when outside pets are not be left alone inside the cabin please either take them with you or if you need to leave them behind travel with a crate we have very strict time constraints between guests and we do not have time to make these types of repairs in this time frame even the most well behaved fur babies experience anxiety when left alone in a strange placenncheck in is 4pm central standard time check out is at 11am central standard time this is not optional unless prior arrangements have been made as we have to have time to prepare for the next guests and we do ask to please be respectful of these

Title: Massanutten Rustic Cabin with Views
Description: covid19 update were still open for guests place has been cleaned and disinfected with commercialgrade cleaning productsnnna simple yet comfortable small shaker cabin placed in the middle of the massanutten mountain with views to die for of the shenandoah river and national park wake up to the sight of the magnificent blue ridge mountains and the town of luray va from 1500 feet the space the spacenwe debated long and hard whether to list this place on airbnb after all this is our hideaway with a view that regretfully only a few will ever get to enjoy but because we love it so much and in the spirit of the sharing economy we felt compelled to open its doors to others and allow you to experience the wonderful warmth that this small and rustic cabin will bring to your soul your heart and your sight while here every sense is lifted every smell improved every sound a symphonynnif youre looking for modern comfort and the latest gadgets this is not your place instead if you want to warm yourself up youll need to place wood in the stove if you want to check the latest stock prices youll need to call your broker because internet is not available if you want to watch tv in your room please look elsewherennhowever if you prefer to wake up to the most extraordinary sunrise in your life simply sleep on the futon couch and open up your eyes in the early morning if you find delight while hearing the buzz of a hummingbird just place a few seeds in the balcony if you want to reconnect with your inner self seat in one of the shaker rocking chairs pull up your legs and open that book you always wanted to complete if youre lucky you may even see a black bear or two roaming around no worries they are not dangerousnnthe cabin is located at about 1500 feet overlooking the shenandoah river the town of luray and the blue ridge mountains the view is a feast to the eyesight but dont stop there visit the luray caverns 6 minutes at the bottom of the hills hike to your hearts content on the massanutten stephen trail a mile above or in one of the dozens other nearby paths bring a road bike and challenge yourself to the top of the mountain go horse back riding explore the virginia wine country or justrelaxnnwelcome to a place where time has finally slowed down other things to note other things to notenq annq why do you rent this placena we use it one month per year at most why keep this jewel to ourselves please enjoy it as if its your place as wellnnq why is there no internetna i work in the hightech sector i am connected 247 i wanted a place where time stands still be close to nature and could truly get away from it all we want to share not only the place but the experience as wellnnq what if i need something from youna just send me a text message or give me a ring youll get my number after your booking is confirmednnq the fridge is very small will we starve to deathna hey no drama here yes the fridge is small but there is also an ice cooler you may use simply bring your own ice and please drain it before leaving that should keep you alive for a bit longer nnq should i bring sheets and towelsna no worries we will provide bedding and towels blankets soap shampoo and toilet paper if you need anything else please let me know and i will do anything in my power to have it ready before your arrivalnnq nice wood stove do i can have to purchase firewoodna no need to do so i usually provide plenty of firewood for my guests you may find it in the back deck please cover the wood with the tarp after youre done to protect it from the rain and allow other guests to warm themselves too nnq i love this place can i extend my stayna if available sure knock yourself out simply get to an internet cafe or use your smart phone and book again but please contact me beforehand out of courtesynnq great decoration what style is itna shaker style from wikipedia shaker furniture is a distinctive style of furniture developed by the united society of believers in christs second appearing commonly known as shakers a religious sect that had guiding principles of simplicity utility and honesty their beliefs were reflected in the wellmade furniture of minimalist designs we are not shakers but we are guided by the same principlesnnq whats the sleeping situationna well youre welcome to sleep any way youd like but to be more specific there are two bedrooms both with fullsize beds one bedroom has a platform bed with a memory foam mattress and the other one a murphy bed with a memory foam topper there are also two fullsize futons located next to the stove in the living room if youre not into futons there is also a comfy inflatable fullsize bed found in the closet where the murphy bed is please take your picknnq there are no bathroom faucetsna mmm that wasnt a question but yes theyre there these faucets and vanity were a diy project of my own design using copper piping and shutoff valves and reclaimed wood just turn the valves one quarter of the way counterclockwise to open the water supply pretty cool hughnnq is the cabin selfsustainablena not yet but im working on it with your booking contribution i created a system to capture rain water to the cistern below the mountain is dry and water is a precious commodity here and eventually i will install solar panels on the roof currently all waste water goes into a septic tank so as soon as i implement the above steps the cabin will technically be able to be offgridnnq what other environmental measures have you implementedna in addition to capturing water from rain and eventually energy from the sun i have renovated the bathroom and kitchen using reclaimed wood some of it from a nearby old farm the dish and body soaps and most housecleaning products are environmentallyfriendly to help natural decomposition of waste water in the septic system the floor is made up of natural cork and wood and the entire place was recently reinsulated to improve energy efficiency if youd like to know more about our ecoefforts please contact mennq why are there so many water jugs in the kitchenna drinking water in colorful jugs as well as the 5gal dispenser just outside the kitchen comes from a nearby natural water spring best tasting water i ever had i leave plenty of it for you because tap water is not potable in fact i ask my guests to be mindful of tap water usage because there is no well or citypiped water source instead water is collected to a cistern below from rain or trucked in by me if need be it is therefore a precious commodity simply shut off faucets when not in use be careful not to leave the toilet running and take shorter showers if possible thats it nnq how is the house heatedna the main source of heat is the wood stove youll be surprise how efficient this rustic appliance is depending on the temp it may take a couple of hours to bring the thermometer up to your standard so exercise a little patience there is a heatinfused fan and a tea pot on top of the stove the fan will propagate the heat efficiently and the tea pot with water will act as a natural humidifier making you more comfortable in addition there is a wall heater in the kitchen dial and another one in the bathroom switch that you can control finally a baseboard heater in the entrance hallway will keep the bedrooms and water pipes warm in short youll be cozynnq ok so i will be warm in winter what about the height of the summer heatna oh youll will be warm in summer alright but seriously there is an old and fairly inefficient ac wall unit in the dining room there is also a ceiling fan in the living room and another one in one of the bedrooms ive found that opening the windows creates a nice airflow that cools the place down but if youre looking for a inhouse refrigerator this small cabin may not be for younnq whats the deal with you being a superhostna well then since you askim a superhost because were relaxed about our guests despite us having fulltime jobs of our own however ive come to be rather fond of that title and i dont appreciate when a guest leaves a review saying that the place was too isolated or that the place was not what they expected theres only about 40 pictures if a guest does not read the detailed description where i specify the exact distance to places or the meticulous portrayal of the house or whatever then their reviews should be kinder i truly enjoy 5star reviews if theres something you do not like while here i beg you to let me know and i promise to do what i can to revert your perspective remember communication is king
Amenities:

Title: Silent Paradise in a Tree House - Monte Huam Hu
Description: in the south portugal in the middle of the alentejo lies a powerful gem in the midst of a forest that has been untouched for decades lies the tree house ancient cork oaks olive trees and birds surround you you sleep in the the pure nature and experience the power silence and coolness of the forestnup on the hill you have a wonderful view there is an outdoor kitchen with a fireplace and a showernthere is the possibility to rent a caravan and to put up your own tent or van the space the spacenthe area around the tree platform with its seating area is completely private as well as the toilet therenthe ruin with its open outdoor kitchen and fireplace can be shared so the composting toilet and the outdoor showernnatural places in the forest with hammocks and stumps invite you to lingernthe entire area is freely accessiblennif its raining it is possible to put a tarp over the platform you can also sleep in the ruinnncatering on the monte huam hunnbreakfast and dinner for 15 personnna delicious breakfast with a fantastic viewnbetween 5 and 750nnvegetarian dinner often from my own garden 950nnon request there is a midnight snack for 5 person under a gigantic starry skynnnown catering in the common outdoor kitchen is also possible small note next minimercado 11km supermarket 35km away exempt
