Title: The Dreamweaver at Treehouse Mountain!
Description: come relax in the mountains at treehouse mountain our treehouse has everything you need to enjoy a few days of relaxation bring your pup we are dog friendly toonnthis is our first treehouse that is great for a romantic getaway for couples it comfortably sleeps two with studio style floor plan featuring a queen size bed but there is a twin sized futon if theres a group of three the space the spacenour treehouse features heating and air conditioning as well as a smart tv for netflix hulu and others with your account there is also a bose bluetooth speaker available for your usennthere is a kitchenette which features a halfsize refrigerator a cold sink no hot water in treehouse a microwave a coffee maker a water boiler for tea and hot chocolate a mini rice cooker and a toaster on our wraparound porch there is a grill with a side burner for additional cooking needs we will provide tea coffee creamer sugar and coffee mugs as well as basic cooking items such as rice salt pepper spices oil utensils plates a pot a pan and a cast iron skilletnnlocated on various parts of the property there are fire pits for your use we provide firestarter and firewood for younnthere is a bathhouse 40 yards away from the treehouse which has two hot showers and two bathrooms with hot water all climate controlled for yeararound comfortnnnhere at treehouse mountain our goal is to provide everything that we would want if we were to travel to other airbnbs during your stay you can find that we are readily available if theres anything we can help out with or want help planning your trip to the area as wellnnif you have questions about any of our treehouse rentals we have four total send me a message we also offer discounts for military weekly stay return guests or renting more than one treehouse during a staynnguests can use up to two discounts for a reservation other things to note other things to notenthere is a climate controlled bathhouse just 40 yards from the treehouse that features two bathrooms and two showers we clean this facility daily we provide all linens and towels needed as well as soap and shampoonnthe other three treehouses may be booked during your stay and other guests may have dogs off leash on the property because we are fully dog friendly if this is a concern to you due to fear of dogs or your dog is not friendly towards other dogs let me know and i would be glad to request any guests staying to keep their dogs on leashnneach treehouse has a private fire pit with firewood and starter provided

Title: White Mountains Heated Treehouse PLUS Campsites!
Description: sleep high or sleep low bring your own sleeping pad and a sleeping bag and other creature comforts this treehouse plus tent sites sits alone on a nearly private acre 100 from the baker river shore this is a carryincarryout full sized sleeping main area for two adults and a loft for two small adultsand a tiny area for kids that a really cool viewneven though it is up high it is stout note that the insulation is a work in progress so come prepared for cool nights the space the spacenthe down stairs area sleeps two adults the loft sleeps two small adults and a tiny area sleep a kid with adventures soul guest access guest accessnthe white mountains are every where other things to note other things to notenpotable water is located in a spring down the road turn right out of my driveway after about 12 mile there is a pullout on the right if you go over the bridge just make a uturn and look a little closer into the woods for the pullout

Title: Phelps Pharm, I Was Almost A Treehouse
Description: the treehouse you always wanted as child but can enjoy as an adult i started out next to three trees that had to be removed but you still may feel a treehouse sway if the wind blows the right way we are a working farm raising beef cattle and offer horseback riding lessons arena rides and trail rides along with kayaking down our local river in mcminnville our guests have the opportunity to experience farm life and assist us in gathering eggs feeding the cows or helping with the horses the space the spacenthe treehouse has a studio style main floor with a kitchenette that includes a refrigerator microwave toaster oven small electric skillet and keurig coffee pot full bathroom and queen size bed there is also a loft with a queen size bed guests have the option of a family style country breakfast typically served at 8am or can be provided with country eggs and homemade sourdough bread to cook their own breakfast included with your stay your choice will be requested at the time of your reservation guest access guest accessnguests have full access to our farm which encompasses 70 acres for hiking and trail rides a gas grill is available for guests to use along with an outdoor wood fire pit or a gas for pit on our cover patio we are centrally located 1 hour from nashville and chattanooga in viola valley tn area attractions include cumberland caverns the caverns five plus state parks and recreational areas for hiking kayaking fishing swimming etc within 30 minutes we offer horseback riding lessons arena rides pasture rides and guided or self guided trail rides for experienced riders kayaks are also available for rent during your stay with us

Title: White Mountains Treehouse
Description: three room treehouse with huge windows in a reading room area set at the end of a field looking towards mt moosilauke walking trail to the river is outside your doornlike camping but better surrounded by forest and fields w your own firepit and new for 2022 outdoor shower with heated waternwe are a 10 min drive from many trailheads two access points to the at and rumney rocks trails and world famous rock climbing relax and enjoy your solitude the space the spacenhave a white mountains farm experience and a tree house stay all at once currier brook farm is a 250 yr old 22 acre working farm located along the baker river the tree house is located along the forest line in the back pasture it has three small rooms plus a sleeping nook one of the rooms has large picture windows for walls and makes for a comfortable space to read while enjoying the outdoors inside the tree house is equipped with a camping propane stove cast iron skillets utensils plates bowls drinking vessels and potable water containers we provide an ample supply of potable water at the treehouse there is an indoor composting toilet and a solar shower bag fire ring and charcoal grill are also at the tree house area enjoy walking running or mountain biking along the extensive old railroad trail that cuts through the farm and goes from montreal to central nh like hiking or climbing we are 10 mins from rumney rocks mt moosilauke and sections of the at planning to hike the at and need a ride to the farm we may be able to provide transport with advance notice the treehouse is far enough away from the workings of the farm and the farm house that you can expect privacy unless you initiate a visit to the farm area you will need to walk in all of your belongings unless we are available to use the lawn tractor and trailer to take it back it is a 5 minute walk from where you will park no electricity bring your headlamps lanterns etc new propane heater buddy available safe to use inside propane provided if you decide to use there will be a 10 charge for propanennote you may or may not be able to drive to the treehouse it depends on time of year and how wet the drive is there is a cart at the parking area about a 5 minute walk from treehouse new for 2022 private outdoor shower house solar charging station for your devices wood for the firepit provided additional charge per bundle propane provided for indoor cook stove and an indoor propane heater for those cool mornings and evenings

Title: Innatural Land
Description: the gaia association organizes an experience in the woods a stones throw from the franciscan route between gubbio and assisi for people who want to regain contact with naturensleep close to the communal kitchen and bathroom but surrounded by the wild nature of the central apennines with a maximum of 1015 other guestsntrails and routes with online maps on foot on horseback or by bicycle right on cais path n2 and within walking distance of the san francesco trail the space the spacenthe farmhouse where we live is in a completely isolated valley with a beautiful view of gubbio and the largest christmas tree in the world but only a 10 minute drive from the village 30 minutes from perugia 40 from assisi and 20 minutes from the e45nthe silence the night darkness and the completely uncontaminated vegetation make this place perfect for those who love relaxing in nature walking in the woods and rediscovering a lifestyle that connects us to the times of naturennear the house there is a kitchen area a space covered by a large vineyard a common area with a stove fridge sink and worktop to spread out the pizza to be cooked in the woodburning oven or to be cooked on the grill with the large barbecuenat 7 km there is one of the best restaurants in the area quality food and reasonable prices in agreement with the propertynin front of the kitchen area there is a large lawn in the shade of large cherries and hazelnuts with hammocks sofas chairs and tables for every need of relaxation or work wifi is on request and is not recommended for use nthere are several pitches available for tents or tent trolleys both near the shared kitchen and the services which are about fifty meters away from each othernthe curtains present with mattress are an extra 10 per night for sheets and blankets it takes an additional 10nif you want to book the treehouse write a message and we will give you the availabilitynthere are then in the vicinity of the parking lot some pitches for campers and caravans close to the services without the possibility of discharging the black water for now nor connect to the electricity network except for emergencies

Title: Stylish barn with pool near Horsham, West Sussex
Description: the granary is a selfcontained cosy and private bolthole there is plenty of parking and access to a walled garden and swimming pool june to september all amenities are provided including a breakfast hamper there is a small kitchen with cooking facilities fridge kettle toaster and coffee maker slinfold village has a friendly pub shop and post office within walking distance westerns farm shop is a local icon and is just around the corner the space the spacenthe granary was converted in 2019 it retains all the charm and character of the original building but with the modern features and facilities expected of luxury accommodation there is underfloor heating throughout the ground floor fast wifi and a large smart tv the 2 sofas in the seating area fold out into beds suitable for adults or children please message to preapprove extra guests this will incur an additional charge the shower room on the ground floor is sleek and modern containing a deluge shower shower gel and shampooconditioner are provided upstairs is a large vaulted room with some low beams a very comfortable king size bed chest of drawers and hanging rail a hairdryer is provided for your convenience washing machine and tumble dryer are available for guests on request other things to note other things to notenplease be aware that we aim to heat the pool between june and september the pool temperature will vary according to the weather

Title: Cosy Barn with a Vineyard View
Description: nestled in open countryside next to our vineyard on the outskirts of bishops stortford an ideal base to explore east herts north essex or visit london cambridge the cowshed is a recently converted barn sleeping 5 complete with fully equipped kitchen dining area and comfy seating around a woodburner egyptian cotton linen and black out blinds in all bedrooms outdoors enjoy the wood burning hot tub feed the chickens take a stroll round our lake or discover the zip wire in the wood the space the spacenfresh eggs are available from the kitchen garden located at the end of the 2 acre orchard that backs onto the property nestled in the woods youll discover the zip wire and play area with plenty of trees for den building guest access guest accessnentire space there are 3 bedrooms 1 single bedroom downstairs along with a twin room 2 single beds and master room with kingsize bed upstairs other things to note other things to notenwe have a minuimum 4 night stay during the week with a checkin on monday weekend checkin is on friday with a minimum 3 night staynnplease note that the hot tub is a wood burning hot tub it is chemical free and filled with fresh water each use you will need to light the fire and tend to it adding logs regularly it will take upwards of 35 hours to get hot we provide logs for your stay instructions and will be on hand to offer guidance the hot tub will comfortably fit 5 adultsnnwhilst we dont have an ev charger there are several outdoor plug sockets to charge your car at

Title: The Buzzardry, Luxury Woodland Treehouse Retreat
Description: come away to beautiful east sussex to experience a unique stay in the buzzardry this stunning structure will not disappoint from the luxurious copper bathtub with exquisite views over woodland grounds to the extravagant beamed ceilings that protrude through the building this magnificent treehouse offers unparalleled style and luxury with full facilities available including two ensuite bathrooms with showers a fully equipped kitchen a barbecue and drinks deck at the front the space the spacenthis fantastic 2bedroom treehouse is generously spaced for you to fully enjoy the lofty environs climb up the spiral staircase and across the walkway to find a delightful decked terrace a perfect place for balmy evenings in the treetopsnnthe buzzardry sleeps 4 people in 2 bedrooms which can either be used as 2 doubles or 1 double and 1 twin each room has its own ensuite shower room the master bedroom also has a luxurious copper bath with views over the woodlandnnthe open plan living area and kitchen has all mod cons oven induction hob fridge dishwasher microwave kettle and sink there is a dining area for four and a comfortable seating area which includes a tv and woodburner wood provided to make things extra cosy in the winter months there is also underfloor heating throughout the treehouse we are plumbed in and on grid with broadband availablenndouble glass doors give you access to the open plan circular living area with gorgeous views over the woodlands from each angled window the lounge includes comfortable seating a tv and a cosy woodburning stove which despite the propertys mod cons provides heating with the oldfashioned way for this wellinsulated space as well as underfloor heating to keep your toes toasty there is also a dining area for four with views through large windows and glass doors for the feeling of al fresco dining a small kitchen complete with oven hob microwave kettle and sinknnto the right is a super kingsized bedroom which can also be used as a twin room and is so spacious it comes with wardrobe space and a beautiful morning view of leafy light the jewel in this cedar crown is the master bedroom which fans out into its own spherical space containing a kingsized bed wardrobe space and an opulent copper bath tub this room is not just metres above the ground its miles above other selfcatering accommodation this is treehouse chic both bedrooms are beautifully appointed with their own ensuite bathroomsnnoutside is a spacious deck where you can look over the lakes into the gardens and fields beyond it has a table and chairs for outdoor dining and a gas bbq the lake gardens are available for you to enjoy as is the tennis court in the grounds of marklye other things to note other things to notenplease note that although this property welcomes children we advise parents that the treehouse is high in the air and advise vigilance when staying here with youngsters

Title: Countryside location with hot tub and sauna
Description: we are offering our pool house which consists of sauna hot tub kitchen double shower room bedroomliving room with separate wc beautiful countryside views this building is located in our garden which is an acre in total from the garden you have the added bonus of seeing llamas and wild deer in the adjoining field we are situated close to the cuckoo line and there are beautiful walks nearby the space the spacensole access to hot tub sauna double shower separate wc kitchen and dining area other things to note other things to notenif you download the app what3word under our check in instructions there is a photo of the exact location of the building so you shouldnt struggle to find us

Title: ‚ÄúThe Stable - self contained modern conversion‚Äù
Description: the stable is a unique one bedroom self catering apartment for adults only set in the grounds of a small independent working farm that rears cattle sheep dogs chickens the original oak wrought iron railings divide the double bedroom with ensuite shower sink wc from the open plan kitchenette with two ring halogen hob microwave fridge with freezer compartment kettle toaster smart tv sofa breakfast table with 2 chairs the space the spacenthe stable is all ground floor level with vaulted ceilings modern fittings private parking with secure electric gate your own garden seating area fire pit bring your mashmallows to toast sticks wood available to buynother things to notenguests have use of a private wood fired eco hot tub which typically takes 3 hours to heat up in winter we provide stick wood to buynour hot tub can be prelit maintained until your arrival if pre arranged at a cost of 20 once checkedin its the guests responsibility to heat the hot tubnif using hot tub addition days 10 for wood only

Title: Trinity: luxury lodge in a stunning, lake location
Description: at cambridgeshire lakes we believe that your holiday should start from the moment you drive down our rural treelined track and into the serenity of our stunning lakeside location the lodge provides a stylish and comfortable accommodation for couples or groups of four people the vaulted living area includes a large dining table two comfy sofas surrounding the wood burner and a large flat screen smart tv we currently have four lodges available on the site sleeping 16 in total the space the spacenthe modern kitchen is equipped with all your kitchen essentials including oven dishwasher wine fridge and a large breakfast barnnthe spacious bedrooms have individual lakeside views featuring superking sized beds which can also be split into singles on request for a 25 charge per room and flat screen tvs each bedroom has a large ensuite bathroom with a free standing bath double vanity basins and separate walkin showers if you wish to add an additional children to your booking there are 2 additional underbeds available for children under 10 years old for a charge of 100 per bed in each lodge all associated bedding towels and bathrobe will be provided please note the underbed is low to the floor nnthe open plan living area has french doors leading on to the decking area which includes garden furniture and private hot tub

Title: CABIN X GPF
Description: nestled amongst the trees our little wooden cabin transports you to the great outdoors its simple and honest interior comfortably sleeps two with wide views overlooking woodland where nature abounds it provides the perfect base for those looking to get out amongst it or those that would rather stay in and enjoy a relaxing retreat the space the spacenthe comfortable double bed is positioned so you can enjoy a morning coffee whilst watching the wildlife through the windownnthe bathroom with its huge walk in shower has amazing views of its secluded tranquil surroundings so you can shower with nature for a uniquely memorable experiencennduring the warmer times of year the cabin opens up to its serene setting offering the perfect escape from a busy life and the chance to explore the country side on those cooler rainy days or for those that would just rather stay tucked up in bed you can watch the wildlife outside the window through our binoculars whilst staying firmly under the blanketnnwe provide you with a delicious breakfast and there is tea and coffee making facilities in the cabin as well as a small kitchennnthe nearby farm shop and cafe 2 min walk sells delicious local produce as well as some very tasty cake

Title: The Retreat Sauna + Hot Tub Boutique Rooms
Description: secluded cozy and charmingly rustic the retreat is perfect for a romantic rendezvous or for small intimate gatherings with family and friendsnnset against the beautiful cambridgeshire countryside the retreat is in a secluded area with its own garden and amenities however despite its seclusion the hideaway is only a 30minute drive to the bustling historic city of cambridge the space the spacenthe retreat is a beautiful barn conversion and an idyllic space to relax and unwind set in the quiet village of great paxton cambridgeshire the secluded hideaway is situated in a perfect location being only a 5minute drive from st neots and only a 30minute drive to the historic city of cambridgennthe cabin itself is within walking distance to various amenities including a sweet little village shop as well as a local pub serving delicious food gazing out onto the fields of the surrounding cambridgeshire countrysidennour stunning accommodation is also within close proximity to the mainline railway station allowing you to reach the city of peterborough in 20 minutes as well as the phenomenal capital city of london in just under an hournnthe retreat is a beautifullyprivate space suitable for a romantic getaway or a get together with a small number of family and friends in addition to possessing a fullyfitted kitchen complete with all the necessary amenities it features an exclusive sauna cabin to help you unwind and let all your stress melt awaynnrelax with friends in the jacuzzi between 10am10pm or dare to take a dive under the cold water bucket take in the last few rays of sunshine in our private garden gazing at our enchanting koi pond or wrap up with your loved one with a glass of wine and enjoy the smokey warmth coming from the stone fireplace it is up to you how you choose to spend your time here with us at boutique rooms and we will do our very best to make your trip a memorable experience with moments to cherishnn if you would like to use the facilities during your stay please let us know in advance the date and time and we will get everything ready for when you are wanting to unwind nnfurther amenities and features includenn modern stylish space perfect for recharging and relaxationn a large back garden with slide and swing perfect for childrenn exclusive private use of the sauna cabin and jacuzzi for you and your treasured guestsn an enchanting koi pond to sit near and ponder the beautiful world that surrounds youn a laptopfriendly workspacen pristine shower roomsn free complimentary wifin free parking for 3 vehiclesn fullyfitted and equipped kitchen to create delicious meals for everyone to enjoyn two large bedrooms with 6 beds spacious enough for up to 6 guestsn petfriendly additional fees apply 25 per pet per stay up to 4 petsnnour goal is to offer you high quality beautifully furnished accommodation for a truly relaxing stay we want you to feel right at home when you stay at boutique roomsnnwith us you can expect sublime comfort tasteful decor and superb customer service in order to give you an unforgettable experiencennwe are happy for our guests to use the space for the followingnn christeningsn mothersfathers dayn family gatheringsn work gatheringsn business retreatsn birthday celebrationsn valentines dayn christmasn boxing dayn new yearsn eastern bank holidaysn weekends awaynnplease contact us beforehand if you are looking to use our space for an occasionnn kindly note this area is not suitable for loud parties we respect our neighbours guest access guest accessnyou will have access to the barn sleeping accommodation exclusive use of the traditional sauna cabin housing the sauna jacuzzi cold water bucket as well as private use of the gardennnthe entire accommodation is for you and your guests to enjoy so please feel free to make the most out of the idyllic relaxing space and create moments with family and friends to cherish for a lifetime other things to note other things to notenwe love our small furry friends and we welcome up to four pets additional fees apply 25 per petnnfacilities are available from 10am10pm expect the day of check out if you wish to use the facilities longer there is a 25 charge per hour up till midnight

Title: Forest Den
Description: welcome to the forest den set in almost 1 and a half acres which has just been beautifully renovated offering a chic rural retreat forest den is probably the closest accommodation to pooh sticks bridge and set in the heart of the ashdown forest with direct access into the famous 100 acre wood from aa milnes winnie the poohnforest den is a super cosy rural retreat offering a get away from it all lodge at the same time as offering all the creature comforts for a holiday or weekend break the space the spacenthank you for interest in the forest denndue to recent circumstances i want to assure all our guests that the den is thoroughly deep cleaned after every guest with antibacterial wipes and sprays the sheets bedding towels and tea cloths are also washed on 60 degrees with dettol antibacterial too the safety of our guests is paramountnnforest den has been totally refurbished for july 2019 and offers a cosy studio cottage it has luxury lounge and sleeping space with a high end brand new sofa bed with memory foam mattress feather plume bedding and cotton sheets with a fully equipped brand new studio kitchen with twin hob microwave fridgefreezer sink cold water brand new and spacious separate outdoor bathroom cold water sink hot shower toilet flat screen hd tv dvd player on the wall and a dinning space outside guests can enjoy exclusive access of the apple orchard for relaxing in addition guests will have gated parking and free tours of the forest on requestnso if you like walking this is the place to be we are set in the heart of the ashdown forest guest access guest accessnguests can access our garden orchard and field we would like you to feel like you are at home other things to notenwe have 2 dogs and 3 cats that have free roam of the garden they dont have access to the den as there is a fence surrounding the dennwhen you come out of the gate of the den you will probably meet them they are very friendly though and love people

Title: Water's Edge
Description: a hand built solid cedar log cabin overlooking naseby reservoir beautifully finished to a very high standard the log cabin also benefits for a hot tub and set within its own paddock the space the spacenthe cabin is newly built from uk sourced cedar it is a a 2 bedroom 2 bathroom cabin with a stunning veranda complete with hot tub and breathtaking views over the water guest access guest accessnwhether its a romantic break a fishing trip or away in business you can use the cabin as if it is your own with the exclusive use of the whole cabin and its private paddock

Title: Standlake Glamping - No2 The Owl Shepherd Hut
Description: welcome to standlake glamping your unique get away with access to many amazing places to visit locally hot tubs on its own decking if you fancy a more chilled weekend why not explore the picturesque village of standlake its within walking distance of local pubs and even boating on the thames we are proud to present 2 deluxe shepherd huts which we have incorporated everything to make your stay unforgettable you could have a go at golf as there is a golf club and some balls no dogs the space the spacenyou have access to your own hot tub on its own decking decking outside of the shepherd hut with table and chairs and sun lounger access to 4 acres even can hit a few golf balls golf club in hut you have bbq firepit will have matches firelighters and coal for your first visit can purchase more in bq or local garage within 15mins guest access guest accessnstandlake is a lovely village can walk to the blackhorse please note no street lights in the village other things to note other things to notensorry no dogs

Title: Best Log Cabin
Description: a very private luxurious log cabin set in the middle of an island in its own 5 acres with your only neighbours being our herd of highland cattle perfect for a romantic retreat for 2 the space the spacenthe best log cabin is unique as in the fact it is totally private with no immediate neighboursit has been built using the traditional methods that have used for hundreds of years guest access guest accessnour guests have access to all of the cabin the island and the lake which is excellent for fishing there is also a rowing boat available other things to note other things to notenthere is a modern mirror tv with netflix

Title: Little Cowdray Glamping - The Log Cabin
Description: the spacenour log cabin is a beautiful self contained home from home with all the necessities needed for a relaxing break away lots of love and attention has been poured into little cowdray glampings log cabin with special touches such as the hand made hand carved king size bed and bunk beds to the personalised kitchen companion paddy pig who greedily oogles your kitchen delights the log cabin has its own private area with a hot tub for 4 people a garden and patio overlooking the animals outdoor seating bbq parking and a private shed with a heater to store bikes or dry your wet weather gearit is still in england after all designed for 4 people with a king size and 2 bunks but on request and a small additional fee can hold up to 6 with the bonus of a double sofa bed the bunk beds are generous singles so suitable for adults toon15pp per night for an extra guest the space guest accessnthe log cabin comes with its own garden patio and private hot tub suitable for 4 people all of which overlook our fields and animals and best of all the beautiful sunsetsnfor a small additional cost at 15 per person per night after 4 guests we can host 6 people and will set up the double sofa bed in the living area guest access other things to notenfor a small additional cost we welcome a well behaved dog but they must remain on a lead at all times outside of the private garden this is not only due to our livestock but because of large machinery operating in and around the farm and wed like your four legged friend to stay safe during your stay we usually just allow one but in certain circumstances this maybe flexible we request that no pets are to be left alone in the cabin

Title: Gorgeous cosy winter getaway in rural Kent
Description: the snuggery is a converted outbuilding that has been set up for a cosy stay with a wood burning stove and lots of snuggly wraps to cuddle up in the open plan interior high vaulted ceilings and natural oak flooring create an interior which is fun light and airy walking enthusiasts will enjoy walks from the back door straight on to the north downs way and there is a bench by the front door fitted with a heated element perfect for warming up your walking boots the space the spacena selfcontained one bedroom outbuilding perfect for a romantic break away guest access guest accessnthe snuggery is separate to the main house and entry is with a key thats kept in a keybox by the front door i will send you the code a couple of days before arrival when you are here guests will have access to the immediate garden surrounding the snuggery which includes a small patio with a table and 4 chairs other things to note other things to notenwe provide tea coffee sugar muesli milk salt pepper and oil theres also a nespresso coffee machine and we provide capsulesnnthe kitchen is well equipped with all the basics you will need to cater for yourselves including washing up liquid dishwasher tablets kitchen roll cling film and silver foilnnfor bathing we provide hand soap hand cream and shower washnnif you run out of any of the above during your stay please just let me know and i can restock for you

Title: The Place for Ewe - rural Shepherd's Hut
Description: shepherds hut in delightful rural setting yet within minutes of all that oxford has to offer the perch pub where morse regularly visited is a five minute walk and serves excellent food there is a golf driving range five minutes in the other direction waitrose is a ten minute walk the space the spacenour selfcontained shepherds hut offers the unique opportunity to enjoy a base in the countryside but only a 25 minute walk to the centre of oxford a kitchenette a small fridge and a hob but no oven shower room and wood burner provide all home comforts towels provided microwave can be provided on request in advance guest access guest accessnwe are happy to accommodate dogs but they must live in an outside pen next to the shepherds hut due to the wooden floor dogs should not go into the hut other things to note other things to notendogs welcome but only with prior notice and should be housed in outside kennel

Title: Milestone House
Description: a cosy and spacious self catering home nestled in the heart of rural cambridgeshire ideal for family getaways short breaks or long term rental with tranquil surroundings five bird reserves within a 3 to 20 mils radius perfect for dog walkers hikers birdwatchers n30 min drive to cambridge city centre 30 min to ely cathedral 20 min drive to huntington station 15 min to historical st ives built on the banks of the river great ouse 1 mile from somersham and its amenities the space the spacenmilestone house comprises an airy modern cottage with beautiful surrounding views double bedroom with ensuite bathroom is located on the first floor and is accessed from outside of the house the second bedroom is located on the ground floor with two single beds and ensuit nspacious living area together with fully equipped kitchen tv and wifi nwe are very happy to host your well behaved pets as we are animal lovers in the interest of hygiene we would just ask not to leave them alone in the house and keep them off the furniture beds and sofas please feel free to bring your own linen if you wish your pet to sleep on the bed dogs are also restricted to the downstairs part of the cottage onlynwe place these rules in order that all our guests may enjoy the cottage non pet owners and pet owners alike guest access guest accessnuse of private driveway and car port access to our private paddock and front garden other things to note other things to notenwe are very happy to host your well behaved pets as we are animal lovers in the interest of hygiene we would just ask not to leave them alone in the house and keep them off the furniture beds and sofas please feel free to bring your own linen if you wish your pet to sleep on the bed dogs are also restricted to the downstairs part of the cottage onlynwe place these rules in order that all our guests may enjoy the cottage non pet owners and pet owners alike

Title: The Pigsty
Description: the pigsty is winchesters first luxury woodland hideaway with beautiful views of vale farm less than 25 miles from the historic centre of winchester this peaceful retreat is perfect for those looking to visit the city or escape for some peacennthe pigstys domed design with wooden interior has a roll top bath cosy open plan living space and decking area to enjoy dinner with sunset viewsnnjust a few minutes walk from the famous clarendon way and a 30 minute walk to the city centre the space the spacenthe pigsty is situated on a working farm however in a secluded corner with minimal disturbance access is via a well maintained private farm track suitable for vehicles bikes or by footnnthe pigsty offers a kingsized bed simple kitchen tv along with a luxurious roll top bath and separate shower and toilet towels sheets bath robes and special toiletries are provided there is a gas bbq for guests to use along with other surprise perks adjacent parking availablennbreakfast is provided for the first morning of your stay however tea milk and fresh coffee beans that have been roasted on the farm are available throughout your stay other things to note other things to notenthe pigsty is designed for those looking to escape the ways of normal life this is why we do not allow children or pets of any sizenthere are a number of factors as to why but mostly because as parents we felt it was somewhere to enjoy a couple of nights off from the home life

Title: NEW Luxury Remote Kabin + Outdoor Bath!
Description: surrounded by stunning countryside our beautiful cabin is the perfect place to relax and switch off the location is totally secluded with stunning views over the meon valley come for a few nights and we promise youll leave feeling rested and reenergisednduring these unprecedented times we wanted to offer a place where people can take a moment away from it all where you can get back to basics and enjoy the benefits of being surrounded by nature and nothing else the space the spaceneverything has been carefully considered and beautifully designed to help our guests slow down switch off and leave feeling revitalised think tiny hotel room in the wild as opposed to your normal shepherds hut our cabin has electric and made entirely using wood from the surrounding trees all of which were felled due to diebacknnthere are beautiful walks some to cosy pubs in the cabin youll find some maps and our personal recommendationsnnif you have any questions please just ask here is some more information of what to expect the cabin has everything you need nothing you dontna large king sized bed with luxury linen beddingna woodburner insidena firepit and picnic bench outsidena bathroom with flushing toilet and hot showerna kitchen with two gas hobs and a fridgefreezerna table and dining areanwe offer a generous amount of bespoke cut woodburner logs within our rates more of these smaller logs are available for purchase during your stay to keep you toasty warmnnwe also provide a secured bin of seasoned cut logs to be used on the firepit 10 per bin which can be purchased on arrival and can be topped up during your stay

Title: Romantic Oak Cabin Berkhamsted
Description: this cosy luxurious self contained oak frame cabin offers the perfect peaceful setting for a relaxing getaway listen out and you may hear the owls at nightnbacking onto the national trust ashridge forest this is perfect for outdoor lovers but equally suitable for a romantic night in 15 miles down the road the popular market town of berkhamsted is offering atmospheric pubs and bars for a special treat outnthe cabin offers comfortable spacious living with king size bed the space the spacenalthough the cabin is within the grounds of the main property it is completely separated off by thick hedge rows to offer complete privacy to our guests a path alongside the house leads the guests to their own entrance of the cabinnnnthis cabin features all you need for a comfortable stay a small bathroom with shower facility a spacious open plan living room an open plan kitchen with a hob and convection microwave oven grill and a comfortable king size bed on the mezzanine level accessed by a ladder it is furnished with cosy lighting two comfortable sofas and a dining table the cabin features a tv as well as a large dvd selection and hifi systemnnkitchen we also provide utensils so that our guests can choose to stay in and prepare their own meal if they wishnnthe back gate allows you to walk straight into the woods to explore 5000 acres of deer filled forest and its other wildlife a 20 minute walk away you may wish to refresh yourself in the upmarket and cosy pub the alford arms in the idyllic frithsden valley where they even have their own vineyardnthe cabin is only 15 miles away from the popular and trendy town centre of berkhamsted featuring a range of lively pubs and restaurants

Title: Luxurious, picture-perfect, stunning treehouse
Description: hoots treehouse wwwhootstreehousecouk is a pictureperfect romantic luxurious treehouse with all mod cons in an area of outstanding natural beauty only 45 minutes south of m25 clad in aromatic cedar wood beautifully furnished ideal private woodland retreat for couples can also comfortably sleep 2 children from 6 years on single mattresses in loft area accessed by a ladder and hatch a wonderful place to chillout and lose yourself you wont want to leave sheer bliss the space the spacenminimum 2 night stay checkin any day of the week guest access guest accessnhoots has its own dedicated parking area from here there is a boardwalk with steps that lead directly into the treehouse about 50mnthere are loads of beautiful walks from your doorstep access through a stunning deer park is a 5 minute walk from the treehousenthere is a tennis court that can be used however please bring your own racquets and balls

Title: Cosy country cottage with chalk stream charm
Description: a beautifully renovated and charming lodge on the river dever ten minutes drive north of the historic city of winchesternnthe fishermans lodge is a beautiful self contained country escape with the added benefits of its own little island and brilliant views of the charming river dever and the wildlife that lives along its banks the space the spacenthe fishermans lodge offers a unique and beautiful outdoor space with all the creature comforts that you would expect to find in a cosy homennalthough there is now no fishing on site the lodge was traditionally part of a small trout fishery it now stands alone adjacent to its own small island alongside the sparkling clear waters of the river dever a tributary of the world famous river testnnright outside the front door is a large covered veranda which offers a perfect spot for a breakfast coffee and croissant a little rustic bridge provides access to the small island the island offers lovely riverside space with both the opportunity to relax in the sunshine with a glass of cool wine or to sit beneath the trailing branches of the weeping willow that grows at its heart and watch the river life float by ducks kingfishers moorhens coots and herons are all common visitors whilst beneath its sparkling surface minnows brown trout and the occasional grayling can be seenand if you are very lucky you may glimpse the otter drift past at dusknnindoors the kitchen is fully equipped with a large modern cooker microwave fridge freezer and breakfast bar the kitchen retains some of its original character with a natural stone tile floor and bespoke wooden unitsnnthe main living area is spacious and contains a dining table sofa bean bag and tv additionally there is a small downstairs cloakroomnnupstairs is reached by a stunning oak and wrought iron staircase and leads straight into the bedroom the large bedroom contains a double bed dressing table two hanging cupboards a long mirror a tv and two wonderful velux windows that offer stunning views over an adjacent private lake and pondnnthe bathroom is large and modern with a huge walkin shower and a deep freestanding bathnnthe whole lodge has its own wifi and both televisions have smart tv optionsnnthe lodge is a short walk from the village of sutton scotney and its facilities including a park the well stocked village shop dever stores a great village pub the coach and horses and a handy garage with post office facilities the whole of the fishermans lodge and the adjacent outdoor space as described is for our guests use other things to note other things to notenyou will be parking your car inside a secure gated property just off the main road a30 please be aware of some road noise during busy periods

Title: Secluded Oak Barn Retreat with Hot Tub & Pool!
Description: relaxation at the oak barn danbury is inevitable surrounded by oak trees the secluded fenced patio with comfy seating hot tub and bbq will allow quiet relaxation after a day exploring the essex countryside on your doorstep inside enjoy a beautiful open plan oak beamed kitchen living area with all the amenities you could need to enjoy your stay 3 luxurious beds and a large bathroom being child friendly free parking and fast wifi are a given a seasonal pool is just an added luxury the space the spacenwelcome to the beautiful oak barn in danbury 1000 sq ft of light quiet secluded space for a relaxing get awaynnbedroom 1 has a luxurious king size bed with memory foam mattress quality linen and is double aspect looking out over the tree lined garden and horses when they arnt on their holidaysnnbedroom 2 has an equally luxurious sprung double mattress quality linen and enjoys views of the horses and national trust forest behindnnthe large bathroom comprises of an overized bath for relaxing after a day exploring picturesque essex a seperate shower toilet and basin all amenities such as shampoo soap and toilet paper are provided as would be expectednnthe open plan oak beamed livingdiningkitchen area is light and spacious even for 6 people the double sofa bed can be made up or left folded for your arrivalnnthe 42 tv in the living area is linked up to a firestick for app access and live tvnna seperate nook is available for reading or if you need to check the laptop and wifi signal is strong so you can keep connectednnthe dining table can be set for 6 and the kitchen is equipped with oven hob microwave fridge with small freezer dishwasher toaster coffee machine kettle and all equiptment you need for self catering a selection of tea and coffee is also provided to get you startednnwashing is available at a small feennoutside the barn becomes even more delightful as you can choose to see in the evening on your private patio either from your 6 person hot tub or outside seating area whilst someone bbqs for dinnernnduring the summer months weather dependent a private heated outdoor pool is available daily between 9am and 1230pm unless otherwise agreednnparking for 2 cars on the shared drive is availablennthe oak barn danbury is family friendly 2 little boys live on site so if there are any specific child requirements please just message me before you come and i will try and accomodatennwe hope to see you soon x

Title: The Barn @ North Lodge -Soho Farmhouse-esque Cabin
Description: inspired by soho farmhouse a stylish converted barn set in the grounds of a georgian lodge within the south downs national park conveniently located close to the picturesque market towns of alresford petersfield alton and historic winchester it is an ideal base to both explore hampshire and kick back and relax in luxury the space the spacenrustic luxury is the barns style whitewashed timber walls heated oak floors industrial iron nkuku lighting and furniture sit comfortably alongside crisp white company linen feather duvets and generous sized pillows relax and restore after an action packed day with neals yard toiletries and fluffy towels comfort is key ideal for couples friends and solo travellers alike with the option of a super king or twin bedsna nespresso coffee machine toaster kettle fridge freezer oven hob microwave and egg cooker are all on hand plus a gas bbq chiminea log burner on the private terrace breakfast provisions of granola yogurt fruit sourdough bread and jam are provided along with eggs from our own hens for delicious boiled eggsnthe barn is equipped with the usual mod cons with tv chrome cast wifi and sonos music systemnthere are sweeping views from the bedroom french doors up the field where the majestic redwood tree and often pheasants hare and roe deer can be seen you are free to explore north lodges paddock to visit north lodges chickens and there are several footpaths off the property one which leads to the famous pub with no name in just under an hour guest access guest accessnprivate terrace with seating coffee table bbq and wood fired chiminea additional larger table with parasol to the side of the barn guests are welcome to wander around the paddock to see the chickens meet the owners friendly border terriers other things to note other things to notenbreakfast dogsnnplease note we provide a complimentary breakfast of granola yogurt fruit fresh sourdough bread butter fresh eggs and jamnndogs we love dogs we have two we accept small to medium well behaved ones we ask that they please keep their paws on the floors not the bed

Title: Luxury Garden Studio Apartment
Description: woodland view is a modern cedar built apartment set apart from the main house located within a 10 minute walk to the near by silverstone circuit it comes complete with off road parking and its own seated decking area with hot tubnthe self contained apartment comprises of a bathroom kitchen lounge area and bedroom with double bednnwe also can cater for private events such as birthday anniversaries and special events as seen in some of the later photos for an additional cost the space the spacenmodern cedar clad structure underfloor heating mechanical vent heat recovery and triple glazing with green roof and zinc features woodland view is set apart from the main house and offers a private setting located within 14 of an acre garden adjoining farm land and wooded area the property also benefits from a 5 person heated hot tub which is perfect for those cozy evenings under the stars guest access guest accessnwoodland view allows private gated access and parking this allows safe parking for your vehicle within a secure electric gated drivewaynnwe currently have two different sets of optional stays standard and premium all prices are standard unless otherwise statednnstandard inclusionsnaccess to the hot tub limited to 2 hours per nights stayncomplimentary tea and coffeena full range of streaming tv packagesntoiletries shampoo conditioner shower gelnuse of bbqwoodburner guests to provide their own coalnparking for one vehiclennpremium inclusions in addition to the standardnbreakfast hamper including a selection of fresh fruits cereal croissants bread juice chocolate and cookiesnaccess to the hot tub limited to 4 hours per nights stay opposed to 2 hoursnpremium optional cost 30nnplease feel free to message us in relation to the additional gold and platinum event packages

acre farm located in the rural hamlet of henton in the beautiful south oxfordshire countryside and is around 1 hour from london and less than 5 miles from junction 6 of the m40 motorway the space the farm located in the rural hamlet of henton in the beautiful south oxfordshire countryside and is around 1 hour from london and less thannndue to the additional cleaning and sanitisation required to Title: The Nest: A Unique Retreat on the South Downs Way
Description: on the south downs way nestled in a beautiful spot amongst trees with countryside views across farmland the nest is a handbuilt wooden cabin positioned at the top of springfields on a familyrun working farm springs pyo in an area of natural beauty yet a short walk to the pyo areas farm shop and wonderful cafe at the gooseberry house it has immediate access to footpaths and is ideal for walkers and cyclistsnprivate parking space and occasional distant road noise across fields the space the spacenthe nest has been lovingly hand built by our family during lockdown using reclaimed woods pallets disused gym wallbars and many other items we could find for the interior yet is fully insulated and equipped with modern comforts we want guests to feel the fun and excitement of staying in something a little different yet privacy away from daily life there is a small kitchen area with cooking facilities a fridge and microwave a feather black double bed 2 comfy chairs to sit on and enjoy the view across fields with the doors open there are several outside seating areas to enjoy the sun all around with outside lighting amidst the trees and a firepit for cosy nights outdoors sitting and enjoying the stunning sunsets some logs and kindling is provided but all extra is available to purchase at the farm shopngood 4g signal only in the cabin so use your break as a rest from the world but there is full wifi available at the farm shop cafe should you require guests can also bring portable dongles if requirenwe would ask guests to bring some soft indoor shoes or slippers for their own comfort as muddy shoes and boots stay outdoorsnplease note there is now access to use of a private gym in a nearby farm building on tuesday and thursday mornings from 630am 730am this may also mean some distant noise at this time guests are welcome to join by prior arrangement when booking their stay please enquire

Title: The Old School House Liphook - hot tub & tennis ct
Description: the old school house is a traditional and cosy one bedroom detached cottage in the grounds of our home on the western edge of liphook village in hampshire easy car access just off the a3 and south of the hindhead tunnel the village has a train stationnnsituated in the south downs national park and ideally located for the market towns of haslemere farnham petersfield and alton it is only 25 minutes from goodwood great countryside and lots on offer locally for holiday or break the space the spacenthe cottage is within a secure and gated property with parking and extensive grounds features include central heating log burning stove tv including sky moviessports wifi king sized bed with luxury bedding a fully equipped kitchen with oven and washing machine a shower room private patio and lovely decked area off the bedroom and small secure garden with table and chairs we offer use of our tennis court and you can enjoy a hot tub guest access guest accessnhot tubnlarge gardenntennis court other things to note other things to notenno smoking on sitenno partiesncheck in after 2pmncheck out by 11amnminimum stay 1 nightncontinental breakfast providednsome traffic noise noise from army training

Title: White Deer Lodge - Breakfast hamper included
Description: white deer lodge is situated in the village of barkway surrounded by open fields and beautiful countryside it is a new build in our garden next to our home there is a huge driveway with private parking for the lodge the main accommodation upstairs is open plan with an ensuite bathroom there is a kitchen downstairs breakfast hamper includes cereals eggs bread bacon mushrooms tomatoes jams tea coffeensee the deer outside your window and hear the owls at nightnsorry no pets the space the spacena beautiful oak interior with a cosy rustic feel the setting is very peaceful and quiet surrounded by countryside there is a seating area outside the front of the lodge and a small area out the back of the lodge overlooking the fields extras available to book in advance movie hamper 10 bouquet of flowers 30 cheese and cracker selection 20 prosecco strawberries and truffles 25 homemade birthday cake 25 please message for more info or to book check in 3pm check out 1030am guest access guest accessnkey code entry private parking right outside the lodge

Title: The Cabin Retreat
Description: lovely self catering log cabin with its own private hot tub located in peaceful residential area next to the historic crouch hill located only 1 mile from broughton castle 6 miles from soho farmhouse 15 miles from bicester village and 19 miles from oxford stratford close to local amenities and countryside walks near by we have mobile beauty therapist that will also come to the cabin if you would like a massage or facial this must be booked in advance so please do let us know the space the spacenstudio log cabin with kingsize bed and sofa bed suitable for children or 1 adult open plan snug kitchen and dining area with separate bathroom lovely decking area with hot tub the space is suitable for either 2 adults and 1 child or 3 adultswe advise that people with heart condition who are pregnant have high blood pressure or skin diseases or disorders to not use the hot as we cannot be held responsible for any illness or accidents that may occurnni also make beautiful candles that can be gift wrapped and left in the room for your loved onenplease see photos on the main pagenthese can be made in range of colours and fragrancesnplease message me if intrestednntreatment listsnfull facial 5000nfull body massage 5000nback massage and indian head massage 5000nback massage 3000nindian head massage 3000nafternoon tea is also available at a cost of 2200 for twonnif you would like to book any treatments or afternoon tea then please let us know in advance

Title: Luxury 3 Bedroom, Scandinavian Lodge with HOT TUB
Description: award winning 5 star 3 bedroom 2 bathroom log cabin with private hot tub sleeps 6 located in the centre of a 18 hole championship golf course just 3 miles from the historic city centre of winchester vaulted ceilings and exposed wood provides a tranquil setting fully equipped kitchen open plan livingdinning area with cosy fire smart tv with streaming services living room opens onto a private deck with hot tub and views over the guest putting green ancient woodland and nature trails the space the spacenthe lodge in detailnliving area the vaulted ceiling and exposed log walls of the open plan living dining area provide a relaxing and stylish room for relaxing and entertaining an electric log burner effect stove provides a cozy and warm environment to kick back and unwind the lodges are heated throughout and are lovely and warm even when its chilly outside the living area leads out onto a large private decked balcony with luxurious hot tub overlooking the ancient woodland nature trails and guest putting greennnmulti media large smart tv with streaming services and bluetooth speaker in the lounge area and another located in the master bedroom free wifi access is available in every lodge free wifi access is available in every lodgennkitchen kitchen the lodge offers a fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher microwave fridge freezer oven and washing machine a complimentary welcome tray is provided with locally sourced produce ground coffee a selection of teas and other yummy goodies to ensure the perfect start to your stay with usnnbedrooms the three bedrooms are light and airy and with beautiful soft furnishings and luxury bed linen and towels the ensite master bedroom is presented as a kingsize bed but can also be arranged as two singles beds on request the second and third bedroom are arranged as twin rooms the master bedroom has the added benefit of a flat screen tv hairdryers are also provided in each bedroomnnbathrooms all our lodges offer two bathrooms a family bathroom with bath and over head shower as well as an ensuite shower room soft fluffy towels are provided as well as luxury locally produced toiletries from lavender log barnnnoutside and accessnall our lodges have a private decked balcony opening out from the living area with views of the ancient woodland or guest putting green the luxurious hot tub is fully serviced during your stay an ready for you to jump in and enjoy outdoor furniture putters and golf balls are provided for guests to enjoy our putting green during their stay each lodge has its own bbq stand suitable for use with a disposable bbq pack bbq utensils and lighters are providednnall our lodges are accessed via a ramp from the private parking area once inside the accommodation is arranged over one levelnnparkingnprivate parking for two cars is by the front door of each lodge some overflow parking is also available on site on requestnnself cateringnto make your arrival as easy as possible all major supermarkets deliver to our lodges we are also just 2 miles from a sainsburys supermarket and local butcher and bakery olivers battery if you would rather take a break from cooking why not book one of our delicious meals offer on our dinners to your door menu or book a beautiful english afternoon tea on arrival served on bone china and three tiered cake stand menus available on requestnwinchester is fast becoming a foddies mecca rick steins river cottage canteen raymond blanc brasserie blanc black rat 1 michelin star chesil rectory voted 3rd most romantic restaurant in uk wykeham arms voted best town pub in uk the plough sparsholt multi award winning country pub to name but just a few winchester offers a fantastic range of restaurants to suit all tastes budgets and occasionsnnfamiliesnchildren are very welcome to stay and our lodges are the perfect safe environment for children and parents to enjoy a stay with us for our little guests travel cots bed guards and highchairs can be provided free of charge on request the open area around lodges and our putting green as well as the beautiful ancient woodland provide a fantastic location for kids to play and explore in the safety of our family friendly site our nature trail offers a great opportunity for wigwam building and woodland exploringshould you book one of our plus lodges with hot tubs a cover is fitted to the tub for when its not being used so your little ones will be safenshould you want to get out and explore the winchester and surrounding areas there are a wealth of attractions on our door step from pepper pig world 15 mins marwell zoo activity centre and play barn15 mins winchester intec science centre 10 mins beaulieu motor museum 25 mins and much much morenngolfnset in the middle of south winchester golf club we have the privilege to be able to offer guests access to the championship golf course and fantastic bar and restaurant facilities within just a short stroll down the 18th fairway from your front door discounted guest green fees can be booked directly with us all guests have access to the lovely lake side restaurant and family friendly bar area and sun terrace the club also offers a short game practice area and driving range for the keen golfer dont forget if you just fancy trying your hand at a bit of golf our guest putting green located at the heart of our site is for all to enjoy old and young golfer or novicenndogsnwe have a number of dog friendly lodges so you are welcome to bring your furry friends along for a holiday too located on the edge of the south downs national park and set in woodland there are some fantastic walks on the doorstep of your lodge please note maximum of 2 dogs per property supplement applies unfortunately we are unable to accept any other petsnngroups and celebrationsnif you are planning a group break our lodges offer flexible and affordable accommodation and the golf club house just a 5 minute walk away offers a great venue for a drinks reception a group meal or function we are also just 3 miles from the city center of winchester with all its restaurants and bars if you would like more information regarding a suitable venue for your group please contact a member of our staff for recommendations and further information our lodges are suitable for a maximum of four or six people for insurance reasons our lodges are not suitable to host a larger group meal or gettogether under one roofnnplease note that we charge a fully refundable damage deposit of 250 on bookings of 2 lodges or more providing there is no damage to the lodge on check out with regret we are unable to accommodate hen and stag parties or larger single sex groups of 6 or more peoplennbook with confidencenat your time of check in should the uk government advise not to travel overnight within the uk full national lock down due to the corona virus pandemic or that we as a business are unable to remain open we will issue a full credit refund or the option to move your break to a future date with no amendment fee please note that as a small business we are unable to cover for every situation and the responsibility is with you the guest to be fully aware of the cancellation policy that you have agreed to at the time of booking with airbnb guest access guest accessnour luxury selfcontained lodges offer the perfect location to relax and unwind each lodge provides independent accommodation maintained to the highest hygiene standards and offers a beautiful tranquil setting to get away from it all other things to note other things to notenwe understand that the last year has created a lot of uncertainty for travellers so we wanted to proactively share the steps weve taken to ensure your health and safety while weve always gone to great lengths to best maintain and prepare our lodges for your arrival weve since updated our operating protocols and are allocating extra cleaning time between guests to disinfect and sanitise all hightouch surfaces we have also implemented a contactless selfcheck in procedure and all hot tubs are fully operational and maintained to strict water hygiene standards set out by the british and irish spa hot tub association bishta

Title: Gorgeous Shepherds Hut, Hot Tub & Firepit
Description: an absolutely stunning little escape with boutique decor and a stylish super comfy interior set in a a beautiful corner of the village just a stones throw from the village pub this is a truly relaxing escape the gorgeous decor super comfy bed along with little touches such as the neom essential oils pod st kitts herbery products make this an extra special place to stayrelax in the evenings with a glass of wine in the wood fired hot tub and snuggle around the indian fire bowl the space the spacenthe shepherds hut is in the centre of a pretty village just moments from the village pub set on a large grassy area that was formally a pony paddock the hut is tucked away but with lovely views of the churchnnlittle dragonfly comes withnnwood fired hot tubnindian fire bowlnkettle toaster and induction hobnluxury productsnneom essential oil diffuser

Title: Self contained country cottage for 2 in Sarratt
Description: crestyl cottage is a delightful self contained home providing the perfect place to relax walk cycle birdwatch and fish for carp in our small private lake we provide high end accommodation for 2 people in an area which has plenty to offer in the heart of the stunning chess valleyncrestyl cottage is a conversion of a redundant barn originally used for watercress seed drying which has been converted into self catering holiday accommodation with wood fired hot tub the space the spacencrestyl cottage boasts a fabulous super king bed with luxury bedding towels dressing gowns and slippers a 50 inch smart tv broadband a comfortable sofa a fully fitted kitchen with washing machine and dish washer and a shower roomnthe beautiful village of sarratt has everything you needgastro pubs village shop providing all your essentials post office garage and stunning walks and views we are conveniently located to leavesden elstree and pinewood studios a 10 min drive to the m25 and the nearest train station with direct lines into londonnweekend check in on friday guest access guest accessnguests have plenty of space for free on site parking for 2 carsnthere is a step up to the main private entrance other things to note other things to notenweekend check in on fridaynnthis cottage is not suitable for children due to the deep waters surrounding the cottage

Title: The Little Cabin by the Lake
Description: sit back relax and enjoy the ambiance of our beautiful holiday cabin and fishing lake set in the heart of the glorious east sussex country side situated in semi ancient woodland yet only a minute or two drive from the pretty village of east hoathlynnour rustic cabin is fully equipped to make your stay as comfortable and enjoyable as possible whether youre escaping for a relaxing stay a romantic weekend taking a ramble through the country side and weald ways or a spot of fishing the space the spaceninside our little cabin you will find a beautifully rustic style living area light airy and comfortable the handmade log bed adds a lovely feature to the room the breakfast bar and fitted kitchen gives all you foodies everything you need to make any stay just perfect the lovely large walk in shower wc and sink all add to the comfort of your stay we provide the towels in the winter you can snuggle by the log burner whilst in the summer you can sit outside on the lovely large deck that over looks the lake the lovely view of the lake through the windows and double doors allows you to see the wildlife that is forever bustling about our lovely canadian geese return every year to have their babies are always a pleasure to watch the bluebells appear in spring and bursts into life what ever the time of year the cabins always a pleasure to be in guest access guest accessnthere is private parking for guests at our cabin and your own entrance the main house is some way away so you can enjoy privacy for all your stay you can stroll around the lake and you have your own outdoor area if you would like to walk to the village you can across the fields where you will find a small cafe village shop and pub other things to note other things to notenwe would like our guests to be aware that we do get some road noise throughout the day we are close to the a22 which is great for excess but can get busy at times although our location is very tranquil and pretty you can hear the road in the background please read our reviews to see what our guests have thought so far

Title: The Good Shepherd Hut with wood-fired hot tub
Description: a beautiful brand new shepherds hut nestled in its own little paddock in rural hampshire within the south downs national park the huts bespoke design ensures a luxurious stay with a comfy double bed free wifi underfloor heating woodburning stove sofa kitchenette and ensuite outside theres a fire pitbbq picnic table and woodfired hot tub offering glorious views across fields its the perfect place to relax and unwind and soakin the hot tub surrounded by nature the space the spacenthe good shepherd hut has been built by master craftsmen to a high specification with every requirement catered for each little detail has been chosen to create a homely atmosphere here you will find a fridgemini freezer butlers sink dual hob microwave kettle toaster bluetooth radio crockery and cutlery theres a sofa and fold down table and chairs from which to dine watch nature or stream movies for added luxury towelling robes and slippers are provided with an ensuite rainforest shower offering instant hot water and a flushing loo outside youll find your own small private paddock complete with picnic table fire pitbbq bench seat and woodfired hot tub the paddock offers privacy and plenty of space to take in the glorious views over fields sunbathe and watch stunning sunsets or stargaze from the scandinavian style woodfired hot tub often you will see deer playing in the fields with barn owls rabbits pheasants grouse and birds of preynwe provide a welcome bundle of logs and kindling wood and a complimentary tea tray and continental breakfast there are hundreds of walks and bike rides connecting us to the south downs national park and ashford hangers and a variety of pubs serving great food and quintessential english villages to discover locally if you like watersports the coast is easily accessed within 30 minutes or simply relax and unwind soaking in the hottub gazing at the stars and enjoying the peace and comfort you will find here guest accessnwe offer private parking on the driveway of our thatched cottage with a 70 metre walk to access the little paddock where the hut enjoys its own secluded and private space we are on hand to answer questions but will leave you to enjoy the peace and quiet of the surrounds this is an ideal location for walkers cyclists and nature lovers and those just simply wishing to get away from the hassles of everyday life

Title: Delightful small converted barn
Description: unique newly converted small barn bright light and self contained sleeps 3 adults or 2 adults and 2 children or 2 small adults due to restricted height space in loft large gravel drive behind big wooden gates for safe and easy parking teas coffee and biscuits providednsituated down a country lane within the garden of the house walking distance to pubs and restaurants a few miles from ascot and royal windsor train stations to london and reading the space the spacendelightful newly converted small barn offering high quality self contained accomodation bright light and unique large gravel drive behind wooden gates for easy safe parkingnsleeps 3 adults or 2 adults and 2 children 2 small adults upstairs due to restricted height space in loft steep staircase so not suitable for very young children to sleep upstairs well equipped galley kitchen combination microwaveoven and single hob fridge and shower bathroomnteas coffee and biscuits providednsituated down a country lane within the garden of the house easy walking distance to pubs and restaurantsnanimals and chickens summer time with chicks live at the house within gardenna few miles drive to ascot and royal windsor so great location for ascot races and legoland easy access to m4 m3 train stations london reading marlow henley other things to note other things to notenhouse rulesnno smoking on the premisesnno candlesnno curries cooked or takeaway due to stains and strong smell

Title: Beautiful log cabin set in a stunning meadow
Description: white hill lodge is a lovinglyconverted log cabin situated a short walk from beautiful shoreham village with its cosy pubs and awardwinning mount vineyard the space the spacenthe lodge is set within a stunning meadow with views over hills and fields it sleeps four comfortably in a double bed and two single beds and we can add a foldout mattress or travel cot if needed there is a fully equipped kitchen with oven hob microwave and dishwasher and a tv with freesat and dvd player you will have your own outdoor seating area the meadow shared with guests of white hill hut has a swing trampoline and childrens playhouse and guests can use our outdoor heated swimming pool for 15 hours a day all year roundnwhite hill lodge can be booked alongside white hill hut a beautiful shepherds hut sleeping 2 also listed on airbnbn please note the upstairs bedroom with two single beds is a mezzanine level so may not be suitable for toddlers who like to climb guest access guest accessnthe meadow and all its amenities is exclusively for guests of white hill lodge and white hill hut the pool can be used by the lodge and the hut separately for 15 hours a day the family use this pool also at other timesnplease be aware that the property has an outdoor gated swimming pool and two ponds so if you have young children they will need to be supervised at all times other things to note other things to notenwe have two friendly dogs on the property but they dont have access to the meadow area please keep your dog on a lead at all points and clean up after the placing the bags in the bin providednthe upstairs bedroom with two single beds is a mezzanine level so may not be suitable for young children who like to climb

Title: Self contained Ecopod with parking near the Downs
Description: our unique ecopod was handcrafted in wales it is beautifully insulated with sheep wool and has a lovely smell of wood the large double glazing doors allow you to make the most of sunlight you are in the sunniest spot of the garden the village has everything you need four independent coffee shops one bakery and two supermarkets further down you have the beautiful hurstpierpoint ditchiling and lewes if you fancy more action brighton is 10 minutes away fully heated for colder days the space the spacenif you cant find the dates you want please message me as i may have a last minute cancellation or the dates are blocked and not yet availablenwe are close to the downs national park as well as having brighton 20 minutes away so if you want to walk and visit the village then its easy but its equally easy to pop into brighton for sea air or shoppingnnwe are located close to the a23 the nearest station is hassocks which is 10 minutes walk from us this is the brighton line to london bridge victoria gatwick airport is 30 minutes by carnntheres also cycle hire at the station in hassocks which is a 10 minute walk from our housennhurstpierpoint is a nearby village with lots of shops and some great pubs 5 minutes by car or 40 minutes walkingnnyou also have lewes plumpton ditchling to visitnncyclists and hikers are also welcome there are two cycling cafes nearby proper cycling here in hassocks and velusso in ditchlingnnpubs include the bull the thatched inn jack and jill inn the hassocks and more we have a curry and chinese restaurant on the high street as well as fish and chips and kebab take awaynnfinally a local lady called carly delivers amazing afternoon teas she organizes everything and even takes the dirty plates away so you dont have to worry about the washing up check carlys afternoon teas on facebooknnthe podnnself check in available and own access independent from main housennthe podis tucked away on a corner of our family garden it is not secluded and i think is not ideal for romantic weekends if not sure please message me before bookingnnyou will have your own independent access to the podnnown indoor kitchen area microwave small fridge kettle tea coffee facilities and crockery there is no cooker so you cannot make your meals from scratch you can buy lovely meals from cook at our local budgens or eat out at one of the local pubs restaurants booking highly recommendednnyou have wi fi and tv with amazon fire stick internet can be slow at times but it is normally goodnnyou can also have a hammock on the veranda of the pod we have one should you wish to relax in the sunnnthere will also be a selection of coffee tea hot chocolate and biscuits for you guest access guest accessnyou will have your own access to the pod using the side gate of the main house other things to note other things to notenwe speak portuguese french spanish and some italian toonnfree off street parking we also have space for 1 small car on our drivennironing board available on requestnnsome toiletries providednnclean towels providednnextra blankets provided too
