Title: Nettlebed Farm Holiday Lets, Barn1
Description: beautiful oak barn set in traditional english countryside placed with own access within 15 acres of private woodland and grazing land away from the main road for peace and tranquility guests are able to have privacy for relaxation and enjoy views of horses grazing and the comings and goings of the british wildlife just 4 minute drive to the market town of bishops waltham or you can join and follow the infamous pilgrims trail and walk there in just 30 minutes the space the spacenstunning new build accommodation set away from the road with private access three cabins built with privacy in mind whilst still making the most of the beautiful views and countryside durley has to offer large apex windows create a warm light and airy space to relax in with an open plan living area with diningnwith beautifully thought out living space kitchen and double bedroom with wet room ensuite youll find everything you need for your stay finished to a high spec our barns have been built to provide home comforts whilst limiting our impact on the surrounding countryside and natural wildlife driving down the private road and walking across to your barn to mark the start of your stay will feel like a complete step away from the hustle and bustle of everyday lifenthere is ample parking for cars horse boxes and motorhomes if required 240 v and water available other things to note other things to notendue to covid 19 we will no longer be leaving our welcome pack which also includes tea coffee and milknbarn 1 has 2 bedrooms but also has a sofabed in the main living area so can accommodate 6 people if requirednwe welcome dogs but please keep them off the furniture and bringing your 4 legged friends bed would be a good idea to help them settlenalso we have stables and horses on the farm nif the horses are out side the stables please pass trough this area slowly you may need to open and close the gate

Title: Les Charmettes  , Haslemere
Description: only two miles from beautiful haslemere yet nestled in the heart of south downs les charmettes is the perfect getaway for all the family only ten minutes from black down the highest point in south downs national park you have walks into the most fantastic countryside quite literally on your doorstep the beauty of this location is that you are away from it all yet have excellent travel links only moments away haslemere station has a line running direct to london central with a travel time of 49 minutes as well as direct line to guildford getting you there in only 15 minutes excellent sussex surrey pubs are within an easy taxi distance the white horse apple tree pub are local and are particularly good a little to the east towards petworth noahs ark inn is another local favourite with excellent food and service make sure to book if you are going on a weekend evening for those attended goodwood festival of speed or revival this couldnt be a more perfect base you are only 30 minutes from the events and travelling via the north side of sussex offers a less traffic filled journey getting you there smoothly across the downs and cutting inbetween west dean charlton get in touch for more information on local routesnnles charmettes has a wonderful alpine feel about it tucked away into the rolling hills of south downs national park on arrival you quite literally look up to the wonderful chalet like building through green vegetation and trees following a winding wooden stairway up to the front door you feel as if you have stepped into another world leaving the hustle and bustle of day to day far behind you les charmettes has a fantastically quirky garden going uphill to the fields beyond as you make your way up to the top you find patches of secret garden flat decked areas with hammocks dining tables and chairs and perfect bbq spotsnnles charmettes is warm and welcoming from the moment you step through the door the kitchen dining area is the heart of the building making the perfect spot to entertain and convene with all the family over a home cooked meal or local takeaway ordered in the kitchen is fully equipped with everything you need to effectively selfcater during your stay a separate utility area with washer and dryer can be found by the front doornnthe living room with open fire is the ideal spot to unwind and relax cosy down with a roaring fire on the chilly evenings or open up the bifold doors on a summers day and let country air and bright sunshine in stepping out of the living room you find yourself on a gorgeous decked area with plenty of room for dining outdoors surrounded by foliage and trees you can enjoy the peace that this holiday home bringsnnon the first floor les charmettes has one ground floor bedroom with shower room next door this lovely space includes desk and chair for a laptop area as well a single day bed which can be converted into a double upon request here is also access to the garden via a french window leading out to a space with bistro table and chairsnnon the first floor is large master bedroom with balcony this room has a full sized cot and sofa bed which can be used for small children please note your own linen is required for cot and extra sofa beds the master bedroom has a large walk through wardrobe leading to a good sized en suitennfurther along the book lined landing you will find a double bedroom and twin bedroom a shower room with wc is also on the first floor the landing has space to become a play area stair gates are at the top and bottom of the stairwell a futon is also here which can be used as a sleeping space should guests not want to share a roomnnfree wifi included parking available for four cars

Title: Magical Treehouse/Cabin hidden in Ancient Woodland
Description: welcome to treetop lodge its a special magical place to stay situated in 10 acres of private ancient woodland on the edge of the surrey hillsnescape into nature and stay warmed by a roaring fire and watch the wildlife stroll past your windows looking out into woodland in all directionsnthe hill was part of winston churchills ghq line from bristol to london and pillboxes can be found in the grounds including one that provides the foundation for this unique structure the space the spacenthe space provides a cosy retreat whilst allowing you to watch nature from the comfort of your bed the main room provides a woodburner for heating a clothes rail two bedside drawers lights a 42 flatscreen tv connected to a bluraydvd player note there is no access to standard tv channels we have a wide range of dvds available at the main house if you would like to watch something a small fridge microwaveoven and oven compartment in the wood burner provide basic cookingfood capability fairylights are threaded throughout the beams and roof space guest access guest accessnthe treehouselodge is located in 10 acres of private grounds and woodland that you are welcome to explore around the treehouse are woodland trails and a bench to sit and enjoy the location access is via a steep grass covered hillside so good movement is needed and care should be taken the car park is situated approx 150m away therefore you might want to minimise tripshave luggage that can be transported easily across grassland other things to note other things to notenthe treehouse has mains electricity and water due to the isolation of the treehouse and the length of electricity cable to supply the property you will need to be careful not to utilise many high voltage items at the same time eg ovenmicrowave hob bathroom heater or bathroom hot water there will be wood kindling paper and lighter supplied for the use of the woodburner and the top part of this can be used as a small oven for heating food there is a cold water tap on the right hand side of the outside as you go up the stairs there is excellent 4g coverage for the vodafone network i do not know for others wifi access is available via an external wifi hotspot near the main housecar parknnoctober to march we provide a basket of logs and half a bag of kindling per daynapril to september we provide 12 a basket of logs and half a bag of kindling per daynnadditional wood and kindling can be purchased at a cost of 15 per basket of wood and 8 per bag of kindling

Title: Charming and Characterful Barn with Stunning Views
Description: charming spacious and characterful barn conversion with stunning countryside views in an idyllic village setting the barn is openplan with oak beams spiral staircase wood burner and a large outdoor patio with seating this home has been fitted with brandnew conduction hob oven microwave and modern bathroom it sits in a highly sought after and beautiful village dating back to the 1100s there are two quality gastropubs a village shop and several gorgeous walks and trails close by the space the spacenfully furnished and thoughtfully decorated to make this space very special and homely the barn has a mezzanine master bedroom and looks out across a pretty garden and rolling fields beyond there is also a large tv with free view television secure private parking also available other things to note other things to notenwood kindling and matches will be provided for the wood burner

Title: Private Woodland Cabin with own wood-fired Hot-Tub
Description: a cosy private self contained cabin with its own woodfired hottub overlooking our woods the cabin is well equipped with everything youll need for your stay we supply a breakfast starter pack and tea coffee and a few treats we are happy to help set up birthdayanniversary celebration a gas bbq is available on the deck of the cabin and youre welcome to bring your bikes we have a cycle rack to use there is only one unit on property youll be comfortably secluded and private the space the spacenthis is an ideal space to relax unwind and reconnect walking or cycling from the back gate can take you on river walks to frensham ponds and to various beautiful places to enjoy we are happy for you to bring a well behaved dog with you we will get the hot tub ready for your arrival keep you supplied with wood and happy to maintain fire each pm if you prefer not to do it its perfect to relax in after a day out we often hear owls and see wildlife its a special place guest access guest accessnthe guests have sole use of the privately situated cabin with its own deck hottub and gas bbq there is a grassed area to the side which they can use for lawn games or enjoy the sun loungers are provided they may see horses passing to the bridlepath but this is in no way invasive we welcome the lgbtqia community other things to note other things to notenwe are within easy walking distance of the duke of cambridge pub which is great for meals i suggest booking as they are very popularnwe are right on the walking paths which lead to frensham ponds tilford hankley common pierre point farm and the craft rooms brewery its a great area for cycling too and a bike rack is available for use as is a hose and tap to wash down muddy dogs and bikesnplease consider covering your booking by taking travel insurance with covid cover which will cost less than 10 for a weekend in case of a positive lft after the free cancellation window

Title: Ivy shepherds hut with hot tub
Description: set in a clearing in the woods our holiday lets offer the perfect place to relax in a sociallydistanced environment we have also increased our cleaning programme so you can be sure that your stay will be as safe as possiblencheckin on fridays and mondays only minimum 3night stay the space the spacenset in beautiful surroundings ivy offers guests the chance to relax and soak up the beautiful natural surroundings or visit one of the many local attractions ivy comes complete with bedding towels logburner and woodfired hot tubnnivy itself is a beautiful shepherds hut equipped with everything you should neednnivy includesna comfy double bednbedding and towelsnfridgenelectric kettlensingle ring camping stovenlogburnerntv over the bednflushing toilet with an ingenious lifting trap door to convert it from toilet to showernshowernelectric socketsnfully equipped kitchennhousehold essentials toilet roll washing up liquid cooking oil salt and pepper and a pint of milknoutdoor seatingnbbqnchimneanwoodfired hot tub no bubblesn1 bag of logs for each night of your stay additional bags of logs charged at 5 per bag kindling 2 per tub also available instant light bbq coal 3 per bag firelogs 2nngolf packages and fishing also available enquire for detailsnnsee also our other listings bluebell the shepherds hut with hot tub and oak lodge with woodfired hot tub perfect for 2

Title: The Blewbury Studio: country walks, pubs & piano.
Description: listed in the sunday telegraph as one of 10 coolest bnbs in britain the studio is situated in a cosy oxfordshire village on the edge of aonb north wessex downs thatched cottages orchards pubs walks stunning detached timberframed barn large living area with sofa 2 armchairs mezzanine king size bed via ladder kitchenette shower room also parking good wifi handmade crockery microwavegrill fridgefreezer organic vegetable garden grand piano extra charge the space the spacencurrently set up for minimum 2 night weekend break for stays longer than 3 nights please message us nnfor over 150 years the village of blewbury has been a destination for artists and as such the blewbury studio is flooded with light and colour beautiful paintings and objects along with wellcrafted fixtures decorate the timber framed space which we hope is inspiring and reflective in keeping with the buildings eco credentials many elements of the decor coffee table kitchen units etc have been handmade on site from upcycled pieces of timber or found in charity shops and given a new lease of life the blewbury studio was listed both in the sunday telegraph and the sunday times as one of the 10 coolest bnbs in britain november 2020nnparking outside our house you are invited to walk through the garden at the back of which sits the studio overlooking the organic vegetable garden outside the back door a small private table is provided which catches the morning sunperfect for alfresco breakfasts or an evening drink you are welcome to wander around our organic vegetable garden or while away the hours by the pond in our vintage deckchairs there is a small fire pit available for when the evenings draw in logs charged extranninside the kitchenette comes with a decent sized fridgefreezer and a microwavegrill for light meals its important to point out there is no plumbed sink in the kitchenette you are welcome to use the plastic wash tubliquid and cloths provided breakfast luxury muesli milk a locally baked sourdough or seeded loaf french butter raspberry jam fresh coffee and tea is providedor stroll along to the village cafe for a full english for those who wish to stay in after a long day exploring we offer a delivery service of delicious asian inspired meals by local chefs monsoon using fresh local ingredients this service is very popular with our guestsdetails will be emailed after bookingnnthe mezzanine is a stunning feature of the accommodation giving a unique aspect of the space it is 22m from ground level and whilst the ladder is steep it is comfortableeasy to use 10 flat treads with brushed steel handrails on the side and at the topsee the photos for safety reasons the blewbury studio is not suitable for young children the bed is a comfortable brand new king size futon made of sustainable hardwood with luxury egyptian cotton bed linen there is storage on the mezzanine for clothes but we would recommend leaving suitcasesbags on ground levelnnas professional musicians we take pride in our boston steinway grand piano its a stunning instrument which is available to hire by professional musicians or those engaged in serious study payable in advance variable ratesplease message me otherwise the piano will be locked there are extra music stands available to borrow there is a large cd collection to peruse and music system as well as vocal scores and piano musicnnthere is a selection of books on the local area plus os walking maps to borrow the bird life is diverse in the area with as many as 30 different species visiting our own garden including herons woodpeckers sparrowhawks a tawny owl red kites and a mandarin duck there is also a guide to garden birds and binoculars to borrow there is scrabble and playing cards but no telly before your arrival well email you a file detailing information on local restaurants shops beauty spot recommendations local businesses and fun excursions like hiking routes wild swimming or hiring canoes on the thamesnnwhite company towels and egyptian cotton bed linen are all provided along with faith in nature body wash shampoo and conditioner and a hair dryer guest access guest accessnthe studio is available in its entirety for your private use along with an outside area you are welcome to sit under the hazel tree by the ponda great place for a coffee and wander about the vegetable garden other things to note other things to notenthere will be a welcome pack on arrivalnfresh local sourdough butter and raspberry jamnmilk freshly ground coffee and teanmuesliniced waternsmall bottle of prosecconnafter booking we will email a local info pack along with details of how to order delicious ready meals from local company monsoonasian inspired meals made with fresh local ingredients if youre planning a night in after a long days walking this is a popular option for our guests please give at least 24 hrs notice

Title: The Cowshed, Tunbridge Wells
Description: new for 2018 a totally renovated and extended 1920s cowshed this cosy retreat is 1 mile from the historic pantiles of tunbridge wells and mainline station where london can be reached in around 50 minutes it sits on the kent and east sussex border in an area of outstanding natural beautynwith its wide range of eating places and shops tunbridge wells is a great base from which to explore the beautiful garden of englandnthe owners live alongside the cowshed but respect your privacy the space the spacenthere is external cctv protecting the property and we have electric gates guest access guest accessnthe cow shed the grass in front and the patio at the back one parking space the driveway in front of our house is private other things to note other things to notenparking is for one car only as this is shared parking with our home it may be possible to accommodate an additional car but this is by prior agreementnsorry no children under 12 apart from non walking babiesnalso strictly no petsnthere is a combination microwave and induction hob but no conventional ovennwedding parties incur an additional cleaning charge of 30

Title: Garden Guest Suite
Description: private garden room with ensuite bathroom in the pretty village of freeland self check in available private parking and wifi freeland is a small village with a lovely village pub which is located a stones throw away close to oxford 101 miles woodstock blenheim place 52 miles and nearest train station is just 26 miles away the space the spacenthe property is located opposite the quiet village pub and church it is also a few doors away from freeland village hall we back onto a lovely playing field which has a park at the far end you have your own private outside area in front of the accommodation with seating please note that it is a family house and although you have your own area you may still hear my children playing in the garden when the weather permits we also now have a black labrador hes very young and likes to greet guests with a bark when hes in the garden please note he is very friendly and cant get to you just please dont be alarmed if you see him guest access guest accessnwe offer self check in please go straight through the gate on the left hand side of the house there on your right you will find the key safe combination will be sent to you before arrival containing the key to your room the garden room is located at the end of the property just follow the path and lights and you cant go wrong if youd prefer to be shown to the suite then please message and ill make sure im around at your check in time other things to note other things to notenthe space doesnt have a fully fitted kitchen but there is a microwave mini fridge and tea and coffee making facilities a welcome pack will also be provided

Title: Beautiful  Log Cabin set in idyllic surrounding
Description: beautiful one bedroom log cabin with separate shower room and comfortable living spacenset in 2 acres surrounded by woodlandnlocated in wonderful village of chelsfield with 2 local pubs both serving excellent foodnorpington town is just a short drive away with shops restaurants pubs and cinemanorpington station provides fast train service in to london victoria and london charing cross both within 25 minutes or less the space the spacenjust come relax enjoy the view and the tranquility you will leave with your shoulders down

Title: Private Annex with Hot Tub
Description: located within the gardens of a quaint cottage this private annex is modern cosy and relaxed the perfect place to explore the beautiful surrounding countryside or use as a base for the areas multitude of sporting and cultural events the space the spacenthe annex is split in to 4 roomsnna cosy living room complete with wood burning fire and 70 tv dvd player and free view channels the large lshaped sofa is perfect to come back to after a long days out in the local countrysidenngenerously sized bedroom with queen bed and stylish wood furnishingnna modern bathroom with showerbath and wcnna small pantry with refrigeration a microwave toaster and tea coffee please note this is not a proper kitchen and therefore doesnt have proper cooking facilities however the area is full of fantastic pubs restaurants and delis wed be happy to recommend and the local shop in kirdford does a great cooked breakfast nnoutside is connected by a series of double doors and theres a small terrace with table and chairs perfect for a sunny morning coffee here youll also find the hot tub overlooking paddocks

Title: River Rose Retreat Shepherds Hut, view and hot tub
Description: river rose retreat is a luxurious and cosy shepherds hut located along side the stunning river hamble in the quaint village of botleynnthe shepherds hut which is within walking distance from botley village and train station has its own garden with hot tub seating area and fire pit surrounded by trees whilst gazing out on to the rivernnalthough we adore dogs ourselves unfortunately no dogs are allowednndue to the current climate please rebook if you or anyone in your house is unwell the space the spacenthe shepherds hut is situated at the bottom of a field behind a working equestrian centre and farm so you will have the delight of having horses as your neighbours this luxury glamping shepherds hut consists of a double bed bathroom and a kitchen area with seating and a log burnernplease note we are completely off grid so the property is solar powered therefore no tv iron or hair dryer the hut has basic facilities including a kettle hob and camping cool box as a fridgenour gorgeous seating area outside has a firepit and log burning hot tubnnthe hot tubnthe hot tub generally takes around 23 hours to heat up from cold logs and kindling are kept underneath the hut and you pay for what you use 5 bag of logs 5 bag of kindling guest access other things to noteneverything you need in a cosy and compact traditional shepherds hut with a modern twist do as much or as little as you like depending on your mood a place to digitally disconnect no wifi and appreciate the beautiful nature sounds of birds and view of the river around you

Title: Stunning barn conversion with panoramic views
Description: wake up and enjoy uninterrupted views to the beautiful rolling hills of the south downs our lovingly converted barn creates a warm and comfortable home perfect for a quiet escape or a base to explore upstairs is a stunning double bedroom with king bed bathroom and separate area for study or additional sleeping on a sofa bed downstairs is a well equipped open plan kitchen and living room with a private garden perfect for alfresco dining or a sundowner drink come and enjoy our working farm the space the spacenwe are so luckily to be able to welcome guests to our barn in the beautiful milland valley we have decked out the barn with everything you need for a relaxing stay so just pack your clothes and come and unwind not only does the house have amazing views across the countryside but there is also a skylight above the king bed so that you can lie in bed and stare at the stars above

Title: Bluebell Shepherds Hut with hot tub
Description: set in a clearing in the woods our holiday lets offer the perfect place to relax in a sociallydistanced environment we have also increased our cleaning programme so you can be sure that your stay will be as safe as possiblencheckin on fridays and mondays only minimum 3night stay the space the spacenbluebell is a beautiful shepherds hut furnished in soft blue fabrics and equipped with everything you should neednnbluebell includesna comfy double bednbedding and towelsnfridge 18x16x16 inchesntwin gas hobnlogburnernflushing toiletnelectric showernelectric sockets and usb charging pointsnfully equipped kitchennhousehold essentials toilet roll washing up liquid cooking oil salt and pepper and a pint of milknoutdoor seatingnbbqnwoodfired hot tubn1 bag of logs for each night of your stay additional bags of logs charged at 5 per bag kindling 2 per tub also available instant light bbq coal 3 per bag firelogs 2nngolf packages and fishing also available enquire for detailsnnsee also our other listing ivy the shepherds hut with hot tub and oak lodge with woodfired hot tub perfect for 2

Title: The Hayloft, Downley Common
Description: the hayloft is situated at downley farmhouse in downley buckinghamshire half way between london and oxford close to marlow and henleyonthamesnndownley is a small village set around a common with a friendly local pub the le de spencer arms which serves good foodnnthe village has all the necessary local amenities and is within easy reach of all major communication networks and local attractions the space the spacenthe hayloft is first floor selfcontained accommodation accessed by a private external staircase it has recently been redecorated and furnished to provide a comfortable and cosy environment the open plan accommodation offers a kitchen area with breakfast bar and bar stools the kitchen is fitted with a combination microwave fridge kettle toaster and coffee machine tea coffee and sugar are providednthe open plan living area has a two seater sofa complete with comfy cushions and throw there is a smart hd 40 tv with netflix and bbc iplayer available radio and cd playernking size bed with duvet and plenty of pillowsnshower room with pedestal basin and wc white fluffy towels and toiletries providedncot and high chair available on requestnthe owners horses are stabled a short distance from the staircase and there are free range chickens and ducks roaming in the gardens fresh eggs always available guest access

Title: Charming cabin in South Downs
Description: charming isolated space overlooking garden and open farmland within south down national park double bed with space for travelling cot if have young family ensuite toilet and shower with luxury products own lockable door with parking ideal for goodwood weddings at the tythe barn and southdowns manor visits to petersfield and chichester as well as walking the south downs way we dont accept dogs but guests may come into contact with nora our friendly dog so must be ok with dogs the space the spacenthe garden is isolated and because the garden and house is on open farmland there is a feeling of space and calm country roads abound for walks and escape from city life guest access guest accessnthe garden area is shared with the owners but guests have exclusive use of the table and chairs directly outside their cabin please contact hosts for use of the pizza oven or bbq facilities other things to note other things to notenplease note that we have a tibetan terrier nora so guests must like dogs as she is free to roam in the gardennthere are no cooking facilities in the cabin bar a toaster and kettle

Title: Self Catering shepherds hut with the deer.
Description: self catering shepherds hut with deer in the surrounding paddock where the hut is situated hut is built to the highest standards and has parking constant hot and cold water a shower loo cooker hob fridge kettle toaster and small double bed towels and bed linen providednnclose to petworth 30 minutes from the coast twenty minutes from goodwood and arundel magnificent local walks petworth park and a village shop close by the space the spacenthis hut is situated in its own small paddock where three tame deer live with an emphasis on wildlife enjoy the peace and quiet in the surrounding area with a lovely selection of footpath walks on the doorstep the hut is deep cleaned after every guest guest access guest accessnparking available on the driveway a very short walk to the shepherds hut no public transport available unfortunately nearest translation is haslemere or pulborough other things to note other things to notenclose parking nearby village shop 1 mile excellent local pubs and superb local walks

Title: The Look Out @ Stable Yard
Description: the look out stable yard is set in an elevated position amongst the trees overlooking the valley its a self contained one bedroom boutique house set within our pretty english country garden the fridge will be stocked with continental breakfast goodies on the first day of arrival the property has its own access and outdoor space ideal for those looking for a place to stay within walking distance to the award winning village the property does have low ceilings throughout the space the spacenwe apologise but due to the elevated position of the look out stable yard the property is not suitable for disabled access or clients with walking difficultiesnunfortunately the property is not suitable for children guest access guest accessnthe look out stable yard is a self contained propertynoutsiden one parking spacen balcony with small seating area over looking the valleyn wood burning stoven wood storen to access the property you need to walk up a ramp and make your way down 6 steps to the front doorninsidenkitchen with 2 burner induction hob microwave oven fridge freezer sink toaster and kettle tea and coffee suppliedn bathroom with walk in showern living room with wood burning stove seating area smart tv gamesn wifi throughout the propertyn flight of stairs to carpeted bedroom with double bed luxury mattress seating area wardroben balcony use far reaching viewsn small garden area with patio and bbqn washing line

Title: Stylish, airy Scandinavian-style summerhouse
Description: our stylish scandiinspired summer house in the bucolic village of long crendon bucks is unique to the area we were thrilled when it recently featured in an interiors magazinennits perfect for a grownup getaway business travellers or if youre attending a wedding in bucksoxon and need a chic bolthole to sleep off the champagne the space the spacenthe onebedroom property is located at the end of our garden but is entirely selfcontained and privatennplease note we cant accommodate children unfortunatelynnbasic breakfast provisions are provided but we recommend you swing by our awardwinning caf and lifestyle store norsk in the neighbouring village of haddenham its less than 10 minutes by car and open seven days a week from 8am on weekdays and 9am on weekends

Title: Orchard Garden Cabin
Description: our cabin is set in the garden of our home which is in an area of outstanding natural beauty there is a decking area around the cabin with a fire pit plus table and chairs for dining alfresco or just enjoy the fresh air we are surrounded by fields located about 1 mile from the village and pubs you can head out for a county walk right from the door step several national trust properties in the area whether your stay is long or short there is plenty do to or just take time to relax the space the spacenour cabin is set in the garden of our home which is in an area of outstanding natural beauty there is a kitchenette in the main studio room and a shower room with toilet the kitchenette has a breakfast bar and stools appliances include a toaster kettle two ring ceramic hob microwave slow cooker and a fridgennthe loungebedroom area has a double bed and bedside tables two seater sofa and television with sky tv including sky cinema and sky sportsnnwe have a travel cot and highchair available for families with babiestoddlersnnon the decking area to the front of the cabin you will find a table and chairs for dining alfresco or just enjoy the fresh air we have a fire pit area at the back of the cabin which can be used to cook on we charge 1250 per night for coal and wood or coal only for 5 we can only allow the use of the fire pit with the coal and logs we provide due to health and safety risk assessmentnnthe cabin is very well insulated to keep the warmth in and has two electric oil filled radiators one of these radiators on a fairly low setting is more than enough to keep the cabin nice and cosy we also have a wood burner look alike electric heater which has a mist flame effect that can be used without using the heaternnwe are surrounded by fields located about 1 mile from the village and pubs you can head out for a county walk right from the door stepnncheck in is from 1600 onwards as this is when it will definitely be cleaned and reset for check ins on tuesdays and fridays the clean is often completed before this on other days and if the cabin can be made available to you earlier we will let you knownnplease note our drive way is directly off the main road through the village and you will hear the sound of cars driving past especially during rush hour

Title: Oakside - Luxury Cabin - Tiny House
Description: a luxury detached secluded cabin set in a private secure garden overlooking playing fields farmland 6 min walk to the local pub with some great walks nearby 5 min walk across the village green opposite the main house to nirvana spa 10 min walk to winnersh train station sainsburys close to bearwood golf club cricket tennis clubs close to j10 m4 reading twyford sonning henleyonthamesnfree parking for 1 car fast wifi laptop workspace cooking facilities the space the spacenas filmed by the bbc for escape to the countrynnwe are familyfriendly and welcome everyone from all walks of lifenndue to covid we have instigated a thorough cleansing protocol in both our cabin studionnoakside cabin is detached from the main house has been designed to use the maximum amount of spacennthe decor is in an industrial type scheme with steel pipes used for shelves mirrors and towel rails along with handrails support rails and lightingnnthe heating system is controlled by the latest technology in underfloor water heating systemsnninside the interior is finished in english oak windsor great park which is used around the doors and window and there is a large solid oak beam that dominates the room there is a sliding oak door that separates the bathroom from the main space and there is a small hanging space with hangers in the airing cupboard should you require itnnwe have flooded the space with led lighting to allow you to control the mood the main space overlooks a playing field farmland via floortoceiling double glazed patio doors and in the morning as the sun is coming up its possible to see deer roaming in the fields outside of the french doors you have your private patio with a table and two chairsnninside there is a kitchenette with everything you need to cook your meals a 2ring electric hob is provided and a nespresso coffee machine to have your first cup of coffee to start the day pods provided should you prefer tea there is instant hot water delivered via a perrin rowe filtered water tap for hot drinks via the sink unitnn kitchenaid nespresso coffee machinen fridge with ice compartmentn combination microwave ovenn 2 ring electric hobn plates cups glasses cutleryn large philips flatscreen smart tv and polk sound systemn alexa shown usb charging ports on the mezzanine level and in the kitchenetten shampoo shower gel handwashn handsanitisern 1 per person complimentary face masks more available at 250 eachn hairdryer straightenersn table chairsn sofa small sofabedn active era luxury single size air mattress elevated inflatable airnbed with an electric builtin pump raised pillow structured ibeam technologyn towelsn luxury memory foam mattress bed linenn usb socketsn wifinnwe also provide tea coffee shower gel shampoo conditionernnto access the mezzanine level a solid beech ladder with handrails has been provided there are solid steel pipe rails that have been installed across the top of the mezzanine to provide safety and comfort once you have gained access you will find a very comfortable japanesestyle double bed with a memory foam mattress and a velux window with a blackout blind to look up and watch the stars as this is a tiny house there is no standing room available on the mezzanine but you can sit very comfortably either against the wall or under the eaves and look through the round window across the fieldsnnplease note this space is not for everyone the cabin is ideal for two but can sleep three as there is a small sofa bed sleeps one on the ground floor andor an active era luxury single size air mattress elevated inflatable air bed with an electric builtin pump raised pillow structured ibeam technologynnwe have provided a philips ambilight smart tv with internet access and an alexa along with free wifi there is a small fridge with an ice compartment a tworing hob and a combination microwave oven along with a coffee machine and an instant hot water tap for drinkingnnin front of the patio doors there is a small private patio and we have provided two chairs and a table for your use where you can simply enjoy the view or you can simply lie back on the sofa and enjoy the view from therennstorage is supplied by a cupboard and drawers and a small hanging rail in the airing cupboard situated in the bathroomnnfree parking for one car onlynncheck out our other listing via my profile guest access guest accessnguests will access the side gate of the main property and enter through the garden to the cabin on the right there is a small patio with two dogs in and around the garden

Title: Evesham Lodge
Description: in the heart of the kent countryside evesham lodge offers a perfect getaway perfectly situated to visit local attractions including leeds castle sissinghurst and bedgebury pinetum to name but a few in the village you can catch a direct train to london which takes under an hournevesham lodge is selfcontained and situated in our large 1 acre garden it has a private entrance and plenty of off road parking a car is essential for your visit the space the spacenevesham lodge has 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms one has a shower cubicle and the other has a bath with shower the kitchen is fully equipped with cooker dishwasher microwave full sized fridge freezer and washing machine with dryer there is an outside seating area and you have shared use of the garden with a pond we have ducks living on the pond and chickens guest access guest accessnyou will have sole use of evesham lodge and shared use of the garden other things to note other things to notenyou may bring up to 2 well behaved dogs they must not be left unattended in the property

Title: Water Lane Barn, Little Tew
Description: a unique and beautifully designed barn with a large open plan living area and a mezzanine sleeping deck a recently built and timber clad giving it a rustic and original feel the barn comes with its own private landscaped terrace providing excellent views over the fields beyond situated in the idyllic cotswold village of little tew a stones throw from soho farmhouse the space the spacenthere is a mezzanine sleeping deck with lovely round window looking over the orchard and fields beyond this is accessible by ladder only so please do not book this if this is at all challenging for younnthe barn was designed to mimic a traditional barn with double crittal windows on opposite sides allowing wonderful views and lots of natural light the space downstairs has a long central table with a wellequipped kitchen area comprising all the usual appliances and a wetroom with a colourful encaustic tiled floornnthe other end has a large comfy lshaped sofa to relax on there is a sound system which you can plug in any device and sky netflix spotify etc are all accessible through the tv guest access guest accessnbehind the barn is a private area with beautifully planted beds around a seating area with pergola above and lovely views beyond over the orchard and fields the parking space is immediately in front of the barn which is shared for the house and cottage beyond

Title: Luxury log cabin
Description: 300 5 airbnb reviews 300 5 for hospitality and the best breakfast ever i am so pleased that briar lodge has successfully hosted so many people from so many parts of the world in gated grounds offering secure parking and rural tranquility with easy access to dorking horsham gatwick and the m25 with excellent rail links into londonnna perfect base to explore surreys stunning national trust sites with golfing fishing cyclingrambling and country pubs all within easy reach the space the spacenpurpose built briar lodge offers complete privacy and secure parking outside there is a patio area with charcoal bbq and views across the fields and woodland with access to the garden and terrace to the main house in the summernninside we have provided everything we would like to find on a short stay ourselves there is an ensuite shower room with plenty of towels and toiletries towelling dressing gowns a flat screen tv with free view and wifi complimentary chilled bottled water and soft drinks fresh fruit as well as a hair dryer iron and ironing boardnna fridge toaster kettle and nespresso coffee machine with a selection of coffees are provided along with a variety of tea pig and pukka teasnnif you wish to have breakfast a substantial freshly prepared breakfast of your choice using the finest local produce is served to your room between 7am to 11am to enjoy at the breakfast bar or weather permitting on the patio or terrace there is an additional charge of 900 per person for this payable during your stay vegan vegetarian and gluten free options are catered for and guests are requested to advise in advance of any special dietary requirements a travel cot is available on request the cabin is a comfortable size for two and will accommodate a travel cot if travelling with a tot access to the garden will help tire them outnnalso room one at briarwood is available a spacious underfloor heated ground floor ensuite with superking size bed double walkin power shower plenty of towels towelling dressing gowns and complimentary toiletries there is a fridge with complimentary chilled soft drinks a selection of tea pig and pukka teas along with a nespresso coffee machine and a selection of coffees fully loaded smart tv with netflix and sky movies and wifi available private sitting room underfloor heating throughoutand fab white company bedding click to see full detailsnhttpswwwairbnbcoukmanageyourspace14898067details other things to note other things to notento get the most out of your visit a car is a must box hill leith hill denbies wine estate and the amazing national trust properties within the area are all well worth a tripnalthough only a ten minute drive away from dorking we are not on a bus route and as a rural area have no street lamps or pavements you can however access many of the lovely bridle paths and footpaths around one will take you to holmwood train station with trains into london and horsham and another will lead you into the village of newdigate with a small local shop and post office and a great pub to enjoy lunch or dinner

Title: Grayswood Cowshed in stunning Grounds
Description: a beautifully converted cow shed in a rustic style with luxurious super king bed in a studio suite with added double bunk room for up to four extra guestsnnstudio has a galley kitchen with hob and oven for basic cookingnnwell fitted bathroom facilities including powerful shower and roll top bath and underfloor heatingnnrelaxing sofa in main space with flatscreen tv and wifi throughoutnnunderfloor heating throughout large french windows overlooking an orchard the space the spacenset in the grounds of a georgian manor house there are beautiful gardens and woodland to explore horses sheep and chickens give a farm like feel guest access guest accessnthere is a tennis court that guests that guests can use and possible access to pool when open in the summer months other things to note other things to notenpretty village with cricket in the summer and local pub within walking distancennsuitable for those with dogs

Title: A cabin retreat in Kingston upon Thames - London
Description: this is an urban stay with an original twist youll be staying in a bespoke cabin with private entrance in a landscaped beautifully lit garden youll have a double bedroom with an ensuite shower room this little sanctuary is situated in kingston upon thames within walking distance to richmond park kingston shopping centre the riverside its 4 minutes walk to norbiton train station with regular trains to waterloo 25 mins journey plenty of lovely shops restaurants on the doorstep the space the spacenthis space was lovingly designed and carefully built for visiting family and friends however we decided following several recommendations to open it up to paying guests which suits us just fine as we love meeting people its situated at the end of our garden which is approx 180 ft50 meters long so youll have plenty of privacy a lovely view of mature trees a green garden to enjoy we like to think of it as the ultimate eco retreat its brand new built in summer 2017 the space is nestled under an ancient oak tree which makes it even cosier and more tranquil it bathes in afternoonevening sun the cabin benefits from its own entrance and the security of cctv cameras around the main house the cabin is independent private tranquil flooded with light and warm all year round you will have coffee and tea making facilities nespresso machine a kettle inc coffee capsules tea bags smart tv with netflix mini fridge free wifi guest access guest accessnyoure welcome to enjoy a lovely lawn area outside the cabin as well as an outdoor seating area with table and chairs under a pergola other things to note other things to noten bed linen bath towels hand soap hand towel toilet paper are provided but please do bring your own toiletriesn only those people on the booking are permitted to stayn laundry service can be made available at a costn bike hire available from hostsn self checkin is available for late arrivals past 10 pm

Title: Woodland Lodge
Description: relax and unwind at our woodland lodge in a peaceful and secluded position spacious cottage is set within the ancient woodland of burrswood with direct access to beautiful woodland walks if the weather is ever against you during your stay we have a table tennis table plus a selection of dvds and games to keep you occupied and a large woodburning stove to keep you cosy the space the spacenthe lodge has been recently refurbished and is an open plan layout the bathroom has a large corner shower and there is a fitted kitchen lounge area with surround sound and a large mezzanine bedroom area with elevated views over the forest canopynnfacilities includennthe kitchennwithin our kitchen facilities we must point out that the oven is a combination microwave oven and grill no large oven there is also a tworing electric hob installed and a toaster kettle espresso machine fridgefreezer french press coffee maker plus plenty of glasses cutlery crockery etcnnliving area woodburning stove table chairs for 6 people plus 2 extra foldup chairs high chair available upon requestnnbathroom mira electric shower large basin wcnnlounge seating comfortably for at least 6 people dvd player dvd collection cd player wifi aux with iphone 6 connection sofa bed table tennis tablennbedroom super king sized bed two single beds optional double futon travel cotnnoutside the gardennthe lodge benefits from its own garden area which is for guests private use our main garden is separate from this however this is a family home with children often in the main garden which we ask you to be mindful ofnthere is a fire pit setup at the lower level of the lodge garden please feel free to use this there is fire lighting material by the wood burner and you can either forage for firewood in the woods or there is a lot of dry wood in the wood store at the side of the buildingnnnoptional extras bbq pizza ovennif you have prebooked the pizza oven this will be set up prior to your arrival we supply enough pizza doughs for two per person and keep them in the fridge of the lodge for you to use whenever you want we also supply basic ingredients for pizzas passata and mozzarella cheese wood and also instructions on how to light and cook the pizzas please give us 24 hours notice if you would like pizzasnthe charcoal bbq is free for you to use you just need to supply your own charcoal guest access guest accessnthe track to the lefthand side of the drive as you come in will take you down to woodland lodgenthere is enough space for a car to 3pointturn down by the lodge however if you have more than one vehicle feel free to park them all down therenwhen facing the front door of the lodge there is a key lockbox to the righthand side on the gable end around the corner just above the wood store about 4ft up you will have received the code prior to your arrival other things to note other things to notenthe lodge is in a secluded location tucked away from the main house it is an incredibly peaceful location with no neighbours other than the local wildlife yet within easy reach of royal tunbridge wellsnnyou are within the grounds of a family home because of this we request any music or noise to be taken inside the lodge from 10 pmnnplease note this is not a party venue where additional people can arrive unannouncednnrubbish recyclingnthere are three recycling boxes beside the righthand side of the lodge one is for paper card one is for rinsed plastic glass metal plus one extra there is also a small food waste caddy under the kitchen sink we ask our guests to recycle when they cannplease put the nonrecyclable bin bags in the green dustbin at the top of the drive please do not leave then outside the lodge because animals will go through them and scatter rubbish everywherenntable tennisnthe table is free for you to use and enjoy and the balls and bats are kept in the cupboard underneath the kitchen sinknnour familynwe have a large family that love the outdoors and we also have a large garden that needs constant maintenance especially on weekends children will be playing and mowers mowing if the odd child wanders down and says hello i apologise in advance but we will try to prevent this we will try our best to prevent any disturbance at antisocial hours to our guests ask that you avoid outdoor noise after 10pm please

Title: The Hay Loft - luxury converted barn nr Haslemere
Description: the hay loft is a beautiful one bedroom converted barn in private gated grounds situated in an area of outstanding natural beauty located next to the village cricket ground pub and church and a five minute drive to haslemere with its mainline train station supermarket independent shops and coffee shops ten minute drive to petworth park with its stately home and deer park and to cowdray park with regular polo during the summer months farm shop and stunning walks the space the spacenthe hay loft has a fully fitted kitchen washing machine oven hob microwave kettle toaster and the all important coffee machine the living room with cathedral ceiling and exposed beams and full central heating provides a warm cosy place to relax there is a double sofa bed which can accommodate 2 children or 1 adult and an additional rollaway bed can be provided upon request a flatscreen tv books and board games are available to help you relax after enjoying the numerous walks in the vicinity the barn has wifi throughout the bedroom is upstairs on the mezzanine level and has a king size bed luxury bed linens robes and towels please note the bedroom is not suitable for those with mobility issues as access is up a ladder style staircase the bathroom has a heated towel rail and a walk in shower externally automated gates lead onto a landscaped driveway where parking is available and there is a decked area with outdoor seating to enjoy the sunshine and a tipple of your choice the hay loft shares its courtyard with the hay barn which when booked together sleeps a total of 8 people

Title: Entire Garden Annex with Breathtaking Views
Description: lovely selfcontained annex with breathtaking views over the open fields open plan spacious living room and kitchen on the ground floor with a double bedroom with ensuite on the first floor short walk to hanborough train station with great links into london oxford and the cotswolds plenty of country walks pubs and within walking distance to blenheim palace the space the spacenappletree cottage is located in an idyllic village in the cotswolds it is perfectly situated for visiting oxford city blenheim palace and the cotswoldsnnthe selfcontained annex is brand new modern bright surrounded by a beautiful garden it offers a spacious open plan living dining and kitchen area with a sofa a 55 tv and under floor heatingnnthe bedroom is located on the first floor and has amazing views of the oxfordshire countryside it has sloped ceilings and it features a king size bed side cabinets chest of drawers and a generous open wardrobe the shower room is located just off of the landing next to the bedroom and offers a shower sink and a cabinetnnplease note that access to the upper floor is via an external staircase guest access guest accessn we offer our guests complementary wifin you will have sole use of the annexen we endeavour to be around to greet our guests whenever that is not possible a lockbox key code will be provide it to self checkinn there is space to park 1 guest car arrangements can be made for more cars but please let us know in advancen you are welcome to use our garden but please note on some occasions we might be using it too other things to note

Title: A Cosy Cottage With A Fabulous View Close To TW.
Description: this listing is categorically not suitable for groups of singles our new cottage has recently been completed it has stunning views across kent situated down a quiet farm lane with no other houses in sight we are 10 mins from the centre of tunbridge wells tonbridge and paddock woodnit is incredibly cosy with underfloor heating throughout it is also totally eco friendly there is an electric car charger for those arriving inelectric cars 15night or 25day chargepayable before charging the space the spacenthe cottage is suitable for couples or a family not groups of singles dogs are welcome with prior consent the floor mattress is a single fold up the cottage has its own terrace with table there is a utility room next door with washing machine and tumble dryer and space for boots and coats it is located on a footpath so great for walking with 2 woods encircling us the garden has open access on to a farm road so dogs need to be attended at all times there are also lots of cycling paths for cycling guest access guest accessnthere is one dedicated parking space for the cottage but room beside it for further cars guests can use the garden which includes a unique fruit garden with peaches apricots pears figs and many other fruits please note there is a private covered swimming pool in the garden for family use only this is not available for guests to use so children would need to be supervised at all times in the garden other things to note other things to notenthe nearest supermarkets are about 10 minutes drive awaynthe nearest station is 10 minutes away paddock wood with frequent trains to london tonbridge station is about 15 minutes drive with even more frequent trains to londonnwe are on a public footpath so multiple walks from the housenthere is a covered private swimming pool for family use only in the garden this is not available for guests to use so children will need supervision in the garden at all timesnthose bringing dogs should be aware there is open access to a farm road so you need to supervise dogs at all timesnwe have 2 very friendly dogs but if you are afraid of dogs please let us know in advance so we can keep them away from you

Title: Lakeside Retreat- The Boat House
Description: the lakeside retreat is a selfcontained lodge on the edge of a lake boasting complete privacy in the heart of a working farm in the picturesque county of sussex the cabin benefits from an open plan living and kitchen area with floor to ceiling glass doors that open out onto decking relish an escape from modernday life surrounded by uninterrupted farmlandnfind us on social media thelakesideretreatsussex or online by searching for lakeside retreat the space the spacenthe ground floor hosts an open plan layout withna living area with a contemporary double sofa bedna dining area with a table and four chairsna kitchen equipped with an four ring hob and ovenn fridgen dishwashern washing machinen expected utensilsna separate contemporary toilet and showernnupstairsnoffers a large bedroom with a double and single bed which are always made up with an abundance of storagennexternallynthe decking area can be used to your full benefit perhaps enjoy an early morning coffee or a glass of wine in the evening on the sunsoaked pontoon outdoor furniture is included to complement those summer bbqsnthe lake is well stocked with carp and full access is offered to use it for responsible fishing activities entering the water or use of any boat is strictly prohibited should groups of families wish to use this fantastically unique space then further discussions can be held regarding more than four visitors and the inclusion of tents

Title: French Gypsy Caravan
Description: bohemian and full of character le grande roulotte does not compromise on comfortnnfamily bathroom with a shower sink and toilet kitchenette with induction hob fridge and microwave full sized double bed and two single day beds outdoor areannall bedding and towels are included in the cost of your stay the space the spacenle grande roulotte is bohemian and full of characternnwe have included a well equipped family bathroom with a shower sink and toilet a kitchenette with small refrigerator induction hob and microwave a full sized double bed and two single day beds making this a real family holiday homennan oak table with stools pulls out to provide an eating space for 4 people there is storage under the beds for clothes and suitcases and a hanging clothes rail is in the cupboard under the tvnnbuilt from sustainable timber with energy efficient materials such as sheeps wool insulation floor walls roof and a rated windows the roulotte is warm even in the winter months a heated towel rail and an electric wood burner provide the main source of heating guest accessnaccess is through a shared electric gate a shared gravel driveway leads up to the caravan where you will find parking for several cars and an outdoor area next to the caravan the wider grounds can also be used but are shared with others other things to note other things to notenthere is an outdoor storeroom and wood store about 10m away from the caravan which is accessed by othersnnthere is a road 30m awaynnthe shower is typical of those found in many caravans and boats it is limited in size and not at the level of a power shower that you would find inside your own homennas detailed in the description above the wood burner is electric and not a real wood burnernnthe caravan shares a site with 5 holiday lodges on mondays and fridays the cleaning team are on site and will use the shared parking area on mondays or fridays from spring to late autumn the gardening team are on site and may be mowing strimming andor hedge cutting there will be some associated noise but it does keep the grounds looking lovely

Title: Old Fox Inn Annexe,Grade 2 listed, near Cambridge.
Description: old fox inn annexe is an independent ground floor wing of the old fox inn a grade 2 listed former pub dating from the mid 1700snnset 9 miles from the historic city of cambridge with good transport links the property benefits from the use of a large garden with free range chickens and overlooking horse paddocks the space the spacenthe annexe has its own entrance and plenty of off road parking it has been renovated with modern fixtures and fittings and is warm and cosy with central heating there is a kitchen with a table and four chairs hob oven microwave fridge with freezer compartment cooking utensils dinnerware and coffeetea making facilities a welcome pack with a range of fresh breakfast produce milk cereals bread jam butter eggs tea coffee sugar is included on arrivalnntowels and fresh linen are provided washed at 60 degrees the bedroom as a very comfortable king size bed with plenty of pillows and a fluffy duvet this room also has a very comfortable single chair bed the living room has a sofa lovely to snuggle and read or watch tv this also converts into a full size comfortable double bed for extra guests and you will have fresh linen plump pillows and a cosy duvetnnthe centre of the picturesque village of bourn famous for its pioneering work in the field of ivf is five minutes away and offers the willow tree pub a very good indian restaurant a coffee shop a butchers a convenience store and a golf club there are numerous local walks through the beautiful surrounding countryside we are happy to help you with any recommendationsnnthe historic wimpole hall estate a lovely national trust property is 510 minutes awaynnthe historic city of cambridge is 15 minutes away by carnnfor trips into london royston station is only 15 minutes away and is much easier for parking the fast train is under 40 minutes journey time

Title: Country estate lodge/cabin on the River Thames
Description: this is a beautiful scandinavian 2 story 3 bedroom log cabin situated on a secure country site between the popular towns of marlow and henley on thames also on the river thames the luxurious lodge is ideally positioned within the estate with just one neighbour overlooking a beautiful lake where spectacular sunsets and a wonderful array of wildlife can be seen the lodge has been refurbished with modern but cosy decor and along with its lakeside views boasts a large gated veranda the space the spacenthere is sky tv netflix wifi central heating dishwasher washing machinedryer the lodge has 3 bedrooms one with ensuite bath further family bathroom a large open plan dininglounge area with balcony also overlooking the lake a large comfortable sofa doubling as a sofa bed and a generous dining table for seating up to 8 guests the master bedroom has a tv that rises up from the foot of the bed this also has netflix etc freeview but not sky at this time in addition to a water softener gas central heating dishwasher washing machine tumble dryer coffee machine and all the usual essentials the estate has an 18 hole golf course large marina restaurant in the golf club ample free parking helicopter landing pad and can provide moorings for guests arriving by boat beautiful walks can be enjoyed in and around the estate or if you fancy venturing off to marlow henley or further afield to oxford or london harleyford provides the perfect location for younnour country estate lodge will sleep 6 guests comfortably in 3 bedroomsnnadditional sleeping arrangement is available to accommodate a further 2 guests sofa bed in the lounge there is a supplement fee per person per night for this

Title: Snug & Secluded Lakeside shepherds hut
Description: perfect rural getaway peaceful secluded lakeside setting for a relaxing adults break in our cosy hut pets welcome xtra private bathroom facilities fishing available countryside walks nearby lead to local villages eg buxted hadlow down or wander round our lakes ancient woodland and shaws where wildlife and wild flowers abound cattle and sheep in our fields nearby tunbridge wellsbrighton 12hr drive main line trains tofrom buxted crowborough and london 1 hr discs for 4 nts the space the spacenour 2 huts have been neatly fitted out to provide a comfortable space to unwind and relax in private they may be small but have all mod cons albeit in small sizes either stay local for a total chill out or use it as a base for exploring the east sussex areankitchen area has kettle small fridgefreezer mini oventoaster double ring gas hob microwave cafetiere ironing board and iron bug zapper fan log burner with initial supply of kindling and logs top up available for extra charge tv wifi usb point bluetooth speaker bbq on balcony firepit outside on slabs to sit round of an evening use of full size fridgefreezer and wash up area with washing machine and line in separate hut own private comfortable heated toiletshower hut a short walk awaynhand towels provided but please bring own bathface towelsnseveral walks nearby to buxted hadlow down rotherfield pubs nearby the new inn a really old fashioned drinkers pub the buxted inn the white hart the blackboys the hurstwood plus several in crowborough uckfield and heathfield takaways menus in the hut for collection or deliveryncoarse fishing carp to 20lbs plus many varieties of other silver fish available for 10 per day 2 rods pp must have a current angling licence full details sent on bookingnmax 2 pets 5 per pet per night payable on arrival please must be kept on leads except for our empty fields that we will show you and the swimming lake not allowed on bed and please pick up after themnsmall safe for your valuables inside plus keysafe outsidenwe fill the bird feeders hanging on your balcony and youll have a good view of our local birdlife from the warmth and privacy of your hutnextra logs and charcoal available to buy other things to note other things to notenwelcome pack on arrival consists of bread croissants butter milk juice drinking water tea coffee sugar also supplied condiments such as pepper salt cooking oilnnearest supermarkets in crowborough waitrose lidl morrisons sainsbury local tesco small supermarket in buxtednpetrol stations morrisons bp and esso in crowborough esso 2 others in uckfield

Title: Laura‚Äôs Little Sanctuary. Gourmet Food Options.
Description: cosy serene annex gourmet food and homegrown ingredientsnnthis tempting retreat is situated in beautiful gardens in the heart of the high weald area of east sussex recently renovated to a high standard with the aim of providing a luxurious and nourishing place to relax and escape from the demands of everyday lifennto this end this immaculate studio has been carefully thought out with attention to detail to provide a comfortable space to completely unwindnna homemade welcome pack is included the space the spacenthe annex has been lovingly restored and offers comfortable cosy accommodationnninside the annex is a sleeping area with a double bed with a memory foam mattress there is an adjacent shower room with marble tiles throughout the bed has egyptian cotton sheets with soft warm throws the shower room has thick soft towels and palm oil free vegan toiletriesnnin the sitting area is a fully fitted kitchen comprising a smeg oven and induction hob fridge dish washer granite work surface and an eating area a nespresso coffee machine toaster and kettle are also suppliednnthere are two comfortable armchairs next to a wood burning stove a smart tv is attached to the wallnnthe welcome pack includes a selection of delicious home made pastries and cakesnnoutside is an eating area and barbecue the views from the annex look out across the beautiful gardens and are close to the kitchen gardennnwe have recently installed a tennis court which is available for guests to usennstroll through the gardens to the river uck which borders the property and to the lake where you can relax in a small rowing boat there is abundant wildlife everywhere and sometimes late at night there are deer to be seen wandering through the gardennndiningin is provided at an additional cost cooked by a cordon bleu cook using locally sourced and home grown ingredients please enquire about dining in experience when booking midweek and some weekends not currently availablennfor stays of a minimum of a week i am currently offering a 15 discountnnthere is wifi set up exclusively for the annex guest access guest accessnthere is private parking for guests in our driveway and your own entrance the main house is a grade ii listed historical building with a thatched barn other things to note other things to notenlocated very close to the little dairy for groups of friends to holiday close bynnglyndebourne is only 20 minutes drive picnics available on request at an additional cost

Title: Woodland cabin in Stoke Newington, Central London.
Description: the woodland cabin is unique a delightful cozy cabin with wifi kitchenette in central london set within its own pretty woodland and featuring a private terrace independent 247 access secure and safe as you will see from our guest reviews the cabin is an oasis of tranquility but with easy access to the bright lights of soho theatreland and funky dalston shoreditch you will adore it the space the spacenthe cabin sleeps 2 people the large double bed is exceptionally comfortable for guests that prefer 2 single beds we can arrange this without difficulty we can also provide a childs bed for a baby or toddler the cabin is safe secure and independently accessed so youre free to come and go as you please with its own private terrace and woodland it combines tranquillity with urban access bustling stoke newington church street renowned for its great restaurants cafes bars is a short walk away as is the wedding venue at stoke newington town hall clissold park and woodbury wetlands nature reserve are nearby too good transport links off street parking a beautiful modern kitchenette with fridge and combi microwaveovensteamer charcoal bbq underfloor heating if needed the cabin has everything you could need for a perfect stay in central london and if youre a musician which i am theres even a guitar in the cabin which youre free to use guest access guest accessna fully equipped cabin with its own terrace outdoor seating overlooking a picturesque pond set within private woodland other things to note other things to notenlaundry for longer stay visitors use of our washing machine and dryer can be arranged we also have a very good relationship with our local dry cleaner who is very accommodating and efficient and can also do emergency alterations and button sewingnncovid19 secure the cabin is deep cleaned between guest visits hand sanitiser is provided and masks and cotton gloves available for for pandemic related purposes including travel on public transport

Title: Luxurious converted stable.

Title: Luxury Cabin on Private Lake
Description: this unique luxury cabin set on a 4 acre fishing lake in the south downs national park the cabin has a huge 8 foot double bed roll top bath and 2 single beds private and peacefulnoutside hot showernroll top bathnfire pitndogs welcomenpontoons to swim fromnnespresso toaster fridge ice machine gas hobnbath robes bath towels swimming towels includednboard games trivial scrabble cards nrowing boat canoe paddle board wet suitslife jacketsnwifi bluetooth dab radionno drones the space the spacenthe cabin and the lake are completely private and set in the south downs national park the cabin is very comfortable and the perfect place to enjoy the countryside and to unwind and relax please read the guest reviews and they will give you a good idea of what this is about guest access guest accessnall areas other things to note other things to notenbring wellies and slippers in the winter

Title: Tudor Barn conversion
Description: circa 1460s self contained barn conversion double bed shower room cosy sitting area with oil burning stove private entrance parking stunning views use of outdoor sitting area quiet location chelmsford 10 to 12 minute drive to city centre and railway station stansted less than 20 minutes away broomfield hospital and farleigh hospice 10 minute walk away buses to colchester braintree and chelmsford from outside front door chelmsford park and ride service is 5 minute drive the space the spacena self contained barn conversion with kitchenette including fridge microwave kettle and toasterntea instant and filter coffee sugar milk biscuits breakfast cereal and fresh fruit includedna cosy sitting area with oil burning stove diningwork tablenshower room with basin and wc sleeping area separated by reclaimed winery screen personal guest use outdoor courtyard with table and chairsnnplease note there is no hob or oven in the barn guest access guest accessnoutdoor courtyard other things to note other things to notenparking is only available during stay
