Title: 'Stable Cottage' - Beautiful family accommodation
Description: our holiday homes are a wonderful base for families and large groups wishing to explore the beautiful south downs national park the space the spacenour holiday homes stable cottage edwards cottage rose cottage and louisas cottage are set in the heart of the beautiful hampshire countryside with wonderful views across a peaceful valley they are a rural haven for visitors but only 10 minutes from petersfield with fantastic road and rail connections for london and portsmouth this description is for stable cottage please see our other adverts for photos and description of rose cottage edwards cottage and louisas cottagennthe four holiday homes would suit large groups and families looking to holiday together please ask your host venetia for more informationnnour small working farm downlands farm on which the selfcatering cottages are set is just off a greenlane which leads to miles of footpaths bridleways and on and offroad cyclingnnpets are welcome at stable cottage please enquire upon bookingnnthere are three excellent pubs surrounding the farm all within a half hour stroll or a 3 minute car journey the quaint and bustling market town of petersfield is a 10 minute drive from the farm and alongside the two local village shops these all provide a perfect base for stocking up on essential items the larger cathedral cities of chichester guildford portsmouth and winchester are all equally 45 minutes away offering great shopping and entertainmentnnwe are so lucky to be within an hours drive from one of the premier blue flag beaches in the country west wittering west wittering is a beautiful place to visit whatever the season and can be enjoyed by all ages during the low season october to april horse riding is permitted at any time during the day on west wittering and the summer months offer horseriding before 9am and after 6pm hayling island a shingle beach with funfair for the children is half an hour from downlands farmnnstable cottage offers light and airy accommodation with two ground floor bedrooms and a huge playroombedroom upstairsnnafter stowing muddy wellies in the undercover porch you will walk into our bright well equipped kitchen dining sitting room stretching the entire width of the barn this large room opens out through french windows onto your own private terrace and garden complete with garden tables and chairsnna television with bt vision and netflix will keep you entertained on those horrible rainy days it goes without saying that guests have use of free wifinna utility room with washing machine and tumble dryer leads off from the kitchen which in turn leads to a well ventilated shower roomnntwo double bedrooms also lead off from the kitchen the master bedroom having an ensuite bathroom with a large bathtub perfect for soaking after a long walk both bedrooms have televisionsnnchildren will absolutely love their playroom at the top of the property accessed by stairs from the sitting room children will have their own space to create chaos and noise there is ample space up here to accommodate up to four additional people two single beds and one double bednnthere is no extra charge for use of a travel cot stair gate and high chair as required please contact us for information and to discuss your requirementsnnwe welcome guests who wish to stay for a minimum of two nights up to a maximum of one monthnnplease note stable cottage rose cottage edwards cottage and louisas cottage are situated on a working farm and next door to horse stables whilst the interior of the properties is beautiful we would like to make it clear that at present the exterior is still a work in progress this does not detract from the overall glorious settingnnthe property particulars may change without prior notice and the owners are not liable for any inaccuracies in the propertys description on our website or through mediaadvertising sources any photographs are for illustrative purposes onlynncovid notes 2021nnwe are delighted that we are able to open our doors again from monday 12th april 2021nnplease see below key dates in our reopening with extracts taken from the govuk websitennmonday 12th april we are open for business again but each property must only be used by members of the same household overnight stays away from home in this country will be permitted and selfcontained accommodation those that do not require shared use of bathing entryexit catering or sleeping facilities can also reopen though must only be used by members of the same householdnnmonday 17th may we will be welcoming groups who wish to stay as two families or as a group of no more than six from different households indoors people will be able to meet socially in a group of 6 or with 1 other household though it may be possible to go further than this at step 3 depending on the datannmonday 21st june our holiday houses will be open as usual with no limits on guest numbersgroups mixing etc depending on government announcements no legal limits on social contact subject to reviewnnncleaning we ensure that the cottage that you have booked will be cleaned and sanitised to the covid ready guidelines from pasc uk the aa and visit england we have produced a risk assessment that covers all aspects of our business this can be seen upon requestnncheckout times strictly 4pm arrival 10am departurennentertainment we unfortunately have had to remove all toys board games books magazines and tourist leaflets as we cannot disinfect every item there is a ping pong table and pool table in the games room within the barn this room is cleaned regularly but it would be great if you could help us by using the disposable paper towel and spray provided to wipe down any equipment after usennif one of your party develops symptoms while staying with us government advice is to get tested immediately and for the group to self isolate in situ should the test come back positive before the scheduled end of the stay then the group is required to immediately return to their primary residences and continue to self isolate for the required time please let us know as our cleaning protocols are different in this scenario the symptoms to look out for are a high temperature a new continuous cough or a loss or change to your sense of smell or taste regardless of the test result if you are too unwell to return home and decide to self isolate in your cottage beyond your scheduled stay then you will be liable for all fees for all bookings affected by this self isolationnneedless to say if one of your party develops symptoms in the days prior to your scheduled stay with us please follow government guidance self isolate get tested and do not travelnthank you for your help and understanding we very much hope that all our guests will continue to have wonderful holidays with us and can once again look forward to getting away from home enjoying the fresh air and open spaces and the beautiful surrounding countryside guest access guest accessnall areas other things to note other things to notenthe cottages are set on a working smallholding therefore visitors can expect to see cows dogs and horses during their stay with usnnplease note that all four holiday properties are adjacentjoined to oneanother each house has its own private patio and garden but the parking is shared due to the proximity to oneanother and also to our farmhouse you will be staying next door to children and animals and sometimes noisy adults we are a laidback farm which very much caters for families so if it is absolute peace and quiet youre after you may want to look elsewherenedwards cottage and louisas cottage are at the ends and rose cottage and stable cottage are in the middlenna car is absolutely essential if you wish to stay at downlands farmnndue to our rural location mobile phone signal and the wifi connection can sometimes be weak

Title: The perfect rural village escape in Sussex
Description: welcome to the greenhouse the perfect rural village escape in sussex based in plumpton green close to the historic town of lewes the bright lights of brighton just minutes away from the glorious south downs perfect for plumpton races glyndebourne 10 miles the brighton festival pubs aplenty all offering fantastic food mainline station with direct access from gatwick and london the space the spacenthe greenhouse is situated at the rear of our main house and has its own private parking it is entered via a large sun deck perfect for lazy breakfasts afternoon tea and sundownersnnthe main bedroom features a super comfy double bed clothes storage and some hanging space the double sofa in the main living space can also be pulled out to accommodate two further guests a wellappointed galley kitchen includes a microwave oven two hob rings and all the usual gadgetry to make cooking a cinch if thats not your thing then visit one of the four pubs in the local area or treat yourselves to the fish and chips van tuesday evenings only the village shop also stocks freshly made meals from chaulas indian tiny thai and cooknnbreakfast bread butter jam eggs and juice teafresh coffee will be left for guests to make themselves please note that we provide enough for two days if youre staying any longer consider it a sort of starter kitnnguests will also have use of a padlocked shed to store bikesnnideal for couples but families with babies welcome due to its size we recommend short stays only for parties of more than two

Title: A unique property in a beautiful location
Description: orchard barn is a brand new property located in radwinter end 7 miles from the market town of saffron walden and 15 miles from the city of cambridge downstairs there is an entrance hall toilet with walk in shower fully equipped kitchen and large living room upstairs there is a small toilet and 2 bedrooms with king size beds outside there is plenty of parking and private garden with decking area a peaceful stunning location with panoramic views across fields to bendysh woods the space the spacenorchard barn is a new property recently completed by the owners to a high specification with its own entrance and garden it is situated up a quite rural single track lane offering a peaceful escape with many attractions nearby other things to note other things to notenorchard barn is a strictly nonsmoking property

Title: The Cabin, a Gorgeous Hideaway in Henley on Thames
Description: the cabin henley on thames is a gorgeous space for you to enjoy your holiday surrounded by nature guests have the pleasure of deers walking past the window in the mornings and red kites flying overhead located in the back garden of our house you can walk straight into fields and the beautiful chiltern hills and are only a 5 minute drive 15 minute walk from the centre of the historic town of henley on thamesnnbuilt in 2018 it features underfloor heating and brand new designer fittings the space the spacenthe cabin was newly built in 2018 it features underfloor heating with oak herringbone flooring the shower room has designer philippe starck hans grohe fittings the kitchen is brand new with an induction hob oven and microwave the bedroom features 2 new divan beds which can be used as twins or pushed together to make a super kingsized double should you prefer it has a designer danish clothing rack to hang your clothing and shelf space in the hallway in the living area there is a new desk and table and chairs to enjoy your meals upon there is a comfortable sofa bed to accommodate 2 guests and a tv connected to wifi with amazon prime videonoutside there are decked areas to the front and back which are lovely sun traps perfect to enjoy breakfast lunch or an evening drink on in the summer time guest access guest accessnthe cabin and its front patio and back garden are solely for the guests use only the cabin can be accessed via a woodland path so there is no need to enter the main house other things to note other things to notenwe are truly thankful for the nature around us and are firm believers in limiting the impact on our amazing planet we are therefore striving to make the cabin as sustainable as possible rome wasnt built in a day but we have changed to using refillable soap and sustainably sourced toilet roll any suggestions on how we can further our quest would be greatly appreciated

Title: Beautiful Winterberry Barn ,Romsey
Description: winterberry barn is a gorgeous 1 bedroom cottage with everything you could possibly need for a cosy country getaway every aspect of the property is finished to the highest standard oak finish throughout with raw natural beams flowing through the property to really give it that warm country feel bed setee close to all the wonderful local amenities such as the beautiful market town of romsey only a 5 minute drive also the beautiful historic city of winchester is only situated 15 mins away the space the spacenbeautiful cosy cottage with an open plan kitchen living room areaneverything throughout is finished in english oak the natural oak beams seamlessly add that rustic country feel to the property the natural wooden floors run throughout the bottom level of the propertynnbeing situated right in the heart of the countryside we wanted the property to reflect its surroundings the cottage has a warm country feel as soon as you step in the property and hang up your wellies you really do feel like youre stepping into your own country retreatset in 15 acres of the countrysidennentertainment at the cottage we want you to have every home comfort on the 55 inch flat screen you will have access to netflix amazon primennthe village of braishfield is in itself beautiful and very quiet whilst being very close to all the wonderful local attractions and history of southern englandnnthe oak french doors open up and outside is a comfy seating area with firepit sometimes its nice to stay in have a glass of wine by the fire and stare at the starsnnthere is a rustic oak barn door that separates the loungekitchen areathe lounge has a brand new corner sofa which also doubles up as a sofa bed allowing two more guests to sleep slide the door open and there is a wardrobe area and utilities room with a state of the art washing machine tumble dryer for those wet walks in the countrysidennthe bathroom is brand new finished with luxurious ceramics and a walk in shower with led light functionnnas you come to the glass and oak staircase and are ready to retreat for the night you hit the brand new soft carpets of the upstairs the bedroom is the entire size of the downstairs there is a makeup table which can also double up as a suitable study desk perfect for those who want to relax and still get a little bit of work done toonnthe bed itself is a luxury super king with a state of the art memory foam mattress finished with cosy yet stylistic vibes think cosy with a element of fun a 32 inch tv is hidden away in a window alcove and can be brought out on its bracket for perfect tv viewing in bed and hidden away when not in use the upstairs also features a stunning electric fireplace to really make you feel at homennjust to note we love the seasonal festivities eg halloween and christmas especially so please do expect extravagant decorations around the property during these seasons other things to note other things to notentravel cot and high chair are available on requestngolf clubs can be borrowed free of chargenfree bike use

Title: The Dairy   A Beautiful Cosy Country Retreat
Description: escape to the country in this stylish immaculately clean barn conversion filled with light and surrounded by unspoiled countrysidennas part of a collection of medieval farm buildings the dairy sits at the edge of a sussex water meadow and boasts its own private south facing terracenngreat for anniversaries and quiet celebrations holidays or just time away enjoying the secluded and self contained accommodationnkeypad access can allow you the opportunity for complete independence the space the spacenthe dairy has been beautifully renovated from a c19th brick built barn into a boutique holiday homenpart of a medieval farmstead which dates back to the 14th century it features nna bright open plan livingkitchen space with large bifold doors opening onto a secluded south facing terrace with beautiful rural viewsna lovely separate bedroom and large ensuite shower roomnnthe addition of old mirrors decorative accent pieces and attention to detail make this property a dream location for a quiet getaway or special occasionnnthe dairy has a fully equipped kitchen complete with large fridgefreezer microwave toaster dishwasher rangestyle oven with ceramic hob and a nespresso coffee machinennthere is also a washerdryer should you need itnnunlimited free wifi throughoutnthe lounge area benefits from a 55 inch smart tv with netflix and an award winning samsung soundbar which will also stream your own music via bluetoothna traditional clearview wood burning stove will ensure that your stay is always warm cosy and relaxingnwe supply you with plenty of logs at no extra costnnin the separate bedroom you will find a wonderfully comfortable king size bed from heals of london draped in sumptuous linens and egyptian cotton bed sheetsnthe handcrafted solid oak dressing table can also be used as a convenient work spacenwe have provided a state of the art dyson fan the perfect companion for warm summer nights and a cosy hot water bottle for those frosty eveningsnnthe light and spacious ensuite boasts a large walk in shower beautiful limestone flooring with underfloor heating and ambient lighting egyptian cotton bath sheets and hand towels are provided along with hand wash and shower gelnnoutside there is a large and private south facing terrace with seating and views over the water meadows where you can stroll down to the river uck boundarynit is not uncommon to see herds of passing deer along with the neighbouring sheep and keep an eye out for the beautiful buzzards who have made their home in the surrounding treesnnfor those of you who like to bring a bike away with you we have installed a sturdy outdoor bike rack that will accommodate three bicyclesnna bbq can be available upon request guest access guest accessnthe dairy is detached and set away from the farmhouse your parking is adjacent to the building other things to note other things to notenplease note that mobile phone reception is limited with some operators better than othersnnunfortunately not safe or suitable for children or infantsnnno smoking within the propertynnno dogs or petsnnlimited access and stepsnnplease be aware that we are part of a small sussex farm and as such there may occasionally be the chance of farm related noise for example from a tractor chainsaw grass cutting sheep a dog and grandchildrennnno parties filming or extra guests please

Title: The Barn at The Grove
Description: the barn is a selfcontained recently converted space in the heart of the chilterns it is close to the riverside towns of henleyonthames and marlow and the surrounding chiltern countryside it is located on the edge of the village of frieth with nearby farm shops and local gastropubs within a 5 min drivennthe barn is in a private and peaceful location with offstreet parking it is perfect for couples solo travellers and small families the space the spacenthe space is divided into bedroom bathroom and kitchenliving spacenthe bedroom has a double bed and ample storagenbathroom has bath and shower facilities plus heated towel railnkitchen has an electric hob microwave grill toaster and fridgensitting area has a twoseater sofa armchair television audio equipment and radionthere is underfloor heating throughout and a woodburner for colder eveningsnoutside is a private patio with seatingnthere is a key safe so guests are able to come and go as they pleasenample parking space on a shared drive guest access guest accessnthe barn is a detached building in a corner of the garden guests have exclusive access to the whole building

Title: Rural retreat in the sticks.

Title: Beautiful barn in the hills and woods nr Brighton
Description: idyllically situated down a quiet magical lane our oakframed barn is surrounded by hills and woodland with stunning views on all sides there is instant access to beautiful countryside footpaths and bridleways we are walking distance from a pub with a garden and good homecooked food just an hour from london by train and 10 minutes drive from buzzy cosmopolitan brighton were also close to lots of pretty villages lovely beaches beautiful historic houses and gardens the space the spacenthe barn is in the garden of our rambling old tudor cottage which is neighbouring perpendicular to the barnnbarn layoutnthere are two bedrooms upstairs one with two singles and one with a kingsized bed downstairs in the openplan living space there is a sofa bed which can be used if there are six people staying we also have a single zbed which can be added to the room with two singles ideal for families with three children sharing

Title: Enchanted Glade Tiny house
Description: return to nature with comfort and easenthe perfect eco retreat in our off grid wooden cabin or luxury bell tents nestled within the enormous magical gardens of a private estatenrelax and unwind in the serenity of our wild spa with only pheasants and deer as neighboursnwe are located in the heart of sussex area of outstanding natural beauty aonbnexcellently located only 30 miles from central london and 45 mins brighton the perfect getaway to return to a sense of peace and tranquility the space the spacenthe perfect staycation so close to london and brighton yet feels like a million miles awaynsocial distancing and bubble friendly holidaysnit is possible to hire the entire glade to yourselves and have it as a private partyfamily gathering please message me for detailsnnour enchanted glade is set in a magical garden in the middle of a working farm on a plateau in the high weald intersected by deep wooded valleys with sandstone outcrops we are an area of outstanding natural beauty and a site of special scientific interest yet within 10 miles of gatwick and 35 miles of central londonnnour gardens comprise some rare and exotic himalayan species first laid out in 1865 the avenue of californian redwoods includes some of the tallest trees in england and our woods contain bluebells mosses lichens and briophytes amongst spectacular sandstone outcropsnnwe offernn1 wooden cabin sleeps 4 2 adults2 children there is a sofa that can be used as a bed and one inflatable mattress the cabin has its own private basic kitchen plus barbecue outsidenplease note that this is a tiny house and for larger families the tents are a better option see our alternative listing for the tentsnn 3x luxury bell tents with furniture and decor decking and wood burners very comfortable and cosy sleeps 2 adults and 2 children single mattresses for the kids please bring sleeping bagsnnwood fired hot tub under the stars seats 6 available for two hour slots for an extra 45 booking in advance requirednnmissing link brewery and cafe are onsite and open every weekend with different food vans and events check their website for specific detailsnnour wild spa massagefull body oil or thai yoga massage nature connection life coaching creative arts workshops booking in advancennforagingwild banquet experience with our fully insured and very experienced local forager fergus drennon who writes regularly on wild food and foraging for bbc countryfile magazine the ecologist country kitchen bushcraft and survival skills magazine as well as contributing andor featuring in many other magazines including most national newspapers he has also appeared on tvnnshared compost toilet with hot shower in the redwood forestnnshared fire pit for all to enjoynnthere is an undercover basic kitchen with sink running water gas cooker basic utensils and bbq for the campersnnthere are so many beautiful walks to explore locally within our boundaries and on public pathwaysnn boulders and caves to explorenn paintball and clay pigeon shooting is available onsite and there are so many local attractions see our fb page for regular updatesnn excellently located in the middle of so many wonderful local attractions including two reservoirs and ashdown forest see my guestbooknnplease note although bedding is provided towels are notplease bring your own tea and coffee is provided but not breakfastnenough wood to heat the cabin for both evenings is provided additional wood costs 10 a sacknthere is currently no fridge available please bring a cool box if requirednthere is lighting and a usb port in the cabin but other than that there is no electricity guest access guest accessnplease note it is a 10 min walk from the parking spot to the site we will meet you with our 4x4 on arrival and help you with bags to and from the site plus offer wheelbarrows bring suitable comfortable walking shoes and clothing for all weathers there are many private and public pathways that you will be able to access from our gladenalso as we are on a private estate there is a security gate this will be locked after 11pm other things to note other things to notenit is possible to book a veg or breakfast hamper in advance 25 from the local farm or to have meals delivered please let us know if you are interested in thisnnthere is a local co op shop in shaprthorne village which is 5 mins drive there is also a village shop with local organic producennplawhatch biodynamic farm shop is open 6 days a week and is 10 mins drivenn forest bathing our compost toilet and hot shower is a 1 min walk from the cabinnnwild spanprivate wood fired hot tub under the stars n45 per 2 hr session can seat 6 peoplennfull body massage deep tissue or thai yoga massage available onsite for 55 ppnthis can include a cupping therapy sessionnnwood fired sauna 45 per session nnwild food foraging and fireside cooking experienceincludes nature awareness exercises some basic bushcraft skills 15 hr walk exploring the area and learning about edible and medicinal plants plus a delicious meal cooked on the fire including all the foraged items 200 for up to 6 peoplennplease note that we welcome acoustic music by the fire but drums speakers and sound systems are not allowednwe must ensure peace and tranquillity for all our guests and the people who live on sitennthere is an 11pm curfew in terms of music in the glade and also returning back onsite the security gate will be locked after this nn after some bad experiences we have sadly decided to be a no dog site we are truly sorry for those we cannot accommodate as a result of this

Title: Gamekeeper's Cottage, near Sissinghurst Castle
Description: sissinghurst castle and its famous gardens are only a 15 minute woodland walk away from this peaceful and tranquil one bedroom cottage which is set in private grounds of 18 acres and surrounded by woods and wildlife gamekeeper cottage is the perfect retreat for getting away from it all at all times of year but is only one hour from london by train the cottage dates from 1798 and sits directly opposite the main house the wood burner makes it a cosy and romantic getaway sleeps 24 the space the spacenthis charming one bedroom cottage is over 200 years old and has been beautifully restored retaining many of its original features including the wooden beams a very large window provides great views to the gardens large pond and impressive eucalyptus trees beyondnnthe double bedroomnnthe cottage has recently been extended and now includes a large double bedroom which is light and airy and has wonderful views to the pond and beyond the french doors open onto a large patio area where guests can relax and enjoy the pond the wildlife and extensive garden area a barbecue is available please note that the extension has not yet been completed so there are no photos yet it will be completed at the end of march 2022nnthe open plan living room and mezzanine sleeping areannthe living room has a large window providing fantastic views to the pond and gardens there is a very comfortable sofa dining table and chairs as well as the woodburner the bathroom has a shower toilet and sink the kitchen area has an electric ovenhob and fridge freezer the comfortable double bed is on a mezzanine level accessed by a steepish staircasennplease note that although the cottage can sleep up to 4 guests it is quite small for 4nnthe woodburnernthe wood burner is a favourite feature of our guests providing warmth and a cosy atmosphere all wood and kindling is provided the wood is sustainably sourced from trees coppiced on the property there are also electric heaters for those who dont want to light a firennnthe outside areanoutside the cottage there is a large patio area where guests can relax and enjoy the pond and wildlife there is a table and chairs and a barbecue guest also have exclusive access to the extensive beautiful garden area around the pondnnthere is also a magical circle of oak bbqsitting area in the woodland which is completely secluded and is a great favourite of our guests located in the middle of a circle of ancient oak trees it is a wonderful spot to light a fire and listen to the bird lifennwe have excellent wifi superfast fibre to the property with a download speed of 900 megabytes per secondnnsissinghurst castle and its world renowned gardens is only a short walk away by public footpath through enchanting woods the property adjoins the sissinghust castle estate so all you need to do is walk to the top of the drive cross the road and you are immediately in the grounds of sissinghurst castle the castle itself is about 15 minutes walk away through an enchanting woodnngamekeepers cottage provides a great retreat at all times of year in autumn and winter it is cosy and atmospheric with the roaring fire and wonderful crisp walks on your doorstep spring and summer are spectacular with the garden of england as kent is known blossoming and coming to life bluebell season which is usually in may is a particular favourite with carpets of bluebells in the woodsnnthe local wildlife is plentiful as well as the resident ducks and chickens there are many badgers foxes and deer in the woodlands surrounding the cottage in the dead of night you will hear the owls hooting and the dawn chorus of the numerous birds will greet you at day breaknnthe area has many excellent pubs some of which are over 500 years old they all serve very good food and first class local beer the milkhouse in sissinghurst and the three chimneys in biddenden are both one mile awaynnthere are many other national trust properties nearby including castles stately homes and gardens the charming village of cranbrook is 3 miles away and the cinque port of rye with the golden sands of camber 30 minutes by car london is one hour away by train and canterbury one hour there are many beautiful walks in the immediate vicinity many of which can be started from the cottage itselfnnnvineyardsnnthe area is also known for some of the finest vineyards in england biddenden vineyards hush heath and chapel down are a short drive awaynnyogannhenrietta is a fully qualified british school of yoga instructor and teaches from beginner level to advanced classes can be arranged directly with her either in the main house or outside in spring and summer guest access guest accessnparking is immediately outside the cottage other things to note other things to notenwe have excellent wifi superfast fibre broadband with a download speed of 900 megabytes per second however we have a limited mobile phone signal due to a poor signal from the main exchange if you switch on wifi calling on your phone then calls work well in the apartment if this does not work and you do need to make a call there is a good signal at the top of the drive and you are welcome to use the landline in the main housennplease note that the main beam in the cottage is 6 feet 2 inches high and the double bed at the mezzanine level can only be accessed from one side public transport is limited and the country roads are not pedestrian friendly so ideally it is better to come with your own transport alternatively taxis can be booked through the local firm mtc taxis

Title: The Acorn - Deep cleaned and FLEXIBLE C-19 changes
Description: brand new detached house in an elevated position above a quiet rural lane great night skies and horses in the field next door outside sitting area and private parking lovely king sized double bed with views and high quality bedding local eggs provided for breakfast the acorn is in the heart of the village so its very easy to walk anywhere and find 3 great pubs there is also a coop store in the village fully refundable booking settings the space the spacenwe have stayed in many places and tried to take the good parts from each to make the acorn comfortable and relaxing for you there is a stereo and an ekornes stressless relaxing leather chair in the main bedroom downstairs is a leather sofa and an extendable dining table to seat 4 and an electric shower in the bathroomnnin the fridge will be milk and local free range eggs there are cereals and various teas and a new frying pannwe have 2 travel cots and a high chair should you need themnnwe can put another mattress upstairs if needed so it would be possible to sleep 5nnthere is a lady in the village who can make chocolate brownies or victoria sponge cake at 3 days notice 10 each so let us know if you might like to try one guest accessnyou will have the whole house along with an outside sitting area and space to park 2 carsnwe also have a large childrens trampoline in our garden which any children can use at their own risk please just walk round any time the post code is mk45 4bg other things to notenthe house is up a short but a little steep drive which some people may find difficult to walk updown however there is parking available at both the top and bottom so no need to walk it

Title: Stansted Airport - Luxury Annexe with Parking
Description: the accommodation is separate from our house and has its own entrancenwe provide a basic breakfast essentials ie bread fresh milk tea coffee etcnfree off road parking for duration of your staynairport transfers availablenyou will require a car as we are in a rural locationnimportant note if there is any antisociable behaviour or taking of any illegal substances by any member of your group you will all be immediately dismissed from the property and there will be no refunds given the space the spacenthe spacennthe annexe in a quiet rural location near stansted airport and wedding venues it has 2 bedrooms with the main bedroom having a double bed and the 2nd bedroom having 2 single beds in the living area there is a double sofa bed and a corner sofa suite table and chairs and a 40 tv the living room and main bedroom have views of the peaceful garden which you have access to the courtyard has a seating area which you can sit outside and enjoy a cup of coffee or something strongernnthere is shower room with toilet and wash basin and we provide shampoo conditioner and body washnnin the kitchen you will have access to kettle toaster microwave and washing machine we provide a basic breakfast tea coffee cereal fresh milk spreadsnnthere is an electric hob george foreman grill and microwave as cooking facilities i also provide pans and cooking utensils other things to note

Title: Private, tranquil lakeside en-suite hut,
Description: fantastic scenic location with superb views over open countryside towards the south downs adults only pets extra fee cosy quiet accommodation with all mod cons and surrounded by wildlife of all kinds shower room en suite fully equipped kitchen with cooker microwave fridgefreezer washing machine available nearby woodburner free basket of logs welcome pack with rolls croissants juice water tea coffee sugar condiments footpaths nearby to local villages disc for 3 nights the space the spacenaround 20acres of farmlakewoodland areas with glorious views and surrounded by wildlife of all kinds great fishing with many varieties available over 3 lakes must have current license guest access guest accessnall areas accessible except where livestock kept pointed out by host on arrival dogs to be kept on lead except in designated areas other things to note other things to notenramp up to balcony for wheelchairdisabled users but small space inside hut compact living area under bed storage drawers utiiity room with hot water washup and washing machine has larger shower and toilet rooms with grab rails could be ok for wheelchairdisabled users

Title: Charming cottage with stunning views -dog friendly
Description: dog friendly charming unique ancient cottage with uninterupted far reaching views of the sussex countryside perfectly placed for guests who wish to explore the countryside visit the historical 1066 town of battle within walking distance or venture slightly further to the seaside hastings 8m camber sands 17m bexhill 10m the space the spacenfamily accommodation suitable for up to 4 guests the cottage benefits from a large decking area overlooking stunning countryside viewsnfully equipped kitchen with oven fridge freezer microwave cooking utensilsndedicated barbecue area within the well maintained gardens that surround the cottage tv and wifi also providedncarport parking for one carnplease note the inglenook fireplace is a beautiful feature but unfortunately due to the age of the cottage is not functional for live firesnguests will receive a complimentary welcome pack including milk tea and coffeenthis property is a strictly nonsmoking venuenup to 2 dogs would be welcomednncovid 19 cleaning will always be carried out between guests using a professional fogging machine with hypochlorous acid hoci which is a hospital grade disinfectant that is also organic and environmentally friendly

Title: Luxury Blackdown Shepherds Hut in Surrey Hills
Description: our shepherds hut is situated within 40 acres of woodland orchard and garden in an area of outstanding beauty set high with stunning views of the surrey hills glorious sunsets and an abundance of bird life are often seen from the hut and within the kilnhanger estate although remote the hut is positioned close to our cottage for security privacy is still available and you may park your vehicle adjacent to the hutnour hut is not only cool in the summer but cosy in the winter the space the spacenshepherds hut contains kitchennete with a fridge and two electric hobs for cooking no oven shower towel rail toilet and double bed with electric radiator to provide warmth on those cold days guest access guest accessnyou are free to explore the estate woodland and pastures but please be aware of horses and their riders that use the estate other things to note other things to notenas we provide a continental breakfast please advise if there are any dietary requirementsnnfor convenience there is private parking adjacent to the hut

Title: Luxurious Shepherds Hut + Private Garden & Views
Description: our cosy and luxurious hut is suitable for singles couples that appreciate the finer things in life the accommodation comprises an ensuite power showerroom compact kitchen dining area and double bed facilities includes freeview tvradio wifi and log burning stove fuel we provide tea coffee milk crusty bread butter olive oil various condiments and fresh eggs from our own happy chickens the private garden with bbq furniture has fantastic views parking space own entrance the space the spacenthe pilgrims hut and surrounding lower garden is a perfect romantic retreat and is all your private space it includes garden chairs and table grass rug with bbq and there are stunning views across the valley there is also a dedicated parking space and your own private entrancennthe main garden with high hedgerows and mature pond is the equivalent of a woodland glade and is a haven for bird life crows jays green and greater spotted woodpeckers and of course herons are all regular visitors and buzzards can be seen circling high above bullfinch and nuthatch are more exotic but frequent visitors and during summer nights there are hunting bats and sometimes owls to hoot you to sleep you are welcome to wander these areas as they are enjoyed by us allnnin spring and summer the pheasants return to the garden and mallard ducks to the pond to mate in late february toads wake up from hibernation and begin migrating to their breeding pond in pilgrims garden to spawn and their croaking sounds give the gardens an equatorial feel unfortunately the temperature doesnt match guest access guest access

Walnut Lodge

A pet friendly converted Barn
Description: a lovely light and airy space with a dining roomliving room space downstairs there is no proper kitchen space but we do provide a toaster kettle microwave and fridgennbathroom also downstairs with double walk in shower loo and sinknnlovely bedroom upstairs with king size bed and velux windowsnntravel cot and high chair for children available on request along with anything else we can help you with the space the spacenenjoy your own access through a shared drive very quiet a private part of the world great overhead shower tv dining area fridge and bedroom easy to use sofa bed for children and 3rd guests other things to note other things to notenthe bathroom sink plug lever is behind the taps some guests think that it is a push plug

Title: Idyllic Shepherd's Hut near Chieveley
Description: one of the top 30 quirky places to stay in the uk chosen by muddystilletos travel guide sleeping two the hut is perfect for couples friends or solo travellers it is close to beautiful walks local pubs farm shops and historic towns or simply a place to unwind read a good book and get back to nature the space the spacenbeautiful bespoke shepherds hut built on the chassis of an original hut found in a nearby copse located in the hamlet of beedon common an area of outstanding natural beauty just a few miles away from chieveley and j13 of the m4 surrounded by fields there is access directly onto byways and footpaths so perfect for anyone keen on walking or cycling the nearby villages of peasemore beedon and chieveley are within walking distance and have super pubs for a drink or bite to eat there are plenty of activities within a short drive from national trust properties to canal boat rides to quirky tea shops or historic market towns more information in the welcome pack once you have booked the hut itself is in a paddock separate from our garden which also houses a large lilly pond and a few chickens so lovely fresh eggs for breakfast beautiful views face across the fields to the west and across the pond to the east we do have dogs ourselves and welcome your furry friends provided they can be trusted with other dogs and chickens the shepherds hut bed can pull out to make a double or folded away to make a single the hut is warm and cosy thanks to proper insulation a discreet heater and a traditional log burning stove plenty of wood provided there is a dab radio for your use as well as a supply of traditional games and a book swap there is currently no bathroom in the paddock but a modern shower room and toilet is set aside for guest use in the barn next to the main house literally 10 seconds walk through the garden for cooking there is a baby belling stove hob grill and oven inside the hut with cutlery cooking utensils and tea making facilities there is a small fridge in the shelter next to the hut for breakfast fresh eggs bread milk juice tea fresh coffee and condiments will be provided there is electricity inside the hut and cold running water is available outside there is a hammock picnic bench and a beautiful oak framed shelter with outdoor wood burner for keeping warm and cosy when sun goes down over the best views in berkshire

Title: The Studio: rural riverside setting near Oxford
Description: formerly the manor house gymnasium the studio now provides comfortable accommodation for two people it consists of an open plan sitting roombedroom separate kitchen and shower roomnthe accommodation is situated in the grounds of a riverside manor farm bordering the river thames and is close to oxford on a direct bus route blenheim palace and the cotswolds guest access guest accessnthe studio has access to 10 acres of gardens and water meadows leading down to the thames path and river thames other things to note other things to notenplease note there is high end glamping on site in the summer season

Title: Mary's Cabin
Description: completely peaceful with fantastic viewstotally isolated with its own private entrancenset in the chiltern hills marys cabin is 2minutes stroll from the restaurant of the yearnin an area of outstanding natural beautywalking road mountain biking pub 7minutes up through the woodsn35mins from heathrow and oxford central london50mins ncouples solo adventurers and small families with 1small childnnsadly since the advent of covid we no longer provide breakfast for our guests the space the spacenset isolated in the garden marys cabin looks across the valley with woods on each side atop the hill you can see for 3milesnthe space consists of one room with double bed sattv internet microwave fridge and kettle a shower room with toilet and sink guest access guest accessnnormally we try to meet you as you arrive or failing this there are instructions the cabin will be open for you other things to note other things to notenplease note that sadly with the advent of covid19 we no longer supply breakfast gratis

Title: High Weald country side Log Cabin on Cattle farm
Description: located on a working cattle farm this cosy log cabin has enough space to comfortably be occupied by up to 7 people with plenty of garden space complete with picnic tables bbq and a fishing pond the farm itself is found in the centre of the high weald area of outstanding natural beauty and is surrounded by numerous castles bedgebury forest and bewl reservoir in addition to the views only a short drive away are plenty of shopping towns a cinema and bowling complex other things to note other things to notenpets are welcome we have 2 dogs and 2 cats who roam the garden freely

Title: Swan Cabin on Taggs Island
Description: a purpose built cabin in the garden of our river home seahorse which overlooks the river thames with views of ash island you will be welcomed into a tranquil comfortable unique retreat with all the amenities you need for a perfect stay with us the space the spacensituated on taggs island off the hampton court road you can drive over the islands bridge left along the road and park in our gravel driveway next to the cabin it has wonderful views of the river thames and the sun pours in through the windows all day we have an enchanting garden and the wildlife of the river is all around us as well as offering comfortable contemporary living space you will also have exclusive use of the adjacent patio area in the garden with outdoor seating to sit and contemplate the river or just read and relaxnnwe have a dog called dilly and a cat called milo there are in the garden from time to time but we will make sure they dont bother younnour guests have the entire cabin which includes a bedroom bathroom and living room there is also a kettle toaster coffee machine microwave and fridge please note there is no hob or oven there is also a smart tv with internet connectionnnthe cabin is entirely electric there is no gas boilernnplease also note that the 10 cleaning fee is for up to a 7 day stay and thereafter weeklynnmake the most of your stay by visiting one of the many places of interest around hampton court the cabin is just a fiveminute walk to londons second largest royal park bushy park and only a fifteen minute walk away from hampton court palace central london can be reached by train from hampton court or kingston stations into waterloo there are regular buses the 111 r68 and 216 which stop just by the taggs island bridge we also have many festivals and concerts locally both at hampton court including the annual flower show and hampton court pool open air concerts more information on the local area restaurants pubs and cafes can be provided we are happy to help you with any information you neednkingston is also a great shopping centre and with more riverside restaurants

Title: The Grange (Annex Apartment)
Description: what better way to isolate yourself and your family with a completely self contained hideawaynsituated in the remote country village of broughton the village boasts popular and quaint pub renowned for its food the crown the annex is detached from the main house loungekitchen area bathroom two ground floor bedrooms with a third double situated in what was a hay loft not suitable for children under 14 years of age recently refurbishednample parking on the drive for 2 to 3 cars the space the spacenthree bedroomed isolated and separate property but priced for either 1 person through to a maximum of 6nnthe property is situated right in the countryside and is very peaceful quiet and surrounded by lovely countryside fields a few sheep horses and of course gorgeous walks to nearby villages and yes with a welcoming pub or two at the endnnthis is a newly renovated property done to a high standard with brand new furniture oven and bathroom the kitchen is fully equipped and operational with plates cultery etc provided tea coffee and sugar available after your journey and before you hit the local storesnmost cooking equipment is available including kettle toaster etcncleaning equipment hand wash washing up liquid bowl all provided for fridge and freezer included within the property guest access guest accessnguests will have sole access to the annex during their stay along with access to the driveway for off road and secure parking for up to three cars as requirednnin addition given the desire of many to socially distance please note there is a key safe allowing self check in the property is disinfected between guests and is a real retreat for those looking for that ultimate getaway or stop over for the wedding or party you are attending

Title: Willow Cottage - Sleeps 4, Benenden Kent
Description: we recently converted an outbuilding into a two bedroom house the house is detached and purpose built we aimed to create a space that was bright airy and incorporated the gorgeous woodland and farmland around usnwhen you stay with us you can expect to be in a peaceful rural setting with stunning views which can be admired from either the patio or through the large bifold doors leading from the main living area the space the spacenthe downstairs has a lovely open plan kitchen and sitting room with oak beams throughout the upstairs has a large double and a twin room with window seats and a stunning apex window offering fabulous views across the kentish countryside the shower room is also located upstairsnneach bedroom has cotton linen quality mattresses and egyptian cotton towels a travel cot and clip on highchair are available for smaller visitors downstairs the well equipped kitchen has everything you would need to cook up a feast the cottage has wifi and free view television and a washer dryer guest access guest accessnyou have full run of the cottage with your own private patio and views across the fields you have your own parking space outside the cottage other things to note other things to notena full refund will be made if guests are unable to travel due to the covid19 restrictionsna local catering company seasons wild free can deliver fresh ready made food to the cottage by prior arrangement please follow the link below for more details wwwseasonswildandfreecomnnnnnnnnnnnnnnhttpswwwseasonswildandfreecomwpcontentuploads201806decadentlywildfreezefinal1308pdf

Title: The little Annexe
Description: the little annexe is a self contained detached unit set within our farmland near rural warninglid we are located within the high weald area of outstanding natural beauty access to public footpaths allow you entry into the beautiful woodlands and surrounds ideally situated 6 miles from both horsham and haywards heath only a 15 min drive to gatwick airport we are also local to event venues including slaugham place cisswood hyde estate brookfield barn bolney wine estate south lodge the space the spacenkitchen appliances include a microwave oven coffee machine kettle toaster and fridgensugar coffee tea is also providednwe really hope you enjoy your stay and hope we have made it as comfortable as possible guest access guest accessnthere is separate entrance for guests off road parking for your car other things to note other things to notenwe are making every effort to ensure that you and ourselves are at the least risk during these unprecedented times please let us know immediately if you are displaying any covid19 symptoms we would rather refund your stay then put youus at risk many thanks

Title: Twmbarlwm Luxury Retreat - Dingle Cabin
Description: we also offer another brand new cabin twmbarlwm luxury retreat barnfields cabin sleeps 6nnluxury holiday cabin in the risca countryside of twmbarlwm built discretely into the hills this cabin has been crafted for a relaxing vacation the cabin has been built with great care and installed with the best insulation to ensure a peaceful nights sleepnn free welcome packn private hot tub firepitgrill 20 for your entire stay pay when youre heren extra logs 10sack the space the spacenlocated near twmbarlwm you are free to walk the entire common with a vast area to ride we are just a 20min ride to some of the best mountain biking trails and downhill tracks in the uknnas for the farm itself we are happy to share the space and view our animals guest access guest accessnthis cabin is hidden away from the farmhouse and is very private other things to note other things to notenplease respect other guests with noise and common decency must be used in and around the private hot tub area

Title: Toad Hall Luxury Lodge with Private Hot Tub
Description: toad hall is our luxury lodge treehouse in the woods at happy valley norfolk with incredible views across open unspoilt countryside with a private hot tub suitable for 4 adults 2 children under floor heating oven hob toaster kettle fridge wet room king size accommodation bbq part disablepram friendly ideally located close to sandringham houghton the north norfolk coast 15 mins from kings lynn station perfect retreat to immerse in nature wifi4gbox the space the spacenopen plan gable living room kitchen wet room king size bedroom downstairs with double doors opening onto morning terrace watch the sunset on the west facing terrace double bedroom and space for children to sleep wet room and fully functional kitchen private hot tub suitable for up to 4 adults and 2 children there are space saving stairs to the first floor these are quite steep there is a stair gate at the top but not at the bottom something to note if you have small children outdoor dining bbq the ground floor is part disabled friendly anyone booking must be able to open doors independently for easy escape covid measures in place guest access guest accessna rural escape surrounded by woodland and open views the lodge is hired as a whole and consists of king bedroom double fitted kitchen with oven sink hob fridge living space looking across open farmland the ground floor is part disabled friendly anyone booking must be able to open doors independently for easy escape other things to note other things to notenhot tub may not have reached temperature on arrival due to the measures we are putting in place for covid bedding is provided but please strip covers and sheets and place in laundry bag provided when you leave toad hall stands alone and is private there are blinds in the gable end and bedroom no other curtains etc so you can appreciate the rural viewsnyou have to drive up a farm track to reach the lodge all types of vehicles can drive up here you do not need a 4x4 downstairs has king bedroom wetroom living room and kitchen oven hob toaster kettle etc we are a rural destination nestled in the woods on a traditional norfolk working farm situated on a norfolk wildlife trust space saving stairs to first floor these are steeper than house stairs stair gate at the top not at the bottom the hot tub may not be hot on arrival due to covid deep cleaning please leave lid on and do not press buttons as this will not speed up heating times there is a play area for children on the main glamping site you will need towels and to bring woodland appropriate footwear wifi isnt the best but thats due to the rural setting not good enough for streaming 4g in places a holiday to connect in nature and reconnect with each otherthe ground floor is part disabled friendly anyone booking must be able to open doors independently for easy escape

Title: Alton forest lodge
Description: alton forest lodge is a unique woodland hidaway set in beuatiful ancient forest on the edge of the peak district national park the space the spacena spacious woodland lodge sleeps up to 12 people located in the stunning dimmingsdale heritage woodland this bueatiful one time youth hostel is clad in waney edge larch and nestles superbly into the sourounding forest gaze out from the traditional wood fired hottub into the woodland night or just lie back close your eyes and listen to the woodpeckersnnwith a 100 square meter decking area the lodge is well equiped for outdoor livingnninside you will find further luxoury a large living area equipped with modern open plan kitched with large state of the art range cooker looks over the dining area with huge handbuilt pitch pine dining table following onto a generous lounge area with comfy sofas 42 led tv and a log burning stove the room also benefits from a bespoke library wall covered in hundreds of booksnnthree large bedrooms are all individualy designed and can sleep up to 4 people bed layout for each room can be tailored to every booking just let us know if you want single beds double beds or a mix in each room and we ll arrange it all before you arrivennthe lodge has 2 bathrooms each is tiled from floor to ceiling the larger of the 2 fitted with a triple sized shower cubicle and both boasting modern power showersnngas central heating throughout a logburner in the lounge and our handbuilt double glazed windows ensure that you ll be toasty warm on the coldest of nightsnndimmingsdale is covered in a beautiful ancient woodland the woods have dozens of footpaths which allow ramblers to discover its natural beauty year round the area is also a very popular mountain biking area with trails from the family friendly xc routes all the way up to the gnarly and steep enduro and downhill tracks rock climbing is also on offer as dimmingsdale boasts some of englands finest sandstone bouldering crags all within walking distance of the lodge even with a heavy mat on your backnnset right on the edge of the beautiful and popular peak district national park youll find the lodge an ideal base from which to explorennalton towers is just 2 miles from the lodge too so if you fancy a few theme park thrills youre in just the right placennthank you for reading about our lodge we look forward to welcoming you to dimmingsdale

Title: Ash Cabin at Bramblewoods with stunning  views
Description: our handcrafted ensuite wooden cabin is located within a small wood on the grounds of working sheep farm with an uninterrupted view across the valley in picturesque shropshirenit has everything you need to retreat from the real world whether its for a cosy night in in front of the log burner or a chance to sit and stargaze on the decknthere is an abundance of walks right from your doorstep youre even lucky enough to have the offas dyke within a stones throw from the cabin the space the spacenhandmade timber cabin set on a working sheep farm within a small wooded area with uninterrupted views across the valleynthe cabin is finished to a very high standard with an ensuite shower room compact kitchen dining area for two lounge area with log burnernoutside the cabin is a secure deck area with 2 lounge seats and a double hammock its a perfect space to bring your well behaved 4legged friend other things to note other things to notenimportant to note that there is no regular tv due to how isolated the cabin is there is a smart tv so guests can log into their netflix or prime accounts to watch tv onlinennthere is limited phone signal depending on your provider there is wifi for wifi callingnnthis site is adult only and not suitable for children

Title: Shepherd‚Äôs Rest, camping pod with hot tub.
Description: nestled in the heart of the forest of bowland aonb this glamping pod is ideal for hikers and bikers who want a base more substantial than a tent and less fuss than a hotel want privacy with absolutely nobody else around we can almost guarantee you wont see a single person while youre at the pod so you can sit back and enjoy the stunning panoramic views that stretch for miles over the dunsop and ribble valleys from the hot tub champagne in hand with nobody to disturb you the space the spacenthe shepherds rest is set in its own valley with panoramic views its location makes it the perfect escape from the hustle and bustle of everyday life anyone who stays at the pod will have great access to walks cycling and adventure gisburn forest mountain bike trails is a 15 minute drive there a plenty of walks to do in the area and some great places to eat outnnthe pod is made out of a solid wood frame and boasts three sides of glass to fully take in the panoramic views the pod is split in half with one side providing a comfortable and relaxing living area there is a log burner sofa bed and kitchen unit in this side of the pod the other side of the pod is the bedroom and bathroom complete with double bed toilet sink and showernnthe hot tub is located on decking outside the pod and backs onto an old barn in the field the hot tub is filled with natural spring water it is a beautiful experience to sit in the hot tub as sunset falls over the valley

Title: Beautiful Tiny House with private hot tubs
Description: le domaine des hauts de canche magnificent tiny house with brand new private spanthis atypical accommodation is quietly located on the edge of the forest a few minutes drive from downtown touquet paris plagendecorated with care and comfort you can enjoy a wide choice of services such as ordering meals on reservation 48 hours before possibility of having the menu card on request bike rental or breakfast service the space the spacenthe kitchen is equipped with an electric hob refrigerator microwave electric oven coffee maker kettle and cooking essentialsnin the living room the sofa is convertible and you have a dining areanupstairs you will find a double bed 160x190 cmnthe bathroom on the ground floor has a walkin shower a sink and a toilet hair dryer on sitentelevision with a wide choice of channelsnoutside your tiny house you can enjoy a large roof terrace making 23 of your home as well as another terrace on the ground floor where you can have your meals or enjoy the garden around you its private spa will allow you to relax in the song of birds guest access guest accessnenjoy access to your home and private jacuzzi not to mention the garden surrounding your tiny house other things to note other things to notenfollowing a few disappointments music is accepted outdoors with a low volume of sound in order to respect the tranquility of the neighborhood it is forbidden after 10 pmnthe fireworks rockets and firecrackers are prohibitednthe spa is no longer allowed after 11 pm smoking in it is prohibitednwe do not accept more than one dognthe decorations like banners are not allowednin case of conflict andor complaint we reserve the right to exclude the person responsible for the disorder

Title: Woodland Winter Cabin with Hot tub & log burner
Description: the woodlands cabin is situated in our peaceful woodland in the heart of snowdonia it has a shower hot water included and wc and washbasin no hot water in the washbasinnlighting is provided from a 12v solar panel systemna log burner is provided with free wood and fire lightersnthere is a double bednthe private wood fired hot tub is situated on a balcony overlooking the woodland areanpet friendlynoutside heating is provided the space the spacenthis unique glamping experience has everything you need for a restful and idyllic break from everyday life wake up to bird song and the sound of the stream enjoy your own exclusive hot tub whilst sipping a glass of bubbly our hut is fully insulated and has everything you need for that perfect rustic getaway without compromising on quality and conveniencennall bedding and towels are included in your stay you may like to bring extra towels for hot tub usagenna small log burner inside to keep you nice and cosynnthere is limited telephone signal other things to note other things to notenthings we do providenin the kitchen we provide a single gas camping stove and kettle the kitchen area is full equipped including a cool box you may like to bring ice with you there is no hot water in the kitchen sinknin the bathroom there is a shower wc and washbasin hot water is provided in the shower cubicle onlynthere is a wood burner and wood and fire lighters are provided freennplease note that this is an eco cabin the lighting is 12v system run off solar panelsnnoutside seating is provided

Title: Odli Pod- Mountain views. Hot Tub. Farm Stay.
Description: odli glamping pod is situated on a picturesque working sheep and beef family farm in the heart of the mid wales countryside both cosy and private it is a place to snuggle down and unwindnnpositioned in its own private field the site is surrounded by rolling fields and farreaching views to the berwyn mountains there is flora and fauna and plenty of wildlife to see with red kites and buzzards circling above and our livestock roaming in the fields the space the spacena perfect couples retreat or the ideal family funfilled break away the pod has all the modern comforts a fully equipped kitchen with a belfast sink fridgefreezer electric hob microwave kettle and toaster and a nespresso coffee machinennthe bathroom has a wc sink electric shower with plenty of hot water and a towel radiatornnthe double bed has a memory foam mattress dressed with a goose down duvet with crisp cotton bedlinen there is a double sofa bed for 2 additional guests aged 2 16nnall linen and towels are providednnthere is an outside seating area with a firepit with grill so you can relax with a glass of wine and listen to the sounds of nature in the evenings and enjoy the stargazing the first basket of logs will be providednnyou will also have exclusive use of your very own private 40 jet american hot tub positioned next to the podnnalthough the pod is great for summer days with underfloor heating and excellent insulation wifi and a 32 smart tv with netflix it still makes the perfect winter getawaynnthere is a private entrance to the site with parking and a 60m stroll down a gravel path to the pod

Title: Alexa Lodge with private hot and sauna
Description: situated in the beautiful village of hurst green in the heart of the ribble valleyyou will find our brand new lodgea true romantic get awayalexa lodge offers guests spacious 5 star quality accommodationset in a peaceful setting with far reaching viewsyet within a 5 minute walk to 2 fantastic pubs and the village cafehurst green the winner of several best kept village awards oozes characterand a wealth of history with the iconic stoneyhurst collegeand the tolkein trail on your doorstep the space the spacenalexa lodge is a true home from home with all the mod consa fabulous fitted kitchensumptuous bedroom with superking size zip and link bedwhich can create twin beds if necessarya stunning bathroom with a walk in shower big enough for 2smart tv with free netflix packagewifiand amazon alexa for your convenienceoutside is a large flagged patio with your very own covered hot tuband a private sauna guest access guest accessnguest access via lock box code 1234

Title: Oak Lodge - Lakeside Retreat
Description: oak lodge is our largest lakeside lodge perfect for families of 4 couples wanting that extra bit of space or mixed groupsnnthe outside decking child friendly is simply fantastic floating high above our lakes with stunning views across the water and beyond you wont want to go insidennwith open plan kitchen diner lounge and patio doors to the decking area its a fantastic communal space the fire pit barbque and lawn area is also just out the front ready to go the space the spacenour lakeside lodges are set on headlands farm fishery 18 acres of outstanding natural countryside with two lakes and away from noise and light pollution our guests are entitled to walk around the lakes and grounds dogs must be on leads at all timesnnoak lodge is nestled into the trees with private parking just outside decking access to our lakes and totally privatennoak lodge has a cosy double bedroom with plenty of space for luggage and hanging a separate bunk bed room with 2 full sized single beds large shower room with luxury organic toiletries a fully equipped kitchen with everything you require and a spacious lounge and diner with tvnnhelp yourself to breakfast which includes selection of cereals sliced bread loaf fresh farm eggs milk orange juice jam butter tea coffee sugarnnalternatively enjoy our on site coffee shop headlands farm coffee shop for a freshly cooked breakfast lunch and afternoon tea as well as fantastic cakes and even better coffee open 9am 430pm every daynnenjoy a barbque or fire pit on your private barbque area just outside the lodgennplease visit our instagram page headlandsfarmlakesidelodgesnhere you will find more photos of our lodges headlands farm as well as our favourite places to visit walk cycle eat explore and donnoak lodge anglers are welcome to fish from any fishing swim around our two lakes with a few swims within 20 meters opposite the decking a maximum of 2 adult anglers per lodge with a 50 discount off our normal fishing rates payable in the fishery club housennif oak lodge doesnt have your ideal dates free please take a look at our other lakeside lodges also on airbnbnnwillow lodge lakeside retreatnsleeps 4 double bedroom and twin room absolutely perfect for couples families and mixed groups with shower room kitchendinerlounge and decking on the lakesidennpine lodge lakeside retreatnsleeps 4 1 double bed on a mezzanine level with a separate bunk bed room below shower room full kitchen diner lounge and a child friendly deckingnn for your reassurance and peace of mind we are spending extra time between guests stays to make sure all surfaces door handles objects etc are thoroughly cleaned and sanitisednnour lodges are beautifully isolated in the countryside theres no need for you to see or to come into contact with anyone during your stay including us however we are always contactable by phonetext and on hand should you require usnnairbnb are continually posting up to date advice regarding covid19 in relation to their bookings please check this out if you have any reason to think you might pose a risk to others guest access guest accessnyou have full access to your private lakeside lodge with private decking the lakes grounds and fishing swims at headlands farm as well as public playing fields within a 2 minutes walk and all the the new forest national park has to offer within a 5 minute drivennnother attractions nearby includennpeppa pig world 4 milesnpaultons park 4 milesnnew forest national park 1 milenmarwell zoo 17 milesnstonehenge 23 milesnbeaulieu national motor museum 15 milesnmottisfont abbey national trust 8 milesndinton park national trust 24 milesnwellow golf club 12 milesnpaultons golf club 5 milesnromsey golf club 5 milesnlandford garden centre 3 milesnlepe country park seaside 18 milesnhilliers arboretum 7 miles other things to note other things to notenplease visit our instagram page headlandsfarmlakesidelodgesnhere you will find more photos of our lodges headlands farm as well as our favourite places to visit walk cycle eat explore and do

Title: Rectory Farm Hideaway
Description: tucked away in the heart of the cotswolds the hideaway is situated within a secluded and idyllic southfacing meadownnlounge on the deck by summer and cozy up by the logburner come autumn the hideaway is a perfect escape for any seasonnnrelax and soak your troubles away in the hot tub available at extra costwhilst gazing at the stars sipping champagnennget back to nature but with a good dollop of comfortnnyour dog is welcome too the space the spacenfacilities includen1 x double bed bedding towels providedn1 x double sized futon bedding towels providednindoor log burner fire wood providednwood fired hot tub this is an additional cost please enquire for more detailsnbasic cooking facilities within the cabin with hot running waterncrockery glasses mugs cutleryntea coffee sugar milknsmall gas fridgenfire pitbbq outside for your use firewood provided coal not providednoutdoor seatingnbathroom comprising hot water shower wc sinknall bedding and towels provided together with additional blanketsndining table chairsnlighting via 12v systemnlimited electricity supply weather dependant power provided by solar which is weather dependantnno wifincheckin after 3pm checkout before 11amnyour beloved dog is also very welcome at the hideaway we do have to take a small surcharge payable upon arrivalnnthis beautiful purpose built log cabin boasts tons of character it has been designed to offer you a wonderfully unique stay set in a private area all to yourselvesnnthe comfortable log cabin sleeps 4 with a king sized bed and a double sofa bed a cute kitchen and a perfectly formed bathroom everything you need for a relaxing break will be supplied including kitchen basics bed linen and towels the bathroom will provide you with a hot shower after a glorious days sightseeingnnthe eco woodfired hot tubavailable at extra cost will keep you relaxed as your supper is sizzling away on the bbq treat yourself to a glass of bubbly gaze at the stars and let the beautiful surroundings wash away your stressnnthe hideaway is supplied with solar power which of course is dependant on the sun shining for those overcast days you can wander down to the local pub cozy up next to the log burner while away your time in the hot tub or snuggle up around the fire pit toasting marshmallowsnnthis is an idyllic place to unwind and leave your hectic life behind there is no wifi to distract you so you can truly switch offnnyou are close to the beautiful cities of oxford and cheltenham and the gorgeous towns and villages of the cotswolds shop till you drop in the many boutiques and antique shops that the surrounding towns have to offer or lose yourself in the wonderful stately homes and gardens nearby to name a few blenheim palace buscot park friars court kelmscott manor or visit one of our local villages bampton where many scenes of downton abbey were filmednnthe cotswolds is dripping in history from ancient churches and barns to roman ruins and gothic monasteries there is a wealth of activity on your doorstepnnif the great outdoors is your thing you are spoilt for choice with wonderful walking and cycling opportunities the cotswolds way is close by and boasts over 100 miles of trails through picturesque villages and ancient woodland you also have the river thames just a couple of miles awaynnif all that activity sounds like hard work just kick off your shoes and spend the day lounging on your deck and enjoying the beautiful countrysidennthe cotswolds is a designated area of outstanding natural beauty and you will be staying in the heart of this wonderful areannif the hideaway is booked for the dates you are looking for please look at our converted railway carriages rectory farm retreat and rectory farm camp all set in a similar setting as the hideaway other things to note other things to notenas we mentioned the hideaway is only powered by solar power so you many experience a limited power supply dont fret too much you are close to many towns and villages if you need a wifi hitnnthe eco hot tub is woodfired and comes at an additional cost please enquire for further information its well worth it as you can enjoy a wonderfully warm outdoor soak if you would like to make use of the hot tub please let us know prior to your arrival so that we can make sure it is ready for you

Title: Y Pod @ Bryntalch - Private glamping pod & hot tub
Description: set in beautiful surroundings our stylish compact twoperson wooden pod is perfect for that relaxing break away from the hustle and bustle of everyday lifenstay with us on our family farm and unwind to the tranquil sounds of the brook below enjoy the picturesque sunsets from your own private wood fired hot tub or explore the rolling hills of montgomeryshire with footpaths right on your doorstep and offas dyke just a stones throw awaynwe look forward to welcoming you the space the spacenthe pod has all your everyday essentials fully equipped kitchenette with fridge freezer electric hob kettle and toaster bathroom shower toilet and sink double bed as well as a spacious outdoor area with you own woodfired hot tub and seating area there is also an electric heater inside to keep you warm on those cold nightsnbed linen and towels are providednthere is a private parking space nearby with a 50m stroll down a gravelled path to the podnthe pod is fenced off however be mindful of livestock in adjoining fieldsnthere is no wifi in the pod however there is good phone signal and 4g in the areanthere will be a welsh welcome hamper on your arrival containing tea coffee sugar milk and chocolate other things to note other things to noteneven though we supply towels maybe bring a couple more to use with the hot tub it might be an idea to bring suitable footwear sandalsslippersto walk from hot tub to podnnwe will supply a bucket of logs for hot tub use
