Title: THE HIDE AWAY "White Rock Ranch
Description: my place is close to rhayader and the elan valley also adjoining the gilfach nature reserve youll love my place because of the coziness the peacefulness of been able to have the freedom to walk and explore our hills of mid wales straight from your doorand only 45 mins to visit the seaside of aberystwth my place is good for couples solo adventurers families with kids big groups and furry friends pets the space the spacenplease note due to covid 19we have now put in place deep cleaning with a fogging machine in between guests in all our holiday properties this takes extra time so our check out times are now at 10 am and check in is now at 4pm also due to covid 19 we will no longer be putting in bathing and hottub towels just hand and tea towels please let me know if you require the hot tub in advance of booking your url hidden due to the high demand on the hot tubs i would need to make sure there is one available for you so i must know prior to you booking and you can pay when you are with us 50 for your entire stay with us the hide away ranch is a unique and very fortunate place it is situated in 400 acres of magnificent views overlooking the wye valley it has been stated its like been on top of the world it rises up to 1400 ft on the tops with amazing views walks and rides ideal for star gazing in the evenings and watching the sun setting over the rolling hills while the wildlife is active all around you you can ramble around the hills at your leisure finding all the sources of the lovely little steams which trickle down through our countryside where many moons ago the pilgrims would walk to the source of these lovely crystal streams to collect the so said holy water in the pilgrims ampullae we have been very lucky in finding one then to take the water back to heel sick people from their ailments we are also neighbouring our local nature reserve which has got nature trials and all the information about our native wildlife in our area they also do childrens activities if you log on to the gilfach nature reserve you are welcome to bring your own mountain bikes motor bikes off road vehicles where you can go and enjoy the stunning views at your own leisure or if you just want to chilland sit out on the veranda with your glass of wine to watch the magnificent birds and wildlife go about their very busy lives you are now also able to hire a hot tub if you so desired at an extra cost from a little company in our local market town they come out the day before you arrive set it all up for you to jump in on your arrival please note the hideaway ranch is situated in the beautiful countryside there is no wi fi and you may find your phone signals are limited in areas but the best of it is that you only need to go 10 mins down the road and you are back into url hidden you have the best of both worldsnif you find that the dates you require for your break have already gone the hideaway ranch does have two further sister properties hide away house rhayader which has installed a red cedar wood far infared saunas well as its own log burner and hottub it sleeps up to 8 people and also the hide away sunrise sunset yurt which is also with airbnb and is situated in the same 400 acre estatewith its own log burner and hottub sometimes in the winter months due to some of our extreme weather conditions the water sometimes cuts into our road through no fault of our own its just surface water coming off our fields we do maintain our road but when the heavens opening we have to wait for them to close xx

Title: Jed's Shed - Little Country Houses SS
Description: a stunning luxury hand crafted cabin with your own private wood fired hot tub and wood burning oven located in the beautiful north cotswold countryside a haven to escape to during the summer months jeds shed is situated in a secret site location on the edge of mickleton or broad campden on 21st september it will then move to its winter location with our 4 other cabins on the main site in mickletonnnif booked check our other cabins mirts mansion djs digs poppys pad daisys den the space the spacenthe houses have a cosy double bedroom with bifold doors opening onto a small wooden floating deck a great chill out area for those balmy summer days the micro kitchen houses a small fridge with ice box double gas hob and hot and cold water to the sink on the covered deck you will find your own double wood fired hot tub emptied and cleaned between all guests and a wood burner with oven and grill to cook up a scrumptious supper a flush toilet is accessed from the deck and a unique outside hot water bucket style shower provides washing facilities for the summer months the cabins are designed to be off grid with solar powered 12v electric for the fridge lighting and charging your electric devices in the winter the cabins will be sited on our campsite where a double shower block is available together with an electric socket to run a heater other things to notenwe only do change overs on a monday wednesday and friday we have a minimum 2 night stay sunday night is charged at a nominal fee as we understand a number of people only wish to stay 2 nights however if you book sunday night this does mean you dont need to be up and gone for a 1000 am check out and can enjoy the facilities for as long as you like on the sunday

Title: Beautifully Eclectic Cotswold Cabin
Description: the old tailors built in 1906 was called smith and hobbs set right in the heart of the quintessential cotswold village of woodmancote an area of outstanding nattural beauty the space the spacenthe original timber framed and corrugated iron building totalling 75 m2 has been recently sympathetically restored th einterior reveals a beautifully designed living space contrasting vintage industrial with contemporary modern design producing a truly boutique experiencennthe entire building is yours for your stay you come in through a small porch where you can hang coats into the main space which is double height with large a framed ceiling thsi accommodates open plan living with fully equipped kitchen and dining area everything you need to throw a dinner party and a cosy nook at the far end with a large sofa and flat screen digital tv a perfect place to drink coffee and read the papersnnin the kitchen area there is a fridge electric oven and hob dishwasher and nespresso coffee machine farrow and ball dark blue colour contrasts with the original short blasted wooden tongue and groove cladding that is a feature throughout as is the vintage and industrial design and fittings with accents of coppernnthe original wooden floor has been painted an off whitennthe bedroom has a king size bed egyptian cotton beddings the softest duvet and electric blanket mustard yellow linen blinds and seagrass flooring a cozy room yet with ample space and quirky lightingnnthe bathroom equipped with a fantastic copper shower there is a heated towel rail loo and an original vintage basinnnwifi is fitted throughout the entire space

Title: 'Juniper' The Cosy Pod
Description: choose juniper our cosy pod and you will be greeted with a kingsize bed table and chairs bespoke furniture and handmade furnishings you also have an outside gas stove for cooking and a firepit on your private patio perfect for a couples romantic getaway all year roundnnnow including payg membership to the china fleet country club here you have access to the pool gym sauna steam room and hot tub further details are below the space the spacenyou have all you need for a relaxing breakaway we provide you with bedding towels and cooking utensils inside you have a kettle plug points and heater the kingsize bed also features an electric blanketnnyou have a cooking space outside for use of the gas stovetopnnthe shared washroom is a short walk away 15 metres which houses a shower and toiletnnwe have an onsite spa cabin called the greenhouse spa retreat where you can receive treatmentsnnwalk the stunning 1acre garden and enjoy relaxing in many of its secluded sitting areas your firepit is particularly nice at night after a day of exploringnnvisit the china fleet country club with your included payg membershipnnoptional extrasnnaqua spa and pool china fleet country club hot tub sauna steam room 25m swimming pool 10 per personnnfitness suite classes china fleet country club 6 per personnnonsite outdoor barrel sauna 12 per couple 30minute experience available 5pm til 9pmnnfire wood 5 kindling paper logsnnnif you would like any optional extras or treatments we require at least 48hrs notice so we can organise it for you the onsite barrel sauna is shared between our three pods and you book private time slotsnnchina fleet country club is approximately a 10minute drive from us this doesnt require any prebooking just take the membership cards and visit their reception opening times available onlinennntreatments in our spa will not be available from 165 to 56 guest access guest accessnlocated in a beautiful cornish garden you are directly in nature other things to note other things to notenwe have two other glamping stays onsite wollemia the peaceful pod and redwood the relaxing podnneach glamping stay is located in a secluded and private area of the gardennnplease check the availability of our other units if this one is not availablennthank you for booking your glamping stay with us herennwe are grateful that you have chosen our home and garden to relax and unwind in naturenndan and i have created your glamping experience to encompass our values living as minimalist vegans we try to do our part to reduce consumption waste and cruelty and would love you to embrace this way of living during your staynnwe have designed the retreat as environmentally friendly as possible from upcycling old materials to installing solar panels thermal collectors and rainwater harvesting we recycle and compost and use a completely renewable electricity provider as our guests we welcome you to enjoy this lifestylennthe garden is flourishing with natures beauty you will hear bird song through the trees see bees collecting pollen smell the incredible scented flowers forage to find herbs check out the veg patch and why not take advantage of garden spa treatments we also hope you catch a glimpse of the animal wildlife that lives alongside us from hedgehogs to frogs and volesnnyour pod has no animal products used inside or out so you can relax in the knowledge that everything onsite from cleaning products to the food you eat and skincare range in the spa is crueltyfree and vegannneveryone is welcome we would ask politely that you bring only plantbased foods which you are able to cook outside in the garden on the stove providednnwe hope you explore and enjoy our way of living experience new things whilst nurturing yourself in naturennif you have any questions please do get in touch we would love to hear from you before your stay to help you have the best unique experience here with usnnthank you again for booking in at the greenhouse spa retreatnnwe look forward to welcoming you soonnnall the bestnndan and victoria

Title: The Hide Out
Description: set amongst green woods overlooking the southeastern coast of england sits the hide out a selfbuilt shepherds hut inspired haven the hide out comprises a comfortable living space fully equipped kitchenette with sink and gas hob a wet room come loo and one upstairs bedroom to sleep 2 the hide out is surrounded by a level decking with outdoor furniture as well as a bbq and fire pit designed to be an extraordinary hut the hide out does not have mains power as it runs off 12v batterys the space the spacendesigned to be an extraordinary hut with an extraordinary experience guest access guest accessnthe hideout is set on top of a steep hill in the edge of woodland with a full view down the valley below parking is above the hideout further in the wood so their is a small walk down to the hideout from the car park other things to note other things to notenthe hideout is situated on a working farm so pets must be kept on leads around all livestock

Title: Luxury romantic couples getaway with hot tub
Description: family owned one bedroom lodge set in secluded private grounds with mature woodland and tree lined entrance in a superb location accessed by private electric gates our lovely cabin has a large deck with a brand new 4 person hot tubnideal for romantic couples it is nestled in an area renowned for walking and cycling and is on the edge of the peak district the space the spacenour exceptionally well designed lodge provides everything you need for a cosy holiday in an area of outstanding natural beauty the large double glazed windows offer wonderful views making it feel as if youre part of the great outdoors relax in centrally heated comfort indoors in the wonderful hot tub outdoors or mix and match in either summer of winternnthe lodge is very very private with a cosy kitchen comprising a 2 burner induction hob a table top oven and a separate microwave theres a spacious living room with electric reclining armchairs a comfortable bedroom and well equipped shower room the entire lodge is beautifully laid out and equipped and under previous ownership was listed in hoseasons luxury range the perfect place to chill throughout the year other things to notenplease note that bbqs are not allowed on site

Title: Stoke Leigh Barn
Description: the property is a self contained oakframed barn the barn is situated just inside the entrance to leigh woods national park and overlooks beautiful open countryside and the woods themselves the woods boast excellent walking and mountain bike trailsnnthe barn is a five minute drivetwenty minute walk to clifton village and a ten minute drive into bristol city centre and harbour side there is a bus stop a short walk away with direct links into bristol city centre bus rail links the space the spacenthe barn is open plan and there is a king size oak framed bed there is a bathroom with a walk in wet room shower there is a fully fitted kitchen with fridge freezernnthe barn has sky tv including all sports and cinema channels accessible on a 120 cinema and surround sound there is netflix and an amazon firestick and also a large collection of dvdsnnoutside there is a large decking area overlooking open fields with a hot tub for guests individual usennthe barn is safe and secure and resides behind forestry commission gates which are locked every evening there is a gate key for guests guest access guest accessnthere is a cinema screen with sky tv sports cinema surround sound free wifi and private use of a large hot tub other things to notenfresh bedding and towels will be providednnbristol airport is 20 minutes away and there is long stay parking and drop off pick up on request for a small additional charge

Title: Woodpecker Lodge - Log Cabin with Private Hot Tub
Description: each solid wood log cabin is encircled by trees for your privacy yet open enough to let sunlight through we aim to give you that cosy romantic log cabin retreat experience with a solid wood burner private hot tub and free access to our seasonal outdoor heated pool end may septnif the dates you require are already booked please look at our other cabinsntawny owl lodge also with private hot tub hedgehog lodge or roe deer lodge the space the spacengenuine scandinavian log cabin tucked away in mature oak woodland guest access guest accessnexplore 8 acres of woodland with wwii pill boxes balcony play area hot tub heated outdoor pool seasonal end may to sept other things to note other things to notengreat pubs and restaurants close by local attractions like forde abbey donkey sanctuary cycle path beaches at lyme regis charmouth west bay beer seaton sidmouth etcnpets are welcome we make a small additional charge of 25 per stay to cover additional wear and tear and cleaning please let us know when booking the extra can be paid on arrivalnif the dates you require are booked please look at our other cabinsntawny owl lodge also with private hot tub hedgehog lodge or roe deer lodge

Title: Elite Suite Two Oak' s  Adults only
Description: elite suites is my luxury concept in country stays 2 oaks is the first of my elite suites i have created a surreal safe space for two adults to enjoy set in the small village of offenham with state of the art 5 seater hot tub luxury egyptian cotton bedding soft furnishings kitchen fully equipped and shower room ensuite large private decking with seating and loungers outside log pit with stunning countryside views for that ultimate romantic time away on the edge of the cotswold the space the spacenset in a private area un disturbed this unique pod is designed for comfort but has 5 star quality with its own hot tub and decking area designed for adults only no children or dogs allowed on site for those special romantic adults only break away on the edge of the beautifull cotswolds guest access guest accessnelite suites is safe tranquil and above all a delight to stay in it has all you need for a luxury romantic break for 2 other things to note other things to notenwe have the historic town of evesham with its abbey and victorian waterside gardens only 2 miles away broadway and its historic tower is only 45 miles awaytrully both are worth visiting not to mention our national trust oldest pubrestaurant the fleece bretferton only 3 miles away great food and atmosphere

Title: Ceirw Treehouse high in the canopy & river below
Description: towering above the river ceirw is the enchanting romantic and magical ceirw treehouse if you want an incredibly romantic cabin experience lantern lit under the starry skies for a night or two then this is the place for you ideally located within easy reach of snowdonia national park you can enjoy beautiful waterfalls lakes and the berwyn mountains the space the spacenour unique treehouse cabin is sure to provide you with a halcyon escape from everyday busy lifennaccommodation is accessed from ground level and from here the real attraction is the balcony where the stunning view boasts an impression of being set high amongst the canopy of trees overlooking the afon ceirw deer river after a mornings hike imagine spending a peaceful and relaxing afternoon here reading a book with a glass of something nicennceirw treehouse is a cosy one room log cabin measuring 9ft x 9ft it has a comfortable double bed with a 135 duvet to keep you cozy electricity fridge and a two ring hob for a fry up in the morning 5 star luxury were not as there is no shower however there is hot and cold water and a sink and a very clean compost loonnthe balcony has chairs with cushions and blankets lanterns provide the atmosphere along with solar fairy lights sitting here listening to the sounds of the countryside in the evenings is what its all aboutnnwe have an abundance of wildlife including owls herons pheasants red kites and buzzards soaring overhead our wildlife camera has pictured foxes badgers mink and otters you will be surrounded by our own animals too cheeky nosey pygmy goats hens and alan the cockerelnnwe are trying to do our bit to be as eco as we can our water is from a bore hole solar electricity recycled rugs sustainable cotton bedding eco products and compost loonnwe have free ranging hens and our girls produce the best eggs youve ever had if you fancy some for your breakfast we usually have them available and cheaper than the supermarket

Title: the pod@springwater
Description: the pod at springwater is a unique handcrafted property set up amongst the trees it has two bedrooms one double with a large window and a view into the trees and the smaller twin room with offset bunk beds the living room has a smart tv on a swing out bracket theres also a well equipped bathroom with a great showernndownstairs is accessed through a trapdoor in the floor to the kitchen double doors open onto the backyard which has an outdoor fireplace pizza oven and bbq the space the spacenas well as the accomodation guests have full access to the field in front of the pod with a willow grove and mowed pathways amongst the willow theres also a firepit den and rope swingnnthe pod at springwater is a great place to reconnect with nature and is in easy daytripping distance for many of devon somerset and dorsets highlightsnnyou will also have three pygmy goats as neighbours

Title: Oak SPECIAL WINTER OFFERS - Hot tub & Log burner
Description: situated in a private tranquil woodland in the snowdonia national park the accommodation is approximately 4 miles from the seaside town of barmouthnsheep and lambs roam the fields around the pod the space the spacenthe pod has a double bed and bedding is provided there is a small kitchen area which is equipped with a two ring gas hob crockery cooking utensils cutlery pots and pans and table and chairs there is no hot water in the kitchen area we provide a cool box you may like to bring ice with yountowels are provided one bath towel and one hand towel per person you may like to bring extra towels for hot tub usagena wood burner and wood is providedna private wcshower is located approximately 10 metres from the pod hot water is providednthe glamping site runs off solar power and because of its location there is a very limited phone signal please bring a battery pack to charge your mobile phonesnthe hot tub heats up using wood which is provided free of charge it is important that you follow the instructions featured in your check in details failure to do this and the water will take longer to heat upnplease note that complimentary tea and coffee is provided for your arrival only and oil and salt and pepper are not providedntwo camping chairs are provided

Title: Mountain View Glamping
Description: my mountain view glamping pod is situated overlooking the black mountains at the southern tip of the brecon beacons national park offering the best glamping experience and a true opportunity to experience nature in luxury located on a working hill farm guests can find excellent waymarked walks that start right from the doornnthe outdoor heated hot tub overlooks the mountains and is perfect for either a romantic break or just a well needed escape from the hustle and bustle of daily life the space the spacenset between the trees inside the pod you will find a self contained kitchen shower room dining area and a comfy double bed along with satellite tv dvd playernnthe pod has underfloor heating a microwave fridge and all basic requirements including a fire pit and gazebo covered bbq traditional charm and a warm welsh welcome guaranteedthis is truly glamping at its bestnnplease notennthe hot tub has recently been upgraded to a fully heated electric one with jets and lights we feel this is much more relaxing for our guests as they dont have to tend the fireso jump straight in and enjoynncovid rulesnnplease do not book if you live in an area effected by lockdown restrictions we are based in powys so currently have no restrictions

Title: Secluded Eco Shepherds Hut with wood fired hot tub
Description: youll love my place for its atmosphere uniqueness and secluded idilic location with stunning views over the devon countrysidenit has an air of creativity and love with a cosy natural feelnthe views overlook forest valley and stream with hot tub its the perfect place to unwind dartmoor is a glorious play ground with wild ponies bouldering for climbers rivers and beaches nearby for swimming many neolithic stone circles around ashburton a town famous for antiques and fine foods the space the spacenthe hut is off grid so you will have a taste of what living simply and close to nature is like but still enjoy having the luxury and comfort of my hut hopefully youll be inspired and go away with an experience of living offgrid and a greater appreciation for nature and what we take often for granted in this modern and busy worldn nthe woodwork is beautiful and the whole dwelling is uniquely crafted using only natural paints and materials so as to minimise anything harmful to both the environment and the people living in itnnsimilarly the washing and cleaning is done with non toxic environmentally friendly productsnndo let us know in advance if you would like to use the hot tub so we can prepare it and treat the water with chlorine we will need to know length of use as we charge 85 for 3 daysnnthe water is not mains but spring water and can be unpredictable in terms of pressure and consistency its the farms own naturally sourced water and it is drunk by the family however is is not possible to test water constantly so for this reason i can not say that it is drinking waternnfamilys wanting to stay with kids patients will need to take responsibility for their children there are animals on the farm and areas with machinery and unusual terrinenndogs should be kept on leads and any mess safely disposed ofnnbut guests will have the benefit of having the entire feild to themselves with little if any interruptionnnthe hut is solar powered and this relies on there being enough sunshine as such there may be occasional blip in power availabilitynnthere are snacks and general food in the cupboard that your welcome to help yourself to during times that covid guidelines do not stipulate that we are not allowed to along with fresh herbs from bay tree or herb potsnnif you want any fresh local produce i can put you in contact with the farmer there is an exclusive private drive leading to the hut with parking in the bay right in front other things to note other things to noten the toilets are compost ones and need a small handful of sawdust after usennthe shower is attached to the hut itself but positioned out side with some screening for extra privacy and to act as a wind barrier

Title: Secluded rural cottage with hottub near the coast.
Description: the accommodation includes a fully equipped kitchen log fired hottub ensuite bedroom with comfy kingsize bed there is a sofa bed in the lounge area suitable for two small children or one adult a large secluded garden decked patio area driveway and bbq small dogs are welcome at an extra cleaning charge of 25 per stay the beach is 5 minute drive away the local pub is a 2 minute walk deal with its cool boutiques and cafes is a 15 minute drive or 10 minutes on the train the space the spacenwickets is a newly constructed luxury cottage situated at the end of a private country track opposite the village cricket pitch fixture dates are available if you like to spectate with a large secluded garden and log fired scandi hot tub the perfect location for local beaches and countryside walks the accommodation has bifold doors out on to garden wifi and netflix children are welcome a travel cot and high chair are available on request dogs are also welcome but please bring their own bed other things to note other things to notenplease note that the sofa bed is only suitable for two small children or one adult the cottage is not really suitable for 4 adults as the bathroom is ensuite to the bedroomnnthe hot tub is chemical free so will get cloudy after a few uses if you are staying more than a few days and would like it emptied re filled and heated this will take around 4 hours so please let us know the day before you will need to know how to light and maintain a fire to use the hot tubnwe will light it for you on the day of your arrival but you will need to keep the fire going once you get here to get the tub hotnit takes around 3 hours to get to temperaturennwe have the village cricket pitch on the other side of the field they have a licensed bar so some social noise can be heard on match days in the summer

Title: The Lodge at Beacon Fell - Hot tub rural escape
Description: the lodge at beacon fell offers a peaceful and beautiful location set within the forest of bowland aonb area of outstanding natural beautynnideally located to explore the nearby ribble valley lancashire and even the lake districtnnopen plan light and modern lodge with amazing views of beacon fell and parlick fell both of which are just on our doorstep a hidden gem last year 2021 we added a woodburning hot tub to the property which looks out over the views the space the spacennew guests can enjoy the luxury of a private logburning hot tub plenty big enough for everyone air jets led lighting and even drinks holders so you can enjoy the idyllic scenery of the forest of bowland or lie back and watch the stars in this dark skies area water is changed between every booking toasty warm in just 15 hours fresh robes and provided for all guestsnnthe lodge is a larch clad 2 bedroom accommodation with an open plan living area boasting a pitched ceiling and exposed beams the main bedroom is kingsize and the second bedroom can be configured as either kingsize or twin with space for an extra floor bed or travel cot for a child an adult camp bed can be provided for use in the main living spacennthe bathroom is modern and has a shower over the bath the large industrial style kitchen boasts a fully equipped kitchen with oven and induction hob dishwasher and microwave making cooking up a breakfast or evening meal easy theres also a washing machine for those longer staysnnthe open plan living area looks out onto the garden and beacon fell beyond through an almost fully glazed wall that leads out onto the decking theres also a large reclaimed wood dining table that seats 6 and a comfortable sofa to enjoy watching the smart tv which includes the netflix app this space is finished off with a cosy log burner for those cold winter nightsnnthe lodge also boasts a 1000mbps 1gbps fibre internet connection giving you the fastest speeds in the country so you wont miss out on anything of course if you would prefer to be unreachable we can always turn it offnnwe wanted the lodge to have a small carbon footprint so it is incredibly well insulated plus fitted with triple glazed windows and although each room has a programmable electric wall heater were not sure when you will need them the solar panels on the roof help to heat the hot water and power the appliances so you can enjoy your holiday while helping the environmentnnthe lodge is set in the grounds of our house whilst still offering the privacy needed to enjoy your holiday as it has its own private enclosed garden when staying at the lodge you will have an area of outstanding natural beauty on your doorstep and a public footpath leading from our garden takes you to the summit of beacon fell where you can view the whole of the area on a clear daynnthere are many walks in the area and we are happy to share our favourites with you if required the country lanes are also a favourite with cyclists so if cycling is your thing then you wont be disappointednnlocally you will have the towns of longridge and garstang just 15 mins drive away both towns offer supermarkets restaurants and a variety of pubsbars plus exceptional high street boutique shops where you can experience locally produced foods and gifts slightly further afield there are the larger towns of clitheroe and lancaster offering even more selectionnnbeing only 15 minutes from the motorway network the lodge at beacon fell is also well placed for visiting the flyde coast arnside silverdale the lake district and even the yorkshire dales as hosts we enjoy visiting all of these places and have great local knowledge too so were happy to make recommendations if you want some ideas theres also plenty for the kids to do even on a rainy daynnsituated within an area of outstanding natural beauty and a designated dark skies areas you will need a car to get aroundnn1 mile to beacon fell country parkn1 mile to brock bottoms picnic siten3 miles to parlick felln11 miles to longridge fellnn5 min drive20 min walk to nearest pubn15 min drive to local shops and restaurantsn15 min drive to m6 junction 32nnn22 miles to the beach at lythamn41 miles to manchester city centren50 miles to manchester airport other things to note other things to notenwe have a dedicated 1000mbps fibre internet connection with very good wifinnwe provide all logs and kindling for your logburning hot tub heating takes just 12 hoursnnif youd like us to prewarm your hot tub ready for your arrival just let us know at time of booking a fee of 20 is due upon arrival for this servicennwe provide a starter pack of logs for the log burner stove more are availableto purchasennthere is a 22kw fast ev vehicle charger available please let us know at time of booking if youd like to use it extra charges applynnwe have a bbq available to use please provide your own charcoal and fire lighters and ensure its left clean after use

Title: Bluebell Pod with wood fired hot tub
Description: set on a rural glamping site the pod is a clever use of space with a side entrance light inside and great views to the outside it has a kitchenette at one end with a breakfast bar and a bathroom with toilet shower and basin at the other end the double bed is made up with luxurious bed linen with a dressing table vanity mirror and wardrobe next to it outside there is a large decked area with its own woodfired hot tub and bbq where you can enjoy views over the water and ancient woodland the space the spacenthe glamping site is in a beautiful area of outstanding natural beauty making it perfect for nature lovers walkers and cyclists guest access guest accessnguests can walk or cycle straight from the site to large areas of forestry and past a beautiful lake parking is right outside the pod other things to note other things to notenwe are in the process of having wi fi accessible in bluebell but at the moment it is only available in and around the outside of the caf on site we hope to rectify this as soon as possiblenthe hot tub is a wood burning hot tub which does not use electricity and so does not have a jacuzzi mode we chose this option as it is more fitting to the area but the main reason was hygiene the tub is emptied deep cleaned and refilled between every stay rather than relying on chemicals which electric tubs use to keep the water clean between stays we hope you enjoy it it looks great

Title: A Hidden Gem - Tranquil Barn in the New Forest
Description: the barn is a delightful studio apartment situated next to our family home in the quaint village of burley new forestnrecently refurbished the barn features an open plan living kitchen and sleeping area with its own private entrance and small outside space with eating area and space for a bbqnnit is a truly fantastic base for you to enjoy what the national park has to offer including walking bike riding horse riding or exploring the beaches of the south coast the space the spaceninside the barn features a full kitchen which includes an oven hob microwave and teacoffee making facilities a choice of eating areas either at the breakfast bar or at the dining area tablennthere is a comfortable sitting area with smart tv wireless internet and whole range of dvds books board games something for every one to enjoy our guests can enjoy a cosy reading corner with high back chair and a overhead lampnnthere is also a selfcontained shower room which features a sink toilet and freestanding shower guest access guest accessnlocationthe barn is located off the open forest around 1km along an unmade forest road we regularly grade the track but there are few potholes and we would advise that it is not suitable for low sports carsnnthere is a separate private gated parking area and entrance other things to note other things to notenparents with babies young children we have a cot and loads of toys etc which you are welcome to use if you would like to bring your little person to the barnnnpetsndogs are welcome at the barn providing they are small to medium breeds please contact us to discuss prior to booking if you would like to bring your dognapologies but large dog breeds are not suitable due to the size of the indoor and outdoor spacesnnbooking and availabilitynnfor ease of use please note that the airbnb booking calendar is up to date and accuratennplease use the airbnb help section via the booking confirmation to make any amendments or cancellationsnnplease contact us should you have any questions

Title: Cosy shepherds hut, hot tub, log burner & Alpacas
Description: a romantic shepherds hut in a beautiful rural setting with alpacas for neighbours located in the village of trematon on the outskirts of saltash also known as the gateway to cornwall plymouth centre is just 30 mins by carnset in a field you will be able to enjoy the quiet seclusion of the hut and at no extra cost the hot tub will be exclusively for you throughout your staynits in close proximity to amazing coastline dartmoor and bodmin moor with an abundance of local walks and footpaths the spacenthe shepherds hut has been built to accommodate your needs for an authentic experience with all modcons the toilet and shower are standard size however the bathroom is small and compact the kitchen workstation has a sink two ring electric hob fridge and a combination microwave and oven just enough to get by with the basicsnnthe cabin double bed is snugly tucked away behind curtains with access from one side only we provide 100 cotton bedding to make your sleeping experience as special as possiblennalthough there is electric heating provided if you want the more traditional warm and cosy feel there is a cast iron log burnernnfor your entertainment there is a wall hung tv with an integral dvd player and we have a digital radio for music lovers there is wifi provided but it can be a bit sketchy sometimes inside the hutnnas well as a decorative fence we have planted over 60 trees to provide natural privacy we also have our own solar power panels to produce locally grown electricitynnalong with the compact space there are steep wooden steps up into the hut you will also need to walk across grassland so sensible shoes are a must please contact us if you have any mobility concerns

Title: Treehouse living
Description: the treehouse at derrington is a simple space where you can sit among the trees with the stream rippling below and enjoy the peace of the country side other things to note other things to notentheres a double bed twin beds on a mezzanine floor for the kids and a log burner to keep you snug and warm gas hoboven for cooking and a rustic bathroom and nothing else in the way of modern distractions its a chance to ditch the wifi and unwind for a while wondering the woods or sitting out on the decking gazing at the stars or listening to the creatures of the nightnnfire pit provided for outdoor cooking with plenty of sticks amenities less than a mile away shop pub butchers tea rooms and garage can be accessed via picturesque route through the woods local towns such as bridgnorth ludlow much wenlock and iron bridge are between 1530 minutes driventhe tree house has been created using recycled materials from the farm and localitynthe farm is a traditional mixed farm of sheep and cattle been in our family for four generations you are encouraged to explore the various foot paths in and around the farm information will be provided at the accommodation of the time of your stay

Title: Snowdonia cabin in nature with hot tub
Description: our secluded cabin is surrounded by ancient oak tree forest and all the wildlife that comes with it it is so peaceful that you will only hear the river and the birds set in 10 acres of our own land for you to explore and easy access to snowdonia public foothpaths it is perfect for those looking to spend some time in nature the cabin itself features private hot tub wet room underfloor heating large deck with bbq kingsize bed kitchen living and dining area and a private cinema the space the spacenour cabin is very popular and if its full for your dates we have another equally wonderful place to stay the barn owl find it by clicking on our host profile photonnour cabin is a nature lovers retreat for those looking for an adventure on foot or 2 wheels or merely an escape from hustle and bustle of everyday lifenits located in the heart of snowdonia surrounded by native ancient forest and the wildlife it supports nothing but the sound of the river and birdsongnafter leaving your car at the garage make the rest of your journey on foot a short walk over a bridge by a waterfall and up a tree lined track up towards the cabinnthe cabin is a long stones throw from the main house but enjoys complete privacy through its own gate and is hidden amongst trees and shrubs it comprises large furnished deck complete with hot tub perfect for relaxing in nature and under the stars inside there is underfloor heating kingsize bed fully equipped kitchen dining area wet room and large comfy couch on which to enjoy a full cinema experiencenthe cabin is a perfect way to explore this part of snowdonia the surrounding area is crisscrossed with walkers paths and bike trails there are outdoor pursuits galore from surfing to zip wiring over the slate mines snowdon itself is close for more great walking as is coed y brenin for mountain biking and bala for watersports or simply amble through nearby forests by beautiful rivers and lakes on a sunny day the beautiful white sandy beaches of harlech borth y gest and the llyn peninsula are all within a short drive awaynnnow for the basics we provide bedding and towels small welcome pack for 3 nights ecosensitive toiletries are provided which we encourage you to use the cabin comfortably accommodates 2 adults and a further 2 small children or babies and we can supply travel cot blow up bed and high chair the cabin has full cinema experience and we have an extensive library for you to choose from we are both keen walkers and can supply maps or advice on the many local hikes you can even borrow jake our perfect dog if you promise to take him for a walk

Title: The Pool House
Description: relax at the pool house enjoy the hot tub and swimming pool very close to oxford ideal for sight seeing very close to the cotswolds cotswold wild life park bicester village blenheim palace suitable for couples or families with 2 young children also ideal for athletes who would like to keep up their fitness the space the spacenour lovely pool house is tucked away but near the bustling city of oxfordnnafter a day of sightseeing shopping or long walks you can relax in the endless fast lane poolnheated at 30c 1st april 31 st october but available for private use all year around for the ones with still some energy left you can swim against the pump the pool has an electric safety cover very easy to use with a turn of a key ideal for families with young children or you can simply relax and unwind in the hot tub inside the pool house you can relax with tv stream your music on the sonos or have a go at the arcade machine we have a nespresso coffee machine for you to enjoy the pool house also has a microwave and fridge guest access guest accessnwe have off road parking on our drive way use of the pool with an outdoor heated shower and hot tub the pool house has a lovely outdoor seated area ideal for relaxing other things to note other things to notenyou will be staying at the bottom of our garden there is a fence to ensure your privacy you will not be over looked we are a family of four with two friendly dogs we welcome couples and families but please no hen or stag parties or any groups who would like to party our pool house is ideal for couples or small families we will make sure we will greet you when you arrive to make you feel welcome and help you with settling innplease note this is a non smoking accommodation

Title: Waterfront apartment with pool.
Description: beachfront apartment of 50m2 in arromanches les bains on the landing beaches large private terrace of 120m2 with direct access to the beach a large living room with open plan kitchen a master bedroom overlooking the sea with a 140 bed a 2nd bedroom with 2 90 beds and a bathroom with a showernaccess to the heated swimming pool from midmay to midoctobernduring the school holidays rentals are by the week from saturday to saturday otherwise 3 days minimum other things to note other things to notenlinens are provided at an extra cost 15person towels and tea towels are not provided during the covid periodnnpossibility to privatize the pool 35day from midmay to midoctobernncalendar is not necessarily up to date as we also use leboncoin to rent please contact us before blocking dates thank you

Title: Secluded Oak Barn Retreat with Hot Tub & Pool!
Description: relaxation at the oak barn danbury is inevitable surrounded by oak trees the secluded fenced patio with comfy seating hot tub and bbq will allow quiet relaxation after a day exploring the essex countryside on your doorstep inside enjoy a beautiful open plan oak beamed kitchen living area with all the amenities you could need to enjoy your stay 3 luxurious beds and a large bathroom being child friendly free parking and fast wifi are a given a seasonal pool is just an added luxury the space the spacenwelcome to the beautiful oak barn in danbury 1000 sq ft of light quiet secluded space for a relaxing get awaynnbedroom 1 has a luxurious king size bed with memory foam mattress quality linen and is double aspect looking out over the tree lined garden and horses when they arnt on their holidaysnnbedroom 2 has an equally luxurious sprung double mattress quality linen and enjoys views of the horses and national trust forest behindnnthe large bathroom comprises of an overized bath for relaxing after a day exploring picturesque essex a seperate shower toilet and basin all amenities such as shampoo soap and toilet paper are provided as would be expectednnthe open plan oak beamed livingdiningkitchen area is light and spacious even for 6 people the double sofa bed can be made up or left folded for your arrivalnnthe 42 tv in the living area is linked up to a firestick for app access and live tvnna seperate nook is available for reading or if you need to check the laptop and wifi signal is strong so you can keep connectednnthe dining table can be set for 6 and the kitchen is equipped with oven hob microwave fridge with small freezer dishwasher toaster coffee machine kettle and all equiptment you need for self catering a selection of tea and coffee is also provided to get you startednnwashing is available at a small feennoutside the barn becomes even more delightful as you can choose to see in the evening on your private patio either from your 6 person hot tub or outside seating area whilst someone bbqs for dinnernnduring the summer months weather dependent a private heated outdoor pool is available daily between 9am and 1230pm unless otherwise agreednnparking for 2 cars on the shared drive is availablennthe oak barn danbury is family friendly 2 little boys live on site so if there are any specific child requirements please just message me before you come and i will try and accomodatennwe hope to see you soon x

Title: Delightful cottage in 15 acres of countryside
Description: the cottage is situated on a private estate with complete solitude in 15 acres of orchards and fields guests are able to use our indoor leisure complex of pool and hot tub at no charge this is on the left of our family house 2 minutes walk from the cottagennthe 2 floor cottage has recently been fully renovated and you will find it to be warm welcoming and decorated and furnished beautifully with full sky tv sky movies and netflix availablennour family home is very close by if you need us the space the spacenas you enter the cottage through the pretty front door you come into the integrated shaker kitchen turning left you have the lounge diner with a cloakroom adjacent a neat white staircase in the corner takes you up with no door to the open plan family bedroom with double bed and 2 singles adjacent to the bedroom is a shower room and landing with large wardrobe from the landing is a door which takes you onto a small balcony with staircase that leads to the grounds the l shaped sofa can double up as a childs bed if you have more than 4 guests in total the area in the cottage is 750 square feet guest accessnprivate parking space outside the cottage other things to note other things to notenno pets

Title: The Warren - Lodge with Private Hot Tub
Description: set in a peaceful area of the hoburne cotswold park is this beautifully equipped mobile home within a few minutes walk to the main park entertainment area and lakesnncomplete with a private hot tub and deckingnnwe are perfectly positioned for easy reach to explore the cotswolds and surrounding areas the space the spacenif you are traveling in a large group then look at our other listings as many are very close togethernnnthis is a luxury home with private hot tub full kitchen including ovenhob fridge freezer washing machine and dishwasherntv with dvd player in the lounge and tvs in both bedroomsnmusic can be streamed using the built in bluetooth speakersntable and chairs inside for a cosy family mealnthere are 2 bedrooms one with a kingsize bed and ensuite shower room the other has 2 3ft beds both bedrooms have ample storage spacennthere is an additional family shower roomnoutside there is a table and chairs on the decking other things to note

Title: Stunning Modern Lodge with Hot Tub on the Lake
Description: there is everything you need for a relaxing break with lake views the lodge has a lovely family bathroom and the master bedroom has a stylish ensuite the lounge dining and kitchen are open plan the kitchen is modern and fully equipped with a full size dishwasher there is fast wifi the large decking has a private sunken hot tub with lovely views over the lake the perfect place to relaxnthe lodge is on chichester lakeside holiday park and you have full use of all amenities other things to note other things to notenplease bring your own bed linen and towelsnmy cleaning lady doesnt have the facility to do this level of laundry

Title: THE OLD SUNDAY SCHOOL
Description: the old sunday school is in the grounds of a gradeii listed georgian rectory opposite a medieval church it has been newly converted and refurbished in an openplan contemporary style and finished to a very high specification it has a private entrance and garden and patio area guests have access to the hosts sevenacre landscaped garden in an area of outstanding natural beauty in the summer months maymid september guests will have shared use of the outdoor pool with the owners the space the spacenthis is a separate and private property and includes a mezzaninelevel bedroom fully fitted kitchen bath and shower room spacious orangerie with bifold windows overlooking the swimming pool and a doubleheight openplan living area with sofa bed and tv private garden and patio with own front and back doors and ample parking guest access guest accessnguests have full access to the beautiful rectory grounds and the swimming pool mayseptembernhighspeed broadband and unlimited wifi on the property other things to note other things to notenthe pool is heated in the summer mayseptember and then closed in the winter octoberaprilnwe have 2 dogs black labradors 1 cat 1 cockerel 10 hens and 3 ducks

Title: The Stables Cottage, hot tub & pool
Description: charming singlestory barnconversion just three miles from the historic town of stratforduponavon with good access into warwick and leamington spa with shared hot tub and indoor swimming pool award winning artisan farm shop with caf butchers and bakery all on sitennkeys are collected using a code for a keybox so this gives you flexibility on arrival and departure times the space the spacenthis cottage sleeps four guests and is all ground floor two bedrooms one with king size bed the other is twin room with two single beds both have tv freeview family bathroom full wet room roll top bath shower basin wc well equipped kitchen with separate dining area sitting area vaulted ceilings with open timber beamsnnoutside you have a private decking area and private lawned garden with rattan garden furniture for alfresco dining enjoy a walk around our 4 acre grounds or take a picnic out and enjoy the stunning views guest access guest accessnthe cottage and its garden are is exclusively for your usennyou will share access to the indoor heated pool and the outdoor hot tub with guests in our two other smaller holiday cottages this will be between 900 1800 daily nnthere is a diary planner in the pool house where you can reserve private hourly time slots simply write your name or cottage name next to the time you would like to use the facilities other things to notenwe are really lucky as we have an award winning farm shop next door they also do takeaway pizzas and sunday lunches picnics etc we have a great little village shop called snitterfield stores and they are open every day with a very good selectionnnthe next closest places to eat are no19 restaurant which is 1 mile and the new inn which is an award winning pub runowed by the villagers in norton lindsey stratford warwick leamington spa and henley in arden all have a fabulous range of restaurants so something for everyone if you dont want to eat out we can recommend other food deliveries private chefs or takeawaysnnsnitterfield boasts two impressive usga golf courses within 5 minutes of the village the ingon manor golf club has a 18hole par 72 championship course the stratford oaks golf club is a welcoming and friendly club with our guests with lots of other activities in the local area including horse riding tennis bowling fishing gliding and cycling the monarchs way runs across the entrance drive giving walkers access to some stunning countryside

Title: Cottage Farm - farmhouse with pool and hot tub.
Description: a three double bedroom property with 3 sofa beds pool jacuzzi pool is available april october hot tub available all yearnndownstairsnkitchen a larder an aga cooker and oak flooringnliving double fireplace main lounge oak flooringnsnug sofabednnupstairsthree double bedrooms superking or twins spacious landing double sofa bed with fantastic views all covered in herringbone sisal carpetsnbathrooms jacuzzi bath and shower room with separate shower outside the space the spacenhistorynlower berrow farm once was a shooting lodge of the norgrove estate of which cottage farm was once two workman cottages that have now been converted to a beautiful chocolate box cottage set in 20 acres with no footpathsnncottage farm is situated just a mile away from lower berrow farmnrental of cottage farm includes parking at lower berrow farm for use of playground and walking trailsnnoutsidena climbing frame outdoor heated swimming pool with pool room and changing room

Title: Idyllic, private & unique countryside holiday
Description: our granary is a stylish sustainable barn conversion set in idyllic countryside at the end of a quiet country lane surrounded by a horseshoe of downs and near wonderful beaches it truly is a picturesque spot and all just 3 hours from londonnnthe granary has just been renovated from two agricultural buildings with two comfy bedrooms a large kitchen diner to inspire a great meal a lounge with a wood burner and a huge window seat in which to gaze out at the garden courtyard and the pool the space the spacentraditionally finished on the outside our barn is unique on the inside style space and light define the granary so relaxing and rejuvenating is it here that many people who stay here with the intention of exploring the island never leave manor bottom with a private a courtyard your own pool unheated a yoga studio on the grounds a picturesque wood and views from an elevated garden to calm your soul why would you need to go furthernnthe two comfortable bedrooms one with ensuite bathroom are ideal for a family of four or two couples the second bedroom can be set up with twin beds or a super king size bed there is a second bathroom with wetroom style shower and we provide pure linen bathrobes for guests to lounge about in comfort guest access guest accessnan entire house c80m sq sole use of swimming pool unheated private courtyard and garden not overlooked a small callisthenic gym space located in the garden of the main house can be accessed by guests who would like to use it for a yoga pilates or kickboxing workout other things to notenthe granary is a perfect choice if you are looking for a comfortable stylish and low carbon footprint holidaynnthe granarys underfloor heating and hot water are provided by a heat source heat pump the solar panels on the roof generate electricity additional energy purchased is from 100 renewable sourcesnnthe timber for the wood stove comes from own own woodland which is regularly replantednnthe charred timber on the outside of the barn comes from reclaimed floorboards the indoor joinery wide window seats and some of the furniture are made with worn and lovingly upcycled scaffold boardsnnthe remote location at the end of a country lane bordering fields and woodland means that manor bottom is an excellent place to see undisturbed wildlife

Title: The Potting Shed, 5* ‚ù§Ô∏é Luxury escape Cirencester
Description: the potting shed is the quintessential 5 cotswold escape following an 18 month restoration completed in may 2019 this stone barn conversion is the perfect retreat located within the grounds of an elegant grade ii listed georgian town house on cecily hill voted one of the prettiest streets in england this romantic getaway is accessed by a private stone bridge which leads through through a formal kitchen garden to a stunning private terrace the space the spacencovid19 potting shed update your safety and protection is our top priority we are deep cleaning the potting shed between visits and have plenty of antibacterial wipes and hand wash throughout the property in addition you are totally isolated with your own private entrances plenty of private outside space and the largest park cirencester park in the county right on your doorstep to roam around in complete privacy further details are listed in our guidebook send us a message we are here to helpnnthe potting shed is a selfcontained converted stone barn which occupies 550 sq ft of living space and has a generous 200 sq ft private terrace this gorgeous hideaway sits in our grounds but with its own separate entrance it is a very private and quiet cottagennfollowing an extensive restoration from the ground up in 201819 we have used local materials and cotswold craftsmanship to create a retreat thats been decorated to a very high standard throughout using beautiful fittings farrow and ball paints and designer fabricsnnupstairs under the eaves with their original limewashed oak beams and exposed cotswold stone walls are 4 heritage double glazed conservation windows fitted with black out blinds for the light early mornings the queen sized 1400 pocket sprung bed with luxurious 400 thread egyptian cotton pressed linen nb can also be set up as a twin room occupies one end of the bedroom while a generous cupboard sits at the other end with a hanging rail and masses of hangers for your clothes and space for your bags all the upstairs lighting controls are conveniently located next to both sides of the bed in addition there is a dab roberts radio on the bedside tablenndownstairs features a great living space with excellent wifi and underfloor heating installed throughout theres a fully equipped kitchen containing a nespresso coffee machine dishwasher fridge with ice compartment gas cooker microwave kettle toaster washing machine and masses of kitchen utensils pots and pans so if you fancy dining in theres everything you need to create delicious meals while the dropleaf dining table can be extended from 2 to 4 placesnnin the cosy living area theres a deep sofa and a 4k tv with access to both catchup and netflix finally for those chilly evenings a stylish chesneys gas fire will keep you lovely and warm and as its operated by remote control you need only to lift a finger nnthe luxurious bathroom is also located downstairs and is equipped with underfloor heating and high end fittings such as a hanns grohe shower burlington taps and natural bramley bathroom products all designed for complete indulgencento ensure your stay is as comfortable as can be weve kitted out the cottage with a fully integrated heating system operated by nest which also controls the underfloor heating but your safety is vital so weve also installed an intelligent automist fire suppression systemnnoutside the terrace is perfectly setup for alfresco drinks and dining and it is there exclusively for your use there is a shared formal kitchen garden potager bordered by a mature hedge which forms the boundary of the shared space beyond which the rest of the garden is private the gumstool brook bridge was also rebuilt last year and the iron decorative railings and pillars which we added won the cirencester 2019 civic design awardnncheckingin dropping off parkingnnthe potting shed is set up for self checkin with a keypad entry system on the bridge and a key safe by the front door unfortunately we do not provide parking on site however there is a drop off point at the end of the gumstool brook path where guests can unload cars can be parked at the old station the brewery waterloo or the beeches car parks there is also free onstreet parking on barton lane subject to availability just 3 minutes walk away please be aware cecily hill is resident only parking alternatively private parking can be arranged for a small charge 5 minutes walk away including a type 2 ev charge point for those travelling without a car kemble train station is situated 10 minutes from cirencester and trains from london take 1hr 20minsnnfrom may until september the beautiful cirencester open air swimming pool with its warm springfed water is open from 7am its a couple of minutes walk along from the gumstool brook bridge so why not go for a refreshing early morning dip guest access guest accessnguests have access to their own private terrace and shared kitchen garden which lead on from the gumstool brook bridge however the wider gardens of cecily hill house are private other things to note other things to notenwe are an active family with children and young fox red labrador we use the garden throughout the year so we will be around enjoying life gardening and socialising

Title: Cosy Wooden Cabin by the Woods
Description: spend your days in a cosy timberframed cabin enveloped by rhododendronsnnwith a woodburning stove a garden and terraces youll be sure to have what you need for a relaxing stay head out of the garden gate and youll enter ringwood forest with a cycle trail moors valley country park a golf course and a lakenna 5min drive will take you to the historic market town of ringwood go east and youll hit the beautiful new forest national park or head south to the sandy beaches of bournemouth the space the spacenthe cabin has everything youll need to stay comfortably a logburner a fully equipped kitchen a modern bathroom a pullout sofa bed and a tv sleeps 4 comfortably double bed in the attic bedroom and a pullout sofa bed in the living areannit is particularly suitable for nature lovers with a fireplace bbq and garden access for guests to enjoy the open forest airnnnote that due to the bedroom being located under an aline roof tall people may not be able to stand upright upstairs however the communal area downstairs is spacious so movement is not restricted in daytoday livingnwe can provide a travel cot and a high chair for infants should you want us to make up an extra bed then you need to add an extra guest when booking so that we know to make up an extra bednnthe cabin now has its own private kirami wood fired hot tub it is filled with fresh water for each new guest and then heated with firewood please contact us for pricesnnparking availability for one carnnwe are dogfriendlynnthere is a sauna cabin on the property with a small pool which is heated with an air heat pump in the summer months you can use the pool free of charge please speak to us if you would like to book the sauna log fired which we charge extra for

Title: Beautiful converted barn with hot tub & pool
Description: lovely barn with private hot tub all year and heated shared pool may to sept countryside walks from the barn including to one of three excellent pubs huge variety of places to visit within a short distance abbeysmarket towns tors henges to smokeries cider farms moors and gardens the space the spacenthis lovely barn has been sympathetically converted to provide a fabulous holiday home on the edge of the somerset levels less than 1 mile from the traditional town of langport it provides the perfect retreat for a couple walk to one of the three dog friendly local pubs serving great food and local beer and cider watch the wildlife along one of the walks across the levels or cycle along the carfree tracks or flat roads alternatively travel a short distance to visit one of the many local attractions or market towns at the end of the day relax in the hot tub or swim in the heated pool in season up to 28 degrees in summer snuggle in front of the wood burner or sit under the cherry tree in the private gardennnset within a perfect spot for touring the beautiful countryside with a wealth of attractions to suit all tastes within a short drive including longleat clarks village at street roman bath and beaches on the north and south coastline enjoy delightful scenery and walks direct from the property and in the evenings visit one of many local excellent dog friendly pubs all serving good foodnnleisure facilities private hot tub available all year shared outdoor heated swimming pool may to end of september table tennis on request outside field available to exercise dogs with walks straight out amenities ample parking bed linen and electric included wifi available in the barn towels provided regret no smoking in the property location beach 30 minute drive shop and pubs under 1 milennaccessed through a separate driveway the accommodation is spacious and furnished to a good standard and offers one bedroom double with ensuite shower room and wc please take care as the bedroom is accessed via a steep opentread space saver staircase there is also an external stone staircase which provides access to the bedroom loungekitchendiner downstairs openplan with tv chromecast and bluetooth sound system woodburner first basket of logs free cooker fridge and microwave shared utility with washing machine in outbuilding outside enclosed private garden with hot tub seating and bbq amenities electric heating included 2 dogs welcome by arrangement 20 per dog other things to note other things to notenplease note there is wifi but it comes from an extended outside so can be a little tricky sometimes

Title: Three en-suite bedroom cottage with indoor pool
Description: this cottage is like a tardis very large ensuite bedrooms huge open plan living area and large private outdoor courtyard by the fullyequipped kitchen with a barbecue and table for outside eating freeview tv apple tv wifi and access to private indoor heated swimming poolnnplease note we do not accept bookings with a saturday check in or out please ensure your check out day is either a friday or sunday for week long bookings the space the spacenin a quiet location a very spacious cottage in a quiet courtyard with 3 large upstairs double bedrooms all with ensuite bathrooms an open plan kitchen living room and dining area with fireplace opening out to a private gravelled courtyard dogs welcomennisolated at the end of a long bumpy driveway this very quiet cottage comes with three large bedrooms all three with ensuite bath or shower rooms it has a spacious open plan kitchen dining and living roomnnwood burning stove in inglenook fireplacennprivate outside space in gravelled courtyard perfect for outside dining in the summernnvery peaceful quiet settingnnideal for families or small parties looking to get up to 8 people together for a long weekend awaynnthere are 2 further single camp beds or a sofa bed available which will allow the cottage to sleep 8nnthere is 4 hours per day of private access to the indoor heated pool times can be arranged in advance of the staynnplease note if you are booking a bank holiday weekend we require a 3 night minimum bookingnnplease ensure that you add the correct number of guests to your booking to ensure that the correct price is quotednnin order to prevent food wastage we only leave welcome food items for guests staying more than one night

Title: Dotty's Hut at Old Rectory House
Description: old rectory house is a grade ii listed property with 8 acres of gardens and meadows with stunning coastal and countryside views we have two luxury shepherd huts both with spectacular sea views wood burner and private hot tub also we have lovingly renovated our outbuildings to create the coach house a large 4 bedroom selfcatering guest accommodation guests in the coach house have their own private outdoor swimming pool pool house and hot tub the space the spacenfor the ultimate countryside experience treat yourself to a stay in one of our luxury oak clad shepherd huts made by the master craftsmen at blackdown shepherd huts the huts are nestled within our fields with stunning coastal views with our dexter cattle and herdwick sheep for neighboursnndottys hut has been lovingly handmade in somerset with amazing attention to detail and the highest quality of finish each hut has a log burner for cosy evenings there is comfortable corner seating with a coffee table which expands into a full dining table when its time for sleep there is a pull down double bed made up with luxury bed linens over the bed you will be greeted with a curved glass skylight for a magical stargazing experience the bathroom has an electric shower heated towel rail marble sink and flushing toilet we provide towels hair dryer and complimentary bramley toiletries the kitchen area has an lovely oak work top induction hob fridgefreezer and belfast sink there is a toaster kettle and coffee pot as well as all the utensils and crockery you will need we provide tea coffee milk sugar oil and salt pepper to get you startednneach hut is surrounded by its own private garden with a kadai fire pit grill and bowl for an immersive outdoor cooking experience let the stresses of everyday life fade away while soaking in your own hikki bohemen wood fired hot tub drink in the breathtaking countryside and sea views by day or luxuriate under the stars by night all logs are includednnbbq and breakfast packs from our home reared produce are available to purchase as well as in hut meals delivered to your door loving prepared by usnnfor use during your stay every property has a selection of board games cards local maps and books as well as a bird watching kit and a fossil hunting kitnnguests are free to explore our stunning grounds which include a walled orchard and a willow tunnel taking you to our croquet lawn there are peaceful seating areas nestled within the wild flower meadow where you can take in the sea views and enjoy a picnic in the evening relax around the fire pit toasting marshmallows while star gazingnnaccess to the huts is by foot and a short walk from the parking area we are happy to assist with any luggage

Title: Apple Store with use of Pool, Jacuzzi & Sauna
Description: the apple store self catering lodge has been expertly decorated in a french style the open plan bedroom living and dining area includes a smart tv and wifi there is a very comfortable king size bednthe ensuite bathroom has a high specification showernthe seperate well equipped kitchen has an oven hob and fridgensituated in the patio area it has its own tables and chairs and is by the swimming pool jacuzzi and saunanset in seven acres of gardens and fields of grazing horses the space the spacenthe apple store features private use of the indoor heated swimming pool jacuzzi sauna and gymnnsurrounded by the cotswolds and malvern hills yet conveniently located close to the historic towns of cheltenham spa gloucester and tewkesburynthe apple store self catering lodge has been expertly decorated in a french style the open plan comfortable bedroom living and dining area includes a smart tv and wifi there is a very comfortable king size bednthe ensuite bathroom has a high specification showernthe seperate well equipped kitchen has an oven hob and fridgennenjoy the pleasures of the cotswolds air rolling countryside picturesque villages our garden and paddocks of grazing horses the accommodation opens on to the patio with seating and a purpose built barbecue to sit round at the end of the day and relax whilst making plans for the rest of your staynmanor barn is close to ancient sites including neolithic barrows hill forts and roman remains you are near to the cotswolds way so if you like walking you can follow one of the walks from the national trail which can be downloaded from their website the malvern hills are also nearby which also provide pleasant walks and spectacular views the river severn is also a short walk away the cheltenham festival and races are world famousnthe cotswold towns and villages with their wild life parks country shows independent shops market stalls pubs restaurants bars art galleries theatres and cinemas are a great attractionnwe have maps and can suggest walks tours and places to visit

Title: Countryside retreat, swimming pool, stunning views
Description: new build for 2021 a brandnew jewel in the summerhouse luxury holiday lets crown a beautiful countryside retreat with access to luxury heated swimming pool with a hot tub steam room changing rooms all bookable for fully exclusive usennthe complex is a grand house in the middle of the chew valley overlooking the stunning mendip foothills east wing has three luxury ensuite bedrooms comfortably sleeping six people with a sofa bed for two more in our spacious reception room the spacento the right of the front door is the sitting room with ceilingtofloor windows large luxurious sofa with a comfortable bed and a magnificent fireplace there is a large hdtv with a wii android tv box and a bluray player skylights stream natural light into the room making it nice and bright just off the sitting room there is a modern kitchenette with a brand new kitchen containing a gas cooker electric oven builtin microwave and a slimline dishwashernndirectly opposite the front door is wisteria a super king bedroom with a private shower room this space also allows access to the shared laundry room with a washing machine tumble dryer and an additional dishwashernnjust off the sitting room are two luxurious ensuite bedroom the nearest one is willow with a superking bed a superb ensuite bathroom containing a freestanding slipper bath and a walkin shower the next bedroom magnolia has a double bed magnolias ensuite has a bath and showernnin our grounds you will find a 200year old converted stables a georgian horse wash a well and a purpose built swimming pool the pool complex houses a tenmetre swimming pool with a fluvo jet to exercise against a hot tub which takes 5 people at a squeeze a shower and steam cubicle robes slippers spa towels hair dryer the temperature of the pool is 88 f 31 c and the temperature of the hot tub is 101 f 38 c bring your own cds use ours or listen to the radio or bluetooth feel free to just sit in the pool room to read relax or meditate groups are to book sessions for exclusive use of the pool complex ask for details we have personally approved people to offer you massages aromatherapy treatments and personal trainer assessment which can be arranged by yourselves at an extra charge if required

Title: Garden Cottage, heated indoor  pool,  tennis court
Description: self contained barn conversion very spacious light open and airynntotally secluded and peaceful except for the sound of local birdsnnprivate decking area and courtyard with views over 4 acres of private park like gardens containing a small private lake and streamnnindoor pool and private tennis courtnhuge wood burner and plentiful supply of logs the space the spacenthe cottage is a fantastic self contained barn conversionnplease note that the driveway is somewhat cambered so may not be suitable for very unstable guests though there is parking very close to the cottage so the amount of walking required to access the building is limited the cottage is all on one level with no steps internallynnthe space is large light open and airy but is cosy in colder weather with a huge wood burning stove and highly efficient underfloor heating through outnnone bedroom has a king bed and the other a twin and single bed we can put a temporary bed in the king room for a 6th guestnnthe hosts live in the main house on site some 30 metres away from the cottage and are available when requirednnthe cottage benefits from a private decking area and courtyard and hasngorgeous views over 4 acres of private park like gardens containing a small private lake and streamnnplease note the followingn1 the cottage is directly above a riding menage and occasionally horses may be exercised thereinnn2please also note that there are steep terraced flower beds immediately below the decking so small children must be supervised at all timesnnnn3 the wifi is good but mobile phone reception in the building is limited it is however available at the top of the driveway around 100 metres awaynmake sure you login to the wifi as soon as you arrive mobile phone signal is not existent at the propety but you can use your mobile plan through wifi it you switch wifi calling on on your mobilesnnnguests have use of indoor pool and private tennis court which is near the main house but please note the following nn1the pool will be available for your exclusive use at times agreed with the host during your stay times of use are flexible please also note that the pool is currently undergoing redecoration after a small leak to the roof so some marks remain visible there is a plentiful supply of childrens floats and toys all swimming is undertaken at your own risk there is a changing room available in the pool house but note that there may be family members elsewhere in that environment although the pool will not be shared whilst you are in itnn2 please note that the use of the pool is strictly for recreational purposes any commercial use including filming will only be permitted under separate negotiationnn3 please also note that the tennis court is unavailable on sunday mornings between 1030 and noon but is otherwise fully accessiblenn4 dogs may be accepted subject to prior agreement with the hosts on a case by case basis and subject to an additional charge depending on the size and breed of the dog this will be payable on arrival notewe have our own small terrier all guests dogs will need to be kept indoors or on a lead at all times because fencing is not dog proof nn5 cycles may be available to hire at a rate of 10 per day each subject to separate agreementnn6 there is a plentiful supply of dvd s available to suit all ages plus a childrens keyboard and a supply of games please note that there is a tv screen with a chrome cast facility and for playing dvds onlythere are currently no other tv screening services on site at presentnn7 please message me about flexibility regarding check in timei am always happy to help subject to the limitations of cleaning on change over days guest access guest accessnguests have access to the barn and decking nnthe pool and the tennis court are also available see separate notes
