Title: The Pool House
Description: welcome to our unique pool house more of a spa retreat set within 18 acres with far reaching views to the south downs way situated with in a 5 minute car drive or 15 minute walk to the village of hurstpierpoint with its shops country pubs award winning restaurants and washbrooks family farm there is a hot tub sauna and tennis courts for your use exclusively and pool is heated from 1st april octoberbrighton is 9 miles gatwick is 20 miles by arrangement use can leave your car the space the spacenwe live next door but the pool house is completely private and we are only a text away if you need anything bikes tennis rackets available the sportsmans pub walkable distance with new eating cabins or nephur indian takeaway fish and chips and pizza takeaway and co op all in the village 20 mins walk and the south downs for hiking on a short drive away

Title: Barn conversion, Henley-on-Thames
Description: a beautiful barn conversion in picturesque stonor valley 10 mins from henleyonthames the barn is surrounded by a 5 acre garden shared with our farmhouse and enjoys spectacular views use of tennis court indoor pool the space the spacenas you enter the barn through tall glass doors you come into an openplan sitting room with double height ceiling and a comfortable seating areannto the right and still part of this open plan room is a dining table that seats up to 12 and a fully equipped kitchen with fridge freezer oven hob and a dishwashernnalso on the ground floor are two double bedrooms and a bathroomnnupstairs the barn is made up of two large mezzanine rooms accessed by two staircases flanking the fire place to the right above the kitchen and dining area is a large family bedroom described under accommodation and to the left on the mezzanine is a games room with a full sized billiard tablennthe fire place is a focal point of the open plan living room and is in good working order logs will be provided although the barn is centrally heatednnthere is no washing machine or tumble dryer but a laundry service can be provided at an additional cost by the ownernnaccommodationnthis property is advertised for 12 it is ideal for that number if shared between two families with children but for an adult group wanting their own space and privacy we would recommend it for a group of 6 two in each of the three roomsnnthere are two single sofa beds x2 singles if guests are not couples and want their own bed please advise if these are required there is a single bed in master with one truckle below and doubles x 5 across x 3 rooms please note there is only one bathroomnnthe bathroom is spacious with loo sink bath and separate wetroom shower and plenty of hot waternnthe accommodation comprisesnnx 1 double bedroom that sleeps 3 1 double bed and a single bed there is a truckle under this single bed so could work for two childrennnx 1 double bedroom that sleeps 2 1 double bednnx 1 family bedroom childrens room this is located on the mezzanine level and sleeps 7 x 3 double beds and one single sofa bed please note that this is on a mezzanine and open to the living area below it is perhaps a consideration for those with young children who are light sleepers and likely to be disturbed by light or noise from the main sitting room belownna travel cot is also available for small infantsnnin the games room there is a further single sofa bed if requirednntennis courtnthis is right next door to the guest house and can be used by guests as they pleasennswimming poolnthe indoor pool is attached to the farmhouse and must be accessed via the house therefore it will be offered to guests between the hours of 8am and 7pm pool towels are provided guest access guest accessnyou will have exclusive access to the converted barn this will be approached from a shared drive with the farmhouse you will have full access to the 5 acre garden which is shared with the farmhousennparents of small children should be aware that there is a small shallow pond that is a good distance from the barn but is not coverednnplenty of parking is available other things to note other things to notenbed linen bath and pool towels will provided by a hire company and charged at cost 55 to be left in cash in the provided envelope at depart regardless of group sizennno stag parties or all male group celebrations sorry guys you are welcome on another occasions we do not hire the grounds for weddings or larger scale events although we have accommodated many brides grooms and families before and after their big day

Title: Cotswold stone cottage with use of private pool !
Description: situated in glorious countryside on a smallholding is stable cottage surrounded by our own meadows beautiful local walks and rolling countryside constructed in local cotswold stone this traditional cottage dates from the 17th century and once was the stable for the cart horses for the farmhouse we have a small heated outdoor swimming pool available for our guests 1 june1 sept and we accept well behaved dogsnwe have a conservatory ideal for cooler months and pretty garden the space the spacenstable cottage sits adjacent to a jacobean farmhouse with banked wild flower meadows rising above the cottage and lovely views with mixed traditional woodland it is a nature lovers paradise and the location is peaceful and tranquilnwe are passionate about the environment and preserving the countrysidenthe cottage has two bedrooms once the old hayloft and is open plan to some extent to the living area there is one a double room en studio and the other a small twin it is important to note that access for the twin bedroom is through the double room see our gallery page the double room has lovely views of the banked cottage garden whilst the twin bedroom has a velux window downstairs we have a cosy living room with woodburning stove and include logs in your rental we have a well equipped kitchen and downstairs bathroom with bath and overhead showernthe conservatory is ideal for the cooler months and doors open to a cotswold stone patio and steps to the pretty garden and views of the fields adjacent to the farmhouse and surrounding countryside guests are welcome to explore our fields but please observe the countryside codenout of season we are very happy to consider short breaks or weekends min 3 nights please send us a message and we will send over a special offer with the correct rates for shorter periods

Title: Award Winning House, Heated Pool, Sauna, Hot Tub
Description: architecturally stunning designed by whitebox architectural firm and idyllically located copse road is inspired by the luxury hotels of london with entertaining in mind ideally situated halfway between the buzzing cities of bath and bristol sleeping 10 guests across 45 bedrooms with a wonderful open plan kitchenliving area and a luxurious heated pool indoor sauna beautiful gardens design by karena batstone compromising california cool copse road is perfect for groups and families the space the spacenthe space was painstakingly designed with hosting and entertaining in mind cantilevered glass expensive finishes copse road oozes sophistication but doesnt compromise on practicality the house is clean and modern but warm and welcoming set in a beautiful garden with its own heated pool sauna private bbq sunken seating area pizza ovennndogs up to 2 wellbehaved dogs are welcome at copse road at an additional cost of 30 per dog please let us know if you will be bringing a dogs and we will then revise your booking confirmationnnthis property can accommodate 12 guests if you also hire our garden studio this is another room with a king size bed in the gardens of the property this room is 175 per evening please enquirennuf0fc sleeps 10 or 12 if garden studio is also rentednuf0fc 4 bathrooms 1 family bathroom 1 ensuite 1 downstairs statement toilet 1 downstairs shower roomnuf0fc private secure parking for 7 carsnuf0fc private walled garden and outdoor kitchennuf0fc heated outdoor swimming pool heated but struggles in freezing temperaturesnuf0fc outdoor sunk seating areanuf0fc indoor saunanuf0fc pizza oven and outdoor cookingnuf0fc all bed linen bath towels and tea towels providednuf0fc robes and slippersnuf0fc hairdryersnuf0fc dining table seating for 10nuf0fc welcome pack tea coffee sugarnuf0fc kitchen essentials dishwasher tablets cloth washing up liquid bin bags kitchen roll baking foil cling film salt peppernuf0fc bathroom starter pack hand soap toilet papernuf0fc heating and hot water via gasoil central heating with individual thermostat controlsnuf0fc free virgin highspeed wifinuf0fc 65 flat screen tv in living area tv in bedroomsnuf0fc dog friendly maximum 2 dogsnuf0fc fully equipped kitchen with toaster kettle utensils crockery cutlery glassware champagne flutes tumblers and wine and water glasses cafetire bakeware food preparation grater jug sieve saucepans etcnuf0fc 4 x wallmounted ovensnuf0fc food steamernuf0fc built in coffee machinenuf0fc microwavenuf0fc dishwashernuf0fc american style fridgenuf0fc washerdryernuf0fc ironing board ironnuf0fc vacuum cleanernuf0fc safety equipment fire extinguisher fire blanket carbon monoxide monitor smoke alarm first aid kitnnsituated 20 minutes from bristol city centre and just 10 minutes from bath city centre you are able to enjoy bars restaurants and night life from either city at arms reach there are uber and taxi services that run in and out of bath for around 15 i have created small guest book of some of my favourite bars and restaurants to explore during your stay no guest access guest accessnwhile staying at copse road you will have full exclusive access to the house and gardens the property has a large secure driveway for parking with secure coded electronic gatesnnthere is a large heated outdoor pool that is available for use we enforce a strict policy of no use of the pool after 10pm for the safety of our guests please note use of the pool is to your own risk other things to note other things to notenwe want our guests to enjoy the use of the property and have a memorable time while staying at copse road we have a few house rules to note and those are as followsnn no parties of any naturen no private eventsn strictly no stag dosn no use of the pool after 10pmn please specify the pet before bookingn no groups under 28n no music after 10pmn no unauthorised additional guestsnnunfortunately our swimming pool can only be heated to a maximum of 27 degrees we cannot increase this temperature due to our pool being of domestic liner construction this is a lovely temperature for swimming all year around

Title: Deluxe Coach House with pool at Bretforton Manor.
Description: the coach house forms part of bretforton manor which has features dating from tudor times we only have the one property which is luxurious and spacious for a one bedroomed apartmentnnguests have access to our incredible facilities 5 acres of grounds walled garden an indoor swimming pool and a tennis court bretforton is an idyllic village which is a brilliant base to explore the cotswolds stratford upon avon oxford the space the spacenthere is a large sitting room with two sofas 1 is a double sofa bed it has fully equipped kitchendining room there is a utility room with a machine and tumble dryer there is a king size bed in the main bedroom there is a also a dressing areaplace to do hair and make up the bathroom has a bathshower and there is a second downstairs wc and basin wifi fast broadbandis and there is desk for working on the mezzanine level as well as space for a travel cot guest access guest accessnguests can access 5 acres of gardens including a lake pond lots of exotic herbaceous borders an orchard ancient listed stocks and the beautiful walled garden where they can eat al fresco or enjoy a sundowner there is also a private swimming pool which is open april until end of october and a tennis court for an extra charge there are alpaca experiences hire of a tudor barn tours of the house and use of a gym other things to note other things to notenthis is our sole airbnb property it sleeps up to 4 although two would have to sleep on a sofa bed we dont allow children under 12 accept for young infants

Title: The Cow Pen Cottage, hot tub & pool
Description: character singlestory barnconversion just three miles from the historic town of stratforduponavon with good access into warwick and leamington spa with shared hot tub and indoor swimming pool award winning artisan farm shop with caf butchers and bakery all on sitennkeys are collected using a code for a keybox so this gives you flexibility on arrival and departure times the space the spacenall ground floor one double bedroom with king size bed tv freeview ensuite bathroom down two deep steps with bath shower over basin wc small range of complimentary toiletries open plan living area with kitchen with nespresso machine dining area sitting area all with vaulted beamed ceilings guest access guest accessnthe cottage and its garden are is exclusively for your usennyou will share access to the indoor heated pool and the outdoor hot tub with guests in our two other holiday cottages this will be between 900 1800 daily nnthere is a diary planner in the pool house where you can reserve private hourly time slots simply write your name or cottage name next to the time you would like to use the facilities other things to note other things to notenwe are really lucky as we have an award winning farm shop next door they also do takeaway pizzas and sunday lunches picnics etc we have a great little village shop called snitterfield stores and they are open every day with a very good selectionnnthe next closest places to eat are no19 restaurant which is 1 mile and the new inn which is an award winning pub runowed by the villagers in norton lindsey stratford warwick leamington spa and henley in arden all have a fabulous range of restaurants so something for everyone if you dont want to eat out we can recommend other food deliveries private chefs or takeawaysnnsnitterfield boasts two impressive usga golf courses within 5 minutes of the village the ingon manor golf club has a 18hole par 72 championship course the stratford oaks golf club is a welcoming and friendly club with our guests with lots of other activities in the local area including horse riding tennis bowling fishing gliding and cycling the monarchs way runs across the entrance drive giving walkers access to some stunning countryside

Title: Pool  House with use of the Pool, Jacuzzi & Sauna
Description: the pool house has been expertly interior designed in a mediterranean style this fully equipped accommodation has a separate bedroom with a quality kingsize bed an en suite bathroom and shower open plan living and dining area and kitchen with a range cookernthe pool house opens on to the patio with seating and a purpose built barbecue it is very close to the swimming pool jacuzzi and sauna the bedroom overlooks the large garden gazebo and fields of grazing horses the space the spacensurrounded by the cotswold and malvern hills yet conveniently located close to the historic towns of cheltenham spa tewkesbury and gloucester this fully equipped accommodation has a separate bedroom with a quality kingsize bed an en suite bathroom and shower open plan living and dining area and kitchennthe pool house opens on to the patio with seating and a purpose built barbecue there is a large front garden with a gazebo fire pit tables and chairs so you can relax whilst making plans for the rest of your staynthe accommodation features use of an onsite heated swimming pool jacuzzi and saunanmanor barn is close the historic towns of tewkesbury cheltenham and gloucester ancient sites including neolithic barrows hill forts and roman remains are nearby we are near to the cotswold way so if you like walking you can follow one of the walks from the national trail which can be downloaded from their website the malvern hills are nearby and provide pleasant walks and spectacular views the river severn the coombe nature reserve and canal is a short walk away guest accessnselfcontained accommodationnswimming pool jacuzzi and saunangymnpationbarbecuenfire pitngardensngated courtyardnprivate parkingnbus routes close byngood train services to and from cheltenham and gloucester

Title: Luxurious barn conversion with stunning views
Description: our rural retreat is a fabulous recently renovated barn situated on an organic farm and with stunning views of the somerset countryside it is the perfect weekend get away and offers every amenity in a luxurious environment the barn is grade ii listed and full of character with exposed beams natural brick floor and exposed natural stone walls imaginative interior design and great attention to detail make this the perfect place to relax in a stunning setting the space the spacenthe barn is adjacent to the farmhouse and shares a courtyard the views are stunning and you might catch a glimpse of the deer and hares red kites and buzzards there is a pretty garden and a terrace with outdoor table and seating there is also a swimming pool that may be made available on request please note that the pool is only heated between june and september

Title: The Parlour: Luxury modern barn with private spa
Description: luxury modern two bedroom stone barn conversion with access to a private spa including heated indoor swimming pool sauna steam room gym tennis court and librarynnsituated on the exclusive gated wellesley park estate in dulcote wells the parlour is the perfect place to explore the charming city of wells somerset with its historic cathedral twice weekly market boutique shops restaurants and bars as well as the nearby mendip hills area of outstanding natural beauty the space the spacenthe parlour is a newly refurbished luxury modern barn conversion with an open plan living space super fast wifi smart tv sonos beam soundbar and dvd playernnthe kitchen is fully equipped and has a fridge freezer gas hob electric oven and grill microwave kettle toaster dishwasher breakfast bar and everything you need to cook and serve a family meal for little ones a highchair is provided as well as kids plates cups and cutlerynnupstairs there are two bedrooms and two bathrooms the master bedroom is a double with ensuite shower room the second bedroom can be configured as a double or twin based on preference and there is also a large family bathroom a travel cot is provided for little ones and can be placed in either room as required both bedrooms have stunning countryside views and blackout blindsnnthe parlour has underfloor heating throughout and both bathrooms have heated towel rails other things to note other things to notenall guests must read and respect the estate rules at all times these are available in both the house and the spa buildingnnthere is no life guard at the swimming pool and the spa is not staffed so guests may use these facilities at their own risk all visitors to the spa must sign in and sign out and a maximum of 4 guests may use the spa during your stay guests are not permitted to use the spa facilities after check outnnplease only use ecofriendly cleaning products provided and no bleach as waste water is treated on site using a septic tanknnno pets smoking parties or eventsnncommercial vehicles and camper vans are not allowed on the estatennthe house and garden including bbq must be left in a clean and tidy conditionnnany damage to the property or its contents that occur during your stay must be disclosed and paid for

Title: Ty Bach
Description: a cosy clean warm and light annexe with its own walled garden situated on a beautiful private road a short walk from the historic cobbled streets of guildford town centre with its numerous boutique shops and quality independent restaurantsnnty bach is on the edge of the beautiful surrey hills a designated area of outstanding natural beauty and the rivey wey it is the perfect destination for walkers mountain bikers and lovers of the outdoors dog walking and country pub heaven the space the spacenty bach is a compact but welldesigned property downstairs there is an open plan kitchen and living area with french doors leading out to the private walled garden the dining table seats four comfortably for a delicious meal prepared in the well equipped kitchen there is also a small but smart shower room with wc upstairs ty bach has one bedroom with a double bed and plenty of storage a sofa bed in the kitchen means it is possible to accommodate four people if needednnthe property enjoys its own sunny private walled garden complete with bistro table and chairs to make the most of an al fresco lifestyle guest accessnwhole property including private walled garden

Title: Cotswolds Lakes, Spa, Pools, Water Sports, Nature
Description: now with access to the onsite spa facilities nna holiday cottage situated on the 500 acre private nature reserve the lower mill estate has much to offer during your stay perfect for family activity holidays for all generations or a relaxing break in the countryside onsite there is a heated indoor pool two heated outdoor pools plus eco pool fishing sports facilities and lakes on your doorstep plus a luxury onsite spa the space the spacenoakleigh cottage offers a cosy and contemporary feel featuring an open plan livingdining room with wood burner which opens up through double french doors to the enclosed outside decking area there is a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher fridge freezer and microwave plus a useful utility room with wc and a washing machine and tumble dryer for your use upstairs there are four bedrooms which sleeps up to eight people which includes two master rooms each with ensuite and balcony a cosy double room and an adult bunk room and a family bathroomnntechnology such as unlimited ultrafast fibre broadband 300 mbps is available to use for all your devices plus there are smart tvs with complimentary access to netflix xbox plus games and films and bluetooth speaker are providednntravel cot stair gate high chair bed guard baby bath seat and toddler feeding utensils are also available please note the cot is a standard travel cot and does not include a full size mattressnnluxury hotel linen plus bath and hand towels are provided for eight people please bring your own poolbeach towels and linen for the travel cot if you require itnnessential starter items are provided eg tea coffee sugar milk dishwasher tablets tea towels toilet roll complimentary toiletries and hand soap please note we do not restock these items for you whenif you run out during your stay and there is an onsite store or a local shop near by their details are found in our digital guide sent on bookingnnfor the warmer months there is a bbq with a starter kit on the back decking and during the autumnwinter months wood coal and fire lighters will be included for the wood burner and if you require more supplies during your stay there is a general store on the estate that sells firewoodnnthe experiencennlower mill estate is situated on a 500 acre nature reserve which includes several lakes interspersed with walkingcycle paths including the thames path which runs past the cottagennincluded with the cottage rental there is the free use of an indoor heated pool at the onsite spa two further outdoor heated pools 30c plus an eco pool two of the outdoor pools are closed christmas to easter but the other two heated pools are open all year there is also two saunas steam room gym three tennis courts astro turf table tennis two playgrounds and several fishing and sporting lakes all a couple of minutes walk away from the cottagennat the onsite award winning spa there are also a variety of treatments available charges apply for everyone to enjoy including teens and expectant mums so you have the chance to really unwind and relax during your staynnfor those who enjoy an active holiday there are varying activities available to enjoy on the water including fishing boating paddle boarding and kayaking all equipment for these water sports except fishing and bike hire is available from the activity hub located on the estate charges apply the activity hub also offers lessons events and group activities during peak season to include paddle board lessons kayak safaris and yogannfrom mill lake opposite the cottage is the start of the childrens miss mouse nature trail and treasure hunt you are also able to swim in mill lake which includes a beach area on the far side which has a gentle slope for paddlingnnfor rainy days or lazy evenings in front of the fire there are a selection of board games and netflix films available for all agesnnthe ballihoo restaurant and clubhouse is a few minutes walk away from the cottage and is open for drinks meals take away and general suppliesnnnfor the safety and comfort of our guests we only accept bookings with a maximum of 8 guests adults or children plus two infants who sleep in travel cotsnnwe welcome well behaved dogs no cats over the age of 24 months max 2 dogs please do let us know on booking if you wish to bring a dog with you adding the number of pets to your booking via the airbnb guest numbers section the are some lovely dog walks onsite and the estate is dog friendly please note the lower mill estate is a nature reserve so there is no fencing between each of the properties but there are grassed areas around the cottage we have details in our digital guide of a dog sitterwalker who is known on the estate who can help with looking after you dog during your stay should you require itnnwe do not accept hen or stag bookingsnnif you have any queries about your stay please do get in touch our guests are very important to us i am currently working a couple of shifts per week volunteering in our local hospital so if i do not respond to your query straight away i will do so as soon as my shift ends thank you guest access guest accessnyou will have the whole cottage to yourselves during your stay you also have access to the private 500 acre nature reserve and spa for paddle boarding fishing kayaking picnics cycling swimming etc there is parking very near to the cottage for one car and overflow car parks within the gated estate for any other vehicles in your group other things to note other things to notenwe provide a comprehensive digital guide at the time of booking for our guests for the facilities on the lower mill estate and also the local area to help guests start planning their holiday to ensure they make the most of their time away

Title: Cotswold Poolhouse
Description: this is a 1960s house sympathetically decorated with original period furniture directly outside is a pool with decking where you can swim and sunbathe the space the spacenthe poolhousennset in the cotswold village of rodborough this unique holiday retreat is a five minute walk from rodborough common an area owned by the national trust and consisting of nearly 300 acres of grasslandnnthe poolhouse was built in the late 1960s in glass timber and cotswold stone reputed to have originated from prinknash abbey it is southwest facing to ensure maximum sun through out the daynnthe poolhouse has recently been refurbished to a high standard the interior has been sympathetically restored to reflect the period it was built comprising of midcentury fittings furniture and original postersnnthe house consists of one double bedroom and a shower room the open plan living space comprises of a kitchen with a breakfast bar a dining area a large settee a tv and dvd player and a woodburning stove there is also a utility room with a washerdryernnexternally the house consists of a private unheated swimming pool surrounded by cedar decking several seated tables including what was part of an old stone cider press and also a large table near the shade of two ancient apple trees a perfect place to eat outside or just admire the view the house is set in grounds shared by the owner but is discretely tucked awaynnthe pool will be open from april 1stnnrodborough common set in open grassland on the cotswold escarpment commands impressive views of stroud and the severn vale in the summer cattle roam free often wandering across roads in the rambling 19th century golf course it is not uncommon to see cattle blocking golfers as they try to take shots to admire the view visit the lodge pub in the middle of the common or have an ice cream at winstones cotswold ice cream factorynnin the village of rodborough is the pub the prince albert a couple of minutes walk from the poolhouse the albert is a busy characterful pub that has regular music nights with musicians of repute as well as comedy nightsnnthe house is a mile from the small bustling market town of stroud with its independent shops pubs and cafs once the industrial centre of the cotswolds and the wool industry it is still very much a working town there are regular arts and music festivals held here as well as a weekly award winning farmers marketnnclose by is tetbury known for its antique shops and 12 miles away is the spa town of cheltenham famous for its racecourse which hosts the annual gold cup as well as its many cultural festivals gloucester with its medieval cathedral is 10 miles away and the ancient market town of cirencester is also 10 miles awaynnnearby is the village of slad immortalized by the author laurie lee in his novel cider with rosie and its pub the woolpack as well as the villages of bisley minchenhampton and painswick with its famous churchyard of 99 clipped yew trees the surrounding cotswolds also has a wealth of houses and gardens open to the publicnnwalkers can access the famous cotswold way 102 miles along the cotswold escarpment stretching from chipping campden to bath with sweeping views and passing through picturesque villages in cotswold stonennfurther afield the city of bath and the city of bristol are both a 45minute drive awaynntransport links stroud train station is less than a mile away there are hourly trains to london gloucester and cheltenham paddington is 90 minutes away by trainnnthe house would be ideally suited to a couple due to the proximity of the pool to the house it is unsafe for younger children and no pets guest access guest accessnthe poolhouse is set in its own private space within our garden the main drive is shared then the poolhouse drive branches off this is where you can park your car

Title: Hall Farmhouse
Description: set in an acre of garden with large outdoor pool in a picture postcard setting overlooking the village pond the grand design style 120sqm kitchen extension to the rear with sliding glass wall and level access to the pool and patio makes this a perfect family holiday venue the space the spacenswimming pool the swimming pool measures 20 x 40 ft its depth is between 4ft and 10ftnthe pool is open and available from april 1st to october 31st weather permitting and can be heated on request at a charge of 3000 per day charges apply for the entirety of the rental periodnthe pool is not fenced off but has an alarmnthe enormous level back garden has a 15ft trampoline and a set of goal postsnthe patio area has a mixture of loungers and sunbeds firepit enormous charcoal bbq 12 seater oak table and chairs ping pong table and football tablenplease notenbedroom 6 is a small downstairs double we added it in 2022 in response to frequent requests for a downstairs bedroom for guests with limited mobility who find stairs difficultnit is located directly adjacent to the kitchen and has one step down to access guest access guest accessnall areas of the property are completely private and accessible

Title: Shepherd's Pye - Luxury Retreat In The New Forest
Description: shepherds pye is a unique 1920s railway carriage rescued from a local farm as a neglected frame it has been lovingly restored by ourselves into a cosy modern retreat on the edge of the new forestnnthe hut is set in a secluded private spot on our farm overlooking a lake it is self contained and finished to a high standard including a comfy double bed heating mains electrics and a fully equipped kitchen and ensuite bathroom supplying all you need for rural yet comfortable stay the spacenwe are a family run cattle and sheep farm explore the farm during your stay use our well stocked course fishing lakes or make use of our indoor heated swimming pool which has just been newly renovatedndue to the huts excellent insulation electric heater heated towel rail the hut is cosy all year round and so is perfect for both summer and winter staysnninside the hut there isn a comfy double bedn soft bed linen and towelsn a tvdvd playern electric heating heated towel rail in the bathroomn plenty of storagen fridgefreezern oven with hobn a clever pullout tablen roberts revival dab digital radion butler sinkn showern toiletn basinn fully insulated and triple glazed windows doorsn kettle and toastern crockery cutlery and glassesn pots pans and traysn salt peppernnoutside the hut there isn decking arean rustic fire bowl we can provide a bbq arm and a fire basket which includes firelighters matches and fire logs at an extra cost of 15 please confirm if you would like the fire basket before you arriven bistro table and chairs for 2n sun parasoln a lake on the huts doorstepn beautiful surroundings with neighbours such as sheep cows ducks moorhen geese and heronnnplease note there is no wifi as the hut is in a remote location and we feel it is more peaceful without itnhowever there is a tv and a roberts radio to keep you entertained on rainy days guest access guest accessnguests will have their own private lake which they are welcome to fish or to just sit relax and enjoy the picturesque surroundings you are also invited to explore the farm and use the indoor heated swimming pool which is just a short walk from the hut the pool has recently been newly renovatednnprivate hourly swimming sessions in the swimming pool are bookable when you arriventhe laundry room is shared with the guests in the self catering barns other things to note other things to notendogs are welcome but please note there is an extra charge of 15 if bringing dogs please also read my house rules before bookingnnplease note that the hut is located in a field away from the main farm buildings and swimming pool a short walk of no more than 5 minutes there is also a small step onto the the decking and another step into the hut it is therefore probably not suitable for the elderlynnwe also have cottage pye bramble pye two luxury barn conversions suitable for larger groups each sleeping 68 adults plus infants as well as four other cottages available for stays please see our website pyesmead farm for more info or visit us on insta pyesholidaycottagesnntakeaways unfortunately dont deliver to us but you can have supermarket deliveries there is a local shop close by as well as a farm shop selling groceries locally produced meats bread and cakesnif you dont fancy cooking the local shop sells cook high quality frozen meals which are designed to be just like homemade foodnif you fancy eating out there is a great selection of pubs and restaurants nearby the ones we recommend are listed in the welcome pack in the hut

Title: Countryside retreat, swimming pool, stunning views
Description: part of the summerhouse luxury holiday lets complex old stables is a grand house in the middle of the chew valley overlooking the stunning mendip foothills old stables boast use of a heated indoor swimming pool with a hot tub steam room changing rooms there are four lux bedrooms three are ensuite comfortably sleeping eight people with additional small pullout beds for three plus a pair of sofa beds for four more in our spacious reception rooms pictures dont do old stables justice the spacento the left of the front door are two reception rooms the breathtaking garden room with a knowle sofabed a chaise longue a pair of sofas a pair of round tables and a highly polished victorian sideboard the spacious sitting room has a pair of sofas of which one is a sofabed there is a large 4k tv with a playstation android tv box and a bluray player both rooms have french doors that leads to the gardennnopposite the front door is a flight of stairs taking you to 3 luxury ensuite bedrooms the largest is chestnut a superking bed with a bijou pullout bed with a superb bathroom containing a freestanding slipper bath walkin shower and his n hers basins the next largest oak has a superking bed with a bijou pullout bed oaks ensuite is a shower room the cosy silver birch has a double bed and the ensuite has a freestanding bath and a separate showernngoing to the right of the front door leads you to damson a small bedroom with full size bunkbeds and a bijou pullout bed there is access to a downstairs washroomnnthe kitchen is extremely large with handmade wooden units granite worktop slate floor a 7 burner smeg range a dishwasher and a wooden dining table that comfortably seats 8 there is additional seating around the central island that seats 8 more there are french doors leading to the patio overlooking the landscaped garden the kitchen also leads to the shared laundry room which has a pair of washing machines a pair of dryers and an additional dishwasher for those large partiesnnin our grounds you will find a 200year old converted stables a georgian horse wash a well and a purpose built swimming pool the pool complex houses a tenmetre swimming pool with a fluvo jet to exercise against a hot tub which takes 5 people at a squeeze a shower and steam cubicle robes slippers spa towels hair dryer the temperature of the pool is 88 f 31 c and the temperature of the hot tub is 101 f 38 c bring your own cds use ours or listen to the radio or bluetooth feel free to just sit in the pool room to read relax or meditate groups are to book sessions for exclusive use of the pool complex ask for details we have personally approved people to offer you massages aromatherapy treatments and personal trainer assessment which can be arranged by yourselves at an extra charge if required other things to note other things to notenplease note that we do 7 night stays from fridays to fridays all year round bookable on airbnb however between november to march inclusive we offer stays of 3 nights fridays to mondays and 4 nights mondays to fridays please contact us directly to book thisnnalso please note that the garden room does not have curtains and has ceilingtofloor windows on 3 walls so privacy would be at a minimum

Title: 3 Bedroom House, Decked Garden with Swimming Pool!
Description: this listing is jersey uk not new jersey usannset in a quiet private residential estate with sthelier town centre 10 mins by car or 2025 minutes walk a shop pharmacy is 2 mins and a large supermarket 3 mins by carwhich has an atm outsidennbus stop situated across the road with nearest beach is only 5 mins by car 10 mins to the east is the scenic castle harbour village of gorey there is 9 hole golf course just 2 mins away with a driving range tennis courts and a restaurantbar the space the spacenthe house has its own private entrance with parking for 2 cars there are 3 bedrooms all with free standing wardrobes 2 have double beds and the other with 1 single bednnthere is a separate lounge with 2 sofas coffee table and a smart digital tv including netflixnnthe kitchen has a table for 5 people tea and coffee making facilities fridge microwave oven stove and toaster cutlery and crockery are also provided there is a freezer in the garagennthere are two bathrooms one downstairs with basin and other upstairs with power shower optional rain shower head setting and seatnnhidden away and perfect for kids is a snug room this has a chair bean bags and tv freeviewnnthe non slip decked back garden has the swimming pool which is 3 to 4 feet in depth throughout and has a great swim against jetnnthe swimming pool is air heated using an external electrical air conduction heater so only available for use april weather dependent but may to september is normally fine please note this is completely weather dependentnnfree wifi provided throughout the living space

Title: Cosy, quirky, split level annex.
Description: quirky openplansplit level selfcontained annex attached to a 16th century farmhouse with tennis court which is situated on a nature reserve lake 15 min drive to central reading and a 20 min walk 1 mile to theale train station38 mins to london pad please not that part of the walk there is not a pavement so it maybe be best to come by car or taxi the space the spacena self contained openplan split level annex with separate entrance and small private garden area full of character with wooden beams set in the beautiful berkshire countryside kitchen and private bathroom with showerbath superkingsize bed sky television and wifi available use of private outdoor tennis court overlooking lake which is a nature reserve not suitable for swimming or sup and direct access to nature reserve walks via the main garden guest access guest accessnprivate access to guest annex and own garden area we have a tennis court too which can be used by guests but will need to be booked in on arrival for guests only sleeps two but if required we have a blow up bedtravel cot for baby if required for a short overnight stay it is all open plan so its probably only suitable for a small childbaby not suitable for older childrennnfor guests staying 3 nights or more if notice is given prior to arrival keys can be supplied for our indoor heated swimming pool pool is fitted with an electronic safety cover for children safety please check if the pool is on if you would like to use it as we tend to turn it off over the deep winter months other things to notenwe are situated just off the the m4 corridor which has great access to london ascot windor bath bristol oxford and the cotswolds depending on what you plan on doing on your stay we are ideally located to really get the most of your vacation here in the uk

Title: 5 Star Luxury Coastal Retreat holiday home
Description: new for 2022 babytoddler package bed guard travel cot booster high chair provided free of charge if requirednnnew for 2022 beachpool towels providednnour privately owned 2 bedroom holiday home is just perfect for everyone who loves the freedom of self catering holidays but the quality and standards of a good hotelncoastal retreat is fitted out to provide you with home from home comfort guests in 2021 agreed we really had thought of everything the space the spacenour modern well looked after holiday home has a relaxing peaceful feelnnthe holiday home sleeps 4 comfortably as is ideal for a family or two sets of friendsnyou will find good quality fixtures fittings exceeding the typical standard you may find in many other holiday homes just because its a caravan doesnt mean you cant have some home comforts we want our guests to enjoy a fun relaxing holiday with everything you might need during your staynnaccommodation includes nnliving room nthe bright airy comfortable cosy lounge with plenty of seating is a perfect place to relax chill after a busy day exploring the local beaches towns villages patio doors lead on to the decking fitted with a feature fireplace electric fire for cosy nights watching tv reading or playing gamesnnkitchen dining area nfitted with a full size fridgefreezer with the important wine bottle rack electric oven grill built in microwave oven toaster kettle and equipped with plenty of crockery glasses potpans utensils enough to cook a meal or dish up a take away and hopefully everything you will need for your staynthe dining area consists of a proper dining table 4 chairs not wobbly stoolsnnwe provide you with a good stock of kitchen essentials for cleaning washing up managing the bins recycling as well as tin foil cling film food bags for picnics days out we also supply toilet rolls to start you off kitchen towel similar items for your arrival there are also bottles of hand soap hand sanitiser you just need to bring your own toiletries personal care itemsnnwhen you arrive you can expect a food welcome pack waiting for you to get you startednnmaster bedroom en suite bathroom nthe master bedroom is fitted with a king size bed the room has a large fitted wardrobe with plenty of hanging space coat hangers provided there is also a chest of drawers with tv a dressing table stoolnan ensuite bathroom with bath shower over wc basinnnsecond bedroom nthe second bedroom can be made up in a twin with 2 single beds or as a double when made up as a double we push the two single beds together use a topper double fitted sheet to create a second double bed the room has a small wardrobe coat hangers shelf hanger provided for your holiday clothesnwhen booking please let us know the configuration of the second bedroom so we know how you would like the beds made upnnall bedding is provided for both bedrooms mattress toppers mattress protectors hypoallergenic duvets hypoallergenic pillows feather pillows pillow protectors all duvet covers pillow casesnnfamily shower wc nwith wash basin and wc mirrored cabinet a large shower cubiclennboth bathrooms have fitted central heating towel rails ideal for warming through towels robes 2 supplied for master bedroom guests making them nice to use all year roundnntowels laundry nwe provide the following for your use during your stay n1 bath sheet per personn1 hand towel per personn1 hair turban per bedroomn1 bath mat per bathroom plus a rubber non slip showerbath matnnew for 2022 1 beachpool towel per personn1 bath robe for each guest in the master bedroomnkitchen tea towels hand towels oven glovesnnwe launder all of the linen towels at each changeover we do not provide a daily service for making bedscleaning etcnnoutside deck nsurrounded by glass its easy to fasten back the main door double patio doors let the sunshine in the large sunny decking with plenty of space to sunbathe or eat dinner is the perfect place to sit back chill relax enjoy a coffee glass of wine or dinner sat at the rattan effect table 4 chairsnthere is a storage box to stow away cushions to keep them dry always useablennthere is plenty of parking in the adjacent parking areannnleisure facilities na leisure club pass is available at 50 for up to 6 guests for up to 7 nights excellent value for a family this allows use of the indoor pool outdoor pool gym and entertainment facilities we will send you a form to complete prior to your stay in order for us to apply for the passes for you as our guestsnnwe recommend you read all our information the booking terms conditions and the site rules before booking your holiday at coastal retreat guest access guest accessnthere is plenty of on site parking around the home with 2 parking areas within walking distance of the home and no designated parking spacesnhoburne park is in a great central position for exploring christchurch mudeford bournemouth surrounding villages a 1015 minute walk will take you to a choice of great local beaches a 5 minute drive and youll be in the beautiful new forest other things to note other things to notenyour holiday home will be completely set up and ready for your arrival with good quality bed linen and towels provided in the nightly price plus other homely extras for your stay we also include robes for guests in the master bedroomnnew we now provide 1 poolbeach towel per guestnnew to save you loading your car to the roof and bringing everything except the kitchen sink we can now provide a travel cot bed guard booster high chair please request these when bookingnna welcome pack will be waiting for you exact items included depend on the number of guests age etc your surprise awaitsnnall water and electric charges are included in your holiday rental chargenn special occasions nwhatever the occasion we can help to make your stay extra special balloons cream tea hamper celebration hamper a choice of breakfast packs just send us a message after youve made your booking for further information and prices

Title: Beautiful S.Downs cottage w/gate to the Downs
Description: a private gate takes you directly onto the south downs with some lovely foot and cycle paths on your doorstep close to the beach and city chichester portsmouth southhampton winchester goodwood and witterings beaches are in easy reach while liphook station takes you to waterloo in an hour ripsley is a place to get away from it all great for cyclists walkers couples and families the space the spacenthe cottage has a private entrance and parking for up to threefour cars it is a 30 second walk through the grounds to the private gate that takes you onto the south downs as there are no roads to cross walks and cycle rides are easy with children nnguests have exclusive use of a private patio area with bbq and a large garden outside of the cottage there are garden games football posts swing ball badminton croquet etc guests also have use of the azalea grove where the fire pit is located a great place to relax in the evening and logs are in full supply from the log shednnthere are two sitting areas one in the kitchendining area upstairs and downstairs in the main sitting roomgames room where french doors lead onto the patio garden and azalea grovennin the sitting roomgames room there is a 52 smart tv with netflix great for cosy nights of film watching a woodburning stove and dvd library that includes some of the latest releases as well as a large double sofa bed downstairs wc and table tennis and pool table there are also garden toysboard games and indoor toys available for children of all agesnnapart from central heating there are two woodburning stoves one in the sitting roomgames room the other in the master bedroomnnthe kitchen has a dining table for seven a high chair is available an american fridge freezer and kitchen amenities including a dishwasher cafetiere and blender to ease your way into your stay with us we supply a starter 3 day supply of goods including coffee tea sugar dishwasher tablets washing up liquid toilet roll rubbish bags and basic cooking ingredients oil saltpepperspicesnnthere is a shower room upstairs with power shower and wc a wc downstairs and an ensuite bath to the master bedroom with a roll top bath and basinnnin the master bedroom there is a woodburning stove and king size bed in the second bedroom there is a double bed and a french sleighday bed that can be used as a bed for a child up to aged 9yrs for a seventh and eight adult guest there is room in both bedrooms for two additional single bed truckle mattressesnnwe know babysitters we can recommend for your stay housekeepers for extra help and a masseur who will make home visits we supply a pdf of the area including recommended places to visit walks local recommended pubsrestaurants and things to do guest access guest accessnthe entire cottage patio and lawn outside of the cottage leading up the main house is available to guestsnnthe gate that leads from the grounds directly onto the south downs is a thirty second walk from the cottage through the groundsnnthe cottage has a private patio area with a bbq and space for sitting outside children are welcome to play in the azalea and the grove and on the sunny garden leading up to the main house at any time this has a tree swing swing ball and football net and we leave outside toys in the cottagennif two guests would like to use both bedrooms there is an additional payment of 25 if three guests would like to use two bedrooms and the sofa bed truckle mattress there is an additional payment of 25 if extra beds are used we can prepare linens for 20nndue to family life the cottage is not recommended to guests who would like to entertain visitors other things to note other things to notenwe have a family dog a 5 yr old chocolate labrador called maddie she has no access to the cottage but if she set you she may come up and say hellonnwe offer a housekeeping service our housekeeper will wash and press clothes for 13 per hour otherwise there is a laundromat and laundry service availablennfor guests staying longer than a week linenstowels are changed weekly and there is a weekly 26 2 hr cleaning fee paid directly to the housekeeper after the first weeknnsorry legalese but if you do wish to use the garden gamesfire pit you use them at your own risk and are solely responsible for the health and safety of your guests and other party members during the staynnthere is an ordinance survey map at the cottage and links in the pdf sent prior to your arrival for you to plan walkstrips prior to your stay we also recommend local pubsrestaurants and send contact info for local things to donnthe cottage is a shoefree zone thank younnif you would like any more information or require anymore help please message us and well do our best to help

Title: Romantic Shepherd‚Äôs Hut Retreat very private.
Description: a beautiful hut within its own private garden with a bbq area fire pit and bench overlooking paddocknnit has a kitchen with fridge microwave two hot plates a cafeteriakettletoaster a table stools a comfortable 6ft 6 in by x 4ft double bed as well as a shower with sink and loo fully plumbed innna small tvdvd and wood burning stove just perfect for rainy days and wifi connectionnnfor those who love being close to nature with all the luxury of being at homennno pets allowed the space the spacenfor people looking for a cosy break from the hassle of life these days guest access guest accessnduring the months that our wonderful pool is open usually between early june and early september you are welcome to share it with our family and guests in our cottagennit reaches a max temperature of 26 degrees by early july please bring your own swimming towels kindly replace cover if the day is chillynnit is our family pool and as a courtesy we invite you to share it please do not expect to have this to yourself although often you may we do not charge for the use and rules apply as with the use of table tennis skittles and darts in covered barn other things to note other things to notenyou may hear the cockerel and horses and some road noise from farm vehicles during the day

Title: Shrove, rural idyll with breakfast hamper
Description: relax and soak in the peace and quiet at shrove cottage an idyllic little gem of a property which is selfcontained with its own private entrance roomy modern bathroom with underfloor heating fully equipped kitchen and bedroomsitting room area with beautiful views up the chedworth valley a perfect central location for work rest and play breakfast with homemade bread included for you to prepare and eat at your leisurenavailable at shrove cottage pancake hillnurl hidden the space the spacenour pool and sun patio area are both for your exclusive use during your stay the pool is 3m wide 55m long and 87cm deep it is heated naturally by the sunnthe property is totally selfcontained and is set out as an openplan loft apartment with a fully equipped kitchen and bedroomdining room area downstairs is the hall and the bathroom which has a generous size shower and underfloor heating guest access guest accessnthere is safe offroad parking on the driveway for your vehicle which is large enough to park five cars you have use of all the patio area around the pool where seating and tables are provided for your enjoyment and the property itself is totally separate from our house the patio is a secluded private space surrounded by hedges and clematiscovered fencing

Title: Avon Farm House, Hot tub, BBQ area, Luxury Living
Description: bs31 3et bath and north east somerset councilnsuperb detached period home located in a secluded position on the outskirts of the pretty village of saltford immaculate accommodation comprises 5 bedrooms 4 reception roomsnthe house has 3 acres private use including a lake you will also have access to the 230 acres farm and the owners small holding or animalsn hot tubn bbq arean heated pool summer onlyn suitable for family groups only the space the spacencentrally located in the swathe of countryside that connects the beautiful cities of bath and bristol the farm house is the largest and grandest of the avon farm cottagesnthe farm house 3 acres for your private use including a lake you will also have access to the 230 acres or arable land and the owners small holding or animalsnthe current owners have owned and previously lived in the property since 2005 sleeping 10 guests across 5 bedrooms is ideal for families and groups looking for some extra space offering everything that you could want from fabulous holiday home features 3 bathrooms 2 ensuite a wonderful fullyequipped kitchen snug off the kitchen large living room dining area for 8 and an impressive outdoor space with plenty of seating a gas bbq private swimming pool may 19th to october 31st with changing room and bathroom and your own private 6seater hot tubnthe 230 acres farm also houses avon farm cottages which comprises six individual holiday cottages that can be booked separately or all together to accommodate larger groups and familiesnplease note no properties at avon farm are suitable for events or parties no additional guests allowed unless previously agreed a list of approved contractors will be sent out after booking has been confirmednnintroductionnnonce you have reached the bottom of the treelined you will immediately be struck by the propertys impressive georgian stature water feature within the turning circle as well as the 3 acres of land that surround the property some of the original parts of the building standing at over 400 years oldnnrecently refurbished to a very high standard avon farm has everything that you could need for a comfortable and relaxing break the property is immaculately designed clean lines glass and chrome furnishings spotlights as well as plenty of natural light the farm house is for guests who love a modern twist on country living with five king size double beds in the main house theres plenty of space for a good nights sleep single z beds can be available on request for flexible sleeping arrangementsnnfacilitiesnn sleeps 10 in 5 bedroomsn 45 bath or shower roomsn private parking for 56 carsn private garden with private use of the swimming pooln hot tub use in strict compliance with hot tub rulesn outdoor seatingn all bed linen bath towels and tea towels providedn hairdryersn dining tablen welcome pack cereal bread biscuits butter milk tea coffee sugarn kitchen essentials dishwasher tablets cloth washing up liquid bin bags salt peppern bathroom starter pack hand soap toilet paper shampoo conditioner and shower gels for each guestn heating and hot water via gasoil central heating with individual thermostat controlsn free wifin 65 flat screen bang and olufsen tv in living area with sky bedroomn fully equipped kitchen with toaster kettle utensils crockery cutlery glassware champagne flutes tumblers and wine and water glasses cafetire bakeware food preparation grater jug sieve saucepans etcn 4 x wallmounted ovens microwaven dishwashern american style fridgefreezer with ice dispensern washern ironing board iron clothes airern vacuum cleanern safety equipment fire extinguisher fire blanket carbon monoxide monitor smoke alarmnnfull descriptionnground floornnentrance hallnnnto the leftnnliving roomnndining roomnnkitchennna light bright and contemporary space offering guests the chance to cook relax and dine together with stunning views over the land and great sunsets thanks to the glass walls the kitchen has everything you will need to cook a fabulous meal range oven and hobs americanstyle fridgefreezer kettle toaster microwave and plenty of crockery glasses utensils and cookware a large dining table with bench seat and additional chairs is the perfect place to enjoy a meal togethernnsnugnnnnback into the hallway andnnupstairsnnstraight along the corridor tonnbedroom onenmaster bedroom ensuitenmaster bedroom dressing roomnnbedroom twonnbedroom threenna cosy beamed bedroom decorated in light refreshing cream tones with a comfy king size bed bedside tables chest of drawers and beautiful garden viewsnninto thenbedroom fourna spacious double bedroom with comfy bed large wardrobe and flat screen television this lovely bedroom has beautiful views of the front garden thanks to two large windowsnnbedroom fivennoutsidenntheres plenty of outside space and seating at avon farm for you to enjoy including the large decking area with an under cover all year round hot tub the heated swimming pool generally available may 19th to october 31st please note the pool will be partially drained outside of these times children should be supervised at all times and not allowed onto the field with the animalsnnpool roomnnthe pool room offers a space to get changed ready for the pool or the hot tub and includes pool towels for your usennthe pool room also includes a shower toilet and sinknnbbq areannnext to the pool room is partially enclosed covered outdoor bbq area gas is provided please only use this bbq if you are confident in using the equipment and are happy with the fire safety precautionsnnlakennin the adjoining field to the house is the lake with a basic lake house fishing here or on the river is permitted during fishing season but not we do not provide equipmentnnaround the farmnnsee guest access we also hire bicycles payable locallynnfor a tour of the house take a look on my insta at holidayletmyhome guest access guest accessnenjoying the farm and our facilitiesnone of the biggest benefits about staying on a farm is theres loads to see and do without even leaving the site its great for families friends and couples alikenplease help yourselves to chicken eggs the chickens are beyond the car park through the opening onto the fieldsnnot far from the chickens are a family of goats they like being fed vegetables fruit even bananasnwalk past the past the goats follow the path down to the river and take a riverside walk either way along the public foot pathsnthe horses do not belong to the farm and are looked after by their owners who come daily to see them please do not feed the horses but they are always happy for a stroke on the nose and a hellonnext to the chickens is the poly tunnel and when there is fresh produce youll find some in your welcome pack and can refill this when there is plenty feeling green fingerednthe grounds of the farm are always in need to something so feel free to help us keep the farm looking lovely whether that be a bit of weeding dead heading or just advice we will welcome any helpnall around this field are many blackberry bushes please help yourselves when they are ripenthere are other tenants on the farm that either live with us in the converted barns or just let a stable and field they are all very nice and always happy to answer any questions

Title: Cotswold Cottage, Pool & Spa, Jacuzzi, long stays
Description: spa complex with indoor swimming pool jacuzzi tennis astro court for parties and families wanting relaxed civilised luxury stays wonderful walking cycling and country pubs local babysitter spa ladyncheltenham festivals worcestershire and gloucestershire the space the spacenthis is a perfect place to work from with strong wifi and peaceful areas please contact me for great deals on longer bookingsnspa complex with an indoor swimming pool jacuzzi astro court tennis football the cottage is set within 80 acres at the edge of the cotswolds and at the foot of bredon hill with beautiful walks scenery and country pubsnour family home is adjacent and the property has an astro court tennis court april oct football pitch nov march indoor swimming pool steam room and jacuzzi which you are welcome to use the pool and spa are attached to the cottage so you dont have to go outside to access it and can come down in your dressing gowns to relax and swim and it is specifically for your use as guests in the cottage and for our family only there are no other properties with access to the spa which makes it a unique luxury stay the cottage has its own garden facing out onto fields and beautiful views we are a family with 3 young children and have designed this cottage as an ideal holiday cottage which we would want to stay in comfort luxury but practical living with lots of activities to do to keep everyone happy swimming tennis walking bredon hill the malverns cycling football pub and farm shop eating culture shopping shakespeare country 40 mins broadway 15 mins cheltenham 40 mins we are 20 minutes from cheltenham race course with room to land a helicopter if required and 40 minutes from soho farmhousenif you give us details about your group and or family we will cater your stay towards you and make every effort to provide extras such as toys games bikes baby equipment etc to help you bring less and enjoy your stay more we are happy to help you organise babysitters spa treatments etcnthe master bedroom and 2nd bedroom can either be used with twin beds or super king all sheets are 300 thread 100 cottonnif you are a slightly larger group dependent on your make up we are able to offer 2 more beds available in the property eg family of 5 plus grandparentsnas per the house rules one well behaved dog in the uncarpeted areas per party dependent on the make up of the party we may on occasions allow a 2nd dog but this needs to be approved in writing before you book the propertynthis is the perfect place to come and cycle mountain or racing bikes and we have a secure lock up to keep your bikesnnfinally although our set up offers something similar to a boutique hotel offering we are not a hotel and the cottage is part of our home and should be treated as such we do the cleaning and changeovers ourselves and expect you to leave the cottage as you found itnnif you are looking for more of a spoiling hotel type stay and would rather have other people clear up after yourselves then we can recommend a lovely hotel called dormy house just down the road in broadway guest access guest accessnour family home is adjacent and the property has an astro court indoor swimming pool jacuzzi and steam room which you are welcome to usenthe astro tennis court is accessible via the back of the house without having to go through our private garden other things to note other things to notencheck in is any time from 3pm please whats app your eta when you are on your way so that we can try and be here to welcome younncheck out is before 10am on the day of your departurennif you or any of your party are showing any symptoms of coronavirus please cancel your booking please take covid tests before you arrive at well furlong to ensure that you are negativennthe cottage and spa are deep cleaned between each party of guests the chemical levels in the pool and jacuzzi are checked daily using high strength chemicals before and after we clean everything is sprayed with antibacterial solution including all handles door knobs tv remote keys key pads etc we operate a self check in and out following advice on social distancing

Title: Indoor Pool near Goodwood  - Boxgrove Chichester
Description: welcome to our lovely home with indoor tropically heated swimming pool and hot tub situated within a 15 minute walk or a 2 minute car drive from the goodwood estate we have 3 ensuite bedrooms and 2 smaller rooms 4 bathrooms and masses of parking the house is set in the historic village of boxgrove with great walks and a pub with a lovely warm fire ideal for a short breaknnwe also have a small room suitable for two at our annexe in strettington look for goodwood barn on airbnb the space the spacenthe house is perfect for a get away we have an indoor security covered swimming pool heated to 30 degrees and hot tub and luxury bathrooms with power showersnnthe house as 56 bedrooms with 3 double ensuite bedrooms with shower andbath additional shower room and loo downstairsnntv in large sitting room and conservatory large american fridge and open fire in sitting room garden has bbq and ample seatingnndriveway for 6 cars electronically gated and securennoutside there is a bbq and outdoor seatingnnnearby attractions nn tennis 3 minute drive our private house has its own private tennis court for your use at any time during your staynn goodwood aerodrome 2 minute drive fly a spitfire or take a pleasure flight around the isle of wightnn goodwood motor circuit 2 minute drive take your car around the historic track the only original track in the worldnn goodwood golf 1 minute drive two high quality courses and driving rangenn goodwood races 5 minute drive the premier flat raving in the countrynn goodwood house 2 minute drive a fine example of a blend of jacobean and edwardian architecture the seat of the duke of richmond take afternoon tea therenntinwood vinyard 2 minutes try our very own local fizz with regular tasting and cheese afternoons not to be missednn west wittering beach 20 minutes the uks finest sandy beachnnwe have another property just down the road in strettington see goodwood barn with tennis guest access guest accessnswimming pool hot tub gated home other things to note other things to notenits a brilliant place to be so near goodwood with a super pub up the road the anglesey arms is not to be missed for their food is awesome

Title: The Pool House
Description: set within the grounds of our georgian manor house the pool house provides a wonderful retreat for those looking to escape to the country whilst being a short drive from the seaside town of sidmouth and nearby city of exeter the pool house has just been renovated may 2021 to a very high specification providing spacious contemporary accommodation with use of heated outdoor swimming pool june to september and sauna the space the spacenguests will love the modern comfortable decor in the pool house downstairs offers a great opportunity to drink your morning coffee at the kitchen bar enjoying the vaulted ceilings and natural light from the bifolding doors leading straight onto the pool area a huge walk in shower marble counters complete the newly renovated bathroom upstairs is a very cosy living area and bedroom with magical views over the church and fields opposite guest access guest accessnguests are welcome to enjoy the pool area shared and the front gardens the rear gardens are not for guests use other than when accessing the pool house other things to note other things to notenthe kitchen area includes a 2 ring induction hob and microwave for cooking it does not have a oven or dishwasher

Title: One bed apartment use of hot tub & pool available
Description: wraysbury is a beautiful village ideally located for heathrow windsor ascot and mainline trains to london 45 minsnlegoland thorpe park and chessingtonnnour apartment is walking distance of all village faclities and the station is a 15 min walknnthe property offers exclusive use of the pool during summer monthsnnthe property has 1 double bedroom open living area with smart tv incl amazon prime and netflix and modern kitchen with granite worktops with views of the pool and gardens the space the spacenimportantnnhot tubnfor new bookings from 12th march 2022 for march and april 2022 charges for use for jacuzzi will be payable upon arrivalnncharges will be 30 per overnight stay use from 800am to midnightnn24 hours notice required to ensure water is 3840oc on arrivalnnnwe do not allow parties of any type and do not tolerate bad behaviour or excessive noisenn new inflatable hot tub area open from 1st october end april the hot tub is then closed and the pool openednnnpool open 1st may closes 30th september the pool is heated but heating is only switched on when outside temperatures are in the late teens for further information please refer to guess accessnnnthe apartment has a modern interior and layout comprising a large open plan living dining and kitchen space one double bedroom with double bed and compact ensuite bathroom with modern shower basin wcnnit is ideally suited to accomadate 2 adults or 2 adults 2 children the children would sleep on the very large corner sofa see pics or a folding bed can be providednmaximum 3 adults or 2 adults and 2 childrennnfacilities include a 55 inch smart tv netflix and free view channels blue tooth sound system and free access to the internet a modern kitchen with hob microwave combination and granite work tops crockery etcnthermostaticly controlled electric heating throughout bedding and towels providednplease look at our photos for more detailsnnplease note due to close proximity to heathrow guests may incur aeroplane noise guest access guest accessnguests have exclusive use of our heated outdoor swimming pool during the summer months mayseptember and exclusive e cross to the hot tub during from october to end april local charges apply use of all the facilities within the barn to prepare meals and make yourself comfortable all we ask is that you respect the fixtures and fittings so that they are in as good a condition for the next guest as you found them during your stay other things to note other things to notenwe do not allow parties of any type and do not tolerate bad behaviour or excessive noise

Title: Self contained Annex with log burner
Description: this really is the most beautiful of getaways the space is beautifully decorated cosy and cleanneasily accessible under 2 miles from junction 27 m5 and tiverton parkwaynmusicians and writers find this a useful retreat to work inndogs are not allowed in the bnb but they are welcome to stay with our dogs in the lobby next to the bnb where they can be as wet and muddy as they please just so long as they are well behaved the space the spacenalthough it is easily accessible we are in the heart of the countryside surrounded by farmland there are no street lights so the stars look wonderful most nightsnthe pool has a swim pump that was developed for olympic swimmers so it can be fierce or as gentle as you like there is a boat building workshop on the premises and i am about to renovate the old stable so there is usually something going on though you have your private space with a garden there are plenty of herbs growing and i have labelled most of them so do help yourselves guest access guest accessnyou have the annex and there is a private garden just for guests other things to note other things to notenif you would like to bring your dog please contact me your dog can stay in the lobby next to the annex with my dogs or i can put my dogs in my kitchen or in a stable or your car under shelter if they prefernif you want to bring a horse i have separate stables paddocks and an arena you will need to contact me to make arrangements and i would prefer it if you could visit first

Title: Stunning Barn conversion with heated swimming pool
Description: courage cottage is a two bedroom detached barn conversion in a georgian farmyardthe barn was converted in 2013 so has all modern conveniences including underfloor heating it is very individual and situated in a quiet rural setting it has two bedrooms with ensuite bathrooms the village of martinstown has an excellent pub shop and post office dorchester is 2 miles away and has every facility including good rail connections in all directionsswimming pool shared open may to sept the space the spacenthis quiet valley in an area of outstanding natural beauty is located between dorchester and weymouth and therefore within easy reach of shops restaurants museums and the numerous seaside activities available in and around weymouth the abbotsbury swannery and gardens are within easy reach as are many footpaths leading to the coast as well as the many remote beaches reached situated along the famous jurassic coastline which is a world heritage site the properties are in the old farmyard and reached down a private road and therefore well away from trafficnngolf several golf courses within a few miles in stunning scenery guest access guest accessnthe heated swimming pool is available form may 1st to september 30th we cant guarantee it will be available outside of these timesnguests are free to enjoy the old walled garden which is a quiet secluded haven other things to note other things to notenthe second bedroom has a steep spiral staircase which is perfectly accessible but not for anyone who is a little unsteady on their feetnthe swimming pool is only shared with owners who use it rarely it is outdoor and open from may to september only

Title: Priors Mesne Coach House, Wye Valley
Description: priors mesne coach house is a converted open plan loft barn space romantically located on a secluded farm estate half a mile down a lime tree avenue and 100 yards from the main house breathtaking views over the severn it is the perfect get away for a couple plus dog with easy access to walking and cycling in the wye valley and forest of dean or canoeing on the wye dog walking and a picnic table are available in the adjacent field and there is a boules pitch with small terrace and seating the space the spacenthe coach house living space is located on the first floor accessed by an external stone staircase the accommodation is open plan with far reaching views over the estuary a cosy sitting room area equipped with log burner tv dvd and a large sofa and daybed there is a candle lit dining table adjacent to a king size bed in the sleeping area with another tv and dvd micro kitchen for cooking heating small meals with oven sink 4 hobs microwave fridge freezer kettle toaster and kitchen utensils cutlery plates etc there is a separate bathroom with toilet bath and shower guest access guest accessn outside seating on boules pitch gardenn dog walking field with picnic tablen tennis by arrangementn swimming by arrangement mid may until beginning of september other things to note other things to notenthere are long walks from the house as the gloucestershire way runs along the wood abovenwe provide in the kitchen some bread milk eggs filter and instant coffee tea and sugar for your arrival as well as a basket of logs and kindling more logs can be bought at the petrol station on the a48 in alvington

Title: The Little Stable for 2  & Indoor Heated Pool
Description: edge of village converted stable at flos cottages for 2 only 2k from town countryside setting with rural views a bolthole for couples with countryside walks from the doorstepnna fully equipped kitchen living area shower room and indoor heated poolnnenjoy the patio in the evening sun enjoy the views or grab a blanket snuggle up enjoy a beautiful starry evening after a day out exploring the local countryside coastline the space the spacenonly 10 minutes from the a303 but utterly peaceful the little stable is tucked away down a quiet country lane on the edge of picturesque east coker only a mile from yeovil there are 2 pubs in walking distance 20 minute stroll and plenty of excellent places to eat nearby and the beautiful jurassic coast only half an hour awaynnthe heated indoor pool is just a few steps away with access reserved for stable guests 9am1pm at 13 metres long its enough to get a few laps innnplease note the little stable is not suitable for babies toddlers or children it is what it says on the tin so if youre after something palatial the little stable might not be what youre looking for guest access
