Title: Priors Mesne, Keepers Yard, Wye Valley
Description: keepers yard is the perfect romantic or family break a converted loft in the coach house on a peaceful farm estate 100 yards from the main house half a mile down a lime avenue with lovely views over the severn it is ideally located for access to walking in the wye valley forest of dean canoeing on the wye or bicycling on miles of off road tracks dog walking a picnic table are available in the field there is access to an outdoor area a pool and tennis court by arrangementin summer the space the spacenthe keepers yard living space is located on the first floor accessed by an external stone staircase the accommodation is two bedrooms a bathroom boot room and an open plan living room and kitchen with far reaching views over the estuary equipped with log burner tv dvd wifi and a large sofa and armchair there is a candle lit dining table a king size bed open plan kitchen with oven sink 4 hobs microwave fridge large freezer dish washer kettle toaster and kitchen utensils cutlery plates etc there is a separate bathroom with toilet bath and shower there is a laundry with clothes washer and dryer located directly beneath the property all sheets and towels are provided with the rooms ready prepared and one basket of logs for the fire are provided for your arrival more can be bought at the petrol station in alvington on the a48 guest accessn outside seating on balconyn dog walking field with picnic tablen tennis by arrangementn swimming by arrangement mid may up to beginning of september other things to notenthere are long walks from the house as the gloucestershire way runs along the wood abovenwe provide in the kitchen some bread milk eggs filter and instant coffee tea and sugar for your arrival as well as a basket of logs and kindling more logs can be bought at the petrol station on the a48 in alvington

Title: The Pool House at Upper Farm (near Thame/Oxford)
Description: enjoy the tranquillity and seclusion of our spacious pool house chalet complete with private seasonally heated 1 may to 30 september outdoor swimming pool and all year round hot tub jacuzzi spa located on our 30 acre farm and equestrian centre in the rural hamlet of henton on the outskirts of chinnor oxfordshirennthe pool house is an ideal location for couples families walkers cyclists coarsecarp anglers and business travellers the space the spacencovid19 restrictions for englandnguests can book with confidence that we will refund any reservations that needs to be cancelled due to government covid restrictionsnndue to the additional cleaning and sanitisation required to keep our guests safe we are unable to offer any form of early checkin or late checkoutnnopened for the first time as a holiday let in 2016 and refurbished again in 2021 we are sure that the pool house at upper farm henton will be your home away from homennwith its own private outdoor swimming pool heated from 1 may to 30 september and an all year round hot tub jacuzzi spa youll be surrounded by acres of green paddocks and with our 1 acre carp and coarse fishing lake our selfcatering chalet is the perfect setting for those who want to get away from the hustle and bustle of everyday lifennthe pool house at upper farm henton is ideal for couples looking for a romantic getaway or as a base for families walkers cyclists anglers and business travellers and as we are only 40 minutes from heathrow airport its also ideal for international visitorsnnlocated in an area of natural beauty and with spectacular views over the chiltern hills to bledlow ridge it is the perfect setting for those who want a relaxing break in the beautiful oxfordshire countryside the village of chinnor is 12 miles away with convenience stores and a few eateries plus we have the historic chinnor steam railway the town of princes risborough is just 4 miles away with a good rail service into london marylebone 40 to 50 minutes and the historic market town of thame is 7 miles awaynnfor birdwatchers our fishing lake is surrounded by trees and is the home to red kites kingfishers sparrow hawks woodpeckers buzzards kestrels ducks moor hens pheasants and some very friendly robins and wrens in the evening you are like to see foxes badgers rabbits and munt jacknnwith two public footpaths running through the farm walkers and cyclists can quickly and easily get on to the phoenix trail and the ridgeway with miles upon miles of footpaths and bridleways to explorennangling guests at the pool house have unlimited and inclusive access during their stay to fish our 1 acre carp and coarse lake located 100m from your holiday accommodationnnthe pool house is a studio chalet featuringnnsleeps between 1 to 4 guestsnnmain studio room 360 sq ftn king size bed with tempur memory foam mattress and bedside tables bedding includedn l shaped sofan 2 large double wardrobes with 6 draws and plenty of hanging spacen 4 seater dining table and chairsn 46 wall mounted adjustable hd led tv with freeview and sky hd movies sports entertainment packsn music system with airplaybluetooth streamingn large patio doors leading to pool hot tub and gardennnkitchen 70 sq ftn electric induction hobn electric oven grilln full sized fridge freezern slimline dishwashern kettlen microwaven pots pans crockery glassware and cutleryn iron and ironing boardn tea coffee and sugarnnbathroom 47 sq ftn electric showern bathroom cabinet with led lighting and shaver charging pointn heated electric towel railn wc and hand basinn towels includedn toiletries included body washshampoo conditioner handwash hand creamnnentrance boot room 65 sq ftn electric radiatorn storage for bikes boots and soiled clothingn door leading to pool hot tub and gardenn optional small double folding bed sleeps 2 adults or 2 childrennnswimming pool hot tub gardenn outdoor seasonally heated swimming pool 12m 40ft long 6m 20ft wide shallow end 90cm 3ft deep end 21m 7ftn hot tub jacuzzi spa with bluetooth sound system available all year roundn non slip artificial grass garden area 21m 69ft long 136m 44ft widen pool loungersn 4 seat patio table chairs and parasolnngeneraln free wifin free offroad parkingn minimum stay applies depending on time of yearn maximum of 4 guestsnnimportant extra informationnwe have a zero tolerance policy on drugs anyone found smoking or taking drugs or any other illegal substance will be reported to the police and evicted from the property immediately there will be no refund for any unused nights and you will forfeit the full security depositnnthere is no smoking permitted inside the accommodation smoking is permitted outside only please use the ashtray providednnno excessive outdoor noise after 11pmnabsolutely no parties or eventsnnmaximum of 2 well behaved dogs per property 15 per dog per stay charge payable on arrival guest access guest accessnguests have private use of our outdoor seasonally heated swimming pool may to september year round access to the hot tub jacuzzi spa and 24 hour access to our carp and coarse fishing lake other things to note other things to notenthe pool house is ideal for 1 to 4 guests please note that we will not accept any bookings with more than 4 peoplenplease make sure that you are happy with the sleeping arrangements and bed configurations prior to bookingnnplease contact the host if you require further informationnnwe reserve the right to refuse or cancel any booking where there are more than 4 guests in the partynnwe also reserve the right to charge an additional 15 per person per night for extra guests not declared at the time of booking

Title: * Jurassic coast, Swallow Cottage - Access to Indoor Pool & Dog friendly
Description: swallow hosts x 2 guests has been recently been refurbished it has an open plan living kitchen areanthe singlestorey cottages at champernhayes have been created from the conversion of the original farmhouse buildings which date back to 1482 swallow cottage is situated around a central courtyard have been awarded 4 star gold by the visit england the aa for comfort location dcor and facilities the traditional countrystyle kitchen is open plan with a dining area and comprehensively equipped the bedroom has their own ensuite bathrooms and you will find your beds already made with towels provided relax in your very own country retreat complete with digital television and dvd playerrecorder we can supply a selection of movies books and board games the space

Title: Beech Tree Cottage @ The Manor Mill near Exmoor
Description: beech tree cottage is a delightful cottage nestled in the beautiful hills of somerset on the south side of a wooded valley beside the river tone nearly 200 years old this lovely cottage has been newly updated to create a charming wellequipped holiday homenthe shared grounds are a paradise of fields water meadows and gardens a haven for wildlife and stargazing in our dark skies our heated indoor swimming pool and play area are shared between our cottages and offer fun for everyone the space the spacenoriginally the grain storage barn for the mill beech tree cottage nestles in the hillside overlooked by a huge beech treenthis charming and characterful cottage is approached from a flight of pretty stone steps it has a comfortable sitting room with an original exposed stone wall and a dining area leading into the new open plan welldesigned compact kitchennall on the same level a short inner hall leads to the bedrooms bedroom 1 has a king size bed and bedroom 2 has a ziplink bed which can be twin beds or a superking bednbeech tree cottage is south facing with river and garden views and an outside eating area guests are also welcome to take advantage of the rest of the beautiful grounds and river banks which are shared with our other cottages mill coach house and bankside cottagenour facilities includen electric stoven refrigerator with small freezer compartmentn microwaven toaster and kettlen smart tvn free wifi and 4g mobile accessn bathroom with a shower washbasin and wcn shared heated indoor swimming pooln shared childrens play arean shared barbecuen a separate shared utility has a washing machine and tumble driern ample free parkingnnlinen and bath towels are included but please provide your own swimming and beach towelsnwere sorry but dogs are not allowed we do have two very friendly waggy tailed labradors who live on site and are a part of our family they have free use of all the gardens so you will meet them wandering around

Title: Safari Tent at Pennard Hill Farm
Description: the safari tent offers an escape from the norm with stunning views over the mendip hills offering you the chance to relax rest and enjoy the tranquility of the somerset countrysidenplease note the safari tent is off grid the space the spacenthe safari tent is a brilliant place to bring children as there is endless space for them to run around there is plenty to do such as build a den in the woods hunt for bugs go for long walks meet the cows play hide and seek and climb treesna holiday in our safari tent is a great way to relax and and switch off from the fast pace of life take some deep breaths inhale that fresh somerset air and while away your days curled up with a good book or exploring the countrysidenthe safari tent sleeps six people in total in two twin beds one double and one king sized bed snuggle into crisp white sheets and fluffy feather duvets this is glamping at its best there is a kitchen with a wonderful wood burning stove which is perfect for cooking and it will keep you warm on the coldest of days there is a seating area with a comfy sofa and lots of games for the children to enjoy the kitchen is fully equipped with crockery cutlery and everything you should need to cook a delicious meal and there is also a kitchen table to seat six there is an undercounter fridge with a small freezer section too at the back of the tent there is a hot shower and separate loo but these are all within the tent itself so there is no creeping across fields to find the loo in the middle of the nightnweve decided not to have electricity in the safari tent we use oil lamps and candles for light we do provide battery powered phone charging packs but there is no need to tell the children thatnnnnthere is so much to do in the area surrounding pennard hill farm from balloon rides to golf and clay pigeon shooting longleat safari park is only a 30 minute drive away and fleet air arm museum is under 20 minutes theres an abundance of fantastic pubs and restaurants if you feel like a night off cookingnnplease note the safari tent is situated on a steep hill and is sadly not suitable for those with trouble walkingnnno pets are allowed in the safari tent unless its been requested and agreed with the owner upon booking

Title: Hitchin Barn conversion
Description: set in beautiful hertfordshire countryside yet only minutes away from hitchin town centre and luton airport we offer a relaxed and peaceful stay in our detached 17th century tithe barn up to four bedrooms one ensuite one family bathroom two shower rooms and a separate toilet indoor private pool games room with full sized snooker table large kitchendiner and galleried lounge overlooking pool the space the spacenvery near to a1 m1 and luton airport five minutes from the lovely market town of hitchin 30 minutes by train to london kings cross yet tucked away in beautiful countryside a totally detached 17th century barn which includes a private pool just for your use a games room with a full sized snooker table up to four bedrooms and sleeps up to eight guest access guest accessnprice is for hiring whole barn conversion including exclusive use of pool other things to note other things to notenthe bedrooms are as follows a first floor double bedroom with five foot bed a second floor twin bedroom both these have access to bathroom and toilet on the ground floor is a large room with double sofa bed and a fold up bed to be used as required please bring your own bedlinen for these access to first floor bathroom and also two ground floor shower rooms and toilet one newly added ground floor double bedroom with five foot bed and ensuite shower room and toiletnnminimum booking is two nightsnall bedlinen and towels providednnchild safetyndue to a recent review we have now fitted child safety gates at the top of each staircase limiting access to the pool for children there is also recently fitted perspex in the viewing gallery area stopping children from climbing onto the room divider a double door lockable has been fitted to the new ensuite bedroom for child safety and to limit noisennpetsnwe regret to say that we cannot have pets staying because of the swimming poolnnthe pool is heated to between 24 and 30 degrees

Title: Summer Lodge
Description: the summer lodge boasts uninterrupted and unrivaled views of the fleet lagoon and world famous chesil beach from its elevated position on the jurassic coast path located just one mile from the isle of portland the home of the 2012 olympic sailing events and a short drive from weymouth town centre and harbour our stunning holiday home is perfectly situated for anyone wanting a coastal escape the space the spacenthe lodgennthe summer lodge boasts a glass frontage which allows guests to enjoy the changing tides and wildlife from the comfort and warmth of the large and tastefully furnished open plan living and dining area sunsets here really are an incredible spectacle not to be missed and a large verandah complete with outdoor sofas and dining table allows you to relax and take in the viewnnmodern furnishings are a staple of the property which is finished to a high spec throughout the stylish kitchen contains everything you hcould possibly want and more for your stay with pots pans crockery and glassware galorennthere are two double bedrooms each with large fitted wardrobe dressing table and ample space for you and your belongings to spread out after a busy day additionally there are two bathrooms one with a bath and the other a double showernnthere is a small double sofa bed in the lounge area which can also be used please note there are no blinds on the large feature window please take this into consideration if you plan on using this space for guests to sleepnnall bed linen and towels are provided as well as toiletries and kitchen essentials so there is no need to pack the kitchen sink all you need to bring is yourselfnnnthe holiday parknnsummer lodge is situated on the five star family run holiday park chesil vista part of the waterside holiday group it is located in the private owners area which is separate from the rest of the park and extremely quiet chesil vista holiday park boasts plenty of facilities which you are more than welcome to take advantage of during your staynnas a guest at summer lodge you will have access tonn indoor leisure complex with gym pool sauna and solarium please note there is a small charge for use of this facility 5 adult day pass 4 child day pass 25 adult week pass and 20 child week pass prices are correct as of january 2020nn on site entertainmentnn bar breeze restaurantnn laundrynn soft play areann amusement arcadenn outdoor adventure play areann outdoor gymnn chesil venuenn outdoor terrace areann sports field guest access guest accessnsummer lodge is completely self contained guests have a private entrance parking for two cars and complete use of the two bedrooms two bathrooms lounge kitchen and veranda other things to note other things to noten wifi you can use up to five devices on the wifi to ensure everyone has a good experience each device can use up to 1gb of data per day when you use up your data allowance the connection will be suspended until midnight when the allowance will be reset the following day any unused allowance does not roll over video applications and streaming will rapidly use up your allowancenndisclaimer wifi access is controlled by chesil vista rather than ourselves and as such any problems with accessibility should be directed at reception efforts will be made to ensure connectivity throughout your stay however in the unfortunate event of breakdown refunds will not be offerednn laundry washing machines and tumble dryers are located in an on site laundry rather than in the lodge itselfnn pets we are pet friendly and welcome one well behaved dog sorry no very young puppies into our home we respectfully ask that pets are not allowed on the furniture and are not left unattended in the property for any period of timennwe endeavor to give your holiday experience a personal touch providing complementary baked goods snacks refreshments and cosmetics during your stay so that the lodge feels like a home from homennwe are always here to help therefore should you require any further information or have any questions please do not hesitate to contact us

Title: Patch: Beautiful country cottage with outdoor pool
Description: this natural stone cottage is set in the beautiful countryside out the way of any noise making it the perfect place to relax the cottage benefits fromn double bedroomn brand new fitted kitchenn log burnern free wifi and smart tv with netflixn sofa bedn patio with tables and chairsn shared swimming pool accessn shared games roomn shared tennis courtnnthere are lots of beautiful walks if you fancy an explore including the strawberry line that stretches from cheddar to congresbury the space the spacenlocated in an area of outstanding natural beauty private drive beautiful views 4 cottages located in 36 acres swimming pool and shower block tennis court games room and laundrynthe cottage itself has a brand new kitchen with breakfast bar open plan living area with log burner double bedroom and bathroom with bathshower outside patio area with furniture and beautiful viewsnnthis beautiful region of somerset offers walking for all abilities along with some great locations to visit including crooks peak cheddar gorge clevedon pier winscombe village is a short drive or 2025 minute walk good range of shops including bakery butcher pharmacy local pubs coop and cafesnclose to cheddar weston super mare and bristol

Title: Beautiful Cottage in Stokenham overlooking the Sea
Description: a lovely attached cottage own private garden parking space shared use of the main house gardens and pool looking out to sea in the heart of the south hams a beautiful historic house renovated with cool retro decor superfast wifi hardwired tv with netflix in a cosy sitting room as a charming old building the cottage has some low doorways that the taller amongst us need to be aware of great bathroom well equipped eat in kitchen and comfortable bedrooms with fresh linen and towels the space the spacenwe live in the main house next door and are happy to help with any queries local knowledge transport info etc there are two pubs in walking distance in the village and the sea is a 10 minute walk guest access guest accessnwould recommend having a car but we are on a bus route that runs between dartmouth and kingsbridge guests have full use of all the grounds and of course the swimming pool which has been refurbished and upgraded for the 2021 season it is closed normally from around october until things warm up in the spring other things to note other things to notenthe cottage is beautiful old and comfortable with all the mod cons important to know for any taller guests some of the doorways and entrances are lower so must take care and that there are two flights of stairs one from the front door to the main landing and one up to the twin and single room there is a stair gate on the top landing and on the lower landing it is easy to close doors to itnnalso the pool is open from the spring until about the end of september but our beautiful grounds are always here to explore

Title: The Bakehouse. Eco-friendly vegan country annexe
Description: the bakehouse is a small but beautiful self contained annexe on a quiet country lane with a private walled garden offering a comfortable double bed living space with dining table for two shower room and well equipped kitchen fridge sink kettle toaster induction hob situated within gorgeous south downs countryside with plentiful walking opportunities but just a 10 minutes drive from historic lewes and 25 minutes from brighton perfect for a rural retreat no tv but fast guest wifi the space the spacenthe bakehouse is a small but well equipped selfcontained annexe with sunny private walled garden chairs and table provided wake up to the sound of birdsong and have a chance to truly relax in this peaceful locationnthere is also a heated outdoor saltwater pool available for exclusive hire 20 per hour during your stay please note the outdoor pool is closed in the winter months enquire when booking as to pool availability guest access guest accessnthe village of barcombe is a mile walk away either over the fields or around the country lanes a car or bike would be handy if you wish to venture further afield other things to note other things to notenowned and run by a vegan family we try to be as earthfriendly and ecological as possible and being vegan is part of this philosophy of lifenour space inside and out is vegan so we ask you to respect our beliefs and not to bring or consume any animal products on our propertyn please note the outdoor pool is closed in the winter months enquire when booking as to pool availability

Title: Holiday cottage 2 people 30 m2 10 minutes from Honfleur
Description: 10 minutes from honfleur you will find an ideal place to recharge your batteries the cottage 2 people 30m2 is located in the property on a landscaped and enclosed garden of almost 2 hectaresncomposed of a room bed 160x200 and a lunch area with table and 2 chairsna bathroom and kitchennview of the park garden table and chair umbrella deckchairs and weber barbecuenparking on the property and free access to the pool from april to october 11m by 5m heated to 27 degrees guest access guest accessnparking located inside the property swimming pool heated to 27 degrees from midapril to late october other things to note other things to notennumerous activities nearbynnumerous hiking trails st gatien golf course equestrian center 5 minutes away museums fishing tennis nthe charming town of honfleur with its museums and lively poetic alleys its small harbour its saturday market is a 1015 minute drivendeauvilletrouville at 25 minutesnyou will be less than an hour from the majestic cliffs of etretat

Title: Holiday Bungalow East Witterings  Bracklesham bay
Description: we would like to welcome guests to our holiday bungalow your canine friends will be very welcomennsleeps 4 with all bedding supplied there is a tv with freeview free wifi and fully equipped kitchennnthe park is situated near a nature reserve and is 5 minutes walk from bracklesham bay beach east wittering onsite facilities medmerry arms pub seasonal heated outside poolna crazy golf course two tennis courts table tennis and a dog agility course plus a dedicated washroom for dogs the space the spacenyou have the bungalow and free access to all facilities on the holiday park guest access guest accessnguest have free access to all facilities other things to note other things to notenthe pool is shut from end of september until the spring

Title: Secluded hideaway, heated pool, walks, fossils
Description: the annex is bright comfortable and cosy with a new wood burner last winter the public footpath crossing our garden next to the river char links with many others great for dog walkers we are close to charmouth beach and lyme regis renowned for their fossil treasures love swimming our freshwater pool is generally heated to a very cosy 29 30 degrees warm bath temperature and can be used at all times of yearnnwith advance notice the twin beds can be connected to form a king size bed the space the spacenwhilst the annexe is attached to the main house privacy would be respected at all times full refurbishment has recently been completed and a private deck added there is plenty of off street parking and you will have a warm welcome from stephen and di we have two friendly dogs of our own and your own dogs are welcome toonthe kitchen is well kitted out but but there are also a number of excellent places to eat in the area including the famous river cottage in axminster guest access guest accessnguests will have access to all parts of the garden and swimming pool please note that it is a freshwater pool so babies will need the double nappy system to ensure no pees in the poolnnlandscaping and garden improvements are ongoing other things to note other things to notenthe historical town of bridport is 5 miles away and offers excellent street markets on wednesdays and saturdays broadchurch the drama was filmed nearby at west bay near golden cap cliffs the highest point in dorset with unparalleled views of the coastline eating out the famous river cottage in axminster the tytherleigh arms our favourite about 15 mins by car the iilchester arms on the nearby symondsbury estate which also has its own excellent cafrestaurant and the railway carriage in west baynnnote there are no hidden charges in our pricing eg no cleaning fee

Title: Fingals Green Oak Barn with shared swimming pool
Description: we built this traditional carpenter oak greenoak framed barn in 1987 constructed with heavy oak beams and trusses over a large open plan area it is glazed between the uprights giving it a wonderful light rustic warm and spacious feelingnnit is situated by the pool on two levels with the downstairs bedroom opening onto its own private patio gardennnthe barn has a private balcony overlooking the grass tennis court with stairs leading down to the shared indoor heated pool perfect the space the spacenthe fingals barn is a unique living space one huge room with green oak trusses in the roof this is an early frame built by the local firm carpenter oak the balcony over looks the tennis court and the garden and during the summer months is a wonderful spot to have your early evening aperitifs and eat alfresco there are three bedrooms two upstairs a twin with a toilet and a double with a shared bathroom downstairs is a kingsize bed with ensuite bathroom with shower the large sitting room upstairs is open plan with a wonderful grand piano at one end the dining area also upstairs adjacent to the sitting room has a large dining table and open plan kitchen with all mod cons larger parties might want to book the wisteria suite sleeps 4 next door to the barn and share mealsndownstairs the double bedroom has its own private patio surrounded by greenery other things to note other things to notenthere is no mobile phone signal here it is so peaceful and quiet however there is free wifi everywhere so you can stay connected to the outside world if you need to

Title: Pear Store cottage, rural location & indoor pool
Description: a beautifully furnished cottage in oving just 4 miles outside chichester 4 miles from goodwood and great beaches walks nearby large master bedroom with king size bed and ample off road parking outside our local pub is 200 yards away pet free property the space the spacena lovely self contained annex cottage attached to the main farmhouse in oving village the open plan living dinning and kitchen area has a great airy feel with its high ceiling and is beautifully finished the kitchen is well equipped with modern appliances the large master bedroom offers a comfortable king size bed full wall fitted wardrobes vanity table and luxurious white company bed linen the bathroom has a fitted shower over the bath to soak away the day a stair ladder off the main living space leads to a further mezzanine level containing two single beds perfect for two extra adults or children aged over 7 years due to steepness of stair also ideal for a couple with a baby to occupy the master bedroom with travel cot secluded location off road with ample parking for up to 2 cars just outside guest access guest accessnlocated on a private rural farm estate there is discreet parking for up to two vehicles outside the property your own separate patio and garden with seating and bbq areannthe tennis court is available between 10am and 5pm only due to the proximity of another holiday let and ask you to respect other guestsnthere are a selection of well loved rackets in the laundry room for guest use but request they are wiped down after use with the spray provided we suggest bringing your own balls to playnnthe pool is now available all year round as from october 2020 november 2021 it is shared with another 2 bedroom holiday lets all year as well as our home which is also a holiday let july to septembernduring peak seasons swimming times will apply to ensure everyone has one slot per day there is also open swimming time but guests must only swim with their household and not enter if someone else is using the facilitynwe suggest bringing robes and flip flops for ease of moving from your accommodation to the pool arrive swim ready

Title: Three Bedrooms With Own Pool, Isle of Wight
Description: with the exclusive use of a heated swimming pool and three bedrooms willow lodge will be a popular holiday home for families and is the best brand new holiday home we have seen on the islandndesigned and built in 2021 specifically for holidaymakers willow lodge is south facingnnwillow lodge is in the grounds of westridge house if willow lodge alone is booked westridge house will not have holidaymakers just the owners the space the spacenthe lodge comfortably sleeps six people with three bedrooms two king size beds and a twin bedroom with the king size bedrooms enjoying the use of a jack and jill bathroom with a walkinshower there is also a family bathroom with a walkinshowernnwhile it may be tempting to stay in and around the lodge and swimming pool during a holiday the beaches of seaview and puckpool park are just a five minute drive away with bembridge countyfile magazines recent village of the year winner is ten minutes and ideally located to explore all parts of the islandnnthe spacious light and comfortable living and dining room with a 50 inch television overlooks the swimming pool with bifolding doors and leads to the modern well equipped kitchen which includes work surfaces dishwasher oven and hob microwave toaster kettle and a fridgefreezernnthe doors from the living room can be opened on warm days to allow free flow from the lodge to the swimming pool areannalso included in the utility room is a washing machine and tumble dryernnwifi linen and towels and central heating are included and there is free off road parkingnnwillow lodge is able to accept one small to medium size dog at 50 a weeknnthe latest reviewsnnjust wanted to say we had the most wonderful time at willow lodge many thanks for your help in arranging it we were very sorry to have to leave and would definitely return luiza family 24th august 2021nnstylish and fresh property with clear attention to detail throughout liz and graham really have thought of everything to make your stay enjoyable and comfortable lovely clean pool very much enjoyed by the children temperature of pool perfect for us big thanks to roger for arranging the ferries for us this was greatly appreciated would highly recommend sonia family 12th july 2021nnwillow lodge was a fantastic new holiday home set in beautiful grounds the place has been finished and furnished to a very high standard the hosts graham and liz were so very welcoming lovely hosts the swimming pool was heated to 28 degrees and was the warmest pool i have been in the whole place was immaculately presented thank you so much for having us nicholas family 1st june 2021

Title: Cosy barn conversion with connecting indoor pool
Description: pennard hill farm is a family farm with breathtaking views over the mendip hills our holiday cottages are very individual and have bags of character and charmnthe haybarn is a beautiful barn conversation next to the indoor heated swimming pool across the courtyard from the main farm housenthere is plenty to see and do nearby such as longleat safari park hauser worth art gallery exploring the local towns of wells frome and glastonbury and enjoying long walks right on the doorstep the space the spacenthe haybarn cottage is opposite the main farmhouse and next to a shared indoor pool the open plan bedroom upstairs is large with space for a cot there is a sofa television and writing desk there is a bath upstairs with a hand held showerndownstairs is also open plan with a fitted kitchen farmhouse table and chairs arm chairs and a television guest access guest accessnparking is next to the propertynthe pool is shared with our two other cottages between the hours of 10am and 6pm outside these hours it is exclusively for your use you are of course welcome to use the pool during the day time too if you wish other things to note other things to notensmall well behaved dogs are welcome a maximum of one unless otherwise arranged but there is an extra charge of 25 per dog there is no garden at the haybarn so dogs must be kept on leads at all times this needs to be requested and agreed with the owner upon bookingnnthere is a pub within about 45mins 1hr walk away do ask for directions

Title: Cottage with tennis court and pool
Description: a tranquil environment to unwind and enjoy some peace and quiet a single storage cottage close to ashdown forest offering an all weather tennis court and outdoor swimming pool heated june august the cottage sits in its own enclosed garden the space the spacenbrickyard farm cottage is the perfect place for a memorable break a single storage cottage on the edge of piltdown golf course offering an all weather tennis court and outdoor swimming pool heated between june and august the local area offers excellent golf cycling fishing and walking the cottage sits in its own enclosed garden the heated swimming pool is within a separate secluded secure garden there is a barbecue area and seating for al fresco dining there is a barn which can be used for the safe storage of bikes and there is ample parking for a number of cars minimum two night bookingnnthe neighbourhoodnnthe peacock inn is in walking distance and is the quintessential country inn offering a wealth of historic features old spot farm shop is one mile stocking a wide variety of farmhouse produce much of it sourced locally supermarkets are within easy distancennother things to notennthe pool will be heated 27 may 18 september the temperature is set to 28 30 degrees but it is heated by a heat exchanger we can never guarantee that it will achieve this temperature although we do our utmost to keep the pool in tip top condition it has been known to get algae bloom and had to be closed for a couple of days until safe to swim again

Title: Luxury Lake Side Holiday Lodge Sleeps 4
Description: this is a beautiful lake side luxury private holiday lodge it has 2 bedrooms so can sleep up to 4 people this is for the entire placennit is situated in a quiet area of billing aquadrome holiday park it has private parking for 1 car private decking and a private garden areannsituated on a private lake you can relax on the decking the area is quiet and tranquil with ducks swans moor hens on the lakenn55 smart tv with netflix in main lounge and a tv and dvd player in master bedroom the space the spacendetached private lake side lodge for private use you are renting the whole unit privately our lodge provides wonderful relaxing self catering accommodation with a fully fitted kitchen central heating and a family bathroom and includes free parking right next to the lodge for 1 car plus free wifi please note only one car will be permitted per staynnthe kitchen has all utensils and crockery you will need to cater for a lovely holiday it also has a washing machine dishwasher oven and hob and large fridge and freezernnthere is private wifi and two digital tvs one 55 in the lounge with netflix included and a smaller tv in the master bedroom with built in dvd playernnthe bathroom has a bath and over bath shower with a rain head and also a hose headnnthe master bedroom has a walk in wardrobe and double bednnthe second bedroom has two single bedsnnthere is also private decking with patio furniture so you can sit and enjoy the sun or watch the wildlife on the private lake

Title: Luxury 2 bedroom barn with pool and tennis court
Description: cherry tree barn is located in the grounds of hazeland lodge an old hunting lodge for bowood house estate a peaceful location with stunning views and lots to do on the doorstep including heated swimming pool available 1st may to 30th september and tennis court available all year come and enjoy your own little piece of the wiltshire countryside the space the spacencherry tree barn is a fantastic converted barn with 2 bedrooms sleeping up to 4 plus 1 infant in a travel cot and 1 bathroom with showerbath one double with kingsize bed and one twin that can be made up as a super king double on request fluffy feather duvets and pillows or antiallergy bedding on request bath towels hand towels and pool towels when pool is open all providednnminimum stay varies 4 nights may to sept 7 nights during summer holidays satsat otherwise 3 nights with some exceptions for 2 week bookings a change of linentowels is provided for long stay discounted bookings a charge for a weekly change of linentowels can be added if requirednnmezzanine dining area overlooking the tennis court lounge with wood burner tv with sky package and free wifi kitchen with dishwasher microwave and washing machine please note that there are 5 steps from the main living area to the mezzanine dining area off which the 2 bedrooms and bathroom are locatednnpatio and bbq next to the heated swimming pool open may to sept and tennis court open all year playhouse slide and swings for little ones large wooded garden to explore facilities are shared with ownersnnnearby fishing horse riding walks and a pub 5 minutes up the road for food and drinknna 5 minute drive away is the wonderful bowood house and gardens with kids adventure playground also close to lacock abbey longleat the city of bath avebury and stonehenge and many more local attractions

Title: The Buttery
Description: this luxury grade ii listed award winning self catering holiday cottage is located three miles from the city of cambridge set in 23 acres of private parklandnthis cottage is perfect for romantic getaways business and solo travellers alike come home to a roaring log fire whilst enjoying a well deserved gin and tonic from the honesty bar the space the spacenthe buttery comprises of a sitting room with a kitchen dining area with a log burning stove along with a good sized double bedroom and ensuite shower room there is underfloor heating throughout guest access guest accessnparking is available in the courtyard situated behind the cottagenaccess to the cottage is from the front garden area

Title: Peace & Comfort within a Hampshire walled garden
Description: the coach house sits within a beautiful walled garden both pool heated from june 1st sep 30th garden are shared with the main 17th century house just 1hr from london 5 mins from the m3 perfect for a break or business good local places to eat country walksnnwe operate a min 2 night stay policy and sleeps 3 cont breakfast includednnrecently renovated luxury beds antique furniture and faded linens restful and relaxing english afternoon tea served aprjul on wed thurs the space the spacenthe coach house is separate from the main house and your own private space to enjoy for a minimum 2 night stay upstairs there is a light double aspect bedroom with 5ft vispring luxury bed quality bed linen running the width of the building is an elegant relaxed sittingdining room with tv wifi comfortable sofa and furnishings a generous table for diningwork space and views double aspect over the garden a bright modern kitchen with fridge toaster iron board leads off the dining area and tea coffee making facilities are provided you are welcome to prepare light meals if you wishnna separate lobby leads to a newlyfitted bath room with power shower over the bath there is also a shaving pointnndownstairs there is a small bedroom that can be rented in conjunction with the space upstairs shares upstairs bathroom there is a standard 3ft vi spring bed and there are limited views over the gardennnwe want you to feel at home and you are welcome to explore the lovely 15 acre garden planted with yew hedges and to form a series of distinct garden rooms you can lounge on luxury chairs and day beds and swim in the outdoor heated pool in summer shared with the hosts there is a small weber bbq available for your use talking of eggs we keep rarebreed chickens up the garden and they lay tiny pretty eggs that you can trynnplease be aware that whilst we are delighted to accept small children parents are responsible for ensuring that the furnishings are not spoiled in any way or we will need to make a charge for replacements other things to note other things to notenincluded in your staynnas well as coffee and teamaking facilities we provide a basket filled with things to get you started for breakfast including orange juice milk granola and muesli sourdough bread butter jams marmalade local honeynnnew for 2022 you may book afternoon tea in the main house at 330pm on wednesdays and thursday between the start of april and end of july tea is served as a series of 7 individual courses and needs to be booked in advance on our dedicated website we are able to accommodate up to 10 people each afternoon and the price is 25head do let us know if you are interested and we can check availability over the time you are with us

Title: Elm Park Barn, Chewton Keynsham, BS31 2SS

Title: Ivy's Sussex sleeps 8 Swimming Pool Pet friendly
Description: character property semi rural location with lovely countryside views local to horshamnamazing location for sussex adventuresnncountry kitchen leads to a sun room afternoon sun with seatingnrelaxing sunny terrace dining for 8 gas bbq quiet balcony space afternoon sunnlarge living room dining for 8 character barnlarge front garden with outside gamesnheated private use swimming pool april septnsecure large shed for bike storage wifi broadband amazon fire sticks for tvs the space the spacenground floorntwindouble bedroom with ensuite shower room walk in shower with grab rail shower seat available ideal for those who dont do stairsnfirst floornmaster bedroom king size bed with jack jill shower room lovely private room with atmospheric led lighting additional sofa bed sleeps twondouble bedroom room with access to balcony with countryside viewntwin room the aft cabin with full size single beds with roof window with lovely viewsntvs in all roomsnwash roomsnground floor large family bathroom bath showernfirst floor shower room with toiletwash basinnensuite shower roomnliving spacencountry kitchen with double oven ceramic hob fridge microwave coffee machine kettle toaster dishwasher breakfast tablenutility space washing machine tumble drier large additional fridgefreezer afternoon evening sun room with seating tables and chairs leading to a secure private rear garden with full size outside table tennisnquiet relaxing sunny terrace over looking the large front secluded garden west facing sunny quiet balcony space with country viewsnlarge living room dining for 8 character bar with fridge to cool your local sussex wine ales

Title: Mill Coach House @ The Manor Mill near Exmoor
Description: mill coach house is a delightful cottage nestled in the beautiful hills of somerset on the south side of a wooded valley beside the river tone nearly 200 years old this lovely cottage has been newly updated to create a charming wellequipped holiday homenthe grounds are a paradise of fields water meadows and gardens a haven for wildlife and stargazing in our dark skies our heated indoor swimming pool and play area with swings mini fortress and trampoline offer fun for everyone the space the spacenoriginally a barn for the horses and carts which transported the wool and corn from the mill mill coach house is entered through a useful porch area it has a new kitchen with dining area and a comfortable sitting roomnon the first floor bedroom 1 has a double bed and bedroom 2 has a ziplink bed which can be twin beds or a superking bednmill coach house is south facing with river and garden views and an outside eating area guests are also welcome to take advantage of the rest of the beautiful grounds and river banks nat mill coach house the facilities includen induction hob electric oven and microwaven dishwashern refrigerator with small freezer compartmentn toaster and kettlen smart tvn free wifi and 4g mobile accessn new bathroom with a shower washbasin and wcn shared heated indoor swimming pooln shared childrens play arean shared barbecuen a separate shared utility has a washing machine and tumble driern ample free parkingnnlinen and bath towels are included but please provide your own swimming and beach towelsnwere sorry but dogs are not allowed we do have two very friendly waggy tailed labradors who live on site and are a part of our family they have free use of all the gardens so you will meet them wandering around

Title: Westcountry house, hot tub, & outdoor heated pool
Description: on the edge of exmoor little burston is a beautiful country home set in 110 acres of our own farmland close to dulverton surrounded by nature very comfortable and well equipped it can sleep up to 6 people your own private garden with hot tub and patio own drive and ample parking heated pool at the main house 1st may to end september for your and our use onlynwe welcome up to 2 well behaved dogsni charge extra for dogs as the house gets an extra clean after their stay the space the spacenthe cottage is secluded and surrounded by nature red deer and roe deer foxes badgers and a large variety of birds in and around the adjacent farmland you are free to walk the farm fish in the trout pond play tennis and enjoy the heated pool at the main farmhouse during the summer may to end of september there is a heated games barn near the main house inside are table tennis and table football tables and gym rings its a lovely space to do yoga with a large window looking down the valleynnthe cottage is cosy and warm with comfy sofas a 42 plasma tv freesat and dvd player and bluetooth speaker there are dvds to watch and a selection of family games and books there is a well equipped kitchen and a dining table and chairs the cottage has wifinnupstairs are three rooms 2 bedrooms one with twin beds and ensuite bathroom with bath and shower the other has a king size bed with ensuite bathroom with shower in between is a study with a king size sofa bed linen and towels are providednnthe cottage has its own private garden with patio pergola table and chairs a real sun trap when the sun shines there is a barbecue for guests to use the garden has a large grassed area with a netted trampoline swing and football net for those with children no hard ball games near the cottage pleasennits a place to relax recharge your batteries away from the relentless pace of modern lifennthe farm has horses grazing and neighbouring farms with sheep and for that reason we ask that dogs are on leads when near livestock other things to note other things to notenthe cottage has wifi the code is evhjf4ktivtvrnnwhen walking the farm please close all gates and only walk in the areas we describe we have several horses who live with us please especially close the deerproof fences as the red deer eat all the trees

Title: The Party Barn
Description: wonderfully rural annex providing self contained accommodation comprising open plan livingdining roomkitchen and use of indoor swimming pool by arrangement no pets allowed the space the spacenthe party barn is modern yet cosy and very easy to relax in fully fitted kitchen tv wifi its easy to stay in touch as well as switch off the annex has a great double bedroom with en suite shower and ideal twin room with additional single bed guest access guest accessnthe party barn has a separate access to our house so you can come and go at ease with keys to your own front door there is an indoor swimming pool that can be used by arrangement but during term time it is limited due to the operation of my swim school that runs six days a week i am a qualified asa swimming teacher so lessons can also be arranged for children other things to note other things to notenif you want to arrange a babysitter then we can help as well as drivers to take you out to dinner

Title: Idyllic Dorset Hideaway
Description: our traditional english shepherds hut sits deep in the rolling hills of the dorset countryside we have created an idyllic escape where you can switch off from the cares of the outside world with nothing but birdsong to disturb your peace take a walk around our beautiful gardens and lake enjoy a dip in our pool warm up next to the log burning stove or while away an evening around the fire pit as you barbecue your supper the space the spacenour shepherds hut contains a very comfortable double bed made up already for your arrival with an electric blanket the hut is warm and cosy even in winter with the logburning stove lit there is a microwave combioven and a single gas ring there is also a fir pit outside to barbecue your supper we provide tea and coffee and our own apple juice and milk can be found in the large cold box just outside our local pub the mitre which serves good food will give you a warm welcome and is only ten minutes walk awaynnthe bathroom is alongside the shepherds hut and contains a shower basin loo and a sink for washing up towels are providednnnoutside we have a prizewining herd of grassfed dexter cattle grazing in our fields people have commented that our beef tastes like it used to and that it is more delicious than any other beef ever sampled joints steaks stewing steak mince burgers and sausages are available frozen to our guests if ordered in advance or on arrivalnwe can now also supply pork breakfast sausages plain or with honey and apple and pork chops from the pigs in our woods

Title: Self contained studio apartment
Description: a self contained first floor studio apartment with private entrance fully equipped kitchen and bathroom located in the beautiful painswick valley the studio is a attached to a large house and guests are welcome to enjoy our gardens and swimming pool when not in use by our family it sleeps 4 1 double and 1 sofa bed in the same room self catered but can stock fridge in advance on request easy access to stroud cheltenham gloucester tetbury cirencester beautiful local walks and pubs the space the spacenthe studio apartment has solid oak flooring throughout there is a large open plan space with a table and chairs a sofa dressing table and a large walk in wardrobe with ample hanging space and shelving a small kitchen has a sink dishwasher fridge and an electric cooker with all basic utensils supplied the bathroom has a shower sink and loo and towels will be provided guest access guest accessnthere is private access to the apartment with a entrance hall with coat racks a storage area and stairs up to the first floor guests are welcome to walk through the extensive gardens and if the swimming pool is up and running guests are welcome to use it by arrangement with the family

Title: Lower Mill Estate.Cosy 1 Bedroom Cottage with Pool
Description: tiny cute cosy 1 bedroom cottage in lower mill estate use of mill village heated outdoor pool tennis courts lakes the cottage is good for couples solo adventurers but can sleep up to 3 people fantastic location in a 550 acre nature reserve with outdoor activities cycling lakes and restaurant gigaclear wifi now installed at the cottage the space the spacenfollow on instagram fireflylowermillestate cosy cute 1 bedroom cottage approx footprint 5m x 5m suitable for solo traveller couples or 2 adults and 1 child fabulous location set in lower mill estate with access to heated outdoor pool and the wider estate facilities excluding artspanmy tiny cottage in the mill village area of lower mill estate has 1 bedroom with a small double bed and a single bunk bed above there is a separate shower room with loo and sink as well as a washing machine the kitchen lounge area is open plan with a sofa tub chair and footstool log burner dining table and chairs freeview tv with a selection of dvds and board games the kitchen area is compact but has everything you will need fridge with small freezer compartment dishwasher oven portable induction hobs kettle toaster microwave iron ironing board and all the essentialsoutside there is a communal courtyard with outdoor seating which is a real sun trap in the afternoon and eveningnngigaclear wifi now installed at the cottagennthe cottage can not be booked to use as a place to stay for commuting to and from a place of worknnthe mezzanine area is not available for rental guests and access is strictly forbiddennnplease note where i had to cancel a booking last december it was due to a small leak and i was unable to resolve it over the christmas week i offered the guest a discount if they still wanted to stay or to cancel with a full refund which was welcomed by the guest

Title: The Duck Wing, quirky dog friendly apartment
Description: the duck wing is a quirky self contained apartment within plenty cottage ideal for two people and pets its beautifully appointed for a relaxed carefree stay in a wonderfully rural environment nothing is too much trouble it sleeps two in double bed in a pretty bedroom and has a double sofa bed too own bathroomshower a separate wc and a warm spacious living area the pub is 7 mins walk away and the beaches a 5 mins drive the private heated swimming is available 1st april 31 sept the space the spacenpretty self contained with everything you need we have ample offroad parking and storage for bikes equipment etc you have your own access front door code deep in the countryside its the land of peace and plenty surrounded by the national trust the swimming pool is warm in a fantastic poly tunnel and wonderful during the summer months april to september inc and the dogchild friendly pub is only a ten minute stroll down the lane the garden is prolific and peaceful dogs love it guest access guest accessnthe front door key code enables you to come and go as you wish and i am here to greet you the large abundant garden is at your disposal as too is the summerhouse bbq and pool theres loads of parking and storage space other things to note other things to notenthe five bells serves home cooked food too and its only a 10 minute stroll we have no street lights yeah but ill provide a torch there are wonderful restaurants in nearby lyme regis bridport and seatown go to the hive at burton bradstock too

Title: Farm View - tranquil retreat near hills & coast
Description: farm view is located in the middle of sampford brett a quintessential english village between exmoor national park the quantock hills somersets coast it provides bright spacious accommodation and is fitted to a high standard with comfy beds fitted carpets modern bathroom country pine furniture central heating keeps the property snug and warm even in the depths of winter outside there are spacious grounds with a swimming pool trampoline and climbing frame free type 2 ev charging the space the spacenfarm view has a spacious double bedroom with plenty of room for a cot which we can provide on request the second bedroom is smaller and has bunk beds which are 3 foot wide both bedrooms have a wardrobe chest of drawers and bedside tablesnnthe large bright lounge has a comfy settee matching bedsettee which will sleep an extra 2 people dining table and coffee table there is a wall mounted tv with a dvd player and freesat box wifi internet is available throughout the propertynnthere is a kitchen area off one end of the lounge an lshaped room which is fully equipped with cooker fridge microwave oven toaster etcnnthe modern bathroom has a bathshower toilet washbasin shelving and heated towel railnnplease note that access is up an external flight of 8 steps so the accommodation is not suitable for people who find steps difficult

Title: The Potting Shed - cosy country cottage
Description: the potting shed is part of the original gardners buildings of a large country house beautifully updated to provide a truly snug and romantic place to stay a log burner is the focal point of the loungeliving area as well as exposed wooden beams and stonework wifi smart tv and all you will need for a memorable get away well fitted kitchen with fridge microwave and dishwasher double bedroom showerwc ample parking we want to make your stay cosy comfortable and enjoyable the spacenwe want to welcome you to our potting shed which is a beautifully restored cottagenthe potting shed is located in the grounds of an old family home now updated and offering a complex of converted barns including a cafe beauty parlour hairdresser and gym please see our other cottages the apple store and the cellar barn which could be booked with extended family groups the complex is set in 12 acres of grounds gardens and an old apple orchard guests are invited to take a walk down the orchard to see the beautiful views across to cheddar gorge or stroll around to meet the friendly animalsnour neighbours crossfit wyvern allow our guests to use their gym and leisure facilities including for the summer season swimming pool hot tub and sauna this can be arranged by booking and payment online directly with them there is also a cafe on site selling delicious homemade foodnnin the potting shed we have included all we can to give you homefromhome comforts in peaceful country surroundings we offer a welcome pack when you arrive there is free wifi just in case you want to contact the outside world a log burner is available please bring your own logs or they can be purchased at our local store in the village we are very flexible so please ask if there is anything we can do to make your stay more comfortable or anything that you neednoutside the potting shed is a table and chairs for you to sit and have your morning coffee and a small bbq as well as this there is a larger grass area with bbq and seating for the use of guests located just across from the parking area or if you would like a little walk you can wander across the grass area of the walled garden and through into our apple orchard with a seating area looking out across the somerset levels towards cheddar gorge if you come in september you are welcome to try the different varieties of applesnif you like animals a walk around the grounds gives you the opportunity to meet some unusual friends including 2 friendly pigs pepper barry pigmy goats murph and cindy and some alpacas sheep and chickens as well as our friendly cats and dogs or if you would rather just sit in the orchard you can see the views of the beautiful somerset levels out towards cheddar gorge or watch the sun go down with a glass of winennthere is a laundry room opposite the potting shed washing machine tumble drier iron and ironing board are available for the use of our guests a rotary clothes line is located in the small guests garden across the car parknnthe cafe next door serves homemade food and delicious coffee and cafe it is accessed via the wooden gate and across the car park down the driveway from the cafe is a gym and swimming pool which guests can book in to and use on a payasuse basis there is also a nails and massage parlour and hairdresser in the gymcafe complexnnthe village has a wellstocked grocery store for all your food and drink needs a post office and 2 pubs within walking distancennif its the countryside you like then there is shapwick heath and ham wall nature reserve 1015 mins cheddar gorge or the quantock hills 30 mins or the sea at minehead 45 mins or simply go down on to the somerset levels for some fantastic walks around the areannthe village is on the somerset cycle route so an idea place to stay during a cycling break to see the wonderful somerset levels or take the challenge of the steep climb up cheddar gorge chilton polden is on many somerset cycle routes for more information about some of the routes that pass the door look up overview of cycling in chilton poldennnthe near town of street 5 miles away boasts the large retail outlet of clarks village if you are in to shoppingnna file with information of local places to visit is available in the potting shed along with tourist information leaflets guest access guest accessnour postcode brings you to broadway via satnav but you will need directions to get to our accommodation we will send these through to you via air bnb message after booking other things to note other things to notenwe have 2 small dogs bertiedad and albe his son they may come and say hello when you arrive because they are very friendly and love all our guestsndo not charge electric cars from the property the supply is not set up for this

Title: Family & dog friendly static caravan on 5* park
Description: spacious 3 bedroom family dog friendly static caravan in a quiet location on shorefield country park a 5 holiday park 5 minutes from the beach on the edge of the new forest national park it has every amenity including indoor and outdoor swimming pools bars restaurant indoor outdoor play areas fitness suite health spa large supermarket small fishing lake etc wifi is freely available throughout the park including in the caravan the spacenthe home is a modern 3 bedroom property that sleeps up to 6 guests with 1 double and 2 twin bedrooms and 2 bathrooms it has a secure decking area safe for children and dogs and a garden backing on to woodlandnnthe unit itself is complete with all the facilities that you would expect there is central heating and double glazing and usb charging sockets in every room the kitchen has a gas hob with fan assisted electric oven fridge freezer microwave kettle and toaster along with all the cutlery crockery and utensils the living room has a large sofa with a 32 smart tv dvd player hifi system with internet radio dab radio cd player usb connectivity a portable weatherproof bluetooth speaker lantern powerbank for outside or inside a large variety of family film dvds games and books all of the bedrooms have plenty of storage with wardrobes with drawers and hangers charging sockets bluetooth dab clock radios and a hairdryer the main bedroom also has another 32 smart tv please note that the bedrooms are a little bit snug compact as with most static caravans so please bear this in mind update 1 of the single bedrooms now have full sized adult bunk beds which offers larger beds and more room in the bedroom the living space on the other hand you could quite comfortably fit in at least 12 people with room for more the bathroom has a very large powerful shower hand basin and toilet there is also a second toilet and hand basin an iron ironing board clothes dryer vacuum cleaner etc are all provided as is bedlinen please bring your own towels the outside decking area has a dining area and additional seating with small drinks table 4 led security lights and a floodlight for al fresco diningnna travel cot and high chair are also providednnif you want somewhere to get away from it all then this is the place for you the amount of wildlife right by the caravan is truly extraordinary whether they are rabbits squirrels deer green woodpeckers my favourite pheasant a huge array of tits finches and other birds that feed off the bird feeders provided there is always something to see please feel free to top up the bird feeders when necessary from the food provided as they seem to get through it at an astonishing rate there is also a bird bath for our feathered friends other things to note other things to notena family pass to access the swimming pools and the fitness centre etc is 50 per week

Title: The 'Cart Shed' - cosy space in a scenic setting
Description: situated in the scenic chalke valley an area of outstanding natural beauty the cart shed provides a welcoming and comfortable base to relax in and explore the numerous sites of wiltshire dorset and hampshirennnewly renovated it is a warm and well furnished private space to enjoy the surrounding countryside the space the spacenthe cart shed has been extensively renovated to create a well proportioned selfcontained private outbuilding to the farmhouse the living space has everything you would need flexible sleeping arrangements twin or super king for 2 persons in a gallery bedroom overlooking the large livingdining roomnnthere is a separate well equipped kitchen with nespresso machine fridge dishwasher microwave oven induction hob opposite a modern shower room with guest amenitiesnnthe living space has a large central woodburner with three large sofas there is a 42 tv at one end of the space with sky tv sports movies blu ray player connected to a bose surround sound system at the other end a dining table and work desk with chairs there is also a large chest of drawers

Title: Crocus at Stancombe Manor, pool and tennis
Description: crocus apartment on the ground floor of stancombe manors tithe barn is a place of peace tranquility and beautynsleeps 24 perfect for a couple or small familynshared use of stancombes facilities indoor pool tennis 7 acres of lovely gardensnclose to awardwinning beaches and fabulous walkingnhalfway between salcombe and dartmouthngreat pubs and restaurants a short drive awaynone wellbehaved dog the space the spacencrocus is a recently renovated apartment on the ground floor of the tithe barn at stancombe manor a walled devon hamlet listed in the domesday book its a great base for a couple or small family to explore salcombe dartmouth and the surrounding beaches there are 17 privately owned properties which share 7 acres of gardens this part of devon is known for beautiful countryside and beaches secret green lanes and a host of good pubs and restaurants we are 3 miles from the sea at torcross and 10 miles from both salcombe and dartmouthnnhere is what the apartment includesnnopen plannnliving arean one 3seater sofa and armchairn tv and dvdblue ray player with some dvdsn comfortable pulldown double bed 4 6 wide if needednnkitchenn under counter fridge with small inbuilt freezern oven and hobn dishwashern kettle and cafetiren crockery cutlery cups pans and all you need for meal preparationnndiningn breakfast bar for 2n dining table and chairs for 4nnbedroomn comfortable extra large bed 6 or 2 single beds 3 widen cot if neededn large wardrobesn bedside tablesnnshower room ensuiten large showern towelsn underfloor heatingn heated towel railnnextrasn wifi we are in a very rural part of the country and wifi can be intermittentn gas central heatingn combi boilern storage roomnnoutsiden 7 acres of grounds shared with other stancombe propertiesn shared indoor pooln barbecuesn seatingn parking a few steps from the front doorn outdoor tennis courtn snooker roomn childrens games room including table tennisn pitch and puttn outdoor childrens play arean there are many ancient green lanes nearby one of which runs through stancombe and leads down to the church at sherford another leads down towards the sea guest access guest accessnguests have access to the whole flat which is on the ground floor of a restored tithe barnnit has its own entrance with a key box by the front door for easy 24hour access other things to note other things to notenas well as the superking bed or twin beds in the bedroom theres a very comfortable pulldown double bed in the lounge which makes it an economical option for a familyncrocus can accommodate a couple or small family 2 adults and 2 children its a squeeze for 4 adultsnthe lanes around us are very narrow with passing pointsnalthough we have wifi it isnt a strong signal due to the rural location

Title: Bucks Green Place Beautiful Converted Barn
Description: a recently converted barn finished to a very high standard set in the grounds of a grade ii georgian country house situated in idyllic sussex countryside nestled close to the surrey hills and south downs with stunning views across seven acres of garden and open pastures the space the spacenbeautifully appointed small barn conversion with original oak beams and features well proportioned open plan kitchen living space with breakfast bar comfy seating new kitchen with all mod cons flat screen smart tv upstairs a spacious double bedroom with luxurious king size bed built in wardrobes and cupboards flat screen tv dressing table ensuite shower room stylishly designed heated towel rail and heated floor space for a single air bed or travel cot upstairs and or double air bed downstairs in living areannthe barn is located within our family garden next door to our outdoor swimming pool we have assigned an area of the garden for your personnel use guest access guest accessncoded electric gate access to secure parking guests will have access to 7 acres open pasture leading onto public footpaths access to our private swimming pool in the summer months can be arranged upon request other things to note other things to notenlong term let monday friday is also available for working professionals please enquire if you are interested in this arrangement

Title: Luxury Studio Apartment with Pool, near London
Description: a large luxurious modern studio apartment sleeping up to 3 set in a large private garden with heated indooroutdoor pool pool open mayseptember inc ideal for relaxing after a hard day at work sightseeing or having funnnoffroad private parking 5 minutes drive to redhill station and 30 mins train to central london gatwick is 15 mins drive as are the m25 and the local amenities of redhillreigatennthe traditional local village pub is 2 mins walk ideal for dining and entertaining the space the spacenthis location is ideal for links to london and the south east in addition local amenities include water sports mountain biking surrey hills cycling aerodromes and traditional surrey villages famous tourist attractions in london plus others eg windsor hampton court and thorpe park are all less than 1 hr away wimbledon ascot henley lords wembley twickenham many famous football and rugby stadiums and entertainment venues are within easy reach less than 1 hr by car or public transport guest access guest accessnthe apartment is stand alone in the large lower garden you have independent private access to the apartment the lower garden is available for use as is the large pool the pool enclosure is fully retractable to create an outdoor pool when weather permits in those days that it is sunny but cool the enclosure creates a 25 deg indoor environment note the pool is shared access with householder the pool and lower garden can be provided as sole private access for for you and your guests for an additional charge of 150 per day note the pool is shut from 1st october to 30th april inclusive other things to note

Title: The Duck House. A child/dog friendly rural chalet
Description: the duck house is a lovely childdog friendly chalet nestling in the orchard at plenty cottagenthe perfect retreat for a familygroup and dogs are especially welcome open plan living is around a potbellied stove and its a comfortable and home from home a wonderful rambling garden summerhouse bbq and a free heated swimming pool 1st april 31st sept the mantra is no stress ample parking dogchild friendly pub 7 mins walk away wonderful nt beaches just five min drive relax the space the spacenthe duck house is fully furnished its centrally heated but in addition theres everything you need to light the wood burner the second bedroom is child orientated with a double bed and a single bed so it sleeps three kids or adults there are strict safety rules regarding the pool but other than that the gardenbbq are for you to enjoy guest access guest accessnthe duck house is completely separate in the orchard near the swimming pool you have your own key so you can come and go as you wish theres plenty of free offroad parking other things to note other things to notenthe pub the five bells is ten minutes walk it serves food and is both child and dog friendly the shave cross inn is a thatched ye olde pub and worth a visit two miles felicitys farm shop is just up the road too charmouth beach is great for dog walking

Title: The Bothy at Launceston Farm, cottage with indoor swimming pool & sauna
Description: the bothy is one of the two small self catering cottages at launceston farm near blandford in dorset this single storey cottage attached to the main farmhouse has its own private courtyard with outdoor bateau bath for soaks under the stars popular with dog owners you can step out of the front door onto farm tracks which run for miles across the chalk downlands of the surrounding cranborne chase area of oustanding natural beauty guests have access to the farmhouse gardens and the indoor swimming pool the local pub is a five minute walk into the villagennif its not walking weather while away the afternoon in the 12m indoor swimming pool and sauna available to guests 700am700pm curl up on the sofa in front of the wood burner with a dvd or a good read if you dont feel like cooking order one of sarahs two course farmhouse suppers delivered hot to your door or take a 5 minute stroll down to the award winning village pubnntake a trip to the world heritage jurassic coast for a paddle in the ocean and the catch of the day enjoy a large slice of british heritage at one of the nearby national trust and english heritage properties including corfe castle stourhead gardens and stone henge nature lovers must visit monkey world and abbotsbury swannery shop in independent boutiques for homewares and fashion in the georgian market towns of shaftesbury salisbury sherborne and wimborne

Title: Large luxury house & pool in Henley on Thames
Description: a new awardwinning house set in extensive grounds with a view over an area of outstanding natural beauty and backing on to henley golf course set amidst mature gardens lawns and a large wildflower meadow the house sleeps 4 adults and 4 children very comfortably it is not intended for use as a venue for large receptions or parties but is ideal for large families who enjoy luxury living and lots of outdoor fun and games to include a heated covered pool football pitch and much more the space the spacendesigned in contemporary style with a touch of midcentury chic everywhere you go within incline cottage you will experience a feeling of space from the 12 seater circular dining table for fab diner parties to a sitting room with 2 x 4 seater sofas and 3 bedrooms with en suite bathrooms 2 of which have large balconies you have 3 rooms to watch skynetflixamazon and a large playroom crammed with games for all ages you even have a large pool housebar with 2 x outdoor sofas and a firepit as well as additional dining table and chairs on the decking outside the kitchen guest access guest accessnguests have full access to the house and garden other things to note other things to notenthe property featured on extraordinary extensions hosted by tinie tempah winner of best modern home chiltern awards and home extension of the year british homes award

Title: Keepers  - Luxury for 4 people ( 2 couples)
Description: luxurious contemporary accommodation for up to four people 2 couples the space the spaceneach of the two bedrooms features a super kingsize bed and has a luxury ensuite bathroom with bath and separatel shower theres underfloor heating in the winter throughout the property and a wood burning stove for those cosy winter evenings in very well equipped living accommodation price quoted is for 4 adults in 2 ensuite bedroomsnminimum 2 night stay guest access guest accessnthe accommodation affords plenty of living space in the winter theres a woodburning stove which adds that extra something to the already cosy warmth of the underfloor heating throughout plenty of logs supplied too well equipped kitchen dishwasher washing machine and tumble drier other things to note other things to notensafe offroad parking in the courtyard very popular with our goodwood festival of speed and revival guests
