Title: The Pool House
Description: the pool house is a contemporary spacious private hideaway perfect for a romantic getaway or just a stay to explore the surrounding area styled with a shabby chic vibennthe space is only suitable for two adults two children age 12 and undernnnew from march 22 a luxury hot tub spa is now available all year roundnnplease note the pool pool area is closed from october to the 29th of april 22 the spacenset behind private electric gates and within the grounds of a large converted barn the pool house is completely self contained it has a king size bed with a very comfortable emma mattressnna dining table and 4 chairs a comfortable sofa bed for extra accommodation for children a dressing table and mirror with a hair dryer in the drawer a dressing mirror with a hanging rail it has heating and air conditioningnnthe wide screen smart television can be used to watch channels with your own login details via the wifi also you will have use of a blue tooth speaker and a pure digital radionnthe space has a door leading to a kitchenette with a fridge freezer a james martin electric table top grill that will cook bacon eggs sausages chicken breast salmon vegetables etc a microwave oven grillntoaster kettle nespresso coffee machine cafetire slow cooker crockery cutlery water wine glasses complimentary tea milk coffee pods sugar salt peppernseparate door leading to the wcnnwalk through doorway leading to the stunning shower room with complimentary use of premium toiletriesnnfinally a door leading out to the swimming pool area which has its own large cushioned seating area it has a bar area with stools and a table and chairs sun loungers and various floatsnnthis door will be locked from october to aprilnnthe owner cannot accept any liability for using the pool area guests use it entirely at their own risknnextrasnbreakfast can be arranged by prior arrangement with the host who offers a continental or a full english breakfast for an additional costnwe can also provide delicious sharing boardsnspecial occasions can be catered for by prior arrangementnncheck in anytime after 3pm check out by 11am early and late check in available at small extra chargennaccess to the pool house can be gained by a key safe next to the entrance gates which will contain a gate fob and keys to the pool housennthe host lives on site and will be available for any help or advice guest access guest accessnthe pool house is completely self contained set in a private area away from the main housenit has security lighting around the building with secure parking adjacent to the propertynnguests will have access to their own outdoor area with a table and chairs fire pit and barbecue with far reaching views of the beautiful surrounding countryside the hosts horses use the paddock next to the pool housennnfrom the beginning of may to the end of september guests will have direct access from the kitchenette to the heated swimming poolnnthe pool will have shared access with the hosts at separate times the host is very flexible arranging private access the hosts own garden sides on to the pool area but the hot tub and bar area does have partial natural screening and is not overlooked from the hosts house however the pool seating area can be seen from the hosts house as shown in the photos of the pool seating areannplease note the pool is not suitable for anyone unable to swim with the exception of babes in armsnntowels are provided but please bring your own swimming towelsnnno glass is allowed in the pool area but plastic glasses will be providednnwe are animal lovers and have 5 dogs and 3 horses and 2 miniature shetland ponies on site they love fuss and attention please be aware that horses may walk past from 830am when they are taken out riding also the dogs can be vocal at times but they are quiet most of the timennone well behaved dog is allowed possibly two but please request first subject to size but strictly dogs are not allowed on the furniture or bed please dogs must also be kept on a lead in the pool area and the open area outside of the pool house because of the horsesnnplease be mindful that staying within the vicinity of horses dogs and farm animals there are associated noises of being in the countryside other things to note other things to notenplease note that the pool and the pool area will be closed from october to may

Title: Design Apartment Deauville with swimming pool

Title: Stable Les Tourelles  Indoor pool & spa

Title: Long Mountain View Tiny House with Hot Tub

Title: Luxury Apartment with pool,indoor heated.
Description: pitfield apartment is in a lovely old village we are inbetween exeter and taunton easy access from m5 exeter offers shopping restaurants cathedral and scenic quay area with lots to do we are very close to the grand western canal which provide some pretty walks or bike rides near the blackdown hills the coast is about a 35minute drive away great place to explore beaches too they are lots of lovely pubs to walk or cycle too as well as the countryside breakfast provided the space the spacenit is in a lovely old village with lots of country pubs nearby its a very peaceful and safe area its a lovely beamed room with double bed and sofa bed suitable for two children to share or one adult we also have a travel cot available a kitchen with small fridge and combi microwave a bathroom with shower guest access guest accessnyou will have access to a very sunny courtyard and use of an indoor heated pool times restricted we have lessons taking place at various times during the daynon arrival you can book slots to use the pool you may book as many as you like but just not back to backnplease note the courtyard and pool is shared with one other apartment other things to note other things to notenslippers bath robes and pool towels are provided for your use during your stay please note there is a twonight booking minimum

Title: NEW 'Bluebell Beach'  Luxury Lodge @ Hoburne Park
Description: bluebell beach is a luxury 2 bed 2 bath lodge in a tranquil and peaceful destination sited on the 5 hoburne park with beautiful beaches and the new forest on your doorstep but all the fun for the family with the onsite facilities the space the spacenour 36 x 20 pathfinder lodge is located in stunning christchurch on 5 hoburne park and designed to make those precious moments for relaxation priceless a time to unwind is a luxury in itself nowadays thats why from its bedroom suites to living quarters this two bedroom luxury lodge is the perfect solution there is parking adjacent to the lodgennas a selfcatering lodge youll find everything you need for a perfect stay the kitchen has a fridge freezer gas hob with 4 burners and electric oven a toaster kettle with complimentary tea coffee sugar a dishwasher washing machine and microwave the lodge is a perfect place to relax and offers a 50 smart hdtv in the lounge a 32 hdtv in the master bedroom a 19 tv in the twin bedroomnnthis lodge has 2 bedrooms and can comfortably sleep 4 in the first bedroom you will find a king size double bed the second bedroom contains 2 6 x 3 ft single bedsnnthere are 2 bathrooms the first bathroom is ensuite has a toilet and sink and a walkin shower the second bathroom has a toilet and sink and a bath with shower hosennthere are also essentials a hair dryer an iron mini ironing board and clothes dryer to make your stay more comfortablennall bed linen bathroom towels kitchen towels oven gloves are providednn you will need to provide your own beach swimming towels nnhouse rulesnn checkin time is 300pm and checkout is 10am unless agreed prior with hostn smoking is not allowed anywhere inside or outside on the decking arean sorry pets are not allowed at the propertyn the washing machine dishwasher are included for your usennnlocationnnbluebell 22 is located in a quiet spacious area close to the main facilities of hoburne park in christchurch dorset just a 10 min walk to friars cliff beach it is also only 10 mins drive to the new forest nearby golf courses include highcliffe brockenhurst manor bartononsea the new forest golf club and remedy oak and are all in easy driving distancennthe lodge is perfect for families and couples alike due to its location you can choose to get involved with the parks activities or be left to enjoy the peace and quietnnonsite facilities include two heated swimming pools indoor and outdoor summer months only gym minigolf bars outdoor playgrounds for toddlers and older children a multi games area boules court restaurant cafe indoor play area arcade and entertainment venuenntemporary membership passes for access to the clubhouse activities entertainment etc are available the cost is 50 and this gives up to 6 people access for up to 7 nights or 25 for 1 day we require 72 hours notice to process the passes which are collected from reception please contact the hosts for more detailsnnaccess to the beach at steamer point and mudeford quay are also within walking distance sainsburys waitrose lidl and aldi are all nearby and theres a local spar is located just outside of the park boundary for that emergency pint of milk nearby attractions include the new forest beaulieu swanage durdle door bournemouth monkey world as well as some fantastic pubs and restaurants including the waterloo arms james white the noisy lobster the boathouse and the kings arms hotel to name just a fewnnhighcliffe castle the isle of wight and the quaint port town of lymington are all well within reachnnlodge facilities includenn adjacent parking for several cars large private decking area rattan decking furniture with seatback cushions linen towels provided for master and twin room lg 50 hd smart tv in living area netflix amazon prime youtube sound bar for tv and your own device connection electric real effect fire in lounge king size bed in master bedroom wardrobe and storage ensuite shower room and toilet off master bedroom lg 32 hd tv in master bedroom hairdryer twin room with two 6 x 3ft single beds wardrobe family bathroom with toilet and bath washing machine kettle tea coffee and sugar provided toaster microwave dishwasher rinse aiddishwasher salt is monitored and refilled on changeover day gas hob electric oven and grill fridge freezer saucepans and oven trays kitchen utensils crockery cutlery dining table 4 chairs gas central heatingnnplease note although were happy for babies and infants to enjoy the lodge too we do not supply cots or high chairs of course please feel free to bring your own guest access guest accessnparking adjacent to lodgenpark facilities very close bynnlocal bus service outside park or short walk awaynnearest mainline station hinton admiral 14m away with access to bournemouth poole southampton etc

Title: Silverwood Coach House, with Indoor Swimming Pool
Description: part of the idyllic bleets farm private estate silverwood coach house offers the perfect countryside stay remote enough for quiet walks in acres of adjacent land but still only a few miles from the awardwinning town frome also longleat bath wells glastonbury are a short drive from silverwood coach house this makes an ideal hub for an action packed break if time to unwind is just what you need you can kick back and relax in the countrysidenncheck pool availability prior to booking the space the spacensilverwood coach house is a brandnew holiday cottage situated on the bleets farm estate in direct view of the main house the coach house is above the quadruple garage with nobody below so no risk of being disturbed with ample free parking and a garden seating area amongst fruit trees youll be sure to have the perfect staynninside at one end you have the openplan loungekitchen area which is spacious and modern with a brandnew fitted kitchen the master bedroom with a luxurious double bed and ensuite is at the opposite end of the coach house in between there is another bedroom with 2 low small single beds and a family bathroom equipped with a sunken bath and showernnif you would like a disposal bbq we keep some onsite at 500 each please message if you would like one so we can arrange paymentnnfree use of our private heated indoor pool however please ensure you check the availability prior to booking as it is not always available guest accessnupon arrival there is a short private drive with an exclusive free private car park suitable for 4 cars there is a short gravel walkway to the right of the electric gates through a small orchard and under an archway onto the main drive where you will arrive right next your accommodation the painted grey door is your front door

Title: Barton Le Clay, the Gem of the Chilterns
Description: this house is a perfect house for families or large group to get together and experience all this beautiful country side has to offer the pool complete with 6 person sauna is a wonderful attraction along with the out door entertainment kitchen with italian pizza oven and gas bbq this is the ultimate entertainment property the village and surrounding chiltern hills is an area of natural beauty with stunning walks and lots of out door activities located 15 min from luton airport guest access guest accessnblack electric gates with own private drive other things to note other things to notenall amenities and the whole property are for the guest unshared use during their stay that includes pool sauna and everything else

Title: The Plovers, Cotswolds (with pool access)
Description: located within the family and pet friendly lower mill estate on the river thames the plovers offers guests a spacious 3 bedroom property with a large private garden outdoor shared heated pool and sauna access yearround on site there are lakes with boating access nonmotorised fishing tennis courts playgrounds trails bike and boat rental shop including an onsite restaurant and shop the estate is located in a protected nature reserve with many miles of hikes and trails to explore the space the spacenground floorn spacious living room with lots of seating and a wood burning fireplacen 50 inch smart tv bluraydvd player with assortment of films for children and adultsn large extendable dining tablen large kitchen with an assortment of cooking tools and spicesn utility room washing machine and separate dryernnfirst floorn master bedroom with king bed large closet lovely views over lake full ensuite bathroom with rain shower and bath tub sofa chair which converts to a single bed great for childrenn second bedroom with king bed and ensuite bathroom with showern third bedroom with 2 single beds full family bathroom the hallnnlarge outdoor garden with back and side patio with views of the thames and mill lake weber charcoal bbq

Title: Curlew 3 - The Cove. Sea views, patio, swimming pool and parking.
Description: settings dont come much more idyllic than the cove and curlew 3 is a bright open plan property with a stylish design throughout the open plan living space makes the perfect spot to sit back with a book and enjoy the sea views and if you step out onto the private decked terrace you can breathe in the fresh air straight from the sea below the resortnstunning coastal views from a large balcony with dining table chairs and gas bbqnnplease note due to coronavirus social distancing measures the pool may be closed during your visitnnsea views and balcony access from both the lounge and master bedroomn1 double master bedroom 1 twin bedroomnheated open air swimming pool open end of may to midseptembernluxury kitchen with clothes washer dryer and dishwasherncool sleek modern design and top quality furnishingsnwifinrear games room with table football air hocky poolnon site dedicated parking spacenquality bed linen towels includednno smokingnno petsnshort breaks from 2 nights available most of the yearnnif the sea air has the whole family feeling ravenous the open plan dining space makes a bright space for that relaxed family meal and just off the kitchen is a games room with an additional freezer and storage space when your beds beckon youll find the master bedroom has access to the terrace so you can step out in the morning and watch the sun rise while you plan your days adventures the second bedroom has twin beds so curlew 3s perfect for a family break in south devonnnthe coves one of those resorts that blends into the landscape so you can truly experience devon life the outdoor heated swimming pool open mid may to mid september makes a refreshing sight on a summers day and for the walkers the south west coast path runs right past taking visitors past some of the regions most striking scenerynna dedicated onsite parking space close to your apartment is included as is wifi access to the heated open air swimming pool summer only quality bed linen towels and all utilitiesnnshort breaks of 2 nights or more are available at most times except summer school holidaysnnliving roomareanopen plan with the kitchen and dining areanaccess to the terracentwo sofas seating fournsmart tv with netflix etc dvd player and bluetooth speakernselection of board games dvdsnngames areangames room off the kitchen with triple games table air hockey pool table football additional freezer and storage spacennkitchenutilitynopen plan with the living and dining areansingle electric oven with halogen hob and integrated grillnmicrowave fridgefreezer dishwasher washing machine and tumble dryernndining roomareanopen plan with the kitchen and living areantable and seating for fournnmaster bedroomnaccess to the terracendouble bed built in wardrobe and chest of drawersnflatscreen tv with freeviewnnbedroom 2ntwin beds and built in wardrobenflatscreen tv with freeviewnnfamily bathroomnfeatures a bath with shower over wash basin and wcnnlarge decked terrace areantable and four chairsngas barbequenncommunal outdoor swimming pool seasonal opening from may till mid september the pool opening times are from 10am to 7pmnnallocated parking for one car in the onsite car parknadditional visitor parking is available on a firstcomefirstserved basis

Title: Relaxing pool house
Description: whitmoor farm whitmoor lane gu47qb is in the heart of surrey in sutton green between the towns of woking and guildford beautiful and relaxing two bedroom two bathroom pool house with loads of charm very cosy living room overlooking the sparkling blue swimming pool the pool is not heated but great in the summer the farm also offers a tennis court and trampoline unfortunately we do not allow visitors to guests for security reasons only booked guests allowed on site the space the spacentwo bedrooms with king size beds two bathrooms one with a shower and one with a bath ideal for two couples or a small family located between guildford and woking towns guest access guest accessnthe pool and tennis court is shared with 3 other units on the farm but theres loads of space for everyone the pool is not heated but great in the summer other things to note other things to notenwe supply a few coffee pods for the nespresso machine and dishwasher tablets as a starter pack but please bring some with you for your stay

Title: Homely Rustic Country Retreat within National Park
Description: escape to a secluded retreat within the national trusts hindhead commons and devils punch bowl only an hours drive from london enjoy local nature in extreme privacy the house is set in beautiful surroundings with a large garden with swimming pool and a walled garden with outdoor fireplace for magical evenings the house offers rustic english charm for the perfect country getaway from the property there is direct access to the national park for walking hiking plus many cycle tracks the space the spacenthe house is full of rustic charm there are many books curiosities and snug reading corners in the large lounge overlooking the garden there is a formal and informal dining room with dinnerware and glasses to match and a downstairs wc there is an office area with a bt smart hub 2 with wifi disc allowing wifi connection throughout the property and the formal and informal dining rooms can be used as further office spaces or breakout areas the fully equipped kitchen comes with two ovens one conventional and an aga style oven with hotplate plus a large fridgefreezer microwave dishwasher and walk in larder fully stocked with dishes and gadgets for cooking and baking through the kitchen is the utilityboot room with washing machine dryer detergents ironing board and iron plus access to the garden upstairs there are 5 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms with one being ensuite to the master bedroom both bathrooms have power showers shampoo conditioner and shower gel there are three fireplaces in the house one open fireplace in the lounge a wood stove in the formal dining room and an outdoor open fireplace in the walled garden there are also three tvs in the house the one in the lounge has a amazon fire stick and dvd player there is also one in the informal dining room with a dvd player and one upstairs in the master bedroom which has a built in dvd player outside there is a beautiful garden with wysterias a large lawn benches to sit to watch the local nature and an outdoor unheated swimming pool private pool is available for use from april to september for an additional fee pool closed for winter at the back of the house is the walled garden a beautiful secluded area with a water feature gas bbq and outdoor fireplace there is private parking with room for 4 vehiclesnnthe house is the most perfect venue for a special occasion staycation workfromhome alternative or as a remote working office for small businesses the house is not ideal for wild parties as we are in a quiet neighbourhood surrounded by a national parknndue to the recent pandemic we would like to reassure you that the house is professionally cleaned and we are taking extra care to disinfect frequently touched surfaces and provide alcohol gel in the house for our guests

Title: Cosy Coach House with Private Garden and Pool
Description: luxury newly renovated 2 bedroom coach house set in the grounds of a georgian manor house with its own private gardens and duck pond over looking the national trust tithe barnnnthe coach house is within walking distance of the quaint village of bredon which boasts 2 pubs a village shop and playground bredon is ideally located for malvern cheltenham and the racecourse worcester and the rest of the cotswoldsnnthe owners live in the manor house so are at hand for any questions the space the spacendecorated in a classic and restful style this home away from home features carefully sourced artworks and antiquesnnthe master bedroom is situated on the first floor along with the main bathroom which has a large shower and a large freestanding bath and luxury toiletries from bramley products are supplied for you to enjoy during your stay at the top of the spiral staircase there is a charming reading nook with a large comfy armchair and plenty of natural light the downstairs bedroom can be arranged as a twin or superking with ziplink mattressesnnthe cosy sitting room is perfect for relaxing in after a long day out or for lazy weekends the kitchen is well stocked with seating for 4 people and there is the added bonus of a large utility room with washerdryer and butlers sink for cleaning up after muddy walks there is an additional shower room on the ground floornnone well behaved dog is welcome to join you we will even provide a dog bed and luxury toiletries for your four legged friend as wellnnthe mature garden is an ideal sun trap and there are 4 sun loungers provided as well as a bbq and outdoor seating you will be able to enjoy use of the large swimming pool may to september shared with the owners who rarely use it during the week and luxury pool towels are provided for your stay

Title: Holiday Home in Poole
Description: our holiday home is situated on the lovely rockley park in poole dorset great for families or anyone looking for a relaxing break away the caravan is a short less than 5 minute walk from the amenities which include a number of restaurants a pool with waterslides rock climbing and lots of activities for the kids the park has its own private beach along with water sports and sun loungers and is great in the summer entertainment passes can be purchased at reception when you arrive the space the spacenour holiday home sleeps 6 with 2 bedrooms and a sofa bed the kitchen is fully equipped and outside you will find a parking space along with additional spaces elsewhere outdoor seating and space for the kids to play other things to note other things to notenrockley park has lots of activities and entertainment available all of which can be booked at reception on arrival message me when booking for more info and the play pass form which needs to be filled out in order to book activitiesnplease note most of of the facilities are shut in november december if you are looking to go for a swim with the kids in these months the dolphin leisure centre in poole has a pool and a sauna or if not id be happy to recommend places a little further away

Title: Cosy and modern with outdoor pool open in summer
Description: gavenny cottage is a self contained annex that has an enclosed private courtyard and a private outdoor swimming pool that guests can use from 26th april 30th september 2021 the pool is closed outside of these dates for autumwinternnsituated on the edge of abergavenny town with views of the blorenge gavenny cottage is the perfect little base for any walking cycling or foodie break awaynninside you will find everything you need for a comfortable stay the space the spacenthe property is modern inside and has an equipped kitchen wifi smart tv comfy seating and dining area and a large bedroom upstairs with extra seatingnnwe have an electric stove heater washing machine iron and ironing boardnnwe have two enclosed outdoor areas a small private patio with seating and a raised patio with an outdoor swimming pool the pool is 24 foot long and is 3 foot deep at one end and 6 foot deep at the other it is open to our guests from 26th april through to 30th september but it is closed during autumnwinternncovidconfident staynnwe want our guests to have a very enjoyable relaxing stay at gavenny cottage we have all been living through a very stressful time so we want to remove as much worry as possible for your stay therefore we have introduced the following important changes to protect you and all of our guests staff and community and to help minimise the risk of contracting and spreading coronavirusn enhanced cleaning on top of our already meticulous standardsn extra cleaning supplies and hand sanitizersoap and available inside the cottagen socially distanced checkin and out with nocontact key collectionn amended checkin and out times checkin 3pm and checkout 10amn keys are disinfected before your arrival and gavenny cottage is not entered after its deep cleannnwe are constantly monitoring and adapting to the most uptodate government advice and our changes and new rules will be constantly revised and are subject to change with government advice and best practices

Title: Shepherds Hut with use of Pool, Hot Tub & Sauna
Description: our beautiful shepherds hut located within our gardens is a unique selfcatering accommodation with interior and exterior design to a high specification set in seven acres of grounds and surrounded by delightful countryside manor barn is a special place to spend your holidaynbedroom with a quality double bednopen plan living area with a fully equipped kitchennbathroom with a showernuse of the 12 metre indoor heated swimming pool with jacuzzi and saunanpatio and landscaped gardens the space the spacensurrounded by the cotswolds and malvern hills yet conveniently located close to the historic towns of cheltenham spa tewkesbury gloucester and malvernnthis fully equipped accommodation has an open plan living area consisting of a bedroom with a quality double bed living dining and kitchen area the kitchen has an oven and a hob the en suite bathroom has a shower the living area has a smart tv and wifinyou have your own space with views across the garden to the horse paddocks outside there is a decked terrace area to sit round at the end of the day and relax whilst making plans for the rest of your staynthe accommodation features use an onsite heated indoor swimming pool jacuzzi and sauna patio and beautiful grounds there is a barbecue and a fire pitnmanor barn is close to ancient sites including neolithic barrows hillforts and roman remains you are near to the cotswold way so if you like walking you can follow one of the walks from the national trail which can be downloaded from their website the malvern hills are also nearby which also provide pleasant walks and spectacular views the river severn is also a short walk away

Title: Cosy rural retreat with hot tub and indoor pool
Description: nestled in the stunning wye valley may hill view barn offers a relaxing and fun break whilst at may hill view barn you can enjoy our indoor heated pool march to september and outdoor hot tub you can also use the garden and paddock for a quiet afternoon or a game of rounders may hill view barn is also in easy reach of many great days out including the wye valley area of outstanding natural beauty 5 mins and the forest of dean 20 mins the space the spacenmay hill view is a selfcontained converted barn and you will have the entire place you yourself it has two bedrooms and sleeps fournnnmay hill view is adjacent to our main house lower ryelands the accommodation is private and has its own entrance cosy and warm and with all the usual amenities the accommodation is all on the same floor and consists of a kitchen area lounge bathroom first bedroom and master bedroomnnthe kitchen area has an undercounter fridge with small freezer compartment a two ring electric hob a kettle coffee machine toaster and a microwave that also works as an ovennnthe first bedroom has two single beds and a chest of drawersnnthe master bedroom has a kingsize bed chest of drawers and bedside tablesnnthere is also free wifi a tv various board games and maps of the area there is one shower in the barn and two in the pool house bedding and towels are includednnaccess to may hill view is via an outside stairway see checkingin details there is space for two cars on the private driveway bike storage and cleaning facilities are also available there are no street lights by the barn prepare for spectacular skies on clear nights and so there are motionactivated security lights you will find a torch in the holiday let but we recommend bringing your own if you plan to take the short stroll up to the moody cow other things to note other things to notenthe pool is solar thermal heated and therefore available from march until september

Title: Self Contained Studio The New Forest National Pk
Description: enjoy the studio and secluded patio plus access to our heated pool open mid april to end oct pool temp varies on the time of year all in lush surroundings in a quiet neighbourhoodnn1000 pocket sprung medium firm kingsize double bed wet room with sliding door wifi smart tv silent fridge microwave tea coffee toasternndonkeys ponies cows deer roam freely pigs close by too step into the national park 71000 acres of protected land within 140000 acres of the new forest the space the spacenthe studio is new transformed in 2021 it has a contemporary feel along with the new secluded patio with outdoor furniturennthe 25x12 ft pool is what airbnb classes as a shared space seeing as we use it too guests can use the pool between 9am and 7pm were often at work ask about sole use of the pool if required pool towels are provided guest accessnaccess to the room is down by the side of our house the key will be in the keysafe by the door well give you the code nearer the checkin date parking is on our drive to the right of our garage other things to note other things to notenthe ensuite has a macerator toilet which only takes toilet paper nothing else no wipes latex or food etc thanksnnthe ensuite has countryside plumbing a shower and sink pump so excuse the momentary pump sounds and suction sounds thanks againnnwe clean and sanitizen sanitize hightouch surfaces down to the doorknobn use approved cleaners and disinfectantsn wear protection to help prevent crosscontaminationn refer to cleaning checklists to thoroughly clean the roomn provide extra cleaning supplies so you can clean as you staynndue to carrying out the extra safe cleaning washing and laundry expenses we have added a small cleaning fee

Title: Brummell Barn with indoor pool on Isle of Wight
Description: lovely old converted barn on a beautiful working farm with animals and amazing viewsnsuited to large family occasions and celebrationsnsleeps 12 in 5 bedroomsnlarge kitchendinernupstairs sittingroom with picture windownfree use of indoor pool shared with one other cottage with simple booking systemnchildrens playgoundnsnooker roomngames roomnfarm butcherynallows 2 well behaved dogsnsorry no staghen parties the spacenwe would recommend that the house has a maximum of 11 adults as one bed space is a bunk bed we offer guests the use of an indoor heated swimming pool which is shared with one other holiday property but with a private booking system we also provide a games room snooker room and childrens playground guests can walk or cycle on our 730 acre downland farm and buy superb dryaged meat from our own award winning farm butchery two miniature donkeys pigs chickens beef cattle and sheep can be enjoyed brummell barn has far reaching countryside views from the spacious upstairs livingroom the large kitchen diner can seat 12 adults comfortably

Title: Newly Renovated Cottage with Far Reaching Views
Description: the orchard is a beautiful 3 bedroom 2 bathroom newly renovated cottage in the heart of the south downs with spectacular views ideally situated with a host of stunning walks from the doorstep yet close to the pretty town of haslemere also conveniently placed for cowdray polo goodwood events the witterings the property has its own pretty garden seated terrace area bbq a tennis court and heated swimming pool are available for use on request long term lettings are also available the space the spacenthe property has its own private parking area and is approached by a gravel path winding through a pretty orchard garden leading up to the cottage tucked away with its own front door the cottage is on the edge of our garden and driveway the orchard garden has a sunny terraced area fitted with new comfortable garden furniture to be enjoyed with over a morning coffee or evening drink there is also a weber bbq for al fresco mealsnninside the cottage is designed upside down so the 3 bedrooms 2 bathrooms utility cupboard with washing machinehoover etc are located on the ground floor the open plan sitting room dining area and kitchen are on the first floor with windows spanning the entire length so that the far reaching views can be fully enjoyednnthe entire cottage has been newly renovated and the kitchen has granite surfaces and all the mod cons you could wish for including oven fridge freezer microwave dishwasher and nespresso maker the kitchen has a convenient breakfast bar and stools ideal for working from home or just reading papersnnthe living area has been designed in a boutique style with a range of luxurious upholsteries cushions and is a lovely space to relax and unwind board games are included and the satelitte tv is equipped with netflix etc wifi is available throughout the propertynnthe 3 bedrooms are all spacious with luxurious bedlinen towels chest of drawers new carpet and fully lined and interlined curtains bedroom 2s singles can be joined and the mattress zipped together producing a very comfortable super king size bed bedroom 3 has 2 envelope single beds so additional sleeping is available for one additional guest on prior request the bathroom and shower room are also newly fitted the main property has a tennis court which you are very welcome to use on requestnnwe are happy to welcome one small pet on request

Title: Stunning Cotswolds Water Park
Description: sleeps 6 with pool
Amenities:
['About this space', 'Enjoy a discount for booking 7 nights or more.

Modelled on the style of local villages, Forge House is set in a secluded, traffic free location within the Water Garden on the exclusive Lower Mill Estate. Built in a traditional Cotswold style, this well furnished and welcoming property comprises of 3 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms a good sized lounge and dining area with cosy wood burning stove and French doors leading to an enclosed decked area, which is perfect for sitting and for children to play.', 'The space', 'The space
Forge House is a delightful Cotswold stone cottage offering a tranquil haven for nature lovers (5 large lakes within 500 acres of secluded parkland).

Complimentary Wifi is available, which has an ultra fast connection, ideal if you need to make video calls or use your time here to ‚Äòwork from home‚Äô. Use of our Netflix account is also included.

We welcome pets but please note this is limited to two maximum.

A high chair and a good-sized travel cot is available for our smaller guests to use.

There is also a Dolce Gusto coffee machine
So feel free to bring your own pods (a few complimentary will be provided).

You can enjoy cooking some great food on the BBQ and the wood fired pizza oven.

An outdoor heated swimming pool, sauna, tennis court, table tennis, playground and indoor soft play area complement this stunning property and is included in your stay. Please bring extra towels if you wish to use the pool or sauna - towels will be provided for use in the house.

Bikes, kayaks and canoes are available on site for rental and local fishing is also available on the estate.

Please note that we do not have access to the onsite spa.', '', '']

Title: The Burrow - Luxurious Pet Friendly, 3 Bed Lodge
Description: set in a peaceful area of the hoburne cotswold park is this beautifully equipped mobile home within a few minutes walk to the main park entertainment area and lakesnwe are perfectly positioned for easy reach to explore the cotswolds and surrounding areas the space the spacenthe spacenthis is a luxury home with full kitchen including ovenhob fridge freezer washing machine and dishwasherntv with dvd player in the lounge and tvs in 2 bedroomsnmusic can be streamed using the built in bluetooth speakersntable and chairs inside for a cosy family mealnthere are 3 bedrooms one with a king bed and plenty of storage space the other 2 bedrooms each have 2 single beds all bedrooms have ample storage spacennmaximum capacity 6 peoplenthere is a family shower room as well as a separate toilet and washbasin roomnoutside there is a table and chairs on the decking other things to note other things to notenwe do have other lodges on site so if you are staying in a group please contact usnyou are welcome to bring up to 2 dogs charged 20 per dog paid after booking

Title: Idyllic country cottage with Heated Pool (May-Sep)
Description: in a stunning rural location 4 miles from the jurassic coast the granary is beautifully equipped with outstanding views over the lawns and tennis court to the surrounding countryside the pool is open from the beginning of may to end of september and is shared with a small number of other guests games room tennis court one well behaved dog is welcome at 20 per pet if more please ask first there are lovely walks all around historic colyton is 2 miles away with pubs eateries and shops the space the spacenliz and gordon provide a warm welcome and the cottage is extensively equipped with welcome pack of basic food household and toiletry items so you can cut down on your packing it has a private garden with furniture and barbequenall linen and towels two each are providednthe bunk bedroom is not suitable for two adults

Title: Stylish converted Stables in Dulcote nr Wells
Description: the stables is located in dulcote village just a short walk from wells in somerset the space the spacenthe stables to the rear of the main house is furnished with an eclectic mix of modern and period furniture a large open plan living space contains an extremely comfortable squishy sofa a 46 flat screen tv iphone dock cunningly disguised as a retro radio and of course superfast wifi a well equipped kitchen has everything you could possible want to create a feast and after a visit to the delectable farmers market in wells you may well want to a stylish zinctopped dining table completes the picturenbeds are supremely comfortable with pocket sprung mattresses and crisp white cotton bedlinen there is a modern bathroom containing a bath with a shower over and underfloor heating a second bathroom boasts a large walkin shower outside there is an enclosed area for your own private use with decking seating and a bbq the cottage is on one level so is suitable for all although there is a small step up to the front door in the summer guests may share our 12m outdoor heated swimming pool situated in the walled courtyard between 11am and 6pm we open the pool at the start of junemay half term and close it at the end of august weather permitting of course it is quite a deep pool even at the shallow end so is not suitable for nonswimmers or young children sorry no toddlers or under 5snalthough we are unable to welcome under5s the property is great for those with babes in arms and we have a travel cot and high chair you may use there is also a pramfriendly path that leads from dulcote directly into wells just long enough to get them off to sleep we can also arrange babysitting if you so requirennduring july august we only take one week bookings starting on a friday at other times there is a 3 night minimum stay midweek and 2 nights at weekendsnfrom september till may except bank and school holidays our weekend rate includes a late check out whenever you like on sundaynglastonbury week 5 night minimum stay we also have 2 bb rooms in the main house sleeping an extra 4 people should you be a party of 8 please ask for ratesnnwe are in a great location for exeat visits to the following schools millfield prep 15mins millfield 20mins downside school 20 mins wells cathedral school 2mins all hallows prep 20minsnthe following local attractions are also nearby bath west showground wookey hole caves glastonbury festival site kilver court designer village and the mulberry factory shop bath and bristol are both a 45 minute drive awaynwe have tried to think of everything to make your stay as relaxing and comfortable as possible but we or our trusted friends in the village are always on hand should you need anything else we own a very friendly labrador retriever who may come and greet you when you arrive please let us know if this may be a problem and we will keep her inside note she is not allowed in the stables or in your private decked area nor are any other dogspets

Title: Contemporary Georgian Coach House with Heated Pool
Description: set within the ground of our georgian manor house the coach house provides a wonderful retreat for those looking to escape to the country whilst being a short drive from the seaside town of sidmouth and nearby city of exeter the coach house was renovated in 2020 to provide a high standard of accommodation perfect for families providing a king bed and 2 single beds in the 2nd bedroom rollaway available set behind a private gate facilities include a sauna and heated swimming pool seasonal the space the spacenguests will love the cosy yet modern decor the tranquil front gardens and use of the heated outdoor pool from june septembernna additional rollaway bed is available for an extra chargennfor families of 6 or more the pool house may also be booked in conjunction with the coach house httpsabnbmejnnxlvyrugb guest access guest accessnwe are happy for our guests to relax by and use the pool between 11am and 6pm we are happy to share the pool with our guests but do not offer exclusive use as our family and friends also usennguests are invited to enjoy the front gardens rear gardens are not accessible to guests other than for access to the pool

Title: Under the Walnut Tree Shepherds Hut with Hot Tub
Description: under the walnut tree is a beautiful shepherds hut in a fabulously romantic setting with farreaching views down the painswick valley the bright and light hut sleeps two in an elevated double bed and has a wellequipped kitchenette a dining table log burner and ensuite shower room with a toilet guests have their own southfacing garden with a woodfired hot tub firepit armchairs bbq picnic table and the seasonal use of a springfed heated swimming pool and garden room the space the spaceninside every amenity has been thought of and cleverly designed to fit tidily away providing a stylish and welcoming space for guests to escape to the sleeping area has a double bed 62 x 46 on a raised platform with led candles lining the mantle above the curtains there is a step to easily access the bed and storage underneath itnnthe dining area has a large pullout table with a bench seat on either side and a view up the main garden and down the painswick valley the kitchen area is equipped with everything guests need to cook simply but well with a double gas hob a sink under a wooden work top and an electric cooler box box the cool box is situated under the bench opposite the door the superefficient cool box is provided with ice blocks that can be changed upon request which usually last up to three days on chilly days and evenings light the little woodburner and enjoy the cosy ambiance next to the kitchen area is a compact shower room with a cubicle shower and toiletnnunder the walnut tree is set in a private area of the owners delightful garden follow a steppingstone path past the swimming pool terraces stone pillars entwined with roses in the summertime to your own southfacing garden with magnificent views down the painswick valley guests have use of a springwater woodfired hot tub charcoal bbq fire pit picnic table and two armchairs at the front door are two large planters full of fragrant flowers and herbs sit back and watch the local wildlife including ravens kestrels deer and the occasional badger guests can also use the summer house at the bottom of the pergola a delightful place in the cool on hot summer days there is also a mini fridgefreezer in this summer house for guests exclusive usennguests may use the owners swimming pool which is spring fed and heated and in the most idyllic of settings the pool is adjacent to the shepherd huts garden and sun loungers are provided poolside making it a fabulous place to relax the use of the swimming pool is seasonal with the season running from early summer to midautumn but varying from yeartoyear with the start entirely dependent on the date the last walnut tree fronds drops off and warm nights to maintain the days gain in temperature if use of the pool is essential for your stay please enquire if its open before bookingnnfacilitiesnnuf0fc sleeps 2 in a raised standard double bed 62 x 46nuf0fc 1 ensuite shower room with cabinet shower and toiletnuf0fc hot tub wood fired and spring fed first nights fuel provided extra kilndried forest stewardship council fsccertified wood can be purchased from the owner for 6 per boxnuf0fc parking for 2 cars private secure drivewaynuf0fc private southfacing garden area with farreaching viewsnuf0fc springfed heated outdoor swimming pool with terrace and sun loungers seasonal use only shared with ownersnuf0fc wood burner logs and kindling suppliednuf0fc solar powered garden lightingnuf0fc gas cooking and electric hot water indoor power pointnuf0fc free wifi available in garden area onlynuf0fc kitchenette with twin gas hob kettle utensils crockery cutlery glassware champagne flutes tumblers and wine and water glasses cafetiere bakeware food preparation grater jug sieve saucepans bread bin kitchen foil kitchen papernuf0fc cool box large esky cooler box with prefrozen ice blocks providednuf0fc fridgefreezer in garden roomnuf0fc bed linen bath towels bath robes and tea towelsnuf0fc kitchen starter consumables teabags fresh and instant coffee sugar fresh milk olive oil and balsamic vinegarnuf0fc complimentary breakfast hamper available usually contains milk bread butter eggs and bacon but can be changed to suit dietary requirements please request when bookingnuf0fc cleaning starter pack brush cloth washing up liquid bin bagsnuf0fc shower room essentials hand soap toilet paper shampoo shower gelnuf0fc fire pit first logs provided extra kilndried forest stewardship council fsc certified wood available to purchase from owner 6 per boxnuf0fc garden furniture picnic table and two armchairsnuf0fc bbq charcoal and utensils initial supply of instant lighting charcoal providednuf0fc garden room opensided stonebuilt room near the hut with fridgefreezer and seating available during the late springsummer monthsnuf0fc games board game cards scrabblenuf0fc safety equipment fire extinguisher fire blanket carbon monoxide monitor smoke alarm first aid kit guest access guest accessnguests have Title: Romantic Secluded Cottage
Description: a stunning cottage standing in its own grounds in the heart of the wiltshire countryside with access to amazing walks right outside your front door wonderful countryside great local pubs all within easy reach enormous comfy bed with ensuite makes this cottage a truly romantic get away small private garden with garden chairs where you sit out and enjoy the stunning views the space the spacenyou can enjoy the features of this truly splendid cottage with separate dining room sitting room with large tv and kitchen which is small but well equipped with quality cooking equipment but please note no dishwasher the bedroom is large and has 6ft comfy bed with cotton sheets the ensuite bathroom has a very large bath with a shower above it you will be provided with bath robes bath towels hand towels and flannels the cottage has a contemporary feel yet retaining the original featuresnsorry no pets guest access guest accessnthe entire cottage is yours there is no over looking and it is completely secluded other things to note other things to notenswimming pool is closed from october till may

Title: Rural Getaway ‚ÄúStaycation‚Äù Bliss
Description: the party barn is a recently converted addition next door to our rural home it is immaculately furnished and is self contained with the use of a swimming pool and beautiful terraced area from june to september it has one twin room and a double mezzanine space sleeping up to 4 adults or 2 adults and 2 children the kitchen is open plan to a living dining area the market towns of marlborough and hungerford are nearby with winchester and salisbury withing easy reach the space the spacenthe barn is light and airy and stands within a pretty cottage garden overlooking our fields the swimming pool area and terrace outside is secluded

Title: Hamlet of converted barns with shared indoor pool.
Description: covid19 update indoor facilities snooker room and games room open swimming pool open and on a rota system with all properties on the estate sorry no pets stancombe is a small hamlet of several converted stone barns that now consist of about 15 properties set within 20 acres of idyllic devon valley in the heart of the beautiful south hams snowdrop is positioned on the 1st floor of the tythe barn the space the spacenthis area is best known for its peaceful rolling countryside outstanding coastal walks and beautiful beaches the original stone buildings of the stancombe estate have been converted into holiday accommodation there are eight stonebuilt properties that make up the converted tythe barn as well as several other properties on the estate snowdrop is on the first floor of the tythe barn has one double bedroom and one twin bedroom there is also room for a foldup bed or cot in the twin room guest access guest accessnall shared outside areas other things to note other things to noten10 discount for 7 night stays sorry no pets

Title: Footmans  - Outdoor Recovery Spa Available to Book
Description: originally part of the servants quarters to west house this part of the north wing has been made into a comfortable studio flat with kitchen and beautiful ensuite bathroom including roll top bath and walk in shower there is a further air bnb flat opposite and another beneath access is up a stairs with an onsite quirky cafe gym beauty parlour and animals this is an unusual place to stay with plenty going on and choices of places to visit and things to do the space the spacenwest house is set on the edge of chilton polden on the polden hills between street and bridgwater and overlooking the somerset levels towards the mendip hills the main house is of gothic victorian style with a beautiful old coach house set behind the house and plenty of other quirky buildings around we have lots of animals on site here sheep and lambs barry our saddleback pig cats and dogs chickens alpacas two naughty pygmy goats called murph and cindy our two red deer called saffron and og two larger goats called bruno and clover horses and currently a donkey called patch you may well see some of these during your visitnnwe also have a gym on site the goat shed home of crossfit wyvern we are primarily a weight lifting and conditioning gym but offer open gym sessions and crossfit classes pt is also available our outdoor recovery spa is linked to our gym and is available to book at additional cost hot tub sauna and pool for cold water swimming in the winter heated in the summer closed christmas day and boxing day we do offer an exclusive option or hourly slots limited availability with limited numbers you are very welcome to make use of the facilities just go to crossfitwyverncom to book the gym or westhouse21com for booking the spa or for more information on the site herenna chiropractor works part of the week from our gym plus sports therapists please ask for detailsnnhave you ever wanted to try alpaca trekking somerset alpacas is based here at west house so if you want to learn more about these fascinating animals plus other rare breeds and try your hand at trekking with them go to fb somerset alpaca trekking and send sue a messagennyou will find a pint of milk in your room when you arrive this is from our milk from the moor milk station in the old donkey barn just across from js bistro you can also buy some real local farm milk from here to take home or sample one of the many delicious milk shakes yummy milk from a local herd of cows grazed on somerset grass with minimal food milesnnin addition there is a beauty parlour offering a range of treatments the parlour and also salon v hair salon somerset silver designs and makes silver jewellery on site here which is also on salennvisit js bistro our on site cafe open 10am 6pm tues weds 10am 8pm thurs sat and 10am 3pm sun closed monday to have a delicious breakfast cooked for you coffees lunches and other drinks are on offer as well and wonderful freshly made pizza please book in advance for pizza to ensure your order alternatively you may wish to prepare your own food and use the kitchen with oven and hob microwave toaster and fridge the bathroom has a walk in rainfall shower and roll top bath access is through a door shared with the old dairy and a further air bnb flat the coachmans flat up a stairs there is a private locked door to the footmans flat guest access guest accessnalthough chilton polden is served by a bus route most people do have alternative means of transport the 75 bus is the one which will take you to places locally and there is a stop in chilton polden within easy walking distance at the old post office or leather and lace the road that the house driveway joins is part of the national cycle network so we often see cyclists in the village if you do drive through the village be aware of tractors cyclists horses and people walking on the road with dogs the roads really are used by a multitude of different people if you want to get away from most traffic then head down goose lane just a short distance from the house and out onto the moor where you can walk or cycle for miles and see very little traffic other things to note other things to notenwe do have a number of animals here dogs and cats sometimes like to visit our guests please do just say if any are a nuisance and i will come and remove them most of the rest of our animals should be behind fences although the odd one escapes ocasionally

Title: Bwythyn Cerrig (W41454)
Description: relax in the shared indoor heated swimming pool hot tub or sauna or keep fit in the onsite gym during your stay here beams and wooden floors throughoutnground floornliving room with wood burner satellite tv dvd player with a selection of dvds cd player and patio doors leading to pationkitchendining room with aga microwave fridge freezer and dishwashernutility room with washerdryernwet room with shower and toiletnfirst floornbedroom 1 with double bed and ensuite with shower cubicle and toiletnbedroom 2 with twin bedsnbedroom 3 with twin bedsnbathroom with bath and toilet underfloor central heating lawned garden with patio garden furniture and portable barbecue private parking for 4 cars please note family bookings only both properties electricity bed linen towels and superfast broadband included logs for wood burner included travel cot and highchair indoor heated swimming pool shared with other properties onsite 91m x 42m depth 09m to 18m with sauna hot tub and childrens play area no smoking visit wales 5 star shared indoor heated pool hot tub sauna gym situated within the heart of the dulais valley at the edge of the village of crynant these barns have been converted to a good standard with splendid views of march hywel mountain and numerous walks directly onto the mountain behind bwthyn cerrig ref w41454 is semidetached whilst the old stables ref w42528 stands detached situated on a working farm with the owners friendly dogs each property has shared use of the onsite facilities including an indoor heated swimming pool sauna and hot tub cefn coed coal museum aberdulais waterfalls and activities such as golfing driving ranges archery paint balling and quad biking are all available within a three mile radius the famous dan yr ogof caves and craig y nos country park are just 10 miles the magnificent gower coast is approximately 18 miles and the brecon beacons are within 35 miles swansea town centre and cardiff both with excellent shopping bars and clubs are within driving distance an ideal holiday base shop pub and restaurant 1 milesnbwthyn cerrig w41454 can be booked together with the old stables w42528 to accommodate up to 11 guests

Title: Nutkins Retreat, Whippingham, East Cowes
Description: tucked away in a secluded spot and surrounded by woodlands and rural areas nutkins retreat is a delightfully peaceful place to get away from it all and enjoy a daily dip in the outdoor heated poolnnlocated just on the outskirts of the historical village of whippingham and a short stroll from the popular english heritage site of osborne house the accommodation is an ideal spot for exploringnnthe accommodation has two bedrooms and overlooks a very scenic natural stream and pond within the grounds of the property which back onto a wooded area the accommodation benefits from the use of a 30ft heated pool open between april and september and shared with an additional smaller lodge within the groundsnnthere are two bedrooms a shower room with pod shower open plan living room and kitchendiner the master bedroom is very spacious and recently refurbished with views over the garden the 2nd bedroom has a single bed with pull out trundle bed making it into a twinnnin the living area there is ample soft and dining seating tv dvd player and wifi outside the living area is a large decking seating area with views over the garden and stream there are plenty of wild visitors to the garden including red squirrels to watch fornnnutkins retreat really is a hidden gem in an excellent spot for exploring and theres even a great pub within walking distance on the bank of the river medina a leisurely stroll awaynnnb as the property has a pond and pool we must restrict bookings with children to 8 years and above

Title: Paignton pet friendly holiday lodge c/w hot tub
Description: luxury 2 3 4 5 or 6 berth timber clad pet friendly double width holiday lodge cw private 56 seat hot tub 3 bedrooms 2 bathrooms 1 en suite large vaulted loungedining area fully fitted kitchen large private outside decking area with outdoor seating and panoramic devon countryside views situated on a five star country park on park facilities include indoor swimming pool sauna gym tennis court archery kids play area dog walking areas pet friendly on site pubrestaurant the space the spacenwelcome to our beautiful fully furnished pet friendly timber clad lodge cw 56 seater hot tub on the 5 devon hills holiday villagecountry park situated between paignton the historic market town of totnes a perfect place from which to visit the holiday attractions of torbay torquay brixham dartmouth teignmouth dawlish the many blue flag pet friendly beaches of the area the cities of exeter plymouth are nearby lovely little market towns like totnes newton abott the dramatic scenery of dartmoor paignton zoo is less than a five minute drive is also well worth a visit the lodge is beautifully furnished with everything you need to make your stay in this lovely part of devon a pleasure the lodge featuresnlarge vaulted lounge dining arean3 bedrooms 1 x king size with ensuite 1 x twin 1 x doublen1 main bathroomnbeautiful landscaped parkndog friendly lodge parknlarge decking area with outside seatingnprivate 56 seat hot tub maintained dailynfree wifinfree use of on site indoor swimming pool sauna steam room gym gym tuition is chargable if required plus other on site facilitiesn15th century thatched roof coaching inn on site serving food wines fine ales just a 5 minute quiet stroll away this is also dog friendly inside or outnnthe lodge is situated on the newest part of the park with sweeping views into the valley the rolling hills beyond it has its own car parking space adjacent to the lodge and an extended decking area to while away the hoursnthe 5 park itself is very quiet relaxing with beautifully landscaped grounds boasts among its attractions a lovely indoor pool with separate kiddies pool a sauna steam room the gym at devon hills is modern well equipped with personal trainers on hand if required there is also a beauty salon hairdressers situated in the main buildingnfree passes for use of the pool gym are included in your stay at the lodge for up to six people seperate charges may apply for gym tuition etc also on the park you can try tennis table tennis archery there is a small play park for the younger members of your familyndogs are welcome on the park in the lodge see below there is a lovely large dog walking fieldarea just 100mtrs from the lodge which leads to a small pond picnic area a further field is available at the other end of the parknalso on site is the blagdon inn a 15th century coaching house serving good food fine wines alesthe blagdon also has sky tv a pool table all this just a five minute quiet walk from your lodge dogs are welcome there too inside out the inn now does a takeawaycollectiondelivery menu service also features an onsite shop selling basic essentials local producennonto the lodge itselfwhich is a 3 bedroom 2 bathroom fully fitted lodge finished to a luxurious standardof course with dg central heating if you are visiting out of seasonncomplimentary wifi is also included in your stay mobile signals are excellentnenter into a superb open plan livingkitchen area with vaulted ceilings the large kitchen is fully fitted including a hob oven microwave dishwasher fridge freezer washing machine the all important wine cooler as well as kettle toaster all the other small kitchen essential items that you may need to make your stay a pleasure oh nearly forgot we supply a small welcome pack for your arrivalnthe spacious bright lounge area has 2 x 3 seater sofas a modern electric fire a 42 flat screen tv with built in freeview then onto the dining area which has a large modern dining table 6 chairsnviews from both the lounge the dining area are onto the decking area beyond to the rolling hills the outside area itself has a rattan dining patio set for up to 8 people it also features the 56 seater hot tub outside lighting a wet storage boxnthrough the hallway where you will find hanging space shoe cupboard are doors leading of to the 3 bedrooms the main bathroomnbedroom 1 master king size divan large wall mirror ample wardrobe drawer space 32 samsung wall hung tv door leading to en suite with a beautiful tiled quadrant shower washbasin wcnbedroom 22x single beds ample wardrobe drawer spacenbedroom 31x double bed ample wardrobe drawer spacenmain bathroom featuring full size bath with shower over washbasin wc welcome toiletries are supplied in each bathroom areanall bed linen towels etc are provided we even leave a few childrens games in the wardrobenthe whole property is tastefully decorated furnished is protected by smoke co alarms all necessary testing to appliances is to standard gas electricity is of course included if you have any further questions about the property or area please just asknnplease note 2 smallmed dogs allowed onlystrictly no smoking within the lodge or on the decking area due to insurance purposes please only a max of 6 occupants per stay from 1607 to 0209 only 7 or 14 day bookings accepted with checkinout day being saturdays guest access guest accessnfull use of 3 bedroom luxury lodge including large private decking area with panoramic views private 56 person hot tub other things to note other things to notenplease note covid19 please Title: Escape to Country Living at its Finest!
Description: escape to the country and unwind at this charming elegant cottage in 2 acres of lovely gardens with swimming pool tennis and badminton and county walks starting from your door located on the edge of the award winning village of cuddington walk to the thatched roof pub for drinks and dinner or village store for supplies and news papers only 10 minutes drive to the bustling market town of thame 35 minutes to oxford 40 minutes to london by train and 45 minutes to london heathrow airport the space the spacentyringham small as it is affectionately called is on the grounds of tyringham hall a 16th century elizabethan manor house at nearly 1800 sq ft and freshly remodelled the cottage is bright clean and open furnished with country antiques modern amenities central heating and log fire with private garage parkingnna comfortable and relaxing retreat with the master bedroom ensuite on the ground floor along with the fully updated kitchen with new appliances the dining area leads to the ample living room with wood burning fire and flat screen tv two additional bedrooms and a bathroom are upstairs every room has an internet connection guest access guest accessnprivate entrance to the tibbys lane with another private entrance to garden the expansive 2 acre garden with pool opened and heated may 1 sept 30 tennis and badminton is available for your exclusive usen other things to note other things to notenfor special events or weddings there are 5 additional ensuite bedrooms in the main house with a separate garden entrance to tyringham small that can be made available on request during your stay we offer massagemanicures and pedicures brows and lasheswaxing and skin cleansing plus sustainable flower arranging classes making wreaths and table decorations clay shooting tennis lessons prices on application

Title: Natural pool, Luxury hot tub with Glamping & Barn
Description: two luxury glamping tents both with king size beds set in the quiet cambridgeshire countryside additional bedroom with double bed in the barn use of natural swimming pool and luxury scandavian wood fired hot tub guests also have access to an inside toilet hot outdoor showersmall indoor kitchenette area and outdoor webber bbq check out our socials stonesglamping the space the spacentwo luxury glamping tents both with king size beds set in the quiet cambridgeshire countryside additional bedroom in the barn use of natural swimming pool and luxury scandavian wood fired hot tub guests also have access to an inside toilet hot outdoor shower small indoor kitchenette area and outdoor webber bbqnngarden poolnnthe mature grounds are a very special feature indeed and enjoy total privacy and seclusion and are bordered on three sides by farmland and enjoy breathtaking and farreaching views particularly from the end of the garden over surrounding unspoilt countryside the gardens are principally laid to lawn with a great variety of mature shrubs bushes and trees around and extend in all to approximately 14 acresnnwithin the central part of the grounds there is a wonderful natural swimming pond which provides pure clean water for bathing and a complete haven for relaxing there is a large timber deck and adjacent to this there is a delightful thatched changing roomsummerhouse the aim of a natural swimming pool is to avoid chemicals such as chlorine and instead encouraging an organic environment a natural swimming pool offers the feeling of swimming in a freshwater mountain lakennthe woodfired hot tub is perfect for relaxing with a glass of bubbly all logs are provided light the stove and have a hot bubbly tub within two hoursnnbarnnnthe barn is for private use and is accessible 24 hours a day providing guests with a kingsized bedroom kitchennette and dining room that includes two ring hob microwave oven full sized fridge with small freezer compartment the room also has a sixperson dining table perfect for breakfast the living room sung area includes comfy seating a tv connected with an xbox perfect for rainy daysnngreenhousennwhat to try your hand at gardening the property includes a large vegetable garden help your self to fresh produce or grab a shovel and give gardening a gonnaccessnnparking is private land you will need a car to access the local area the host will meet you at the property show you around and then leave you to enjoy your holidaynnextrasnnwant to make your trip extra special from putting away your shopping before you arrive to organising private chefs yoga lessons or days out no question or activity is to big to ask for send us a message for more details guest access guest accessnparking is private land you will need a car to access the local area

Title: The Country Retreat - fabulous holiday lodge
Description: comfortable and spacious lodge in 5 star edgeley park in the surrey hills an area of outstanding natural beauty the country retreat offers selfcatering accommodation use of sauna swimming pool and gym free wifinnideal for relaxing holidays with the whole family quick getaways with friends or the perfect romantic breaknnwell behaved pets welcome extra 35nno commercial vehiclesvans allowed if in doubt please ask first the space the spacenthis lodge is completely detached and isolated from all others on the park the only shared spaces here are the pool gym and reception area none of which need to be entered during your staynnthe property is deep cleaned after each guest surfaces sanitised and all fabrics washed with the exception of carpets curtains and sofasnnthe accommodation sleeps 6 adults in 3 bedrooms includes a master bedroom with ensuite twin bedroom and one bedroom with bunk beds for two family bathroom stylish open plan living area and modern kitchen with separate utility room the kitchen is equipped with an oven dishwasher and washing machine and towels and bed linen are includednnthere is a dining area and seating area with a flatscreen smart tv and dvd player a sun terrace complete with furniture for alfresco diningnnyou can play swim have a sauna and use the gym on site there are also tennis courts at the park and the area is popular for golfing and cycling the swimming pool and gym close at 5pmnndorking is 91 miles away while university of surrey is 56 miles from country retreat london gatwick airport is 143 miles away

Title: Lilly Pad
Description: our lakeside lodge offers comfortable modern accommodation with stunning views across the lake perfect for a memorable get awaynit is perfectly positioned a stones throw from the waters edge a perfect place to relax after a busy day the space the spacensituated in the cotswolds an area of outstanding natural beauty our lodge is perfectly placed were just a 15 minute drive from bibury burton on the water and all the cotswold villagesnif you wish to use the hoburne facilities then please ask about passesnthe lodge has a great lakeside viewnthere are 2 bedroomsnmaster bedroom has a king size bed with en suite showertoilet and a walk in dressing roomwardrobenthe twin room has 2 single beds with additional storagenthe kitchen is fully equipped with oven fridgefreezer dishwasher and washing machine as well as other small appliances such as kettle toaster and microwave guest access guest accessnyou will have access to the whole lodge other things to note other things to notenwe do have other lodges on site so if you are staying in a group please contact us

Title: Apple Cottage - Barn with Log Burner, Private pool/spa sessions & Alpacas, Nr Beach
Description: berehayes has 8 selfcatering holiday cottages set around a delightful courtyard in a tranquil rural village just 2 miles from the beaches of the world heritage jurassic coast in west dorset near lyme regis some parts of the cottages are over 500 years old and they have been rated 4 star by the aa the berehayes spa includes a heated indoor swimming pool sauna and jacuzzi open all year its all about the pool you can now have the indoor pool complex all to yourselves covidsafe 1 free session is bookable in the pool complex each full day to be fair to other guests bookings can only be made once you arrive on site converted from 16th century listed stone barns outside table in the courtyard for al fresco dining village pub with good food games room free 30 mbps incottage wifi smart tv alpaca feeding in large paddock designated car park space 2 miles from britains premier fossil beaches sand pebbles a peaceful relaxing sanctuary in an area of outstanding national beauty just 25 hours from the m25 we are adhering to all government guidelines for extra cleaning and have been approved by the aa covid confident scheme if there is a government lockdown that effects your stay full refunds will be given the space guest access other things to note

Title: Stunning Coastal Apartment with Parking & Pool
Description: situated in a secluded cove this 2 bed apartment in a gated development offers breathtaking panoramic sea views across torbay from the large balconynavocet 2 at the cove makes a peaceful coastal retreat for a family couples or single travellers keen to enjoy devon life in style avocet 2 is set in a prime location and boasts spectacular sea views from its position on the first level of the building the space the spacenthe full width balcony is accessible via sliding doors from both the living room and the master bedroom and provides plenty of space to relax bbq and dine and to take in the breathtaking panoramic views across torbay and on clear days as far as the dramatic coastline of the east devon area of outstanding natural beauty nnthe communal grounds offer a boules court barbeque area and an outdoor swimming pool with seasonal opening from june until mid september there is direct access to the secluded fishcombe cove where you can enjoy freshly prepared food and drinks and even catch a glimpse of the local seals if you are lucky follow the south west coast path 5 minutes down through the adjacent national trust woodland and you will find yourself at the very picturesque and sheltered churston cove nnas well as the contemporary decor the property benefits from stunning coastal views and is close to battery gardens and churston woods for those who enjoy a nice stroll for those who like to wander further afield youre only metres from the famous south west coast pathnnthe apartment also includes access to an outdoor heated swimming pool on the grounds of this breathtakingly beautiful developmentnnliving roomdining areanfull width sliding doors with access to the balconynopen and bright with fantastic viewsnopen plan living room and dining area n4 seater dining tablentwo 2seater sofas and footstooln32 flatscreen tv with freeviewnbluetooth wireless speakernnmaster bedroomnaccess to the balcony via sliding patio doorsndouble bed and built in wardroben19 flatscreen tv with freeviewnnbedroom 2ntwin single beds and built in wardrobe with hanging spacennkitchennopen plan kitchen off living and dining area nsingle electric oven with grill and hobsnunder counter fridge with freezer drawer dishwasher washerdryernnfamily bathroomnbath with over head showernnoutdoorsnlarge balcony spanning whole width of apartment with stunning panoramic sea viewsnprivate and enclosed with four piece rattan set with table and foot stoolsngas barbequencommunal outdoor heated swimming pool seasonal opening from june until septembern for summer 2021 the swimming pool is anticipated to open after 21st june subject to government confirmation that all social restrictions can be easednallocated parking for one car in the secure gated car park on site nnall saltwater escapes properties have acquired the industry standard and has followed government and industry covid19 guidelines all properties have risk assessments in place and a process to maintain cleanliness and aid social distancing guest access guest accessnavocet 2 is a first floor apartment and is accessed either via the boardwalk which runs along the front of the site and then up a set of stairs to access the front door or along the level paved path which runs from the car park between the first and second rows of apartments from this path it is only a couple of steps down to the front door of the property please note it is not permissible to park directly outside the apartment roller cases and soft luggage which can be easier stored are recommended nnonce inside the property it is single level and there are no stairs other things to note other things to noten early check in 3pm check out 10amn outdoor pool is open from june september annually however the dates are at the discretion of the site management please contact us with any questionsn for summer 2021 the swimming pool is anticipated to open after 21st june subject to government confirmation that all social restrictions can be easedn no pets permitted on the developmentnnall saltwater escapes properties have acquired the industry standard and has followed government and industry covid19 guidelines all properties have risk assessments in place and a process to maintain cleanliness and aid social distancing
