Title: The Shed
Description: the propertynnthe shed is named somewhat tongue in cheek by the owners family as it is about as far from a shed as you can get whether sitting out on the decking with its clear view glass balustrade or in the comfort of the lounge you have stunning views across avon beach and the solent to the isle of wight and the needles there is always something to watch at any time of year when you talk about a property one of the most important factors is location new for 2015 the chalet has it all from its prime sea front position to its proximity to such places as the beautiful new forest bournemouth lymington and christchurch there is so much to do right on your doorstep or within a very short drivennthe shed is fully equipped to a high standard with all you need to make your stay one of comfort and luxury there is a dishwasher so no arguments over the washing up separate fridge and freezer microwave and extra touches like a built in coffee maker bose sounddock and tvs in both bedrooms you have private parking adjacent to the chalet so you do not have to haul your luggage and shopping farnnthe shed is based within the boutique sandhills holiday park with its historic main house and leafy grounds the whole ambiance is one of relaxing in the country but with the sights and sounds of the sea the park facilities are available to all guests and include an adventure playground family bar with sky tv heated outdoor pool small gymnasium pool table launderette and mini mart store additionally there is free wifi in the lounge and bar areasnabout the local areanchristchurch was a renowned smuggling town and the shed is just a short walk from the historic mudeford quay where in 1784 smugglers skirmished with customs and excise officers so kids bring those cutlasses eye patches and skull and crossbones oh and a parrot if you have onennit is still a working quay today with fishing boats venturing out most days so why not say hello to pete on boat deja vu su21 and see how his day has been or wave to him from your decking as he heads back from another successful day out if you fancy testing your skills out and bringing the catch home yourself pleasure fishing trips are available directly from the quay or we can help you organise in advance there are many pleasure trips to be had or if you fancy a thrill then why not hang on to your seats on the bay blast rib ridennthe quay is also famous for its crabbing from the quayside crabbers quay and has a childrens play park fish stall cafe the haven house inn and a large green area which is perfect for picnics ball games and kite flying you can catch the ferry to hengistbury head directly from the quay and visit its fantastic beaches and beach hutsnnchristchurch harbour is a great place for watersports from windsurfing to sailing and the highcliffe sailing club is based on the quay there is also an active rnli lifeboat station which practices launching weekly so you are almost bound to see their rather unusual lifeboat launch and recovery system in actionnnif walking or bird watching is your thing then you can do both without even getting in the car within an easy stroll you will find a nature reserve on the cliff top adjacent to highcliffe castle if you fancy a little longer out then why not try the circular walk through stanpit marshes and on to christchurch for a spot of lunch then take the tuckton ferry from outside the captains club to cross the river or walk over tuckton bridge a little further on if the ferry is not running and head across more picturesque marshes to the back of hengistbury head from there you can skirt the inside shoreline head up and over the top or use the beach as your route back to the beach huts and ferry home at the tip of the head who knows the haven house inn may tempt you with a thirst quencher before heading back to the luxuries of the chaletnndown at avon beach there is a cafrestaurant the noisy lobster and kiosks serving fish and chips coffee and ice cream there is a shop selling anything from localnational papers to clothes and holiday souvenirs and even a bakery on sitennif you head out in the car then the walks available to you are endless with the new forest on your doorstep and the purbecks within easy reach easily missed and of particular note is the area around keyhaven and lymington and in particular the sea wall walk past the now disused salt works and the spit and hurst castle which in itself is worth entry but make sure you have a few hours to sparennhistorically sailing and fishing are all part of the local heritage with such famous local sailing clubs as christchurch and lymington to hand more recently wind and kite surfing have become extremely popular along with kayaking and paddle boarding dont worry if you have never tried any of these or do not have any equipment as shore sports base themselves in the harbour and are more than happy to help outnnabout the area in generalnnchristchurch the sign says where time is pleasant and its right from the lively monday market to the great shops and restaurants along the high street it is a great coastal town it is a short trip in the car or by the ferry that leaves from mudeford quay christchurch priory is the longest parish church in the country and is surrounded by beautiful grounds riverside walks and christchurch quay the priory is a must see and is steeped in history the priory contains the miraculous beam said to be placed there by a carpenter locals believed was christ himselfnnthe new forest a national park situated on the south coast of england the landscape is a mix of heathland grassland bogs and woods domestic animals are permitted to roam freely throughout the forest visit beaulieu motor museum catch a ferry from the pretty town of lymington to the isle of wight or just enjoy the many cycle trails walks and forest villagesnnbournemouth the famous seaside resort with miles of beaches loads of restaurants bars clubs and great shopping just 9 miles away it has so much to see and donnother attractions alice in wonderland maze theme park serendipity sams go ape at moors valley towerpark with its multiplex bowling and splashdown indoor water park paultons theme park on the edge of the new forest the bournemouth oceanarium compton acres poole old town harbour sandbanks and brownsea island to name but a few guest access guest accessnguests have full access to the full property along with access to the sandhills holiday park site facilities

Title: 17thC  thatched cottage in farming hamlet
Description: this pretty selfcontained 17thc thatched cottage is situated in a farming hamlet near historic abbotsbury village and world heritage coast the cottage is annexed to the owners farmhouse and cottage guests are welcome to use our heated swimming pool june end august hot tub and to relax and unwind in our extensive garden the hamlet is a walkers paradise surrounded by footpaths including the dorset coast path the cottage is available to hire on a weekly basis with a friday changeover the space the spacenthis pretty thatched 17thc grade 2 listed cottage has oak beams inglenook fireplace with log effect electric stove the garden is in excess of 2 acres with tables chairs and benches where guests can relax and unwind there are no other holiday cottages on site and outdoor facilities are only shared with myself and very occasionally when my family may visit guest access guest accessnguests are welcome to use our hot tub swimming pool bbq all outside garden furniture and to relax in our extensive garden other things to note other things to notenboth abbotsbury and portesham have farm shops and pubs abbotsbury also has a general grocery store post office and various craft shops

Title: The Hunting Lodge (NQ4)
Description: a unique tranquil hideaway a mile from pretty bourtononthewater with fishing swimming and tennis by arrangement all on the ground floornlivingdining room with tv and dvd playernkitchen with electric cooker microwave fridgefreezer and dishwashernbedroom with twin beds and dressing areanbathroom with bath and toilet oil central heating electricity bed linen and towels included garden with garden furniture outdoor swimming pool shared with owner available on request tennis court shared with owner private parking for 1 car please note no children under 12 years old there is a stream that runs at the back of the property this enchanting detached holiday cottage is set in the grounds of a grade ii listed mill house where guests can enjoy trout fishing in the grounds and use of the owners tennis court and outdoor swimming pool by arrangement while outside is a pretty enclosed garden it lies close to riverside lodge nvg with the picturesque cotswold village of bourtononthewater only a mile away with its beautiful old houses and many attractions including the elegant bridges spanning the river windrush also nearby is 18hole golf at lynham cotswold farm park burford wildlife park and the attractive spa town of cheltenham with its art galleries pump room and museums all within 12 miles ideally situated for exploring the cotswolds picturesque villages national trust houses and old market towns stratford 35 miles shop and pub 1 mile

Title: Bramble Pye - New Converted Barn In The New Forest
Description: rob claire welcome you to bramble pye a newly renovated barn on the edge of the new forest which is renowned for its wild ponies scenerynnlocated on our family farm within an idyllic courtyard of converted barns beautifully decorated furnished to a high standard accommodating between 6 to 8 guests infantsnnsituated within the charming hampshire countryside close to historic romsey salisbury winchester there are plenty of places to visit 10 minute drive to pepper pig world the spacenshorter stays 2 nights minimum accepted during the winter months from november until march please contact us fore more info nnwe are a family run cattle and sheep farm explore the farm during your stay guests can get involved in lambing and feed lambs at lambing time aprilmay only make use of our indoor heated swimming pool sauna use of the pool is shared with the other cottages but you can book private hourly swimming sessions in the pool when you arrivenwe also have a well stocked course fishing lake on the farm own equipment and license needednnthe ground floor of bramble pye comprises of a spacious open plan living area which includes a bespoke kitchen with washing machine dishwasher a large farmhouse dining table that seats 68 and a comfortable sofa areannthe first bedroom with a kingsize bed is also found on the ground floor and is equipped with an ensuite bathroom with a generous walk in rainfall showernnthe master bedroom is located upstairs and has an impressive kingsize bed and a substantial velux window looking out onto the courtyard and farm beyondnnthe third bedroom is upstairs and has two single beds sleeping two as well as daybedsofa that sleeps another 1 to 2 guests please note that if you are a booking of 6 or less guests then there will be an extra charge for making up the daybed if required this room also has a large velux window with views across the courtyard and farmnnoutside there is a large patio area which is shared with the cottage next door with a rattan table and chairs that seats 6 there is also a communal courtyard grass gardens and plenty of fields to play in nearbynnthere is a communal laundry room which is shared with the five other barns which is stocked with dvds and games as well as leaflets and ideas of things to do and places to see in the area the laundry room has a washing machine and dryer that is coin operatednnyou have exclusive use of the entire barn which includes a fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher and washing machinenprivate hourly swimming sessions in the swimming pool are bookable when you arriventhe laundry room is shared with the guests in the other barns guest access guest accessnbeing on the edge of the new forest there are lots of walks and places to be explored the nearest train stations are romsey southampton central or salisbury bringing a car is recommended to explore the best placesnnthere is a dedicated parking area adjacent to the courtyardnplease let us know if you are bringing more than two cars we only have a finite number of parking spaces per cottage other things to note other things to notenwe also have a shepherds pye a shepherds hut located on one of our lakes for smaller groups 2 adults plus infant as well as cottage pye another luxury barn conversion sleeping 68 adults plus infants and also four other cottages available for stays please see our website pyesmead farm for more info or visit us on insta pyesholidaycottagesnnntakeaways unfortunately dont deliver to us but you can have supermarket deliveries there is a local shop close by as well as a farm shop selling groceries locally produced meats bread and cakesnif you dont fancy cooking the local shop sells cook high quality frozen meals which are designed to be just like homemade foodnif you fancy eating out there is a great selection of pubs and restaurants nearby the ones we recommend are listed in the welcome pack in the barn

Title: One bed Lodge in AONB Dorset with shared pool area
Description: fully refurbished to a high spec brook lodge sits in the grounds of the main house in the village of iwerne minsternone bedroom with king sized bed bathroom with free standing bath and separate walk in shower open plan living area downstairs with sofa dining area for 4 new fitted kitchen separate cloakroom and entrance hall small outdoor semi private seating areafree wifi tv welcome pack outdoor heated pool open mayseptember only nb pool use is shared with property owners the space the spacenthe lodge sits to the side of the main house it is a private space with a small outdoor seating area to the side of the doors and further seating around the shared pool areanpool is open air so it is only open from end may to end september npool is closed from october to mid maynpool area is a shared space guest access guest accessnparking is adjacent to the garageworkshopnthe house is situated in a small village with a well stocked village shop and pub both of which are walkable from the lodge other things to note other things to notenpool is only open in the summer monthsnduring the remainder of the year it is covered but there is still access to the pool area for additional seating if required or to catch some winter sun

Title: Spacious house and garden in Itchenor
Description: located in shipton green itchenor the willows is surrounded by large gardens with tennis court and heated swimming pool close to w wittering beach and itchenor harbour and with easy access to local walks bike rides and waterside pubs near chichester and goodwoodnnwow the house is absolutely fantastic we couldnt have asked for a better setting to celebrate christmas if you are looking for a spacious beautiful property then this is a must book house we will 100 be back dec 2021 the space the spacenspacious ground floor with large kitchendiner living room and games room with pool table the garden includes a trampoline tennis court and bbq facilities the new outdoor pool will be open from april october and heated throughout this time the pool will include a full safety cover and is visible from the house and patio area guest access guest accessnguests can use any space within the house and back garden

Title: Silverlake, Dorset - Eco House - 2 bedroom
Description: located in silverlake a habitat escapes development set in 500 acres of parkland lakes and situated in the centre of the crescent in beaumont village this bijou cottage offers bright and airy accommodation enjoys a sunny southerly aspect with the loungekitchendiner situated on the first floor adjacent to the master bedroom these rooms have access to the south facing balcony that runs the full width of the property there is a second bunk room situated on the ground floor the space the spacenset in a private 500 acres lakeside reserve within a 10 minute drive of the jurassic dorset coast this eco village boasts its own entertainment with its own private luxury spa tennis court football pitch lakes paths trails and adventure you will be at home both inside and out of the house there is now a new poolside bar guest access guest accessnaccess all areas on the 500 acres estate free entry to swimming pool and sauna spa and massages available on request for extra nthis property also benefits from full access to the activity hubs facilities subject to prior booking and availability providing you with access to bikes canoes kayaks and stand up paddle boards during your staynplease note latest covid procedures and contact owner for further details other things to note other things to notenthis cottage sleeps a family of 4 2 adults 2 children max the master bedroom is located upstairs and has its own en suite the bunk room downstairs is suitable for children only and access to the toilet en suite upstairs is via the master bedroomntoilet role bath towels and fresh linen is all provided please bring your own towels for the swimming pool lake beach etc pleas also bring condiments shower gel and other toiletries

Title: The Pool House
Description: a secluded pool house with private pool in its own private garden set in the chiltern hills of hertfordshire an area of outstanding natural beauty the space the spacenthe property sits in an unshared private garden with its own swimming pool it is private from the main house which is approximately 50 metres away there is a gate that leads straight onto footpath for some great walks guest access guest accessnthrough a gate from the drive you will have the private garden and the pool house all to yourself and your guest other things to note other things to notenthe pool house has wooden floors and rugs in the winter months it would be advisable to bring slipperssocks

Title: Birch Cottage located on a country working farm
Description: a peaceful and family run fully working farm a country paradise for youngsters and adults alike situated close to all major attractionsncome and meet all our animals free roaming chickens feed our saddleback pigs say hello to our ponies or pet goat we also have petting lambs during the springnwe offer fully selfcontained comfortable and cosy cottages with access to our outdoor heated swimming pool skittle alley games room play area onsite bar or bistronhave fun down on the farm the space the spacenwithy grove farm offers 10 fully selfcontained charming comfortable and cosy cottages with their own individual access set around a courtyard and patio area with our family also living on site we can accommodate for parties up to 45 in each cottage all cottages have access to our outdoor heated swimming pool as wells as a skittle alley and wellequipped games room including table tennis a pool table and table footballnwe are a family run business who are committed to providing the best experience for all of our guests we put our guests at the heart of everything we do and pride ourselves on excellent customer service and will go out of our way to ensure you have an enjoyable and memorable stay with us on the farm guest access guest accessnthe cottage has its own access via its own door with a key provided we always try to greet our guests and provide a quick tour of the facilities

Title: lower grange park ,chacombe banbury ox17 2el

Title: The Stables - easy access and a swimming pool
Description: the stables is the ground floor apartment in the old rectory coach house in the middle of sampford brett a quintessential english village between exmoor national park quantock hills somersets coast it provides bright spacious accommodation has easy access from the parking area is fitted to a high standard central heating keeps the property snug and warm even in the depths of winter there are spacious grounds with a swimming pool trampoline climbing frame free type 2 ev charging the space the spacenthe stables has two bedrooms one with a double bed and the other with two singles that can be configured as a double each has a generous wardrobe with drawers and bedside tablesnnthe large bright lounge has a sofa bed settee and 2 armchairs theres a dining table with 6 chairs and a wall mounted smart tv wifi internet access is available throughout the propertynnthere is a separate kitchen which is fully equipped with ceramic hob oven fridge freezer dishwasher microwave oven toaster etcnnthe modern bathroom has a good sized shower toilet washbasin shelving and heated towel railnnthe stables has a fast broadband connection but mobile phone signal varies between providers vodafone and o2 are good but you have to go up the field to get an ee signal

Title: Shillings Cottage,  Hemyock, Devon
Description: shillings has exclusive use by arrangement of a large outdoor pool this has just had a new liner fitted the surrounding terrace with a table and reclining chairs is a sun trap the cottage lies inside gardens orchards and meadows with footpaths close by upstairs french windows open onto a balcony with a table and chairs for al fresco dining under a walnut tree steps from the balcony lead to lawns with teak loungers and comfy cushions at night you can gaze at the stars from your pillow the space the spacenthe cottage is in the blackdown hills which lie between the north and south coasts in an area of outstanding natural beauty it is the only rentable property on the premises and is a field away from a quiet devon lane the kitchen is fully equipped and the bathroom although tiny is enough for a holiday stay and has a power shower the bed is a continental king size there is a cafetire and microwave wi fi is available everywhere even next to the pool guest access guest accessnsurrounding the cottage there are several areas of garden a fruit orchard grazing fields and a big pond where swallows dip and dragonflies flynthe village lies within half a mile and has a post office and general store a pub and doctors surgery other things to note other things to notenthe parking is secure and off the roadnwe allow one small dog depending on age and breed for which payment can be made on arrival please note that your dog must be closely supervised on a lead particularly around the pool as they can cause damage if they fall in there is a 4 acre stock proof field next the cottage where they can run freely we have found that dogs left on their own in the cottage can be noisy and destructive so we ask guests to please take your dog with you the pubs in the area are happy to have dogs

Title: Secluded luxury in New Forest with heated pool.
Description: a secluded luxurious retreat located on a smallholding where you can interact with the animals once the loft of a victorian stable set in the ground of a country house in a beautiful rural setting with an outdoor heated pool to use in summer located in the northern tip of the new forest national park close to paultons park and salisbury the added bonus of a country pub 2 min walk up the road the space the spacenthe retreat is a lovely sunny self contained and very spacious 1100 sq ft first floor converted stable loft which has been newly refurbished to a very high standard and everything within is there to provide you with the standard of quality you deserve for 2022 we have added some additional touches including a replacement top quality mattress for an even more comfortable nights sleepnthe modern kitchen is new with all the facilities you need to cook and dinein should you wish to tea coffee sugar milk will be provide on arrival and we often offer a selection of fresh produce for sale from our smallholdingnnyou are welcome to visit the smallholding and share in the daily feeding of chickens and sheep or see where all the fresh produce is grownnalternatively you may wish to cook alfresco over the fire pit or on the barbecue whilst watching the sunset over the fields in your private garden before retiring inside to the oak beamed living area relax watching tv talk tv included or a dvd challenge each other to a game of scrabble or just spend quiet time snuggled into a luxury throw whilst reading a book all are provided for your enjoyment there are two single sofa z beds in this space for younger children hidden behind curtains to make their own special den as well as a double sofa bed for older children so plenty of options for guestsnthe bedroom has a king size bed with top quality angora wood 30000 spring mattress and high quality bed linen and anti allergy duvet fitted wardrobes provide ample hanging and shelving space and a ceiling fan helps to ensure you are comfortable when the weather gets warmernthe spacious shower room has a beautiful stripped wooden floor and views across the fields there is a large walk in shower and plenty of room for all your personal toiletries a small selection of miniature toiletries are provided along with good quality fluffy towels and of course loo rollsndownstairs as you enter your front door there is a boot roomutility room with plenty of coat hanging space cupboards and sink with running hot and cold water and a washing machine outside there is parking inside the gates and storage can also be provided for bicycles if you bring these with younthe private garden to the retreat is well stocked with mature shrubs and beautiful flowering perennials with a lawn leading to a seating area overlooks the fields early in the morning you are likely to see deer roaming rabbits foxes squirrels and a plethora of wild birds in the evenings the sky is the domain of bats and owls or you may be lucky enough to see swallows swooping aroundnfrom your garden you can take a stroll up the avenue a sweeping grass walkway edged with an enormous planted mixed border and ancient brick and stone wall along the path and out through the private gate to a footpath leading to the road and further footpaths beyond in spring these paths provide a magnificent spectacle covered in a carpet of bluebellsnnthe heated outdoor swimming pool is available for your exclusive usenfrom 9am 2pm and again 6pm8pm during the summer months usually may to end sept swimming towels are provided and there are sun loungers by the pool as well as in your own garden guests use the pool at their own risk and any children should be supervised at all timesnnnpetsnalthough we have a dog in our main house it is with regret that we have decided not to accept dogs at the retreat due to the close proximity of grazing sheepnnarrivalnthe retreat is available for a minimum of 2 nights 4 or 7 nights min in high season usual check in is after 3pm and is contact free we hope to be there to meet you from a distance on arrival but if this is not possible a key will be left for you my husband and i will be around if you have any queries or you need a good recommendation for eating out in one of the many pubs and restaurants near bynnpricingnprices provided here are for low season at different times of the year price may vary summer is typically 165night for 2 and includes the use of the heated pool additional guests from 30nightnndeparturenwe ask all guests to strip their bed clean the bbq if used and pop rubbishrecycling outside into the main bins this helps reduce the contact our cleaners have with personal items whilst we are still battling the covid pandemicndeparture is by 10am to enable us the maximum time between guests to ensure the property is as clean and safe as possible other things to note other things to notenthe accommodation is primarily on the first floor with stairs

Title: Granary Cottage (6255)
Description: complete with a shared swimming pool this property is ideal for that escape to the countryside all on the ground floornlivingdining room with wood burnernkitchen with electric cooker fridge and dishwashernbedroom 1 with double bed and tvnbedroom 2 with twin bedsnbedroom 3 with twin bedsnbathroom with bath and toiletnshower room with shower cubicle and toilet central heating electricity bed linen and wifi included cot and highchair laundry room shared with other properties onsite sittingout area with picnic bench and barbecue indoor swimming pool shared open from easter closed winter please enquire when booking games room shared 2 dogs welcome to be kept on a lead at all times livestock private parking no smoking please note there is an unfenced shallow stream in the grounds wtb 3 dragons indoor heated swimming poolhot tub the ancient farmhouse at werngochlyn dates back to the 12th century it nestles in open farmland underneath the skirrid mountain and the four comfortable holiday cottages are sympathetically converted from stone farm buildings set around the farmyard the setting is perfect for children of all ages adults too there is plenty of room to run around and explore and plenty of animals to befriend a pair of kunekune miniature pigs a donkey goats sheep chickens you can collect your own eggs for breakfast if you want to ducks dogs cats and loads of horses and ponies including a tiny rescue pony named tinkerbellnyou could stay around the farm all day with a heated indoor swimming pool hot tub games room and then a bbq in the evening there are footpaths running directly from the farm and dogs are welcome you are ideally place to explore the brecon beacons black mountains usk and wye valleys and the fantastic countryside that surrounds the nearest market town of abergavenny which is only 3 miles away home of the food festival it boasts good shops and a market a cinema theatre castle and museum as well as good choice of pubs cafs and restaurants including michelin starred walnut tree which is within walking distance of the farm an 18hole golf course and driving range is only mile away an enjoyable stay that will have you wanting to return shop 3 milesnfree wifi

Title: Traditional Sussex Barn with Pool
Description: traditional black boarded barn in secluded grounds with beautiful views of sussex countryside plenty of space to relax by the swimming pool on the terrace or wander round the garden the space the spacenthe converted hay barn is situated within private grounds offering extensive views over fields to the south downs the building features exposed oak beams and a galleried roof space so there is plenty of room for guests to spread out socialise or relax the cow shed is a separate building across the barn yard and contains 2 additional bathrooms ideal to change for the pool kitchen and lounge area guest access guest accessnguests have access to the barn cow shed and gardens the heated swimming pool is open summer months only normally mid may to mid september please confirm dates in advance as weather dependant there is a barbecue and fire pit on the terrace feel free to bonfire in the garden other things to note other things to notenplease supervise children at all times as there is a swimming pool pond and river in the garden dont swim alone or at night

Title: Hoarstone - Cosy country cottage
Description: peaceful and with stunning views you will find hoarstone cottage the perfect place from which to enjoy everything that the cotswolds countryside has to offer with a wealth of walks cycle routes bridleways and wildlife right outside your window you will also find yourself within easy reach of plenty of renowned towns such as burford woodstock bourtononthewater and stowonthewold all of which will enable you to enjoy a fantastic cotswold holiday an ideal staycation post lockdown the space the spacencottage is a selfcatering holiday cottage for upto 4 people located on the edge of the cotswolds with stunning views across the glyme valley yet only 5 minutes from the bustling market town of chipping norton this cottage is the perfect setting for a luxury break soho farmhouse daylesford farm shop blenheim palace many award winning pubs plus cornbury feastival and wilderness festivals are all within 10 minutes of this beautiful hideawaynnopen plan with high vaulted ceilings to let in plenty of light the cottage is situated next to a synthetic surface tennis court and a shared swimming pool and with footpaths crossing the farm this is a great getaway to unwind and relax due to the ongoing situation with coronavirus the swimming pool is open but will be operated on a rota basis and at our discretionnnthere is ample parking and a private garden with outdoor garden furniture and bbq during summer monthsnnin the cooler winter months a wood burning stove adds to a cosy feel within the cottage which is itself heated through underfloor heating from ground source heat pumpsnnfor those with young children we can provide a travel cot high chair and the cottage is fitted with a stair gate to prevent the more adventurous toddler exploring too farnndogs are welcome provided you let us know in advance so that we can provide towels to help dry and keep your pet clean we do have our own dogs and a cat so well behaved dogs only please

Title: Culver Reach 33 - cosy and warm caravan by the sea
Description: a light and airy caravan with a lovely sized lounge area refurbished 2022 which has a tv with dvd player separate seating is set around a dining table which then leads into a galley fully equipped kitchen down the hallway there is a bathroom with power shower wc and basin separate toilet two twin bedrooms and the master double bedroom the caravan is double glazed and benefits from gas central heating there is parking for two cars beds are made up on arrival please bring towels the space the spacenculver reach 33 is conveniently situated in the centre of the park all park amenities are in easy reach and the secluded beach is a short 10 minute walk guest access guest accessnthe caravan will be yours to use exclusively during your stay on site there is a bar shop day and evening entertainment and indoor and outdoor pools access to the bar entertainment swimming pools requires passes available at reception at an extra cost other things to note other things to notenthe park do not assist owners in monitoring the gas bottles please keep an eye on this during your stay and contact me should you find the window to be red and i will ensure the gas bottle is changed for you

Title: Spacious cottage, indoor pool, sauna
Description: characterful 2 bedroom barn conversion sleeping 4 people cot with period features and wood burner set in the beautiful east devon countryside shared use of 33ft indoor pool sauna fitness room childrens play areas 12 ft trampoline and 2 acres of grounds rated 4 star by visit england private patio and parking area located near tiverton 15 minutes drive from the m5 j27nncentral heating free wifi flat screen tv cot highchair available pets welcome charge appliesnnwere running our indoor pool sauna and fitness room on a rota system at the moment with each cottage having exclusive use of the pool house for two 1hour slots each day the play area trampoline and games room are open with parental supervisionnnenglish spanish french and greek spoken the space the spacenthe granary at three gates farm is cosy and comfortable ideal for a family cot and hchair available a perfect base to stay for some r r or explore this lovely part of devon short breaks available upon request outside school holidays guest accessnthe cottage is self contained and has a patio area with table and chairs bbq available guests have access to 2 acres of shared grounds and facilities including indoor pool sauna fitness room childrens play area and games rooms

Title: Dellfield holiday cottage
Description: self contained holiday flat 2 bedrooms 1 double 1 twin double room has ensuite shower room spacious sitting room looks out onto secluded shared garden off road parking for 2 vehicles next to the flatnnwe are inside the south downs national park with lovely walks close by we are also close to goodwood for the festival of speed revival and horse racing as well as the cathedral city of chichester and sandy beaches at west wittering the space the spacenthe flat is self contained with its own access door fully equipped kitchen with a dish washer and a sitting room with tv there is access to a laundry room with a coin operated washer and drier guest access guest accessnwe have a swimming pool outdoor and only in the summer tennis court sauna and gym which guests can use by arrangement extra charge for use of sauna due to electricity costs we just ask for consideration as sometimes we would like to enjoy them either on our own or with friends we do not expect guests to spend all day everyday by the poolnnthe garden has a slide and trampoline and there is a shed with a few toys and bikes suitable for children other things to note other things to notenalthough the flat is all on the ground floor there is a small step down into the sitting room and there are 3 steps outside down from the car park area to the main access doornnthe flat is not suitable for wheelchair users due to the steps noted above and also a narrow door between the kitchen and sitting roomnnthe sitting room and kitchendining room are spacious but the bedrooms are compact

Title: Vale Hornbeam - Farm with stunning mountain views
Description: onebedroom house this house with a balcony and mountain views of the brecon beacons an open plan kitchenliving room one bedroom with king size and single bed also a double sofa bed in living room there is a shared indoor heated swimming pool and indoor hot tub with changing roomsndue to covid rules of no more than 6 adults staying in one house we offer our shepherds hut free of charge to keep within the welsh government rules child under 12 yr are not counted also parties and gatherings are not allowed within the cottages our hot tub and pool are open on a booking slot system for a private 15hr slot only one cottage can use the facilities at only one time face masks and social distancing applies our cottages are cleaned to covid standards and hand sanitiser is in the cottage for your use the space the spacenthe cottage features original oak beams in all the rooms and has a spacious living room with french doors opening onto a balcony with views of the brecon beacons situated in a farm court yard setting ideal for al fresco dining or a barbequena great location to meet up with family and friendsnsituated on the edge of the brecon beacons amongst beautiful countryside close to brecon builth wells hay on wye crickhowell and abergavenny located on a traditional working farm with cows sheep hens goats pigs and our donkey called star our farm tours are very popular with the all the family and our play area with swings slides sand pit and football goals are situated by the cottages

Title: The Beach Huts: Unique home with indoor pool
Description: a stunning unique home in the pretty village of oving this ecobuild beach hut style property has 2 bedrooms a bathroom and a stunning large open living space a private back garden terrace with beautiful unspoilt views across fields and separate bbq sun deck a tennis court is literally on your doorstep and a great local pub only 200 yards away a quiet and truly unique place to stay and enjoy we are only 4 miles from the goodwood estate and in easy reach of west wittering beach the space the spacenthis eco build property has a lovely light open plan living area containing a modern fully equipped kitchen dining area seating and tv area with a cosy wood burning stove the master bedroom offers a comfortable king size bed with fully fitted wardrobes and space for a travel cot the second bedroom has 2 single beds which can be pushed together if preferred and equipped with blackout curtains and blind to ensure a good nights sleep all bed linen is the white company for added luxury the house is beautifully finished in scandinavian style with picturesque views across the farmnnthis is a truly stunning place to stay and relax if you want peace and quiet then this is a perfect retreat unless you bring your own little noise makers we are very child friendly and can provide everything from toys to high chair nb arent providing travel cots due to covid19 we also have our pear store property situated nearby combined they offer a great place to stay with friends and family but have the added bonus of everyone having their own space we are so lucky to have so many wonderful places to visit on out door step from the spectacular beaches of the witterings to the south downs and its stunning walks to the goodwood estate and its renowned events the beach huts is ideally located to ensure easy drives to so many days out a list of suggested places to visit including family friendly and rainy days is in our visitors book this can also be emailed to you on requestnnthis is an eco build and our preferred method of heating the space is using our wood burning stove there is plenty of wood available for your stay in our wood shed so please help yourself at no extra cost we have a smart electric heating system if wood burners arent your thing to ensure your stay is a cosy one we only use green energy suppliersnnwe are lucky to have a separate internet signal for the beach huts which offers fantastic wifi for all your needsnnthe washing machine dryer is located in a utility building adjacent to the property

Title: Chalet at  Selsey Golf and Country Club
Description: 57 granada is a traditional holiday chalet situated at selsey golf and country club a popular familyoriented holiday park the facilities on site include an outdoor heated swimming pool and bar with a family seating area there are two ball play areas a tennis court and a childrens playground the chalet is suitable for both families and couples the site is located just a few minutes drive or 1520 minutes walk to selsey village and the local beaches the site is next to selsey golf course the space the spacenthe chalet has two bedrooms with a separate showertoilet with a heated towel rail a new kitchen was installed in january 2018 and this has a hoboven and microwave the chalet was also completely rewired in january 2018 the first bedroom has a double bed and second has a single bed with second pull out bed underneath unfortunately there is no cot available guests are welcome to bring their own the sofa also pulls out to a double bed all bedding and towels are provided along with bathroom essentials and cleaning products there is a tvdvd player an outside seating area on a paved patio is ideal for alfresco dining guest access guest accessna car parking space is available close to the chalet all areas in the chalet are accessible other things to note other things to notento use the two bars a temporary membership is required which can be arranged in advance

Title: Cosy cottage with stunning views and hot tub
Description: pennard hill farm is a family farm offering fantastic views over the mendipsnthe lamb is the perfect place for a luxurious romantic getaway with its roaring log fire and stunning views from bedroomnthere is plenty to do just a stones throw from pennard hill and some lovely towns to explore such as bruton frome wells and glastonbury there are a huge array of pubs and restaurants on the door step and plenty of places for long or short walks in the countrysidenbreakfast is not provided the space the spacenthere is a gorgeous private woodfired hot tub guest access guest accessnthe pool is shared with our two other cottages and is available to use between the hours of 10am and 6pm other things to note other things to notenplease note small well behaved dogs are welcome a maximum of one unless otherwise arranged but there is an extra charge of 25 per dog this needs to be requested and agreed with the owner upon booking

Title: The original Spice Bus from 1997 movie Spice World
Description: this is the actual and original spice bus that fans will know and love from the movie spice world but with an interior makeover working with some incredible designers we have turned it into accommodation so that you can stay the night and live out every fans wildest dream the bus has the bonus of being situated in a stunning location overlooking island harbour marina there is a bar restaurant and a small shop on site you can reach us by land sea or air the space the spacenthe outside of the bus shows off its famous union jack exterior as it did in the spice world movie inside as huge fans of the band we have tried to include as many little touches as possible inspired by the girls and their music to make the interior just as iconic as the outsidenninside guests will have the run of both floors which have been lovingly renovated with little nods to each of the spice girls and some bold interiors the bus can sleep up to three people with two sharing a double bed and one on a single day bednndownstairsnnthe drivers seat remains at the front of the bus sadly no meatloaf towards the back of the bus there is a spacious seating area with a table and three union jack cinemastyle chairs for relaxing in front of the tv or listening to wannabe on repeat on the oldschool cd playernnupstairsnnthere is a double bed at the back of the bus as well as a day bed which can accommodate a third guest if needed there is also a separate dressing room area complete with rail and dressing table perfect for spice girlinspired makeoversnnplease note we have no official affiliation with the spice girls we just want fellow fans to enjoy the spice bus as much as we do we are looking for guests who share our love of the spice girls have a verified airbnb profile and have great reviews please also identify your guests when requesting to booknnthe outside of the bus shows off its famous union jack exterior as it did in the spice world movie inside as huge fans of the band we have tried to include as many little touches as possible inspired by the girls and their music to make the interior just as iconic as the outsidenninside guests will have the run of both floors which have been lovingly renovated with little nods to each of the spice girls and some bold interiors the bus can sleep up to three people with two sharing a double bed and one on a single day bednndownstairsnnthe drivers seat remains at the front of the bus sadly no meatloaf towards the back of the bus there is a spacious seating area with a table and three union jack cinemastyle chairs for relaxing in front of the tv or listening to wannabe on repeat on the oldschool cd playernnupstairsnnthere is a double bed at the back of the bus as well as a day bed which can accommodate a third guest if needed there is also a separate dressing room area complete with rail and dressing table perfect for spice girlinspired makeoversnnplease note we have no official affiliation with the spice girls we just want fellow fans to enjoy the spice bus as much as we do we are looking for guests who share our love of the spice girls have a verified airbnb profile and have great reviews please also identify your guests when requesting to booknna facilities block is located a few steps from the bus for your private use in the facilities block there is a toilet sink and shower room as well as toiletries and towels within this block there is also a kitchenette area with a sink kettle microwave cutlery and crockery there is a mini fridge inside the bus note there are no bathroom facilities on the bus itself as the bus still has its original structure there are stairs and so unfortunately it is not suited for all accessibility needsnnother things to notenn there is no partition between the double and single bed both situated on the top decknn there are no kitchen facilities or running water on the busnn there are shops and a restaurant within two minutes walknn there is no wifi on the bus but there is free wifi at the onsite barrestaurantnn the bus is located at island harbour marinann all guests must be 12 years or oldernn the bus sleeps three peoplenn height restrictions are 17 metres so watch your headnn towels will be provided in the separate facilities blocknn the bus has electricity pointsnn please also note that there is no smoking on the bus or within the grounds and sadly no pets are allowed other things to note other things to notendue to the originality of the listing height restrictions apply all guests must be age 12 or older no pets and strictly no smoking

Title: Cow Shed: Daisy at Easton Farm Park
Description: a unique place to stay the cow shed is a mix between camping glamping and a caravan situated on a clean and quiet farm park the cow shed provides a great place to escape tonnthe accommodation has a ground floor double bed with a threequarter bed above able to sleep four people the cow shed provides a base in the suffolk countryside with the benefit of included access to the farm parknnplease note that the wifi can be intermittent the space the spacendaisy can sleep up to four people the accommodation has a ground floor double bed with a threequarter bed above linen and towels are provided as well as tea coffee making facilities bbq and tools are available for hire at an extra charge of 10 the toilet block and shower shed are both within 20 meters admission to the farm park is included guests are welcome to have access to the park out of hours and see our team in action feeding and mucking out the animals guest access guest accessnthe cow sheds are situated within the grounds of easton farm park guests have access to the toilet block and shower shed both within 20 meters our cafe and gift shop is open during the day other things to note other things to notenenjoy the full farm experience guests can explore the farm out of hours and can even help give the animals breakfast and clean out their stables in the morning staff are on hand to answer any curious questions

Title: Bumble Barn at Great Field Farm
Description: great field farm is set in 45 acres including gardens paddocks and the great field with different crops each yearnbumble barn is the newest addition to our ecofriendly holiday lodges built to passiv house standards with smart technology and a beautiful living sedum roof that bees loventhe views from the sitting room and patio over open fields and sky are stunning with wildlife all aroundntruly quiet and rural yet canterbury folkestone hythe channel tunnel only 10 minutes drive the space the spacenbumble barn has a large sitting dining and kitchen area opening onto the patio with views of the horse paddocks open field and treesnsitting room has a smart 4k tvnfully equipped kitchen with large fridgefreezernmain bedroom with king sized double bed and en suite shower room optional colour changing led lightingn2 twin bedrooms main bathroom with bathshower

Title: NEW! Longhorn at Barrow Hill Barns- with Outdoor Bath
Description: longhorn is nestled in the rolling hills of the south downs national park this secluded retreat has all the creature comforts of home whilst enjoying unspoilt 360degree views of barrow hill farmnnlonghorns domed design with wooden interior has a cosy open plan living space and decking area to enjoy dinner with sunset views the large outdoor roll top bath is perfect for romantic bathing under the starsnnjust a short walk from the famous south downs way and other stunning trail longhorn is also a short drive to the historical town of petersfield and the cities of winchester chichester and portsmouth the space the spacenlonghorn is situated on a working farm however in a secluded corner with minimal disturbance access is via foot along a 400m track from barrow hill barns our cottages site or along a track for suitable vehiclesnnlonghorn offers a kingsized bed kitchen tv superfast wifi and separate shower and toilet towels sheets and ren toiletries are provided there is also charcoal bbq for alfresco cooking other things to note other things to notenlonghorn is designed for those looking to escape the ways of normal life this is why we do not allow children or pets of any sizennthere are a number of factors as to why but mostly because as parents we felt it was somewhere to enjoy a couple of nights off from the home life

Title: The Tree Tent
Description: brand new tree tentnif you are desperate for a change of scene and are yearning for some fresh countryside air look no furthernthe tree tent is a suspended spherical structure strung between two trees overlooking the gorgeous mendip hills it offers the ultimate escape into the outdoors its an absolutely magical retreat which captures the true romance and cosiness of a camping but in a luxurious and unique way the space the spacenthe tree tent offers a comfortable double bed led lighting and a wood burning stove perfect for those chilly evenings the bed even folds into a sofa for daytime loungingnnstep out of the suspended bedroom pod across the rope bridge to find a gorgeous decked seating area nestled among the trees here there is a fully equipped kitchen with a fridge gas hob sink saucepans crockery and cutlery there is a firepit which is perfect for cooking your evening meal if you are keen to hone your inner bear grylls or start simple by toasting some marshmallows whilst sipping a hot chocolatennthere is no wifi or electricity here so it is the perfect place to switch off and really relaxnnthere is a wonderful outdoor shower with hot water and separate loo we have ensured there is everything you could want to create the most memorable of stays more pictures of this are coming soonnnplease note no pets allowed the bed is a small double

Title: 1920s Showmans living wagon,experience times past.
Description: set in the sussex countryside our beautiful showmans wagon is now resting she has spent many years looking after showman travelling around the countryside housing show folk and fair ground people her history and that of the travelling community is a magical fascinating part of history it is a privilege for us to own and gives us pleasure to be able to share with anyone who would like to staynthe garden and surrounding countryside are part of the charm of our wagon in summer and winter the space the spacenthe wagon has a cosy seating area a fold down table we have equipped her with a double plug in electric hob kettle and toaster for light cooking saucepans cutlery plates cups glasses there is a very small 4ltr fridge just big enough for a bottle of milk and a can or two a 5ltr pump flask is there with water and can be filled from outside tap there is two heaters that keep the wagon nice and warm a picnic basket with picnic plates glasses and cutlery are also provided should you want to have a picnicnntea coffee and sugar bread milk butter marmalade or jam are all provided and we leave a welcome basket with a few extra goodies for you to enjoynnthe bedroom area has a standard double bed and there is a dvd tv with some dvds so you can watch some films should you wish tonclean bedding sheets and towels are all provided we do ask that you dont take the towels to the beach and bring your own beach towelnnnoutside is a table and chairs a small bbq overlooking a large private garden which is reached by some steps for you to use should you wish tonthe old outside toilet has been turned into a wet room with a corner loo sink and shower please note that due to the rural location the water pressure can sometimes drop if this does happen the shower may not work for a short time it is something that we are used to living with and does not happen very often we apologise should this happen it is just part of living in such a beautiful setting if you should be visiting us in the colder months the shower room can be a little chilly but once the hot water gets going it soon feels warmnnthe wagon unfortunately is not suitable for dogs so we have decided it is best that we dont allow themnunfortunately due to bad connection the wifi does not always work

Title: Comfortable riverside landed houseboat
Description: converted world war 2 landing craft giving modern ensuite 2 doubletwin bedroom selfcatering accommodation on shore but in pleasant riverside location comfortablyheated throughout with fully equipped openplan kitchen living area and patio the space the spacentruly unique accommodation is in a spacious modern converted ww2 landing craft conveniently drydocked in a riverside garden with two cosy ensuite doubletwin bedrooms an openplan kitchen and living room offers ample space opening to a sunny morning patio other things to note other things to notensingle beds 2ft6indouble 5ftnfamilies warmly welcomed but parental supervision required in waterside locationnthe airbnb pricing section contains an immovable extra guest charging provision which can cause confusion although we have occasionally agreed to an extra child staying the boat only has sleeping accommodation for four

Title: The perfect chalet
Description: lovely fully equipped self catering chalet on a spacious holiday park 3 minutes walk from the seancome to kingsdown where you can enjoy the pebbly beaches enjoy food and drinks at local pubs and restaurants walk or ride on flat ground to deal and beyond or walk onto the white cliffs for views over to francenthere are 3 king henry viii castles to explore dover castle for lots of history and av tours walmer castle for beautiful gardens cannons and tea room deal castle for interest the space the spacenthe chalet is in a great peaceful location within the park and is fully equipped with bed linens towels all kitchen crockery oven hob microwave step in and enjoy

Title: Breathtaking Mountain views in cozy Birdbox

Title: The crystal dome under the stars, bed and breakfast
Description: totally unusual accommodationnideal for dreamy nights for couples summer and winterna bubble three meters high in the middle of nature to observe the stars what could be more romantic and restfulnyou will have access to a nice ensuite bathroom a few meters from the bubble from your cozy nest you will have seen the mountains the natural pool and the horsesna french breakfast will be served on the private terrace of your bubblenthe bubble is heated in winter the space the spacenthe bubble has beautiful views of the forest horses the pool and the starry skynan extraordinary night not to be missed in all seasons guest access guest accessnwe are located in the middle of nature on the edge of the forest you will find all the shops and restaurants necessary for your stay in thnes about 6 kmnyou can go to lake annecy via menthon st bernard and its castle just ten kilometers awaynannecy is a little 15 minutes away and you ride the skis at la clusaz or au grand bornand in 20 minutes you will understand we are conveniently located between lake and mountain other things to note other things to notenmagical night guaranteednreal comfort under the stars with real beds and heating in cool seasons

Title: The Arctic Hideaway - Lower fat pod -1 double bed
Description: head north in norway and experience our tinyhotel on a remote island the arctic hideaway is an architecturally playful and stunning collection of ten individual buildings where four are sleeping cabins the shared areas are the iconic tower house kitchen house studio building bathhouse crab shack and sauna in limited periods we will offer single cabins for rent on airbnb included in the stay is breakfast and use of the sauna that we will fire up once a day for every guest to enjoy the space the spacenthe arctic hideaway is an experience like few others our space is as much as a mindset as it is a physical location a place to unplug and unwind it is a place that will give you visual tranquillity it is truly a transformative experience staying here we have a minimum 2night stay as we believe this will provide you with the best experience at our unique place and most of our guest wish they could stay longer so maybe book a weeknnthe arctic hideaway is nestled into srvret of the fleinvr islands these cabins provide guests with beautiful views of the norwegian sea nearby islands birds seals sunrises and sunsets the northern lights the midnight sun and so much more the architecture is designed to push you out into nature which means that you move between the cabins for bathroom and kitchen usage look at the map for the location of your cabin in regards to the other buildingsnnthe calendar is not open on the dates you want to staynthe whole compound can sleep up to 10 guests and it is an ideal location for retreats and workshop or maybe you want to rent the entire hideaway by yourself at this moment we only have availability during may here on airbnb with four cabins with space for two people in each if you are interested in visiting us at another time or arrange an event please do send us an email and we will do our best to help you coordinate and epic experience at our facility

Title: Emotional Healing in Lee Cheon-si, Seoul
Description: tonguishaped cottage in a twothousand pottery art village a large monolithic house with a threefloor terrace of the serra guitar cultural museum renowned for its distinctive facade in a twothousand pottery art village that blends very well with naturennenjoy a relaxing emotional healing holiday in a cozy and welcoming room you can take in the open nature on the third floor of a village without a tall building or you can take a picnic on the lawn in front of a tongui housennif you prefer you can also take ukurelle lessons on the first floor of the building a handcrafted workshop and other venuenn directions younnare 15 minutes by car from lee cheon station and 8 minutes by car from sindun station if you have a car it should take less than an hour from seoul and you can park it

Title: Minimalist Modern Cabin - Amazing Views
Description: with some of the best views in the high desert this unique dwelling situated in the hills of yucca valley has everything you could want in a desert getaway its clear walls take the indoor outdoor experience to a whole new level it has its own deck and propane fire pit is completely off grid and generates its own power from the sun the detached kitchen and full bathroom are just yards away it is one of three other short term rentals on the property the space the spacenmade out of corten steel and polycarbonate this cabin is unlike anything you have stayed in it comes with a detached full bathroom with hot water a kitchen with stove sink all types of cooking equipment and a dining area because it is completely off grid we are limited on a few things mainly power we have power for lights water and heating but we dont have enough for full time refrigeration or power outlets we have usb chargers for your phone and tablets though we do have a cooler so please bring ice there is a fire pit so make sure to bring plenty of firewood the gas for the stove is provided guest access guest accessnthe cabin is on a 100 acre property with three other short term rental locations the cabin has its own detached yet private bathroom and kitchen and is a good distance from the other three locations so you do have your own privacy but may see the occasional guest driving by or hiking speaking of hiking there are many hiking trails right off the property so you will never need to leave other things to note other things to notendue to the property being offgrid we have water brought in for guest usage please be mindful of your usage we do not allow personal pools to be fillednthere are two other short term rentals on the 100acre propertynwe are powered by 12 volt solar and battery backup so we do not have power outlets we do have usb chargers for your phone and tabletsnwe do not have a fridge but we do have coolers so bring icenour minisplit ac unit is on a timer due to power restrictions and is available from 8 am5 pm there is a swamp cooler available to use in the evenings and overnightnplease keep all doors or screens closed as we are in the desert and there are critters around while we do have a pest control company out regularly critters can still slip in through open doors from time to timenevents and photoshoots will only be allowed with written permissionnpets are allowed but we charge an extra 40 cleaning feenplease check the weather prior to your stay so you can be properly prepared we are in an area that can get very hot in the summer very cold in the winter and during certain times of the year can experience very high winds we will not issue refunds for weather issues that are out of our control

Title: Luxury suite overlooking the Wadden Sea, Harlingen
Description: the luxurious spacious suite is furnished with a cozy seating area flatscreen tv minibar double box spring double sink jacuzzi hairdryer bathroom with spacious rain shower and toiletna luxury breakfast is served every morningnnfrom the suite you have a unique view of the largest tidal area in the world the unesco world heritage site the wadden seanwe will do everything in our power to ensure that you have an unforgettable stay in the funnel the space the spacenenjoy a snack and drink with a unique view of the nieuwe willemshaven and one of the largest tidal areas in the world the wadden sea the wadden sea is special in its kind no less than twice a day the world changes there one moment youll find miles of expansive mudflats and the other moment everythings underwater from your room you have a direct view of arriving and departing ships and in clear view you can even see the wadden islands vlieland and terschelling the setting evening sun creates a romantic ambience

Title: Luxe Boulder 'Barrett House' on Mtn Peak w/Hot Tub
Description: theres no better place to experience colorado than at barrett house a spectacular 3bedroom 3bathroom vacation rental in beautiful boulder nestled at an elevation of 7000 feet on a scenic 3acre mountain peak in the foothills this stunning home borders roosevelt national forest ensuring endless outdoor activities right outside the door with a fireplace theatre room and unique decor this lovely home promises a memorable getaway with your fellow outdoorloving friends and family the space the spacenprivate hot tub unique architecture 3000 sq ftnnthis eclectic midcentury modern home is the perfect space for you and your loved ones to relax and restore in between outdoor adventures offering all the space and modern luxuries needed for an unforgettable colorado getawaynnmaster bedroom queen bed bedroom 2 queen bed bedroom 3 loft 2 full bedsnnarchitecture in 1971 barrett house was designed by celebrated colorado architect charles haertling for noted artist clotilde barret the house has maintained its architectural significance with recent earthfriendly renovations including cork flooring and soft rugs made with recycled plastic bottlesnoutdoor living 3acre mountain peak private balcony w outdoor dining table forest mountain views hot tub secluded location outdoor seating hammocknindoor living high ceilings skylights ample natural light mad meninspired bar dining room modern trendy furnishings open layout office area theatre room w 80inch hd screen smart hd tvs desktop computer printer bose sound system ceramic art spalike ensuite w petrified wood sink spa jet shower electric heated flooring game roomnkitchen fully equipped stainless steel appliances midcentury finishes keurig coffee maker tea kettle dishwasher cooking basics dishware flatware kitchen tablengeneral free wifi linenstowels inunit laundry machines central heating complimentary toiletries first aid kit trash bags paper towelsnfaq exterior security cameras 3 all facing outnparking driveway 3 vehicles

Title: Snow igloo
Description: snow igloo with real beds inside nice atmosphere with led lights and white walls outside the igloo is possibility to see northern lights if you are lucky come to lapland and explore the wildernessnnits always minus degrees inside the igloo we provide warm sleeping bag but you should bring your thermos layers warm hat socks and cloves also headlight or flashlight is handy warm apartment available 24 h in case of cold feet the space the spacenwe are a small family run business located next to the lake pyhjrvi and pyhluosto national parknonce in a lifetime opportunity to sleep in a snow igloo that we make ourselves every winter guest access guest accessneach partygroup have their own igloo max 4 personsigloo apart from the igloo there is a warm house with toilets shower living room and small kitchen that guests are free to use other things to note other things to notenlucky ranch is a horse farm and activity center we have two different base camps located 1 km from each other depending of the booking situation the location of snow igloo accommodation is either organized at the horse farm where the owners live or at lucky ranch saloon next to the lakennwe provide light self service breakfast please note that all restaurants and a supermarket are 10 km away at the ski resort if you want you can bring some food with you there is a microwave and fridge in the kitchen but no oven or stove

Title: The Chaos Oasis
Description: the chaos oasis is the first construction made entirely from recyclable materials in the district it is situated right next to the mayan ruins and archeological park of lubaantun the village of san pedro columbia is a 10 minute walk from us with chocolate making river swimming and bird watchingnwe welcome couples solo adventurers and families with kids i say we are not suitable for pets as we have so many animals of our own dogs cats a horse ducks chickens etc the space the spacenwe have a bottle recycled house for your use and will give you a tour of the earthship and our whole recycling project we are always working on a new project so some spaces will be available and others under construction we are completely off grid so you can feel good about helping the environment if you dont mind the quirks that involves so we have solar lights and cold showers which can be great plus in the heat and if youre into recycling its the biggest recycling project in southern belizenwe also have a 25 acre farm with cacao coffee and many fruit trees and our own ruins on the property guest access guest accessnyour casita has a double bed however if you are a family and need more beds rooms it can be arranged there is a separate bathroom with two toilets and showers but the bottle house catches its own rainwater and there is an outside shower adjacent to the house for those who wish to really experience the wild

Title: The Roundhouse : Rainforest & Mountains
Description: the roundhouse is located in a place of spectacular beauty with views of quamby bluff and the great western tiers on all sides the property is surrounded by world heritage rainforest which is a result of the protracted jackeys marsh forest protests the fresh air crystal clear water abundant wildlife and pristine environment are all environmental values prized by the people of jackeys marsh we would now like to share our unique heritage with the rest of the world the space the spacenthe roundhouse is a selfcontained home set apart from the other buildings on the property it gives you the privacy and independence to do your own thing the interior is warm and comfortable with extensive windows to highlight the amazing views of the mountain valley of jackeys marshnnthe roundhouse is full of architectural features from the handmade stonewall basement through the curved wooden features of the main floor to the onion top cupola that caps off the building it is a truly unique property that continues to create special memories for all who visitnnpeople respond to the shapes that i make they enjoy the playfulness and freedom of line and see the resemblance of natural forms in the designs they appreciate the skill required to make such shapes from straight timber following natures design rulesnkim clark curved wood creations search this name to see website guest access guest accessnour guests will have exclusive access to the entire house and are welcome to explore the rest of the property including the selfguided walk to the old nut garden and into the rainforestnnguests are asked to respect the privacy of the other buildings on the property guided tours are available on request

Title: Charming Wood-roof Simple Survival Earthship
Description: a small and humble earthship nestled in the high desert of taos new mexico earthships offer the opportunity to experience offgrid living with the amenities of modernlife but without the strong dependency on a fossil fuelbased grid infrastructure the space the spacenthe house was built about two years ago in what is known as the gravel pit of the greater world community the largest legal offgrid subdivision on the planet it is situated in a very private place which is perfect for those looking for a retreatnnall of the utilities that one would normally use municipal infrastructure for are taken care of by the house itself with electricity captured from sunlight and stored rain and snow melt collected into large cisterns and a wall of thermal mass charged by the sun that keeps the house at a relatively constant 72f all year roundnnwith all of that there is a fullsized fridge a stove and oven for cooking your delicious meals internet access and a standing showernnthere is a single fullsized bed that can comfortably fit two and an airmattress that can fit another twonnthe house is about 2025 minutes to the ski mountain and 15 minutes to get into downtown taos close enough to town for access but far enough away in nature for contemplation

Title: HIDEOUT HORIZON - Eco Bamboo Home
Description: hideout horizon is the largest addition to the hideout family the most adventurous allbamboo home is ready to welcome those seeking a little jungle adventure in east karangasem your perfect little staycation in bali is right here we take relaxation seriouslynnnow more than ever we can be your safe hideaway from the world epidemic special discounts running nownnfollow our social media hideoutbali for the special promo the space the spacenfun unique adventurous open bamboo those are all the words that will be buzzing in your head when you stay in the horizon wellknown open bamboo house is ready for you and your friends for a quick staycation make it your basecamp once you explore karangasem region we will make sure you will have the best time we are most happy with environmentally thinking guests who treat this little bamboo home with love and carennif you read further you can find much important and interesting information but for those in a hurry these are some key points to know n1 breakfast is included in the price served in the house lunch and dinner can be ordered from hideout bistro for an extra charge vegan options as welln2 scooter for free during your stayn3 there is an equipped kitchen unlimited drinking water fridge filled with cold bintangn4 two places to sleep main round bed dominant in pictures with twolayer mosquito net and two single beds can be put together with mosquito net on the top floorn5 there is wifi music stereo system in the house and a hot showern6 we can help to arrange your transport find you the right guides give you the best balinese massage inhouse or organise a great cooking class at hideout bistron7 checkin from 3 pm please no latenight arrivals checkout at 11 amn8 we are in the middle of the jungle please expect some wildlife nnimportant informationndue to the ongoing pandemic of covid19n all guests will be measured by a professional nocontact thermometer for their body temperature if their body temperature is repeatedly measured as above 375 celsius they will not be allowed to checkin as this can be a sign of ongoing illness such as covid19n all guests will sign a declaration of their current health statusn all guests need to wear a face mask during checkincheckout or when in contact with our teamn houses are cleaned and sanitized after each guestn we provide hand sanitisers in the housennthe spacenhorizon is our most adventurous all bamboohome with open space design on the ground floor you can find a neat fully equipped kitchen with stove and smaller fridge cozy livingrelaxing area with extra hanging hammock bathroom with outdoor shower and indooroutdoor plunge pool covered from rain by large overhanging grass roofnthere is no private bedroom in horizon all space is open so the traveling party should be well accustomed to sharing the house together it is a very playful and adventurous space with large net overhanging the pool you can climb up there by bamboo shelves or get there through the master bednfollowing the bamboo ramp it leads you to a large round bed 240cm wide with twolayer mosquito net providing safety and privacy and extra two guests can share the very top of the building climbing the bamboo ladder leading from the ramp there are two single beds there that can be used for any kind of relaxation during the day if you are only two travellers what a place for reading cuddling and relaxing the perfect place for meditation bamboo is wellknown for its temperature stability thanks to natural ventilation there is no need for ac or a fan it can be very cold up here nnat your arrival you can be looking forward to a welcome basket full of seasonal fruits in the kitchen you will always find balinese coffee tea oil sugar and salt if you dont feel like cooking dont worry we have a delicious hideout bistro a kitchen concept we provide breakfast included in the price lunch and dinner and all are brought to your house we do not yet have restaurant seating but you can enjoy the meals in the privacy of your hideoutnnscooter for free during your stay you will have available one simple basic and older scooter with two helmets if you are a motorbike racer you might be disappointed towels and beddings are also provided

Title: Naturalist Boudoir
Description: nestled in the heart of the big thicket our naturalist boudoir bb has everything you need to revitalize your senses extremely private area for the naturalist with outdoor hot tub and shower we welcome all guests to experience our lovely naturalist boudoir and reconnect with your special someone located in lumberton texasnnshould your dates not be available for this cabin please check out our two additional cabinsnaturalist boudoir too and naturalist boudoir on point the space the spacenready to unplug and get back to nature come check out naturalist boudoir guest access guest accessnnaturalist boudoir is an unusual space where one can get back to nature in a peaceful private setting other things to note other things to notenas you are actually in nature you may encounter gods creatures of the woods

Title: Forest Garden Yurts
Description: glamping at its finest forest garden yurts are wooden yurts designed and built by bill coperthwaite in the 1970s for tom hess and lory brown as home and pottery studio tucked away in 4 acres of ozark forest the yurts are simple in nature yet abound with artistic details the home yurt has a kitchen bedroom and a nook living room the bathroom yurt is separate but has a covered walk unconventional and unique with hobbit hole doors and low clearances in places guest access guest accessnthere are 4acres of woods to roam that are either along the road or fenced so there is no chance of wandering off of the property there are also fire pits camp chairs and roasting sticks available
