Title: Luxury Dome Villa Eclipse
Description: floating above an ocean of green palms makalele dome villas has one of the most spectacular settings in the world perched atop a verdant bukit peninsula cliff overlooking a sea of azure blues with volcano viewsnncustom 3 leaf clover shaped infinity edge pool looks directly out to the ocean and volcano views with one of a kind sunset vista experience the space the spaceninspired by the surrealist artist wolfgang widmoser a prodigy of salvador dali unique dome architecture provides floating ocean and volcano views right from the bed each dome villa has a custom king size tear drop on the ground level and a single day bed in the second level loft guest access guest accessnour friendly staff on site is available to help and assist you with whatever you need from 8am till 9pm other things to note other things to notenplease note this property is surrounded by nature the property is thoroughly cleaned daily including the beds stripped and swept but the odd ant frog geko butterfly or any other local creature may encroach on occasion if you are squeamish sensitive or have any kind of aversion to such a possibility then we highly recommend you choose another of the lombok locations that is not so much a part of the natural environment

Title: The Silo House At Laughing Llama Farm
Description: enjoy the silo house at laughing llama farm secluded and private conveniently located within minutes to everything waco temple belton have to offer you can also follow along on insta at silohouselaughingllamafarmnnplease see the detailed info about the space in this listingnnextrasnsilo house smores mimosas special occasion flower arrangements laughing llama farm experience packages are availablenmessage us for details to arrange at least 3 days prior to your arrival the space the space guest access guest accessnthere is a pond on the property with gate access right outside the front door of the silo house stocked with bass and perch for catch and release bring your gear and if you dont have any we will be more than happy to loan you lures and rods if needed other things to note other things to notenthis is a working farm with llamas sheep goats and cows occasionally no matter what they say please do not let them out of their designated areas into the fenced yard of the silo house theyd love to sit on the silo house porch and have a beer with you if they could nour animals are fed a special diet and the sheep can not eat the llama feed we will provide you with some llama feed and when you arrive there will be instructions to how they are trained and fed so that you can feed the llamas if you like please do not take any feed past the gate at the silo house they are trained to know if you are in the pasture there is no food involvednlil d the brown goat loves to hang out with you when you fish he also loves fishing tackle so please close all tackle boxes and watch your poles lures and hooksnwe feed and put the animals up at night depending on the weather and the season at the barn and they know the routine about sundown and the routine at sun upnevery day is a new adventure at laughing llama farm

Title: Crystal Peak Lookout üå≤
Description: the lookout is open year round with a wood fired stove to keep warm at night or heat your morning coffee a wood fired sauna sits below to relax and rejuvenate your body after a big hike or snowshoeing adventure whats that other little wooden building no fire lookout is complete without an outhouse the space the spacencrystal peak lookout was built in 1959 and was originally located in chewelah wa on top of stranger peak in 1983 it was moved to northern idaho to the cedar and tamarack lined slopes of crystal peak completely remodeled in 2018 crystal peak lookout is now an immersive deepforest getaway for adventurous couples surrounded by 13 wooded acres youll find yourself sharing the sunset view with mountain bluebirds in the tree tops gazing at the starlit skies while an owl calls from its neighboring perch and if youre lucky waking up to the occasional passing moose guest access guest accessntheres 13 acres to wander around to your hearts content depending on the time of year youll find huckleberries ripe for the picking tamarack needles beginning yellow blue bird boxes full of nestlings or fresh moose tracks in the snow youll have full access to the lookout an outhouse sauna during your stay winter is accessed by snowmobile or by a ride in our vintage snowcat see getting around other things to note other things to notenyou must have a 4wd vehicle to access the lookout in the winter which can start in late october youll need snowmobiles or the equivalent to get to the propertynnnow available winter wonderland experience its a rare absolutely stunning to stay in a lookout in the snow our caretaker david will greet you in town with gourmet hot cocoa baileys optional a vintage 1960s thiokol snowcat snuggle up with your partner in the fully enclosed heated track vehicle that maneuvers over the snow youll enjoy breathtaking 360 degree views of the snow covered forest on your way to the lookout well transport all your gear and food to the bottom of the driveway and pick you up at the end of your stay we supply you with a sled and snowshoes to make the trek up the driveway fun and easynnits a beautiful addition to staying at the lookout its a 100 for the snowcat and we will add that to your booking if youd like to reserve it also your welcome to tip your driver in person if you feel so inclined

Title: Semi Open Bamboo Bungalow + Instagram Hammock Net
Description: a unique 2 storey bungalow located in the south of bali the bungalow is part of a small resort and has a restaurant onside and a massive infinity pool this will be a unique experience sleeping in this bungalownnwe have 4 of these types of bungalows and you will be placed randomly in one depending on availabilitynnwifi speed 50 mbps the spacenthe bed has 2 double beds the bedrooms downstairs are closed and have a fan there is no door between the upper floor and lower floor and does not stop any noisennthe room upstairs is open as per the picturesnnthe rooms are not suitable for young kidsnnattentionnwe would like to inform you that construction has started next to le bamboo as there can be construction noise during your stay we will be flexible with cancellations if you decide not to stay we will refund the night that you did not stay at le bamboo some guests are not bothered by the noise and some days there is no noise but we cannot predict what is happening during your stay we are sorry for this inconvenience

Title: Leafy Greens Chiangmai : Mushroom M2
Description: leafy greens was built as a retreat center for our family and friends it is where people would visit to refreshing their souls and mind we work so hard to make this place to be one of the place that we can live in harmony with nature that is why the cob houses are the right choice for us not only the buildings are ecofriendly but also the garden is organic visit here you will be able to take a deep breath and enjoy the fresh air with organic environment it is a perfect place to getaway the space the spacenthis clay house was built for meditation course and it was designed for people to learn being with themselves that is why the function of the house is simple the house is 35 square meter with essential facilities it might be considered as a tiny house yet its comfortable for 2 people living together it is a single floor house with bunk bed the entire of the house was made by clay earth it is not only ecofriendly building but also good for our health we believe that our body will absorb good energy from the earth this means earthy house brings you close to nature and eliminate bad energy out it is very special house for us too special actually to keep it only for family and friends so we decided to share our paradise to everyone hope you would love it like we donndo not click on the airbnb link for directionsnplease only use our provided location to get here otherwise you might end up to other placesnnplease note that our place surrounded by naturenour place is full of flowers and trees you might see part of nature like birds crickets frogs lizards butterflies bugs and insects in our garden dont worry they are harmless however if you are afraid of these creatures our place might not suit you we do not offer refunds if those creatures comes into the house but we will check the house before guests check in to make sure there is no any bugs and we have insect net please keep it close every time during staynnplease note that clay house has a thick wall and the clay is blocked the internet reception so the internet might get slow sometimennplease note that we are not hotel so we do not have reception to help you 24hr however you would do our best to help you out to checkin it is very important to read out message thoroughly in order to have a smooth arrivennwe have cat in our property if you are allergic to cat or do not like them our place might not a good fit for younnif more people than the number declared at the time of booking stayed the room additional fee and penalty will be chargedchildren over 3 years old is also count as 1 personnnno commercial photography shoots allowed

Title: Kettle House Galveston - As Seen On TV DIY
Description: welcome to the galveston famous kettle house enjoy this newly renovated 1960s home originally built as a steel storage tank this home has foam insulation and central ac for ultimate comfort we have high speed wifi 4k smart tv and includes all the comforts of home large deck great for catching rays and relaxing in the breeze seen on hgtvdiy show big texas fixnn8 minute walk to the beach have to cross fm 3005n12 miles to the historic strand the space the spacenimportant to notennthere is an interior metal spiral staircase that is steep tight and can be difficult to navigate there are no handrailsnndownstairs bedroom with 2 queen beds requires going downstairs and bathroom is upstairs these beds are also elevated we do provide stairs with 3 steps for easy access there are no rails on bed so if your worried about yourself or children falling off these beds wont be for you got to work with the space we have nnsince this is a beach house there are 14 exterior stairs that take you to the main living spacennthis is a west end beach house and like all galveston there are mosquitoes we supply big spray at the house and also a bug zapper but during certain times of the year they can be bad if you leave the outside lights on at night they will attract june bugs and other insectsnnalso to note this house is on the west end of galveston by all the beach homes this house is not in town by restaurants and downtown its approx a 10 min drive back to walmart and fast food

Title: La Redonda
Description: un espacio confortable perfecta para visitar en pareja esta diseada para convivir en armona con el medio ambiente ideal para relajarse y escapar del mundo estamos en el corazn de la sierra gorda a 15 min del centro histrico de jalpan pueblo mgico una ubicacin estratgica para visitar los lugares de increible belleza natural que hay en la regin de nuestra bellisima reserva de la biosfera the space the spacenestamos ubicados en el corazn de la sierra gorda a 7 km del centro de jalpan de serra lugar ideal para salir a visitar los atractivos de la regionnes una cabaa tiene un enfoque totalmente ecologico hecha de barro en la que utilizamos diferentes mtodos de bioconstruccin fue pintada con savila y cal empleamos el bao seco inodoro el cual nos permite ahorrar una gran cantidad de agua y crear composta para el jardn calentadores solares para las regaderas y captacin de agua de lluviassi les gustan las opciones alternativas seguro te encantar guest access guest accessnasadores es necesario traer su propio carbnnrea de juegos infantiles trampoln y uso del jardnnnservicios con costo extranfogatanbao tipo sauna u200du200dndesayuno baj reservacin unicamente los domingosnterapia de polaridad balance de energanrenta de bicicletasnartesana y productos naturalesnecotours en la sierra gorda hiking mtb u200du200du200d bajo de reservacin o pregunta por el servicio al momento de llegar

Title: Guard Tower Suite #1 with Pool
Description: units designed to make the everyday extraordinarynnthe ultimate glamping experience featured on hgtv the castle house estate brings tiny home living to another level located in the heart of joshua tree and minutes from the national park this unique medieval piece of architecture blends indooroutdoor living with an emphasis on entertaining the castle house estate is situated on eight picturesque acres surrounded by many more private undeveloped acres the spacenguard tower 1nn3 levels 1 bed 120 sqf per floornnthe ultimate tiny house experiencennthe castle house guard tower is a custom three level living space loft each piece of furniture has been custom made to fit this unique round space which includes a queen sized bed in the loft did we mention 1500 thread count sheets and pure care plush memory foam pillowsnnthe full glass door and windows have been placed strategically to catch the desert lightnnfor outside adventurers step up to the rooftop hatch to enjoy your views or bring your sleeping bags and sleep under the stars weather permittingnneach tiny home includes it own outdoor wood burning firepit grill top and two chairs perfect for enjoying the outside elements of joshua tree where you can enjoy a few cold ones and roast smores included in each tower is a minirefrigerator and nespresso coffee maker the restroom facility is just 20 steps away and has two private toilets two hand sinks and urinal two outside showers and one outdoor sink nothing can be compared to showering outside with 365 degree views of the national parknninstagram thecastlehouseestate

Title: Unusual Luxury Accommodation in Champagne 1H Paris
Description: our accommodations are unusual ecological constructions of great comfort in wood and glass nestled in a green setting in the dawn at the gates of champagne they all have a large equipped terrace where you can relax and enjoy your meals optional from 19 and breakfasts included in baskets served on request guests have free access to the swimming pool area private deckchairs and bar and snack service the space the spacenaccommodation at the cherry tree keeps the promise of an offthebeatenpath stay that will leave you dreaming a real cocoon this small structure has all the comforts you need for a pleasant stay as a couple or a romantic getaway you will particularly appreciate the panoramic roof of the bedroom and bathroom promise of beautiful starry nights guest access guest accessnreserved parking is available upon arrival arrive at the entrance to la rserves main residence and well accompany you to your accommodation once your keys are delivered you can access the site freely through a dedicated entrance near the parking lot other things to note other things to notenthe reserve of the dawn is committed to maintaining its luxury and confidential character you will therefore be only three couples at most on the site children are not allowed parties beyond 6 people are systematically refused pets not allowed nyour panoramic and private bathroom is independent of your listing it is in close proximity to your bedroom doornthe 29 heated swimming pool is freely accessible from 10 00 am to 8 00 pmnthe pool is accessible from april 10th to october 31st andnheated from may 1 september 30ncheckin times are from 5 00 pm to 7 00 pm and checkouts are from 10 00 am to 12 00 pm

Title: Honey's Silo Retreat
Description: please go to the glacier national park website updated 2021 visitation policynnhoneys silo is in the very nw corner of my 20 acre property in the country surrounded by alfalfa wheat fields the property borders blaine creek a natural wet land an abundance of wild lifenbring a license plate to be placed in the rafters receive a free montana made goody the space the spacenunique 1950s grain silo converted over a year into this very cool vacation rental owned by a farmer in st ignatius transported here its quiet location next to blaine creek a wild life haven my grain bin lies in the beautiful valley east of kalispell at the base of the swan mountain range you will be impressed by the uniqueness of the interior style and never feel like you are staying in a grain bin i had a vision of how it would turn out and the vision came true breath taking sunrises and sunsets can be seen from this location your home away from home is conveniently located between all the major attractions that the area has to offer minutes to bigfork a small eclectic town at the north end of flathead lake and glacier national park with its outstanding vistas the towns of whitefish and kalispell with their many shops and restaurants are also nearby guest access guest accessnwell all of it of course youre in montana other things to note other things to noteni rent bear spray 5 per can per canrefund if it saves your life from a bearninflatable paddle boards x 2 25 per board per staynbring a license plate sign it date it i will place it in the raftersyou will receive a home made local goody

Title: IGLU Hut Milzkalne

Title: Dome house in the Sacred Valley
Description: beautiful and peaceful double occupancy dome house in the base of the pachatusan mountain ideal for couple or a single person one double bed feather duvet private bathroom with hot shower complete kitchen drinking well water wifi access in the garden and amazing 360 degrees of gardens and views the space the spacenthe dome house is located at the base of apu pachatusan in a conscious little community called la pacha surrounded by magnificent mountains 7km from pisac by car youll love our place because of its gardens the location the views a peaceful place for relaxing in the stillness of nature without sacrificing modern comforts while discovering the historic hidden treasures of the andean culture guest access guest accessnguests have access to all surrounding grounds and gardens we have also a beautiful playground for children at the property there is an ayahuasca temple up the hill where there are ceremonies most fridays and full moons

Title: Leafy Greens Chiangmai : Snail Dome (SND)
Description: leafy greens was built as a retreat centre for our family and friends it is where people would visit to refreshing their souls and mind we work so hard to make this place to be one of the place that we can live in harmony with nature that is why the cob houses are the right choice for us not only the buildings are ecofriendly but also the garden is organic visit here you will be able to take a deep breath and enjoy the fresh air with organic environment it is a perfect place to getaway the space the spacenthis clay house was built for meditation course and it was designed for people to learn being with themselves that is why the function of the house is simple the house is 100 square meter with essential facilities the house is designed to fit for up to 5 people with 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms the entire of the house was made by clay earth it is not only ecofriendly building but also good for our health we believe that our body will absorb good energy from the earth this means earthy house brings you close to nature and eliminate bad energy out it is very special house for us too special actually to keep it only for family and friends so we decided to share our paradise to everyone hope you would love it like we donndo not click on the airbnb link for directionsnplease only use our provided location to get here otherwise you might end up to other placesnnplease note that our place surrounded by naturenour place is full of flowers and trees you might see part of nature like birds crickets frogs lizards butterflies bugs and insects in our garden dont worry they are harmless however if you are afraid of these creatures our place might not suit you we do not offer refunds if those creatures comes into the house but we will check the house before guests check in to make sure there is no any bugs and we have insect net please keep it close every time during staynnplease note that clay house has a thick wall and the clay is blocked the internet reception so the internet might get slow sometimennplease note that we are not hotel so we do not have reception to help you 24hr however you would do our best to help you out to checkin it is very important to read out message thoroughly in order to have a smooth arrivennwe have cat in our property if you are allergic to cat or do not like them our place might not a good fit for younnif more people than the number declared at the time of booking stayed the room additional fee and penalty will be chargedchildren over 3 years old is also count as 1 personnnno commercial photography shoots allowed other things to note other things to notenhost might not be able to reply guests message or help after 2100 pm so that guests must read and study our house manual with care all information about our house that guests need to know are in there

Title: Tree-house Experience on a river
Description: treat yourselves to an unforgettable experience this is not some kids treehouse but rather a truly unique and one of a kind in panama the treehouse is located next to a river that will sooth you throughout your stay with its majestic sound the space the spacenyou can soon tick off the number one on your bucket list the absolutely amazing experience of spending a couple of days in your own treehouse in tropical naturenthis large treehouse is situated in a private corner of our nature resort rio encantado let the soothing sound of the river and the rushing of the leaves lull you to sleep in the comfortable double bed the next morning you will be awoken by the beautiful song of the birds around you from your halfopen room in the treehouse you can control a light switch to illuminate the river at night there is a comfortable bed for you as well as a wet bar and bathroom facilitiesndownstairs a few meters from the treehouse is a rancho where there is a full bathroomhot water and a kitchen for your use but for bathing you may probably prefer to use the natural pool in the river bend that your treehouse bedroom looks down tonmany of our guests who came to try out the treehouse for a night for the unique experience ended up extending their stay claiming they had never slept so soundly in all their lives it is a totally no smoking area

Title: Heated sleeping cabin made of straw panels - MINI2
Description: voose home of sun is full of positive energy the unique buildings made of straw panels will recharge your batteries if you just visit it come and recharge your voltage the crystalclear air of the krvemaa forests and insane history of voose bring together an unbelievably good aura and energy for everyone we have 5 cabins for two people for healthy sleep for seminars or gatherings main house with unique projection system and modern kitchen straw panel sauna is also worth of experience the space the spacenminicabin is really tiny but have bed for two people guest access guest accessnprice includes warm and healthy sleeping cabin made of straw panels free wifi bath towels common toilet and shower in special building access to barbecue area for extra 10 euro usage of kitchen with refrigerator washing machine and dryer are also in use for another 10 euro modern sauna is also made with straw panels cost 30 euro for first two hoursnspecial prices for entire complex come with your company

Title: HIDEOUT BALI - Eco Bamboo Home
Description: your perfect little staycation in bali is right here we take relaxation seriouslynnow more than ever we can be your safe hideaway from the world epidemic special discounts running nownnhideout is a unique eco stay hidden in the mountains of gunung agung volcano far from the city life it acts as the perfect hideaway for all adventurous travellers we are honoured to be number 4 most wished accommodation at airbnb in the world nnfollow our social media hideoutbali for special promo the space the spacenthis experience is not like any other hideout is not some fancy hotel it is truly an adventurous experience rustic and authentic right in the middle of balinese village life hideout is a perfect place for longtime travellers lovers of nature spiritualminded people trekkinglovers backpackers artists musicians and ecoenthusiast to have their own unique bali experience we are most happy with environmentally thinking guests who treat this little bamboo home with love and carennif you read further you can find much important and interesting information but for those in a hurry these are some key points to know n1 breakfast is included in the price served in the house lunch and dinner can be ordered from hideout bistro for an extra charge vegan options as welln2 scooter for free during your stayn3 there is an equipped kitchen unlimited drinking water fridge filled with cold bintangn4 large cosy bed with mosquito net wifi music stereo system in the house and a hot showern5 we can help to arrange your transport find you the right guides give you the best balinese massage inhouse or organise a great cooking class at hideout bistron6 checkin from 3 pm please no latenight arrivals checkout at 11 amn7 we are in the middle of the jungle please expect some wildlife nnnimportant informationndue to the ongoing pandemic of covid19n all guests will be measured by a professional nocontact thermometer for their body temperature if their body temperature is repeatedly measured as above 375 celsius they will not be allowed to checkin as this can be a sign of ongoing illness such as covid19n all guests will sign a declaration of their current health statusn all guests need to wear a face mask during checkincheckout or when in contact with our teamn houses are cleaned and sanitized after each guestn we provide hand sanitisers in the housennnthe spacenthe building has two floors on the first floor you can find a neat fully equipped kitchen cosy livingrelaxing area with extra hanging hammock wardrobe with safety box bathroom and entrance to the outdoor shower on the second floor there is a spacious bedroom providing king size bed with a mosquito net right in front of the unique triangular window there are multiple bean bags for reading cuddling and relaxing the perfect place for meditation or playing a musical instrument all with a direct view of the shimmering rivernbamboo is wellknown for its temperature stability thanks to natural ventilation there is no need for ac or a fan it can be very cold up here nnin the kitchen you will always find balinese coffee tea sugar salt and some spices if you dont feel like cooking dont worry we have a delicious hideout bistro a kitchen concept we provide breakfast included in the price lunch and dinner and all can be brought to your house we do not yet have restaurant seating but you can enjoy the meals in the privacy of your hideoutnnscooter for free during your stay you will have available one simple basic and older scooter with two helmets if you are a motorbike racer you might be disappointed always new towels and beddings are also providednngood to knownwhat is amazing about stay in hideout nsolitude all hideouts have their own private garden and we do the best we can to provide you with full privacy and solitude the closest family warungs are 515min away easy to reach by scooter or by footnwe love music that is why we provide you with a nice stereo system and traditional balinese music equipmentnhideout is also a shelter for a kikky cat which is super cute and cuddly you can also meet our friendly hoki dog they are the best security for nighttime dont book hideouts if you have an allergy or if you dont want to be close to the animalsnnyou can experience authentic balinese lifestyle cultural habits and observe many wonderful things in nature especially in the river which is sometimes used for cleansing ceremonies and baths its a wonderful thing to experiencennyou cant lock the bamboo house you can close the garden gate from the insidennfirst time in the junglenhideout is part of local nature our cleaning standards are at the highest but that doesnt stop occasional insect furry caterpillar that should have a sign do not touch frog snake or mouse from visiting the house please consider this before booking and do not book this house if you are not prepared for an occasional encounter we are immersed in nature animals are friends not enemiesnnwe urge you to always turn your lights on in the night when moving around the house or visiting the bathroomnndid you know that a spider can make a new web in under 1 hour with our biggest efforts to keep the houses perfect and insect free you have to expect that there will be some spiders some bugs and some mosquitos that is just nature and we cant do anything more for it if you dont feel comfortable with that it is better to book a different type of accommodation than a bamboo housenthe internet is very poor and sometimes not working at all we recommend being prepared for the offthegrid experiencennabout usnwe are not a hotel we dont offer hotel services or 247 reception we are a true airbnb experience we are here for you daily from 8am 8pm if you want a daily cleanup please let us know when you checkinnbeware that the nearest atm is from a local bank it only accepts mastercard international atm is about 35 minutes by car away do come preparedncheckin is 3pm 7pm please avoid checkin later than 8pm since it is very problematic and in some cases not possible checkout by 11amnnlocationnplease take a careful look at the map we are over 90 minutes away from the ubud and 2 hours from the city of denpasar and the international airport nthe closest city is amlapura 30min away there is no nightlife here no bars clubs coffee houses or shops with imported products we are this far from the city by choice in the middle of rice fields with a calm setting next to the running rivernnhideout is within walking distance from a resort where you can have a lovely dinner in the restaurant with an unforgettable view of gunung agung you can easily reach many traditional small shopswarung there are so many things to explore around by foot or by bike just to mention you can go trekking through the rice fields explore local waterfall jagasatru visit tirta gangga ujung temple go snorkelling or diving visit the night market visit shaman or local temples go to experience pura besakih have a wild day of rafting and many more other things to note other things to notenriver surrounding the land is very clean you can take a refreshing dip in a natural swimming pool which the river provides you can observe here many of amazing animal species lizards of all sizes enormous butterflies all you can count dragonflies and fireflies chameleons birds of all colours and not to forget our kitten kikka and dogs hoki and tracy its a unique experience to fall asleep looking at the fireflies just behind your window nnthe view from the house is focused directly on one of the most sacred places around called campuhan campuhan is balinese term for a place where two rivers meet this place is regarded by locals as a holy place for centuries its a source of holy water for ceremonies and cleansing the body and spirit during your stay you will have the opportunity to observe balinese during their ceremonies and baths campuhan is a very magical place attracting good vibes and positive energynnby our experience in the hideout you can find an enormously inspiring environment for your writing music an art of for work

Title: Veluvana Bali - Owl Bamboo House
Description: veluvana is a unique bamboo house with a wonderful view of sidemen valley a genuine tropical landscape with mount agung peak on its back this getaway spot is a great place to bring into reality the dream adventure of the true wanderer we invite you to feel the magnificent vibes of the entire house to escape the life that is full of drama into a journey with ultimate joy the space the spacenthe bamboo house is located at the main tourist district of sidemen a small town with a magnificent landscape in the southern flank of mount agung sidemen is not a touristy area it is about a 90minute drive from bali airport and a 45minute drive from ubud besides the beautiful scenery and the indigenous culture sidemen also surrounded by a lot of famous tourist destinations in bali some of them include lempuyang temple the gateway to heaven besakih the mother temple of bali tirta gangga royal water palace telaga waja river for rafting amed diving spot and bias putih the virgin beachnnupon arrival at veluvana bamboo house you will find the upper ground parking area with a small gazebo on the west side of the entrance and a small front office building in the northeast edge take your time in the upper ground to enjoy the welcome drink served by our doorman while resting from a long journey through the wavy road of east balinnonce you finish your drink the declining stairs down to the north edge of the upper ground will lead you to the bamboo house you will not see the building until you reach the lower ground as it is secluded behind the bamboo wall and vegetation at the lower ground you will notice a small fish pond to be your silent neighbor during your stay spin the leaf door and follow the stone path to head into the ground level of the bamboo housenall part of the building is fully designed for guest enjoyment sit back the bamboo couch to watch the paintinglike scenery right from the ground level porch on the left side of the house is a small pool to chill with your partner while at the right end are the semiopen toilet and the lush rainforest shower there is also a kitchenette at the back of the couch that features a sink a cooler a coffee maker a water heater and seasonal fruit will also be served subject to availabilitynnclimb up to the upper level of the house through the bamboo stairs you will enter the all bamboo bedroom that facing north to the sidemen valley with the green hills and mount agung on its back half of the room wall is windows with transparent glass that allows sunrise to light up your mind and sunset to color up your soul the room features a comfort doublesized bed a single reclining sofa bed and a cozy bedroom chair where you can kick back and relax with a book or hustling on a laptop before rolling into bednnthe upper level of the house also features a balcony on the east side and the dreamy hanging net right in front of your bed carefully spin the east door to enjoy sightseeing from the east balcony especially when the sunlight softly appears to charm you up from your restful sleep if you brave enough to try relaxing on the hanging net while enjoying the magnificent view of mount agung open the north side window and go down slowly to the net layback and chill like you were floating on a soft cloud it is okay to also bring pillows and blanket to the net because anyone can fall asleep by the soft wind of the sidemen valley other things to note other things to notenbefore you book please read a few details for your considerationnn1 the constructionnthe construction and furniture are mostly made of locallysourced bamboo that covered with rice straw roofs the building is designed and built by local bamboo artisans with serious consideration to the strength of the entire part of the construction and furniture the lower level floor is a half meter from the ground with a higher edge on the north porch please take care of your step while playing on this site the upper level is 25 meters from the ground with stairs that are considered easy to climb watch your head and hold the railing for your safetynn2 water electricity and wifinthe water you use in this house is supplied by the regional water company that distributes fresh water sourced from mount agung aquifer although the water is fresh it is not ready to drink water so please drink only water that is served in the bottle and ask the doormen to refill if it runs out the electricity installed in the house is connected with the main east bali grid system to assure you have reliable lighting in the night and optimum power supply to your device because we understand you may physically offgrid but your digital presence can have no break so wifi is free as alwaysnn3 the locationnthe small town of sidemen is less crowded compare to ubud and any other tourist destination in bali this area is slowly growing as the indigenous culture and society remain preserved by its humility you can explore the village in a shortrange by foot a scooter is also available to rent if you want to go a little bit further to the town center or the neighbor villagenn4 public facilitynthe small town of sidemen has a village hall traditional market small grocery school and hospital with an emergency care unit ride a scooter around 5 10 minutes from the bamboo house to reach one of these facilities bigger public facilities are available in the nearest town of semarapura that requires a 20minute drive or denpasar that is around 60 minutes from sidemennn5 the climatenthe climate is divided into two seasons dry or wet the dry season comes around may september while the wet season is from october april each year however climate change has made the weather a bit unpredictable sometimes there is a rainy day within the dry season and not all day is rainy during the wet season when you stay during the wet season please consider facing heavy rain with a wind that may blow water into the lower ground porch the upper balcony and the hanging net however we have installed curtains and rollup blinds at the lower ground so you can protect yourself from rainwater or bugs in the nightnn6 the bugsnthe bamboo house is located within a rice terrace with rich biodiversity our commitment to reducing the carbon footprint has led us to design the house with minimum impact on the surrounding living organism stay in this bamboo house means that you are willing to share your living space with other creatures ants fly mosquito and other insects are commonly found outside of the building especially during fruit season as long as you keep the space clean and not leave any left food open they will not come to disturb you if you notice mosquito entering the bedroom area we highly recommend you to use the mosquito net on the bed during your sleep if you have a specific insect allergy or afraid of these insects we suggest this bamboo house is not good for you or you may go at your own risknn7 room servicesnyou have a doormen standby at 700 am 900 pm at the upper ground you can ask him almost anything you need to make your stay enjoyable he will help you with breakfast food for lunch and dinner find a masseur room cleaning laundry transportation area information and tourist activities you can also contact us online through airbnb platform in case the onsite services do not meet your needsnn8 breakfast lunch and dinnernbreakfast for two is included in your booking you can ask the doormen to serve the breakfast in the spot you want whether it is floating on the pool on the couch or you feel too heavy to wake up from your bed the breakfast will be served at your convenience we plan to have a small restaurant in the upper ground so that you can order food for your lunch as well as dinner for now you can walk around as there are several restaurants available near the house or you can ask the doormen to buy onenn9 air conditioningnwe do not install air conditioning in the house as it is against our spirit to maintain natural air remain fresh and healthy matterfact we think we do not need that urban stuff around sidemen village especially when you let the soft natural wind flows into your spacenn10 use of hanging netnthe hanging net is made of strong string with iron steel pillars to sustain the weight of the user using the hanging net means you understand the risk that you may fell off to the side of the net if you are not careful only use the hanging net if you are confident that you have a good balance and always have your partner watching you in case you need help to get back to the room do not use the hanging net after hitting even a shoot of alcohol do not jump down from the hanging net and do not hang on it as it is your pull up barnn11 the neighborhoodnas the bamboo house is located in the main tourist district of sidemen several accommodations and restaurants are situated near your space you will see some buildings on the west side of the house right at the back of the house is also accommodation with several rooms the neighbor is warm and friendly especially the owner of the surrounding properties however to make sure you have great privacy during your stay we have created a high bamboo fence at the back of the house and plant dense vegetation on each border with the neighbor propertynn12 irresponsible behaviornirresponsible behavior and threatening and abusive conduct towards the host doormen neighbors of the house and the villager will not be tolerated the host will refuse to allow checkin to the house if there is any case and or information that assume the guest s have related to any irresponsible behavior threatening and abusive conduct toward the mentioned person above the host also has a full authority to end guest stay in the house if there is any case and or information that assume the guest s have related to any irresponsible behavior threatening and abusive conduct toward the mentioned person above no refund will be given regarding the cancelationcanceled stay due to irresponsible behavior threatening and abusive conduct toward the mentioned person aboventhe host will not have a further responsibility to the guest once the booking is canceled and or the stay is ended

Title: Bamboo eco cottage in rice fields
Description: this bamboo cottage is a secluded eco retreat down a quiet foot path nestled in the rice fields and only a five minute walk to central ubud open air basket weave bedroom with mini loft modern elegant bathroom and outdoor living area make this a truly unique bali experience the space the spacenthis is a woven house made almost entirely of bamboo it is open air and as close to living in nature as you get our main lodge is down a private foot path only accessible to cottage guests if you choose to join us for dinner a swim or for socializing with other guests you are welcome to enjoy this common space with a saltwater pool and a swing guest access guest accessnwe have a complete menu and full service to the cottage is just a phone call away with the complimentary cell phone we provide we offer a complete menu of asian fusion snacks as well as a traditional balinese village style dinner served with candlelight and all accessories for a formal dining experience under the stars dinner is prepared fresh from wild harvested or organic ingredients breakfast is not included in your stay but we do provide upon request at an extra fees and can be delivered when you awake on the patio overlooking a lush greenery as far as the eye can seenhe property is surrounded by rice fields with many opportunities for hiking other things to note other things to notenthis is a unique place and is not for everyone it is eco tropical living at its best but with that comes nature in all its glory things to note there is no airconditioning although because of the location there is a constant cool breeze and you may even enjoy the quilt we provide at night this cottage is a woven basket with a living bamboo and traditional grass roof leaving it totally open and in nature some people have asked about security it is very secluded and very safe there is a cabinet you can lock up valuables in if you like we have staff available to assist you and ensure you have what you need at all times you will be very well cared fornnsleeping in nature is something most of us dont do as we sleep in sealed rooms it can be transformative to sleep in a natural setting open to the cool night air listening to the crickets and chirping geckos the sounds of the nearby rushing stream with the fireflies glittering in the night dont let the unusual openness of the space deter you this is an experience you wont soon forgetbali 101nwelcome to bali no this is not like where you are coming from to hopefully enhance your experience we want to provide you with a bit of cultural context people often feel disappointed when they try to make bali what they are familiar with we hope by describing a few scenarios that this helps as bali has things about it that may be very different than you are used ton1 there is a lizard staring at me from the ceiling who pooped on the floor and there are ants crawling along the wall in the bathroom the outdoors will come inside crickets spiders and certainly a resident gecko and wasps will all join you in your living space no matter how fancy the villa there is no keeping them out given that all of our bathrooms are open air this is something to embrace as part of the experience and not be afraid as they are all harmlessn2 i can hear roosters and dogs and the temple and even the occasional pig being sacrificed at midnight oh and the crickets are too loud to sleep yes indeed all true when i think of bali i think of roosters they are very proud of their fighting cocks and spend a great deal of time with them often keeping them quite close to living spaces so your neighbor may very well have one our neighbor certainly has both and his dog barks a lot and has attempted to scare away many a guest but dont be afraid he is harmless the temple is a charming sound that echo thru the night and adds the to atmosphere but it can be less charming when they begin to sacrifice pigs at midnight peaceful bali well its all a matter of perspective bali is here to be itself not just to be a peaceful place for you to relax enjoy these new and unique sounds as part of the atmosphere and dont expect it to be an instagram photo it is a real living placen3 an old lady with a machete and no shirt on just wandered into my living room balinese have a very different relationship to personal privacy than we do it is not uncommon for neighbors or ricefield farms to wander into your space and personal property because they are curious about you or simply because they want to borrow your sugar they may not even ask as they would imagine you would do exactly the same this can be very startling at first and takes some getting used to you are welcome to ask them to leave but do keep in mind they are more than likely not there to harm you just used to sharing personal spacenn4 there are naked people in the stream by the house it wasnt very many years ago that all balinese women were topless as their normal daily attire now only the traditional old women still maintain this style of dress but it is still very common to see people publicly bathing in ricefield streams naked you may even see this from your front porch dont be alarmed this normal here and they will not even feel embarrassed if you wave uf04an5 the guy tried to over charge me there is a very different relationship to money here think of it as a tug of war with a rope in the middle its not that they are trying to steal from you or cheat you or have anything against you at all they are just pulling on the rope to get as much money as they can if you dont tug back then they won dont get angry or feel the need to have hurt feelings just negotiate calmly to lower the price to something fairer negotiate everything in every situation you will use these skills later when you need to ask for a raise with your boss n6 everything is damp yes this is the tropics and especially during the rainy season everything can feel a bit damp and can mildew quickly even within a day if your clothes need fresh laundering after being in a suitcase or if the sheets need to be changed for this reason just let us know and we will assist younwe hope these scenarios help you to be prepared if you face them and feel free to let us know should you need additional help navigating in this new environment also please be aware that this is a house with two cats who live there we very much want to host people who are cat friendly as the cats are very much running the resort and we want you to be able to include them in your stay

Title: "Air Castle" by Highpoint Treehouses
Description: most unique treehouse destination you will find for ages 12 1600 sf living space 2 bedroom 1 bath treehouse uses 4 shipping containers the interior has a modern farmhouse style after waking up with an incredible view move outside to 1 of 5 balconies including the 3rd floor screened porch with hot tub or to the 6th floor crowsnest 50 in the air are looking for a couples getaway adult trip or a romantic celebrationthe unique nature will make for a memorable experience the space the spacenyou will be immersed and be one with nature and the environment local animals that you may see include deer wild hogs raccoons armadillos opossums rabbits bobcats squirrels owls redtailed hawk and many other varieties of birds there are a number of trails to take by foot or bike guest access guest accessnthe treehouse has all the amenities of home and many that only exist in your dreams you can be comfortable in all seasons with a 20 wall of windows where you can watch birds and squirrels feed 20 off the ground from the comfort of power recliners each of the 5 balconies provide unique perspectives of nature and shade relax with a morning coffee on balcony adjacent to kitchen or take steps to the shaded crows nest to swing in a hammock 40 off the ground fully surrounded by extra tall railings in the evening start a fire in the covered fire pit and let nature and the crackle of the fire relax you other things to note other things to notenthis treehouse is meant for ages 12 and older onlynn all registered guests must review sign and return a waiver term of conditions before checkin nnplease no pets for safety reasons pets are not allowed an exception is made for any registered service animal we do this to protect you and your pet from any injurynnclosures we retain the right to close or limit your access to the treehouse during your stay if we deem it unsafe due to heavy storms or other considerations these facilities and activities can be inherently risky due to the unique nature of the experience so safety must stay top priority for you during your staynnsafety each unit has multiple smoke detectors and carbon monoxide sensors please do not tamper with these units also keep in mind that when staying in a treehouse youre between 10 and 50 above the ground and should act in a responsible manner accommodations have been constructed in as safe as possible manner but we need your help keeping you and your loved ones safe during the stay fire extinguishers are scattered around the treehouse including one in each bedroom for your use in an emergency designated operational windows in each room are available for quick escape using a ladder in case of fire do not use these items unless there is an emergency if there is an emergency dial 911 each visitor and guest shall conduct themselves in a responsible manner so as not to endanger the lives of other guests or visitors cause damage to the property themselves or others or consume alcohol to excess or use illegal drugsnndisclaimer we cannot control nor are we responsible for any acts of nature this includes but is not limited to weather insects rodents or the presence of wildlife bugs deer squirrels raccoons bats skunks wild hogs armadillos snakes etcnnliability risk management inherently we do as much as possible to make our treehouses and the outside activities as safe as possible all activities involve a certain inherent risk or injury up to and including death it is expressly understood and agreed that neither the owner nor hpt air castle llc shall be liable for any damages or injury to guest guests guest or their families or to any of their property from whatever cause arising from the occupancy or use of the premises by guest and hisher family and guests if an unregistered guest damages property is injured or causes liability then the person making the reservation is personally liable and responsible for the acts of the unregistered guestnnproperty dos dontsnn no house partiesnn all visitors must be registered and have a signed assumption of risk and release from liability agreement on file prior to the commencement of their stay a visitor may be replaced or added with at least seven 7 day notice to hpt air castles llc and having the new or replacement visitor sign and return to hpt air castles llc the assumption of risk and release from liability agreementnn exceeding maximum occupancy of any unit results in a 100 personper day chargenn there is a 2000 service fee postage for any items left behind that we mail to younn no pets allowed if noncompliant 150 charge will be applied to credit card on filenn no smoking inside if noncompliant 150 charge will be applied to credit card on filenn treehouses are to be left tidy your rate includes a basic cleaning fee any excessive cleaning that is required will result in a minimum cleaning fee of 25 to 100 plus you agree to be financial responsible for any economic loss to hpt air castles llc due to any reservation cancellation or delay in reservation moveins that are a result of excess cleaning needing to be done after your staynn any type of foreign material oil or soap used in outdoor hottubs will result in a 50 to 100 feenn any items removed or damaged will result in extra fee charges including bedding and linensnn hpt air castle llc reserves the right to refuse service cancel any reservations at any timenn no atvs or firearms are to be used on propertynn fires are to be burned in designated locations onlynn holdovers dont holdover we need to make sure our place is tidy for the next visitors and guests therefore please check out by 1100 am check in is at 400 pm if you do not check out by 1100 am you will be subject to a stayover penalty which is the market cost for the next night plus an additional cleaning fee and a 10 penalty on top of the market cost for the nightnnyour satisfactory stay is very important to us and we want to correct anything that is not in working order please report any issues or concerns to us prior to your first night stay we will make every effort to get it immediately fixed we cannot honor any requests for refund or compensation for any existing concerns or issues reported after the first nights stay

Title: Underground Hobbit Hole @MMV Ecovillage
Description: approximately 260 sq ft earth sheltered structure within our permaculturebased sustainable offgrid village it is one of a kind in architecture and theme with colored bottles built into the wall stained glass windows center tree pillar with atrium windows above and medieval celtic cross above the hobbit hole outside and atop give it a hobbit church feel the space the spacenheads up one of our hobbit front door hinges just broke darn it just a heads up it usually takes a couple weeks to get a welder out here for such fixitsnnthis is a primitive cabin it does have running water but no electricity you bring your own candles byoc common facilities kitchen and bath being shared with the larger community about 200 yds awaynnjust so everyone knows during heavy rains in our rainforest winter months sometimes the floor can get a little wet and the underground cave can be damp utilizing the wood stove is ideal please bring some firewood keeps it drier and warmernnbreakfast nook has a hobbit mushroom table and there is a comfy sky chair suspended for luxuriatingnnbuilt into the side of a mountain with a seasonal spring there are springs everywhere here in the mountainous rain forest that runs through the house on purpose so there is often the sound of a babbling brook in the hh november thru maynnif you are looking for a unique experience in a beautiful natural area and would like to experience life in an offgrid sustainable permaculturefocused ecovillage and all the rough roads dirt mud insects messes barking dogs mosquitos bees mice early morning roosters communal living composting toilets ongoing construction projects in remote wilderness then we invite you join us in our mountain villagennour property encompasses 160 acres of pristine natural wilderness in northern californias beautiful smith river canyon home of the only undammed river in the state lush fernencrusted hillsides slope down to countless springfed streams teeming with wildlife from cute caterpillars to also cute sometimes black bears accessible only by forestry road from scenic redwoon hwy ca199 this is an opportunity to experience our responsible natural relationship with mother earthnnthis location is very beautiful and quite remote so please be sure youve read through the full description and are prepared for certain elements of roughing it and adventure travel the village is also a workinprogress so we are likely to be working and there may be construction dirt and messes aroundnnamenitiesnnbedding it seems weird and unnecessary to me honestly but bending to some covid requests we are asking you to bring your own sheetssleeping bags etc there will be a mattress pad blanket and some sheets in a drawer if you really needwant them well call it a rustic cabin theme instead of a paranoid germophobe motifnnlighting electricity your cabin does not have electricity we try to keep a flashlight lantern andor candle available for your use but we recommend that you bring your own lightsnkitchen the outdoor kitchen about 200yds away from the hobbit hole has a small propane camping stove and plenty of pots pans and utensils for your use we do not have refrigeration but we do have a freezer with ice packs and coolers for storing foodnbathrooms we use composting toilets buckets with seats there is an indoor toilet in the bathhouse hot shower in the saunabathhouse it is about 200 yds on average away from most of our cabinsnlack of phone internet some verizon and us cellular service is available but att and tmobile do not service our area we do not have wifinnthe great outdoorsndomestic animals between the three dogs who run around at night chasing forest creatures springtime frog concerts and the earlyrising chickens it is likely that there will be some animal noises occurring at unpredictable moments during the night and daynwild animals there are various of these that live in the forest including skunks chipmunks foxes black bears and many birds and insects since we have dogs and people around the wild animals tend to keep their distance from the areas that we use if you are lucky you might spot a black bear on a hike they are basically like big raccoons and prefer to run away from humansnnif you are looking for a unique experience and up for rustic accommodations with a few offgrid perks we welcome you to join us in our mountain paradise guest access guest accessnthere is no key or lock to the hobbit hole just head up the road to the lower village common area the hobbit hole is the first structure before the treehouse and just past the parking area on the right someone will probably be there to show you about the common areas otherwise just make yourself at home its casual not formalnnthe hobbit house is quite private and the furthest away from amenities in our village we provide a portable composting toilet our dining hall bath house with shower bidet and fancier indoor toilet is about 200 yds awaynthere are plenty trails to hike a swimming hole and garden benches and porch swings to enjoy the viewnnthe host dan is sometimes around sometimes not often busy doing stuff so its all pretty straight forward check in yourself no key or lock make yourself at home community areas are obvious but theres almost always someone around other residents intern woofers to answer questions if you have themnnthere is a woodfired sauna usable november thru may large organic garden and edible landscaping chicken and goat pens other animal residents include dogs cats chickens fish and frogsnnfrom your cabin you are welcome to wander at will amongst our 160 acres of mostly steep forested land and enjoy the streams and waterfalls leading into little jones creek a stroll down the driveway and back along the forestry road is a beautiful hike in itself where you could easily spend all day in the company of only quiet woodland creaturesnnwe also offer custom bodywork sessions holistic chiropractic and massage more info available on request other things to note other things to notendriving here you do not need 4wd or any special vehicle to reach our property we drive in and out regularly in our small honda hatchback and have had hundreds of visitors drive up in their regular cars indeed the forestry road has a few potholes worth slowing to 5mph but otherwise can be driven at 20mph the rainy winter season creates puddles but actually better traction than in summer counter intuitively the bridge ramps narrow and all you need to do is drive it slowly consciously pretty easynnnote plenty of people have very relaxing enjoyable satisfying experiences here in our sustainable culture experiment but this happens only when reality exceeds expectations this is where i try to talk everyone out of coming to stay with us mmv is nothing like a resort or the marriott hotel think some crazy combination of campingglamping at a rugged mountainous offgrid remote farm and sustainable community there may be a compost pile outside your cabin after we weed the the beds around it our goats chickens or dogs may wake you in the morning there are all kinds of critters here including but not limited to spiders and bears and all in between we live here and make messes undertake all kinds of projects including big building projects sometimes it is not polished not always tidy although we really try convenient or even sometimes comfortable you may have to split your own firewood there is plenty of raw beauty and these forementioned functionalities are how it is here as we continue working towards shangri lanwe love our visitors and appreciate them if you want to understand more about our project visit join andor support us search maitreya mountain village

Title: Unique glamping experience near Ely & Cambridge
Description: a beautifully converted 1945 boat nestled within a private forest overlooking the beautiful open fenland countryside perfect retreat for couples looking to relax explore and visit the local towns located 15 minutes drive from ely and 30 minutes from cambridgennthe boat forms part of the overall space incorporating the bedroom with a king size double or two singles accompanied by a adjoining boat shack with an eclectic industrial style kitchen and bathroom with walkin shower the space the spacenthe historic 1945 boat originally called the anthony stevenson sailed out of penzance cornwall she has been converted in to a unique holiday retreat for couples the modern boat interior has been designed to complement the beautiful oak beams and larch planking it includes a double kingsize bed or two singles running water tea coffee and wifinnthe boat is positioned on a large deck made of reclaimed sleepers within a tranquil forest overlooking the beautiful fenland countryside the perfect retreat for couples to relax explore and enjoy the amazing sunsetsnnaccompanied by an adjoining boat shack style building made from many reclaimed materials which contains your private eclectic industrial kitchen and bathroom the kitchen contains a large vintage carpenters workbench with butler sink cooking hobs and fridge the spacious bathroom includes a private walkin shower toilet and basin if you would prefer to relax and bathe in nature on a fresh summers evening there is a secluded rolltop bath outside on the decknnthe boat is positioned on its own privately fenced three acre forest on our small holding where we live in a 1760 georgian property with our pet goats horses dogs and chickensnnwe try to live a eco friendly sustainable lifestyle and as such the boat runs entirely offgrid with renewable energy produced by our solar panelsnnif you have any questions about the boatshack or local area please send us a message via airbnb messenger

Title: Wee Nook- a Hobbit Hole
Description: wee nook is a 360 square foot living space with a full kitchen and bathroom it is tucked underground in the middle of the woods please come enjoy the woods farm animals trails pond and wide open space while youre herennas jrr tolkien said in a hole in the ground there lived a hobbit not a nasty dirty wet hole filled with the ends of worms and an oozy smell nor yet a dry bare sandy hole with nothing in it to sit down on or to eat it was a hobbithold and that means comfort the space the spacenwee nook is a 360 sq foot house with a full kitchen bath queen bed and sofa it boasts the most quiet spot on our property with a lovely pavilion for outdoor sitting in the middle of the woods the hobbit hole has a live roof and several eatable plantings around this space for enjoying in spring and summer months the fire pit in back allows guests to sit back and listen to nature while enjoying natures tv a firennguests can enjoy walking the trails around and through the property as well as visiting the pond for fishing and swimming the horses goats and highland cowsnnwe have a cream and white dog leeloo that has free range of the property she will most likely greet you upon your arrival or join you on your walk shes very sweet and social she just wants to meet everyone she will barknnthere is no internet or tv in this space there is also very little phone service we recommend bringing books games journals or small hobbies if weather is supposed to be rainy you might consider bringing a computer with movies downloaded on it or one with dvd capabilitiesnnwe are 15 miles from loretta lynns ranch waverly west of us 30 miles from dickson tn east of us and an hour from nashville eastnnother listings on the propertynhttpsabnbmeqlxqi0mysrnnhttpsabnbmelpjarfoysrnnhttpsabnbmebcgwuyjuprnnhttpsabnbmeky70ehhysr we do allow pets at our hobbit house we require that all pets are up to date on all flea and tick medication and a 40 pet fee that can be left upon your departure please bring a blanket or sheet to cover the furniture if your pup is accustomed to being on the sofa and bednplease keep animals on a leash if they are not responsive to their commands we do have farm animals that can hurt your animal if they feel threatened and vice versa also our dog leeloo and the neighborhood dog red have free range of the property both are very kind and love the opportunity to play if you are willingnncheck in is not strictly at 2pm as it is key code entry so whenever you arrive you can unlock the door and make yourself at homenncheck out is at 10amnnplease feel free to share any photos of your experience to our social media page rock n refuge rocknrefuge or rocknrefuge

Title: Leafy Greens Chiangmai : Mushroom M5
Description: leafy greens was built as a retreat center for our family and friends it is where people would visit to refreshing their souls and mind we work so hard to make this place to be one of the place that we can live in harmony with nature that is why the cob houses are the right choice for us not only the buildings are ecofriendly but also the garden is organic visit here you will be able to take a deep breath and enjoy the fresh air with organic environment it is a perfect place to getaway the space the spacenthis clay house was built for meditation course and it was designed for people to learn being with themselves that is why the function of the house is simple the house is 35 square meter with essential facilities it might be considered as a tiny house yet its comfortable for 3 people living together it got 2 stories2 futons on upper area and 1 bed on the ground floor the entire of the house was made by clay earth it is not only ecofriendly building but also good for our health we believe that our body will absorb good energy from the earth this means earthy house brings you close to nature and eliminate bad energy out it is very special house for us too special actually to keep it only for family and friends so we decided to share our paradise to everyone hope you would love it like we donndo not click on the airbnb link for directionsnplease only use our provided location to get here otherwise you might end up to other placesnnplease note that our place surrounded by naturenour place is full of flowers and trees you might see part of nature like birds crickets frogs lizards butterflies bugs and insects in our garden dont worry they are harmless however if you are afraid of these creatures our place might not suit you we do not offer refunds if those creatures comes into the house but we will check the house before guests check in to make sure there is no any bugs and we have insect net please keep it close every time during staynnplease note that clay house has a thick wall and the clay is blocked the internet reception so the internet might get slow sometimennplease note that we are not hotel so we do not have reception to help you 24hr however you would do our best to help you out to checkin it is very important to read out message thoroughly in order to have a smooth arrivennwe have cat in our property if you are allergic to cat or do not like them our place might not a good fit for younnif more people than the number declared at the time of booking stayed the room additional fee and penalty will be chargedchildren over 3 years old is also count as 1 personnnno commercial photography shoots allowed other things to note other things to noten check in after 1500 pm check out before 1100 amn no smoking in the house if guests break this rule we have to ask for cleaning 2000 thbn no durian in the housennwe can provide a pickup service to our place please book it in advancennwe have 5 bicycles you can use them for free

Title:
The best in tiny living!
TreehouseTopia
Description: the barkhouse is the only fully tree supported structure in the gatlinburgpigeon forge area located just minutes from all the major attractions in the area and only 5 miles from the greenbriar entrance to the gsmnp enjoy the seclusion of 25 acres of trees with amazing views of the river and the mountains plus all the comforts of homenthe barkhouse is engineered with a beautiful live white pine growing through the center of the treehouse enjoy stargazing through the skylight the space the spacenthe barkhouse has a kitchen area with a microwave refrigeratorfreezer combo toaster oven single electric burner and coffee maker enjoy charcoal grilling outdoors on your private deck or using the fire pit shared with the other treehouse located on the property spend time inside resting on yoga mats in the suspended cargo net area guest access guest accessna door code will be given prior to arrival to enter the premise once inside the treehouse the entire black circle locking mechanism will need to be turned clockwise or counterclockwise to unlock or lock the door other things to note other things to notenno pets

Title: Alianz Loft
Description: insta alianzloft 20 minutes from san jose airport first loft built by alianzcr it contains a decked terrace jacuzzi firepit rabbits garden two rooms two balconies entrance gate private garden private parking bbq area ac in each bedroom basketball court luxury beds and mountain views ideal for architecture lovers romantic dates or having a good time it is a unique space of his kind only pets that do not harm rabbits are allowed the space the spacenentrance with keyboard dont worry about arrival time only rented by the complete loft my relatives houses and our architectural office are 800ft 75mts away the property has big green areas hall for group activities bbq children playground nice gazebo and a small farm its a gated community will be weddings on the green areas at 300 feets away on weekends that takes 5 hours per day with fireworks at night sometimes no unauthorized meetings more than 4 or events are allowed all loud music must end by 9pm because the place has a patent for events until that time guest access guest accessnyou can use the property for walk use the playground gazebo recommended for romantics trampoline play with the horse and visit the farm other things to note other things to notenon saturdays or sundays there is an event room on the same property aprox 70 meters occasionally will be events of weddings with 4 consecutive hours of music all group activities must end at 9pm no loud noise is allowed after 9pm please
