Title: The Cabin at Fernwood Hills
Description: looking for time away to disconnect from the city and reconnect the tiny cabin 107 square feet at fernwood hills might be the perfect spot nestled in the heart of south western ontario in a beautiful forest quiet cozy romantic in the lush sanctuary of naturennnote no washroom in the cabin but one a short distance up the lanennnew check out our airbnb profile to book our other cabin bracken listing or the studio loftnncheck out more about fernwood hills fernwoodhillscom the space the spacenwe started off offering this tiny space for day use so people just like you could come away from their office or their work and clear their mind just a couple years ago there were several couples that asked us if they could stay overnight and have the experience of quieting their minds their heads were spinning because they just needed to disconnect from all the chaos and for a day or overnight listen to their breathing and look out the windows to nature and wildlife here you are in the forest but not the dense part and it overlooks green space and trails retreat rewind and refuel by yourself or with your significant other maximum of two people and both must be adultsnimportant to note no washroom in the cabin there is a nice washroom with a shower but it is not inside the cabin it is a two minute drive up the lane or if you decide to walk it will take longernnyou have the option if you want to add on food delivered to your door there might be restrictions on availability due to covid or allergies or other situations just keep on reading and see further belownfernwood hills offers retreats for the individual and small groups wedding ceremonies proposals and elopements and certainly anniversaries as well we can help you with any of these or other ideas you have for your stay why not let us help you make a total experience we would love to hear from you ideas birthdays anniversaries proposals getaways surprise outings let us help you create the experiencenadd on optionsnromantic night date night celebration make this a part of your experiencenadd on option 175 paid when you are here via cash or etransnpretty tiny lights and flowers in season in your space and a lovely food grazing board consisting of several cheeses crackers fruit veg in season nachosdip applescaramel stuffed mushrooms pulled pork or beef on a bun a few other hot apps hot home made soup in season and a home made dessertndelivered to your space upon arrival some allergies cannot be accommodated must be ordered and confirmed before your arrivalnnplease check with us before ordering as some things may not be available at certain timesnthe tiny cabin is in fact tiny at only a little bit over 100 square feet it is intended for quiet relaxation and not for camping or parties or events we are happy to let you have a small campfire in the provided fire pot and there is a lot of firewood around you can collect weather permitting if the weather is windy or has been dry this is not possiblennote to photographers creatives and other business ownersnour space has become popular with photographers and other business owners for its natural light with large windows and we love working with them however this space is not to be booked through airbnb for business uses including use as a photography studio or a work studio if you are having others or clients come in to have business with you those inquiries are welcome and we do that but it must be an inquiry through our fernwoodhillscom website and details will be given and pricing and availabilitynyou might also want to have our photographer take photos of you for a short time example engagement or proposal then that is allowed to be requested here through airbnb if you need clarification on this or any other questions please let us knownthis listing is only for 12 people to book this space no guest or person under 18 and one of them has to be over 25 all other inquiries will be directed to go to our websitennwe are an agriculture property as well as a private park focused on regenerative agriculture and sustainable agriculture practices focused on health wellness education and events related to these activities helping to expose and immerse individuals and groups in nature and allowing others to better connect with and understand the natural world around them we are passionate about what we do here and the opportunities we have to help others each day through our propertynromance quiet and cozy are keywords that describe our spotneven if you are single the importance may not be on romance but certainly on the quiet mindfulness and disconnecting one of our passions is personal growth and understanding yourself better as well as others we want you to be able to ignite your dream again believe in yourself again and believe you make a difference in this world you were made for a special purpose and we hope our quiet spaces help you to discover this in a deeper way no live flame candles in any of our spacesncant wait to meet you guest access guest accessnyou have access with a key to the cabin it is a tiny space just 100 square feet but has large windows and is very uptodate and kept well the setting is incredibly relaxing in the woods but overlooking greenspace not in the dense woods not totally remote yet private but rather just in a very relaxing green space area it is right off closeby trails so access to the forest is just steps away in the winter months when the public washrooms are closed the main lovely washroom is just a two minute drive on the property up the lane up until recently we rented the cabin out for 68 hours dayuse for relaxation writing reading painting rebalancing or whatever quiet you need it is still available to be rented for day use however many people have asked to have the overnight cabin experiencennwe heat it all winter with an electric heater however we want to encourage you when it is very cold to bring a sleeping bag or extra blankets and extra warm clothes so you will be warm all the timennif you would like to upgrade your booking you have a couple optionsnis this a surprise for a special someone or for each other or are you coming by yourself and you would just like to relax and enjoy some food without having to go out and get it allnnromantic night date night celebration make this a part of your experiencennnnotherwise you still have the option of just the airbnb booking of the space either way just want to tell you about our add on option if someone wants it we do have to know about allergies at booking we do accommodate vegetarians and but are not doing gluten free or vegan at the momentnjust let us know if youre ok with doing just the space or if youd like anything added onnplease check with us during covid as to the format for the food offerings all food will be brought to your spacenotherwise you still have the option of just the airbnb booking of the space either way just want to tell you about our add on option if you would like it we do have to know about allergies at booking to make sure it can be accommodatednjust let us know if youre ok with doing just the space or if youd like anything added onnnjust write and let us know by messaging us when you are booking other things to note other things to notenwashrooms are not in this building but are nearby a short distance this space is designed for day use or overnight we have a double bed in the cabin and it sleeps two cozy again please note it is not for parties camping or events it is only for one person or max 2 but as noted already it is a disconnect spot to enjoy quietnit is also important to note that we are a total smoke freevape free location and sorry no pets because of allergies to other guests

Title: Belonging in the Heart of the City
Description: shell house is inspired by the seashell form in nature and is concerned to offer our guests a unique experience you can enjoy the outdoor fireplace on its spacious patio or you can lie in the hammock inside and watch the sky we are waiting for you at the shell house for an unforgettable experience considering your every need the space the spacena quiet nest of your own where you can rest in the city our home is on about 1 acre of private land next to the main street you wont want to come out of your shell which absorbs you with its unique design guest access guest accessnbirthdaynmarriage proposalnanniversary nbarbecue norganizationnand you may contact for different eventsnour guests have full use of our garden and house other things to note other things to notenwhen coming to the location it is necessary to enter the dirt road to the right from the foot of the high speed train bridge 50 m away from the black sea market on gecit street

Title: Magical Hobbit Treehouse Nestled in the Jungle
Description: experience your childhood dreams of staying in a treehouse even better since this one is inspired by the hobbit movies with round doors to enter and to access the deck imagine the adventure of arriving to your hobbit treehouse by crossing a suspension bridge 15 meters upnnwake up to a symphony of bird songs and the occasional view of monkeys order room service from our restaurant and enjoy it on the deck or rooftop terrace later go for a guided trek to a nearby secluded waterfall the space the spacenmy husband and i own one of balis most unique boutique ecoresorts sebatu sanctuary which includes the hobbit treehouse and eight other distinctive accommodationsnnweve designed the hobbit treehouse for adventurers with oneofkind features that includes a suspension bridge that leads to the rooftop terrace a loft for kids at least 7 years old a queensized swing sofa on the ground floor a balcony to enjoy breakfast with a view a semioutdoor bathroom and a bedroom with arched windows on three sides providing views of the surrounding forest and terraced rice paddiesnnbegin your day with a sumptuous breakfast choosing from an array of balinese and western dishes prepared by our inhouse chef room service is available and you can dine either on your balcony or go even higher up to the rooftop terrace and enjoy sublime views of the terraced rice paddies across the valley at the end of the day tuck yourself into a topofline queensize bed 400 thread count cotton sheets our boutique ecoresort is compliant with the green globe and earth check sustainability standards to reduce our environmental footprint the treehouse doesnt have air conditioning but does have a high quality ceiling fan were 600 meters above sea level and nights are typically quite cool

Title: UNIQUE SUMATRAN KARO HOUSE
Description: special monthly ratesnnour bali based jungle creation space and home for allaround creatives and life explorers welcome to be a guest in a tropical vibe stay create rest enjoy and meet each othernnthis 60year old traditional sumatran karo house made of eternal teak wood is a very special holiday accommodation for an adventurous couple the space the spacenthis 60year old traditional sumatran house made of eternal teak wood is painstakingly renewed by hand without missing a bit of its authenticitynnthe declined walls were originally meant to keep the wild tigers away the floor lifted off the ground was supposed to save food kept indoors and the little path around the house was made especially for guarding spirits of the householdnnthis unique house is beautifully decorated with rugs batik cushions and furniture made of recycled wood a very special holiday accommodation for an adventurous couplennall the facilities are situated in a next building but are used privately by the tenants of the house

Title: Eclectic Cliffside Den with Hanging Living Area
Description: this underground den offers a one of a kind experience relax in the giant outdoor net bed or literally hangout in the suspended living room or enjoy the cliffside bbq and fire pit area whatever you choose to do every option has magnificent views of the ocean and the dynamic rolling hills that were shaped by itnit is next to another airbnb please keep in mind this might not be a place for kids nor older people we have a lot of stairs the space the spacenrooms are not separate by walls the 2 queen beds are the sofas in the living room they are pull from the wall when you need to use them other things to note other things to notenwe charge 50dlls per petnif we find your pets hair on the blankets or furniture an extra charge of 20dlls will be charged for cleaning pets are not allowed on furniture or bedsnnwe have a gas refrigerator it is not electric so it does not cool like an electric one it cools enough to keep the food in the best condition it is not for making ice or having frozen fishnnplease make sure to read the house rules thank you

Title: Gawthorne's Hut - BEST UNIQUE STAY - Airbnb 2021
Description: gawthornes hut is a luxurious architect designed off grid eco hut just for couples it is the newest of wilgowrahs unique country escapes built to capture stunning views it provides guests with peace privacy and a sense of isolation inclusions king bed full bath shower flushing toilet and kitchenette gawthornes hut now has day time air conditioning wilgowrah is a historic and picturesque rural property well known for its first escape toms cottage the space the spacenthe space is warm and inviting with natural timbers used extensively throughout the large windows and doors capture the views of the beautiful mudgee valley and the natural surroundings gawthornes is the perfect romantic escape destination licence number licence numbernpidstra6327

Title: Hobbiehouse - tiny house on Fjone
Description: have you dreamed of staying in a hobbit house but with luxury the opportunity can be found at fjone in nissedal municipalitynnthe cabin is equipped with kitchen 2 hotplates fridge sink and everything you need coffee machine is ready for use beds are made up and towels are readynnthis summer you can enjoy sandy beaches by the lake nisser marked mountain hikes climbing museum norways smallest cable ferry and much more this winter there are nice crosscountry skiing opportunities and there is a short way to vrdal and gautefall ski center the space the spacenour hobbit house is one of very few of these minihouses in norway the house is private but easily accessible spacious parking space is located right by the house natural outdoor area with fireplaces and cozy seating within 10 minutes walking distance there is a sandy beach otherwise good hiking opportunities in a direct area the nearest shops are in either nissedal ferry over nisser or treungen 2 miles cafrestaurant and beer brewery we have at fjone guest access other things to note other things to note

Title: Architectural wonder in the woods
Description: unique experience cleansanitize and secludednenjoy a weekend or a few days ecofriendly retreat in an architectural geometric masterpiece on 30 preserved acres just minutes from all that rhinebeck and the hudson valley have to offernthe house is an open plan and though it has zero bedrooms it can sleep 3 the space the spacenat the entry porch an orb of wood carved out of the house will welcome you into a play of geometry situated around one main volume and open to the second level the kitchen is placed in the centernthere is a futon queen bed 1 sleeper futon sofa one single futon bedninstead of fossil fuel the house is heated geothermally instead of grid power the house has electricity from the sun we are sensitive to the environment and respect its ecological balancenthere is a hybrid heatcold unit on the2nd floornthe wood stove is highly efficient and keep the space warm in the hudson valley winter guest have access to a large supply of wood stacked outside the house tip about the stove build the fire like a tipi and add wood in a vertical position to make sure the fire will be strong and well maintainnthe design allows the air to flow when all the doors and windows are open in addition the floor heat is connected to be cooling in the summernoutside of the kitchen there is a dinning table with 4 chairs and a charcoal bbq we do not provide charcoal or starter nwe do not accept pets of any kind guest bringing pets will be charge an extra 200 cleaning fee

Title: One of only three Silos in Tennessee on AirBnB!!!
Description: turners grain silo 25 minutes from downtown nashville this converted grain silo is absolutely one of a kind in fact we are only 1 of only a few silos in the united states offered by airbnbpretty cool tucked away among the trees youll be able to relax in our unique home we are just far enough away from the hustle bustle of the city to rest your mind body but close enough to be able to enjoy all that our great community has to offer the space the spacensecluded we are not in a neighborhood the inside of the silo is not at all like the exterior we offer modern conveniences with contemporary style this labor of love took 5 months we have put our hearts into every aspect of this silo spray foam insulated with central heat air conditioning the kitchen is stocked with pots pans cooking utensils dishes a 2burner stovetop microwave fullsized fridge an assortment of spices lots of snacks including breakfast items are provided all the toiletries one could imagine are available as well as fullsized shampoo conditioner body washhigh quality too not the offbrand stuff we hope our guests enjoy the serenity of the location ask that respect is given to other guests on the property because of the uniqueness of the structure no children under the age of 13 are allowed to stay

Title: Pine Needle Treehouse at Tudor in the Pines
Description: tudor in the pinesnnhidden amidst the dense foliage of baguio citys pinewood forest tudor in the pines is a remarkable estate in the philippines compromising of seven 7 unique residences within a gated property accommodating a maximum of 30 guests with the convenience of multiple road accesses to and from the city and to different highland provinces of the cordilleras tudor in the pines is perfectly located as your home base to travel the northern wonders of the philippines the space the spacenthe spacentudor in the pines features a variety of amenities exclusive to our guest during your stay in our calm and peaceful estate stroll through our private garden enjoy a picnic with a fully equipped barbecue pit share stories around our roaring fire pit have a tea in our glasshouse lounge and make memories with our lush pine forest sceneries majestic mountain views and breathtaking sky views from our black towernnpine needle treehousendwell amongst the pine trees across a hanging bridge and timber deck 30 feet above the ground is quite an experience for the adventurousnnthe pine needle treehouse features full view of expansive pine tree forestsnnimmerse yourselves among the fresh pine trees across the hanging bridge or dine in the timber deck 30 feet above the ground a truly unique experience for the adventurous within the gated estate of tudor in the pines the pine needle treehouse can accommodate a maximum of 2 guestsnnguest reminder expect some movement to the treehouse because it is attached to the hanging bridge

Title: Cozy Hobbit House on charming Bainbridge Island
Description: in a hole in the ground there lived a hobbit not a nasty dirty wet hole filled with the ends of worms and an oozy smell nor yet a dry bare sandy hole with nothing in it to sit down on or to eat it was a hobbithole and that means comfort jrr tolkiennhandbuilt by our family this warm and cozy inhill cabin located in the lower area of our property is something right out of a tolkien novel beautiful territorial views very lgbtq and bipoc friendly hope you enjoy our shire the space the spacenthis one room hobbit hole has everything in its 75x155 cozy comfy convertible bedcouch complete with linens a small table with 2 chairs for playing games and eating puzzles games snacks hot water kettle coffee maker bluetooth speaker electric fireplace warm and cozy books sketchpad with colored pencils and more a rustic wooden floor with some paint splatters and a braided rug give you a feeling of comfort and home on site we have a private portable bathroom complete with handwashing station and an outside combination fire pit and charcoal barbecue with a grill top and smores sticks provided so you can cook over a wood fire or coals and an outdoor table and chairs that are super comfortablennthe house itself is heated insulated and has working electricityoutlets for computer or phone charger clean bedding and pillows provided washed in fragrancefree detergent between each guest we provide a full water jug with spigot hot water kettle teapot assorted teas an empty growler to use 2 pint glasses and 2 mugs private area of the yard with plenty of room to relax we have a disc golf goal and discs to use as wellnnfirewood is available for purchase onsite for 7milk crate full this comes with a kindling kitnnterritorial views of the tree line and sunset views to die for we are located near meigs park as well as a 10minute walk from manitou beach and an easy bike ride to the ferry that goes to seattle 2 miles from the grand forest and 3 miles from battle point park we are exactly 3 miles from the ferry terminal in a convenient midisland locationnnneed to know managing expectationsna note on the bathroom the hobbit hole is small and will not fit a bathroom or plumbing your nearby private portable restroom about 150 feet away is cleaned thoroughly between each guest and serviced pumped out weekly we consider our listing to be glampingnalso our property borders a local 2 lane highway and you can expect road noise mostly during the day and evening while it is a private setting you can expect to hear the road weekends and evenings it is quieter and when the door is closed it is quietnthere is no cooking inside the hobbit house however we have a combination fire pit and charcoal bbq that you can use to cook on bring your own dishesnnwe are on insta hobbithouse98110 and there are videos of the space to give you a solid look at what is in the spacennon you tube we have a nice video giving a tour of the property and the hobbit hole look for hobbit house bainbridge islandnnthe hobbit house is strictly limited to 2 guests or 2 adults and a small child that can share the bed the bed is a queen size and we cant allow sleeping on the floor as the door opens inwards and is a safety concern howevernadditional guests are welcome to bring a tent and camp outside for 20tent up to 6 additional guests or 2 tents whichever is smaller let me know when you are booking that youd like to bring additional guests and we will adjust the costs accordinglynnwe look forward to hosting you guest access guest accessnyour own private parking space is about 50 yards from the hobbit house we have wheelbarrows available to use to for your belongings portable potty with hand washing station about 50 yards from the hobbit house other things to note other things to notenthis is an unusual listing please read the description thoroughlynadditional tent camping available for guestsncooler provided arrange for ice if desirednwe have wheelbarrows for bringing down your belongingsnwe do not have wifi as the hobbit house is built into the ground weve found cell phones work just fine here

Title: 'Ndida (The True Bushveld Experience)
Description: unique secluded and very close to the crocodile river ndida is the ideal natureescape for those who enjoy privacy quality and style this is the true bushveld experiencennthe river is just a 1min walk so listenout for hippo and elephant by day and lion and hyena by nightnntwo traditional bedrooms 1 queen 2 single beds with another queen on the mezzanine house sleeps 6 two toilets 1 bath and 3 showers 2 outdoornnthe resident bushbuck warthog and bushbaby await your arrival the space the spacenarchitectural gem set deep amongst the trees and only a 1min walk from the crocodile river and the worldreknown kruger national parknnspanning two 2000m2 plots and bordered on all sides by large areas of pristine bushparkland the house offers a level of privacy that is difficult to match anywhere in marloth parknnthe house also sits on the confluence of two dry riverbed systems so is completely surrounded by dense junglelike riparian woodland providing muchneeded shade in summer and exceptional privacy allyearroundnnbut these tangled vines hoisted between mature leadwood knobthorn and marulas dont only benefit humans theyre also fantastic cover for birds and for all the other animals that call ndida home eg eastern yellowspotted nicator giant plated lizard and the nights most enthusiastic guest and the cutest the lesser bushbaby who love banana btwnnthe heated outdoor showers are a must even during the mild lowveld winter its a true privilege being out there whilst a troop of banded mongoose scurry past on their daily raid searching for insects reptiles and rodentsnnone of the best locations within marloth park very close to the crocodile river but without compromising on privacy again ndida is the true bushveld experiencennndida launched on 29th october 2018 so almost everything inside the house is pretty much still brand new and also topquality please let us know in your review if theres anything weve missed from our inventory we want it to be perfect other things to note other things to notenimportant marloth park has a very strict no noise policy this means no loud music no parties no shouting etc lawenforcement and the community policing forum respond to noise complaints immediately with a fine of r3500nnplease note power outages loadshedding is a very serious problem in south africa and marloth park is also being badly affected please make sure you bring your own torches and that you locate the candles provided as soon as you arrive at ndidannalthough the bush poses its own dangers and threats to adults snakes scorpions etc it is obviously even riskier for little ones in addition see photos the property has a partially exposed mezzanine level stairs without a banister a raised swimming pool and raised decked patio without handrails so please please keep a close eye on littler childrennnalso proper wifi coverage hasnt reached the area yet so sadly wifi isnt an option also for now we have decided to keep the environment as natural as possible so there is no tv or dvd either however if our valued guests are critical about this in their reviews we will obviously do something about it

Title: Pool, air conditioning in everything. Itamambuca. Nova!!
Description: for quotation please enter the correct date standard high house 22nd street 3 suites published in archdaily magazinen930410houseinplaceitamambucavidalandsantannanwifi fiber 120 megasnair conditioning in everything small outdoor pool without heating only the jacuzzis of the master suites heat normally enter dates because the price the site shows is only an average for the year each date has a value forbidden petnallotment with rules against noise after 20 hours the space the spacenthere are 3 suites 2 of them master with hot tub double shower closed third suite on the second floor access by santos dumont stairs full kitchen weber breath barbecueoutdoor swimming pool without heatingnattention to check and check out times there are no daily socks to get in early book the night beforenwe do not accept pets dogs and cats of any size or breednfailure to comply will result in an immediate charge of 1 night 1 cleaning fee it is possible to hire the employee during the stay linen optional laundry fees apply please consult guest access guest accessnentire house exclusive to the guest air condin all environments small outdoor swimming pool without heating only the jacuzzis in the master suites heat up normally self check in other things to note other things to noten1 step to access the housennrules in the subdivision regarding noise especially after 8 pm subject to a fine deducted from the depositnnplease be aware of the checkin and checkout times before booking to arrive early book the night before there are no daily socksnndoes not accept pet marries almost all blank fabricsnnthe final cleaning fee is included but it is possible to hire the employee during the staynnbed linens and bath linens optional for a lananderia fee paid per pixnlet me know about your choicennattention to strict cancellation policy bookings made after march 15 are nonrefundable because of the pandemic

Title: Phoenix Earthship - Experience off-grid luxury
Description: the phoenix official earthship cannot be compared to any other rental in this world this homes jungle greenhouse creates its own microclimate in the high mountain desert and is completely offthegrid exquisitely detailed and outfitted with modern amenities the outer greenhouse features towering banana trees grape vines birds turtles and even a fish pond the inner living spaces are cozy and quiet the phoenix earthship was featured in 2014 as one of lonely planets top ten ecostays the space the spacenthe phoenix is a work of sustainable art that has been featured in countless television shows and print articles besides the two bedrooms bathrooms kitchen and common area it featuresnna teeming greenhousenfish pondnbirdsnfood gardennearthshipinspired chicken coop and runnoutdoor fire pit with seatingnbbq grill and outdoor eating and sitting areannall of which exist within the phoenix complex regardless of the time of yearnna cozy fireplace with water fountain free wifi and tv with netflix are also available and like everything in the phoenix completely solarpowered

Title: ‚ÄúWhimsical Stone Abode‚Äù - Boston Magazine
Description: the best possible combination between the postcardperfect cliffside suites of santorini greece and a hobbit housethe white stone cottage flows around 900 sf which contains a nice bathroom full kitchen and plenty of natureinspired furnishings boston magazine travelnnyou are the only guests in the domes which are attached to our home a stone cottage with eye brow architecture enjoy gardens meadow woods and mountain viewsnnwe are 25 minutes from manchester and bennington vt the space the spacenthe best possible combination between the postcardperfect cliffside suites of santorini and a hobbit house boston magazinenyou will be the only guests the entire place is yours the domes feature free wifi a kitchen with microwave stoveoven refrigerator drip and single serve coffee maker tea snacks and a bathroom with heated tile floor the bedroom has a queen size bed and the full bathroom includes a showertub heated tile floor hairdryer soap and shampoo you will enjoy sitting by the thermostatically controlled propanefueled wood stove when there is a seasonal chill in the air guest access guest accessnthe domes are completely private you alone have use of the interconnected domes we live in a completely separate living space outside you have access to an outdoor gas grill patio and our 10 acres of woodland and meadows take a walk on the road that leads to the town hall just over a mile away other things to notencheck out our guidebookngetting around 10 minutes to arlington vt 25 minutes to manchester vt 25 minutes to bennington vt and less than an hour to saratoga springs ny 45 hours to nyc and under 4 hours to boston the battenkill river is 3 minutes away for swimming fishing kayaking and canoeing hiking the base or up to the summit of the highest peak in southern vermont mount equinox is a popular activity afterward head into manchester at the base of the mountain a great place for brews dining art galleries and shopping the appalachian trail is within a 5 minute drive from manchester in the winter season downhill and xcountry skiing are within an hour the two closest downhill mountains are bromley 35 minutes and stratton 50 minutes

Title: 360 degree Himalayas view
Description: heavot caves not all those who wander are lost will let you enjoy and live a true fairy tale experience it is part of a retreat located at a distance of only 10 km from shimla this place is personification of tranquility surrounded by lush green mountains located perfectly to give you a 360 degree view of the himalayan mountain ranges rarely do you find a retreat that is embodied by the essence of nature taking your mind off everything that is apparent enjoy peace and serenity the space the spacencomfy dome shaped room with a lawn in front and surrounded by himalayan mountain range our place is surrounded by the whistling pines and the room are situated in the middle of a green valley we are far away from the city hustle bustle you will enjoy an exceptional beauty of landscape including birds and a great variety of flora the scenic view the refreshing air and the dazzling sight of the sun descending behind the mountains adds to the solace it is a perfect getaway and if you are looking for rejuvenation and a surreal experience this should be your holiday destination space consists of a bedroom with an attached bathroom the bathrooms are well tiled and fitted with modern sanitary ware everyday toiletries and bath linens are provided the room has a wall mounted flat screen led tv and a big lawn in front guest accessnone bedroom in a beautiful resort lawn restaurant small nature trails around the property parking area other things to note

Description: in all seasons it feels good sweet refuge in winter sunny in summernlocated near the restaurant le chalet suisse in balmoral on the heights of spa 3km the lair de l ours will be the ideal starting point magnificent walks relaxation at the thermes 2km a part of golf 500m or a visit to the famous spa circuit francorchamps the space the spacenthe den includes a living area with a bed for 2 people 140cm a fridge an induction hob and a private bathroom with sink shower and toilet heating is electric 1 convector in the bedroom and one in the bathroom private parking is available other things to note other things to notenpossibility of eating in our restaurant le chalet suisse open thursday to sunday and ordering breakfast daily from 8 30 am to 10 am

Title: Iconic Union SKYHOUSE with Hood Canal views
Description: iconic 1970s pnw home on alderbrook creek with skyroom views of the hood canal and olympic mountains surround yourself in nature with two levels of wraparound decks or walk amongst the treetops on the skyroom balcony this oneofakind home sleeps 11 with three bedrooms and 35 baths perfect for a group retreat family getaway or reunionnn please read all listing descirptions photo captions before booking instantly to make sure the space suits your needs the space the spacenrecently renovated with modern comforts and decor this house retained many of the original 1970s fixtures and designs that have been preserved to keep this home as unique as when it was built at over 2400 square feet the skyhouse features several options for gathering indoors or out all sleeping spaces have doors and no bedrooms share walls allowing for privacy even for large groups the primary bedroom has a king bed and full sized sofa bed there are two sleeping spaces on the lower level a pull out sofa cot in the rec room which has a door for privacy and a cozy bedroom with a king bed there is also a guest suite with a queen bed private entrance 34 bathroom and wet bar the guest suite master bedroombathroom kitchen and dining room are all on the main level for guests who avoid stairs the climb to the top of the tower is about 98 steps depending on where you start your climb at the top the skyroom features 8 foot sliders with views to the north east and west enjoy views from the skyrooms wraparound balcony there is a half bath just below the skyroom so you can enjoy the views as long as youd like

Title: Heavenly Highlands Mountain Property
Description: a house surrounded by spectacular views vegetation and hiking trails in the middle of the mountains of the central valley wind farm it is more than a house it is a unique experience in costa rica you can relax in front of a firepit with breathtaking views of the pacific oceannfor breakfast you can enjoy collecting fresh eggs from our chicken coop totally a unique experiencenheavenly highlands is your choice the space the spacena house surrounded by expectacular views guest access guest accessnprivate hikenfire pitnchicken coop other things to note other things to notenkey informationnnalthough it was very difficult to have internet on the property we did it but on some occasions when there is very heavy rain and dense fog the signal weakens however it is momentary and they are the perfect times to disconnect and enjoy naturennthe access road to the house is 100 safe however the street is narrow and very steep so it is advisable to drive slowly and with caution the last kilometer is not paved and it is necessary to come in an suv 4x4 is not necessary to facilitate driving in short it is the price of being in the middle of nature

Title: Peacock Tiny House near Las Vegas
Description: we have a unique tiny home located in sandy valley nv one hour outside south las vegas off us 15 this is one of two tiny home on a dude ranch with horseback riding cattle drives and rodeo events when available search sandy valley ranch come stay at our beautiful desert hideaway enjoy the tranquility of the mojave desert and gaze at the sea of stars we are near death valley tecopa hotsprings and goodsprings home of the famous pioneer saloon the space the spacenour tiny house the peacock has a flushing toilet shower with hot water a stove a fridge and a comfortable queen size bed the couch also pulls out to become a bed it is a little larger then a twin but smaller then a queen you can enjoy watching the sunset and sitting under a sea of stars from our roof top pationwe do allow pets but charge a 10 pet fee per night we ask that you do not leave your pet un attended if you travel off property we proudly donate a portion of our pet fees to the spca guest access guest accessnplease let us know if you are going to be arriving after checkin so we can give you instructions other things to note other things to notenbreakfast lunch or dinner can be served in the ranch house next to the tiny house if you are interested in any meals please let terry the ranch host know you can also book a horse back back ride through the desert rob and sandi built own the tiny house and on most days are there for your assistance it is the most beautiful peace of property with happy helpful staff if needed other wise sit back enjoy and come and go as you please there is 1000 pet fee per nightm

Title: The Bunkhouse at Love's Hideaway
Description: unique stay in the bunkhouse grain bin this bunkhouse is a 15 foot round grain silo that has been transformed into a loft one bedroom tiny home this tiny home does have natural well water the property is shared with the property owner although you will not see very much of them they will drive in and out of the driveway on the 27 acres you have your own seating outside with a fire pit area if youre traveling for business or just a nice getaway come and stay at loves hideaway the space the spacenthis one bedroom is a tiny home though this is unique the height upstairs is 5 7 when you get to the top of the stairs so you do have to lean over so you do not hit your head on the ceiling light there is a tv upstairs and one downstairs there is a washer dryer combo the home has everything you need sheets towels dishes coffee pot a keurig kcup silverware pot and pans due to events that have happened with our farm animals pets are not allowed anymore that includes service animals we are very sorry for this inconvenience also due to some recent events with some of our guests we do now have ring cameras that look on the parking near the tiny house this is just to see when people come and go there are some trail cams on the walking trails back in the woods to take pictures of the dears other things to note other things to note

Title: Enchanted Tree House Concept off of Main st. Tub!
Description: imagine being immersed in a small enchanted forest only 100s of feet off of main street nestled into live oak trees that gently sway in the breeze under dark skies with bright stars and curated to both inspire joy and create presencennwelcome to our little magical treehouse and landscape resort in fredericksburg the amazing stays in our secluded forest are only minutes to all of the beautiful shops cafes restaurants bars and vineyardsnna magical stay that we hope you will love the space the spacenawe inspiring designed modern tree house concept surrounded by a magical forest imagine laying in the soaker tub perched into the forest as wild turkeys and deer stroll past you a fire pit looking at the stars or relaxing on your private decknnthe unit demonstrates immaculate views and a nature immersive experience that will be both exciting and calming thousands of live oak trees across the property manicured paths whimsical evening lights and friendly wildlife bring a sense of wonder and serenity to the spacennnour whimsical property offers a community of eight unique structures from treehouses to safari tents to geodesic domes scattered about through a 13 acre enchanted forest in townnnprivacy inside of the units and after nightfall you should feel very secluded as each unit is 50200 feet apartnnduring the day you may see people walking around general maintenance happening etc but if you refer to our reviews the experience is amazing

Title: Area 51 Futuro house
Description: free pickup in new tesla starting from late marchnthis amazing 1974 futuro house 1 of only 50 in the world has just been fully restored and is ready to offer you an amazing experience now the spaceship is massive and offers genuine rare furniture from designers such as verner panton and luigi colani the property has a pool spa sauna outdoor showerand a 1968 concord caravan for extra sleeping if required we are also in the process of building a gamesroomgym you will be amazed the space the spacen25 minutes from christchurch cbd and christchurch airport amazing 1974 futuro house which has been restored meticulously to its original condition with no expense spared beautiful large landscaped grounds with swimming pool spa pool outdoor sauna and outdoor shower plus many other amazing retrovintage items scattered around the property including the 1970s80s mcdonalds playground you will feel like you have been transported back in time yet into the future guest access guest accessnelectric entrance gates into the property very private and secure other things to note other things to notenfree pickup and drop off from christchurch airport in a brand new black tesla if you book for two nights or more this service will be available beginning at the end of march

Title: slube am Stadthafen Neustrelitz // slube Home
Description: excellent location at neustrelitz harbour yet an exceptional adventure ambience the slubes not only offer functional comfort but also a new experience with an original atmosphere the space the spacenmore comfortable than thought and at the same time an intelligent space miracle thats what the slube home could be called after all who would have thought that there would be a double bed seating areas a table and a separate bathroom with shower and toilet in the twostorey slubesnnthe minihotel has sealed windows is sound and heatinsulated and can also be heated comfortably on cooler daysnnin the lower area there is a seating area and a small but fully equipped bathroom a staircase leads to the upper floor of the sludge on which the double bed is locatednnfree wifi is available everywhere in addition you can control light and heating in the slube via your own mobile phone with the slube appnnif you are looking for modern accommodation in a unique atmosphere slubes am stadthafen neustrelitz is the place to be

Title: Guard Tower #2 with Pool
Description: the ultimate tiny house experience featured on hgtv the castle house estate guard tower brings tiny home living to another level located in the heart of joshua tree and minutes from the national park this unique medieval piece of architecture blends indooroutdoor living with an emphasis on entertaining the castle house estate is situated on eight picturesque acres surrounded by many more private undeveloped acres the space the spacenguard tower 2nn3 levels 1 bed 120 sqfnnthe castle house guard tower is a custom three level living space loft each piece of furniture has been custom made to fit this unique round space which includes a queen sized bed in the loft did we mention 1500 thread count sheets and pure care plush memory foam pillowsnnthe full glass door and windows have been placed strategically to catch the desert lightnnfor outside adventurers step up to the rooftop hatch to enjoy your views or bring your sleeping bags and sleep under the stars weather permittingnneach tiny home includes it own outdoor wood burning firepit and two chairs perfect for enjoying the outside elements of joshua tree where you can enjoy a few cold ones and roast smores each tiny home includes it own outdoor wood burning firepit grill top and two chairs perfect for enjoying the outside elements of joshua tree where you can enjoy a few cold ones and roast smores included in each tower is a minirefrigerator and nespresso coffee maker the restroom facility is just 20 steps away and has two private toilets two hand sinks and urinal two outside showers and one outdoor sink nothing can be compared to showering outside with 365 degree views of the national parknninstagram thecastlehouseestate

Title: Moleiro Shelter
Description: classified as a national monument this emblematic peniche mill has since 1895 and for decades had agricultural and industrial use currently completely renovated and under the name shelter of the miller it is intended to be a welcoming space for tourists from all over the world providing unique memories to those who stay in it to complete the experience guests also receive breakfast delivered to the doornnthe perfect place for those looking for a different experience the space the spacenwhen booking a stay at the shelter guests will have access to the entire space ie 3 floors kitchen and living room bathroom bedroom 1 and bedroom 2 guest access guest accessnguests will have access to the entire mill 3 floors its surrounding area and parking other things to note other things to notendiversified breakfast delivery every morning licence number licence numbern79462al

Title: Beautiful, Secluded Private Mountain-Top Modern Retreat, Dog-Friendly with Hot Tub and AMAZING Views
Description: retreat to your own private modern oasis with the best views in all of tennessee perched on top a private 36acre hilltop the highest outside the park belltop offers unparalleled views of wears valley and the smoky mountains with 360degree views from floortoceiling windows and a rooftop walkway you wont miss a single sunset unplug and unwind as you sit in your private hot tub or curl up in front of the stunning openhearth woodburning fireplace perfect for families or friends the space the spacenthis custombuilt modern 4 bedroom25 bath house sleeps up to 6 guests a secluded natural retreat perfect for couples families reunions or small groups of friends perched atop a private 36acre hill the house offers spectacular views of the smoky mountains and the valley both indoors and outdoorsnnguests will take the private driveway to the top of the hill please note the driveway is gravel windy and reasonably steep so anxious or new drivers may not be comfortable and in the winter guests should plan to arrive in 4wheel or allwheel drive automobiles as you pull up to the house youll catch a glimpse of the beautiful views the house offersnnstep inside the front door into the modern openconcept living room anchored by a beautiful openhearth fireplace and framed by panoramic floortoceiling windows the living room offers plenty of room to relax unwind and catch up with friends it is complete with a piano record player library and a selection of games for guests to enjoy the living room opens up to the dining area and the kitchen youll find stunning views from all three areas the exterior walls of the room are all glass and there are several doors to the patio and yard for easy indooroutdoor living an outdoor grill and dining table are perfect when the weather is nice behind the kitchen is a small laundry room which guests are welcome to use and there is also a half bath off the living roomnnwant to see the best views take the spiral stairwell next to the front door to the observation deck step outside at the top and take in the best views in tennessee with unblocked 360degree views you can see the whole area because the stairs are long and there are open areas on the observation deck see photos guests with mobility issues and young children should skip the observation deck dont worry the views at main level are incredible toonnstep off the living room or walk down the hall to access the master suite featuring floortoceiling windows a custom kingsized bed expansive closet space and a spacious bathroom the master suite is a perfect retreat the master suite offers the best access to the hot tub which is neatly tucked away on the private pationnbeyond the master suite guests enter the second half of the house which is home to three additional bedrooms a full bathroom and a playlounge loft a small bedroom at the front with a twinsized daybed is a great option for a younger guest at the back there are two additional kingsized bedrooms each with a private patio they share a full bath which has a separate bathing room so multiple guests can use the facilities at the same time in the hallway between the bedrooms there is a metal staircase see photos not ideal for bad knees or toddlers which leads to a secluded loft space perfect for teens it offers a variety of games a television and a sleeper sofannwe aim to deliver the most comfortable stay possible all of our beds are equipped with new memory foam mattresses which promise wonderful nights sleep guest access guest accessn247 nocontact self checkinnhouse access is via electronic lock so guests will be allowed to come and go at their conveniencennbecause of the driveway we do recommend guests try to plan their arrival during the daylight hours while certainly not impossible it can be a bit uncomfortable climbing the driveway for the first time at night other things to note other things to noteninternet the house is on intended to be a retreat offering guests an option to unwind and unplug the house is remote and does not have unlimited internet while there is wifi we generally ask guests to keep its use to a minimum if you are planning to do a lot of online work or streaming during your stay this may not be the best option for younnpets wellbehaved housetrained dogs are welcome however because dogs create a bit more mess and require more cleaning time there is an additional pet fee of 20 per dog per night you can include your pets as adults in your guest count or if your pets push your total guest count over our maximum 6 please let us know and we will send a separate request after booking for the pet fee we do ask that guests 1 clean and pick up after their pets while on the property and 2 do not leave their pets unattended for extended periods of time if you bring your pet you are also assuming full responsibility for them and any damage they may cause additional cleaning or repair fees may apply if your pet is destructivennguest count please make sure your guest count is accurate and includes all guests including children who will be joining you during your stay as your guest count will affect the price of your stay we welcome groups of up to 6 people the nightly rate reflects the price for our standard occupancy 1 for each additional guest beyond the first up to 6 total we charge an additional guest fee of 20 to cover additional cleaning utilities and wear and tearnnparties we do not allow parties at the house no guests outside of those included in the reservation are permitted on the property during your stay please make sure that your guest count accurately reflects the number of people you have invited to the property with you if you plan to have additional guests for only a portion of your stay please let us know so that we can adjust the guest fee accordingly

Title: Panoramic Views & Dog Heaven at The Silo!
Description: welcome to the silo once grain storage bins on a working dairy farm these twin silos have been repurposed into a brand new 2story living space in the heart of the bitterroot valley three out of four original generations still make their home on this location which is transitioning from a fulltime dairy farm to a host property acres on which to roam with your dog leash free pet fee a pond stocked with fish incredible scenery and delightful small towns strung along the hwy 93 awaits the space the spacenas much privacy or interaction as you choose optional activities for booking english afternoon tea in the parlor tearoom on premisesnnto note the silo is situated on an 80acre lot that is home to the hosts family and one rental tenant while your time here can be as private or interactive as you choose please be aware that there will be other people dogs and automobiles coming in and out of the property guest access guest accessnguest are free to roam the 80 acre property with dogs please note that you many encounter other wildlife people and pets other things to note other things to notenthere is a nominal fee per pet per visit which will be requested once your booking is confirmed more details under house rules

Title: WORLDS GREATEST BEACH HOUSE
Description: worlds greatest beach house the space the spacensouthern california is more than just a lifestyle it is a vibe a connection a mood and most of all a glorious undertaking in enjoying all life has to offer in a great climate bounded by sun surf and sand we humbly submit that if you rent this home you will agree that from the desert to the sea throughout the entire state there is quite simply no finer home to experience the dream of southern california buckle up folks you are about to enter the water tower experiencennfor a video of the home please click on the video box in the photo montagennthe name says it all the water tower for the those unfamiliar with perhaps the most famous beachfront landmark in all of california lets start with a little history located in one of americas tallest ground to ceiling residential structures and serviced by a commercial elevator that whisks you upwards of close to one hundred feet in the sky this almost 3000 square foot home was in fact southern californias first manmade tourist attraction long before knotts and disneyland indeed before the first automobile was registered in orange county the water tower stood marveled at by visitors and locals alike as a wonder of engineering and architectural bravadonnas for the structure it stands over 85 feet tall and has three stories with windows on all sides this amazing home is beyond wellappointed it has been professionally renovated and decorated with first class amenities appliances thousandthread count linens and topshelf accoutrements so that your experience in southern california beach living is not only firstclass in every conceivable way but a memory you treasure forever no detail has gone unnoticed as the owners endeavored to create a home that will reward every person who enters an indelible lifetime memory the interior designers charge was simple pay tribute to the history of the water tower and when finished we wanted every guest who stays in the home to leave and tell everyone they know about the magic of the water tower experience as you can see from the photos we believe the decorators and designers hit this one out of the park the home has two garages an elevator four bedrooms three and onehalf bathrooms a fully stocked kitchen bar laundry room and the most amazing living room you will likely ever encounter with 360 degree views of southern california and beyondnnnow that we have the structure out of the way lets get to the fun stuff the water tower experience as natives know the debate has raged for years over what is more so cal orange county and its miles of pristine beaches or la with a bit more traffic but mountains and beaches and a whole lot of glitz as you enter the water tower experience this wont be an issue you are part of both tower locals however might argue as to whether or not she resides in sunset beach or seal beach as they both claim her it really doesnt matter as make no mistake about it while like the beaches the water tower belongs to all californians it is the love child of sunset beach but seal beach is very much the proud father as you stand on the sidewalk please take a moment to look up and take in the grandeur of this magnificent 19th century landmark which was once the tallest structure in orange county and today stands as the second tallest residential home in the united statesnnas you enter you will see the fine artwork on the doors and plaque detailing some of the history of this home which was built to service the railroads in the last half of the 1800s as the steam engines required a tremendous amount of water to power the locomotives the tower could hold up to 75000 gallons of water which weighed over 37 tons so dont worry about whether or not the she is strong enough to support your family the entry way is a tribute to the tower and the workers who built her from vintage tools and a water fall to the burlaps and barrels bathroom you will feel the history of the water tower as soon as you cross the threshold into a home experience like nonother you will also be introduced to the tower mascot mr wally tower as your stay unfolds enjoy finding the hidden wallys around the home there are several intriguing finds on this floor including a bedroom with a secret room located behind a bookshelf where some folks believe the ghost of wally resides after taking in the entry level get in the elevator and start your staynnon the second floor you will be thrilled to find a wonderful lounge dining area and fully stocked kitchen with all new state of the art appliances and cookware the view is nothing short of stunning as walls are in fact mostly windows revealing the entire pacific ocean slide open the doors and walk around the entire tower or simply sit on the deck and enjoy the view of the beach and catalina this is the lowest indoor floor of the water tower yet you are still 60 feet in the air with a majestic view throughout the tower you will find a number of treats and architectural gems including magnificent stained glass windows and custom woodwork this floor is no exception look up at the ceiling or simply give a listen for the whistle of the trains circling around the ceiling these trains are replicas of those serviced by the water tower over a century ago the lounge has not only amazing scenery but we believe some of the most comfortable chairs you will ever have the pleasure of sitting in as you enjoy the view and your stay this floor also hosts a bedroom with bunk beds dedicated and decorated in recognition of a little know part of california history pirates thats right pirates specifically hippolyte bouchard who after raiding monterey plundered mission san juan capistrano while cruising up and down the coastlinenna short trip up the beautiful winding staircase leads to the two master suites facing towards los angeles you will find the whale lovers bedroom with a view of huntington harbor bay of los angeles and whites point which is the land jettingout from the end of san pedro to form the outline of our los angeles coastline this room not only has all new fine linen but a world class shower sunken with an equally impressive view to enjoy while you experience this wonderful rain shower on the other side of the floor you will find the dolphin bedroom with a view towards huntington and newport beaches we think you will find this suite equally impressive with unapparelled views and a bathroom shower with a view of the san gabriel mountains all bedrooms are equipped with brand new hd televisions with direct tvnnnow it is time to journey to the top floor or rotunda room of the water tower this room which stands over 80 feet above sea level offers a 360degree view of all of southern california from the hollywood sign to san clemente island for as far as the eyes can see you will have an unobstructed view if for some reason that is not enough for you we have numerous magnifying devices including a custommade viewfinder so if you are curious about what the crew of a passing sailboat looks like just zoom in and take a gander the room itself is designed to entertain and be enjoyed by up to 20 people there are four large screen curved hd televisions so you can watch all the games or if you simply want to sit on the custom leather chairs or new couch and enjoy the view then dont forget to take in the 100 gallon fish tank or be certain to look up at the stain glass ceiling as you look up you will see propellers those too are part of the history of the tower and its unique role as a coastal landmark during world war ii this floor includes a custom bar video station with over 600 different games and a lifetime of breathtaking viewsnnnow that you have seen a glimpse of the inside of the water tower experience we invite you to think about spending a little time on the exterior just a few short steps and you will find yourself on an elevated outdoor deck 50 feet above the ground with everything you need to enjoy the views and the beach without stepping off the lot the deck boasts not only a jacuzzi and bbq but also the amazing breakfast bar perfect to take in the sunrise or our favorite the sunset bar which provides perhaps the best view of the sunset over catalina in all the land indeed we would put a view of the sunset from the water tower up against any other on the planet it is that spectacularnnof course we do not expect you to spend all of your beach vacation indoors so we have provided beach cruisers stand up paddleboards body boards and an array of beach toys while you are less than 50 yards from the beach we also provide a wagon so you can pack your toys for an easy jaunt to one of the best beaches on could ever hope to enjoy

Title: Rasong - Solitary Pension Near the Steep Sea Bath
Description: we designed nature and unity as a motif for architecture andnas a prototype to get out of the formalized frameworknand to feel at ease in the world of sitting and watchingnwe decorated most of the space with cholesterolnnlasong is a thoughtfully constructed house that was designed and built for families to livenin in the last few yearsnit was time for orot to feel itnnnow we want to share the comfort and beauty of jejunnnstay easynnlarson the space the spacenthe warmth of jeju lasong designed a circular house in naturenwith a main space with two bedrooms and another bedroomnit consists of a separate spacennbehind the building is a large lawnnon jejus natural stone villa in the middle of the yard a large pine treentake your seats and represent lasongnfeel the relaxation of the bay of larsonnnthere were many spears and they were cast into the warm sun of jeju and into the cool windnyou can feel different exterior views from space to spacenthe building is divided into a main residence and a spaciousncool bamboo garden for a relaxing independent break other things to note other things to notenthe lasong open memorial discount event discounted accommodation fee of 100000 krw closes at midnight on december 31 2021

Title: The old mill, Chinon
Description: old mill walnut oil restored by combining the modern with the charm of stonenthis 27m2 house is located in the upper part of chinon not far from the royal fortress located 13km from the city centre 25min walk free lift the space the spacenthe accommodation consists of an equipped kitchen oven stove refrigerator dishwasher dolce gusto coffee maker coffee tea and basic condiments for cooking are available on site living room with sofa bed and tvnin the bathroom you will have access to a washing machinenthe bedroom is on a mezzanine level accessed by a ladder and has a double bed bed linen as well as sheets are providednthe old mill has private parking as well as a terrace with barbecue for sunny daysnthe accommodation can accommodate 2 peoplennthe cleaning is not included in the price you will have on site all the necessities to leave the accommodation in the same condition as when you arrived if you dont want to do this you can book a cleaning service in advance for 50 guest accessnaccess throughout the property private parking terrace

Title: Leafy Greens Chiangmai : Mushroom M4
Description: leafy greens was built as a retreat center for our family and friends it is where people would visit to refreshing their souls and mind we work so hard to make this place to be one of the place that we can live in harmony with nature that is why the cob houses are the right choice for us not only the buildings are ecofriendly but also the garden is organic visit here you will be able to take a deep breath and enjoy the fresh air with organic environment it is a perfect place to getaway the space the spacenthis clay house was built for meditation course and it was designed for people to learn being with themselves that is why the function of the house is simple the house is 35 square meter with essential facilities it might be considered as a tiny house yet its comfortable for 3 people living together it got 2 stories2 futons on upper area and 1 bed on the ground floor the entire of the house was made by clay earth it is not only ecofriendly building but also good for our health we believe that our body will absorb good energy from the earth this means earthy house brings you close to nature and eliminate bad energy out it is very special house for us too special actually to keep it only for family and friends so we decided to share our paradise to everyone hope you would love it like we donndo not click on the airbnb link for directionsnplease only use our provided location to get here otherwise you might end up to other placesnnplease note that our place surrounded by naturenour place is full of flowers and trees you might see part of nature like birds crickets frogs lizards butterflies bugs and insects in our garden dont worry they are harmless however if you are afraid of these creatures our place might not suit you we do not offer refunds if those creatures comes into the house but we will check the house before guests check in to make sure there is no any bugs and we have insect net please keep it close every time during staynnplease note that clay house has a thick wall and the clay is blocked the internet reception so the internet might get slow sometimennplease note that we are not hotel so we do not have reception to help you 24hr however you would do our best to help you out to checkin it is very important to read out message thoroughly in order to have a smooth arrivennwe have cat in our property if you are allergic to cat or do not like them our place might not a good fit for younnif more people than the number declared at the time of booking stayed the room additional fee and penalty will be chargedchildren over 3 years old is also count as 1 personnnno commercial photography shoots allowed

Title: golf, relaxation, jacuzzi, sauna
Description: the villa is located in the picturesque drahan hillside it is located at the golf course in roots your mission is to ensure guests are comfortable during their stay the villa has three bedrooms a spacious living room and three bathrooms in the atrium of the villa there is a private whirlpool bath for 4 people you can also enjoy a private finnish sauna in the garden of the villanthe modern interiors and sommelier handpicked wines are guaranteed to capture you for an additional fee you can order breakfast at a villa or a full body massage the space the spacena private whirlpool bath will be at your disposal the interior design equipment combined with french natural cosmetics loccitane will ensure that you will be pampered from the very first moment would you like a glass of good wine then you chose the right one equipped wine cellar is a matter of course villas are nonsmoking and comfortably accommodate six people in each villa pets can also be taken with you for a fee guest access guest accessnthe whole villa will be at your disposal

Title: Glass House & SPA - DCA Certified -
Description: a glass house located on a beautiful hill in the heart of monferrato unesco world heritage site glass house offers an incredible 360 view a bedroom full of comfort an elegant living room a fully equipped kitchen a tuscan marble bathroom sauna and hammamnit is equipped with stateoftheart home automation technology fireplace tv etcnnearby excellent restaurants 36 hole golf horses and excellent cellarsnstaying at glass house 7 is truly a unique experience the space the spacenthe only glass house in italy great comfort security and privacy surrounded by nature a truly unique experience in italy perfect for a couple for a birthday anniversary special moment honeymoon wedding night etcnthanks to its magical panorama the glass house is perfect for romantic weekends for the first wedding night to celebrate an anniversary for a company award as a gift for a special birthday or simply to live an unforgettable experience the glass house is dca certified and received the award for best bio spa in italy in 2021

Title: Ocotillos Village A-Frame | Stargazer Lyra
Description: ocotillos village is a truly unique camping experience located right in the heart of terlingua our aframe wooden tents are equipped with a door and ceiling made of plexiglass that allows you to stargaze at night and see incredible views of the chisos mountains in the day best sunrise youll see the space the spacenthis is a great stay to enjoy a comfortable night under the stars the view is absolutely incredible this is a wooden aframe structure with a roof made of plexiglass to stargaze in comfort at night the wall facing the mountains which includes the door is all made of plexiglass as well for an amazing view of the mountainsnnplease note make sure you bring what you need we do not provide linens or bedding for your stay please bring your ownnnimportant this stargazer is further from the bathhouse than some of our other stargazers the distance from the stargazer to the bathhouse is about 300 feet you are more than welcome to drive down to the bathhouse and use the parking lot near there if needed this stargazer is closer to the street than our other stargazers so there could be more road noisennthere is wifi on the property but it can be spotty in the stargazernnthe space includesnqueen mattress with mattress protector no linensbedding electricity mini split acheat unit minifridge single kcup coffee maker kcups no mugs or water rug led lights fire pit shared bath house with hot showers 2 indoor and 1 outdoor and 4 flushing toiletsnnthe space does not includenpillows bed linens towels coffee mugs chairs flashlights food soaps cooking supplies cleaning suppliesnnthere is no lock on the inside of the stargazer but has a rope latch from the outside and inside to close it

Title: The Silos at Prairie Vale- lil Silo on the Prairie
Description: come experience tiny home living silo style on a family owned missouri farm complete with nigerian dwarf goats miniature donkey chickens and morenthe silos at prairie vale are between sedalia missouri and the little town of green ridge missouri the farm is only about 12 miles from the missouri state fairgrounds in sedalia and 2 12 miles on paved road from the katy trail the space the spacenthe silo apartment has a full kitchen with a refrigerator microwave stove and some utensils pans there is a kuerig coffee maker along with a selection of coffee tea or other beverage pods for you to enjoy the silo has its own onsite bathroom with a shower linens and hairdryer for guests to use there is a double bed in the loft and a futon that expands into a second double bed on the lower level the silo will comfortably sleep four people please use caution as you ascend and descend the staircase it was made to fit the space available and the steps have varying widths guest access guest accessnguest checkin is flexible the silo will be open and ready for registered guests on their arrival we live on the farm and are only a few yards away please do not hesitate to call on us for anything that you might need we would love to visit with you you are welcome to come to the farm house wendy loves tea so we have a coffee and tea bar in the kitchen wendy has every flavor of tea imaginable and she is always brewing a pot coffee is available too for anybody who wants to share one with her we have a large library of movies for guests to borrow guests are welcome to sit on the patio or on the big wrap around porch and play with our outdoor farm cats they are very friendlynwe have several bikes that katy trail riders can rent for the day we also have fishing poles that can be borrowed if fishing in the pond sounds fun there is a fire pit by the pond that guests can use we have roasting forks that can be borrowedand probably the makings for smoresif our youngest daughter hasnt eaten all the graham crackers

Title: StarsBOX in the Alpi Marittime Natural Park
Description: the starsbox is located on the shores of lago delle portette at an altitude of 2388 meters in the heart of the maritime alps natural park the access path starts at terme di valdieri and it takes about 3 hours to reach the starsbox once you reach the e questa mountain refuge you will be welcomed by the host marco who will show you the way to reach your starsbox just a few minutes away the shelter near the starsbox offers a kitchen and access to services the space the spacenstarsbox strives to embody a lighter and more conscious way of experiencing nature thanks to its immersive design starsbox is more than just a shelter it combines the concept of home with travel and represents a box of dreams where you can admire the stars and experience a fresh new dawn part tent and part hut it offers shelter but can open to the sky to reveal all the beauty nature has to offer guest access guest accessnfrom the parking lot of terme di valdieri an hourlong hike along a dirt road leads to the rifugio valasco once a hunting fort of the kings of italy from here the road continues as a mule track up to an altitude of about 2000 meters where at a larch tree a path branches off to the left and leads to the e questa mountain refuge the walk from the parking lot of terme di valdieri takes about 3 hours in totalnnfrom the larch tree it is also possible to continue on the mule track and reach the refuge with a less steep but longer path passing by the lower lake of valscura the walking time is about one hour longer other things to notenmountain trails can be difficult for inexperienced hikers be sure to take a look at the trail before you begin your adventure and bring a printed map as cell phones may not work

Title: Seaside getaway in √ñ√∂d mirror house
Description: d house is an ideal getaway for couples very isolated location with sea view creates a special kind of vibe great hiking trails or option to go horseback riding nearby offer plenty of opportunities for enjoying the scenic outdoorsnnwe are located an hour car drive away from tallinn in a tiny seaside village called alliklepa on the north coast of estonia here you will find an ideal mix of lush forests with plenty of hiking trails or seaside with sandy beaches ideal for swimming the space the spacend mirror house is one of the most unique experiences you can imagine for being one with nature while at the same time enjoying all the comforts of a tiny cabin the 18 m2 house has full glass windows on three sides giving you a panoramic view to the surrounding nature straight from bed the house has a comfy bed for two a fireplace remotely controlled floor and air heating systems water toilet a shower fully equipped tiny kitchen with refrigerator and a stove for cooking gives you the perfect opportunity to spend undisturbed time here without leaving to the city for days other things to note other things to notenmake sure you have enough food and drinks to fully enjoy your stay as the closest shop is 20min drive away tap water is perfectly drinkable

Title: Spend Ski Season at Sypes Canyon Adventures Silo 2
Description: welcome to the sypes canyon silos this listing is for silo 2 on the right side located just 5 miles from downtown bozeman 8 miles from bozemanyellowstone airport and 2 miles to the conveniences of target costco and other big box stores the silos exude the quiet of the country life nestled at the base of a ridge in the bridger foothills you have easy access to both bozeman and the great outdoorsnnbridger bowl18minbig sky48minyellowstone90mi the space the spacenwhats more unique than sleeping in a former grain silo cozy and eclectic this unit has all the comforts and conveniences you need to enjoy your time in bozeman wifi smart tv full kitchen washerdryer please note that there is a short ladder to access the bedroomloft space imagine a 5 rung stairladder hybridnnthe silo on the left can be combined with this one guest accessnfull unit and patio hiking trails on 42 acre property fire pit visit with the animals other things to notenplease keep in mind that all beds are in the same space 1 queen 1 full size sofa sleeper and 1 floor mattress that is actually a foam floor chair that flips into a single bed also the ceiling height in the bedroom is much lower near the walls please mind your head
