Title: Quirky land boat close to the beach with donkeys!
Description: nesbitt is a land boat set in its own private garden overlooked by 3 donkeys she has electricity full cooking toilet and showering facilities on board albeit all quite compactnideally suited for a couple or small familyna peaceful and quite getaway surrounded by animals trees farmland just 10 mins drive from kinsale and 5 mins from some fantastic beaches an ideal base for exploring the south of ireland somewhere quirky and different great for little big imaginations the space the spacennesbit is a 37ft land based boat she was destined for the scrap heap but we completely transformed her over an 18 month period almost everything in her has been recycled she is bright cosy and a funky little place to stay to enjoy the beautiful local countryside she has full selfcatering facilities there is a bedroom with a triangular shaped double bed a galley kitchen with sink hob grill microwave kettle toaster and small fridge the living space has a comfortable seating area with a table that converts to a single bed suitable for an adult also on board is a bijou bathroomwetroom with toilet wash hand basin and electric showernthe living space is all on one level there is electric heating in the boat so it is suitable for winter living there is a big private garden area with the boat with a picnic bench and sand pit guest access guest accessnthe boat with its own private garden overlooked by donkeysnand the occasional cow there is an electric fence between the boat garden and donkey field and we would ask guests not to enter the field with the donkeys other things to note other things to notennesbitt is available on a self catering basis onlynthe table in the seating area converts to make a single bednthe ceilings in parts of the boat are a little lowna travel cot is also available if you need onenwe are happy to accept a small to medium sized dog in the boat but we would be grateful if they did not sleep on the furniture and are kept on a lead at all times as we have donkeys cattle and free roaming hens in close proximity

Title: Beachfront retreat with a private hot tub, WiFi, AC, shared pool & lagoon views!
Description: the space the spacengold standard certifiednnmake your belize getaway truly unforgettable when you stay at this unique placencia vacation rental situated right on the lagoon and 50 yards from the beach and boasting upscale amenities including a shared pool this vacation rental is perfect for a couple small family or a solo travellernnthe newly constructed swan villas complex sits within a mile of fantastic restaurants like maya beach bistro and a supermarket for home cooking its about seven miles from placencia village where youll find more restaurants bars and grocery stores spend an afternoon lounging by the pool before putting on your snorkel gear and getting into the oceannnthis villas intriguing organic architectural style is sure to delight you and your loved one its designed to mimic the harmony between nature and humanity the openconcept kitchen is well equipped for cooking so you can easily put together a romantic dinner for two this home also has a private washerdryer and hot tub theres a half bathroom on this floor head upstairs to find the bedroom and the breathtaking naturalistic shower if youre travelling with another group of travellers please be aware that you can rent several suites within the swan villas togethernnthe romantic belize getaway of your dreams starts with this exquisite onebedroom vacation rental make your reservation todaynnthe twin bed is not a mattress but a foldable cushion meant for childrennnplease note that the property has a security guard at night and security cameras at the common areas in the propertynnparking notes there is free parking for 1 vehicles there is a parking lot in the property about 30 yards from this unitnndock details shared floating dock at the propertynnno dogs are welcome in this home no other animals are allowed without specific vacasa approval

Title: Striking contemporary by Andrew Geller
Description: the antler housennstriking contemporary by andrew gellernn3br2ba w large outdoor entertaining deck great room oneofakind vacation experiencenndesigned and built by famed architect andrew geller in 1968 the antler house was fully restored and updated in 2019 and has been featured in dwell magazine novdec 2019 designboom archinect curbed etc the home also won an aia honor award for restoration in 2020 the house has never been offered for rent and is a true gem for lovers of midcentury modern architecture and design you can expect a one of a kind vacation experience in this internationally recognized architectural masterpiece with impeccable interior design including designer finishes period correct details and the way the hamptons was supposed to be with a focus on escapism back to nature and total privacy the home is like living in your own wes anderson movie with its whimsical adventurous even wild spirit it is one of a handful of andrew geller houses that still exist in the hamptons and one of a few that have been restored to better than new condition the antler house is a 3story 3bed and 2bath with a large outdoor entertaining deck an upside down house with two bedrooms on the first floor a great room and entertaining deck up on the second story and surrounded by a forest canopy and a private 3rd story loft bedroom up above the tree tops just a few blocks from the beach but nestled in a woodsy forest the home is the best of both worlds a modernist beach house and a cozy cabin set on a very private 11 acre lot on the amagansetteast hampton border of historic springs its an easy drive or uber to all the best hotspots and just down the street from the famous springs general store as well as kidfriendly and picturesque louse point beachnnrental id 20 879nnthis property has a max occupancy of 6nnbedroomsnnbedroom 1 one queen bed first floormain floor air conditioning ensuite bathroom closet balconydecknnbedroom 2 one queen bed first floormain floor air conditioning closet balconydecknnloft bedroom one queen bed 3rd floor air conditioningnnbathroomsnnbathroom 1 full bath first floormain floor ensuite handicap accessible showernnbathroom 2 full bath first floormain floor shower tubnnoutdoorsndeckpatio lounge chairs 4 chairs patio furniture table chairs umbrella grill gas beach chairs 2 chairs beach umbrella beach toys cooler paddle board fire pit wood balcony bicycle 4 adult bikesnnamenitiesnbed linens bath towels poolbeach towels hair dryer washer dryer air conditioning heating hot water wood stove kitchen stove oven refrigerator coffee pot toaster blender dishes and silverware pots and pans living room internet wifi television smart tv speaker system bluetooth speaker sonos stereo private entrance parking 4 cars in driveway carbon monoxide detector smoke detector fire extinguisher dishwashernnspecial featuresnandrew geller was one of the premiere midcentury architects remembered most of all for his playful beach houses in the hamptons this home the antler house is one of his most published and celebrated homes including recent articles in architectural digest dwell archinect etc staying in this home is a onceinalifetime vacation experience private and protected by the surrounding oak forest yet just blocks from louse point beach it is the best of both worlds a woodsy cabin and a stylish beach house during summer the giant oaks create a cocoon for the property hiding it away from the rest of the world set equidistant between amagansett and east hampton the private yet close to towns location gives you all the best summer options without having to deal with traffic on montauk highway even during the peak of summer montauk is just a short 15 minute drive through backroads its a perfect getaway for couples or families who value midcentury architecture and decor as well as those who like to entertain on the large outdoor deck with dining bbq and stunning treetop views the property is child safe with two bedrooms on the ground floor and no pool a full ground up restoration was completed in 2019 including adding all modern conveniences including hvac heated bathroom floors and a full cinematic experience with a 120 movie screen and 4k laser projectornnlocationnnnearby beachesnlouse point is within walking distance or an easy bike ridennnearby grocery storesnsprings general store and old stone market are both within an easy bike ridennnearby restaurants and barsnamagansett main street and east hampton are both less than 3 miles awaynnother location Title: TAMANCO TUBISMO
Description: sleep in the round wake up with songbirds and sunshine in our tubismo tube we transformed eight reclaimed concrete tubes into cosy rooms with a view plunge into our saltwater pool escape to our gardenlike campground and embrace the fresh air and a great nights sleep under a starry night sky wether you are seeking refuge looking to meet other travelers or hang out with friends we have the right vibe for you the space the spacentamanco is a campground hostel in the green heart of the costa da prata between porto and lisbon a unique base to explore the center of portugal visit the many special monuments and places in the region browse local markets discover portuguese cuisine and drink um cafzinho in one of the many pastelarias go hiking in pristine green or along the secluded beaches or endless sand dunes that stretch from figueira de foz to nazar which with the highest waves in the world can rightfully be called the mecca for surf enthusiasts guest access guest accessna cantina caf eatery a meeting point for everyonenwe serve home made comfort food at a cantina our onsite caf and eatery you can also check out our make your own pizza nights or join in for our free soup for everyone evenings fancy just a drink at the fireplace you are more than welcomenntamanco tubismo comforts n pick up service for travelers by trainn communal outdoor kitchen with bbqn saltwater pooln wifin laundry servicen bread deliveryn books and boardgamesn farm grown fruits and vegetables for salen fridges for rent

Title: A Unique Spring Retreat near the Beach
Description: spring is a magical time to visit the outer banksnnrelax enjoy the beach and the quiet at the unique retro round house an all inclusive beach experiencenna perfect place to escape for a romantic getaway or to spend fun time with friends and family located only 100 yards from the beach pathnnyour stay includes use of 2 beach bikes 2 kayaks a surf board 4 skim boards beach cart and cooler and beach chairs everything you need to enjoy your vacation almost home the space the spacenduring peak season checkin on friday and avoid the typical changeover traffic in the outer banks the retro round house is just a 25 hour drive from the dc areannthis is the perfect space for a family or 3 couples to enjoy time together the 3 bedroom 2 bathroom beach house is cozy about 850 square feet but very well laid out for maximum family fun and interaction however this little round house is limited to 6 peoplennthe round house is a place to relax yet if you need to work we have reliablehighspeed wifi for your use yes you can get away from it all and stay connected at the same timennyou will find the open floor plan fun inviting and incredibly comfortablennthe kitchennnthe fully stocked kitchen features a large family dinning area with banquet seatingnnpropane stoveovenndishwashernsmeg drip coffee makerntea kettlencoffee tea sugar creamncoffee bean grindernmicrowaventoasternall clad pansncrock potnmixing bowlsnroasting pansncutting boardsncharcuterie boardnwooden spoons tongs etcnblendernsalt pepper common spices olive oilndishtowelsnpot holdersnpaper towelsndish soapndishwasher soapnwashing machine and dryernwashing machine soapnspongesngarbage bagsnnthe comfy living space features an electric fireplace turntable and a large screen art tv we also supply games books and video arcade tablennoutdoor scenennoutside we created wonderful seating areas so you can enjoy time listening the waves gazing at the stars and enjoying the sun and the fresh airnnlarge screened in porch featuring hanging chairs a dining table and bar areana deck featuring 2 hatteras hammock rocking chairs a high top table with 2 chairsnlower deck with unique built in hammock for star gazingnlarge yard for outdoor games corn hole suppliednbig green egg grill charcoal suppliedngas grillngas fire tower to keep you warm on cool nightsnout door shower for 2noutdoor sink fridge and fish cleaning stationnntoy closetn2 beach bikesn2 kayaksn910 soft top surf boardn2 boogie boardsn4 skim boardsn6 beach chairsncoolernbig tire beach wagonn2 shade tentsnkitesncorn holensand toysnnlocationnnwe are located in the town of salvo nc in the outer banks this is a quiet beach community where you will find some of the most beautiful beaches and scenery in the world the round house is located only 100 yards from the beach access path a short easy walknnpetsnnwe love dogs and can host one dog there will be a 100 pet fee unfortunately we cannot allow cats because of a severe family allergy guest access guest accessnthe round house is located in an ideal neighborhood setting kids can safely ride their bikes skateboards or scooters and you can take a nice jog around our sleepy two mile loopnnalso salvo has a wonderful walkingbike path so your can ride bikes to the day use area or to one of several wonderful local restaurantsnnas for the beachwe are only 100 yards from the beach path on the ocean side of the street no roads to cross you can hear the waves from our deck other things to note other things to noten1 hurricanes are a possibility please understand this when you book your vacation rental we do not provide refunds due to hurricane evacuation however we will work with you by providing midseason complimentary days to match days missed if an evacuation occursnn2 we suggest paying for your reservation with an american express card several american express cards will cover the cost of your trip should a hurricane evacuation become necessarynn3 we do allow dogs with a 100 dollar pet fee unfortunately we cannot allow cats because of a family allergynn4 the round house does require climbing steps as is true of most beach homes in the area the house sits on pilingsnn5 the wifi in the round house is suitable for remote work to include zoom calls

Title: Yome Away from Home
Description: come experience glamping at its finest in our beautiful yome fyi glamping is still camping just a little more comfy locally made a yome is a yurtgeodesic dome hybrid youll love the ultra comfortable queen mattress mini kitchen dining area and the warmth of the propane heater enjoy all the comforts of home plus the adventure of camping nestled in the woods yet only 10 minutes from downtown weaverville 10 minutes from the blue ridge parkway and 20 minutes from asheville the space the spacenembrace glamping to the fullest our yome is offgrid no wifi no electricity no running water and spotty cell service instead we have batterypowered led lights solar lights and candles providing mood lighting if you need bright lights i suggest bringing a lantern a solar shower with privacy enclosure and a very clean portajohn for your usennthere is a small grill that is byob bring your own briquets and lighter fluid i do provide tongsnnthe minikitchen consists of a 2burner propane stove with propane frying pan tea kettle french press cooking utensils dishessilverware grater peeler wine key organic coffee organic olive oil sugar creamer salt peppernnthe driveway is not very long but it is gravel steep in places and can be very bumpy careful if your car is low to the ground any car will be able to make it we have a jetta and a camry in our family but those with awd4wd will certainly have an easier timennwe have two dogs that have free reign of our property including at night while they fancy themselves watchdogs and are sure to cause a ruckus when they first meet you they are the biggest sweethearts and nothing to be afraid of nellie is the small one and maisie is the largernnour house is visible from the yome however there is much more distance about 150 feet than you would find between sites in a campground or a neighborhoodnnplease keep in mind that because this is a tent you will be more subject to the elementsnature that you would be in a conditioned space so check the weather before you come and dresspack accordingly expect bugs spiders etc despite the fact that i remove all of them each time i prepare the yome for a guest some will inevitably find their way back innnthe propane heater is provided octobermarch includes 1 1lb canister of propane per night of stay

Title: Otter Landing on Santa Fe River, 13 private acres
Description: spend all the time you want at home in nature relaxing or recreating this unique treehouse home is set high up in the trees and on 13 acres of natural habitat on the banks of the santa fe river the santa fe has so much wildlife and we are near the famous crystalline ichetucknee river and miles of public trails we share our kayaks a canoe and many amenities for your stay so go for a solo paddle join local guide trips to various springs or hike on the property and at nearby parks the space the spacenthe property is an amazing 13 acres located on 1000 of waterfront on the wildliferich santa fe river the forest includes many big old trees on both floodplain and bluff habitats offering great opportunities for serious or casual birdwatchers and botanists we are only about 2 miles upstream of the mouth of the ichetucknee river and we are less than a mile from 1600 acres of wilderness public land for wildlife there are about 45 miles of hiking trails just a short walk from property much of the river frontage is located on an island that you are free to wander at times our islands bridge can be under water during high water floods so do ask about conditions though some guests love to canoe through the trees at high water otter landings round house is always dry you have access to free kayaks and a canoe from property free coffee kcups for all guests dont forget to bring your firewood for the awesome fire pit guest accessnvery safe neighborhood of family homes we will send instructions for entry via lockbox after reservation is confirmed plenty of parking for your own car and boat should you choose to bring no rvs or camping please with due respect to the neighbors other things to note other things to note

Title: Boatel
Description: be under no illusion this is like camping under a wooden roof not glamping or an hotelnboatel guests share the boat roofed shed with other guests and residents and no one has exclusivity on this structurenthe boat is old and dusty with the occasional spider an unusual and quirky experiencenthe views are stunning sorry no dogs but there are two friendly dogs that live here and cats and ex caged chickens the spacenset in an acre of wild flowers and up a mountain in the beautiful dyfi valley biosphere the boatel is literally a bed in a boat not to mention a beautiful open plan cooking and living space all in a shed aka the boat roofed shed recognised for its amazing and unique qualities it even won the infamous cuprinols shed of the year in 2013 its our absolute pride and joy and we love sharing it with our guestsnweve hosted comedy festivals exclusive concerts and curious tourists in our little mountain hideaway and alex aka dj badly uses it to prepare his sets for festivals such as glastonburynwe built the shed in 2012 using recycled materials and it was our first major project alex is normally a rubbish diy person so designing and building the whole thing ourselves was a great achievement and we couldnt have been happier to win both the shed of the year unique category and the overall category in 2013nfrom the shed you can see across cader idris part of the cambrian mountains of snowdonia its so beautiful even in the maddest of weathers you can close the door light the candles pop some kindling in the wood burner and be snug and warm in momentsnour guests all love staying in the boatel they love the peace the location the structure the ambience and the curios alex is a big collector and has been on antiques roadshow with his poole pottery collection as well as the relentless throwing of frisbees for the dogsnwe supply all bedding but do not supply towels or breakfast

Title: Eco-Lush Mayan Dome in Family  Jungle Place
Description: nested in between the mayan jungle and the crystalline waters of soliman bay beach and 10 mins driving north from the bohemian town of tulum stands nahku surrounded by sparkly cenotes and impressive caves in what is known as the lower mayan jungle here we offer you your own private space in deep connection with the natural forces that surround us plus the opportunity to embark on new adventures with private cenote visits just steps away the space the spacenbienvenidonnoverview we welcome you to our sacred space our brand new dom is waiting for your presence located 10 min before ariving to tulum stands nahku close by to the ocean bay of soliman beach over 70 cenotes and more 4 archelogical sites near by akumal bay and many more places and sacred sited to visit without the harsh noise pollution traffic and construction of the downtown core this gives an enormous advantage to our place as strategically you can plan your trip around the most attractive places without losing comfort and commuting timennour dom maya is the first of its kind made out of an innovative and sustainable material called aircrete you can rest assure that the energy in this dome will deliver a power and harmonious vibration for your rest and comfort staying in this dome goes beyond expectations as its finished with an ancient stucco finished called chukum to insulate and keep it fresh our dome has 1 luxury queen size bed with high quality linens and pillows electrical outlets running water sink and wifinnntowels are includednntulum is a town with great biking infrastructure you can always move from nahku by walking 10min to the highway and taking the collectivo or van and for 20 pesos youll be in downtown in 5minnnkitchen inside your dome youll find a counter top with a sinknnbathroom eco outdoor toilets and showers ensure the natural efficiency and legacy of our jungle by avoiding water contamination and clearing of land for water infrastructure enjoy comfortable ecolushy private showersnnthe dome the dom maya is the first one of its kind in the mayan riviera giving you a wonderful brand new feeling of knowing that the impact of your visit in this natural paradise is reduced by the type of sustainable construction method we use nninspired in the mayan culture and its legacy the dom was born from its handcrafted stone work mixed with the wood of its furniture and the fine textiles from the mayan lands you will feel inspired to keep exploring this ancient lands guest access guest accessnonce you have turned from the highway to the dirt road continue till you find the fish rock once there youll have arrive park your car next to the other and follow the path to your dome we will be here to help you other things to note other things to notenthere is limited amount of power and we encourage all our guest to me mindful of turning lights off when not in use and unplug electrical devices when not in usennthere is no hot water in the premises be ready to enjoy a fresh water jungle shower

Title: La Casa Naranja
Description: five minutes from the village casa naranja offers a magnificent view over the alto de los migueles valley from the balcony in the living room three comfortable bedrooms each with its private bathroom and roomy closets are sure to make the sojourn of the travelers a pleasant one the interior garden with unusual succulent plants and fossil stones faces the social area bathed in the colors that gave the house its name a modern kitchen is available for those who enjoy cooking the space the spacenguests will find good books in three languages good cuisine if they wish and a welcoming hostess who will recommend the best restaurants the most original shops and boutiques fun gatherings and events guest access guest accessnthe entire house and garden

Title: Spaceship Destination!
Description: 726 square feet of one of a kind 1960s futuristic lodging set down on 5 acres in the rural hockinson hills the space the spacennext to a year around creek among trees with hills and meadows to explorenspaceship amenities include a wet barlunar lounge with fridge gamma ray microwave and mr fusion coffee makerntwo futon sofafull size beds with up to four cots available bathroom with shower tv bluray laser disccd player stereo and wifi plus a pair of freezing tubesfor 5 year stays guest access guest accessnthe spaceship landed only about 30 feet from the hosts living quarters and can be driven right up to its front door entry hatch after traveling down a 13 of a mile private drivewaynafter unloading parking is provided via the lower deck hangar doors on the north side of the ship other things to note other things to notenfriendly natives aboundnthe nearest sign of civilization is only about 1 12 miles away due west and over the hill the hockinson market provides fresh made pizza and has its own tap room the chevron market provides fossil fuelnhocinson meadows and alderbrook parks are 3 12 and 2 miles away respectivelynfurther afield and to the northeast is the city of battleground featuring restaurants a library antique shops and several breweries

Title: Spacious Dome Architecture
Description: main dwelling 34 ft diameter rustic wooden floors 5 12 ft round windows over looking great views large kitchen open plan space king bed in main living area queen bed in open loft retreatwriting meditation yoga dancing playing fun locationlocation 4 miles to town the space the spacenarchitecturally elegant and unique design situated with beautiful views this was a big home that has been duplexed and is about 1100 square feet it was designed for privacy so the entry door for the other home is on the opposite side of the house from where you enter very peaceful and quiet the only house on the street i call the area country suburbia with houses peppered in the neighborhood about 14 mile away this is a monolithic dome which means a huge balloon was blown up and sprayed with concrete before the balloon was popped that part of the house is 34 ft diameter with rustic wooden floors two 5 12 ft round windows over looking great views yard the yard is not totally secure for pet safety large kitchen very roomy open plan space king bedqueen bed in the loft a smart tv and selection of dvds for your entertainment the picture shows a ladder going to the loft but it is now a stair case the loft has an artsy 2 12 foot picket fence as a wall there is sight privacy but due to it being a half wall there is no sound privacy parents note please look at the pictures to decide if this room is childsafe for your needs about 2 of folks decide its not right for themi imagine it should be no problem unless they are climbers when youre not looking please ask for details if youre unsure this is a wonderful space for retreats writing meditation yoga dancing playing fun the sister dome is about 1000 square feet and renting both sides is excellent for smallish eventsretreats there have been a few weddings held here locationlocation 4 miles to town

Title: Loch Lomond Oval
Description: we dont fit easily into the categories that airbnb has so for a clear picture read onnloch lomond hideaways is an exclusive collection of individual getaway properties consisting of four luxury indooroutdoor cabin rooms with sheltered decking and outdoor cooking and eating facilities the hideaways are dogfriendly the space the spacenthree of the hideaways are wooden cabins which also have a secluded private outdoor bath while the fourth has a double sized indoor bath all four surround a fairytale lit garden with private outdoor areas outside each one and youll find individual listings on airbnb for each one for booking click on my pic top right and select profilennthe hideaways are a short distance from loch lomond and even shorter distance from the west highland way the john muir way and the devils pulpit so plenty of opportunity to get out and about or to walk your dog there is a restaurant in the village croftamie a couple of hundred metres walk and shops restaurants and pubs in nearby drymen 2 miles if youre arriving from glasgow airport its about a 40minute taxi ridenneach property overlooks the garden with its own entrance cosy indoors and even outdoors with their own individual outdoor wood burning stovesnnthe rooms have a kingsize bed the garden room has a kingsize fourposter and the others have the option of kingsize or two singles an ensuite shower and wc the garden room has a fabulous double bath in the ensuite and the tree house oval and arch have fantasy outdoor bathsnthe tree housenn kingsize bed or two singlesn ensuite wc and showern private secluded outdoor bathn luxurious dressing gowns and towelsn wifi and bluetooth speakern microwave toaster kettle nespresso coffee machine tea coffee hot chocolaten outdoor barbecue dining table and chairsn outdoor woodburning stove with cosy seating on the deckn blankets and hot water bottles for the evening chill when youre sitting outdoorsn breakfast of porridge pastries jam butter fresh milk shortbreadnnthe ovalnn kingsize bed or two singlesn ensuite wc and showern private secluded outdoor bathn luxurious dressing gowns and towelsn wifi and bluetooth speakern microwave toaster kettle nespresso coffee machine tea coffee hot chocolaten outdoor barbecue dining table and chairsn outdoor woodburning stove with cosy seating on the deckn blankets and hot water bottles for the evening chill when youre sitting outdoorsn breakfast of porridge pastries jam butter fresh milk shortbreadnnthe archnn kingsize bed or two singlesn ensuite wc and showern private secluded outdoor bathn luxurious dressing gowns and towelsn wifi and bluetooth speakern microwave toaster kettle nespresso coffee machine tea coffee hot chocolaten outdoor barbecue dining table and chairsn outdoor woodburning stove with cosy seating on the deckn blankets and hot water bottles for the evening chill when youre sitting outdoorsn breakfast of porridge pastries jam butter fresh milk shortbreadnnthe garden roomnn kingsize fourposter bedn ensuite wc and showern ensuite double bathn luxurious dressing gowns and towelsn televisionn wifi and bluetooth speakern microwave toaster kettle nespresso coffee machine tea coffee hot chocolaten outdoor barbecue dining table and chairsn outdoor woodburning stove with cosy seating on the deckn blankets and hot water bottles for the evening chill when youre sitting outdoorsn breakfast of porridge pastries jam butter fresh milk shortbreadnnthe storenn not accommodation this houses all the essentials like milk dishes cutlery extra tea and coffee etc you can buy soft drinks crisps and sweets and occasional souvenirs the recycling is here and theres a collection point for your used dishes youll also find information about the surrounding area here guest access guest accessnyour parking is beside the main house the witches hat and signed loch lomond hideaways car park the house is on the outskirts of the village of croftamie just a short walk away and a couple of minutes drive from the larger village of drymen with shops traditional pubs restaurants etc loch lomond is a further short drive to balmaha on the east shore or balloch on the south west and we are only 45 minutes by car from glasgow city centre or glasgow international airport

Title: Glamping-Sky Dome Yurt-Tiny House-2 by Lavenders
Description: this is our second tiny house concept yurt glampingnnwere in a gated community close to everything guests have been enjoying the view the sunsets the stars the ocean breeze the offgrid feelingnnif you are thinking about buying a yurt try ours out you will enjoy the entire yurt by our baby lavender fields with a covered patio outdoor shower its really insides and a modern compost toilet in the attached restroom right by the doornnthe yurt is built in wonderful 2020 newfun the spacenour yurt is a 294 sqft comfortable room with a queensize memory foam bed a sofa bed a kitchenette portable acheater unit and etc its linked to the 200 sqft patio and the attached restroom right by the doornnits about a 100 ft walk from the parking spot to the yurt on the boardwalknnif you need an extra bed for the 4th guest we can provide a folding camping bed

Title: Rondavous Land Yacht - Tin Valley Retro Rentals
Description: tin valleys first clothing optional campsite no need to worry about tan lines pet friendlyntin valley retro rentals was featured on nat geos documentary show badlands texas and has caught the attention of travelers all over the world 90 private acres nestled in the foothills of surrounding mountains perfect for stargazing located near big bend national state park and the rio grande families solo travelers couples photographers weddings are all welcomed the space the spacenthis beautiful land yacht is the newest addition to tin valley and the first clothing optional campsite she is now docked on her own desert island i have the cost of the rental at a lower price due to the work in progress however i think you will be pleased great for families lots of privacy large fire pit charcoal smokergrill and sand pit area large enough for an additional tent or two one bedroom with kitchen until we get the toilet issues worked out a composting toilet is provided outside and a shower houseflushing toilet nearby approx 1000 feet away solar lights all around propane provided for the heater cooker and light running water for sink shower incredible lookout upper deck and ramp that gives you the feel of walking onto a docked boatnnthere is a 3000 nonrefundable pet fee due upon check in guest accessnproperty isn35 miles to terlingua terlingua ghost town study butte and to the front entrance of big bend national parkn5 miles to the back entrance of big bend national park but high clearance andor 4wheel drive is needed for this routen4 miles to terlingua ranch lodge available to you which has a swimming pool full service restaurant shower house and laundry facilityn20 miles to the closest grocery storen35 miles to the closest gas station

Title: Skylight Cabin
Description: it is a cozy room with some comforts here at our laitila home we have built a comfy skylight dome house perfect for camping visitors can also enjoy the wood burning sauna terrace for grilling and the firepit if you enjoy the campfire experience there are numerous walking paths you can take if you are looking for an adventure our property is surrounded by open fields and woods with a swamp nearby only 50km from turku downtown the space the spacenwe are a finnishamerican couple and love our home so much we are happy to have people from all over come visit us to experience the life here and to also learn from othersnnlaitila is a quiet place about 50km from the heart of turku our skylight cabin is small but at the same time spacious and very comfy the room includes a mini fridge and microwave for quick and easy meals and a small heater in case it is cold you will also have access to a firepit nearby the cabin where you can camp out and grill too there is a terrace if you prefer for grilling and sitting as well on the other side of the lot by the main house there is a wood burning sauna and shower in a seperate building and there is a warm and clean outhousennour property is set up as growing farm niiralan tila the farm was established in the summer of 2019 and we are always looking for ways to improve and expandnnenjoy beautiful walks through the village woods fields and even the swamp nearby if you do not wish to go alone we are more than happy to join you and show you around depending on time of the year there are chances to gather fresh berries and mushrooms to enjoy much wildlife can have a chance to be seen like deer moose fox and perhaps even wolves there is also lake with small beach and a pier 7 km away for swimming

Title: The Island House of the Marais de Larchant
Description: the marais de larchant a labyrinth of canals with a view on the medieval saint mathurin basilica lies just west of the fontainebleau forest close to the famous bouldering spot of la dame jouanne the house rented is fully independent with 5 bedrooms 4 bathrooms 1 kitchen 1 dining room and a large drawing room it has its own linen kitchenware and cutlery it also has its own internet connection wed be happy to host you english spoken the space the spacenbased on an architects design the houses main feature is its vaulted hall at the heart of the marais canals it is perfectly quietnthe island on which it is located will be at your disposal but the rest of the natural reserve is closed to the public guest access guest accessnthe entire house and the island on which it is located surrounded by canals is at the guests disposal walks in the marsh and canals can be organised depending on availabilities other things to note other things to notenthe house is already booked on the dates of your stay try the other house on the property the courtyard house of the marais also on airbnbnnbookings of 5 days and more will be given priority during holiday season

Title: Exposed Rock From Hillside In House, 5200SF, Views
Description: one of a kind 4br 3ba 5200 sqft home stunning views of the co ntl mnt and entire grand valley our grandpa a home builder designed this rustic house as a masterpiece for his family he wanted it to be part of nature so he fit it between trees and inside left exposed the massive sandstone slab on which its built this large house has entertained our family and friends for generations and were thrilled that now you can share it with yours too be in nature but minutes from downtown the space the spacenour grandpa designed and built this unique home in a way that captures the rugged terrain on which it sits and compliments the stunning natural beauty of the colorado national monument that serves as the backdrop he made it so every room has its own stunning view look closely at the photos to see the rock and wood detail throughout the sandstone slab of the hill on which its built actually makes up the entire wall of the downstairs family room and the floor of the room above grandpa had artistic vision creativity and the craftsmanship to put it all together and he built this house from his heart he was still building furniture for us well into his 90s it has served as a cherished place for family gatherings and we invite you to enjoy your vacation the way we have enjoyed this home throughout the generations have breakfast in the kitchen or on the giant deck while enjoying unobstructed views of the colorado national monument and the way the morning sun hits the red rocks spend evenings by the massive fireplace watching the sun set over the bookcliffs and the grand valley during the summers you might catch a lightning storm over the grand valley as the thunder echoes off the massive canyon walls behind the house we also have a charcoal grill so you can bbq outside and take in the views from the deck take leisurely walks through the neighborhood or drivebike to get to everything that grand junction has to offer see list belownnsee our video tour search house on the rock and grand junction on that big video platform that everyone uses stated in a way that gets around a ban on mentioning websites here nnwhile most of the home furnishings are rustic and cozy in a way that preserves the years of fond memories we made sure you had enough upgraded guest amenities to make your stay as comfy as can be we just remodeled our showers have hotelquality linens plush towels and plenty of toiletries you get to enjoy a vacation with maybe the most gorgeous views in the grand valley in a house full of charminglyold stuff spanning generations but you still get to sleep as if you were staying in a great hotelnnplease note we try our absolute best to keep the house clean for you and all of our future guests for this reason we ask that you note our rules for no pets and no groups or gatherings of over 10 people thanksnnlayout of the housennmain floornkitchen new fridge and stovenbreakfast nooknformal dining roomnliving room and fireplacenlaundry room washerdryer ironnbedroom 2 queen bednbedroom 3 two twin beds travel cribnbathroom with bathtub and showernnupstairs entire floor is master suite up a small staircase from the living roomnmaster bedroom king bednattached full bathroom with clawfoot bathtub showernsewing room attached to master bedroom full bednndownstairsnfamily room with builtin wet barnplayroomoffice full bednbedroom 4 queen bednbathroom with showernnnearby attractionsncolorado national monument east entrance 5 min drive close to serpents trail devils kitchen hikes etcnmountain biking on tabeguache trail systems which includes the lunch loop andys trail and many more 5 min drivenredlands mesa golf course 5 min driventwo rivers winery 10 min drivenhistoric main street with restaurants shopping art galleries and summertime farmers market 15 min drivenpowderhorn ski resort 50 min driventake a day trip in your car to moab the grand mesa glenwood springs aspen ouray guest access guest accessnentire house other things to note other things to notenplease make yourselves at home while being respectful of this family treasure and peaceful neighborhood no rowdy parties if you need anything at all during your stay please dont hesitate to contact the property manager who lives just down the street also we are listed as five bedrooms because airbnb doesnt quite have the listing options needed for a full picture of our house there is one bedroom off of the master bedroom that has a bed but used to be a sewing room its a little smaller and has a little less privacy than a normal bedroom also the office has a bed but we didnt list that as a bedroom thanks for understanding

Title: Buff and Fellow Eco Coconut 7 (6 sleeper)
Description: the eco coconut is nestled on the banks of the dam overlooking the mountains it offers a fully equipped kitchen living room with fireplace dinning area with braai and a patio with woodfired jacuzzi 2x ensuite rooms 2x outdoor showers bath extra sleeper coach with separate bathroom and shower sleeps 6 guests the space the spacenthe one of a kind design of the eco coconut makes it truly unique experience in south africa it almost feels like you inside a coconut on a tropical island beside a lake and overlooking the outeniqua mountains the interior is calming and neutral with a bohemian flavour the fully equipped kitchen with gas stove oven microwave fridge and woki ware cutlery is the perfect place to create a family meal cuddle up at the fireplace or relax in the wood fired hot tub guest access guest accessnthe eco coconut is totally private and is exclusively yours for your stay the farm is a paradise with wildlife like buffalos rhinos and other animals

Title: Fairytale Treehouse Turret at Santarella Gardens
Description: the newly renovated magical turret on the santarella estate in the berkshires western massachusetts this unique loft with turret bedchamber offers guests a fairytale experience the open concept living space filled with plants brings the outdoors inside and offers ample room to relax guests can spend the day exploring the grounds nearby lakes trails and many nearby berkshire towns the space the spacenenter through a second story entrance into a large open space with a sitting area with a sofa hanging chair television and windows that offer views out into the gardens a bohemian bedroom with fullsized bed is hidden behind a sliding door the turret section has a suitable kitchenette with microwave fridge small oven hot plate and coffee maker there is also a cozy eating area with table and chairs a large bath contains a double vanity huge shower and private water closet the third story bedchamber awaits up a winding staircase and sleeps two in a queensized canopy bednnthe fairytale treehouseturret is situated on 4 acres including lovely gardens beautiful lily pond a running brook and wooded area absolutely unique storybook experience for up to 4 questsnnour lovely grounds are open to our guests there are garden paths brook with stone bridges loveliest of lily ponds stone bench seating area with chiminea and firewood for guests usennwhile we do not allow pets we will consider requests to allow 1 small pet with prior approval and acceptance of rules and policies

Title: Self-Contained Pyramids in the Australian Bush
Description: find peace and quiet at our large family property hidden close to the township of adaminaby in the snowy mountains of nsw is our surprising and unique accommodation two pyramids set in our 40 acres of pristine alpine australian bushlands and flowering wildflower style gardens all here for you to discover on your retreat from the city a peaceful retreat hand built by our grandparents in the 90s located close to cooma and a short drive from canberra airport privacy and peace await you the space the spacenbuilt from scratch by our grandparents this property is truly unique and special you wont find pyramids set in the australian bush land anywhere else two selfcontained pyramids rest within established gardens overlooking undeveloped australian bush surrounded by tranquility use the pyramids as a base to explore the surrounding ski fields or use your holiday to completely relax away from it all from the handcut slate tiles to the pink granite surrounding the property there is so much to discover at rocky corner please note there is mobile phone reception predominantly on the telstra network but there is no wifi guest access guest accessnthe pyramids are fully selfcontained buildings that sit within our larger property which is called rocky corner our house is a little further up the hill so youll have privacy if you wish so youll have your own parking at the front of the pyramid and there is plenty of space to park further vehicles as required the road to our property is unsealed and is suitable for normal vehicles 2wd to travel onnplease note the snowy mountains is a rural area there is a lot of wildlife around all the timeplease be aware if you choose to drive in the dawn or dusk this increases your risk of hitting wildlife so please do not speed or take unnecessary risks travelling to visit our property if you hit an animal please call the local council who can direct you what to do other things to note other things to note

Title: Foxbriar Inn
Description: a most unique home in the lovely pines of northern arizona foxbriar is historical charming and unlike any house youve ever seen nestled at the foot of thumb butte mountain foxbriar has a milliondollar view and set in a beautiful rural neighborhood it is only two miles from downtown prescott oneofakind furnishings and all the conveniences of home as well as outdoor gardens and dining areas and a gypsy wagon too experience an original living adventure the space the spacenstaying at foxbriar is better than a disneyland adventure it is unique and thoroughly charming with all the modern amenities guests may opt for a small charge a tour of a pirate ship treehouse offsite too which was featured on tvs animal planet ultimate treehouses ii as well there is a gypsy wagon onsite at foxbriar it can be rented for sleeping too it features a double bed but no bathroom the additional charge is 80 charge per night guest access guest accessnthere is a large parking area in front of the house which is off the street and private other things to note other things to notenfoxbriar is close to downtown where there are many restaurants and other activities available year round

Title: Upstate NY - Willow Glen House
Description: stay in a beautiful contemporary architect house in a case study house style with floor to ceiling windows our cats and nature on your doorstep its an absolute experience of living indoorsoutdoors with nature close to farmers market in nearby towns concert halls and ccs at bard music venues in kingston and basilica in hudson its the perfect hideaway from the city for true nature cat lovers onlynnmay june 2022 open for longterm rental ideal for remote work or nature retreat the space the spacenour home is an architectural concept house and a gem though please note that it is a concept house and therefore not without imperfections so for the ones who appreciate architecture and design it is not a perfect airconditioned clinical space as its situated in nature and nature is very present which in the summer means that you have animals and insects around and yes some come into the house the insects that is and in winter there is snow and ice and in ny state that can be plenty so not for the faint of heart or the squeamish as its a modern house but located as a cabin in the woods at the house you will truly feel nature and nature is on your doorstep for both good and bad note to dog owners we are big fans of dogs but sadly the house cant accommodate any dogs during your staynwith our house come four companions our cats will be delighted about every guest who loves and appreciates animals and is willing to take care of them nothing extraordinary but feeding twice a day and some of the usual care and attention other things to notenwe have four lovely cats who live in the house they go in and out and are fairly independent but look forward to your company and some care and attentionnnwe have fresh herbs in our front garden for you to enjoy and if you come in the right season also homegrown zucchini tomatoes arugula etc just water them in the evening and youll get all the great harvest as reward

Title: Historic Ball-Paylore House
Description: the ballpaylore house is captivating offering guests a true tucson midcentury modern experience a stay in the ballpaylore lets you step back in time widely published the 1200 sq ft two bedroom architectural landmark has been named one of the most significant examples of modern architecture in arizona centrally located within the historic catalina vista neighborhood the property is close to the uofa and major attractions entertainment and shopping the space the spacenin 1952 librarians phyllis ball and patrica paylore commissioned legendary tucson architect arthur t brown to design a bespoke oneofa kind home one that embraced the tenets of the modern movement responded to the environmental conditions of the sonoran desert and offered both beauty and functionnnthe result was an architectural masterpiece considered one of the most important buildings of browns design career the avantgarde design of this noted and forwardthinking project embraced geometry and siting to create a pioneering and early passive solar home the south facing floortoceiling windows shed light on the authentic midcentury interior bold original colors are punctuated by pale wood finishes and earth toned polished concrete floors the primary living areas radiate off the central fireplace like the petals of a flower the dark colors of the bedrooms with sloped low beam ceilings create intimate and comfortable spacesnnthis significant historic property was purchased at the end of 2019 and meticulously restored by tucson historic preservation foundation the property retains its classic charm the 1200 sq ft architectural plan is based on the geometry of the hex featuring two bedrooms plus a shared bathroom much of the original modernist furniture by george nelson for herman miller and custom tucson furniture maker john kelso are extant recent upgrades have introduced contemporary amenities including air conditioning and wireless high speed internet each bedroom features a tv and tuft and needle mattressesnnstep back in time spend easy afternoons reclined in a chaise lounge on the revolving terrace or enjoy the tucson weather as the sun sets over the tucson mountains take shelter from the midafternoon days while relaxing in the bright sitting areas experience 1950s tucson

Title: Brand-New, Seaside Luxury Suite with WiFi, AC, Shared Pool, and Beach Access
Description: the space the spacengold standard certifiednnswim play and relax when you stay at this unique gaudiesque villa in belize with two bedrooms and two bathrooms this unique vacation rental features fantastic architectural touches access to a shared infinityedge pool beach views and plenty of room for up to four guests please note that this suite is the bottom floor of a twolevel villanneven though it may be difficult to leave this tropical retreat the placencia peninsula has lots to offer if you have never experienced underwater wildlife now is your chance to rent scuba gear in the nearby town and book a guide to view the beauty under the sea in addition you can take a boat trip to view some manatees visit the ancient mayan ruins take a hike through lush jungles or simply lounge on the beach with your favourite straw hatnnthis rental suite has two bedrooms each with a round kingsize bed and its own ensuite bathroom you might especially enjoy the jetted tub also round to compliment the overall decor so you can relax in some bubbling hot water before heading to bed you will also have complimentary wifi and a laundry room for your convenience in the centre of the house the spacious living room and full kitchen make for a fabulous gathering space cook nightly meals perhaps your days catch and enjoy fresh breakfasts each morningnnperfect for couples travelling together or a small family looking for a memorable vacation look no further than the lion fish retreat make belize your destination and this home will make it into a vacationnnplease note that the property has a security guard at night and security cameras at the common areas in the propertynnbelize tourism board license 19302016nnparking notes there is free parking for 2 vehicles there is a parking lot in the property with space for two cars about 30 yards from this unitnndock details shared floating dock at the propertynnno dogs are welcome in this home no other animals are allowed without specific vacasa approval

Title: Boho Hideaway
Description: welcome to the boho hideawaya charming bungalow located in the sought after montrose district minutes away from some of houstons best coffee dining nightlife whats our favorite thing about this home the location theres plenty to see and do within walking distance or bike ride quick access to i59 i45 610 within a 10 minute drive or less you can easily get to the galleria downtown and texas medical center the space the spacenhip comfy and clean soak up the vintage flair of this 1920s bungalow overflowing with art house plants and eclectic furnishings our home has a private entrance and keyless access for an easier checkin experience boasting 4 comfortable queen beds 2 full bathrooms roku tvs highspeed wifi we pride ourselves in stocking our homes with everything you may need for a comfortable stay including highquality linens full kitchen coffee bar towels so much more should you need anything else during your stay please contact us we are more than happy to accommodate you ensure you have the perfect hideawayhouston experiencennparking parking is only available on the street directly in front of the homennsleeping there are 3 bedrooms total in the home one of the bedrooms has two queen beds and the rest each have one bednncooking use our pans utensils to chef up something yourself or reheat leftovers in our microwave we have kcups and a coffee maker for those early mornings toonncheckin check in anytime after 4pm we have keyless entry for a more convenient checkin process early checkins are on a case by case basis depending on availability if you need to drop off your luggage earlier please contact us and we can accommodate younnconcierge servicenanything you need is at your fingertips with our concierge addons like stocking your fridge luggage storage or decorating for your celebration let us make your trip to houston the best trip evernncleaning feenwe pride ourselves on providing a clean home for our guests we hire cleaners that not only work hard but are family and friends of ours they treat the property as their own and we pay them well resulting in a slightly higher cleaning fee it goes back to them not some major company paying their workers minimum wage if during your stay anything isnt up to your standard please let us know and we will address it immediatelynnthe home is located in a residential neighborhoodwe ask that you please be mindful of our neighbors please keep any noise down after 10pm we do not allow parties or events max total guests is 8 people additional guests must be approved by the host failure to communicate with the host about extra guests will result in violating your booking terms please note we have security cameras on the exterior of the home to ensure the safety of our guests our home your vehiclesnnpictures are worth a thousand words so please feel fee to browse through our photo gallery and message us if you have any questions we look forward to hosting you for your next houston staynnsome of our favorite places nearbynthe pitt room 3 mi awaynuchi 9 mi away the best sushinbcn taste tradition 335 ft away one of our favorite date night spotsnsiphon coffee 4 mi away seriously best coffee evernthe menil 7 mi away one of our favorite museums guest access guest accessnkeyless entry street parking available directly in front of home other things to note other things to notenwe have worked very hard to make your stay as comfortable as possible please respect care and be mindful of the surrounding neighbors so that guests can continue to enjoy the space for many years to comenn quiet hours start at 10 pm we do not allow loud noisesmusic parties in the housenn there are security cameras at the perimeter of house there are no cameras inside the housenn please do not smoke vape use marijuana or drugs in the housenn street parking available directly in front of home no parking in the driveway

Description: at the heart of the ardches natural and cultural heritage les gtes de sylilanse welcomes you to make your stay an unforgettable memory take the time to recharge your batteries do a cure for nature calm and freshness on the coiron plateau in ardche the secret of an excellent vacation nfor more relaxation the possibility of massages by a practitioner qualified in ayurvedic only on appointment to rent mountain bikes elec from april to september and to book food baskets the space the spacencome and experience a stay in a gout d o all made of wood unique in our region it is in the heart of nature and the lucky ones will have the joy of seeing foxes deer deer on the threshold of their gout d o and of rubbing shoulders with our donkeys nnyou can enjoy your meals in a kitchen open to a quiet and peaceful environmentnnto make your stay perfect and not surprising we offer you free access to the pool and jacuzzi nand for even more relaxation the possibility of being massaged by a qualified ayurvedic massage practitioner on appointment other things to note other things to notenyou have the option to book meal baskets or breakfast baskets on order nbreakfast basket 16 for 2 peoplenardchois meal basket 35 for 2 peoplenbasket meal hot 35 for 2 peoplencold meal basket 30 for 2 people

Title: A Grass-Roofed Earthen Hobbit Hut
Description: this uniquely constructed cob hut was crafted by sculptor miguel elliott of living earth structures and is one of a kind the thick walls provide natural insulation keeping it cool in summer and warm in winter it was constructed out of adobe bricks from the property and features a living grass roof while the rustic decor transports you to middle earthnnupdate sadly due to covid19 restrictions we arent able to host your beloved animal companions at this time the space the spacenwe invite you to partake in the spiritual life which is the heart and soul of isis oasis sanctuary by joining us for daily noon rites in the small temple sunday salons under the great tree or by simply meditating at any of the numerous shrines and altars at our beautiful sanctuary our temple and theater are always open if you seek a moment of peaceful reflection or a place to give offerings or prayersnnisis oasis sanctuary is an exceptional place to stay if you are visiting wine country and looking for a singular spiritual experience our cob huts offer a unique approach to lodging that you wont find anywhere else crafted by sculptor miguel elliott of living earth structures these small standalone structures are built with natural selfinsulating materials and inspired by magical fantasy stories that are well known and loved by many they live tucked into an intimate corner of our wooded campground with a small picnic area and bamboo privacy screens bathrooms and rustic outdoor showers are just a few meters down perfect for those who want a remote camping feel but with some added creature comfortsnnfree wifi and a coffee and tea bar are available for all guests to use in our spacious dining pavilion a small library collections of puzzles and games and a gas fireplace provide a cozy setting in which to relax and unwindnnvisit our community garden or request an animal tour to see our menagerie of exotic rescued cats birds and reptiles we are a licensed 501c nonprofit and any taxdeductible donations go towards the care and upkeep of our animals and groundsnnwhether you are coming alone or with company you will find isis oasis a refreshing departure from the traditional hotel or motelnnnote if youre coming as a group multiple spaces can be rented out simultaneously and some buildings can be rented in their entirety for larger parties ask about our catering options please note that if other huts or campground areas are rented you will be sharing the facilitiesamenities with other guests we do offer a number of other rental options on property if you prefer more privacy see our full listing options by typing isis oasis sanctuary in your airbnb search bar

Title: Unforgettable Pyramid home in sunny Florida 7046
Description: dont miss your chance to stay at this unique and exciting pyramid that features a natural spring water lake this home is perfect for couples families or close friends who are looking for a fun vacationnwe are located about 15 miles from most beaches and central to all local attractions in a quiet and safe communitynnsome highlightsn 2 queen bedrooms 1 bathroomn self check inn free wifin beach gear washerdryer full kitchen private grill patio guest access guest accessnthis pyramid is situated with just enough privacy while still being only a short walk to the lake your main patio from this unit overlooks the lakennit is thoughtfully furnished with fun and cozy furniture that is sure to please everyone for your comfort the pyramid is supplied with a hairdryer iron and ironing board beach chairs beach towels cooler coffeetea appliances washerdryer microwave and a gas grill the unit is stocked with some mini starter supplies such as shampoo conditioner soap coffee and toilet paper additional supplies can be purchased from one of the many drugstores or grocery stores within a short drive away we have a pack n play and high chair available upon request if you would like to request these items please let me know upon booking and we will do our best to accommodate other things to note other things to notenthis pyramid is in a wonderful location in southwest florida it is just a short drive away to many beaches shopping restaurants some of the highlights in the area include sanibel island naples ft myers beach bonita beach coconut point shopping center lakes park and miromar outlet mall koreshan state park and a few local kayak placesnnplease note this is a quiet and relaxing community we ask that guests respect the village and other guests on site no excessive noise or parties will be allowed especially at night nnno pets allowed at this time no smokingvaping sage insidennnthe village was built 20 years ago so please understand these pyramids have some slight wear and tear keep in mind it is a tropical and humid environment located on a natural spring lake for those travelers who have sensitivities and allergies these pyramids might not be perfect for you we are not representing these homes would compare to an elite hotel or resort but an alternative to other vacation options

Title: Wonderful Casa de Playa in Huentelauquen, Nueva.
Description: wonderful and cozy house with panoramic ocean view bright house with large common areas just meters from the beach it has a protected patio and terraces with spectacular views five bedrooms two and a half bathrooms with solar energy system and backup generator if required woods charcoal grill trampoline stove 12 beds the space the spacena quiet place with incredible views of the sea in semidesert vegetation meters from two quiet beaches house of 250 m2 on a plot of 5000 meters the house has 3 bedroom wings creating independence between sectors ideal side entrance to get from the beach with shower to take off the sand and leave the beach things other things to note other things to notenwe deliver an informative document with the necessary indications for the use of the energy system take care of the ecosystem of the area and use the water without abusing it do not use energyintensive electrical appliances such as hair dryers or blenders as solar energy is not availablenthe house has 8000 litres of nonpotable water per week in case the water runs out it should be purchased by contacting the tanker truck supplier

Title: Mirror House South
Description: the mirror houses are a pair of vacation homes set in the marvellous surroundings of the south tyrolean dolomites amidst a beautiful scenery of apple trees just outside the city of bolzanonthe mirror houses offer a unique chance to spend a beautiful vacation surrounded by contemporary architecture of the highest standards and the most astonishing landscape and beauty nature has to offer the space the spacenmirror house south 45sqm has 1 bedroom with 1 double bed 1 bathroom with a spacious shower and 1 living room kitchen all one space with 1 couch bed the location is ideal for 2 persons but can accommodate up to 4 people if you are in 4 adults we suggest do book both mirror houses north and southnin addition there is a large terrace private garden and a shared garden in summer with a shared pool and self service pool barnalso there is a storage room underneath the house eg for sports equipment guest access guest accessnin the summer months beginning of june end of september our pool is accessible therefore the slightly higher pricennif needed a baby cot high chair can be made available for an additional cost 20 a daynnfor any specific request do not hesitate to ask we can organize almost anything for you other things to note

Title: Ream Hills Helicopter

Title: Luxury Unique Cloud Villa Ocean View
Description: absolutely fantastic architecture of the villa consists of 5 huge shapes creating an internal space with living room kitchen dining area and 3 bedroomsnthis villa is like a great white floating cloud is reflected in the turquoise water of the infinity pool in the garden of the villa is a large area designed for wedding fashion and another events for more than 50 guests come for party the space the spacenthis villa is like a great white floating cloud is reflected in the turquoise water of the infinity pool in the garden of the villa is a large area designed for wedding fashion and another events for more than 50 guests come for partynthe graceful staircase soaring like a bird will lift you up to the master bedroom which offers a magnificent view of the indian oceannthe spherical shape of the internal space creates an extraordinary feeling of harmony and peacena huge double bed lounge zone with chairs from the old teak wood art objects made from onyx bedsides from petrified wood which is 15 mil years old a fivemeter ceiling height with floating lights of hundreds of petals created by the authors of the project make the atmosphere bedroom is truly uniquenthe other two bedrooms are located on the ground floor of the villa and unusual large windows offer views of themed gardens and private terraces in one of the bedrooms works of art created by nature itself and the authors of the project dressing room and a bathroom from the root of a giant tree becoming in the form of sculptures reminiscent of the fantastic flowernall interior parts are created from different varieties of natural marble and precious solid woodnfuturistic design and architecture completes the top class of servicenfeaturing concierge manager full housekeeping butler and restaurantnunique spa menu created in a refined concept boutique hotel sensation

Title: Stunning  5-Bed  Getaway,  Xmas/Winter season
Description: perfectly situated between stratton 15mi okemo 15mi bromley 12mi and magic mountain 2mi resorts the octagon at powder mill is a perfect getaway for skiers and adventurers looking for winter outdoor activities antique shopping siteseeing and fine dining large open spaces 5 bedrooms make it perfect for multiple groupsfamilies cathedral high windows will make you feel immersed in the outdoors while inside the space the spacenthis contemporary retreat built on 2 hillside acres is a oneofa kind home locally known as the octagon perfectly situated near manchester chester peru weston and grafton the octagon at powder mill is a perfect getaway for leaf peepers and adventurers looking for outdoor activities antique shopping site seeing and fine dining large open spaces 5 bedrooms make it perfect for multiple groupsfamilies cathedral high windows will make you feel immersed in the outdoors while insidennin the fall the house serves as a convenient home base for hiking trails of various difficulties some within walking distance or close by in the green mountain national forest theres a large pond visible from our front yard dam for tranquil afternoonsnnnext door we have golf and disc golf fly fishing mountain biking and kayaking at lowell lake state park 5mi also nearby are lively scenes in londonderry peru weston grafton and manchester center with chefrun restaurants farms markets vermont country stores antique stores theatre and festivals please let us know if you have any questions on activities there is lots to donnthe house itself is locally known as the octagon because of its various window faces and architecturally unique elements our two acre hillside haven is oneofa kind as you enter you will be enveloped by pines birch trees and moss covered boulder facades bordered by a pond and seasonal stream the hillside forest ecosystem can be seen from various heights and perspectives from within the two sprawling lightdrenched levels of the house itself the main floor of the top level of the house has one main bedroom with bathroom ensuite second bedroom with bunks a fullyequipped chefs dream kitchen with generous slate countertops custom cabinets multiple bar spaces and updated appliances and adjoining openfloor dining room with fireplace and living room for entertaining off the kitchen also on the main floor next to the dining room is a convenient deck for barbecuing featuring tree top and mountain views on the upstairs balcony is a reading nook with desk and pull out futon next to the enclosed master king sized bedroom perched alongside an old fir giving you the impression of sleeping in a tree house the lower level of the house is nicely separated for large groups to enjoy off the balcony stairs is a pod suite and walk in shower all bathrooms feature radiant heat with slate floors on the ground floor is the octagons great room with 30 high ceilings exposed wooden beams wet bar foosball table massive fireplace large sectional sofa and xfinity connected tv the great room allows easy access to an additional deck and the backyard with fire pit and seasonal brook off the great room are two other bedrooms including the master guest suite with its own fireplace porch and private entrancenna stay at the octagon is a truly magical experience we look forward to hosting you and we hope you enjoy it as much as we do guest access guest accessnyoull have access to the whole house except for the loft area not described in the space other things to note other things to notenthe house is family friendly but isnt fully kidbaby proof portable crib and high chair are available upon requestnnthe house while secluded is easily accessible from route 11 and is sited on wellna plowed roaddriveway with shoveled entryway licence number licence numbernmrt10126712

Title: La Loma del chivo - Na Bolom
Description: this structure was designed and built partially by the same artisan who did a good bit of the foundational work on eves garden one of the best examples of papercrete building world wide and located in north marathonnthis building named na balom or jaguar house in mayan was constructed in the manner of the ubitious conical structures in southern italy all through desert communities in the middle east africa and is comfortable for two the space the spacenthere is a deck on the west side and access is encouraged to the other experimental building projects on la loma del chivo come try this amazing edifice in the wilds of the far west texas transpecos region just north of big bend national park free dust and scorpions are constants as is the overwhelming brilliance of the great via lactea milky way guest access guest accessnspace deck to see the stars and view of our little town beautiful sunsets other things to note other things to notenplease wash the dishes hang the towels when you done thank you

Title: Heiwa Lodge 2Bdrm (winter`21-22 longstay rate ok)
Description: heiwa lodge is a great retreat for friends families or a superb retreat to bring your partner for a romantic getaway heiwa lodge is 1km from the centre to hirafu resort with the ski lift approximately 800m from the property enjoy the benefits of hirafu without the crowds bdrm 1 and 2 can be set as 1 x double or 2 x singles each bedroom is en suite with toilet hand basin and shower no bath tubs please note that for this location we recommend you rent a car the space the spacenprior guests arrival all touch surfaces in our properties light switches door handles key boxes bench tops etc are sprayed with alcohol for our guests safety we supply guests with complimentary face masks upon check in and each property has complimentary hand sanitizernncomplimentary breakfast starter pack upon arrival starter pack includesneggsnmilknbutternbreadnwaternteacoffeegreen teansugarnrice instantnmiso soup instantnnfor guests comfort we have available delivered to your property prearrival snap frozen precooked meals from local restaurants this service is made available to guests and charged separately giving guests the option to dine in at night to avoid restaurants and larger groupsnnheiwa lodge offers much more than a condominium style accommodation restaurants bars and shops are all within walking distance of the property however we do recommend renting a car with this location for your convenience the house has a well equipped kitchen a tv with an hdmi cable for screening netflixs etc no local or cable tv free wifi is standard on a clear day in winter there are views of mt yotei in summer the property has air conditioning

Title: SiloStay - one of it's kind in the world
Description: youll love silostay because of the ambience the outdoors space the light the comfy bed and the neighbourhood silostay is good for couples solo adventurers and business travellersnnas our silos are isolated from each other and the silocheckin is contactless we are not requesting vaccine passesnnthe only areas where silonauts might encounter each other are at the key kiosk and dropoff in the car park or on the boardwalks providing access to the silos the space the spacenour silos provide a haven of intimacy where you can close off the world outside each 2storied silo is fully selfcontained and perfect for a couple an upstairs bedroom ensuite contains a queen bed fitted with a multifunctional music headboard that utilizes a car stereo to play your tunes charge your devices and provide moody lighting there is a tv and dvd player and there is more quirky appeal when you lift the ceiling hatch to make way for a view to the sky from your bed you could catch a glimpse of stars or even watch snow flakes fall on the glass in the winter step outside onto your upstairs balcony to admire views over the banks peninsula countrysidendownstairs youll find a kitchenette containing everything youll need for making a bite to eat microwave small fridge and 2 element cooktop we provide a selection of teas plunger coffee hot chocolate sugar and a bottle of fresh milk to get you started and the little river cafe store next door will have enough supplies to see you right for anything else you may neednwe are proud to be 100 smokefree

Title: The LOFT at Cozumel's Casa Darcy Bungalows
Description: the loft is a uniquely designed bungalow the stairs to the loft bedroom are made from cocobolo wood and beams overhead are exposed which add beauty to this space double bedbuilt in closet upstairs the ground floor has a single bed sofa kitchenette with amenities and large walk in bathroom outside is a dive pool pond covered palapa and lush gardens the loft suits 12 people linens towels purified water coffee included lock box please see our fb page for more reviews the space the spacenthere are two cruiser bikes for guests to use now while they stay at casa darcy our property has 3 bungalows in total and lots of space between each each is a private small home for guests varying in size from our main bungalow which is two stories and has 3 terraces to our loft and then our pool suite for short term stays guest access guest accessnguests are welcome to sit outside the loft in our gardens or sit upstairs in the large palapa covered area with overhead fans the dive pool is for all guests as well
