Title: "At the rhythm of the tides" sea and modern design
Description: au rythme des mares is a beautiful modern and luminous flat with a large 3m x 4m bay designed by an architect located on the pink granite coast the house is southwest facing with a large garden with a swing and a loggia spacious and functional it also has two wooden terraces located 100m from a beautiful family sandy beach and the gr34 is next door a cocooning accommodation with all the comforts to rest come and enjoy the sea air the space the spacenthe servicesnthe bed linen kit is included in your stay it consists of a flat sheet a duvet cover and a pillowcase the beds are also made up on arrivalnplease note we do not provide a towel and bath mat kitnif you forgot to bring it it is possible to rent the towel kit a bath sheet and a small towel for 10 per personnbaby equipment high chair bed bathtub potty is free and available on requestnin the common room a washing machine and a dryer are availablen babysitting available on request for a feenthe house offers impeccable comfort is bright thanks to its large windows with direct access to a 30 m wooden terracen fully equipped kitchen oven microwave refrigerator freezer dishwasher induction hob nespresso coffee machinen spacious living room with 43inch hdtvn 1 bedroom with 1 sleeping 2 pers bed 160x200n 1 bathroom with walkin showernupstairs n 1 large bright room sea view with 1 sleeping 2 pers bed 160x200 and 1 bed bed 90x200noutside n 2 terraces including a large terrace with garden table and private planchanparasol and 2 chairs sunbathingn garden with swing and slide for childrenn private parkingn infos electric sunshade electric shutters blinds and curtainsn quality beddingnthe property is large 2500 m2 travelers have space and appreciate the unique architecture of the place our construction project was thought from the beginning carefully thought out with an architect to make our rental project a success to allow vacationers to make the most of the beauty of the seascape the light to feel good in our accommodation and in bellevuessurmernnnnhouse rulesn nonsmoking accommodationn pets are not allowedn no parties or noisy evenings to keep the residence quietnno possibility to charge an electric carnno possibility to wash your car guest access guest accessncommon room laundry equipment washing machine dryernparking space in the propertyngarden with swingslide other things to note other things to notenshort stay possiblenexcept in july and august minimum 7 nightsnnservices nthe bed linen and towels kit is included in the rental price the bed linen set is placed on each bed and includes a flat sheet a duvet cover and a pillowcase a bath towel and a small towelnbaby equipment high chair bed bath pot available on request 5 nbabysitting possible paying optionnrules of proceduren nonsmoking accommodationn pets are not acceptedn no parties or noisy parties to preserve the calm of the residencennin accordance with local legislation there is a tourist tax to pay this is the number of people over 18 who is concerned the applied rate is 050 per night the amount will be requested upon arrival licence number licence numbern50145494600044

Title: Pikul Hut3 Surrounded by scented trees.
Description: little bamboo hut with outside bathroom a very good place to relax as it is surrounded by nature pikul is a little bamboo hut which provides a nice area to sit and relax in a quiet environment make yourself at home staying at baan suanthip will make you feel as if you were visiting familyn the space the spacenunique to the area baan suan thip is an ideal place to relax and enjoy an unspoiled part of thailandnnimmerse yourself in the culture of southern thailand with amazing people food and nature experience the hidden treasures of ao luek with local guides who enjoy sharing their experiences and culture whether its a swim in the jungle pool boat trip to some of the many stunning islands of ao luek bay or kayaking in the mangroves to caves with 3000 year old cave art there is something for everybodynna 5 minute walk to thanbok koranee national park 20 minutes from the beach by car or motorbike assistance with arranging transportation available if needed many local food shops restaurants and a 711 are within walking distance or by bicyclennlocal markets in ao luek provide an opportunity to enjoy the delicious local food and people the owner and landscape designer tan who created the lush gardens at baan suan thip also offers thai cooking lessons or meditation classes on sitennairport pickups from krabi airport krabi town or ao nang availablenao luek is also easy to reach by bus from phuket krabi or surathanninonsite scooter and bicycle rental coming soon guest access guest accessnwe got 4 bicycle petong ball and many thing for free other things to note other things to notenjust make your self at home here i hope you can feel this is your second home

Title: Glamping in Friday Harbor
Description: the ting house offers a tiny home away from home perfect for exploring friday harbor this sweet one room cabin accommodates a small family of three featuring a sweet little kitchen woodstove one queen bed and a couch the space the spacenthe ting house is a one room rustic cabin located in a tiny meadow in a douglas fir forest the cabin offers a wood burning stove for heat propane three burner stove and hot and cold running water we will provide a cooler for your food items your designated bath house is a short stroll away and is complete with a flushing toilet and hot shower for washing up pprov0170021 guest access guest accessnguests have a designated parking spot and access to a shared bath house complete with flushing toilets and hot shower other things to note other things to notenplease note that getting to the island requires a ferry reservation from anacortes to friday harbor you can see a schedule and pricing information at wsdot ferries the reservation holds your spot on the ferry make sure to arrive at least 45 minutes before the departing ferry you can make your reservation 2 months before 2 weeks before or 2 days before your departure some standby tickets will be available for drive up however these goes quickly and during the summer months may require a long wait at the ferry terminal the ting house is located 1 mile down an unpaved country road off of bailer hill on the north west side of the island as such we highly recommend a vehicle in order to access the property and allow maximum flexibility for sightseeing and seeking out meals road bicycles will find our road difficult to navigate and possibly dangerous mountain bikes are able to negotiate the access road easily howeverncell service on the property is spotty at best and wifi is nearly non existentnwe advise bringing a head lamp or flashlight for treks to the restroom though we have solar lights illuminating the path our property is located in a douglas fir forest and the additional light is recommendednif bringing food items you may want to pick up an extra bag of ice for the cooler also please note that the grocery store is open until 9pm and most of the island resturants close between 9pm and 10pmnfinally this property does have a pet dog she is big fluffy and friendly but mostly sticks close to the hosts

Title: King Bedroom in Eco Domes on Sustainable Farm
Description: the domes are uniquely inspired by an architect based on sacred geometric angles combined with sustainable building material without use of any metal within its dome structures in order to preserve its energy fields within no outside microwave fields penetrate the dome structures the structures also hold special acoustics for sound musicnni am also available to cook delicious local organic vegetarian breakfasts for an additional charge of 510personmeal depending on your selection other things to note other things to notenthe king bed can comfortably fit 3 people though typically we host 12 people in the king bedroom there is an additional semiprivate space in a separate room of the house upstairs that has a chaise lounge with a small single mattress where a third person can sleep if you have 3 guests and 1 bed is not suitable for all 3 folks please message your host in advance if this option is requested so we can be sure to have it appropriately setup for you thank you

Title: Enjoying the Wangeliner Garten - Eco-tip (Room 4)
Description: the double room with its separate access gives you a special feeling of living through the vaultlike interior designnin the room approx 17m you will experience a special room climate which is achieved by the clay in the wall stones and floornthe bathroom is plastered with blame act which gives it a noble ambiencenin the integrated small kitchen you can prepare your very own breakfast you can use a fridge kettle toaster dishes etc the space the spacenhere on the edge of the mecklenburg lake district not far from plau am see lies wangelin welcomennthe description of the holiday roomnthe double room in our guest house built of straw bales gives the visitor a special feeling of living through the vaulted interior design it has a separate access from the outside and is equipped with a private bathroom shower and toiletnthe 40 cm thick straw bales plastered with clay provide a very high insulation standard so that the heating energy expenditure is very lownin the room approx 17m you will experience a special room climate which is achieved by combining the clayplastered walls the use of clay stones and a tamped clay floornthe room is uniquely designed in its colour scheme warm harmonious natural tones give the room an almost mediterranean atmospherenthe shower room is plastered with a traditional moroccan marble lime tadelakt which gives it a noble ambience that you can literally feel tadelakt cleaning surfaces fascinate with their color and surface structure the shimmering slightly wavy and lively surfaces exert a great attractionnthe double bed 140 x 200 cm was created by a wood designer from parts of ancient looms in combination with metal and stone to an experience place of all sensesnin the small kitchen integrated in the room you can prepare your very own breakfast however a fridge kettle toaster dishes etc is not available for this purpose from may to autumn we open the simply equipped summer kitchen on the premises for our guests who do not have any cooking facilities in your accommodationnwifi access is available in the wangeliner garten caf and is accessible during the daynunfortunately the airbnb booking system cannot be combined with our wangeliner garten system so you must first make an inquiry here however you usually get an answer within an hournif you havent discovered it yet weve got other places to stay for youngrtnerinnenhaus httpswwwairbnbcomrooms14053630previewformltrue wohnwagennhttpswwwairbnbcomrooms10164312previewformltrue lehmklosternhttpswwwairbnbcomrooms14117664previewformltrue firstnof all please make a booking request so that there are no double occupancies as our wangelinergarten booking system cannot be integrated here other things to note other things to notenthe village of wangelin is located on the edge of the mecklenburg lake district off the main roads so very quiet the nearest larger towns are plau am see lbz and meyenburg all about 15 km away

Title: The Sleeve House
Description: the sleeve house is a getaway for lovers of architecture design and the hudson valley this unique structure conceived as two intersecting volumes recently won second place in the americanarchitects us building of the year competition sited on 15 acres of open rolling meadows the setting affords privacy as well as dramatic views of the mountains the towns of hudson rhinebeck red hook chatham kinderhook and millerton are all within a 30minute drive the space the spacenfor more information about the sleeve house please visitnnhttpgarydimaurocomlistingthesleevehousennornnaslashocom guest access guest accessnyou will have access to the entire house

Title: Polo's Igloo

Title: Sleeping under a grass roof
Description: on the quiet shore of the river reitdiep you find our comfortable unique cottage the house has a grass roof and offers you a breathtaking view in all seasons the spacious house is 100 m2 and is fully equipped for six people the space the spacenon the shore of the river reitdiep you find our comfortable holiday homennit is a particular cottage because the roof is made of grass the detached house has a sunny garden a large southfacing terrace and a private landingstage in the beautiful river reitdiep in summer you can swim or fish here whatever you wantnthe cottage offers you peace and a breathtaking view in all seasons and all weather typesnnour grass roof house is 100 m 2 and is fully equipped for six people the house is nice and comfy there is underfloor heating free internet a woodburning stove double oven dishwasher microwave washing machine and dryer there are three bedrooms two have a double bed one with box spring the third bedroom has a bunk bed there are a spacious living room kitchen en bathroomnnthere is an excellent fiber optic internet connection throughout the house with a 100 mbps download and a 100 mbps uploadnnthe minimum rental period is three nights in high season the minimum rental period is seven nights other things to note

Title: Houseboat by the sea Alkyona Beach - your oasis of peace
Description: right on the beach is our boat an old wooden fishing boat became a wonderful place to live by the sea the views are magnificent many animals such as turtles kingfishers herons and even flamingos can be observed on the premises in winternjust 30 minutes from the olympus mountains you have all the possibilities that mountains and sea and culture offer the space the spacenwe converted the old fishing boat into a holiday home and it is only 15 meters from the sea with large panoramic windows and a particularly comfortable lower deck it is a real experience ideal for families couples or young groups of up to 6 people there is also a bathroom and a small kitchen guest access guest accessnthe entire site may be used 36000m we also have changing rooms on the beach a shower and toilet block on request we can also prepare a greek breakfast on the beach provide towels and help you find the best hidden destinations for excursions other things to note other things to notenon the beach we offer snacksbreakfast and dinner together in our bistro we have guests of villa sevasti who use our disabled beach during the day dear dogs cats and donkeys live on our premises it is not fenced by the direct beach location licence number licence numbernafm 800728979

Title: Bell Rock Vista - Unit G
Description: two bedroom 25 bath townhouse in the village of oak creek facing the beautiful sedona red rocks minutes from 3 great golf courses tennis shopping hiking and many great restaurants the space the spacenspacious townhome with 1240 sf of living space private bathrooms and balconies off each bedroom nice patio with optional hot tub usage directv with hddvr there is a a queen sofa sleeper in the living room guest access guest accessnwe have an electronic lock on the front door code is sent upon confirmation of reservation other things to note other things to notenwe include a 10 discount to cucina rustica a great italian restaurant near our townhouse we also include a red rock parking pass that you can use it will save you 5day at parking places when hiking and sightseeingwe include discounts for golf at sedona golf resort and oak creek country club pets are not allowed theres a hot tub maintenance fee of 25stay if you would like to use it the hot tub is dedicated to only our renters of unit g

Title: Coastguards Beach House
Description: stay at coastguards beach house and discover a landscape full of myths and legends surrounded by the haunting loneliness of romney mash the space the spacencoastguards beach house summarynnsleeps 4 1 people single fold out bed in 2nd bedroomnsea viewsnbeach just 80 meters awaynpet friendlynhigh chair travel cot suppliednwoodburning stoven6 miles to rspb dungeness nature reserven6 miles to medieval town of ryenquiet and secluded locationnsouth facing fully enclosed gardennparking for 2 carsnsuperfast broadbandnflat screen 32 tvndvd playernselection of dvds board games and booksnipod docking stations in living room and both bedroomsnncoastguards beach house is so close to the beach you can see it from the upstairs windows yet youre also not far from camber village and a little further on the pretty cinque port town of ryennhere at coastguards beach house views extend in every direction with marshland designated an sssi site of special scientific interest to one side and the sea to the othernna painstaking amount of care and attention was paid to renovating this traditional 1875 coastguards propertyturnedcosyholidaycottage find comforts like a log burner a comfortable lounge and a modern kitchen we consider the coastguards beach house the perfect place for some wellearned rr far away from the monotony of everyday lifenndining loungingnncoastguards beach house has a contemporary and sociable open plan layout downstairs ideal for enjoying the company of your holiday group a log burning stove warms the space and sets the scene for relaxing with a good book and a glass of winennthe newly equipped kitchen is fully stocked breakfast bar and farmhouse dining table for planning the day ahead for ingredients that are fresh as it gets take a quick drive to rye for seafood fresh from the boat and romney marsh lamb from the local butchers talk to beside the sea for our recommendationsnnbed bathnnupstairs youll find a beautiful modern family bathroom and two bedroomsnnthe large comfortable master bedroom has a double bed with views of the sea coastal garden and adjoining coastguard cottagesnna family bathroom includes wash hand basin wc and a raised shower bath with screen providing you a coveted choice between a relaxing bubble bath whilst stargazing or a refreshing shower with a view of waves lapping the shorennthe second bedroom has two 3ft beds and a single fold away bed with unspoilt views over the marsh this room also benefits from an ensuite shower room with marsh viewsnnoutdoorsnnthe cottage has a fully enclosed southfacing and quiet garden the site of many relaxing holiday evenings after exploring historical sites walking the marsh and playing in the waves the beach is just steps away over the seawall with a paved boardwalk spanning its length for easy walks and jogs guest access guest accessnkeysafe details are in the digital guide other things to note other things to notenour bookings are protected by superhog you will be contacted by superhog directly to verify yourself once your booking is confirmed you can also go via their website superhogcom to start the verification or wait to be contactednncoastguards is located near to the lydd ranges a military firing range its also a nature reservennit has been used for military training for over 150 years and is part of the dungeness romney marsh and rye bay site of special scientific interest it is home to incredibly rare plants and animalsnnbecause the range is used for live firing access is sometimes restricted red flags are flown during these times access is prohibited along the foreshorennwhen firing is not carried out it may be possible to walk along a designated path along the shorennthroughout 2021 the environment agency ea will be working on improving the existing coastal defences between jurys gap and dungeness and so will be utilising the compound to the right of the cottages the area with the green containers on the photo this will mean that the construction vehicles will be using the promenade to access the ranges on the mod landnncoastguards are old properties in a very exposed location and in the winter months the wind can really howl off the sea some guests love watching the weather go wild or the sea mist rolling creating an eerie atmosphere while some have found it a little unsettlingnnso if you are not a fan of older houses that have history and character then this would not be for you we do have modern properties down the road that are in a more sheltered environment

Title: Rooms By The Sea on The Sunshine Coast.
Description: beautiful spacious newly refurbished first floor one bedroom flat with floor to ceiling windows overlooking the beach on the border of hastings and st leonards walking distance to the bars restaurants and shops of hastings old town town centre and st leonards sleeps 2 in king size four poster bed with a roll top bath shower and fully fitted kitchen tv and fast wifi nearby free parking the space the spacenwe have a huge livingdining room with a 3 metre high bay window overlooking the sea there are double doors opening into the bedroom so you can lie in bed and look out to sea we have a rolltop bath in the bedroom and a separate toiletbasin the kitchen is a separate room also with a sea view

Title: The Beach Hut Gurnard-stunning beachside location
Description: the beach hut gurnard located in an enviable position is the perfect home from home for solotravellers couples friends and small families this beachfront property features fantastic solent views the perfect place to watch the stunning sunsets gurnard is famous for wellequipped and with fast wifi makes this the ideal choice for a chilled break enjoying the sea beach and all that goes with it all on your doorstep the space the spacenthe two bedrooms can accommodate four people comfortably with one room being a double and the other a twin 2 single bedsnbenefitting from an openplan living area the property has a well equipped kitchen including washing machine dishwasher and coffee machine na large island incorporates the induction hob and plenty of seating space for a breakfast bar with 4 upholstered stoolsna childrens chair and table set is available if the stools are unsuitable please enquirentwo large sofas make up the lounge area with coffee and side tables and a wall mounted tv with smarttv box on opening the double doors you have a decked outdoor space with picnic bench for alfresco dining plenty of seating and magnificent viewing platform for watching the nearby sailing club set sail and also the many windsurfers and paddle boarders that are drawn to the area if you fancy joining in there are local hire companies who will supply any equipment requirednrelax and watch the world go by and enjoy a pizza delivery from one of our local businesses who deliver to the areanwe are happy to accommodate one small dog to join you on your holidays but we please ask to refrain from allowing them on the furniture or beds please bring their own bed and bowlsnnthere are some points to advise before booking the accommodation there are steps to the bedrooms and bathroom and care should be taken one bedroom has a reduced head height in the doorway the upper roof terrace is unavailable to guests finally there are some building works been carried out at present in the vicinity and may be some noise during the week days the neighbouring property was demolished over a year ago and is waiting rebuilding no work has started on this site should this situation change i will notify any guests affectednferry discount codes are available please enquire when bookingnwe operate a self check in system for your convenience using a key safe all codes will be sent before travel

Title: BEACH DREAM STAYCATION! UNIQUE & TRANQUIL
Description: soak up the british sea air in our newly refurbished two double bedroom beach house enjoy an open plan down stairs living area with views of the sea enter in from the busy road to an unexpected magical high spec seafront property enjoy a large outdoor garden area with decking and balcony this really is a hidden gem with unavoidable beautiful views of the sea if you can bare to leave then worthing chichester shoreham and brighton are easily accessible by walking bus or even swimming the space the spacenwe have worked hard to make this place as lovely as can be downstairs you have a carefully planned living space perfect for friends and family get togethersnupstairs there are 2 bedrooms both doubles with a jack and jill bathroom which is accessed via each bedroom so dont forget to lock both doors the master bedroom has a king size double bed and is luxuriously decorated large patio doors out to a large balcony the view is mind blowing you can see to worthing and brighton from here and look over the beach your own little private suntrap at night the wind farm is even more spectacular and the lights from brighton twinkle awaynthe 2nd bedroom with a double bed is equally luxurious smart tv for viewing however no view slightly smaller and on the main road side of the house noise is minor but not silent all of the timenthe kitchen is designed that even whilst the chef is hard at work they wont miss out on any conversation or interaction they even have the best view in the house whilst chopping their onionsnthe lounge area is comfortable and has a large open fire where you can enjoy cosy eveningsn42 large screen smart tv gives you plenty of choice for viewingndining room to the rear with dining table for 4 and a nice chesterfield arm chair if you would rather just read a book and watch the sea dining room leads out to the garden partially decked and partially paved completely enclosed so if you wanted to bring your pooch then you can be sure of their safety there is a gate in the garden side wall that you can get straight onto the beach withnthe beach in lancing is just amazing you will be sure to take endless photos and go on endless walks 2 minutes to the left east of the house is an amazing restaurantcafe called the perch they serve everything you would need the food is excellent here they also do one of the best breakfast bacon sandwiches i have ever tasted takeaways available alsonwe are always at hand to help however you are on your own here we dont interfere or even come and say hi unless you want us tonthis place is perfect for a summers get away water sports weekend winter hibernation a real break from reality

Title: House on the beach
Description: awesome weather boarded beach house on the stunning sandy beach at camber east sussex under 2 hours from london enjoy barefoot beach living in a gorgeous house where the beach is your front garden up to two well behaved dogs welcome at 35 per dog per stay dogs have free run of the entire beach from october to may between may and september you will need to walk 50 metres along from the house to reach the dog friendly section of beach the space the spacenbarefoot brings you closer to nature and offers an idyllic escape from the stresses of everyday life cosy up by the old wood burner or toast marshmallows on the deck surrounded by your own private dune the house has plenty of character with stripped wooden floors and doors but combines this with modern luxuries for a once in a lifetime experience of true beach living guest access guest accessnthe sandy dune fringed beach stretches for miles the gorgeous cinque port town of rye is less than 10 minutes away and dungeness the uks only desert is just 15 minutes away hastings and dover are easily within an hour other things to note other things to notenin high season bookings are for a minimum of 7 nights commencing fri in mid and low season there are options to book a 3 night weekend frisatsun or a 4 night midweek montuewedthu as well as week stays or longer check ins are on either friday or monday depending on length of stay

Title: The Beach House
Description: the beach house west wittering beachnan airy bright home shares a garden with the main house sitting directly on the beach a perfect getaway an hour and a half from londonnit is selfcontained and is close to goodwood chichester theatre great bike routes local pubs and of course the sea is on your doorstepnopenplan fullyequipped new kitchen big comfortable sofa tvwifi separate shower roomnsuper king double bed plus 2 single beds on large mezzanine floor with a sea view the space the spacenample parking by the housennlocal surfing club has all you need to learnrentnpaddleboarding kitesurfing windsurfing with friendly staff to help www2xscouknshore water sports 22 shore road east wittering sells clothes and equipmentnnfor newspapers and daily fresh breadcroissants we have sayas our brilliant local minimart in west wittering open early til late most daysnnfor all your daytoday needs east wittering a five minute drive but nicer bike ride has two supermarkets tesco and the coop also numerous independent shops and great local produce try something fishy for the daily catch or horrocks for fresh fruit and vegnnanything you may need for a day on the beach is sold in quite a few places in east wittering eg crocs beach balls boogie boards etcnnthere are also many local pubs and places to eat andor get great takeout from a traditional fishandchip supper to delicious indian meal to tapas pizza a pub lunch a big fryup at the boulevard or we even have a pancake breakfast place check out driftin just ask me for details i can let you know we also have a new beach cafe just up the beach about a 5 minute walk to your right as you access the path outside it serves hot food coffees and ice cream in the main restaurant or from the takeout section

Title: Family home on seafront. Private pool, balcony.
Description: a truly spectacular beachfront home with direct access to bracklesham beach is ready to delight up to 9 guests ideal for families or groups of friends heres a stunning property with amazing views thats bright and welcoming among its many highlights are the private indoor heated swimming pool the extensive balcony with sea views and the patio and garden with direct access to the beach this is the kind of place dreams are made of the space the spacenshell seekers is an amazing house with a unique history its actually built around a classic railway carriage which dates back to the 1920s extensively modernised and extended over the years the house is now an eyecatching homefromhome thats ready to make groups of friends families with children even work colleagues warmly welcome for short or longterm stylish stays by the seannand when we say this is a beachfront home we mean it check out the amazing sea views from many of the homes rooms and the fact that you will enjoy direct access to the beach from the beautiful garden with so much to see and enjoy lets start a quick tour of this bracklesham bay beauty by the beachnnopen plan living room dining roomnthere are actually two spaces designed for you all to gather to relax or socialise one on each floor both have comfortable seating on which you can all kickback and live like you do at home maybe watch the wallmounted flat screen tvs read or just take in those amazing views the upstairs sitting room gives you direct access to a balcony that will afford you yet more sea views the downstairs lounge also has a dining table with space for everyone to gather and experience the delights youve created in the homes exceptionalnnmodern kitchennyoud expect such a stunning home to have a smart kitchen with high specification appliances and thats precisely what youve got here everything you need to prepare snacks and meals and to wash clothes and dishes is here for younn4 bedroomsnthree of the bedrooms are situated on the ground floor of this magnificent beachfront home including the master bedroom heres a sleeping space that has it all an ultra comfortable kingsize bed its own dressing room and ensuite bathroom plus simply spectacular views there are two other bedrooms on the other side of the house on the ground floor the fourth and final bedroom is upstairs with a stunning dual aspect that includes a sea view plus access to the balcony well leave you to decide between yourselves who gets what room rest assured theyre all gloriously comfortable with plenty of storage space for your belongingsnnbathroomsntake your pick from a stylish bath tub in which you can relax in bubbles or standalone showers that will invigorate you at the start or end of the day there are various bathrooms and dressing facilities that are available on both floors of this stunning home by the seannindoor poolnfancy a dip before breakfast or a refreshing swim in the afternoon undoubtedly one of the highlights of this home is its 25ft heated indoor swimming pool enjoy the chance to relax in private around and in a beautiful pool always a popular feature for guests of all ages and its all yoursnnoutside spacenthe inside is certainly impressive and so are the outside spaces you get with this home as well as the extensive balcony on the upper floor and the parking spaces at the front at the back of the house theres a large decked area with plenty of seating space for everyone to gather and enjoy the views theres also a garden which gives you direct access to bracklesham beach but youd expect no less from a beachfront property as stunning as thisnnchildrens play areasnthis beautiful house is perfect for kids theres even a kids playroom and an outdoor shed area for them to explore plus plenty of childfriendly facilities laid on by your hostsnnhighlightsn direct access to the glorious pebble beachn private indoor pooln amazing sea viewsn recently refurbishedn child friendly with kids play roomn free parking on premises guest access guest accessnguests have access to the entire property other things to note other things to noten covid19 sanitization nheath safety and wellbeing of our guests are of utmost importance to us for this reason we use a thorough process of cleaning after each checkoutnn noiseaware nplease be mindful of our neighbours during your stay our propertys quiet hours are in place to ensure that everyone can enjoy a peaceful nights sleep we care a lot about maintaining good relationships with our community so we appreciate you following our house rules during your staynnwe are committed to rent responsibly standards this means we follow bestinclass guidelines to ensure you have a peaceful safe and memorable stay with us we use smart home technology to improve your experience noiseaware is a smart home device that measures volume levels throughout the property and allows us to respond to noise nuisances without disrupting your stay noiseaware is 100 privacy compliant and is required on this property if you have any questions please ask we are committed to your comfort so please let us know if we can do anything during your stay to make it more enjoyable

Title: Seafront Home with Private Access 2 Beach - Selsey
Description: beautiful modern architect designed property just by the sea with private access to the beach theres a fire pit in the garden a bbq on the terrace and a balcony with magnificent views over the sea the space is ideal for family and friends get togethers the large open plan kitchendiningliving area invites socialising as well as relaxing the outdoors and interiors merge in this light filled house with french doors opening up to balconies terraces and front and back gardens guest access guest accessnguest have access to the entire house

Title: Panoramic Sea View, Prime Location, Free Parking
Description: prime central seafront location by brighton pier with arguably the best sea views in brightonnfree off street private parking space for 1 carnluxury second floor 2 bedroom apartment in a central residential regency building with uninterrupted panoramic sea pier views from lounge bay window 2nd bedroom master bedroom ensuite with views over new stein gardens to the sea close to all major attractions inside the pride village zonenmidday check out available for a small feenno parties the space the spacenplease state your reason for staying in your booking message we do not allow any kinds of parties or groups of guests that may disturb or upset our neighbours it is a residential building and any noise must be kept to a minimumnnthis is a prestigious and well equipped luxury 2nd floor apartment right on brighton seafront and we want you to enjoy the very best that brighton has to offer you in both style and comfortwe hope that staying in our apartment will help you to fulfil that to the utmostnncheck in time is from 4pm but you will be messaged if it is available beforehand parking will be available to you from whichever time you check in we will be parked in the space whilst we prepare the apartment for you the space is privately owned and marked flat 4nif you will be arriving early to brighton there is free parking for up to 4 hours at brighton marina car park if that might be helpfulnncheck out is by 11am however if agreed to and paid for in advance this can be extended to midday for an extra fee please enquire for thisnnparkingnthe apartment comes with its own single private parking space on the forecourt at the front it is the left side space by the path to the entrance door marked flat 4 the space must be vacated at check out to make room for me to park my car whilst i service the apartment for new guests arrivingnncommunal entrancenaccess to the apartment is through the main communal entrance at the front of the building and up the stairs to the 2nd floor the key to the main communal door is located in a masterlock key safe padlocked to the black railings to the right of the door the code to access this will be sent shortly before arrival please close this and scramble the code after taking the key the door to the apartment has an electronic keypad entry code system that is randomly generated specifically for each guests stay this will be 4 digits and sent together with the key access codennapartment entrance hallncupboard with hooks on back of door for coats etc in this cupboard we store the sofa bedding a spare dining chair iron ironing boardnshelf with internet hub and above is the heating thermostatncctv camera monitoring the entrance hallnnlounge size 14 9 in to bay x 14 1nthis is open plan with the kitchenkitchen measurements separatenthe room is laid with varnished solid oak flooringnthere is a leather 4 seater sofa with king size bed pull out with real sprung mattress there is a leather strap under the middle headrest to use to pull the sofa bed openna large 65 samsung uhd smart tv with freeview hangs on the wall opposite the sofa a solid oak coffee table sits nicely in front of the sofa a solid oak extending dining table sits in the double glazed bay window space with a professional telescope on top for those that would like to star gaze look out to the sea etcnot for use by young kids the bay window has beautiful white shutters and overlooks the beach and sea to the south east and west to the east you can see the marina and clifftops and on the right you can see brighton pier west pier sealife centre volks railway and zip line just outside there is a double socket with 2 usb charging points next to the sofa for chargingpower for your electrical itemsnthe main lounge lights and pendant light are dimmable and remote controlled the remotes are kept in the coffee table drawernnkitchen size 11 3 x 5 3nthe kitchen area has luxury silvergrey real stone floor tiles the main kitchen lights are also remote controlled and dimmable the remote controls are kept in the coffee table drawernthe kitchen has been fitted with the highest quality fully integrated appliances by brands such as neff siemens elica etc and finished off with a sublime tiger walnut worktop for a truly luxurious feel and is equipped with everything that anyone would require including a kettle matching 4 slice toaster and nespresso coffee machine the appliance user manuals for everything are kept on the shelf above the fridgenvarious kitchen utensils cutlery glasses cups pots pans etc are all provided in the drawers and cupboardsnfor laundry there is an integrated washerdryer and the siemens oven is also a microwave that can be controlled via wifi all instructions on how to use the appliances will be found in the kitchen cupboard above the fridge freezernthe bin is located in the cupboard next to the washerdryerntea coffee and sugar are provided as are some basics like washing up liquid some cleaning materials and capsules for the washing machine and dishwashernthe newly fitted and insured vaillant combi boiler is located in the cupboard at the end of the kitchen a small fire extinguisher is also next to itnnmaster bedroom 15 1 x 9 4 max to 7 1 min ensuite toilet 5 1 x 3 6nthis room has been fitted with a luxurious silver carpet and has been furnished with exquisite matching white french style furniture and solid king size bed the bed has an award winning sealy nostromo posturepedic mattress with a large silky soft velvet headboard and topped off with quality bed linen so a great nights sleep should be guaranteednthe bedside table has 3 small drawers with a lamp and dab clock radio on topnthe large wardrobe with its mirrored doors has hanging space a shelf and 2 large drawers under for storagenthe dressing table has a large folding mirror 2 drawers and chair under the dressing table is a double socket with 2 usb sockets for chargingpower for your electrical itemsnthe lighting is remote controlled and dimmable to suit your mood the remote is kept in the bedside table drawernthe view through the white window shutters is over new stein gardens and towards the sea and marinathe balcony outside the window does not belong to this apartment and cannot be usedna hair dryer is provided in the roomnthe ensuite toilet has fully tiled walls in luxury travertine and a black and silver grey slate floor again the sash window looks over new stein gardens and to the sea and marina the mirror has led lighting that can be turned onoff by waving your hand underneathnnsecond bedroom size 11 8 x 6 7nthis room has been fitted with a luxurious light brown carpet and has been furnished with top quality painted solid oak furniture the bed is a double size with headboard and sits snuggly between the side and end walls under the window so please take this in to consideration if you are tall as there is no space to hang your feet out of the end of the bed the bed has a highly rated casper memory foam mattress at the foot of the bed is a 40 samsung uhd smart tv with freeview tv to the side of the bed is a double glazed window with its wonderful white shutters and large window ledge that looks out directly to the beach brighton pier and seanthe double wardrobe has hanging space with a drawer undernthe dressing table has 2 small drawers freestanding mirror lamp and dab clock radio on top and matching leather upholstered solid oak chairnunder the dressing table is a double socket with 2 usb sockets for chargingpower for your electrical itemsna large mirror hangs on the wall above the radiator coverna hair dryer is provided in the roomnthe lighting is remote controlled and dimmable the remote is kept in the dressing table drawernnmain bathroom size 5 9 x 5 6nthe bathroom has been fully tiled with luxury largetravertine wall tiles and silvergrey slate flooringnthis room features a double length shower enclosure with a luxurious rain or waterfall shower option from the shower head above there is also a hand held shower hosenthe mirror is led litntop quality soap shower gel and shampooconditioner are provided as are quality towelsnsome cleaning materials and a first aid kit are kept under the sinknnhallnthe hallway has solid oak floors and is where the entry phone internet router and hive heating thermostat are located just by the lounge doornto the left of the entrance door is a large cupboard that houses a spare oak dining chair hoover ironing board iron broom dustpan brush spare towels and the bedding for the sofa bed etc as well as the water stop cockbottom far right corner and consumer unitmain electric switches inside left wallnnthe apartment features exclusive stunning commissioned original limited edition artwork throughout by up and coming local artist richard berner his beasts of brighton workcollection is particularly interesting as it is of local famous brighton landmarkssubjects his intricate and alternative style is unique to his vision and as far as we can tell there is nothing else in this style aroundnnnext door propertynwe also own a luxury 1 bedroom apartment that sleeps 4 at the next door property39b which has permit parking for 1 car if you are a group of up to 10 people it is possible to book both together providing it is also available you should be able to find this in our other listings from our page guest access guest accessnguests have full use of the apartment if less than 3 guests are staying the 2nd bedroom will only be made up on requestnnthere is an apartment information sheet provided containing useful info regarding the apartment and surroundings this is found on the kitchen worktop at check in along with the parking permit please return the parking permit at your check outnnwifi is unlimited the password is on the router in the hallnnboth tvs have freeview and internet so guests can log in to their own netflix or similar accountsnnat the very front of the building is a private off street parking space for 1 car only the left side space belongs to our apartmentflat 4 the space is available from check in until check out and you will need to use the parking permit provided to display during your stay we will need to park in this space and use the permit in our car after your check out please return the permit back to the kitchen worktop in the apartment at check out a 35 fee is chargeable from your deposit if the permit is lost or takennot returnednnthe key for the main entrance is kept in a key safe box next to the front door you will be given the code to access it shortly before your arrival please close it and scramble the code after taking the key at the end of your stay you may leave the key on the kitchen worktop and just close the door behind younnthe apartment door has a special code lock the code is changed between each guest remotely and will be given to you shortly before your arrival the lock has a safety feature whereby it will not accept any codes for 1 minute if a code is entered too slowly or incorrectly 3 consecutive times if it flashes red please leave it for 1 minute before trying to enter your code again if you pause between a key press for too long the lock will reset and you will have to wait a minute before entering your code again so please have your code to hand and ready to enternnunfortunately this apartment has no disabled access and is not suitable for those with mobility impairmentsnnthis apartment is self check in and outn24 hour check in is availablenna midday check out may be available upon request for an extra fee please check other things to note other things to notenafter both residents and airbnb complaints due to guests abusing thier stays at the apartment a security camera has been professionally installed monitoring the entrance hall inside of the apartmentnthe camera is maintained and looked after by the company that installed itbrighton cctv the camera records 247 on a loop recording over old footage with new and is alarmed it is not to be obscured or tampered with in any waynthe camera is not monitored however should we receive any complaint from a resident authority or suspect that any guest is not using the apartment in an appropriate manner we may use any footage as evidence in any case or claimnplease remember that the apartment is for the sole use of the guests on a booking only people that are not a part of a booked group may not stay at the apartment the apartment is in a residential building and as such the residents must be respected no parties of any kind or any noise that may disturb a resident is allowed during a guests stay thank younnthis is strictly a no smoking apartmentnn11am check out means the apartment must be vacated on or before this time we will be in a few minutes past this to park and service the apartment for our next guestsnnif you have a car parked this must be removed at your check out and return the parking permit we need to use this space for our car whilst we service the apartment for our next guestsnnif you need to empty the rubbish bins duringat the end of your stay the communal bins for general rubbish recycling are on the street just outside the building to the left and the rightnnwe charge 10 for a lostmissing front door keynnthe fire alarm panel is located inside the main entrance lobby if a false alarm sounds there are clear instructions written next to it on how to silence themnnthe safety and wellbeing of our guests is paramount to us and therefore we are taking some extra measures to keep both ourselves and our guests safe during this difficult timendue to this we have taken the following measures to help avoid transferringcatching the virusnwe are wearing disposable gloves and using disinfectant for the cleaning of the apartment we have also provided a large bottle of disinfectant in the hall cupboard for guests use if required all bedding towels and dishcloths are washed at 60 degreesnthank you lee sue

Title: The Curious Crab-Flat with Uninterrupted Sea Views
Description: dog friendly beachfront 2 bed apartment with amazing sea viewsnnmodern relaxing recently refurbished 2 bedroom flat on the st leonardshastings coast doors in the living room open directly onto the sea with stunning uninterrupted panoramic beach viewsnnpotential to sleep 6 with 1 king size bed and 2 small singles or king on request and a sofa bed in the living roomnnlocated a 10 min walk in either direction to st leonards and hastingsnncheck out our other listing the curious lobster the spacenthe space is decorated in relaxing neutral tones with carefully edited pieces bringing the outdoors innnthe little touches to make your stay more comfortablen some traditional games for those cold and winter daysn a sound bar for when you just want to chill out and listen to some musicn a multi adapter phonetablet chargern a beach bag with beach towels cool box and beach blanketn nespresso machine for that shot of caffeine in the morning with compostable podsn luxurious organic shampoo and conditioner from eco brand davinesn welcome packn books on the local area and interesting walksn bespoke selection of beachthemed works of art by independent artistsn a fully kitted kitchen for those days you feel like cooking at homen brand new boiler and hive systemn iron and ironing boardn hairdryern kettle and toastern washing machine fridge freezer and microwaven dog blankets and dog bowl for your furry friend

Title: Garden Flat, Sea Views & Wonderful "Hobbit House"
Description: within site of hastings pier and the ever changing coast line this ground floor garden apartment has everything you need for a wonderful seaside break this flat has the benefit of outside space whilst still being on the seafront the space the spacenthere is a wonderful hobbit house in the garden for children to explore and play in with a little kitchenettechairstabletoy crockery and cupboards sure to entertain them for hours there is also an outside seating area for children and a hammock for the grownups the garden is well lit at night so can be enjoyed in the eveningsnnsituated between st leonards and hastings this apartment is well placed to easily reach the heart of both communities and is only a 15 minute walk from st leonards warrior square stationnnew shops bars restaurants and galleries are opening up at a fast pace and the two towns are fast becoming a mecca for artists and creatives alike but still retains its charm and appeal for family holidays guest access guest accessnfull access to everything in the flat private garden

Title: Stylish Modern Flat near the Station & Laines
Description: located 1 minute walk from brighton train station this sophisticated and trendy house is the perfect place to rest and relax during your stay in brightonnnwhen youre not relaxing with your feet up take a very short walk into town to dine at central local restaurants pubs and bars followed by a short stroll down to the infamous brighton lanes for some shopping then hit the beach the space the spacenthe suite is fully equipped with a kitchen a stylish wet room luxurious double bed as well as a dining table wifi a smart tv and a sea view from the living room window whether youre a single traveller business person couple or group of friends visiting youll be comfortable in this little apartment and find everything you need other things to note other things to notenthere are two flights of stairs

Title: Seascape, house on the beach at Hayling Island
Description: offering stunning sea views this beach house is perfect for a holiday or work space super fast fibre on the south coast step onto the beach from the garden and enjoy miles of shingle and sand depending upon the tidenndesigned to maximise the incredible sea views the bedrooms are on the ground floor with living areas above it has an enclosed patio garden and off street parking bbq sea kayaks kids bikes toys games buckets spades provided for rainy days x box sky bt sport the space the spacenseascape is perfect for families group getaways water sports enthusiasts or those working remotely with super fast broadband the island is a great place to try out a new water sport or take a course kite surfing windsurfing stand up paddle boarding kayaking and sailing can be arranged for groups or individuals see contact details belownnthe house offers a great base for walkers who can enjoy the beautiful walks around the island and in chichester harbournnfor those who just want to get away from it all the views whatever the weather are incredible and ever changing you dont need to go anywhere just relax on the sofas on the balcony have a bbq in the garden or snuggle up round the fire pit at nightnnseascape is kid friendly with its enclosed patio garden stair gates high chairs and travel cots baby sitting is available on request there is no road to cross to get to the beach the promenade which is on the other side of the gate goes from one end of the island to the other making it particularly suitable for buggies scooters and bikes as well as walkers a ten minute walk along the promenade takes you to the ice cream parlour and the best fish and chip shop from here you can catch the light railway along the coast to the funfair at beachlandsnnground floorn2 super kingtwin bedrooms one with en suiten1 double bedroomn1 bunk room with 2 sets of bunk bedsnfamily shower roomnutility roomngarage for storagenenclosed patio gardennnfirst floornopen plan livingdiningsitting area with patio doors onto roof terrace and panoramic sea viewsnkitchen with electric oven gas hob microwave fridgefreezer dishwasher coffee machinennwhat to donnat the housennsit and watch the world go by the seascape is ever changing with the wind and weather you will see sailing boats sea kayaks cruisers and tankers pass by you may see light aircraft playing in the sky above or a lifeboat and coastguard helicopter practising a rescue out at seannread relax watch a film listen to music do a puzzle play a board game find them in the tv cupboardnnhave a bbq in the garden briquettes in the garagennon the beachnneat fish and chips from the coastguard 10 mins walk awaynnsit in a deck chair at the waters edge deckchairs in the garagenntake a dip towels in utility roomnnpaddle in a sea kayak stored in garage please wear a buoyancy aidnnbuild your masterpiece in the sand at low tide buckets and spades in garagenngo fishing tackle and bait can be bought from tackle shop on creek rd 5 mins walk awaynnfly a kite one in garagennstretch your legsnngo for a stroll cycle or scooter along the promenade on the other side of the garden gaten10 minutes walk west takes you to eastoke corner with its fabulous coastguard fish and chip shop and pepperellis ice cream parlour from here you cannnfollow the seafront exercise trail or take a ride on the little steam train which takes you along the sea front tonnthe traditional seaside fun fair at beachlands or take your skate board to the hayling skate park from here you cannnwalk further along the beach to inn on the beach which has fabulous food and spectacular views and you can watch the windsurfers and kite surfers at playnnif you take a stroll east from the house youll pass the nature reserve take your binoculars its a haven for birds and birdwathers the life boat centre and the sailing club to sandy point at the mouth of chichester harbour views of the south downs the witterings and east head are stunning and at low tide you can walk onto the sand bar islandnngo crabbing nets in the garage if you walk all the way round sandy point past the sailing club you reach an inlet there is a little bridge back to the mainland and if you cast your nets into the muddy water below with a little bacon the crabs will be unable to resistnnaway from the housenncycle or walk the hayling billy trail you can cycle or drive to the end of the old rail track which ran from havant to west town it is an easy coastal trail and the ship inn in langstone harbour makes the perfect place to stop for refreshments before you head back to west townnnat ferry point on the western point of the island board the rosie k for a fabulous harbour boat tour of langstone harbour its best to book at low tide to increase your chances of seeing the harbour sealsnnswing a golf club at the pay and play hayling island golf club on the coast or tourneburynnswing a racket at the pay and play tennis courts at hayling community centrennhire or book a lesson on a paddle board windsurf or kite surf contact andy biggs watersports west townnndine out there are many great places to eat on the islandnnexplore further afieldnndrive east to chichester with its cathedral roman villa and the beach at the witterings and east head nature reserve take a boat cruise with chichester harbour water toursnngo to an event at goodwood or the races at fontwellnndrive west to portsmouth visit the historic dockyards to see the hms victory warrior and the mary rose and a harbour tour around the active naval base check out the views from spinnaker tower at gunwharf quays shop at the outlet stores bowl or watch a movie drive further west to visit the maritime history at southamptonnntake the kids to the inflatables water park at chichester marwell zoo the blue reef aquarium in southsea or peppa pig world at paultons parknntake a day trip to the isle of wight by car ferry from portsmouth or on foot by hovercraft from southseanntake a walk on the south downs way or visit queen elizabeth country park or stansted parknntake a steam train ride on the bluebell railway in sussex or the watercress line between alton and alresford other things to note other things to notenif you are planning to stay for the weekend please enquire about a later checkout on a sunday whenever possible we will delay the changeover until monday so that you can check out as late as you like on sunday however this is only possible out of peak season

Title: Modern 2 bed with sea views & beach access ‚òº
Description: please note that our neighbours above have scoffolding up at the moment so the view is disrupted the space the spacenwith stunning views across the solent and access to the beach this large modern twobedroom apartment is everything you could want in a beach get away the large patio doors open out to uninterrupted views of the sea and the private garden is only a few meters from the water located on the first floor and in a quiet road this apartment is only a stone throw away from nearby shops cafes and pubsnnthis first floor apartment has one double bed 2 single beds and 1 additional single bed means this property sleeps 5 comfortably large sofa and living area and newly fitted kitchen means you will feel at home during your beach get away guest access guest accessnnearby there is a winegin bar and ice cream parlour not to mention a few minutes drive from hayling fun fair there is plenty to do from visiting the nature reserve to water sports hire there is something for everyonennthere is free parking is onsite for 2 carsnnplease note that access to the beach is back out the front door and round the building to the garden other things to notenthis property is professionally managed by pass the key which means guests have access to a 24 hour dedicated support line professional and thorough cleans between stays hotel quality linen bath and hand towels and hotel style toiletriesnncheck in from 4pm and check out at 11amnnwe can offer travel cots and high chairs for a small fee please advise when booking

Title: The Boathouse on the beach in Seagrove Bay
Description: rare opportunity to enjoy a truly special holiday in an outstanding converted victorian boathouse the boathouse sits in a totally unique setting in one of the most soughtafter premium locations on the isle of wight the house itself commands central position in the bay and fronts onto a magical beach with far reaching views across to the solentnnseagrove bay embodies the notion of a faroff sandy cove and is simply magical and alive with sailing boats of all shapes and sizes the surrounding area ouzos blissful tranquillity with buttery soft sands and glistening clear water punctuating the landscapennnthe boathouse is an upsidedown house that is set over three floors sleeping 6 guests on the ground floor maximising the picturesque views of the beach and bay to the other two floors the sitting room is simply a gorgeous space contemporary light extremely comfortable and those views the dining room can sit up to 8 guest and has direct access via stairs to the front balcony area on the ground floor the boathouse also has the added benefit of having an enclosed rear lawned garden plus the luxury of garage parking for one carnnnnnnaccommodationnground floornthree bedrooms 1 king double with a large wardrobe 1 double 1 twin family bathroom with roll top bath and a separate shower wc and basinnfirst floorna central staircase takes you up to the living area where the sea and beach views are simply stunningnthe living area consists of a thoughtfully fitted kitchen with bar stool seating for threena gorgeous sitting room with log burner plenty of comfortable seating looking towards those panoramic solent viewsna separate dining room seating up to 8 guestsnoff the kitchen there is a utility room with wc basin and laundry facilitiesnsecond floornsitting area with a freeview tv a perfect retreat for the teenagersnoutsidenoutside to the rear there is an enclosed lawned garden with an outdoor shower to the front there is a balcony area overlooking the beach and solent garage parking for 1 carnnnamenitiesngas heating and hot water log burner with a starter pack of logsncooker electric double oven with a gas hob microwavendishwasher fridge freezer toaster kettle cafetirenwifi 2 x freeview tvs dvd bluetooth dab radiontravel cot highchair attached stairgates on all the stairs top and bottomnhairdryer iron ironing board linen and towels inc in rent not beach towels heating inc in rentncharcoal bbqnnote1 dog is welcome on request onlynnote sorry no partiesnnote the property is set over three levels with the bedroom being on the ground floornnote children must be supervised at all times while on the front balcony area note the front balcony area is used at your own risk please always take care garden furniture will be outside from the spring to the early autumnnnthe seaside resort of seaview was built by the edwardians due to the stunning panoramic sea views and great sandy beaches and these assets are still very much true today the boathouse sits in the middle of seagrove bay which is a much soughtafter holiday destination to be desired as you can quite simply gently melt into the sands for a long day of sun basking the property itself faces a shallow bay with a host of water sports and inviting turquoise blue water to explore a short walk along the beach and you find yourself on priory bay treasure island always comes to mind as you turn the corner from seagrove bay into priory bay a view you simply cannot get board of and just as wonderful in the winter months especially on those crisp winters morning simply breath taking look for the many oysters and scallops that regularly get washed up from these sparkling waters explore along the beachline and let the childrens imagination go wild play cricket or boule at low tide or just relax and enjoy a delicious picnic the boathouse looks straight across the solent to portsmouth and the spinnaker tower and the famous solent forts it is only a short walk into seaview where you will find the old fort a newly refurbished gastro pub aa award winning seaview hotel seaview yacht club the wonderful lilys cafe the new lime chilli indian restaurant bring your own bottle chemist post office community store stocked with delicious local produce and a couple of boutique shopsnshop pub and restaurant 16 miles by car or just a short walk along the beach or costal path which is directly outside of your rear gate nearest beach 00 miles ryde 36 miles by carnnoutside of seaview discover english heritages carisbrooke castle and osbourne house take the family to dinosaur isle and the activity parks at blackgang chine and robin hill country parknalternately a host of activities tempt the more adventurous visitors such as hiking horse riding or mountain biking across the famous tennyson downs all the way to the far west point of the island discover the islands greenery exploring the breathtaking landscapes on route why not take the family and explore our caves by kayak or challenge yourself with some paragliding from our chalk cliffs for the water enthusiasts the island offers something for the whole family from sailing paddle boarding kitesurfing windsurfing kayaking or simply just enjoy a picnic or bbq and enjoy some spectacular sun sets on one of the many beaches from bembridge to brook oh the possibilities the space the spacenthree bedrooms all on the ground floor 1 king double 1 double 1 twin ground floor family bathroom with roll top bath and a separate shower stairs take you up to the living area so you can benefit from the most stunning sea views with a fitted kitchen sitting room with log burner and a separate dining room both with those breathtaking seaside views off the kitchen there is a utility room with cloakroom facilities up the second set of stairs takes you to another sitting area a perfect retreat for the teenagers outside to the rear there is a lawned enclosed garden with an outdoor shower to the front there is a balcony area overlooking the beach and solent other things to note other things to noten1 please do not leave children unattended at the front of the property there is quite a drop down to the beachn2 no smokingn3 no pets allowed in the bedrooms or on the furniture pets must not be unattended in the property or garden area all no 2s to be picked up before you leave we would appreciate if you could hoover up any excess dog hair before you leave as welln4 no partiesn5 no parking infront of the garage access is required at all timesn6 please remember you have neighbours so please be courteous and respectful thank youn7 2 there are storm doors infront of the beach fronted windows please close when windy or if a storm is expected the doors can be used as blackouts as welln8 please use the front balcony at your own risk there is a big drop down to the beachn9 small children must be supervised at all times while out on the front balcony arean10 please advise on booking if bringing dogs then we can get the property dog ready

Title: Stylish Seafront Flat
Description: beautiful seafront first floor south facing apartment recently re decorated to a high standard direct sea views the space the spacenfirst floor sea front flat centrally located by hasting pier and walking distance to all the amenities of st leonards on sea and hastings warm comfortable and welcomingnnliving roomnsouth facing with direct sea view high ceilings with large sash windows and a door leading to private balcony while the flat is no smoking am happy for you to smoke on the balcony large sofa which can also act as additional bed extra duvet bedding available tv with normal freeview and also amazon fire stick that includes netflix amazon prime and disney the room also has 2 high quality blue tooth sound systems available raft wooden dining room table with 4 chairsnnplease note the fire is not operational and can not be litnninternational plug adaptors and extension cables availablennflat is fully gas central heatednnbedroomndouble bed with new mattress and lovely view from the bed through large window to hillside at the rear of the flat cupboard and chest of draws are empty and available to you bedside tables bedside lamps there are usb double plugs next to each bednnkitchenntassimo coffee machine with some welcome pods available fridge freezer washing machine microwave gas hob and electric convention oven kettle toaster and all utensils including pots and pans outside the kitchen is a lovely seating areannbathroomnbath shower and toilet with soap toilet paper provided

Title: Salty Lodge (UKC3456)
Description: set in an idyllic location just steps from the beach this bungalow is perfect for families couples and friends alike 3 steps to entrance all on the ground floornlivingdining room with freeview tv and patio doors leading to decked areankitchen with electric oven induction hob microwave fridgefreezer dishwasher and washing machinenbedroom 1 with kingsize bed and patio doors leading to decked areanbedroom 2 with twin bedsnshower room with shower cubicle and toilet gas central heating electricity bed linen towels and wifi included travel cot enclosed decked area with garden furniture and charcoal barbecue outside hot shower private parking for 6 cars no smoking please note there are 4 steps down to the beach enjoying a wonderful coastal location salty lodge is a light and airy singlestorey detached property with fantastic sea views across to the isle of wight it has a large decked sittingout area to the rear ideal for alfresco dining or enjoying a drink on a warm evening and where beautiful sunsets can also be viewed at the end of the back garden there are steps over the low wall directly onto the pebblesandy beach and fishing is available nearby when the tide goes out it makes a great crabbing area with many pools along the sand salty lodge has been refurbished in 2018 and offers modern and tastefully presented accommodation for couples or familiesnhayling island is well known for its sailing activities it is sheltered by the isle of wight making it ideal for watersports activities it is renowned for its windsurfing kayaking power boating jet skiing kitesurfing and wake boarding local paddle boating and windsurfing lessons are available close by every year there is a national windsurfing event and a hive of sailing and nautical activity can be seen along the coastline walk the hayling billy trail which starts at the former railway line where the theatre now is or take a pleasant amble overlooking langstone harbournmany activities can be enjoyed locally for all ages including a seaside railway and a small amusement park for the children for the sports enthusiast seacourt is also worth a visit with 5 racket sports including real tennis also nearby activities including golf horse riding boat trips and scenic walks along the waters edge or scenic walks along the south downs national park which are within easy reach chichester with its beautiful cathedral festival theatre pedestrianised shopping leisure centre roman villa and goodwood or fontwell races its definitely worthy of a visit visit portsmouth with waterside dining ferry trips to the isle of wight designer outlets natural museum leisure facilities spinnaker tower hms victory or the maritime history at southampton winchester with its cathedral abbey and the new forest are within easy driving distance plenty of national trust homes and gardens can also be discovered nearby beach 4 yards shop 220 yards pub and restaurant 330 yardsnfree wifi

Title: Hastings Gem on the seafront

Title: Sea-view Retreat in Old Town
Description: a stunning 2 bedroom seaside apartment in the grade ii listed building of pelham crescentnperfectly located in the old town with direct sea views and great local amenities the space the spacenwe are very happy to host our recently renovated apartment in the grade ii listed building of pelham crescent in the old town with amazing direct sea views through beautiful georgian windows on to the main strip of the beachnnthe property is located within the oldest part of hastings a beautiful and exciting part of town full unique and stunning architecture and history the apartment is also located next to the gothic st mary church the property is a historical building with all its charm and is nestled amongst the apartments is gothic st marys church pelham crescent and the church was built in the late 19th century and still remains a beautiful and iconic building perfectly located facing the seannthe apartment is the perfect option for short lets or longer stays in hastings for singles couples friends or small familiesnnthe flat is located on the second floor of a four storey building there is a large open lounge which faces directly onto the sea with a brand newly fitted kitchen fully equipped at the back of the roomnnthe apartment is full of character and rustic charm and provides all the basic home comfortsnnthe kitchen is well stocked of cooking utensils cutlery crockery and spicesnnthe lounge has a seating and dining area with an extra dining table in the kitchen if needed as well as a record player books and tv for entertainment there is ample space for 4 or more people to share the room at any given timennthe lounge runs through into the hallway which leads on to the two double bedrooms and bathroom both bedrooms face directly on to the ancient cliffs of hastings and are very private with nothing but the cliffs and seagulls onlookingnnthe small bathroom has also been fitted with a brand new toilet and bathroom set and was newly decorated with a new high pressure shower please note this is not a luxurious bathroom as it has taken pressure from leaky roofs from above is decorated when needed and is functional and cleannnthe larger bedroom can accommodate a travel cot please request this via the enquiry option and specify you have a child so we can arrange accordinglynnthe following is also available and provided during your staynnfree wifi very strong speed password can be found on the router box on the shelf in the loungenfull use of all utensils condiments spices etc in flat including bathroom kitchen loungenfull kitchen utensils etcnfresh sheetsntowelsnhair dryernnthe vintage record player is unfortunately not working anymore but we have a vintage radio which you can enjoynnplease can you remember to always use cup holders and place mats for the surfaces on the dining table and the nest of small tables as they stain pretty much immediately with heat or wine nnfeel free to use anything you can see in the flat and feel comfortable in the flat as your own home there will be a variety of condiments for you to cook up a nice meal and there will be towels etcnnparking should be easy as its just opposite the flat on the beach front at pelham place car parknnplease do not invite any unannounced guests to the flat we may consider docking from your deposit if guests are found to have done sonnplease also remember to keep the noise down after 11pm sharp out of respect for the neighbours the building is also an old building so please note as expected that sound does travel through the floors please also be mindful not to let the front door bang or to make noise in the hallway as noise travels easily through the buildingnnif you have a pet your would like to accompany you please enquire in advance as there is an extra charge of 15 for cleaning i will also require that your pet comes with bedding and is not allowed on the fabrics and sheets in the flatnnmany thanksnnthere is parking in the pelham car park directly opposite the building but across the road so there is no road noise or traffic parking in the other old town is difficult but we have never had any problems with this car park all day parking costs 8 evening parking is 1 from 6pm until 8amnnthere are an array of great quirky shops cafes and restaurants at a stones throw away from the flat the high street in the old town and st leonards have the most and best options for independent food and drink venues shops and galleriesnnopposite the flat on the beach front there is family entertainment such as crazy golf volley ball and a cycle hire shacknnall of hastings events such as food festivals bonfire night carnival and pirates day and much more all happens in this part of the town and the parades take place just outside the window facing this stretch of the seafront so you can also have the best view and can enjoy the atmosphere from the comfort of the apartment if preferrednngeorge street and the high street as well as jerwoods gallery are minutes walk from the flat where you can take the lift to the cliff tops or start your adventures around the old town fromnnthe new town is also a stones throw away st leonards norman and london road is approx 15 minutes walking along the beach front towards the opposite the opposite direction from the old town its definite worth a visit guest access guest accessnplease note all bookings for 2 people will be assumed as using one bedroom please let me know if you need both bedrooms as the bedding will need to be made up for the extra roomnnfree wifi very strong speed password can be found on the router box on the shelf in the loungenfull use of all utensils condiments spices etc in flat including bathroom kitchen loungennfull kitchen utensils etcnfresh sheetsntowelsngood quality travel cot plus mattress but you will be required to bring your own bedding please inform us that the cot is required on check in so we can organise other things to note other things to notenimportant please readnnplease be mindful of noise on the communal stairs as some neighbours do night shifts and may be sleepingnnplease notify me if you wish to bring a pet one pet is allowed with an extra cleaning fee of 15 the pet is required to sleep on their own bedding and should not use be allowed on the beds and fabricsnnfor two people bookings who require the use of the additional bedroom please let me know on enquiry so we can ensure the 2nd bedroom is made up on arrivalnndo let us know if you have any questions how big or smallnnfurther information to follow on hastings and st leonards and check in details to follow on booking
