Title: Flat with Breathtaking Sea Views
Description: our vintage shabbychic one bedroom victorian flat with breathtaking panoramic sea views across the english channel is only minutes from the beach and picturesque old town with its boutiques art galleries restaurants bricabrac shops cafes and barsnnfollow us on instagram on flatwithbreathtakingseaviews the space the spacenthe flatnan elegant 1 bedroom flat with unobstructed panoramic sea views across the west hill common the east hill nature reserve and the english channelnboasting dark wooden floors throughout an open marble fire place high ceilings tastefully decorated in vintage seaside charm making it a very attractive and convenient onebedroom holiday apartment to suit 2 or 4 peoplennbedroomnhas a relaxing and extremely comfortable double bed with plenty of light during the day and blackout curtains at nightnthe bedroom has two windows facing the back of the house which are double glazed allowing you to have a quiet nights sleepnthere are a selection of books and magazines to read on the vast shelves of the bedroom please leave the books and magazines in the flat or have a chat with me about borrowing any if you are too engrossed in a story to leave it behind na cot bed can be provided for babies toddlers with prior warningnjust outside the bedroom you will find an iron and ironing board as well as a useful umbrella for those rainy english days and a sun tent to protect the little ones when its too hot on the beachnin this same cupboard you can find a laundry hanger a wooden babys high chair a henry hoover mop broom and a wicker mat for the beachnnliving roomnwith a gorgeous grey marble fireplace as its centrepiece and truly unobstructed breathtaking sea views across the west hill east hill and english channel the living room also benefits from a double sofa bed to cater an additional two peopleni have also provided a wicker basket of childrens toys to entertain little ones should they also be our guests and a backgammonchess set plus trivial pursuit for bigger kidsna retro dab radio with ipodiphone dock can be found on the gramophone to add a bit of ambience to your stay and charge up your iphonesnthere is also a selection of magazines for your browsing pleasure in the magazine racknplease leave the books and magazines in the flatnnplease note there is no television in the flat although there is an active tv license so you can enjoy all licensed channels on laptops ipads and other mobile devicesnnkitchenna tidy and intimate kitchen with gorgeous reclaimed teak work surfaces which benefits from a washerdryer fridge double oven 4 hob gas cooker and all the conveniences of a modern homenyou can find a kettle toaster hand blender a wide selection of glasses mugs plates and vases as well as a few cook books to inspire you if you are thinking of eating inna selection of take away menus can be found on the rack in the hallway if you are a fan of indian food jali is a favourite of oursnunder the sink you will be able to find any cleaning products you may need during your stayna fire extinguisher in case of fire is located to the left of the kitchen on the counternnext to the kettle you will find an honesty jar for you to add a contribution if you break or misuse anything please be as generous as you feel is right to so that guests after you can also enjoy these added perksnin the kitchen i have added a folder greyblue with all my favourite places to eat drink see and do in hastingsnnbathroomna light and modern bathroom with toilet sink bathtub and hand held shower body soap shampooconditioner can be found here toonin the bathroom you will also find a small first aid kit in case of bumps and grazes and in case of hair emergencies a vidal sassoon full power hair dryer a curling wand and babybliss travel hair straighteners can be found in the bedroom on top of the red cupboardnnrecently i have ensured that all beauty products shampoo conditioner body wash hand soap washing up liquid etc provided in my property are vegan organic chemical sulphate free faith in nature is the company that ticks all the boxes and i purchase their products in bulk which i then use to refill the glass jars in the bathroom and kitchenni have done this to play my part in reducing my our plastic waste chemical consumption impact on the environment as well as the more obvious animal welfare issues which i feel passionate about wwwfaithinnaturecouknnthe flat also uses 100 renewable energy from a company called bulb who provides 100 of its electricity generated from wind solar and hydroelectrics click this link to join up in your uk property wwwbulbcoukreferbindud7875 guest access guest accessnguests will have the flat to themselves at all timesnnit is situated on the first floor and of course there are neighbours on the floors above and below who need to be respected many thanks for understanding thisnnguests have access to the flat via the main front door and up the stairs to the first floornnan entryphone is situated inside the flat to the right of the front door for your conveniencennthe middle bell outside the building pertains to the first floor flat other things to note other things to notenwe can provide a travel cot bed and a highchair should you need onenplease let us know of your requirements when you make your bookingnnif you are 2 people who wont be sharing the double bed and you require the sofa bed as well please make your booking by stating you are 3 people as this required more linen preparation etcnnall beauty products in the flat are organic vegan sulphate and chemical free from faith in nature wwwfaithinnaturecouknnthe flat uses only 100 renewable energy from a british provider called bulbnby switching to bulb youre making the world a greener place to live in join the movement now with this linkcode wwwbulbcoukreferbindud7875nnchildren under 2 years of age can stay for free please state the total number of people staying in the flat when you make your bookingnncertain weekends during high season or when special festivals are taking place in hastings we may require you to book a minimum of two nightsnnhere are just a few of the many festivals and local events to note down for 2018nnfebruary fat tuesday from 913nmarch hastings half marathon 18 marchnapril beatles day 19 on 8th at white rock theatrenmay hastings jack in the greennjune stade saturdays cultural events every saturday on stade open space and freenjuly hastings beer and music festival the ovalnaugust old town carnival weeknseptember seafood wine festivalnoctober hastings bonfire 13 octobernnovember hastings storytelling festivalndecember its christmasnnplease follow us on instagram flatwithbreathtakingseaviews

Title: 2 Bed Seafront Regency Apartment with Sea Views***
Description: welcome to our hideaway by the sea our cosy home is within a beautiful coastal grade ii listed building near the shores of brighton beach with direct and uninterrupted panoramic sea views well located on a prestigious main street in kemptown village the sea is literally across the road while the pier the lanes brighton marina and all the other amazing places are just a stroll away the interior has been crafted for comfort relaxing and snoozes with a sprinkle of style on top the space the spacenour coastal retreat is on the 3rd floor of a grand regency grade ii listed building on brightons seafront so as you step into the apartment youll be welcomed by the stunning direct sea views neatly framed by the sash bay windows weve kept other original features inc the slight wonkiness of the floors and ceilings but have combined that period character with a modernity to create a home that is relaxed delightful and practical our apartment has two good sized double bedrooms an open loungediningkitchen main area and a bathroomnnthe lounge is airy and bright with wooden flooring and casual furniture theres also a writing deskchair with usb charging the dining area is placed by the window so meals can be enjoyed with a sun lit sea viewnnthe kitchenette is compact but serves most short holiday needs inc electric induction hob oven fridge freezer and ample storage space theres also a microwave toaster and cutlery crockery and basic cooking utensilsnnthe larger bedroom is very generously sized with a king size bed side tables dressing table builtin wardrobes with plenty of hanging space and other furnishings to ensure a restful experience the quirkier second bedroom hides behind a sliding door and has bedside tables furnishings and a double bed facing out at the oceannnthe bathroom is clean functional and includes storage vanity unit washing machine and a bath tub offering the option of a good long soak or a quick showernnthe apartment has gas central heating it also has a hair dryer iron ironing board and fresh towels and bed linen are provided the building doesnt have a lift though but the elevated views will hopefully make the short ascent to the apartment worthwhilennparkingnfinally whilst we dont have a dedicated parking space but our guests normally dont have a problem on getting a good spot it is basically on street metered parking between 1216day closest space is right opposite to our buildingnusing the paybyphone parking app is a great way to monitor the parking time remotely highly recommend other things to note other things to notenour apartment is within a friendly regency building shared with a few other households some with young children so its not suited to any guests thinking of parties or other noisy activities it is also on the 3rd floor so do bear that in mind when booking as there is no lift

Title: Gorgeous seafront flat: views, parking, balcony

Title: Beautiful sea view Victorian apartment
Description: this raised ground floor apartment has direct sea views in an architect refurbished 1838 decimus burton house the apartment is exceptionally spacious with light and airy decor and a selection of original artwork it is a wonderful space to relax admire the sea views and watch the world go bynnthe apartment and entire building have been restored it has a modern spacious kitchen and living room with underfloor heating there is a south facing balcony with sea views and a garden terrace the space the spacenthe apartment has been lovingly restored retaining the beautiful victorian features including a huge elaborate fireplace original coving and ceiling rosesnnthe front room and kitchen are connected in a very large airy space with amazing views of the sea which can be enjoyed from the balcony guests love watching the world go by from the window and enjoy the sea whatever the weathernnthe furnishings include mid century modern pieces heals sofas and eclectic lighting the original wooden floors have been restored and benefit from underfloor heating in the front roomnnthere are modern fittings in the smart kitchen area which is fully fitted with washerdryer dishwasher fridge freezer induction hob and gas cookernnthe bathroomwet room has modern fittings with heated towel rail and underfloor heating

Title: Amazing Beach Apartment
Description: stunning modern apartment right on the beach with unlimited views of the sea and beach 20 minutes outside of brightonnnthe apartment has a 15 meters run of floortoceiling windows facing south directly out to sea huge open plan living dinning kitchen and entertaining space we have installed an apple home pod and a large tv with netflixnnthis apartment is not suitable for loud parties stag or hen dos it has steps up to the entrance we ask guests to be respectful of everyone the space the spacenopen plan kitchen and living area and three separate bedrooms to the back the flat is an eco building with triple glazing its is quiet insidenthe apartment has access to the balcony that wraps around the south aspect of the apartmentnnthree bedrooms one with an ensuite bathroom and two with additional sofa beds the apartment can sleep up to ten people guest access guest accessnthe apartment is self contained and the guests have access to all parts the balcony isnt segregated from the other apartments but 20m is for exclusive access of this apartment other things to note other things to notenon friday nights in the summer we put on an outdoor cinema on the beach for a local charity the balcony has the best view for the films being shown please look at the facebook page of the perch cafe

Title: Beautiful Beachside Chalet, Gurnard, Cowes
Description: our seafront chalet beachcombers is situated in the pretty village of gurnardnnbeachcombers is part of an eclectic mix of chalets and bungalows come the evening you can take in some of the finest sunsets across the solent the space the spacenbeachcombers includes three bedrooms two with king size double beds and one with a standard double bunk bed and pull out mattressnnwe have a spacious kitchen with a cooker fridge and washing machinennalso included corner sofa central heating two bathrooms wifi and tvnnthe beach is pebble and shingle and the front is lined with pretty beach huts and the beach currently holds a seaside awardnnwe are a stones throw away from gurnard sailing club water sports and sailing are a popular past time in this areannthere are a few small shops in gurnard as well as two pubs both of which serve food and offer a selection of drinks including island ale the woodvale is located right at the seafront and serves food all day also located on the front is a sloping green and kids play area located near a small cafe serving snacks and ice creamnnthere are some great walks and cycle routes to be explored in the area and for those wanting a little more life in the evening cowes town is a short walk awaynnby walkingnnbeach a minutenwoodvale 5 minutesnshops 10 minutesncowes 30 minutesnnour chalet has been handed down the generations and was recently renovated we love the isle of wight and hope you will too

Title: SEA VIEW FLAT Rottingdean

Title: Coast View
Description: stylish detached seaside home situated right on the beach at pevensey bay the quiet shingle beach is the back garden a set of wide steps with handrail lead you to the front of the property where you enter into a welcoming open loungekitchendinernnthere is now a virtual guidebook link below that can be downloaded prior to arrival that gives all the information you could need to help you enjoy your stay even morennhttpshostfullygvlcwsq the space the spacenthe kitchen area is wellequipped for family entertaining with an electric oven and hob fridge with ice compartment wine cooler fridge dishwasher microwave tassimo coffee machine and washing machine relax at the breakfast bar or move to the lounge area which offers the perfect place to watch tv or look at the amazing seaview from the comfy corner sofa catch up on your favourite tv programmes or netflix on the smart tv listen to the dab radio or play one of the board games that are kept in the footstool the dining table with seating for six overlooks the rear beach seaview garden and the wonderful horizon beyond there are two bedrooms a double with a large freeview tv an ensuite walkin shower and wc the second bedroom has a superkingsize zipandlink bed which can be made into twin beds on request the property is completed with a second bathroom that has a rainfall type shower over bath and wc in the garden that leads directly onto the beach is a dining table with 6 chairs and sun umbrella bar b q fire pit swinging chair and reclining chairs there is also a storage shed with buckets and spades and ball games for use on the beach

Title: SEASONG, LUXURY ON THE BEACH HSE FOR 12 & HOT TUB
Description: stunning and totally luxurious 6 bedroom and 5 bath house directly on the beach one double bedroom with own shower room on the ground floor ideal for easy access with hot tub bbq plus seating for 12 on the deck overlooking the sea large balcony with 2 front bedrooms over beach separate sitting room and games room with large tvwii and wifi luxurious fittings and furniture bedding and linen dressing gowns towels beauty therapist babysitter availablen1 well behaved dog allowed the space the spacenyou will not be disappointed this is a little piece of paradise within just over an hour of london fulham with all home comforts you can totally relax and sleep to the sound of the sea take it one step further with our excellent masseusebeauty therapist coming to the house offering many treatments use our recommended baby sitting service and head out for a lovely supper at the end of a beach fun day guest access guest accessn3 parking spaces outside the front of the property other things to note other things to notenbedroom locations and set upnground floor 1 double bed with own shower roomnfirst floor 2 king size bed and 3 king size bed with balcony 4 double and single bunkbed these 3 bedrooms share 2 large family bathrooms both with bars and separate showers 4 2 single beds with ensuite shower roomnsecond floor super king size bed and ensuite bathroomnndressing gowns now provided the white company soaps etc all complimentarynnchef available on requestnknown nanny for babysitting available on requestnmassage available on requestnballoons and champagne on ice for your special occasion available on request

Title: 'Spindles', 2 bed house, near West Wittering beach
Description: this property has luxurious private accommodation it sleeps up to 4 people perfect for either 2 people 2 couples or a family and an option of an additional single bed if 5 people wish to staynit is close to west wittering beach has many coastal walks numerous family activities and restaurantsnnplease note that there is another listing spindles annex which sleeps a further 2 people therefore if available it combines to make an ideal stay for a family and parents too the space the spaceneverything within the property spindles has been finished to a high standard upon entering through into the gated property there are secure allocated parking bays off the beautiful original driveway one for each bedroom a path leads you alongside the decked seating area to the private oak front door inside there is a large entrance hall with doors leading to the bedrooms both with luxury ensuite facilities and the kitchendinerliving room guest access guest accessnthe rented part of spindles is a very private 2 bedroom house with its own front garden within the garden there is a shed which residents may use to store their bicycles and other beach equipment behind the shed there are 2 kayaks single and double which you may use obviously at your own risk inside the entrance i have provided a selection of games for all ages for people to relax and enjoy a selection of brochures will be available for those wishing to venture a little further from the beach

Title: Beach house on a idyllic private beach
Description: this is our family holiday home we absolutely love to go down there for a chilled out weekend with the kidsnwe have three young children who iove to play on the beach when the tide is lownthe beach is almost private even in the high season there is barely anyone there and the beach is the back garden im sure your family will love this place as much as we donplease note that school holiday and summer its a minimum of seven nights stay the space the spacenthe house has three bedrooms one king size one double and the kids room has four single beds the beds are very comfortable mattress bought for our personal usennnew log burner and central heating system installed for the winter months please bring logs if you wish to lit up the firennthere is a large living dinning room and a sun lounge downstairs kitchen and a toiletnplease note the house is a bit outdated cosmetically but it has everything a family need to have a great and comfortable holiday in a the perfect location its all about the locationnits fully equipped with dishwasher washing machine a large fridge freezer microwave nespresso coffee machine tv dvd player wifi bed linen are provided but not towels please bring your own lazy chairs toys books trampoline swingntravel cot and high chair availablennthe beach is the back garden with amazing sunrise and sunset and the full moon is my favourite

Title: Seascape, panoramic views of the west hill and sea
Description: sea scape luxury apartment above hastings old town with sea views over the green all the way to france the seascape apartment has just been completely refurbished to a high standard with everything you might need for you stay it is bright and airy with amazing views from all windows a large section of dvds parking is street parking with no permits if coming by train arrive at hastings station there is a sainsburys next to the station for any provisions a taxi is about 5 to the west hill the space the spacenan outstanding one bed apartment with orthopaedic mattress and an added deluxe sofa bed in the open plan livingnfully equipped kitchen area dining area 4 chairs breakfast bar with 2 stoolsnwork station to include a desknif you enjoy films there is a large collection of dvds for your stay guest access guest accessncommunal front door one flight of stairs to the apartment door situated is on the first floor other things to note other things to notenplease request travel cot if you need one for your stay as not stored at the apartment pub 2 minutes walk away west hill ideal for outdoor activities or just sit back and sun bathe overlooking the old town and sea

Title: Bright sea view 2 bedroom apartment by the pier
Description: welcome to our homefromhome opposite the english channel and two minutes from hastings pier enjoy big skies and stunning uninterrupted sea views from the living room kitchen and serene cliff greenery from the bedrooms close to all local attractions its under 20 minutes stroll to hastings old town situated between the heart of st leonards hastings town centre the space the spacenthe apartment is on the second floor and is simply furnished with modern midcentury and vintage stuff from and featuring the local area it has recently been fully renovated and has new beds bed linen and towelsnnthe kitchen includes a microwave fridge with freezer section gas hob electric oven digitalbluetoothfm radio blender a washerdryer plus all essentialsnneach bedroom has a fitted wardrobe and roller black out blinds behind the curtains all bed linen is 100 cottonnnthe bathroom has a heated towel rail a bath with rainfall handheld showers and a steamfree mirror with light all towels are 100 egyptian cottonnnin the living room there are two armchairs a threeseater sofa and a dining table to seat four the tv includes a dvd player and there are a selection of dvds books and board gamesnnsorry the apartment is not suitable for children under the age of 12 yearsnnthe apartment is served by a lift accessed via eight steps from the pavement to the ground floor lobby area please note the lift is quite old and isnt guaranteed to be operational during your stay

Title: Spectacular Beach House
Description: westbeach is pleased to present this stunning beach house retreat comprising of 3 bedrooms for up to 6 guests this immaculate 3storey beach house with unrivalled sea views from every room elegant decor and high quality bedding linen is perfect for a coastal getaway you are spoilt with a lovely splitlevel garden with direct access to the beach there is a chesney wood burning bbq stove which is lovely to cook on and to sit around for cosy outdoor evenings the space the spacenthe property comprises on the ground floor a beautiful living room with panoramic sea views and full length opening windows a small study off the living room and a charming twin bedroom with sea views and ensuite shower room then on the first floor are two good sized double bedrooms one with kingsize bed and ensuite shower room and the other with a double plus there is a single blow up bed for a small child both bedrooms offer spectacular sea views of the sussex coastline also on this level is a separate family bathroom with wc bath and shower over on the lower ground floor is a spacious fully fitted well equipped kitchen with open plan dining living area utility room and separate wc in hallway there is a breakfast bar good sized dining table and comfy sofa to one end with bifold doors opening out to the decked garden and beach beyond beachwear is also provided which includes beach towels some wet suits buoyancy aid jackets and some body boards the house also provides some garden games and board games in the decked garden there are loungers a swing chair and dining table and chairs this unique stylish property is a special place to unwind and enjoy the beach life other things to notenin respect of covid19 our cleaners are taking a more specific protocol on cleaning upon checkincheckout of properties ensuring thorough and stricter cleaning activities are adhered toonnin line with these high cleaning standards we request a 4 pm check in to ensure our cleaners have plenty of time inbetween guestsnnin addition the owner of this property leaves antibacterial wipes and spray for those that feel they want to use this where necessary for their own reassurancennhouse rulesnnno smokingnnot suitable for petsnno parties or eventsncheckin time is 4pm 9pmncheckout time is 10 amnshoes are removed within the house to avoid sand damaging the flooring

Title: Lovely Annexe near the Beach, in Central Worthing.
Description: a lovely seaside ground floor annexe a stones throw from the beach splash point and restaurants in central sunny worthing the annexe has a bright open plan kitchenloungediner with a lovely sofa bed and flat screen television the bedroom has a comfortable double bed and flat screen tv the family sized bathroom has everything you need and huge fluffy towels for parking your car there is one dedicated space on our driveway allocated for guests also a nespresso machine the space the spacenthe annexe is a good sized bright one bedroom ground floor flat freshly decorated in january 2021 the living area has a table that can comfortably seat four people and a wide sofa that easily turns into a comfortable double sofa bed there is a flat screen television and wifi the living area also contains a good sized kitchen with an oven and hob a family sized fridgefreezer and washing machinedryer there is also a sink with drainer the kitchen comes equipped with toaster kettle nespresso machine and utensils and crockerynthe bedroom has a comfortable double bed with clean fresh linen and huge fluffy towels there are two bedside tables and lamps and a wardrobe with drawers there is a flat screen television on the wallnthe bathroom is also a good size with a bath shower sink and wc guest access guest accessnthe annexe is all yours other things to note other things to notenpets and children welcome

Title: Beach front home with cosy, coastal interiors.
Description: featured in the times 50 great british beach escapes 25th april 2015 driftwood is a charming end of terrace twobedroom house in the pretty town of seaford on the sussex coast the space the spacenlocated directly on the esplanade with unspoilt views overlooking seaford bay it is decorated in fresh neutral shades and furnished with simple yet comfortable new england style furniture it features a courtyardstyle beach garden which links to a large decked terrace perfect for enjoying a cocktail at sunset or for alfresco dining large garage at the back of the house allows for safe storage of bikes or surfing equipmentthe interior of the house is comfortable and cosy with barewood floors and white walls which frame the stunning view the openplan reception room includes an area for relaxing or watching a movie on the 40inch flatscreen smart tv equipped with complimentary netflix and bt sport the house has free wifi for those who like to stay in touchthere is a roundfarmhouse style dining table for four and a fullyequipped kitchen with washing machine fridgefreezer microwave and breakfast bar upstairs on the second floor are two bright and airy double bedrooms the shabby chic style master bedroom boasts a spectacular ocean view and is furnished with a kingsize bed and double wardrobe the second bedroom overlooks the town and features two twin beds and ample storage crisp white linen and nautical stripes create a chic contemporary lookthere is a family bathroom with wc basin and bath which is fitted with a shower mixer and overhead shower linen and towels are provided and gas central heating is fitted throughout sleeps up to 4 a collapsible guest bed is available for a 5th guestpets welcome with prior arrangement guest accessndriftwood is in an excellent location being only a 10 minute walk to the centre of seaford town with its diverse range of shops and restaurants including the excellent trawlers for fantastic fish and chips olivers a small family run restaurant offers a more discerning choice of menu and there is also a good selection of tea shops for cream tea loversseaford is surrounded by stunning scenery villages and countryside and is very popular with hikers nearby is the famous seven sisters whose seven cliffs form part of the seven sisters county park at cuckmere haven and which starts at the end of the beach just a few hundred metres from the property

Title: Pagham Beach House, sea views,
Description: here is your opportunity to stay in an architects own home this exquisite single storey house was built in 2001 in a modernist style designed by james wells for his family as a weekend getaway the house is now available to rent all year roundnnpagham beach house is the perfect retreat for goodwood events festival of speed glorious goodwood and goodwood revival the space the spacenwwwpaghambeachhousecouknnbuilt on a shingle beach the house is 40 meters from the sea with one large living dining and kitchen room guests can enjoy panoramic views with all the comforts of modern livingnnlocated in a magical peaceful hideaway the beach house is tucked away from traffic but conveniently close to chichester with its culture restaurants cafs and shopping guest access guest accessnpagham beach house is available for full use by guests we no longer live there but we live 30 minutes away other things to note other things to notenthere is off road parking for two cars it is not possible to park on the road the house is situated directly on pagham beach and the approach road is a track

Title: ‚ÄòEbb & Flow‚Äô stylish seaside flat
Description: boutique style ideal for exploring st leonards on sea surrounds working from home 2 mins from the sea 5 from the station easily accessible by car free on street parking private entry spacious open plan living private gardensnwe respectfully ask for guests who are happy to observe a quiet time after midnight do not mind hearing the odd voice or footstep above the space the spacenthe living area is large and open plan for cooking in the kitchen space sociable dining and relaxing and watching tv in the lounge area guest access guest accessnguests can access all spaces described within the flat including the back and front basement gardens other things to note other things to notencurrently we are following a self check in procedurennebb and flow is a flat in a converted house so please bear in mind people do live above and you may hear the sound of footsteps and voices sometimes equally we respect our neighbours by asking for a quiet time after midnightnnit is a non smoking apartmentnnalthough i have never charged for small breakages i will have to charge for larger damages

Title: Beautiful Beach House Winchelsea Beach East Sussex
Description: beautiful 3bedroom beach house double twin bunk 100m to winchelsea beach sea views from lounge and master bedroom balconies garden with deck area and outdoor table and chairs walking cycling watersports birdwatching rye harbour nature reserve the ship deli great butchers and bread and the red pig food truck good pubs restaurants and cafes in rye and icklesham the space the spacenfabulous new england style beach house with stunning sea viewsnthe house is set on the ridge just yards from winchelsea beach near rye in east sussex the house was featured in coast magazine in 2008 and real homes magazine aug 2010 located in the small village of winchelsea beach where marshland meets the sea the shingle beach gives way to flat wet sand at low tide a wonderful fourmile walk is to follow the sea wall eastwards stopping at the bird reserve then following the river rother towards rye and returning across the field tracks past camber castle whether you want to go surfing cycling walking or beachcombing bramble tye is the perfect place to sit back and decide either in the summer house or gazing across the sea from your balcony shop 01 mile pub 01 mile coast 100mnnground floornentrance porchnkitchendining room an extremely light and attractive space with wonderful oak flooring there is a family room which can be closed off from the main living area furnished with a three seater sofa occasional table a variety of chairs a gas woodburning stove and a flat screen tv in the main room there is a dining table and six chairs plus sideboards and cabinets and the superbly stocked bespoke kitchen provides an electric oven and gas hob dishwasher fridge freezer microwavenrear porch utility room houses a washing machine and tumble dryernbedroom 1 with bunk beds bedside table and clothes hanging railnbedroom 2 with twin beds bedside table chest of drawers and double wardrobenbathroom with oak flooring a bath overbath shower heated towel rail washbasin and wcnnstairs with stairgates top and bottom tonnfirst floornsitting room with oak flooring this glorious room has a spectacular galleried roof with open rafters and fabulous sea views from the balcony and the dual aspect windows there is a three seater sofa antique leather and cane armchairs occasional table tv with dvd and gas woodburning stovenbedroom 3 with double bed bedside tables wardrobe and private balcony with stunning sea views ensuite bathroom with a bath heated towel rail washbasin and wcnngarden fully enclosed pebbled decked and lawned areas with summer house and wooden garden furniturenparking parking for one car in the drive plus parking for two cars outside on the ridgenheating oil central heating and gas woodburning gas stoves for boostnnwifi available mobile phone reception poornhighchair available attaches to adult chairnremovable bedside barrier available for toddlersnnall linen and towels providednall heating and electricity costs includednnfacilities for babies and small childrennmamas and papas travel cot please bring own linen blankets and pillow etc the cot mattress is thin so you may wish to bring your own thicker cot mattressnsafetyrail for bed secured under the mattressnhigh chair secured on to dining chair with straps guest access guest accessnguests have access to the whole house and one offroad parking space additional parking on road by pedestrian gate other things to note other things to notenshort breaks are available 4 nights minimumnnthe house sleeps a maximum of 6 and no additional people can be accommodated

Title: Caribbean Corner
Description: a secluded beach hideaway in the woods at the top of the coastal slope on priory bay it has been described by guests as a little piece of paradisennthe north end of priory bay is locally known as caribbean corner the mature woodland slope running all the way down to the sand makes it a uniquely romantic locationnncaribbean corner along with its sister property the hideaway gives a desert island experience only 25 hours from london and 15 minutes from portsmouth by rib the space the spacenbeautifully constructed by local craftsman paul this glamorous structure inspired by mongolian yurts provides the ultimate in glampingnnthe yurt has a king size double bed built from our own oak allows you to look both out to sea and up through the tree tops to the stars the adjoining bathroom has all the essentials champagne bucket a rolltop victorian bath a flushing toilet and views to the starsnnthe handcrafted kitchen with oak worktop and cupboards made from recycled pallets has a belfast sink fridge twin induction hobnnmoving through the french doors to your barbecue you step on to a viewing platform over the idyllic sandy beach and are surrounded by majestic native woodland if you can find a shower with a better view we will fill the champagne bucketnnthis yurt is really designed for two but there is plenty of room for two little onesnnthe main feature is the sheltered gently shelving sandy beach it is completely protected from the prevailing winds and the morning sun warms the sea on a rising tide on a spring tide you can take a morning walk all the way to st helens fort getting wet only up to your knees there is no better experience than coming back to barbecue a couple of locally caught mackerel for breakfastnnit is very important that this is only done when the tide times are safennif youre lucky enough to come in spring the woods are carpeted with wild garlic bluebells daffodils primroses wild violets and later in the year wild orchids cover the orchardnnas well as everything you might expect to find in rock pools you can expect to see red squirrels peregrines stoats buzzards owls sparrow hawks swifts swallows bats woodpeckers and if youre lucky a badger other things to note other things to notenthe property is adjacent to the historic priory bay hotel which is currently closed awaiting refurbishmentnnthere are many other hostelries and restaurants in the local towns of st helens seaview and bembridge

Title: Old Leigh Cottage

Title: The Beach House
Description: the beach house enjoys a beachfront position our light and bright holiday home enjoys panoramic and uninterrupted views of the sea a moments walk from the garden gate is the pebble beach which will take you down to the waters edge a weekend break or a longer stay is possible all year round the space the spacenour enviable waterfront position with direct sea access is usually the first comment that our guests make our open plan kitchen diner and lounge enables all guests to enjoy interaction at all times guest access guest accessnfull access to the beach house can be enjoyed together with a double garage and forecourt in order to park four cars easily other things to note other things to notenbedroom 1 is accessible via bedroom 3 the bunk bed room

Title: Worthing Prom direct sea views! Free parking.
Description: check our reviews self checkin free parking a big bright and sunny 1 bed flat located directly on marine parade panoramic sea views from the huge openplan living kitchen room big windows and high ceilings recently refurbed double bedroom with a kingsize bed ample storage and double sofabed in the lounge perfect holiday pad and offering easy access to the sth downs nat park arundel goodwood chichester shoreham and brighton 80mbps wifi 43intv netflix ms foodhall 200m the space the spacenthe flat will be fully sanitised by our professional team before checkin if you are using airbnb for the first time please message us with your request giving the names ages and occupations of your group a little bit of information about yourselves and the nature of your trip please have your verification process complete we will provide free parking vouchers for your full days but not checkout day just let us know when you book the flat is situated directly on the seafront and is only yards away from the beach the flat is on the ground floor and gives easy access with two small steps from the pavement the front door and common parts have motion sensor lighting to assist while you enter the property worthing pier and the town centre is a couple of minutes walk 400m go and see russell at the pier cafe for a freshly brewed coffee and an ice cream worthing mainline station is approximately 1km away the fabulous worthing splashpoint leisure centre is also just 1km away along the promenade the flat has a lovely big sunny south facing living room measuring 21 feet long by 15 feet wide and has a newly fitted corner kitchen area the kitchen has a slick black ceramic hob a bosch fan oven grill and a leibherr fridgefreezer all new in 2020 a washing machine and microwave the flat has been recently refurbished and has a bay window four seater dining table area a large double sofabed two coffee tables a new 43 inch led flat screen smarttv with netflix and youtube and fibre optic 80mbps wifi when hard wired the flat benefits from gas central heating and doubleglazing throughout the flat has lovely high ceilings and large windows to let all that lovely seafront sunshine pour in the rectangular 11 x 9 foot double bedroom comes with a pocket sprung luxury 900 kingsize double bed with two bedside storage drawers a chest of drawers and a wardrobe weve put a superkingsize duvet on the bed and four pillows pure cotton bedding completes the opulent finish the separate wc bathroom with shower finishes the private accommodation there is access to the communal front and rear garden areas the beautiful south downs park is accessible only 3 km out of town superbly located for access to all the main attractions of the town bicycle hire is now available on the promenade via the donkey republic app theres an ms food hall a couple of hundred metres along the seafront heading into town and theres a coop at the top of the road 2 mins away montague street and rowlands road which are one block behind the flat are the hub of the town theres a superb selection of shops coffee shops restaurants takeaways and pubs

Title: Isle of Wight home next to the sea
Description: lovely modern maisonette that is part of a seafront complex neutrally decorated throughout 3 good sized bedrooms 2 new bathrooms newly decked spacious garden with wonderful views fabulous situation with direct access to the beaches at seagrove bay and seaview with wonderful walks at low tide round to priory bay you can fish off the sea wall at high tidenwe are 5 minutes walk to the centre of the village which has a local shop cafes and a popular pub the space the spacena secure home in a stunning position within a beachside complex the apartment is on 2 floors and is spacious and comfortable with direct proximity to the sea a much loved holiday home guest access guest accessnguests have full access to the property and garden the complex has direct access to the beach other things to note other things to notenthe property is secure and there is a full time maintenance person on sitenpets are not allowed

Title: LOCATION LOCATION LOCATION! Desk WiFi Bed and Lock
Description: central yet oasis like residential area to return to after making the most of all the fun and festivities found virtually on the doorstepnmy home was rest rooms for the actors on location during the 1940s50s when connected to the erstwhile film studios next doorndelightful small double bedded lockable ground floor room with wash basin desk unlimited wifi large tvnndecorative and quirky jpg wall coverings give the room a lovely nostalgic feel with pleasant view to the patio garden the space the spacenfemale led household you can be confident that thorough cleansing takes place between stays using premium products such as method soaps and surface cleansers fairy soap and conditioner is used on laundering your 100 cotton beddingnngreat little bolt hole with handy desknconvenientconvenient convenient in central brighton yet a quiet residential oasisnpavilion dome north laines the lanestheatre royal brighton station local buses serving seven sisters and beyond are 5 minutes awayni360 the brighton centre and the beach is 10 minutes walknthis charming small double room 4x35 m is ideal for le weekend or an ample cavelarge screen tv for onenessentially victorian in style juxtaposed with some modern objects such as the large screen television also conveniently this room contains your very own hand basin and an arts and crafts writing bureau for penning your memoirs there are books for your enjoyment in the antique bamboo shelving hanging space and drawers for your clothing the victorian style iron bed is situated leaving approximately 2x25 of clear floor space and a view to my delightful patio gardennthe room has a lockable door

Title: Spacious seafront apartment
Description: come and enjoy all brighton has to offer right on the seafront in vibrant central kemptown with its cafes shops delis bars and restaurants newly refurbished spacious lower ground floor apartment offering flexible accommodation welcome families kids free the space the spacenperfect for couples business people or families kids free works well for two to four people the main superking bed is a hotel ziplock and can be divided into two 3 singles there are two top quality full depth mattress 2 6 fold away beds which adults are happy with and also makes it perfect for families there is also a high chair and travel cot with mattress and bottom sheets please bring your preferred top covers and a cupboard with childrens games books cutlery and crockery in the sitting roomnnthe fitted kitchen is fully equipped with electric oven gas hob fridge microwave and washing machine cutlery crockery and basic cooking utensils gas central heating and hot waternnno charge for under 18yrs with responsible adult families please book only for adults on the system so that you are not charged for under 18s just let us know they are coming by email guest access guest accessnprivate access down narrow external stairs to front door means this flat is unsuitable for people with restricted mobilitynnparking is generally straightforward and available but all on road if resident spaces are available we can provide visitor permits for 7 per day usual charge opposite the apartment is 15 per day with some cheaper places a short distance away other things to notenwe can usually be very flexible with check in and check out times please just ask

Title:
Luxury seafront flat with balcony 
(New!)
Description: my seafront flat is set back from road and enjoys fabulous sea views in a very convenient locationnthere is an underground carpark directly in front cost about 8 per daynthe flat is in the newly trendy america ground area of hastings close to the pier ten minutes walk to either the old town or st leonards the space the spacenyou will have the principal rooms of the flat to yourself the rest of the flat is locked offnthere is a bedroom with superking 6 foot bed a small cupboard for hanging your clothes and a small sofanthe main room of the flat 7m x 5m has a large dining table with benches a very well equipped kitchen and a sitting area with sofa armchair and a 43 samsung tv with netflix and other internet stationsnthere is a shower roomnthere is a balcony running the entire width of the flat at the front with a small table and chairs the balcony gets sun in the morning through tonmid afternoon guest access guest accessnthere is a lockbox by the front door where the keys will be ready for your arrivalnthe flat is on the first floor up the spiral staircase other things to note other things to notenthis flat is my own home which i enjoy letting through airbnb when i am travelling which i love to do and am away often you will have the flat to yourself but some of the rooms with my personal stuff in them are locked offni have another dedicated airbnb in the same building which is let all through the year

Title: The Beach Side - 100 Yards Beach - Sleeps 4.
Description: the beach side is a well maintained comfortable two bedroom chalet just 50 yards from the beach which gets regular good reviewsnnfresh linen and towels are includednnwith one double bedroom and a twin the beach side sleeps up to four people and has a shower wc wash basin etcnntheres a sitting room that leads to a fully equipped kitchen the space the spacenthe beach side has many return visitors who enjoy the location and peaceful aspect an easy flat walk to the village and as well as the beach fifty yards away just three hundred yards away is the free to use hersey nature reservennlatest reviewsnnthe beach side is an absolutely delightful little holiday home the location is perfect steps away from a gorgeous beach and lovely walks in both directions the bungalow itself is small but very cosy and was perfect for our family of four plus dog for a weeks stay the communication and welcome we received from roger was exceptional and most definitely set the tone for a special week on the island thank you roger sally family 30th october 2021nnthank you for renting us your holiday home we had a lovely two weeks the location is superb and fell in love with seaview karen adrian 10th october 2021nnmy parents had a wonderful weeks stay here on their first holiday in 8 years roger was really helpful and easy to communicate with and we were grateful for the discount booking ferry tickets very nice bedlinen and towels and fully equipped accommodation had everything needed the place was clean and quiet and location is faultless my parents enjoyed long evenings sat on the decking enjoying sea views would not hesitate to recommend to others or stay here ourselves again viktoria 23rd september 2021nnwhat a great place would highly recommend the deck area in front of the house has a beautiful view over the beach towards portsmouth we had a great time with our 2 year old son popping over to the beach and back all throughout our stay roger was the perfect host helped with ferry bookings and told me everything i needed gary and family 19th july 2021nna nicely decorated tasteful cosy cottage just by a wide spanning beach there are a number of relatively close shops if you dont mind a short walk through the nice seaside town of seaview the place itself was well fitted with a full kitchen and all the bits and bobs you need on holiday there are a multitude of sites to visit around the property with a beautiful nature reserve just a hundred metres from the front door the shore changes from sandy beaches to shingle beaches with a welcoming setting no matter your preference inside the beach side youll find all you need with a tv and stable wifi the two bedrooms were comfortable and quiet at night and the living space has a modern sliding window out onto the communal gardens and the path out to the sea only 30m or so away overall a great place to stay while you explore what the isle has to offer monica 12th july 2021nnwe had a lovely stay on the isle of wight the accommodation was perfect for our needs the location was fantastic in a very quiet peaceful area with lovely coastal walks nearby rogers communication was fantastic he rang before our trip and arranged discounted ferry tickets helen 30th june 2021nseaview is pretty with local eateries that are very good not too far a walk to ryde where there is the bus station and hovercraft giving access to the whole island and a 10 minute trip to portsmouthbeach in ryde was glorious in the sunshinewe had a lovely week ate out had take away and cooked at the beach side toowould recommend and hope to return margaret friends 22nd june 2021nnhi roger many thanks for everything we had a great stay and really enjoyed staying at the beach side lovely place to stay 2 minutes from the beach in a quiet complex best ian 12th june 2021nngreat stay at seaview lovely accommodationvery clean would definitely book again marilyn 29th may 2021nnthe beach side has everything you need fantastic stay very good location for a getaway beach is very close martha 30th april 2021nnwe family of four had a great stay at the beach side its very well appointed and the extra folding chairs and fluffy blankets for cool evenings were a nice touch the location is absolutely perfect and although you cant see the sea from the deck unless you are standing up its only 50yds to take your morning or evening coffee over the road to the sea wall lucy family 17th april 2021 guest access guest accessnthe whole bungalow

Title: Beach Garden - 4 bedroom seaview apartment
Description: a beachfront dream on the coast of pevensey bay this property offers a truly tranquil getaway with amazing views over the english channelnnpevensey bay is a small town located just outside of eastbourne it has its own delicious restaurants and cafes that are just minutes from your front doornnthe property has four bedrooms sleeping up to eight in total and dogs are considerednnparking and free wifi is also included the space the spacenenter by your own private door and up a flight of stairs to the first floor on this level youll find a glorious openplan living space with incredible sea views plus a balcony where you can really soak up the sea airnnthe modern kitchen is fully equipped and includes a dishwasher fridgefreezer oven hob and microwave a separate utility room houses a washing machine and tumble dryernnthis floor also boasts two bedrooms and a bathroom one bedroom is a kingsize while the other can be set up as a super king or with twin beds the bathroom on this level has both a bath and a separate walkin showernnup on the top level youll find a huge master suite this has a super kingsize bed which can be split into twin beds if preferred there is an ensuite shower room and also an adjoining twin bedroom with gorgeous sea views that is ideal for children wanting to be close to their parents as guests to this room have to walk through the master bedroom to reach itnnthe property also has its own private garden which directly extends onto the glorious stretch of beaches for outdoor lovers this property is a must there is bench seating up to eight people plus a parasol to enjoy you will want to take in those views as often as you can a wellbehaved small dog may be considered please discuss in advance supplement appliesnnthere is private parking for one car off road and more on street parking available nearby this stunning exclusively eastbourne property is booked from saturday to saturday in peak season but flexible arrival days andor short stays may be possible last minute or out of season guest access guest accessnboth floors of this private splitlevel maisonette are yours to enjoy the owners live in a separate flat below this maisonette so are on hand should you need help

Title: BRIGHTON BEACH APARTMENT FREE PARKING
Description: prime seafront location the apartment situated in royal crescent offers a luxury stay with complimentary parking on site with ev charger if required master bedroom with heals four poster superking bed rainfall shower spacious open plan lounge netflix cable television wifi well equipped kitchen with range cooker fridgefreezer dishwasher coffee machine etc the apartment has its own sole entrance with key box for contactless entry private residential garden the space the spacenfree parking self check in with sole access along with the open plan lounge and dining space which features a panasonic flatscreen television where guests can enjoy cable television and netflix free of charge wifi free also included for coffee lovers we have a dolce gusto coffee machine with a generous sized table in the lounge ideal to use as a worklaptop area the super king sized heals bed is heavenly comfortable a super efficient fired earth rain shower with plenty of towels the apartment is spacious with plenty of seating we do have a residents private garden for guests to use which faces onto the seafront it is laid to lawn and has seating we offer sun loungers to use during your stay there are a number of independent cafes a road away for everything from breakfast lunch through to dinner we have a well equipped kitchen with smeg range cooker and a dishwasher along with washerdryer guest access guest accessnparking the apartment comes with a parking space allocated for our guests sole use during their stay if required being located ideally for the beach and brighton city centre as well as brighton mariner there are independent shops restaurants bars two minutes from the apartment in kemp town a group of wonderful traders offering unique products and dining experiences including an antique centre other things to notenroyal crescent has a great historical past with the late sir lawrence olivier the famous actor having lived at no 4 royal crescent with his wife owning no 5 joan plowright an actress of the time the crescent is uniform to the front but each house is very original in there own right and the apartment is part of the main house which has remained very close to its original floor plandeliveroo and uber eats offer take away from breakfast lunch dinner to everything in between

Title: Sea Dreams - seafront apartment with fab sea views
Description: sea dreams has wonderful views over the english channel and is literally moment from the promenade and beachnnit is ideal for friends and families who want to escape to the sea for fresh air a dip in waves and a break from hectic livesnnthe apartment is located in a prime spot close to the beach theatres and town centre and also the soughtafter meads area with independent shops cafes and restaurantsnnwifi provided plus towels and linen the space the spacenthe openplan living area has the windows facing the sea and there are doors out onto a balcony overlooking the seannthe lounge includes a large smart tv with freesat so comes with access to channels such as youtube and iplayer as well as traditional tv and the kitchen with a huge window provides arguably the finest views whilst washing up you are ever likely to encounternnthe kitchen is fully equipped with oven and hob microwave and washing machine and there is even a nespresso machine for coffee lovers bring your own capsulesnnit has a master bedroom with a double bed while the second bedroom has a single bed plus an extra pullout single that can be set up for families of four or combined into a second double both bedrooms have picturesque inland views over lower meads and the distant south downsnnthere are two bathrooms wifi is provided along with all towels and linen parking is unrestricted on street bookings run from sundaytosunday in peak season although flexible arrival days may be possible out of seasonnntalk to the exclusively eastbourne team if youve any questions that can help you reach a decision or check out our own website for more photos and alternative places to stay in the area

Title: The Beachfront seaview appartment
Description: situated on southend seafront with free parking at the rear this spacious first floor apartment right on the sea front it is a short walk from the main attractions yet in a quieter residential area suitable for couples 2 persons it has a seperate bedroom with a king size bed bathroom and loungekitchen with sea views a small balcony overlooking the beach the space the spacensituated on the seafront in thorpe bay the affluent part of southend guest access guest accessnthis is a single bedroom appartment with lounge with extensive sea views kitchen and bathroom

Title: Beautiful sea front two bedroom apartment
Description: welcome to my beautiful seafront escape a light and spacious two bedroom apartment situated directly on the seafront during your stay marvel at the sea views relax on the beach or enjoy the cafes restaurants galleries and shops that st leonards has to offer less than 10 minutes walk away the space the spacentwo double bedrooms at the back of the apartment which both overlook the beautiful green cliffsidena modern kitchen equipped with everything you need to cook for yourself and a dining table that seats fournthe living room is spacious light and airy with spectacular sea views from both windows and includes a smart tv and board game cupboard for days when you wish to stay at homenstylish bathroom with shower and bathnthere are beach chairs provided for you to relax on the beach in comfort guest access guest accessnfree on street parking directly outside and a paid car park across the roadnguests will be welcomed on arrival and i am always available if there are any issues otherwise i will leave you to enjoy your staynlocal amenities all within walking distancenaccessible by car or train with 2 local train stations within 15minutes walk st leonards warrior square and west st leonards other things to note other things to notenplease note the apartment is on the 4th floor and there is no lift so may be not suitable for people with mobility issues or really young childrennnunfortunately at the moment there is scaffolding on the front of the building and therefore the view is partially obscured

Title: Coastguard cottage in a coastal nature reserve
Description: solent cottage is a historical victorianera coastal property which has been substantially renovated to modern standards as well as fantastic sea views from one side and gorgeous views of the neighbouring nature reserve from the other guests will enjoy the lovely period feature such as original victorian flooring and the wood burning stove as well as the modern fullyequipped kitchen the space the spacenin such a fabulous location its all about the outside there are three outside spaces to enjoy the rear woodland facing garden is perfect for morning and early afternoon sun a great space for alfresco breakfast and for lunch in the evening the sun appears at the other seafacing garden which is ideal for bbqs or just enjoying a glass of wine as the yachts sail by and the sun goes down and that second garden opens out to a very large green or third garden where wild rabbits roam in the morning and kids play in the afternoonnnboth the living room and the master bedroom have amazing and direct views over the solent and its especially lovely to wake up to the fresh air open the curtains and imbibe the stillness and tranquility of the morning sea the two smaller bedrooms overlook the gardens and woodland nature reserve to the rear the area feels safe secluded but also friendly guest access guest accessnthere is a dedicated offroad parking spot for solent cottage in the cottage car park next door and if you are bringing more than one car free parking at fort victoria a couple of minutes away there is plenty of walking or cycling around the area there are cafes and restaurants on the doorstep shopping and pubs a short 15 minute walk along the coast to yarmouth and a bus stop which connects you to the island bus network at the end of the road westhill lane

Title: Panoramic sea views in beachfront apt w/balcony
Description: newly refurbished seafront apartment 2 bedrooms sleeps up to 5 balcony with panoramic views of the sea iconic listed building the royal open plan loungedining areakitchen master bedroom with sea views outstanding location close to town centre and pier all rooms beautifully presented book your stay today the space the spacenstaying beside the seaside doesnt get much more enjoyable than this heres a 2 bedroom apartment with amazing panoramic views of the sea and bognor regis pier from the balcony at the front of the property and its a property thats an iconic listed seafront building with pillars at the entrance thats been recently refurbished throughoutnnthe balcony is accessible from the apartments open plan living roomdining area and kitchen this features comfy seating from which you can enjoy that amazing sea view and the view of the flatscreen tv is pretty good too theres also a dining table with room for 4 to sit and enjoy any snacks or meals you choose to prepare in the kitchen that features modern countertops cupboards and appliancesnnone of the two bedrooms is at the front of the apartment with amazing sea views to wake up to every morning the second bedroom is at the back with a double and single bed both bedrooms have plenty of storage space for your belongingsnnin between the bedrooms is the bathroom a space thats been recently refurbished featuring a tub with shower overhead plus a washbasin and wcnnsleeping arrangementsnbedroom 1 1 double bednbedroom 2 1 double bed and 1 single bed

Title: Casa Blanca Beach House, Sleeps 10+2, Camber Sands
Description: get your nantucket vibes in casa blanca an exquisitely styled new england beach front home bought and refurbished during lockdown this stunning property is deceptively large and sits discreetly on the camber foreshore it has been sympathetically and cleverly styled to create the most wonderful space for guests to enjoy the best of both the house and the landscape the space the spacensleeping 10 guests in four bedrooms and the possibility of another two in the reading room on a sofa bed it is the perfect home to celebrate or gather with friends and family for a truly memorable escapennarriving at property you enter into a roomy hallway sit down kick off your shoes hang up your coat and let the stress of life melt awaynnif you want to cook up a storm you wont be disappointed the large open plan kitchen boasts a range master oven with 2 ovens separate grill with an 6 ring induction hob including induction griddle plate a microwave two bosch dishwashers a large double samsung fridge freezer with ice machine and a separate wine fridge a nutribullet bakeware but more importantly for those coffee lovers a sage oracle touch coffee machine bean to cup full on arrival with an integrated milk frother you wont be needing to go anywhere for coffee you wont be wanting to go anywherenna bespoke 3 metre oak table that seats 12 invites long lazy lunches or decadent dinners if the cocktail hour takes hold there is a plethora of options from the honesty bar cocktail shakers and martini glasses glint in the sunlight waiting to be shaken and stirred all we ask is you top it up when you leave the bifold doors allow the outside innnmoving into the sitting room the soft muted tones with large corner sofa and natural planters is the perfect place to while away the hours staring out to sea there is a 75 smart tv together with all the apps netflix amazon prime etc if you feel the need for some downtime if you can drag yourself away from the view sonos provides the sound throughout the ground floornncasa blanca is an all year round property with its large conservatory with hot tub overlooking the beach it is serviced and water changed every week if ordered to the rear of the room is a pool table and darts board for extra entertainment there is access into the garage which has been converted into a small gym at your own risk and has a table tennis table permanently set up two paddle boards are available for your enjoymentnntaking yourself upstairs you will find four bedrooms and a reading room two ensuite walkin shower rooms and a large family bathroom the master bedrooms and reading room all enjoy access onto the upper terrace an amazing place to sit and watch the kitesurfers fly bynnthe rear double with a four poster king bed with built in cupboards and dressing table is next to the sizeable family bathroom with walk in shower a large oval bath with hand shower and double basin vanity unit a haven for kids with its four cabin beds all 3ft wide is the fourth massive bedroom each bed comes with their own lights and usb plugs you will also find a playstation 5 a number of games and 42 smart tv to keep the little big ones entertained and a three seater sofa to chill for the little ones the house is equipped with a baby monitor stair gate high chair bottle steriliser travel cotnnthe reading room is a small beach front room where you can sit for hours and indulge in a chapter or two the sofa turns into a sofa bed and whilst the most amazing spot to wake up is not promoted as a bedroom but as an add on if you want a guest for an odd night or twonnoutdoor living is just as stylish as the inside with a dining area with the same table as the dining room a builtin bbq and pizza oven you can enjoy eating alfresco whilst enjoying the breath taking and ever changing scenery or collapse in the comfy sofas hammock or loungers every inch of casa blanca has been thoughtfully styled given the wealth of activities both on and off the water you may never want to leavennwe also welcome up to two dogs to the property it is 35 for the stay you can add these at the time of booking

Title: The Little Lookout
Description: this memorable place is anything but ordinary formally the old coastguard tower on littlehampton seafront this small and unique stay is a little gem newly renovated the space is modern light and airy situated directly on the seafront next to the harbour entrance with incredible views from the 3rd and 4th floor balconiesnnin the heart of west sussex only a 90 minute train ride from london 15 mins from near by attractions brighton the south downs goodwood chichester arundel the space the spacenoriginally built in 1931 the tower was left derelict for over 10 years or so before being fully renovated and refurbished with the works only recently completed by ourselves in june 2021 the space has been cleverly split over 4 floors each floor accessed by the new addition of a spiral staircase extension as you enter the ground floor level you will find a small entrance hall that leads into the kitchen which is a bespoke handmade plywood kitchen finished off with a super cool gold lusso stone sink and tap and stunning stone worktops on the first floor is the luxurious bathroom in herringbone marble stone with a walk in shower and a full sized bath tub looking out to the sea the river mouth on the third floor you will find the bedroom with double doors leading out onto a cosy balcony lay in bed at night and listen to the calming sound of the ocean and finally on the top floor you will find the beautiful vaulted ceiling living space with widows either side and double doors leading out onto a larger balcony again over looking the sea and the river mouth there is a super comfortable double futon sofa bed on the top floor that can accommodate extra guestsnneach floor is carefully thought out and styled to a high standard with gorgeous throws and soft furnishings so even on a dark and stormy day you will still enjoy curling up and soaking in the incredible sea views

Title: King's View - Emsworth
Description: kings view is a stunning town house with water front views in the centre of the charming and popular village of emsworth on your doorstep you can enjoy the fantastic restaurants including fat olives 36 on the quay or treat yourself to a night at jjs restaurant and bar all of the village pubs offer wonderful food and there are many independent cafes to enjoy too the village has many independent shops with po10 being a must visit featuring beautiful pieces made by the many local artists inspired by this scenic areannentering the property there is a utility area with washerdrier and shower and wc to the rear going up to the first floor into the sitting room you are greeted by the direct views of the water this room is filled with comfortable furnishings to relax in while you enjoy your surroundings of an evening you can sit out on the balcony in the sunshine with a glass of wine or in the winter months snuggled under a blanket taking in the stunning views across the marina and over chichester harbour to the rear there is a kitchen dining area overlooking slipper pond the kitchen has been thoughtfully equipped with everything you will need to self cater including krups coffee machine dishwasher large 6 ring range fridge and freezer and a kettle and toasternntaking the stairs up to the second floor there is a beautiful double bedroom with ensuite shower the second bedroom has twin beds and the third has a single there is a family bathroom with shower over the bath on the second floornnoutside to the rear there is an open paved garden looking our over slipper pondnnthere is parking to the front of the property on the driveway for one car

Title: Panoramic sea view apartment
Description: this 2nd floor flat is located on the seafront 100m from the beach you will be in the heart of kemptown village 12 minutes walk from the centre of brightonn5 fantastic local pubs all within 5mins from the flat the palace pier is 8mins walk from the house along with many other sights of brightonnthere is a bus stop literally opposite the house just after bedford street that can drop you off from the station or take you into town and many other destinations in the area the space the spacenthe entire flat

Title: ‚òÖ Chic apartment right by the beach ‚òÖ Sea views ‚õ±
Description: come and stay by brighton beach in our cute and comfortable apartment complete with seafront views of the pier and kemptown just ten minutes walk from the centre of brighton the space the spacenthe apartment has two spacious rooms a bedroom and living room as well as a full kitchen and gorgeous bathroom with shower both of the main rooms have stunning views of the beach and across brighton theres also exclusive guestonly access to the magnificent gardens in marine square guest access guest accessntheres lots of street parking available in the square and of course on the main beach road parking is limited to 4 hour slots but there are a number of longterm car parks you can use too or if youd like to arrive by train its about a 1520 minute amble through north laine and old steine down to the pier and along the seafrontnnour apartment is within a stunning regencystyle block built around 1826 everyone who visits really enjoys the ride in the original lift think all those classic novels youve read about the victorian days other things to note other things to notenplease note we are 100 kid friendly and can provide a travel cot kids plates bowls and cutlery and even games for our younger guests

Title: Idyllic beachside cottage next to nature reserve.
Description: fabulously located between the beach on one side and a woodland nature reserve on the other this cottage is perfect for families who like the outdoors or couples and friends looking for an idyllic getaway retreat the cottage has fantastic sea views from both master bedroom and living room gardens to both front and rear where there is a small gate that open directly onto a woodland nature reserve and the isle of wight coastal path and in the winter months a lovely cosy log burning fire the space the spacenthe cottage was built to house married officers stationed at the victorianera coastal fortress next door and many original features remain it has been recently renovated to a very high standard with a new custombuilt kitchen new bathroom modern electric heating system doubleglazed timer sash windows and full redecoration throughoutnnthe rear woodlandfacing garden receives sun in the morning until midafternoon so is the perfect spot to enjoy alfresco breakfast or lunch in the late afternoonearly evening the sun is out at the sea facing garden where you can enjoy a glass of wine or cup of tea watching the yachts sailing by sunsets over the fort are fabulous

Title: Beachfront home, perfect for families and friends
Description: a bright welcoming and familyfriendly four bedroom house right on the east beach of selsey enjoy sea views from the lounge balcony and two of the second floor bedrooms and a gorgeous sunset in the garden at the end of the daynguests can enjoy use of the whole house with wifi smart tv and a fully equipped kitchennfollow us on facebook no4kingsway for more info pictures and updates the space the spacenno 4 kingsway is the perfect place for family and friends to relax and enjoy time together the owners have catered for families and groups of friends alikenan amazing local photographer and an incredibly talented artist feature throughout to brighten the walls of the housenthree bedrooms on the second floor offer a super king bed king sized bed and bunk beds the ground floor bedroom has a double bed and double doors onto the patio there is a family bathroom with separate shower on the second floor and a separate toilet and wash basin on the ground floornthe kitchen is fully equipped with plenty of dining space with plastic plates cutlery and cups for the kidsnthe lounge is spacious and bright the perfect place to relax with breathtaking views from the balconynthe garden is simple and provides a relaxed area to spend time with a large dining table our fabulous mud kitchen for the kids will keep them busy for hoursnthere is also a large shed that guests may use during their stay which is perfect for your water sports equipment or bikes you will need to provide your own padlock

Title: A relaxing haven with superb views
Description: the spacenlocation location location this stunning studio apartment situated in historic rottingdean certainly gets three ticks for thatnyou are literally seconds from the seafront and ideally situated to explore your beautiful surroundingsnthe apartment boasts a fully fitted kitchen with modern appliances a bath with a shower and a spacious uncluttered living area that provides a feeling of space and tranquility there is a double pull down bed which folds away easilynsitting at the table in front of the window you are treated to unspoilt panoramic viewsnrudyard kipling made rottingdean his home and the old house adjacent to kipling gardens is still standing rottingdean is also notable for the black wooden windmill on the hillnit boasts many pubs including the ye old black horse which dates back to 1513 making it the oldest pub in rottingdeannfor your convenience there is a tesco express a pharmacy cafes bakers fishmonger butcher and much more all in rottingdean high street car parking is less than than three minutes walk away in a council run car parknjust 42 miles from the vibrant city of brighton access is easy with an efficient and regular bus servicenthis gem of an apartment offers you the best of both worlds

Title: Beachfront self-contained one bedroom annexe
Description: come and stay at this tranquil beachfront hideaway this is a selfcontained one bedroom annexe with its own en suite bathroom kitchen and patio you will have direct access to the beach and a sea view famous for its crab and seafood sold at beachside huts selsey is also a short drive from the sandy dunes of the witterings goodwood estate and racecourse and historic chichester the 350yearold renowned crab lobster pub is our local the space the spacenthe annexe has one bedroom with a king size bed an en suite bathroom with a wet room shower a sitting roomkitchen with a tv on the wall and a seafront patio guest access guest accessnthere is free onstreet parking outside the house the nearest train station is chichester with bus services to selsey we are a five minute walk from the bus station taxis are also readily available at chichester train station
