Title: Marine Court,  Bognor Regis
Description: over looking bognor regis sea front marine court is the perfect holiday destination throughout the year enjoy the bright sunshine on the balcony in summer or cosy down and watch the waves crash in the winter no matter the time of year with these spectacular views of the sea you will never be bored of sitting in this living roomnnturn left out of the apartment and you can walk the coastline and be at bognor regis pier in only 5 minutes a fantastic fish and chip shop can be found here also turn right out of the coastline and you can continue along the coast to aldwick and even onto pagham nnthe large living space is light and airy with a window spanning the entire width of the room the kitchen is partially open plan giving your a window to the sea views also carefully refurbished this apartment makes the most of the stunning views on offernnthe living room includes dining space and large television for cosying down with a movie after a busy day of exploring bognor regis has many local eateries mustards is a favourite to dine out or order in and enjoy in the comfort of your holiday home with plenty of takeaway deliveries on offer you will be spoilt for choice if you prefer to have a shop delivered this well equipped kitchen has everything you need to cook up a feast while awaynnmarine court has two bedrooms and bathroom with shower between free wifi included parking space is available at rear but the drive is narrow and may not suit wide vehicles free parking is available locally if you would prefer

Title: Stylish apartment with amazing sea views
Description: the lookout is situated directly on the sea front between southend on sea and thorpe bay we have stunning sea views and our balcony is the perfect place to watch the sunset over southend pier the beach is right outside our front door and a 15 min walk along it will take you to southend sea front with its many arcades and adventure islandnthe 1 bedroom luxury apartment has a king size bed south facing balcony full kitchen stylish wet room 50 curved tv free wifi and a log burner the space the spacenrecently refurbished beautifully decorated and modern one bedroom apartment perfect for couples looking for a romantic break located directly on the seafront where you are able to take a nice stroll to one of the many restaurants or towns nearby such as southend on sea and thorpe bay

Title: Amazing views! 2 bed central apartment ‚òºsleeps 4‚òº
Description: watch the ships and the sea from the comfort of your own living room all whilst only minutes from the main barsrestaurants of southsea this spacious two bed apartment that sleeps up to four is perfect for a weekend away with a modern kitchen newly fitted bathroom with walk in shower two spacious double bedrooms and uninterrupted views of the sea all set within a beautiful period property fantastic access to the best of southseas attractions gunwharf quays and old portsmouth the spacenupon entering this imposing period property you will climb the stairs to the third floor there is a communal hallway which leads to the apartment which has a large open plan kitchen living dining room perfect for time with the family there is a large smart tv and even a nintendo wii there are two large double bedrooms with storage facilities and the master bedroom has an amazing view across the the common and out to the sea there is a high spec family bathroom with plenty of room guest access guest accessnthe apartment is a stone throw away from all the best bars restaurants and cafes of southsea you are within minutes from gunwharf quays iow ferry the historic dockyard and also you can see victorious festival from your windownnsouthsea common car park is located 50m from the property and is pay and display due to its central location there is not any onsite parking for this property and the street parking is limitednnnote that there is not any lift access and this apartment is on the 3rd floor of the building so guests must climb stairsnnthere are traditional sash windows which open from the bottom so please ensure children are not left unsupervised if open

Title: Salty Lodge,  (No.50)
Description: cool chic and newly refurbished bungalow on the beachnnall you need for a perfect holiday at home quiet road with magnificent views of the solent and plenty of places to eat and drink nearbynnwe are located down a quiet private road but within 100m of a convenience store pubs and takeaways the space the spacenan enviously unique beach front position with all new fixtures and fittingsnfabulous outdoor facilities for that perfect staycation relax in the comfy new england chairs or sunbathe on the padded sunbeds book in hand and gt in the othernna charcoal barbeque at your disposal with outdoor table and chairsnninside the space is tastefully furnished with brand new comfortable chairs and sofas where you will be able to look out at the boats on the solentnnthe kingsize bedroom has its own patio door leading onto the deck with fabulous views again of the solent which can be enjoyed with your early morning cuppannthe well equipped kitchen has a fridge freezer oven microwave dishwasher and washing machine to make your stay easy and relaxingnnwe have an outside 13amp plug for easy ev charging this is by prior arrangement only and a fee of 10 per charge needs to be paid directly to us

Title: 5 Bedroom Beach Front Property

Title: Stunning East Sussex 4 Bed House, Private Beach
Description: white water house a stunning 3 storey edwardian property boasting 4 dble bedrooms plus 3 bathrooms theres also a childs bed and travel cot availablenthis exquisite hideaway is ideal for families couples or groups of friends seeking sanctuary from busy bustling citiesna peaceful location set in historical 1066 country the property overlooks pevensey beach features a decked front garden with alfresco dining area plus beach hut leading onto a private beach the space the spacena sleepy haven in which to take in the sea views as you wander along the shingle beaches and enjoy the invigorating airnnrecently refurbished set directly on to pevensey beach white water house is ideal for beach side getaways provides a cosy base all year round getting there couldnt be easier with it being an hour and half from london by car plus eastbourne or pevensey rail links being just 15 minutes and 5 minutes away respectivelynnthe main living space is a large through reception room with two large sofas plus a love seat set around a fireplace the dining area includes a 10 seater table complete with banquette seating french doors lead on to the beach side gardennnthe well equipped kitchen includes double oven coffee machine plus all other mod consnand there are several farm shops nearby so you can cook some delicious local produce after a day spent at the beachnrear door leads on to a decked rear garden complete with jacuzzinnstairs lead up to nnmaster bedroom stunning views directly on to the beach this beautiful light and airy bedroom has a central kingsize bed and ensuite bathroom dressing table wardrobennfamily bedroom again with views on to the beach this large bedroom includes a kingsize bed plus toddler bed dressing table wardrobennbedroom 3 two single wooden sleigh beds with wardrobe overlooking rear gardennnbedroom 4 kingsize bed with wardrobe overlooking rear gardennntwo further bathroomsnnall bedlinen and towels are hotel quality

Title: Sea, surf & views
Description: at the end of a small cul de sac is a hidden gem you will feel like you are holidaying on the beach itself with nearly every room having stunning sea views this beautiful three story house has a very large open plan kitchen dinning and sitting room looking directly south opening out onto the sun terrace it also has two additional balconies decadently furnished to watch the world go by the space the spacenthe house has three floorsnnit has a stunning top floor with top balcony its bedrooms are all good sizes and furnished to facilitate two families very comfortably the middle floor balcony accessed though the snug is such a comfortable spot for both dining and lounging the ground floor has a large corner sofa and tv unit as well as dining and open plan kitchen with all the commoditiesnnthis house is perfect for two families to holiday together as it is less than a stones through to the stunning hayling beach with safe swimming and lots going on to see and do guest access guest accessnthe house has space for off road 4 space parkingnnaccess to the beach at the bottom of the garden other things to note other things to notenyou are allowed one well behaved dog but please do keep it off furniture and be responsible owners on the beach

Title: Luxurious Beach House With Direct Beach Access
Description: beach fronted large detached family house commanding spectacular sea views from the rear and superb far reaching rural views from the front a truly luxurious getaway by the sea the space the spacenkey featuren direct beach accessn fenced decked arean outside table chairsn charcoal bbqn sunloungersn one dog welcomen travel cot stair gate high chairnon entering the property there is a ground floor entrance hall separate utility room housing a washing machine and clothes airer a double bedroom with a kingsized bed and large wardrobe with views to the countryside adjacent to this bedroom there is a ground floor shower room with a walkin shower cubicle pedestal wash hand basin and lower level wcnthe rest of the accommodation is situated on the first floor including a 191 x 108 lounge looking out to sea an impressive 238 x 83 second reception room with a dining table and chairs to seat 8 guests also enjoying sea views the property boasts a good sized and well fitted modern grey kitchen housing a full range of utensils plates pots and pans along with a toaster microwave kettle american fridge freezer and microwave the open plan kitchen and dining area leads into the spacious lounge which has a 70 inch flat screen tv a large leather corner sofa and additional lounge chair and a bar area with two raised bar stools with french doors opening onto a superb twotiered sundeck with spectacular sea views and leading down directly on to a private beach the sun deck has a modern rattan table and chairs along with four sun loungersnthere are three additional bedrooms on this level one has a kingsized bed one has a double bed and the other has two single beds a travel cot and all with plentiful storage facilities for clothesnthere is an additional family shower room with a shower area pedestal wash hand basin and a low level wc adjacent to one of the bedroomsnat the front of the property there is offroad parking for several cars along with a mature garden with shrubs and plants and a raised sun patio enjoying a rural outlooknpevensey bay has a dog friendly shingle beach it is a seaside resort in miniature a good place to take a holiday and really unwind we allow one small dog to stay in the property but please note the stair gate must be put across and the bedroom doors need to remain closed to prevent the dog from going on the bedsnwhen booking with us your stay will be protected by a deposit guarantee and public liability provided by our risk management partner superhog to benefit from this protection you will be contacted by superhog directly to verify yourself or you can also go via their website superhogcom to start the verification to view the superhog privacy policy use this link httpssuperhogcomprivacypolicydataprotectionpolicy other things to note other things to notena damage deposit of 20000 is payable for direct bookings with beachside holiday rentals this amount will be held on your payment card on the day that you check out and returned to your card after a full inspection has been completed and within 14 days of departurenwe allow one house trained dog to stay in the property but please note the stair gate must be put across and the bedroom doors need to remain closed to prevent the dog from going on the beds for guests who may struggle with the internal 12 stairs there is a flat way into the property just a few houses down and along the beach which brings you into the back entrance the majority of the house is then on one level please ask if you require any clarification on access or layoutnnthe cleaning fee covers all cleaning laundrytowels and bed linens which we provide for your stay

Title: Climping Beach House - a perfect beach getaway
Description: the beach house is a tranquil space overlooking climping beach perfect both as a chance to spend some time on this lovely part of the coast at an unspoilt beach and as a great base for exploring the light is stunning the air is clear and guests who arrive all feel the relaxing benefits of being so close to the seanwith two large bedrooms peaceful living area and a light airy bathroom the beach house has views over the sea and south downs the space the spacenself contained and sleeps two or four the beach house has views over the sea and south downsnupstairs there is a large bedroom with king sized bed a bathroom with loo basin and bath no shower a second bedroom that can be made up as either twin beds or a double this bedroom is open to the staircase and a large dining area with a kitchenette with fridge kettle microwave toaster and crockery etcnour wifi is not the always the fastest because of the location down a country lane right at the beach but we are hoping you will come here for some time away from life onlinennto be clear you will have a separate self contained unit whilst not the entire building there is another room accessed separately but within the same buildingnnwe are sorry but this space is not suitable for young children under 7 other things to note other things to notenthe beach house is not suitable for small children we suggest a lower age of 7 years old but are happy to chat about whether it would be suitable for your child before you booknthe bedrooms and bathroom are up a flight of stairs so this not suitable for people who cannot manage stairs sorry

Title: Serenity  "your calm seafront retreat"
Description: serenity is a luxurious two bedroom house with breathtaking views of the sea the property is located right on the seafront which means you can go from the lounge to water within a minutennthis completely self contained property has access to one private parking space the private decking area at the front of the property has views of the breathtaking sunsets and sunrises daily perfect for alfresco dining or a peaceful morning coffeennthis property is managed by air premier the space the spacenthis property can comfortably host four adults as both the bedrooms contain double beds this property has an open plan modern kitchen which leads onto the outside decking area the lounge is bright and has stunning views of the sea as does the master bedroomnnthe master bedroom has a large private balcony and an electric fannncoffee machine bosch tassimo

Title: Seascape
Description: step straight on to the beach and enjoy spectacular views out to sea in this spacious property perfect for a couple family or small group of friends to get away from it allnnthe property comprises a large bright kitchenliving room overlooking seaford beach a spacious double bedroom a second bedroom with bunk beds and a newly fitted bathroomnnseaford is surrounded by stunning countryside the train station is 5 mins walk and the property enjoys free parking outside the flat the space the spacenthe flat has easy access on the ground floor its perfectly located for peoplewatching on the esplanade or spotting the ferry to dieppennit has been refurbished with a new bathroom and a wellequipped kitchen everything you will need for a comfortable break at the seaside is providednnthere is free parking on the road outside the flat seaford town centre is only 3 minutes walk away and many walks across east sussex can be started from the door

Title: Family holiday home with amazing panoramic views
Description: waters edge is a nordic style water front house with its own private sea shore and panoramic views of the solent the house is suited for family holidays or groups with 5 bedrooms 4 bathrooms a large open plan sitting dining room extending to a deck over looking the solentnit is ideally positioned on the edge of yarmouth where beaches walks and various activities can be enjoyed west wight is fast becoming a foodie haven with a plethora of options from cafes through to fine dining the space the spacenthis is our much loved home from home that is set up for our young family and guests to enjoy guest access guest accessnall areas except for the garage other things to note other things to notenthe coastal defence gabions are dangerous not for walking or climbing overnthe tide in the solent is extremely strong therefore swimming off the jetty is at your own risk and children must be kept away from the seafrontnthe gardens at the seafront are open guests should not venture in front of our neighbours houses and should respect their privacy

Title: Home By The Sea | Free Parking & Prosecco!
Description: tucked away at the tipping point of kemp town this cosy apartment provides a great launch pad for a breakaway to explore brightons bohemian vibesnnthe kitchenliving space filled with sunshine in the morning you can enjoy a coffee with a glimpse of the sea a big cozy casper bed in the bedroom which is a quiet sun trap in the afternoons however you choose to take your break this apartment allows you to explore retreat and nest all at the same time the space the spacenwhile the apartment is cosy it has everything you need in the kitchen there is a fridge freezer washerdryer and a dishwasher for those lazy evenings the hob while its small can take 3 pans at once enough to cook a small banquetnnthe apartment is set up and ready to go there are usb charging points throughout the flat to charge your phone theres a bluetooth speaker in the bathroom for a shower singalong theres an amazon fire stick in the living room for accessing netflix and amazon primennthe bedroom has lots of storage so that you can unpack and make yourself at home theres a side lamp for latenight reading and goosefeather duvet and pillow to keep you sufficiently snuggled extra blankets pillows and central heating are prerequisite youll also find some bonus paddle boards and roller skates in the wardrobe youre very welcome to try out if the sea is calm for the weekend

Title: No4. Yarmouth Country Cottages

Title: Premium Lake Lodge
Description: our variety of standard and premium lake lodges offer the perfect accommodation for those seeking lets in the historic town of chichester lodges sleep up to 4 guests with a living kitchen area double bedroom en suite bunk bed room and a shared bathroom fresh linen and towels provided guests can relax on their private terrace overlooking a stunning 50 acre lake you can also enjoy 15 off all water sport activities in the summer season located just a 5 minutes drive from goodwood the space the spacenonsite secure parking next to each of the lodges is available for guestsnlocated just a 5 minutes drive from goodwood other things to note other things to notenguests should be aware that the water sports centrecaf is closed during the winter seasonnnduring the summer season water sports activities must be prebooked in advance please enquire for more informationnnthere is strictly no swimming in the lake and there is no access to walk around it

Title: Stylish house on Winchelsea beach, near Camber
Description: sitting on the shores of winchelsea beach is cloudbreak a new contemporary build with stunning views of the sea and easy access to the beach that is directly on the doorstep of this modern property built beside the bike path and walkway along the beach it is a short drive from the medieval town of rye with all its history cloudbreak is perfectly situated to explore the surrounding area the space the spacenturning the house upside down it benefits from the spectacular views of the beach the open plan living allows its guests to fully relax in sumptuous luxury attention to detail top notch kitchen facilities and stylish furniture encourages our guests to fully enjoy seaside living the sitting room boasts a 65 smart tv with a sonos soundbar to maximise alternate viewing if required off the kitchen sits a tiny snug an escape from the day with a 55 smart tv with playstation4 and a vast library of dvdsnnfor the chef the kitchen is beyond well equipped to knock out a perfect meal with a neff double oven neff induction hob microwave nespresso coffee machine top of the range saucepans and baking equipment it is a delight to cook in nearly as good as the view the balcony stretches the length of the property floor to ceiling sliding doors allow the outside in and you can watch the world go bynnthe sound of the sea always encourages a peaceful nights rest the master bedroom on the middle floor overlooks the sea with a superking bed dressed with 600 thread count linen styled in muted colours a dressing room leads onto the ensuite shower room with curtains and sheers for privacy the bedroom is an oasis of calmnnthere are two further bedrooms both with king beds one has and ensuite shower room and the family bathroom with bathshower sits between the bedrooms all beautifully furnished for your complete comfortnnentering cloudbreak on the ground floor there is a garage that is fully insulated and houses the games room with full size table tennis table and perfect place to store bikes surfboards etc another fridge freezer is housed in the garage so that you can keep a well stocked supply the hallway has a large cupboard to hang your coats beyond the stair case is another snug room an escape for teenagers with sofa bed next a utility room with shower and loo together with bosch washing machine and dryer the snug also leads out onto the enclosed sunken courtyard with bbq and outdoor seating via a glass french door the large sofa bed that can accommodate two extra guests once the bed is down access to the bathroom is compromisednnwe allow up to two dogs please add them to your booking

Title: Little Beacon Beach House ,  Selsey
Description: set on selsey sea front overlooking our beautiful south coasts blue seas little beacon is a wonderful retreat quite literally a stones throw from the waters edge with direct access to the sea via a private gate only available to two of properties in the quiet cul se sac with an abundance of independent restaurants cafes and shops selsey has everything you will want while on your holidays and with a regular bus service running from chichester a car is not necessarynnlittle beacon beach house has a large open plan living room with flat screen television free wifi and amazon fire stick so you can login and cosy down in the evening after a busy day of exploring overlooking the beach and with sea views this is the perfect spot to unwindnnthe dining room leads on from the lounge and has room to seat your party comfortably the dining room is open plan to the beautifully light conservatory which leads out to the courtyard garden the garden has four sun loungers and an outdoors dining table with seatingnnlittle beacon beach house has a wellequipped kitchen with everything you will need to effectively selfcater during your stay this includes dishwasher fridge freezer microwave toaster cafetire and washing machinennlittle beacon beach house has two bedrooms one double bedroom over looking the sea and one double bedroom over looking the garden with a shower room ensuite the first floor has a family bathroom with shower cubicle and bathtub there is a further wc on the ground floornnoff road parking for two cars

Title: Stunning sea views at a charming character cottage
Description: coastguard cottage in a idyllic location between the beach and a woodland conservation area on stunning coastline beautiful walks fantastic views gorgeous sunsets over a historical fort next door perfect for family holidays and groups of friends the space the spacenthe best things about wight cottage are waking up in the master bedroom to a fabulous and uninterrupted view of the sea and sipping a glass of wine or a cup of tea in the sea facing garden at sunset while watching the boats sail by there are also great views over the sea from the living room downstairsnnthe cottage itself was built in 1855 and is packed with original features including an open log burning fire and original doors it has been renovated for 2017 including a new heating system with modern electrical heaters for maximum comfort other things to note other things to notensorry but wight cottage does not accept dogs at the moment but we do have other cottages which are dog friendly

Title: Spacious Modern Beach House
Description: sleeps 8 sleeps 8 a large beach house situated right on the waters edgen3d tour copy this link into your browser httpsvtehousecouk7ft3ekkm3mhnplease note the 3d video shows our listing with an additional bedroom with ensuite attached but on this listing for driftwood 8 the reservation does not include access to this bedroom you would need to book through driftwood 10 to have access to this facilitynnewly renovated jan 2021 to a modern and contemporary style throughout with its own gated beach garden to the rear and an additional secluded courtyard garden to the front of the house offering some privacy and a place to enjoy the evening sunset the space the spacenkey featuresn beachfrontedn enclosed decked arean four bathroomsn travel cot stair gate high chairn safen pool tablenarranged over three floors and offering well laid out and generous living accommodation this is the perfect holiday home for a large family or group this property really does make the most of the breathtaking views on offernthe house has a garage for one car at the front with additional space for two parked cars in the forecourt beyond the double garage there is a secluded large courtyard garden that has a wooden table and chairs a wooden bench and nice area to enjoy some privacy and of course the sunset in the evenings this than leads us to the main house inside the front door which is accessed via the courtyard garden there is a lobby and a utility room on the left containing a washing machine dryer iron ironing board washing line etc a shower room and wc and on the right is a bedroom with a triple sleeper bednfrom the lobby there are stairs leading up to the main floor which is on the same level as the beach there is a large open plan sitting room that interconnects with the dining area through to a newly fitted kitchen with everything you need to comfortable prepare and cook your owns meals a second sitting area which looks out to sea which contains two double sofas a triple corner sofa two arm chairs side tables with lamps and a tv with dvd player having been completely refurbished in jan 2021 to a modern and contemporary style truly a room you will not want to leave the floors are wooden giving you a real seaside feel there are two double bedrooms on the same floor one of which has an ensuit bathroom there is also a fully fitted family bathroom just of the lounge area with bathroom with a bathshower hand wash basin and wcnthe beach is accessed directly from the lounge area with concertina doors opening onto a large decking area with an outside dining table and benches two armchairs with a coffee table a 3seater hammock swing 2seater bench with beach accessories stored underneath all over the beach garden with uninterrupted views towards the coastna wooden staircase leads to the top floor which has a double bedroom with a super kingsize bed and ensuite bathroom with the benefit of heated flooring a wc shower and heated towel rail on the same floor there is also another lounge sitting area with an additional tv dvd player a bluetooth stereo system loads of dvds and books for all ages to keep the family entertained indoors too an hp printer if you want to connect your laptop and some usb cables to charge up your phone the lounge then leads on to a balcony that has two three seater benches to sit and enjoy the far reaching and uninterrupted views towards the english channelnthere is a hotel style wall mounted safe in the master bedroom for safekeeping valuablesnbed linen and towels provided on each bed you will find a set of towels per person travel cot highchair and child safety stairgate is available upon request unlimited free wifi is available throughout the premises free use of kayak at users risk please only use in safe waters and under adult supervision life jackets provided guest access guest accessnentry instructions will be provided 4 days prior to your arrival datencovid19 guidelinesnall guests are responsible for meeting any uk current covid19 guidelines in place whilst staying in one of ournproperties other things to note other things to notena damage deposit of 20000 is payable for direct bookings with beachside holiday rentals this amount will be held on your payment card on the day that you check out and returned to your card after a full inspection has been completed and within 14 days of departurenlost keys will be charged at 2500 per setnnthe owner supplies a welcome starter of tea coffee sugar dishwasher tablets washing up liquid kitchen roll salt pepper oil dishcloth and pad one bath towel per guest and an additional hand towel in each bathroom along with the first toilette roll kitchen roll

Title: A proper beach house with great views
Description: my place is close to rye hastings the sea great walks youll love my place because of its location right on the beach the light and its open feel my place is good for couples and families with kids the space the spacenthe house is a twostorey 1980s house reclad in siberian larch it is situated in the small hamlet of pett level and is one of only twenty houses on the beach all the houses are different styles and sizesnnthe house has been comfortably furnished as a home for the owners it is an upside down house there is a large living room upstairs which includes kitchen and dining room with a terrace overlooking the sea it easily sleeps eight people it has two double rooms two twinbedded rooms and one bathroom and one shower room it is centrally heatednthe house is situated in the most fantastic position stunning sea views in one direction the end of the south downs the other over which you get some amazing sunsets the garden leads straight onto the beach guest access guest accessntheres one parking space outside the house and ample parking on the other side of the road the beach is accessible from a gate at the end of the garden

Title: The Smugglers Retreat
Description: beautifully presented south facing sea front apartment with exceptional panoramic views out over the english channel and the beach on its doorstep located at the heart of hastings seconds from the town centre and only minutes walk from hastings station this perfect seaside retreat is ideal for a short break to hastingsnto the front of the apartment is a large bright livingdining room with sofa bed double height ceilings floor to ceiling windows and french doors leading to a full width south facing balcony ideal for evening drinks or al fresco dining adjacent is the fully equipped modern fitted kitchen complete with nespresso machine dishwasher microwave and full range of cutlery and crockerynto the rear are two spacious double bedrooms the master featuring a kingsized bed and both fitted with wardrobes for storage the apartment is complete with a stylish contemporary bathroom with part tiled walls pedestal hand basin and showernthis fantastic seaside home has recently undergone extensive restoration and the attention to detail is evident in every room with high quality finishes and luxury furnishings throughout ideal for anyone looking for a stylish seaside retreatnthis apartment can be booked in conjunction with our other stunning seafront holiday let apartments ideal for larger groups or families or events as all of our short break apartments are situated in the same buildingnour holiday homes come complete with an on call service should you need us during your staynhastings is home to the largest beachlaunched fishing fleet in europe the remains of the first castle in england to be built by william the conqueror a stunningly beautiful and preserved old town and a strong local arts communitynhastings is really three towns in one joined by a level promenade the old town to the east the bustling contemporary shopping town centre in the middle and st leonards to the west featuring the classical elegance of james burtons architecture and the fashionable norman road recently named as the new portobello roadon sea by the times and offering a great collection of antique shops and vintage galleriesnhastings has grown in popularity as a seaside destination attracting many visitors and holidaymakers over the summer season with multiple festivals and attractions taking place not to mention the huge music and arts scene there is always plenty to do sign up to our news letter or check out our blog to keep up to date with what is going on

Title: Compact studio minutes from the seafront
Description: centrally located around the corner from the sea front the west pier and just off of western road this compact and stylish studio flat is the perfect place for a quick getaway in brighton easily accessible by foot to all the attractions 10 minutes from train stationnthe space itself is very small but includes kitchen facilities fridge stove microwave grill you have lots of storage space for your belongings the space the spacena lovely little studio moments from the seafront light bright and really cosy it is a very small space so not really suitable for a couple for more than a few days ideal for a short break where you just need somewhere to rest your head shops bars restaurants nearby the location is hard to beat guest access guest accessnthe little room is a small bedsit located in between the ground and first floor flat in the building the building is a quiet residential building so not suitable for loud parties if that is what you are looking for please find another booking

Title: Seafront balcony, lovely spacious relaxing flat
Description: this recently renovated spacious flat is on st leonards seafront close to the new pier warrior square hastings the jerwood gallery etc many restaurants the beach and all sorts of other activities it has amazing views from its roomy balcony high ceilings and a great location its laid out in shabby chic style bare floorboards rugs open plan etc its a very comfortable space and place to relax in a wonderful antidote to city lifea few minutes here and youre relaxed the space the spacenthe flat comprises a beautiful and very large room with two windows and a sizeable balcony looking straight onto the sea comfortable sofas an indoor viewing platform which you can sleep on at your own risk and at the back the kitchen area the bathroom and the double bedroom its a really wonderful place to relax and enjoy yourself in you can incidentally hear the soft and lovely sound of the waves as you sit in the flatnnplease note ive instant booking turned on but id prefer an enquiry first if possible also the instant booking says seven days notice but its worth asking me if you want to book within seven days as sometimes it may be possible thanks guest access guest accessnyou have the whole flat to use to yourselves its on the fourth floor by the way theres a two person lift that takes you up thereor stairs of course if youre keeping fit other things to note other things to notenas its a lovely quiet space in a building with a flat on each floor please have respect for neighbours i dont have a tv so please bring a computer if you want to watch iplayer via the wifi i have and ipodmp3 players and a radio

Title: Cottage by the beach with fantastic sea views
Description: coastguard cottage in a idyllic location between the beach and a woodland conservation area on stunning coastline beautiful walks fantastic views gorgeous sunsets over a historical fort next door perfect for family holidays and groups of friends the space the spacenthe best things about sea view cottage are waking up in the master bedroom to a fabulous and uninterrupted view of the sea and sipping a glass of wine or a cup of tea in the sea facing garden at sunset while watching the boats sail by there are also great views over the sea from the living room downstairsnnthe cottage itself was built in 1855 and is packed with original features including an open log burning fire and original doors it has been renovated for 2017 including a new heating system with modern electrical heaters for maximum comfort other things to note other things to notensorry but sea view cottage does not accept dogs at the moment but we do have other cottages which are dog friendly

Title: "Ocean Waves " Beach House  on the Sea front
Description: renovated seafront house 10 minutes walk to local village shops pub cafes restaurants and supermarketnlocal water sports surfing windsurfing kite surfing kayaking boogie boardingn20 min drive to chichester 25 min drive goodwood the space the spacensituated on a private road ocean waves has been refurbished to create a cosy and relaxing beachfront family homennon the first floor youll find it easy to relax in the upstairs lounge with unobstructed views of the sandy beaches and oceannnthe house has a large open plan kitchendining area with plenty of seating for ten people and patio doors which can be opened to enjoy the sound of the waves the kitchen is fully equipped with everything you will need to selfcater during you stay the kitchen includes a dishwasher oven hob microwave fridge and freezer with ice makernnthe downstairs lounge is a separate space which is ideal for relaxing with a book or playing games with the family the room has a piano and a comfortable sofa bed if needednnocean waves has 5 bedrooms two on the ground floor one of which is a large super king this can be configured in to 2 separate single beds if requested at time of booking and the other with adult sized bunk beds on the first floor there are three additional bedrooms which consist of one double one king and one super king the super king has unobstructed sea viewsnnthe first floor also has a spacious family bathroom with a shower no bath an additional shower room and separate toilet can be found on the ground floornnoutside you can relax on the private sea front terrace the property also has a front and back garden with access to the beach and parking for 4 carsnncarbon monoxide and smoke detectors are situated on both ground and first floornnwifi and sky tv included

Title: Right on the beach
Description: the bitter end beach house sits on the beach facing the sea with nothing between you and the water except sand and shingle at high tide the sea is about 30 feet from the deck low tide the sandy beach is almost half a mile wide camber sands is 35 miles from the historic town of rye in east sussex the house looks out over rye bay to the west and dungeness to the east for the best rate book direct through julie at camberbeach dot ukay the space the spacenour home is a four bedroomed two storey detached beach house at the end of a private un made up lane it is nestled next to the dunes a site of special scientific interest sssi no traffic noise just the sound of the ocean as at sept 2020 ours is one of only three houses in camber to rent through airbnb that sits on the beach with direct access to itnnsitting room with wood burner baby grand piano and pool table dining table seats 8nkitchen with range cooker american fridge freezer dishwasher and washing machinennfour bedrooms one with a 6 super king bed one with a 5 king bed one with a 46 double bed and the fourth bedroom has a 5 king sized double bed and a single bednbathroom with bath and loo downstairs separate loo also downstairs shower room with loo upstairsndeck outside with table to seat 10 wet suits body boards kites and beach toys providednnthe house is clean tidy our personal belongings are all packed away during rentals and warm full central heating and a wood burner but please bear in mind that it is our family home and so it is equipped as we like it rather than as one might for a full time rental for example there is the usual essential stuff in the drawer of the kitchen table bits for things that no one now recognises but that we are afraid to throw awaynnas it is a beach house the floors downstairs are painted concrete which is easy to sweep but please consider bringing slippers we have some hotel ones to use if you forget and clean dressing gowns on the backs of doors

Title: Sunny room with view of the sea.
Description: beautiful large sunny bedroom available in 1930s art deco block right on worthing seafront the room has a direct view of the sea so you can sit back and relax watching the sunrise and sunset the fishermen and kite surfers the flat is in a convenient location for walking into worthing and traveling to brighton the space the spaceni am renting a double bedroom in my lovely 1930s art deco flat on worthing seafront the views are stunning and the sea is forever changing the room has loads of space including a wardrobe for hanging clothes table and comfy lounge chair the double bed base has a futon mattress so is firm and comfortablennthe bathroom is shared and theres a separate toilet which is also shared a kettle and teacoffee is provided in the room guests are welcome to store food in the fridge in the kitchennnits easy to get to brighton and hove on the 700 bus which goes from directly outside the flat every ten minutes access to the downs chichester and surrounding areas is excellent by either train or car guest access guest accessnexcellent free parking available at the front of the propertynplease contact me so we can make specific arrangements for your arrival other things to note other things to notenplease be aware that the flat is on a busy coastal road and theres some light traffic noise however the room has double glazing so reducing the noise level

Title: MARINA VISTA THREE SEAFRONT APARTMENT
Description: four exclusive seafront apartments available on a per night basis perfect for short stays hoilday lets these apartments start from great prices the space the spacenmain front door leading to one flight of communal stairs taking you up to the apartmententrance to the apartment to inviting long hallway first door on your left leads to a good size double bedroom with king size bed 2x bedside tables chest of drawers mirrored wardrobes flat screen tvsecond door on left leads to the bathroom with brand new suite to include showerbath basin wc special feature within this carefully crafted designer bathroom is the built in tv unfortunately the tv is not working at the moment third door on the left gives a convenient storage cupboard for all your coats bags shoes or a pushchairstraight ahead from the main entrance leads directly into the bright welcoming open plan kitchen living space furnished and decorated to a high standard with a flat screen tv bluetooth speaker sofa bed table 4 dining chairs brand new quality kitchen fully equipped with fridgefreezer bosch induction hob extractor fan bosch oven kettle microwave builtin water filter tap knife block set pots pans cutlery glasses cups plates bowls books dvdsthe apartment has wooden floorboards neutral walls ceilings throughout guest access guest accessnguest will have full access to the whole apartment other things to note other things to notenwe have no parking spaces available with these apartments but we can leave parking permits for you when you arrive please take note of these important details about the parking permitnwe do charge 250 a day per vehicle please leave money on side when you departnnwe are zone anmake sure you are in the right zone to avoid parking ticketsnone permit is required per calendar day and only valid for the date validatednscratch off the day date month and yearndaily visitor permit hours is 900 am to 600 pm monday to saturdaynnheres the list of the roads where you can park please check if these are still zone a as we will not take any responsibility for any parking ticketsnnplease make sure you read the road sign and it clearly says you are in the zone a areannif you head towards ms take your 2nd right which will be west buildings then 1st right into augusta place this area is all zone annother zone a roads you can park downnnew streetnaugusta placenchandos roadnliverpool gardensnshelly roadnbuckingham roadngraham roadnsalisbury roadnnif you still are unable to park anywhere there is a multistorey car park above the bowling alley called grafton multi storeynn please note we will not be held responsible if a parking fine is given to you nnnot suitable for anyone who struggles to climb one flight of stairs

Title: Family home on the beach
Description: our beachside family home is the ideal getaway for families with 4 bedrooms 1 superking 1 double and 2 bunkbeds top bunk only suitable for children 2 bathrooms and large livingdining area and fully kitted kitchen you will find all the space you need for a holiday on the beach the enclosed private garden leads directly onto the beach there is parking for 2 cars which is on a private road the house is within walking distance of the town centre with many pubs restaurants and shops the space the spacenleading directly onto an area of private beach our home is the ideal getaway all year round the garden is enclosed making it safe for our younger guests in the winter we have a wood burning stove to ensure cosy eveningsnour house is in a very quiet residential area so we do ask you to respect our neighbours which is why we have a strict no parties or events rulenplease check out all the photos before bookingnplease note at this time we are requesting that all guests bring their own bedding and towels due to covid protocols and guidelinesnthis is a well loved family home guest access guest accessnyou have access to the whole house except the private garage other things to note other things to notenno dogs allowednno parties or events allowednthe house is at the end of a private road please be very aware when parking as the road is only accessed by 3 houses each with private parking areas please do not block or obstruct access to the other properties at any timennthis is a family home and you will find personal items storednplease respect our privacy and do not use thesennwe are asking all guests to bring their own bedding and towels due to covid protocols and guidelines the health and safety of our guests is very important to us

Title: Stunning Seafront Penthouse, Private Sun Terrace
Description: small but stunning seafront facing penthouse right at the front and the top of this iconic 1930s grade ii listed building enjoy uninterrupted panoramic sea views from the living room bedroom and private sun terrace accessed from both the living room and bedroom a very special place very well equipped with everything you may need for your stay including white company towels and egyptian cotton bedlinen onsite parking also available at an additional nightly rate a rarity in brighton the space the spacensituated right at the top and front of this beautiful iconic grade ii listed building this small but stunning penthouse apartment directly faces the sea enjoying panoramic uninterrupted sea views from the living room bedroom and the 73 x 17m private sun terrace with doors opening directly onto the terrace from both the living room and bedroom the apartment offers a great value alternative to seafront hotel rooms often twice the price for just a bedroombathroom with either a tiny or no balcony onsite parking is also available at a nightly rate a rarity in brightonnnthere are lifts to take you up to the top floor and the apartment is furnished and equipped to a very high standard with everything you may need for your stay including high quality egyptian cotton bedlinen and fluffy white company towels fast wifi is available throughout the apartment and there are wallmounted lcd televisions in both the living room and the bedroom with virgin cable tv and netflix on sunny days the large private sun terrace enjoys the sun all day long and even in winter the sunsets from the terrace and the apartment are absolutely stunningnnthe beautiful bespoke italian blue granite kitchen is very well equipped for selfcatering and the stunning bespoke designer bathroom has luxurious underfloor heating and a rainfall shower were delighted to be in tripadvisors top 5 guestrated of all holiday apartments in brighton and hove and to hold their coveted certificate of excellence for the fourth year runningnnembassy court is a beautiful and historic listed 1930s modernist building and the apartment and its top floor neighbours were the first ever purposebuilt penthouses in the uk so it has a lovely architectural significance the architect wells coates who also designed the famous isokon building in london made pleasure and making the most of the wonderful top floor views his top priority for the apartment the private sun terrace and the windows and glass doors run the length of the apartment giving wonderful light and a stunning sense of openness and space with the panoramic views youll see from the photos that the bedroom is small but looking right out to sea you can sit up in bed and look out at the amazing viewsnnplease note that the while the apartment can sleep four with use of the sofabed by prior arrangement it is small and best suited to two adults with up to two children we are unable to accept bookings for three or four adultsnnliving room 42m x 32mndirectly faces the seafront with sea views stretching across the entire length of the room and doors opening onto the lovely private sun terrace real scandinavian wood floors sofa seating for four wallmounted lcd tv dining table and chairs for four two glass electric radiatorsnnkitchen 26m x 19mnfully fitted and well equipped kitchen with italian blue granite surfaces and siemens appliances dishwasher washerdryer fridgefreezer microwave glass convection hob and oven plinth heating farreaching views across the rooftops of brighton and hove to the sussex downs real scandinavian wood floorsnnbedroom 27m x 25mndirectly facing the seafront very small bedroom with enormous stunning sea views along the length of the room and doors opening onto the lovely private sun terrace double bed wallmounted lcd tv small wardrobe real scandinavian wood floors glass electric radiatornnbathroom 24m x 2mnbespoke italian fully tiled bathroom with luxurious underfloor heating and deep bath with rainfall shower overnnsun terrace 73m x 17mndirectly facing the seafront with breathtaking panoramic views fully tiled private sun terrace with designer planters from chelsea flower show award winner fernando gonzalez dining table seating for fournnstep out of the front door of the building and you are on the seafront the flat is located close to central brighton with all its attractions shops restaurants the pier the i360 and the lanes and has many fantastic amenities on its doorstep including one of the best restaurants in brighton the gingerman waitrose sainsburys and the wonderful taj supermarkets are a few minutes walk and there is a small convenience store next door to the building brighton and hove stations are five minutes by taxi gatwick airport thirty minutes by train and london fifty minutes by trainnnonsite parking can be arranged in advance at an extra nightly rate cheaper than onstreet or the local car parks there is lift access but as a listed building with some steps and the lifts being very small we regret that there is no wheelchair access for children we happily provide the following free of charge travel cot with mattress highchair wooden bed safety rails childrens plates cups bowls and cutlerynnif you are interested in staying with us please let us know a little about yourself and your trip along with any questions you might have and well get back to you asap guest access guest accessnyou are booking the entire apartment to enjoy other things to note other things to notenplease note that the apartment is small and best suited to two adults and up to two children were unable to accept bookings for three or four adults

Title: SeaScape - Luxury Romantic Retreat with Sea Views
Description: at a glancenncompletely refurbished in 201617 seascape is the ideal place to take advantage of the beautiful sussex coastlinennsituated just a stones throw away from the sea front promenade it boasts fully opening bifold doors on to a balcony with sea views stretching right to the tip of eastbourne the space the spacencompletely refurbished is 2017 seascape offers a delightful living space complete with balcony overlooking the seannoffering a spacious double room plus a small double at the rear of the apartment seascape is perfect for couples looking for a quiet relaxing get away guest access guest accessnguests have access to the full apartment including a front balcony and rear stairwell balcony

Title: Stunning sea views from spacious 2 bed apartment
Description: the selfcontained 2 bedroom apartment is located on hastings seafront with wonderful views to hastings pier and the english channel the accomodation has just been completely refurbished with new carpets freshly painted new bathroom and ensuite bathroom to the master bedroom there is an open plan kitchen living area with dining table allowing wonderful views of the english channel throughout the open plan living there are two large double bedrooms one with own ensuite bathroom the space the spacenthere is direct beach access a short stroll across the coastal road and youre on the beach or on the promenadenthe apartment is within walking distance to hastings town centre and the historic old town land based fishing fleet and allows for a pleasant walk along the promenade to burton st leonards with its collection of antique shops art galleries and restaurantsnweather permitting you can have enjoy the beach and spend a day swimming or a family picnic on the beach walking and cycling are great ways to explore keep fit and enjoy the long promenade using the 7km beachside trafficfree route is the perfect way to discover the extensive hastings seafront with plenty of fascinating places to stop and explore along the waynthe accommodation has double glazing throughout and gchnthe apartment is located on the third floor its a period building with no lift but the climb is worth it to enjoy the magnificent viewsnthe holiday flat is immaculately presented after just completing refurbishment in april it has a modern bright simple and uncluttered feelnboth bedrooms have huge wardrobes which are ideal for families or friends to store clothing etcnthe dining table extends to comfortably seat 6 peoplenthe open plan nature of the accomodation allows either family or friends to enjoy the holiday togethernthe communal hallway and stairs leading to the holiday flat are scheduled to be redecorated in the winter

Title: Scandi Beach
Description: a stunning and unique scandinavian inspired architectural house right on the beach shorehambyseann360 views of the sea and the downs behind the town spacious accommodation with six bedrooms superbly equipped kitchen magnificent bar stylish dining area cosy seating downstairs with entrance on to patio leading to barbequefirepit sunken gardennnupstairs spectacular lounge with magnificent outside terrace large screen television on both floors ample parkingnnwe also offer catering the spacendesigned by award winning architect the villa is spacious and delightful to be in guest access guest accessnguests can access the whole of the villa including the front drive and back garden the villa is situated on the beach itself other things to note other things to notenscandi beachnshoreham beachnplease can you ensure all guests have read the house rulesnnwelcome to scandi beach we hope you have an enjoyable staynnnoise outside areasnkeep your noise at a tolerable level especially when eating drinking entertainingnwhen entering or leaving property please be respectful to our lovely neighbours and do not congregate in the streetnwe ask guests to refrain from excessive noise outside the property after 1030pm and any complaints from neighbours about guests disrespecting this will receive a 150 fine please keep noise inside the property also to a minimum after 1030pm and continuing festivities to be moved to the more private first floor and balconynnkeys check outnon checkin we provide you with 2 sets of keysnensure all doors are locked when leaving the property and when retiring for the eveningnplease leave our lovely property as you found it we provide all cleaning products and have a hoover and mop within the property please do not move furniture as scratches the floornif you spill drinks on the wooden floor please mop up as it will stain if left to settlenleave 2 sets of keys on departure 75 chargeset unreturnednno candles or naked flames pleasenplease do not download any illegal music or films on our internet pleasennfootwearnplease no stilettoes at all we have beautiful wooden flooring so kindly ask you to refrain from spoiling with shoesnnsmokingnif you need to smoke please do so in the back garden preferably exiting from the southwest patio door so to be a distance from the neighbours smoke on the balcony on the first floor after 1030nndecorationsnif you put up decorations please do not use sellotape or bluetac as it damages the paint work any decorations left such as glitter or confetti an additional 50 will be added to the cleaning fee subtracted from the damage depositnnif confetti gets wet it stains and subsequently ruins floorsnnrubbish recyclingnplease do not leave rubbish inside the property the recycling and and refuse bin are outside at the entrancenncomplaintsnyou are staying at the heart of shoreham beach a very tight community this is also a residential area with families living close by so please be mindful of your noise and behaviournncouncils enforce specific rules regarding noise and behaviour within short terms lets if we receive a complaint from the neighbour this will result in deductions from your depositnnif we receive a complaints regarding these house rules we will deduct 150 from the security deposit 2 complaints your whole deposit with be withheld three complaints during your stay will result in an immediate eviction from the property

Title: The Blue House on the Beach in Camber
Description: the blue house is a truly stunning house its location is spectacular situated on the miles of sandy beach in camber close to rye within easy access from london finished to the highest standards with bespoke kitchen apple tv luxurious beds and sofas it is an ideal escape for a coastal retreat good for couples families big groups and furry friends pets please do get in touch the space the spacenwant a beach holiday with sand between your toes from the moment you arrive this stunning beach house is built on the foreshore of camber sands offering a truly luxurious escape please read the access information before bookingnnthis stylish and contemporary air conditioned house sleeps 8 guests in four bedroomsnnthis property brings the sea to your doorstep immerse yourself in water activities jaunts in the dunes or collapse on the deck or if its a little cool or windy snuggle up on the sofa in the living room with a good book or pair of binoculars apple tv and in built ipad sonos system are available when you get bored of the viewnndownstairs the living room over looks the deck there is a bespoke kitchen dishwasher oven microgrill oven fridgefreezer and separate drinks fridge which offers plenty of scope to cook up a storm eat at the handmade dining table overlooking the beach or fire up the bbq on the deck there are two bedrooms downstairs a large superking bedroom surf with wardrobe and a twin bedroom with 3ft beds and apple tv sharing a double shower wetroom the laundry room is equipped with a washing machine and separate dryer and has a side entrance for access to the housennupstairs the two stunning superking bedrooms beach dunes are both beautifully appointed with free standing baths and the front bedroom with an additional shower and usb ports by the bed all linen is white superior egyptian cotton beautifully decorated throughout in muted colours that dont jar with the incredible viewnnsimply put it is the perfect retreat in all weathers a log burning stove for cosy autumnal and wintery escapes sliding doors onto a decked terrace enclosed to offer security and privacynndogs are very welcome but please be aware of the dog restrictions on the beach between 1 may 30 september there is an additional charge of 35 for 2 dogsnnnew for 2021 stays smokeless wood burning fire pit and ooni pizza oven nnaccess infonnthe blue house is accessed from the car park via the beach if you have a 44 you are allowed to drive onto the beach and park one car in front of the house at the discretion the beach inspector in peak periods high tides and full beach do not park between the houses as this is owned by the neighbours there is a car pass that enables one car to park for free in the car park for the duration of your stay there is a barrier that the beach inspector will put up if there is deemed a risk to beach goers and will prevent access this is usually at high tide with a full beach or servere adverse conditionsnnwe do not advise leaving any car on the beach in bad weather as the salt and sand could seriously damage the paintwork and it is entirely at the owners own risk guest access guest accessnaccess to the blue house is across the beach one proper 4x4 may park drive across the beach and park in front of the house 150m if you dont have a 4x4 there is one pass for the car park other free parking is available in camber but not guaranteed

Title: "A little piece of heaven"

Title: Marine Parade, Worthing
Description: getaway with sea viewsnmake yourself at home in this 2 bedroomed first floor regency apartment holiday let on worthings vibrant seafront listen to the seagulls and sounds of the buzzing promenade enjoy stunning views while relaxing on the large comfortable sofa in this ideal holiday home for a family or friends the space the spacenthe loungekitchendiner has impressive floor to ceiling sash windows with panoramic views across the promenade and sea there is a large family sofa and dining for 4 people the wellequipped kitchen includes oven hob microwave and fridgefreezer there is a smart tv with amazon and netflix and free wi finthe comfortable master bedroom has an oak bed large wardrobe armchair and an ensuite shower room this bedroom window has a distant sea viewnthe second bedroom has two 3foot wooden single beds and an open wardrobennext to the second bedroom is a bathroom with a washerdryernthe property benefits from central heating

Title: Lancing Beach Apartment
Description: an apartment directly on the beach at lancing west sussex with a whole wall of glass facing the continually changing view of the sea and sky easy access to brighton worthing shoreham trains buses roads located above the award winning perch on lancing beach restaurant pop downstairs for an early morning breakfast or bring your coffee back to the balcony to enjoy the view the space the spacenthis is a brand new purpose built apartment in a modern design low energy eco building which is situated directly on the beach it is on the first floor with an outdoor balcony over looking the beach and sea there is a cafe restaurant on site as well as a well equipped gym the gym can be used by purchasing a day pass for only 5 the usual day rate is 10 there is a kite surfing school on this beach also this coast line boasts wonderful off road walks and cycling along the coastal path with shoreham to the east and worthing to the west both in easy walking distance guest access guest accessnthe apartment has its own front door and a shared locked entrance lobby where cycles or water sports equipment can be stored safely there is an entry phone access for safety there is a large car park adjacent to the green where you can park for 150 a day other things to note other things to notenthe cafe is open every day and some evenings during the summer months there is a local pub chippy greek chinese and indian restaurants all in very close walking distance worthing is less than 2 miles away and there are restaurants cafes of every type a large shopping centre a museum 2 cinemas a theatre and well stocked library there is a local hospital with an a e department less than 2 miles away the vibrant cosmopolitain town of brighton is only 11 miles to the eastnwe keep a variety of guide books for people new to the area

Description: light roomy space with outside garden 5 minutes walk from seafront the space the spacen5 minutes walk to seafront 20 minutes walk to brighton pier and 2 minutes from hove seafrontnrock water is nearby as is hove lagoon guest access guest accessnowing to covid and stringent regulations we cannot provide parking permits at this time the local council will only issues permits by signature post or personal collection by the property owner who does not live locally we are hoping to be able to provide permits by march 2022 other things to note other things to notenplease can guests be aware that an elderly lady lives above thank younnthe heating is programmed on a timer but can be overridden using the and buttons on the timer control in the hallway also there is a controller in the kitchen beneath the boiler press the button on it and the boiler will kick in any issues with that just call

Title: Sea front flat with a stunning view!

Title: MP713 - Camber Sands Holiday Park - Sleeps 6 + 1 small dog - 2 Bedrooms - Quiet Area
Description: with all the modern amenities our contemporary accommodation will allow you to relax and unwind whilst being only a few minutes walk to 7 miles of sand and sea if you are looking for fun the holiday park boasts facilities such as swimming pools restaurant gokarts mini golf soft play and plenty of evening entertainment for all the familynas of 1st january 2021 all bookings include linen and towels dressed onto the beds plus a cleaning pack the space the spacenmodern 2 bedroom luxury caravan with patio doors leading out onto a gated wrap around decking area this is the perfect caravan to relax and enjoy the surrounding countryside this caravan has everything you should need including a dishwasher washing machine free wifi smart tv in living room and a master bedroom with a tv and ensuite bathroom the caravan is located over the back part of the park where its nice and quiet but only a short stroll to the facilities or beach parking is located nearby in allocated parking baysnnlounge bright living area with double french doors opening up onto decking plenty of comfy seating smart tv with freeview additional sleeping with pull out sofabednnkitchen lots of worktop and cupboard space equipped with everything you may need if you choose to stay in and cook freestanding table and chairsnnbedrooms spacious master bedroom with tv and en suite bathroom second bedroom with 2 single beds sofa bed in living roomnnbathrooms main bathroom has good size shower toilet and sink en suite in master bedroom with toiletnnparking short distance away on a first come first served basisnndistance to play area 34 minute walkndistance to beach 4 5 minute walkndistance to entertainment 34 minute walknnpets 1 small pet allowed 25 additional surchargennas of 1st january 2021 all bookings include linen and towels dressed onto the beds plus a cleaning packnnplease note entertainment passes are not included with your stay and would need to be purchased either in advance or upon arrival you require these to have access to restaurants bars outside areas and all other facilities after 5pm you will also require entertainment passes to access swimming pools at any time you will enjoy access to the full holiday home with no shared access other things to note other things to notenimportant informationnbars restaurants shops and all facilities including evening showbar entertainment and swimming usually starts from february half term through to the start of november and require passes for access after 5pm passes are also required for the activities and are bookable via parkdean resorts office upon arrival we arent able to assist with this as we are completely different companies slots are not guaranteed and are subject to their availabilitynthe exact season start and end date is not guaranteed if you are booking early or late in the season please check the dates and schedule before you booknthe passes can be purchased via us at the same price as park and we leave them in the property for you for when you arrive if you would like a quote for us to provide these please messagennlinens and towels will be provided for all guests listed on the booking so please ensure the guest details are correct on your bookingnnthe park is bbq friendly but we do not supply or hire bbqs you will need to provide your own they are not permitted close to the properties must not be on the decking if applicablenncamber getaways are a local agent who look after privately owned properties for their owners you will be sent checking in and property details 12 weeks prior to your arrival via email so please ensure you check your messages and emails

Title: Sea Scene's ,  Hayling Island
Description: sea scenes is a homely two bedroom groundfloor apartment located on haylings beautiful stretch of beach and perfectly situated for stunning views across the solentnnhayling island is ideal for holiday makers and families as it retains all the attractions of a traditional seaside resort one of the biggest attractions is the funland amusement park at beachlands which has everything from roller coasters to a games arcade and a soft play area the hayling seaside railway that runs from beachlands to eastoke corner is equally popularnnthe island is also well known for its watersports in fact windsurfing was invented here and miles of glorious seafront the local water is perfect for sailing windsurfing power boating jet skiing and morennthere are various great places to eat if you dont feel like cooking from nice restaurants to pubs and of course a wide range of takeaways hayling is also well served by shops so anything you need during your stay is right on handnnhowever if you feel like venturing out and exploring nearby areas the attractions of portsmouth southsea emsworth and staunton country park are all close bynnthe property itself is well furnished and feels comfortable and welcomingnnthe livingkitchen area is open and spacious with amazing views overlooking the sea the living area consists of comfortable sofas and a smart tv the kitchen area is well equipped with a kettle nespresso maker cafetiere cooker fridge freezer microwave toaster washing machine and dryer along with a wooden dining table that seats fournnthe master bedroom has a queen size bed a stylish dressing table and a smart tv the second bedroom has a single bed which can be pulled out to make a comfortable king size bed please note once the bed has been pulled out there is limited room in the bedroomnnthere is a stylish walk in shower and a separate wcnnthere is no bbq provided for the garden however you are more than welcome to bring your own and enjoy the amazing scenerynnwifi is included with this property and there is enough parking for 2 cars
